GSP33vacbhamu:1: bhāmatī. anirvācyāvidyādvitayasacivasya prabhavato vivartā yasyaite viyadanilatejo 'bavanayaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:6: śāśvatāya namaskurmo vedāya ca bhavāya ca //3 //
GSP33vacbhamu:15: atha yadasaṃdigdhamapirayojanaṃ ca na tatprekṣāvatpratipitsāgocaraḥ, yathā
GSP33vacbhamu:16: samanaskendriya- saṃnikṛṣṭaḥ sphītālokamadhyavartī ghaṭaḥ, karaṭadantā vā ; tathā cedaṃ brabmeti vyāpakaviruddhopalabdhiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:18: sa cāyam ākīṭapataṅgebhya ā ca devarṣibhyaḥ prāṇabhṛnmātrasyedaṅkārāspadebhyo dehendriyamanobuddhiviṣayebhyo
GSP33vacbhamu:20: na hi jātu kaścidatra saṃdigdhe 'ahaṃ vā nāhaṃ vā' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:24: tadālambanatve hi 'yo 'haṃ bālye pitarāvanvabhūvaṃ sa eva sthāvire praṇaptṝnanubhavāmi' iti pratisaṃdhānaṃ na bhavet /
GSP33vacbhamu:25: na hi bālasthavirayoḥ śarīrayorasti manāgapi pratyabhijñānagandho yenaikatvaṃ adhyavasīyeta
GSP33vacbhamu:26: tasmādyeṣu vyāvartamāneṣu yadanuvartate tattebhyo bhinnaṃ yathā kusumebhyaḥ sūtram /
GSP33vacbhamu:27: tathā ca bālādiśarīreṣu vyāvartamāneṣvapi parasparamahaṅkārāspadamanuvartamānaṃ tebhyo bhidyate
GSP33vacbhamu:28: api ca svapnānte divyaṃ śarīrabhedamāsthāya taducitānbhogānbhuñjāna eva pratibuddho manuṣyaśarīramātmānaṃ paśyan 'nāhaṃ devo manuṣya eva' iti devaṣaśarīre bādhyamāne 'pyahamāspadamabādhyamānaṃ śarīrādbhinnaṃ pratipadyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:31: ata eva nendriyāṇyapyasyālambanam, indriyabhede 'pi 'yo 'hamadrākṣaṃ sa evaitarhi spṛśāmi' ityahamā-lambanasya pratyabhijñānāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:36: tasmādidaṅkārāspadebhyo dehendriyamanobuddhiviṣayebhyo vyāvṛttaḥ sphuṭatarāhamanubhavagamya ātmā saṃśayābhāvādajijñāsya iti siddham /
GSP33vacbhamu:38: tathā hi- saṃsāranivṛttirapavarga iha prayojanaṃ vivakṣitam /
GSP33vacbhamu:47: tasmādanubhavavirodhādupacaritārthā evopaniṣada iti yuktamutpaśyāma ityāśayavānāśaṅkya pariharati- yuṣmadasmatpratyayagocarayoḥ iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:48: atra ca yuṣmadasmat ityādiḥ mithyeti bhavituṃ yuktaṃ ityantaḥ śaṅkāgranthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:52: yathā hyahaṅkārapratiyogī tvaṅkāro naivamidaṅkāraḥ, 'ete vayam, ime vayam,
GSP33vacbhamu:54: citsvabhāva ātmā viṣayī, jaḍasvabhāvā buddhīndriyadehaviṣayā viṣayāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:55: ete hi cidātmānaṃ visinvanti avabadhnanti ; svena rūpeṇa nirūpaṇīyaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:57: parasparānadhyāsahetau atyantavailakṣaṇye dṛṣṭāntaḥ - tamaḥ prakāśavat iti
GSP33vacbhamu:58: na hi jātu kaścitsamudācāradvṛttinī prakāśatamasī parasparātmatayā pratipattumarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:62: mā bhūddharmiṇoḥ parasparabhāvaḥ ; taddharmāṇāṃ tu jāḍyacaitanyanityatvānityatvādīnāṃ itaretarādhyāso bhaviṣyati /
GSP33vacbhamu:63: dṛśyate hi dharmiṇorvivekagrahaṇe 'pi taddharmāṇāmadhyāsaḥ, yathā kusumādbhedena gṛhyamāṇe 'pi sphaṭikamaṇāvatisvacchatayā japākusumapratibimbodgrāhiṇi 'aruṇaḥ sphaṭikaḥ' ityāruṇyavibhrama ityata idamuktam - taddharmāṇāmapi iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:64: itaretaratra dharmiṇi dharmāṇāṃ bhāvo vinimayaḥ, tasyānupapattiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:65: ayamabhisaṃdhiḥ - rūpavaddhi dravyamatisvacchatayā rūpavato dravyāntarasya tadvivekena gṛhyamāṇasyāpi cchāyāṃ gṛhṇīyāt, cidātmā tu nīrūpo viṣayī na viṣayacchāyāmudgrāhayitumarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:68: tadiha pāriśeṣyādviṣayaviṣayiṇoranyonyātmasaṃbhedenaiva taddharmāṇāmapi parasparasaṃbhedena vinimayātmanā bhavitavyam , tau ceddharmiṇau atyantavivekena gṛhyamāṇāvasaṃbhinnau, asaṃbhinnāḥ sutarāṃ tayordharmāḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:74: etaduktaṃ bhavati - adhyāso bhedāgraheṇa vyāptaḥ, tadviruddhaścehāsti
GSP33vacbhamu:76: mithyeti bhavituṃ yuktaṃ yadyapi tathāpīti yojanā /
GSP33vacbhamu:77: idamatrākūcam - bhavedetadevaṃ yadi 'aham' ityanubhave ātmatatvaṃ prakāśeta /
GSP33vacbhamu:80: na caitānyupakramaparāmarśopasaṃhāraiḥ kriyāsamabhihāreṇedṛgātmatattvamabhidadhati tatparāṇi santi śakyāni śakreṇāpyupacaritārthāni kartum /
GSP33vacbhamu:81: abhyāse hi bhūyastvamarthasya bhavati yathā 'aho darśanīyā aho darśanīyā'
GSP33vacbhamu:83: ahamanubhavastu prādeśikamanekavidhaśokaduḥkhādiprapañcopaplutamātmānamādarśayan kathamātmatattvagocaraḥ kathaṃ vānupaplavaḥ ? na ca jyeṣṭhapramāṇapratyakṣavirodhādāmnāyasyaiva tadapekṣasyāprāmāṇyamupacaritārthatvaṃ veti yuktam, tasyāpauruṣeyatayā
GSP33vacbhamu:89: na hyāgamajñānaṃ sāṃvyavahārikaṃ pratyakṣasya prāmāṇyamupahanti yena kāraṇābhāvānna bhavet ; api tu tāttvikam /
GSP33vacbhamu:92: tathā ca varṇe hrasvatvadīrghatvādayo 'nyadharmā api samāropitāḥ tattvapratipattihetavaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:93: na hi laukikāḥ 'nāgaḥ' iti vā”nagaḥ”iti vā padātkuñcaraṃ vā taruṃ vā pratipadyamānā bhavanti bhrāntāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:94: na cānanyaparaṃ vākyaṃ svārtha upacaritārthaṃ yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:95: uktaṃ hi - 'na vidhau paraḥ śabdārthaḥ' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:96: jyeṣṭhatvaṃ ca anapekṣitasya bādhyatve hetuḥ na tu bādhakatve,
GSP33vacbhamu:100: tathā ca pāramarṣaṃ sūtram - 'paurvāparye pūrvadaurbalyaṃ prakṛtivat' iti
GSP33vacbhamu:105: api ca ye 'pyahaṅkārāspadamātmānamāsthiṣata tairapyasya na tāttvikatvamabhyupetavyam, 'ahamihaivāsmi sadane jānānaḥ' iti sarvavyāpinaḥ prādeśikatvena grahaṇāt uccataragiriśikharavartiṣu mahātaruṣu bhūmiṣṭhasya dūrvāpravālanirbhāsapratyayavat /
GSP33vacbhamu:106: na cedaṃ dehasya prādeśikatvamanubhūyate na tvātmana iti sāṃpratam /
GSP33vacbhamu:107: na hi tadaivaṃ bhavati 'aham' iti, gauṇatve vā na 'jānānaḥ' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:108: api ca paraśabdaḥ paratra lakṣyamāṇaguṇayogena vartata iti yatra prayoktṛpratipattroḥ saṃpratipattiḥ sa gauṇaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:112: juhoti' ityatra sādhyasādṛśyena gauṇaḥ, māṇavake cānubhavasiddhabhede siṃhātsiṃhaśabdaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:113: na tvahaṅkārasya mukhyor'tho nirluṭhitagarbhatayā dehādibhyo bhinno
GSP33vacbhamu:115: na cātyantanirūṭhatayā gauṇe 'pi na gauṇatvābhimānaḥ sārṣapādiṣu
GSP33vacbhamu:117: tatrāpi snehāttilabhavādbhede siddha eva sārṣapādīnāṃ tailaśabdavācyatvābhimānaḥ, na tvarthayostailasārṣapayorabhedādhyavasāyaḥ tatsiddhaṃ gauṇatvamubhayadarśino gauṇamukhyavivekavijñānena vyāptam,
GSP33vacbhamu:118: tadiha vyāpakaṃ vivekavijñānaṃ nivartamānaṃ gauṇatāmapi nivartayatīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:119: na ca bālasthaviraśarīrabhede 'pi 'so 'ham' ityekasyātmanaḥ pratisaṃdhānadehādibhyo bhedenāstyātmānubhava iti vācyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:121: parīkṣakā api hi vyavahārasamaye na lokasāmāmyamativartante /
GSP33vacbhamu:123: bāhyā apyāhuḥ -'śāstracintakāḥ khalvevaṃ vivecayanti na pratipattāraḥ' iti
GSP33vacbhamu:124: tatpāriśeṣyāccidātmagocaramahaṅkāram 'ahamihāsmi sadane' iti prayuñjāno laukikaḥ śarīrādyabhedagrahādātmanaḥ prādeśikatvamabhimanyate nabhasa iva ghaṭamaṇikamallikādyupādhyavacchedāditi yuktamutpaśyāmaḥ na cāhaṅkāraprāmāṇyāya dehādivadātmāpi prādeśika iti yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:126: aṇupariṃmāṇatve 'sthūlo 'ham, dīrghaḥ' iti ca na syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:128: kiñca asminpakṣe avayavasamudāyo vā cetayet, pratyekaṃ vāvayavāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:129: pratyekaṃ cetanatvapakṣe bahūnāṃ cetanānāṃ svatantrāṇāmekavākyatābhāvādaparyāyaṃ viruddhadikkriyatayā
GSP33vacbhamu:131: samudāyasya tu caitanyayoge vṛkṇa ekasminnavayave cidātmano 'pyavayavo
GSP33vacbhamu:134: ya evāvayavo yadā viśīrṇastadā tadabhāve na cetayet /
GSP33vacbhamu:135: vijñānālambanatve 'pi ahaṃpratyayasya bhrāntatvaṃ tadavasthameva, tasya sthiravastunirbhāsatvādasthiratvācca vijñānānām /
GSP33vacbhamu:136: etena 'sthūlo 'ham andho 'ham gacchāmi' ityādayo 'pi adhyāsatayā vyākhyātāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:137: tadevamuktena krameṇa ahaṃpratyaye pūtikūṣmāṇḍīkṛte bhagavatī śrutiḥ apratyūhaṃ kartṛtvabhoktṛtvasukhaduḥkhaśokādyātmatvamahamanubhavaprasañjitamātmano niṣeddhumarhatīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:143: iti śabdasūcitaśca śarīrādyanukūlaṃ pratikūlaṃ ca prameyajātaṃ pramāṇena pramāya tadupādānaparivarjanādiḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:144: anyonyadharmāṃścādhyasya anyonyasmindharmiṇi dehādidharmān janmamaraṇajarāvyādhyādīnātmani dharmiṇi adhyastadehādibhāve samāropya,
GSP33vacbhamu:148: atra ca adhyāsavyavahārakriyābhyāṃ yaḥ kartā unnītaḥ sa samāna iti samānakartṛkatvena 'adhyasya vyavahāraḥ' ityupapannam /
GSP33vacbhamu:153: tadevamadhyāsasvarūpaṃ phalaṃ ca vyavahāramuktvā tasya nimittamāha -
GSP33vacbhamu:156: atha aviveka eva kasmānna bhavati, tathā ca nādhyāsa ityata āha -
GSP33vacbhamu:158: paramārthato dharmiṇoratādātmyaṃ vivekaḥ dharmāṇāṃ cāsaṃkīrṇatā vivekaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:161: iha tu paramārthasataḥ cidātmano 'nyanna dehādyasti vastusat, tatkutaḥ cidātmano bhedāgrahaḥ kutaśca tādātmyavibhramaḥ ityata āha - satyānṛte mithunīkṛtya iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:163: satyaṃ cidātmā, anṛtaṃ buddhīndriyadehādiḥ ; te dve dharmiṇī mithunīkṛtya yugalīkṛtyetyarthaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:164: na ca saṃvṛtiparamārthasatoḥ pāramārthakaṃ mithunamastītyabhūtatadbhāvārthasya cveḥ prayogaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:168: āropyasya pratītau satyāṃ pūrvadṛṣṭasya samāropaḥ samāropanibandhanā ca pratītiriti durvāraṃ parasparāśrayatvamityata āha - naisargika iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:173: advā pūrvapratītimātramupayujyate ārope, na tu pratīyamānasya
GSP33vacbhamu:175: pratītireva tu atyantāsato gaganakamalinīkalpasya dehendriyādeḥ nopapadyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:176: prakāśamānatvameva hi cidātmano 'pi sattvaṃ na tu tadatiriktaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:178: sattāyāścārthakriyākāritāyāśca sattāntarārthakriyākāritāntarakalpane anavasthāpātāt prakāśamānataiva sattā abhyupetavyā /
GSP33vacbhamu:179: tathā ca dehādayaḥ prakāśamānatvānnāsantaḥ cidātmavat, asattve vā na
GSP33vacbhamu:181: tadabhāve vā kasya kuto bhedāgrahaḥ ? tadasaṃbhave kuto 'dhyāsaḥ ?
GSP33vacbhamu:182: ityāśayavān āha ākṣeptā- ko 'yamadhyāso nāma iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:192: tasya ca dṛṣṭatvamātramupayujyate na vastusatteti dṛṣṭagrahaṇam /
GSP33vacbhamu:193: tathāpi vartamānaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ darśanaṃ nāropopayogīti pūrva- ityuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:200: asti hi svastimatyāṃ gavi pūrvadṛṣṭasya gotvasya paratra kālākṣyāmavabhāsaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:201: asti ca pāṭaliputre pūrvadṛṣṭasya devadattasya paratra māhiṣmatyāmavabhāsaḥ samīcīnaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:202: avabhāsapadaṃ ca samīcīne 'pi pratyaye prasiddham, yathā nīlasyāvabhāsaḥ pītasyāvabhāsa iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:211: tathā hi- bahirvinirgacchajatyacchanayanaraśmisaṃpṛktapittadravyavartinīṃ pītatāṃ pittarahitāmanubhavan, śaṅkhaṃ ca doṣācchāditaśuklimānamanubhavan,
GSP33vacbhamu:216: evaṃ vijñātṛpuruṣābhimukheṣvādarśodakādiṣu svaccheṣu cākṣuṣaṃ tejo lagnamapi balīyasā saureṇa tejasā pratisrotaḥ pravartitaṃ mukhasaṃyuktaṃ mukhaṃ grāhayet, doṣavaśāttaddeśatāmanabhimukhatāṃ ca mukhyasyāgrāhayat,
GSP33vacbhamu:219: etaduktaṃ bhavati- na prakāśamānatāmātraṃ sattvam, yena dehendriyādeḥ prakāśamānatayā sadbhāvo bhavet /
GSP33vacbhamu:220: na hi sarpātadabhāvena rajjvādayo vā sphaṭikādayo vā raktādiguṇayogino na
GSP33vacbhamu:221: pratibhāsante, pratibhāsamānā vā bhavanti tadātmānastaddharmāṇo vā /
GSP33vacbhamu:226: na ca marīcirūpeṇa salilamavastusat svarūpeṇa tu paramārthasadeva dehendriyādayastu svarūpeṇāpyasanta ityanubhavāgocaratvātkathamāropyanta iti sāṃpratam ; yato yadyasanto nānubhavagocarāḥ kathaṃ tarhi marīcyādīnāmasatāṃ toyādyātmatayānubhavagocaratvam ? na ca svarūpasattvena
GSP33vacbhamu:228: yadyucyeta- nābhāvo nāma bhāvādanyaḥ kaścidasti, api tu bhāva eva bhāvāntarātmanā abhāvaḥ svena rūpeṇa tu bhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:233: prapañcasya punaratyantāsato nirastasamastasāmarthyasya nistattvasya kuto 'nubhavaviṣayabhāvaḥ, kuto vā cidātmanyāropaḥ ? na ca viṣayasya
GSP33vacbhamu:236: yato yeyamasatprakāśanaśaktirvijñānasya kiṃ punarasyāḥ śakyam ? asaditi
GSP33vacbhamu:237: cet, kimetatkāryam, āhosvidasyā jñāpyam ? na tāvatkāryam,
GSP33vacbhamu:240: vijñānasvarūpameva asataḥ prakāśa iti cet. kaḥ punareṣa sadasatoḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:241: saṃbandhaḥ ? asadadhīnanirūpaṇatvaṃ sato jñānasya asatā saṃbandha iti cet,
GSP33vacbhamu:242: aho batāyamatinirvṛtaḥ pratyayatapasvī yadasya asatyapi nirūpaṇamāyatate /
GSP33vacbhamu:243: na ca pratyayastatrādhatte kiñcit, asata ādhāratvāyogāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:244: asadantareṇa pratyayo na prathata iti pratyayasyaivaiṣa svabhāvaḥ na tvasadadhīnamasya kiñciditi cet, aho batāsya asatpakṣapātaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:245: yadayamatadutpattiḥ atadātmā ca tadavinābhāvaniyataḥ pratyaya iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:247: atra brūmaḥ- nistattvaṃ cennānubhavagocaraḥ, tatkimidānīṃ marīcayo 'pi
GSP33vacbhamu:250: dvividhaṃ ca vastūnāṃ tattvam- sattvamasattvaṃ ca tatra pūrvaṃ svataḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:256: tatkiṃ marīciṣu toyanirbhāsapratyayastattvagocaraḥ ? tathā ca samīcīna iti na bhrānto nāpi bādhyeta /
GSP33vacbhamu:257: addhā ! na bādhyeta yadi marīcīnayaṃ atoyātmatattvānatoyātmanā gṛhṇīyāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:258: toyātmanā tu gṛhṇan kathama bhrāntaḥ, kathaṃ vā abādhyaḥ ? hanta !
GSP33vacbhamu:259: toyābhāvātmanāṃ marīcināṃ toyabhāvātmatvaṃ tāvanna sat, teṣāṃ toyābhāvādabhedena toyabhāvātmatānupapatteḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:262: na cāropitaṃ rūpaṃ vastvantaram ; taddhi marīcayo vā bhavet, gaṅgādigataṃ toyaṃ vā /
GSP33vacbhamu:263: pūrvasminkalpe 'marīcayaḥ' iti pratyayaḥ syāt, na 'toyam' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:264: uttarasmiṃstu 'gaṅgāyāṃ toyam' iti syāt, na punaḥ 'iha' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:265: deśabhedāsmaraṇe 'toyam' iti syāt, na pula 'iha' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:268: tasmānna sat, nāsat, nāpi sadasat parasparavirodhāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:269: ityanirvācyamevāropaṇīyaṃ marīciṣu toyamāstheyam ; tadanena krameṇādhyastaṃ toyaṃ paramārthatoyamiva, ata eva pūrvadṛṣṭamiva ;
GSP33vacbhamu:270: tattvatastu na toyam, na ca pūrvadṛṣṭam ; kiṃ tu anṛtam anirvācyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:272: pūrvamithyāpratyayopadarśita iva paratra cidātmanyadhyasyata iti upapannam, adhyāsalakṣaṇayogāt
GSP33vacbhamu:275: abādhitā svayaṃprakāśataiva asya sattā, sā ca svarūpameva cidātmanaḥ, na tu tadatiriktaṃ sattāsāmānyasamavāyaḥ arthakriyākāritā vā iti sarvamavadātam /
GSP33vacbhamu:282: vijñānavādināmapi, yadyapi na bāhyaṃ vastusat tathāpyanādyavidyāvāsanāropitamalīkaṃ bāhyam ; tatra jñānākārasyāropaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:284: abhyupetavyamityutsargaḥ ; anyathātvaṃ punarasya balavadbādhakapratyayavaśāt ; 'nedaṃ rajatam' iti bādhakasya idantāmātrabādhenāpyupapattau na rajatagocaratocitā /
GSP33vacbhamu:285: rajatasya dharmiṇo bhādhe hi rajataṃ ca tasya dharma idantā ca bādhite bhavetām ; tadvaramidantaivāsya dharmo bādhyatām, na punā rajatamapi
GSP33vacbhamu:286: dharmi ; tathā ca rajataṃ bahirbādhitamarthādāntare jñāne vyavatiṣṭhata
GSP33vacbhamu:288: kecittu- jñānākārakhyātāvaparituṣyanto vadanti- yatra yadadhyāsaḥ tadvivekāgrahanibandhano bhrama iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:292: anubhavo 'pi rajatapratyayo vā syāt, bādhakapratyayo vā /
GSP33vacbhamu:294: sa hi idaṅkārāspadaṃ rajatamāvedayati na tvāntaram /
GSP33vacbhamu:295: 'aham' iti hi tadā syāt, pratipattuḥ pratyayādavyatirekāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:296: bhrāntaṃ vijñānaṃ svākārameva bāhyatayādhyavasyati, tathā ca nāhaṅkārāspadamasya gocaraḥ, jñānākāratā punasya bādhakapratyayamālocayatvāyuṣmān /
GSP33vacbhamu:297: sa kiṃ purovarti dravyaṃ rajatādvivecayati āho jñānākāratāmapyasya darśayati ? tatra jñānākāratopadarśanavyāpāraṃ bādhakapratyayasya bruvāṇaḥ ślāghanīyaprajño devānāṃ priyaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:300: pratipatturatyantasaṃnidhānaṃ tvasya pratipatrātmakaṃ kutastyam ? na caiṣa rajatasya niṣedhaḥ, na ca idantāyāḥ, kiṃ tu vivekāgrahaprasañjitasya
GSP33vacbhamu:302: na ca rajatameva śuktikāyāṃ prasañjitaṃ rajatajñānena /
GSP33vacbhamu:303: na hi rajatanirbhāsasya śuktikālambanaṃ yuktam, anubhavavirodhāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:308: na ca rajatajñāne śuktikā bhāsate, iti kathamālambanam ?
GSP33vacbhamu:309: bhāsamānatābhyupagame vā kathaṃ nānubhavavirodhaḥ ? api cendriyādīnāṃ samīcīnajñānopajanane sāmarthyamupalabdhamiti kathamebhyo
GSP33vacbhamu:311: sāmarthyamiti cet, na, doṣāṇāṃ kāryopajananasāmarthyavidhātamātre hetutvāt
GSP33vacbhamu:315: tathā ca 'rajatam','idam' iti ca dve vijñāne smṛtyanubhavarūpe /
GSP33vacbhamu:317: doṣavaśāttadgataśuktitvasāmānyaviśeṣasyāgrahāt tanmātraṃ ca gṛhītaṃ sadṛśatayā saṃskārodbodhakrameṇa rajate smṛtiṃ janayati /
GSP33vacbhamu:319: tathā ca rajatasamṛteḥ purovartidravyamātragrahaṇasya ca mithaḥ svarūpato viṣayataśca bhedāgrahaṇāt, saṃnihitarajatagocarajñānasārūpyeṇa 'idam',
GSP33vacbhamu:320: ṭarajatam', iti dve ete api grahaṇasmaraṇe abhedavyavahāraṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:322: kvacitpunargrahaṇe e mithaḥ agṛhītabhede, yathā 'pītaḥ śaṅkhaḥ' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:323: atra hi vinirgacchannayanaraśmivartinaḥ pittadravyasya kācasyeva svacchasya pītatvaṃ gṛhyate pittaṃ tu na gṛhyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:326: bhedāgrahaprasañjitābhedavyavahārabādhanācca 'nedam' iti vivekapratyayasya bādhakatvamapyupapadyate ; tadupapattau ca prāktanasya pratyayasya bhrāntatvamapi lokasiddhaṃ siddhaṃ bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:330: yasmin śuktikādau yasya rajatāderadhyāsa iti lokaprasiddhiḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:331: nāsāvanyathākhyātinibandhanā, kiṃ tu gṛhītasya rajatādestatsmaraṇasya ca gṛhītatāṃśapramoṣeṇa gṛhītamātrasya yaḥ 'idam' iti puro 'vasthitāddravyamātrāttatprajñānācca vivekaḥ, tadagrahaṇanibandhano bhramaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:333: anye tu- atrāpyaparituṣyantaḥ- yatra yadadhyāsastasyaiva viparītadharmakalpanāmācakṣate
GSP33vacbhamu:334: atredamākūtam- asti tāvadrajatārthinaḥ 'rajatamidam' iti pratyayātputovartini dravye pravṛttiḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyavyapadeśaśceti sarvajanīnām /
GSP33vacbhamu:336: grahaṇanibandhanau hi cetanasya vyavahāravyapadeśau kathamagrahaṇamātrādbhavetām ? nanūktaṃ nāgrahaṇamātrāt, kiṃ tu grahaṇasmaraṇe eva mithaḥ svarūpato viṣayataścāgṛhītabhede,
GSP33vacbhamu:341: iti grahaṇam, atha vā 'tayoreva svarūpato viṣayataśca mitho bhedāgrahaḥ'
GSP33vacbhamu:343: tatra na tāvatsamīcīnajñānasadṛśī iti jñānaṃ samīcīnajñānavadvyavahārapravartakam /
GSP33vacbhamu:344: na hi 'gosadṛśo gavayaḥ' iti jñānaṃ gavārthinaṃ gavaye pravartayati /
GSP33vacbhamu:345: 'anayoreva bhedāgrahaḥ' iti tu jñānaṃ parāhatam ; na hi bhedāgrahe
GSP33vacbhamu:346: anayoriti bhavati, anayoriti grahe bhedāgrahaṇamiti na bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:347: tasmātsattāmātreṇa bhedāgrahaḥ agṛhīta eva vyavahāraheturiti vaktavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:348: tatra kimayamāropotpādakrameṇa vyavahārahetuḥ, āho anutpāditāropa eva
GSP33vacbhamu:349: svata iti ? vayaṃ tu paśyāmaḥ- cetanavyavahārasya ajñānapūrvakatvānupapatteḥ āropajñānotpādakrameṇaiva- iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:350: nanu satyaṃ cetanavyavahāro nājñānapūrvakaḥ, kiṃ tu aviditavivekagrahaṇasmaraṇapūrvaka iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:354: kathaṃ cāyamidaṅkārāspade pravarteta yadi tu na tadicchet ?
GSP33vacbhamu:356: na cedidaṅkārāspadaṃ rajatamiti jānīyāt kathaṃ rajatārthī tadicchet ? yadi atathātvenāgrahaṇāt iti brūyāt, sa ca prativaktavyaḥ, atha tathātvenāgrahaṇāt kasmānnopekṣeteti /
GSP33vacbhamu:357: so 'yamupādānopekṣābhyāmubhayata ākṛṣyamāṇaścecanaḥ avyavasthitaḥ idaṅkārāspade rajatasamāropeṇopādāna eva vyavasthāpyate, iti bhedāgrahaḥ samāropotpādakrameṇa cetanapravṛttihetuḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:359: tajjātīyasyopakārahetubhāvamanucintya, tajjātīyatayedaṅkārāspade rajate tamanumāya, tadarthī pravartate ityānupūrvyaṃ siddham /
GSP33vacbhamu:366: rajatādyarthinastatra niyamena pravartakatvāt, yadyadarthinaṃ yatra niyamena pravartakatvāt ; yadyadarthinaṃ yatra niyamena pravartayati tajjñānaṃ tadviṣayaṃ yathobhayasiddhasamīcīnarajatajñānam ; tathā cedam ;
GSP33vacbhamu:368: yaccoktam anavabhāsamānatayā na śuktirālambanamiti, tatra bhavān pṛṣṭo
GSP33vacbhamu:369: vyācaṣṭām- kiṃ śuktikātvasya 'idaṃ rajatam' iti jñānaṃ pratyanālambanatvam
GSP33vacbhamu:370: āhosvit dravyamātrasya puraḥsthitasya sitabhāsvarasya ? yadi śuktikātvasya anālambanatvam, addhā ! uttarasyānālambanatvaṃ bruvāṇasya tavaivānubhavavirodhaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:371: tathā hi-'rajatamidam' ityanubhavannanubhavitā purovarti vastu aṅgulyādinā nirdiśati /
GSP33vacbhamu:378: yaccoktaṃ mithyāpratyayasya vyabhicāre sarvapramāṇeṣvanāśvāsa iti, tat bodhakatvena svataḥprāmāṇyaṃ nāvyabhicāreṇeti vyutpādayadbhirasmābhiḥ parihṛtaṃ nyāyakaṇikāyāmiti neha pratanyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:379: diṅmātraṃ cāsya smṛtipramoṣabhaṅgasyoktam ; vistarastu brahmatattvasamīkṣāyāmavagantavya iti
GSP33vacbhamu:380: tadidamuktam- anye tu yatra yadadhyāsastasyaiva viparītadharmakalpanāmācakṣate iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:381: yatra śuktikādau yasya rajatāderadhyāsastasyaiva śuktikāderviparītadharmakalpanāṃ rajatatvadharmakalpanāmiti yojanā /
GSP33vacbhamu:382: nanu santu nāma parīkṣakāṇāṃ vipratipattayaḥ, prakṛte tu kimāyātamityata
GSP33vacbhamu:385: tena sarveṣāmeva parīkṣakāṇāṃ mate anyasyānyadharmakalpanānirvacanīyāvaśyaṃbhāvinītyanirvacanīyatā sarvatantrasiddhānta ityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:387: na kevalamiyamanṛtatā parīkṣakāṇāṃ siddhā, api tu laukikānāmapītyāha-
GSP33vacbhamu:388: tathā ca loke anubavaḥ śuktikā hi rajatavadavabhāsata iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:391: anyasyānyātmatāvibhramo lokasiddhaḥ, ekasya tvabhinnasya bhedabhramo na dṛṣṭa iti kutaḥ cidātmano 'bhinnānāṃ jīvānāṃ bhedavibhrama ityata āha-
GSP33vacbhamu:394: ayamarthaḥ- cidātmā prakāśate na vā ? na cet prakāśate,
GSP33vacbhamu:395: kathamasminnadhyāso viṣayataddharmāṇām ? na khalvapratibhāsamāne purovartini dravye rajatasya vā taddharmāṇāṃ vā samāropaḥ saṃbhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:396: pratibhāsamāne vā na tāvadayamātmā jaḍo ghaṭādivatparādhīnaprakāśa iti yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:397: na khalu sa eva kartā ca karma ca bhavati, virodhāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:398: parasamavetakriyāphalaśāli hi karma, na ca jñānakriyā parasamavāyinīti kathamasyāḥ karma ? na ca tadeva svaṃ ca paraṃ ca, virodhāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:402: ātmā jaḍo 'pi sarvārthajñāneṣu bhāsamāno 'pi kartaiva na karma,
GSP33vacbhamu:404: yathā hi caitrasamavetakriyayā caitranagaraprāptāvubayasamavetāyāmapi kriyamāṇāyāṃ nagarasyaiva karmatā, parasamavetakriyāphalaśālitvāt, na tu caitrasya kriyāphalaśālino 'pi, caitrasamavāyādgamanakrīyāyā iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:408: tathā hi- yo 'yamarthaprakāśaḥ phalaṃ yasminnarthaśca ātmā ca prathete sa
GSP33vacbhamu:409: kiṃ jaḍaḥ svayaṃprakāśo vā ? jaḍaścet viṣayātmāvapi jaḍāviti kasmin kiṃ prakāśeta aviśeṣāt, iti prāptamāndhyamaśeṣasya jagataḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:413: na ca nilīnameva vijñānamarthātmānau jñāpayati cakṣurādivaditi vācyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:414: jñāpanaṃ hi jñānajananam, janitaṃ ca jñānaṃ jaḍaṃ sannoktadūṣaṇamativarteteti /
GSP33vacbhamu:417: tathāpi kimāyātaṃ viṣayātmanoḥ svabhāvajaḍayoḥ ? etadāyātaṃ yattayoḥ saṃvidajaḍeti /
GSP33vacbhamu:418: tatkiṃ putraḥ paṇḍita iti pitāpi paṇḍito 'stu ? svabhāva eṣa saṃvidaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:419: svayaṃprakāśāyā yadarthātmasaṃbandhiteti cet, hanta putrasyāpi paṇḍitasya
GSP33vacbhamu:421: sahārthātmaprakāśena saṃvitprakāśo na tvarthātmaprakāśaṃ vineti tasyāḥ svabhāva iti cet, tatkiṃ saṃvido bhinnau saṃvidarthātmaprakāśau /
GSP33vacbhamu:422: tathā ca na svayaṃprakāśā saṃvit, na ca saṃvit arthātmaprakāśa iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:423: atha saṃvidarthātmaprakāśo na saṃvido bhidyete, saṃvideva tau /
GSP33vacbhamu:424: evaṃ cet yāvaduktaṃ bhavati saṃvit ātmārthau saheti tāvaduktaṃ bhavati saṃvidarthātmaprakāśau saheti /
GSP33vacbhamu:430: arthaviṣayahānādibuddhijananācca arthasaṃvidastadviṣayatvamiti cet, tatkiṃ dehasya prayatnavadātmasaṃyogo dehapravṛttinivṛttiheturartha ityarthaprakāśo 'stu ? jāḍyāddehātmasaṃyogo nārthaprakāśa iti cet,
GSP33vacbhamu:431: nanvayaṃ svayaṃprakāśo 'pi svātmanyeva khadyotavatprakāśaḥ, arthe tu jaḍa
GSP33vacbhamu:433: na ca prakāśasyātmāno viṣayāḥ ; te hi vicchinnadīrghasthūlatayānubhūyante
GSP33vacbhamu:438: na ca anirvācyārthabhedaḥ prakāśaṃ nirvācyaṃ bhettumarhati, atiprasaṅgāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:439: na ca arthānāmapi parasparaṃ bhedaḥ samīcīnajñānapaddhatimadhyāste ityupariṣṭādupapādayiṣyate
GSP33vacbhamu:440: tadayaṃ prakāśa eva svayaṃprakāśa ekaḥ kūṭastho nityo niraṃśaḥ pratyagātmā aśakyanirvacanīyebhyo dehendriyādibhya ātmānaṃ pratīpaṃ nirvacanīyamañcati jānātīti pratyaṅ, sa cātmeti pratyagātmā sa cāparādhīnaprakāśāt anaṃśatvācca aviṣayaḥ, tasminnadhyāso
GSP33vacbhamu:443: kasmādayamayukta ityata āha - sarvo hi puro 'vasthite viṣaye viṣayāntaramadhyasyati /
GSP33vacbhamu:444: etaduktaṃ bhavati- yatparādhīnaprakāśamaṃśavacca tatsāmānyāṃśagrahe karaṇadoṣavaśācca viśeṣāgrahe anyathā prakāśate /
GSP33vacbhamu:445: pratyagātmā tu aparādhīnaprakāśatayā na svajñāne kāraṇānyapekṣate, yena tadāśrayairdeṣairduṣyet
GSP33vacbhamu:446: na cāṃśavān, yena kaścidasyāṃśo gṛhyeta, kaścinna gṛhyeta /
GSP33vacbhamu:447: na hi tadeva tadānīmeva tenaiva gṛhītamagṛhītaṃ ca saṃbhavatīti na svayaṃprakāśatāpakṣe adhyāsaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:449: na hi śuktau apuraḥsthitāyāṃ rajatamadhyasyati 'idaṃ rajatam' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:450: tasmādatyantagrahe atyantāgrahe ca nādhyāsa iti siddham /
GSP33vacbhamu:452: aviṣayatve hi cidātmano nādhyāsaḥ, viṣaya eva tu cidātmā asmatpratyayasya,
GSP33vacbhamu:453: tatkathaṃ nādhyāsa ityata āha- yuṣmatpratyayāpetasya iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:455: tathā ca yo viṣayī sa eva cidātmā /
GSP33vacbhamu:457: tasmādanātmatvaprasaṅgādanavasthāparihārāya yuṣmatpratyayāpetatvam ; ata eva aviṣayatvamātmano vaktavyam ; tathā ca nādhyāsa ityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:460: ayamarthaḥ- satye pratyagātmā svayaṃprakāśatvādaviṣayo 'naṃśaśca ; tathāpi anirvacanīyānādyavidyāparikalpitabuddhimanaḥ sūkṣmasthūlaśarīrendriyāvacchedakabhedena anavacchinno 'pi vastuto
GSP33vacbhamu:461: 'vacchinna iva abhinno 'pi bhinna iva akartāpi karteva abhoktāpi bhokteva
GSP33vacbhamu:462: aviṣayo 'pyasmatpratyayaviṣaya iva jīvabhāvamāpannaḥ avabhāsate, nabha iva ghaṭamaṇikamallikādyupādhyavacchedabhedena bhinnamivānekavidhadharmakamiveti /
GSP33vacbhamu:463: na hi cidekarasasyātmanaḥ cidāṃśe gṛhīte agṛhītaṃ kiñcidasti /
GSP33vacbhamu:464: na khalu ānandanityatvavibhutvādayaḥ asya cidrūpādvastuto bhidyante, yena tadgrahe na gṛhyeran
GSP33vacbhamu:465: gṛhītā eva tu kalpitena bhedena na vivecitā ityagṛhītā ivābhānti /
GSP33vacbhamu:466: na ca ātmano buddhyādibhyo bhedastāttvikaḥ yena cidātmani gṛhyamāṇe so 'pi
GSP33vacbhamu:468: tasmāccidātmanaḥ svayaṃprakāśasyaiva anavacchinnasya avacchinnebhyo buddhyādibhyo bhedāgrahāt tadadhyāsena jīvabhāva iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:470: tathā hi- kartā bhoktā cidātmā ahaṃpratyaye pratyavabhāsate /
GSP33vacbhamu:471: na ca udāsīnasya tasya kriyāśaktirbhogaśaktirvā saṃbhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:472: yasya ca buddhyādeḥ kāryakaraṇasaṃghātasya kriyābhogaśaktī na tasya caitanyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:473: tasmāccidātmaiva kāryakaraṇasaṃghātena grathito labdhakriyābhogaśaktiḥ svayaṃprakāśo 'pi buddhyādiviṣayavicchuraṇāt kathañcidasmatpratyayaviṣayaḥ ahaṅkārāspadaṃ jīva iti ca janturiti ca kṣetrajña iti ca ākhyāyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:476: tasmāccidātmano 'vyatirekāt jīvaḥ svayaṃprakāśo 'pi ahaṃpratyayena kartṛbhoktṛtayā vyavahārayogyaḥ kriyata ityahaṃpratyayālambanamucyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:477: na ca adhyāse sati viṣayatvaṃ viṣayatve ca adhyāsaḥ ityanyonyāśrayatvamiti
GSP33vacbhamu:482: jīvo hi cidātmatayā svayaṃprakāśatayā aviṣayo 'pi aupādhikena rūpeṇa viṣaya iti bhāvaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:484: na vayamaparādhīnaprakāśatayā aviṣayatvenādhyāsamapākurmaḥ, kiṃ tu pratyagātmā na svato nāpi parataḥ prathata ityaviṣaya iti brūmaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:485: tathā ca sarvathāprathamāne pratyagātmani kuto 'dhyāsa ityata āha-
GSP33vacbhamu:487: pratīca ātmanaḥ prasiddhiḥ prathā, tasyā aparokṣatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:488: yadyapi pratyagātmani nānyā prathāsti tathāpi bhedopacāraḥ, yathā
GSP33vacbhamu:490: etaduktaṃ bhavati- avaśyaṃ cidātmā aparokṣo 'bhyupetavyaḥ tadaprathāyāṃ sarvasyāprathanena jagadāndhyaprasaṅgādityuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:491: śrutiścātra bhavati- 'tameva bhāntamanu bhāti sarvaṃ tasya bhāsā sarvamidaṃ vibhāti' iti
GSP33vacbhamu:492: tadevaṃ paramārthaparihāramuktvā abhyupetyāpi cidātmanaḥ parokṣatāṃ prauḍhavāditayā parihārāntaramāha- na cāyamasti iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:494: kasmādayaṃ na niyama ityata āha- apratyakṣe 'pi iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:496: nabho hi dravyaṃ sat rūpasparśavirahānna bāhyendriyapratyakṣam /
GSP33vacbhamu:497: nāpi mānasam, manaso 'sahāyasya bāhye apravṛtteḥ ; tasmādapratyakṣam /
GSP33vacbhamu:498: atha ca tatra bālā avivekinaḥ paradarśitadarśinaḥ kadācitpārthivacchāyāṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:499: śyāmatāmāropya, kadācittaijasaṃ śuklatvamāropya, nīlotpalapalāśaśyāmamiti vā rājahaṃsamālādhavalamiti vā nirvarṇayanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:500: tatrāpi pūrvadṛṣṭasya taijasasya vā tāmasasya vā rūpasya paratra nabhasi smṛtirūpo 'vabhāsa iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:502: upasaṃharati- evam uktena prakāreṇa sarvākṣepaparihārāt, aviruddhaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:504: nanu santi ca sahasramadhyāsāḥ, tatkimarthamayamevādhyāsa ākṣepasamādhānābhyāṃ vyutpāditaḥ nādhyāsamātramityata āha-
GSP33vacbhamu:507: taducchedāya ca vedāntāḥ pravṛttā iti vakṣyati /
GSP33vacbhamu:508: pratyagātmanyanātmādhyāsa eva sarvānarthahetuḥ na punā rajatādivibhramā iti sa evāvidyā, tatsvarūpaṃ cāvijñātaṃ na śakyamucchettumiti tadeva vyutpādyaṃ nādhyāsamātram /
GSP33vacbhamu:511: na caivaṃ pṛthagjanā api manyante adhyāsam, yena na vyutpādyetetyata
GSP33vacbhamu:513: nanu iyamanādiratinirūḍhanibiḍavāsanānubaddhā avidyā na śakyā niroddhum,
GSP33vacbhamu:514: upāyābhāvāt, iti yo manyante taṃ prati tannirodhopāyamāha - tadvivekena ca vastusvarūpāvadhāraṇam, nirvicikitsaṃ jñānam, vidyāmāhuḥ paṇḍitāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:515: pratyagātmani khalu atyantavivikte buddhyādibhyaḥ buddhyādibhedāgrahanimitto buddhyādyātmatvataddharmādhyāsaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:517: adhyāsāpabādhātmakaṃ vastusvarūpāvadhāraṇaṃ vidyā cidātmarūpaṃ svarūpe vyavatiṣṭhata ityarthaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:519: atinirūḍhanibiḍhavāsanānuvidvā avidyā vidyayā apabādhitāpi svavāsanāvaśātpunarudbhaviṣyati pravartayiṣyati ca vāsanādikāryaṃ svocitamityaya āha - tatraivaṃ sati, evaṃbhūtavastutattvāvadhāraṇe sati,
GSP33vacbhamu:520: yatra yadadhyāsaḥ tatkṛtena doṣeṇa guṇena vā aṇumātreṇāpi sa na saṃbadhyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:523: etaduktaṃ bhavati - tattvāvadhāraṇābhyāsasya hi svabhāva eva sa tādṛśaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:525: tattvapakṣapāto hi svabhāvo dhiyām, yathāhurbāhyā api--
GSP33vacbhamu:529: viśeṣatastu cidātmasvabhāvasya tattvajñānasya atyantāntaraṅgasya kuto 'nirvācyayā avidyayā bādha iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:536: tattvaparicchedo hi pramā vidyā ; tatsādhanāni pramāṇāni kathamavidyāvadviṣayāṇi ? nāvidyāvantaṃ pramāṇānyāśrayanti, tatkāryasya vidyāyā avidyāvirodhitvāt iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:537: santu vā pratyakṣādīni saṃvṛtyāpi yathā tathā ; śāstrāṇi tu puruṣahitānuśāsanaparāṇi avidyāpratipakṣatayā
GSP33vacbhamu:542: ayamarthaḥ- pramātṛtvaṃ hi pramāṃ prati kartṛtvam /
GSP33vacbhamu:547: na ca kūṭasthanityaścidātmā apariṇāmī svato vyāpāravān /
GSP33vacbhamu:549: atha mā pravartiṣata pramāṇāni, kiṃ naśchinnamityata āha- na hīndriyāṇyanupādāya pratyakṣādivyavahāraḥ saṃbhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:550: vyavahriyate aneneti vyavahāraḥ phalam, pratyakṣādīnāṃ pramāṇānāṃ phalamityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:551: indriyāṇi iti indriyaliṅgādīnīti draṣṭavyam, 'daṇḍino gacchanti' itivat /
GSP33vacbhamu:555: kimiti punaḥ pramātā upādatte pramāṇāni ? atha svayameva kasmānna
GSP33vacbhamu:556: pravartante ityata āha- na cādhiṣṭhānamantareṇendriyāṇāṃ vyāpāraḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:558: na jātu karaṇānyanadhiṣṭhitāni kartrā svakārye vyāpriyante, mā bhūtkuvindarahitebhyo vemādibhyaḥ paṭotpattiriti /
GSP33vacbhamu:559: atha deha evādhiṣṭhātā kasmānna bhavati ? kṛtamatrātmādhyāsenetyata āha-
GSP33vacbhamu:564: evamanadhyastātmabhāvaṃ dehendriyādi vyāpārayan bhaviṣyati tadabhijñaḥ pramātā ityata āha- na caitasminsarvasmin, itaretarātmādhyāse itaretarātmādhyāse itaretaradharmādhyāse ca, asati, ātmano 'saṅgasya,
GSP33vacbhamu:570: pramāyāṃ khalu phale svatantraḥ pramātā bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:573: yadi cidātmā tatra nādhyasyeta ? kathaṃ caiṣa cidātmakartṛko bhavet,
GSP33vacbhamu:575: tasmāditaretarādhyāsāccidātmakartṛsthaṃ pramāphalaṃ sidhyati, tatsiddhau ca pramātṛtvam /
GSP33vacbhamu:582: bhavatu pṛthagjanānāmevam ; āgamopapattipratipannapratyagātmatattvānāṃ vyutpannānāmapi puṃsāṃ pramāṇaprameyavyavahārā dṛśyanta iti
GSP33vacbhamu:584: vidantu nāma āgamopapattibhyāṃ dehendriyādibhyo bhinnaṃ pratyagātmānam ;
GSP33vacbhamu:586: yādṛśo hi paśuśakuntādīnāmavipratipannamugdhabhāvānāṃ vyavahārastādṛśo vyutpannānāmapi puṃsāṃ dṛśyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:590: etadeva vibhajate- yathā hi paśvādaya iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:591: atra ca śabdādibhiḥ śrotrādīnāṃ saṃbandhe sati iti pratyakṣaṃ pramāṇaṃ darśitam /
GSP33vacbhamu:600: śāstraṃ tu 'jyotiṣṭomena svargakāmo yajeta' ityādi na dehātmādhyāsena
GSP33vacbhamu:603: tathā ca pāramarṣaṃ sūtram- 'śāstraphalaṃ prayoktari tallakṣaṇatvāttasmātsvayaṃ prayoge syāt' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:604: na ca dehādi bhasmībhūtaṃ pāralaukikāya phalāya kalpata iti dehādyatiriktaṃ kañcidātmānamadhikāriṇamākṣipati śāstram ; tadavagamaśca vidyā ; iti kathamavidyāvadviṣayaṃ śāstramityāśaṅkyāha- śāstrīyetu iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:606: adhikāraśāstraṃ hi svargakāmasya puṃsaḥ paralokasaṃbandhaṃ vinā na nirvahatīti tāvanmātramākṣipet, na tvarayāsaṃsāritvamapi ; tasyādhikāre
GSP33vacbhamu:609: prayoktā hi karmaṇaḥ karmajanitaphalabhogabhāgī karmaṇyadhikārī svāmī bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:610: tatra kathamakartā prayoktā ? kathaṃ ca abhoktā karmajanitaphalabhogabhāgī
GSP33vacbhamu:614: te tvavidyāvantamanuśāsato nirmṛṣṭanikhilāvidyamanuśiṣṭaṃ svarūpo vyavasthāpayantītyetāvāneṣāṃ viśeṣaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:617: yadyapi virodhānupayogābhyāmaupaniṣadaḥ puruṣaḥ adhikāre nāpekṣyate tathāpyupaniṣadbhyo 'vagamyamānaḥ śaknotyadhikāraṃ niroddhum /
GSP33vacbhamu:618: tataśca parasparaparāhatārthatvena kṛtsna eva vedaḥ prāmāṇyamapajahyādityata āha- prāk ca tathābhūtātma- iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:619: satyamaupaniṣadapuruṣādhigamaḥ adhikāravirodhī ; tasmāttu purastātkarmavidhayaḥ svocitaṃ vyavahāramabhinirvartayanto nānupajātena brahmajñānena śakyā niroddhum /
GSP33vacbhamu:622: yajeta' iti śāstraṃ pravartamānaṃ 'na hiṃsyāt' ityanena na virudhyate ;
GSP33vacbhamu:624: avajitakrodhārātayaḥ puruṣā niṣedhe adhikriyante, krodhārātivaśīkṛtāstu śyenādiśāstre iti
GSP33vacbhamu:625: avidyāvatpuruṣaviṣayatvaṃ nātivartata iti yaduktaṃ tadeva sphuṭayati-
GSP33vacbhamu:633: tadevamātmānātmanoḥ parasparādhyāsamākṣepasamādhānābhyāmupapādya pramāṇaprameyavyavahārapravartanena ca dṛḍhīkṛtya tasyānaharthahetutvamudāharaṇaprapañcena pratipādayan tatsvarupamuktaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:639: dehatādātmyamātmanyadhyasya dehamarthaṃ putrakalatrādisvābhyaṃ ca kṛśatvādivat āropyāha- ahameva vikalaḥ, sakalaḥ iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:640: svasya khalu sākalyena svābhyasākalyāt svāmīśvaraḥ sakalaḥ saṃpūrṇo bhavati ; tathā svasya vaikalyena svāmyavaikalyāt svāmīśvaro visalo
GSP33vacbhamu:642: bāhyadharmā ye vaikalyādayaḥ svābhyapraṇālikayā saṃcaritāḥ śarīre tānātmanyadhyasyatītyarthaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:643: yadā ca paropādhyapekṣe dehadharme svāmye iyaṃ gatiḥ, tadā kaiva kathā
GSP33vacbhamu:644: anaupādhikeṣu dehadharmeṣu kṛśatvādiṣu ityāśayavānāha- tathā dehadharmān iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:648: tadanena prapañcena dharmādhyāsamuktvā tasya mūlaṃ dharmyadhyāsamāha-
GSP33vacbhamu:653: caitanyamupapādayati- taṃ ca pratyagātmānaṃ sarvasākṣiṇaṃ tadviparyayeṇa,
GSP33vacbhamu:654: antaḥkaraṇādiviparyayeṇa- antaḥkaraṇādyacetanam, tasya viparyayaḥ caitanyam, tena, itthaṃbhūtalakṣaṇe tṛtīyā-antaḥkaraṇādiṣvadhyasyati /
GSP33vacbhamu:655: tadanena antaḥkaraṇādyavacchinnaḥ pratyagātmā idamanidaṃrūpaścetanaḥ kartā bhoktā kāryakāraṇāvidyādvayādhāro 'haṅkārāspadaṃ saṃsārī sarvānarthasaṃbhārabhājanaṃ jīvātmā itaretarādhyāsopādānaḥ tadupādānaścādhyāsa ityanāditvāt bījāṅkuravannetaretarāśrayatvamityuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:656: pramāṇaprameyavyavahāradṛḍhīkṛtameva śiṣyahitāya svarūpābhidhānapūrvakaṃ sarvalokapratyakṣatayā adhyāsaṃ sudṛḍhīkaroti- evamayamanādiranantaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:659: mithyāpratyayarūpaḥ mithyāpratyayānāṃ rūpamanirvacanīyatvam ; tadyasya sa tathoktaḥ ; anirvacanīya ityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:663: pratipattiḥ prāptiḥ, tasyai, na tu japamātrāya, nāpi karmasu pravṛttaye /
GSP33vacbhamu:666: etaduktaṃ bhavati- asmatpratyayasyātmaviṣayasya samīcīnatve sati brahmaṇo jñātatvāt niṣprayojanatvācca na jijñāsā syāt ; tadabhāve ca na
GSP33vacbhamu:667: brahmajñānāya vedāntāḥ paṭhyeran ; api tu avivakṣitārthā japamātre upayujyeran /
GSP33vacbhamu:670: āropitaṃ hi rūpaṃ tattvajñānenāpodyate, na tu vāstavamatattvajñānena /
GSP33vacbhamu:671: na hi rajjvā rajjutvaṃ sahasramapi sarpadhārāpratyayā apavaditumutsahante
GSP33vacbhamu:672: mithyājñānaprasañjitaṃ tu rūpaṃ śakyaṃ tattvajñānena apavaditum,
GSP33vacbhamu:677: tatkathaṃ sarveṣāṃ vedāntānāmātmaikatvapratipādanamartha ityata āha- yathā cāyamarthaḥ ityādi
GSP33vacbhamu:678: śarīrameva śarīrakam ; tatra nivāsī śārīrako jīvātmā /
GSP33vacbhamu:679: tasya tvaṃpadābhidheyasya tatpadābhidheyaparamātmarūpatayā yā mīmāṃsā sā tathoktā /
GSP33vacbhamu:680: etāvānatrārthasaṃkṣepaḥ- yadyapi svādhyāyādhyayanavidhinā svādhyāyapadavācyasya vedarāśeḥ phalavadarthāvabodhaparatāṃ āpādayatā karmavidhiniṣedhānāmiva vedāntānāmapi svādhyāyaśabdavācyānāṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:682: iti nyāyāt mantrāṇāmiva vedāntānāmarthaparatvamautsargikam, yadyapi ca vedāntebhyaḥ caitanyānandaghanaḥ kartṛtvabhoktṛtvarahito niṣprapañca ekaḥ pratyagātmā avagamyate, tathāpi kartṛtvabhoktṛtvaduḥkhaśoka-
GSP33vacbhamu:683: mohamayamātmānamavagāhamānenāhaṃpratyayena sedehabādhavirahiṇā virudhyamānā vedāntāḥ svārthātpracyutā upacaritārthā vā japamātropayogino vā ityavivakṣitasvārthāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:684: tathā ca tadarthavicārātmikā caturlakṣaṇī śārīrakamīmāṃsā nārabdhavyā /
GSP33vacbhamu:685: na ca sarvajanīnāhamanubhavasiddha ātmā saṃdigdho vā saprayojano vā, yena jijñāsyaḥ san vicāraṃ prayuñjīta- iti pūrvapakṣaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:687: tasya tu uktena krameṇa śrutyādibādhakatvānupapatteḥ, śrutyādibhiśca samastatīrthakaraiśca prāmāṇyānabhyupagamādadhyāsatvam /
GSP33vacbhamu:688: evaṃ ca vedāntā nāvivakṣitārthāḥ, nāpi upacaritārthāḥ, kiṃ tu uktakṣaṇāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:690: tasya ca vakṣyamāṇena krameṇa saṃdigdhatvāt prayojanatvācca yuktā jijñāsā-
GSP33vacbhamu:691: ityāśayavān sūtrakāraḥ tajjijñāsāmasūtrayat, athāto brahmajijñāsā iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:696: kiṃ tu brahmamīmāṃsākhyatarketikartavyatānujñātaviṣayairvedāntairāhitaṃ nirvicikitsaṃ brahmajñānameva samastaduḥkhopaśamarūpamānandaikarasaṃ paramaṃ prayojanam /
GSP33vacbhamu:698: tacca prāptamapyanādyavidyāvaśādaprāptamiveti prepsitaṃ bhavati ; yathā svagrīvāgatamapi graiveyakaṃ kutaścidbhramānnāstīti manyamānaḥ pareṇa
GSP33vacbhamu:700: jijñāsā tu saṃśayasya kāryamiti svakāraṇaṃ saṃśayaṃ sūcayati /
GSP33vacbhamu:702: tathā ca śāstre prekṣāvatpravṛttihetusaṃśayaprayojanasūcanāt yuktamasya sūtrasya śāstrāditvam, ityāha bhagavānbhāṣyakāraḥ-
GSP33vacbhamu:706: tasya mīmāṃsāyāḥ śāstram, sā hyanena śiṣyate śiṣyebhyo yathāvatpratipādyata iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:712: tadevaṃ sūtratātparyaṃ vyākhyāya tasya prathamapadaṃ atha iti vyācaṣṭe-
GSP33vacbhamu:714: teṣu sūtrapadeṣu madhye yo 'yaṃ athaśabdaḥ sa ānantaryārtha iti yojanā /
GSP33vacbhamu:715: nanu adhikārārtho 'pyathaśabdo dṛśyate, yathā 'athaiṣa jyotiḥ' iti vede,
GSP33vacbhamu:716: yathā vā loke 'atha śabdānuśāsanam' iti, 'atha yogānuśāsanam' iti ca ;
GSP33vacbhamu:717: tatkimatrādhikārārtho na gṛhyata ityata āha- nādhikārārthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:719: jijñāsā tāvadiha sūtre brahmaṇaśca tajjñānācca śabdataḥ pradhānaṃ pratīyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:720: na ca yathā 'daṇḍī praiṣānanvāha' ityatra apradhānamapi daṇḍaśabdārtho
GSP33vacbhamu:723: tadavivakṣāyāṃ tadasūcanena kākadantaparīkṣāyāmiva na brahmamīmāṃsāyāṃ prekṣāvantaḥ pravarteran
GSP33vacbhamu:724: na hi tadānīṃ brahma tajjñānaṃ ca abhidheyaprayojane bhavitumarhataḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:728: tasmātsaṃdehaprayojanasūcanī jijñāsā iha padato vākyataśca pradhānaṃ vivakṣitavyā /
GSP33vacbhamu:729: na ca tasyā adhikāryatvam, aprastūyamānatvāt, yena tatsamabhivyāhṛto 'thaśabdo 'dhikārārthaḥ syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:732: na ca jijñāsā mīmāṃsā yena yogānuśāsanavadadhikriyeta ; nāntatvaṃ nipātya 'māṅ māne' ityasmādvā 'mānapūjāyām' ityasmādvā dhātoḥ 'mānbandha-'
GSP33vacbhamu:733: ityādinā anicchārthe sani vyutpāditasya mīmāṃsāpadasya pūjitavicāravacanatvāt ; jñānecchāvācakatvājjijñāsāpadasya
GSP33vacbhamu:736: na ca svārthaparatvasyopapattau satyāṃ anyārthaparatvakalpanā yuktā,
GSP33vacbhamu:739: atha maṅgalārtho 'thaśabdaḥ kasmānna bhavati ? tathā ca maṅgalahetutvāt
GSP33vacbhamu:740: pratyahaṃ brahmajijñāsā kartavyeti sūtrārthaḥ saṃpadyata ityata āha-
GSP33vacbhamu:742: padārtha eva hi vākyārthe samanvīyate, sa ca vācyo lakṣyo vā /
GSP33vacbhamu:743: na ceha maṅgalamathaśabdasya vācyaṃ vā lakṣyaṃ vā, kiṃ tu mṛdaṅgaśaṅkhadhvanivadathaśabdaśravaṇamātrakāryam
GSP33vacbhamu:744: na ca kāryajñāpyayorvākyārthe samanvayaḥ śabdavyavahāre dṛṣṭa ityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:745: tatkimidānīṃ maṅgalārtho 'śabdaḥ teṣu teṣu na prayoktavyaḥ ? tathā ca oṅkāraścāthaśabdaśca dvāvetau brahmaṇaḥ purā /
GSP33vacbhamu:747: iti smṛtivyākopa ityata āha- arthāntaraprayukta eva hyathaśabdaḥ śrutyā maṅgalaprayojano bhavati
GSP33vacbhamu:748: arthāntareṣvānantaryādiṣu prayuktaḥ athaśabdaḥ śrutyā śravaṇamātreṇa veṇuvīṇādhvanivanmaṅgalaṃ kurvan maṅgalaprayojano bhavati anyārthamānīyamānodakumbhadarśanavat /
GSP33vacbhamu:750: tena ca iha ānantaryārthasya sataḥ śravaṇamātreṇa maṅgalārthatetyarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:757: na ca prakṛtānapekṣā, tadanapekṣasya tadviṣayatvābhāvena asamānaviṣayatayā
GSP33vacbhamu:759: na hi jātu bhavati- kiṃ nitya ātmā, atha anityā buddhiriti /
GSP33vacbhamu:760: tasmādānantaryaṃ vinā pūrvaprakṛtāpekṣa ihāthaśabdaḥ kasmānna bhavatītyata
GSP33vacbhamu:763: asyārthaḥ- na vayamānantaryārthatāṃ vyasanitayā rocayāmahe, kiṃ tu brahmajijñāsāhetubhūtapūrvaprakṛtasiddhaye
GSP33vacbhamu:764: sā ca pūrvaprakṛtārthāpekṣatve 'pyathaśabdasya sidhyatīti vyartha ānantaryārthatvāvadhāraṇāgraho 'smākamiti /
GSP33vacbhamu:766: paramārthatastu kalpāntaropanyāse pūrvaprakṛtāpekṣā ; na ceha kalpāntaropanyāsa iti pāriśeṣyādānantaryārtha eveti yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:767: bhavatvānantaryārthaḥ, kimevaṃ satītyata āha- sati cānantaryārthatva iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:771: na cānantaryamātrasya dṛṣṭamadṛṣṭaṃ vā prayojanaṃ paśyāmaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:772: tasmāttasyātrānantaryaṃ vaktavyaṃ yadvinā brahmajijñāsā na bhavati,
GSP33vacbhamu:776: dharmajijñāsāyā iva brahmajijñāsāyā api yogyatvāt svādhyāyādhyayanānantaryam, dharmavadbrahmaṇo
GSP33vacbhamu:777: tasya cāgṛhītasya svaviṣaye vijñānājananāt, grahaṇasya ca 'svādhyāyo
GSP33vacbhamu:781: atra ca svādhyāyena viṣayeṇa tadviṣayamadhyayanaṃ lakṣayati /
GSP33vacbhamu:782: tathā ca 'athāto dharmajijñāsā' ityanenaiva gatamiti nedaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:783: sūtramārabdhavyam ; dharmaśabdasya vedārthamātropalakṣaṇatayā dharmavadbrahmaṇo 'pi vedārthatvāviśeṣeṇa vedādhyayanānantaryopadeśasāmyādityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:784: codayati - nanviha karmāvabodhānantaryaṃ viśeṣaḥ dharmajijñāsāto brahmajijñāsāyāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:786: brahmajñāne viniyogāt, jñānasyaiva karmatayā icchāṃ prati prādhānyāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:788: tatrāpi ca na vākyārthajñānotpattāvaṅgabhāvo yajñādīnām, vākyārthajñānasya vākyādevotpatteḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:789: na ca vākyaṃ sahakāritayā karmāṇyapekṣata iti yuktam ; akṛtakarmaṇāmapi viditapadapadārthasaṃbandhānāṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:792: tadbodhatastu tadarthānuṣṭhānaparivarjane parasparāśrayaḥ, tasmin sati tadarthānuṣṭhānaparivarjanaṃ tataśca tadbodha iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:793: na ca vedāntavākyānāmeva svārthapratyāyane karmāpekṣā na vākyāntarāṇāmiti
GSP33vacbhamu:795: nanu 'tattvamasi' iti vākyāt tvaṃpadārthasya kartṛbhoktṛrūpasya jīvātmano nityaśuddhabuddhodāsīnasvabhāvena tatpadārthena paramātmanaikyamaśakyaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:798: tatkimidānīṃ pramāṇakāraṇaṃ yogyatāvadhāraṇamapramāṇātkarmaṇo vaktumadhyavasito 'si, pratyakṣādyatiriktaṃ vā karmāpi pramāṇam /
GSP33vacbhamu:800: tasmāt 'tattvamasi' ityādeḥ śrutamayena jñānena jīvātmanaḥ paramātmabhāvaṃ gṛhītvā, tanmūlayā copapattyā vyavasthāpya, tadupāsanāyāṃ bhāvanāparābhidhānāyāṃ dīrghakālanairantaryavatyāṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:804: ata eva śrutiḥ- 'tameva dhīro vijñāya prajñāṃ kurvīta brāhmaṇaḥ' / iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:806: vijñāya tarkopakaraṇena śabdena prajñāṃ bhāvanāṃ kurvītetyarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:809: yajñādisaṃskṛto hi puruṣaḥ ādaranairantaryadīrghakālairāsevamāno brahmabhāvanāmanādyavidyāvāsanāṃ samūlakāṣaṃ kaṣati ; tato 'sya
GSP33vacbhamu:811: ata eva smṛtiḥ- 'mahāyajñaiśca yajñaiśca brāhmīyaṃ kriyate tanuḥ' /
GSP33vacbhamu:814: asti hi smṛtiḥ- 'ṛṇāni trīṇyapākṛtya mano mokṣe niveśayet' / iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:816: anye tu 'tametaṃ vedānuvacanena brāhmaṇā vividiṣanti yajñena'
GSP33vacbhamu:817: ityādiśrutibhyaḥ tattatphalāya coditānāmapi karmaṇāṃ saṃyogapṛthaktvena brahmabhāvanāṃ pratyaṅgabhāvamācakṣate, kratvarthasyeva khādiratvasya vīryārthatām, 'ekasya tūbhayārthatve saṃyogapṛthaktvam' iti nyāyāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:818: ata eva pāramarṣaṃ sūtram 'sarvāpekṣā ca yajñādiśruteraśvavat' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:820: tasmāt yadi śrutyādayaḥ pramāṇaṃ yadi vā pāramarṣaṃ sūtraṃ sarvathā yajñādikarmasamuccitā brahmopāsanā viśeṣaṇatrayavatī anādyavidyātadvāsanāsamucchedakrameṇa brahmasākṣātkārāya mokṣāparanāmne kalpata iti tadarthaṃ karmāṇyanuṣṭheyāni /
GSP33vacbhamu:824: karmāvabodhena hi karmānuṣṭhānasāhityaṃ bhavati brahmopāsanāyā ityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:829: tatra brūmaḥ- kva punarasyāḥ karmāpekṣā ? kiṃ kārye yathāgneyādīnāṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:830: paramāpūrve cirabhāviphalānukūle janayitavye samidādyapekṣā ? svarūpe vā yathā teṣāmeva dviravattapuroḍāśādidravyāgnidevatādyapekṣā ? na
GSP33vacbhamu:833: sa cotpādyo vā syāt yathā saṃyavanasya piṇḍaḥ, vikāryo vā yathāvaghātasya
GSP33vacbhamu:834: vrīhayaḥ, saṃskāryo vā yathā prokṣaṇasyolūkhalādayaḥ, prāpyo vā yathā
GSP33vacbhamu:837: na khalu ghaṭādisākṣātkāra iva jaḍasvabhāvebhyo ghaṭādibhyo bhinna indriyādyādheyo brahmasākṣātkāro bhāvanādheyaḥ saṃbhavati, brahmaṇo
GSP33vacbhamu:839: tato bhinnasya vā bhāvanādheyasya sākṣātkārasya pratibhāpratyayavat saṃśayākrāntatayā prāmāṇyāyogāt, tadvidhasya tatsāmagrīkasyaiva bahulaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:841: na khalu anumānāvagataṃ siddhaṃ vahniṃ bhāvayataḥ śītārtasya śiśirabharamantharatarakāyakāṇḍasya sphurajjvālājaṭilānalasākṣātkāraḥ pramāṇāntareṇa saṃvādyate, visaṃvādasya bahulamupalambhāt tasmāt prāmāṇikasākṣātkāralakṣaṇakāryābhāvānnopāsanāyā utpādye karmāpekṣā
GSP33vacbhamu:842: na ca kūṭasthanityasya sarvavyāpino brahmaṇa upāsanāto vikārasaṃskāraprāptayaḥ saṃbhavanti
GSP33vacbhamu:848: etāvāṃstu viśeṣaḥ- pratisīrāpanaye pāriṣadānāṃ nartakīviṣayaḥ sākṣātkāro bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:851: atrocyate- kā punariyaṃ brahmopāsanā ? kiṃ śābdajñānamātrasaṃtatiḥ, āho nirvicikitsaśābdajñānasaṃtatiḥ ? yadi śābdajñānamātrasaṃtatiḥ, na tarhīyamabhyāsyamānāpyavidyāṃ samucchettumarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:854: na hi sthāṇurvā puruṣo veti vā, ārohapariṇāhavat dravyamiti vā śataśo 'pi
GSP33vacbhamu:855: jñānamabhyasyamānaṃ puruṣa eveti niścayāya paryāptam, ṛte viśeṣadarśanāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:856: nanūktaṃ śrutamayena jñānena jīvātmanaḥ paramātmabhāvaṃ gṛhītvā yuktimayena ca vyavasthāpyata iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:865: na caiṣa sākṣātkāro mīmāṃsāsahitasyāpi śabdapramāṇasya phalam, api tu pratyakṣasya, tasyaiva tatphalatvaniyamāt ; anyathā kuṭajabījādapi vaṭāṅkurotpattiprasaṅgāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:867: na cāyamanubhavato brahmasvabhāvo yena na janyeta, api tu antaḥkaraṇasyaiva vṛttibhedo brahmaviṣayaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:869: na hi śābdajñānaprakāśyaṃ brahma svayaṃ prakāśaṃ na bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:870: sarvopādhivihīnaṃ hi svayañjyotiriti gīyate, na tūpahitamapi /
GSP33vacbhamu:872: na cāntaḥkaraṇavṛttāvapyasya sākṣātkāre sarvopādhivinirmokaḥ, tasyaiva tadupādhervinaśyadavasthasya svaparopādhivirodhino vidyamānatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:873: anyathā caitanyacchāyāpattiṃ vināntaḥkaraṇavṛtteḥ svayamacetanāyāḥ svaprakāśatvānupapattau sākṣātkāratvāyogāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:874: na cānumitabhāvitavahnisākṣātkāravat pratibhātvenāsyāprāmāṇyam, tatra vahnisvalakṣaṇasya parokṣatvāt
GSP33vacbhamu:875: iha tu brahmasvarūpasya upādhikaluṣitasya jīvasya prāgapyaparokṣatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:877: jīva eva tu tattadupādhirahitaḥ śuddhabuddhatvādisvabhāvo brahmeti gīyate
GSP33vacbhamu:879: tasmāt yathā gāndharvaśāstrārthajñānābhyāsāhitasaṃskārasacivaḥ śrotrendriyeṇa ṣaḍjādisvaragrāmamūrchanābhedamadhyakṣamanubhavati, evaṃ vedāntārthajñānābhyāsāhitasaṃskāro jīvaḥ svasya brahmabhāvamantaḥkaraṇeneti /
GSP33vacbhamu:880: antaḥkaraṇavṛttau brahmasākṣātkāre janayitavye asti tadupāsanāyāḥ karmāpekṣeti cet, na, tasyāḥ karmānuṣṭhānasahabhāvābhāvena tatsahakāritvānupapatteḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:881: na khalu 'tattvamasi' ityādervākyānnirvicikitsaṃ śuddhabuddhodāsīnasvabhāvaṃ akartṛtvādyupetaṃ apetabrāhmaṇatvādijātiṃ dehādyatiriktaṃ ekamātmānaṃ pratipadyamānaḥ karmasvadhikāramavaboddhumarhati anarhaśca kathaṃ kartā vādhikṛto vā /
GSP33vacbhamu:883: dṛśyate, yathā guḍasya mādhuryaviniścaye api pittopahatendriyāṇāṃ tiktatāvabhāsānuvṛttiḥ, āsvādya thūtkṛtya tyāgāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:886: na ca- karmāvidyātmakaṃ kathamavidyāmucchinatti, karmaṇo vā taducchedakasya kuta ucchedaḥ iti vācyam, sajātīyasvaparavirodhināṃ bhāvānāṃ bahulamupalabdheḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:887: yathā payaḥ payo 'ntaraṃ jarayati svayaṃ ca jīryati, yathā viṣaṃ viṣāntaraṃ śamayati svayaṃ ca śāmyati, yathā vā katakarajo rajo 'ntarāvile
GSP33vacbhamu:888: pāthasi prakṣiptaṃ rajo 'ntarāṇi bhindat svayamapi bhidyamānamanāvilaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:895: tathāpi tānapyayaṃ vyavahārapratyayānmithyeti manyamāno vidvān ca
GSP33vacbhamu:896: śraddhatte, pittopahatendriya iva guḍaṃ thūtkṛtya tyajannapi tasya
GSP33vacbhamu:898: tathā cāyaṃ kriyākartṛkaraṇetikartavyatāphalaprapañcamatāttvikaṃ viniścinvan kathamadhikṛto nāma ? viduṣo hyadhikāraḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:900: kriyākartrādisvarūpavibhāgaṃ ca vidvasyamāna iha vidvānabhimataḥ karmakāṇḍe /
GSP33vacbhamu:901: ata eva bhagavān avidvadviṣayatvaṃ śāstrasya varṇayāṃbabhūva bhāṣyakāraḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:904: na cānadhikṛtena samarthenāpi kṛte vaidikaṃ karma phalāya kalpate,
GSP33vacbhamu:906: tena dṛṣṭārtheṣu karmasu śaktaḥ pravartamānaḥ prāpnotu phalam, dṛṣṭatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:907: adṛṣṭārtheṣu tu śāstraikasamadhigamyaṃ phalamanadhikāriṇi na yujyata iti nopāsanākārye karmāpekṣā
GSP33vacbhamu:910: tadabhimānarahitasyānadhikāraḥ, evaṃ niṣedhavidhayo 'pi manuṣyādhikārā iti tadabhimānarahitasteṣvapi nādhikriyeta paśvādivat ; tathā cāyaṃ niṣiddhamanutiṣṭhan na pratyaveyāt tiryagādivaditi bhinnakarmatāpātaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:912: na khalvayaṃ sarvathā manuṣyābhimānarahitaḥ, kiṃ tvavidyāsaṃskārānuvṛttyāsya mātrayā tadabhimāno 'nuvartate /
GSP33vacbhamu:913: anuvartamānaṃ ca mithyeti manyamāno na śraddhatta ityuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:914: kimato yadyevam ? etadato bhavati- vidhiṣu śrāddho 'dhikārī nāśrāddhaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:920: api tu niṣidhyamānakriyonmukho nara ityeva pravartate /
GSP33vacbhamu:921: tathā ca sāṃsārika iva śraddhāvagatabrahmatattvo 'pi niṣedhamatikramya pravartamānaḥ pratyavaitīti na bhinnakarmadarśanābhyupagamaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:926: 'na karmaṇā na prajayā dhanena tyāgenaike amṛtatvamānaśuḥ' / iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:928: tatkimidānīmanupayoga eva sarvatheha karmaṇām ? tathā ca 'vividiṣanti
GSP33vacbhamu:931: tathā hi- tametamātmānaṃ vedānuvacanena nityasvādhyāyena, brāhmaṇā
GSP33vacbhamu:933: vastutaḥ pradhānasyāpi vedanasya prakṛtyarthatayā śabdato guṇatvāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:934: icchāyāśca pratyayārthatayā prādhānyāt, pradhānena ca kāryasaṃpratyayāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:935: na hi 'rājapuruṣamānaya' ityukte vastutaḥ pradhāno 'pi rājā puruṣaviśeṣaṇatayā śabdata upasarjana ānīyate, api tu puruṣa eva,
GSP33vacbhamu:939: kāmānaśanameva tapaḥ, hitamitamedhyāśino hi brahmaṇi vividiṣā bhavati, na tu sarvathā anaśnataḥ, maraṇāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:941: etāni ca nityāni upāttaduritanibarhaṇena puruṣaṃ saṃskurvanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:942: tathā ca śrutiḥ- 'sa ha vā ātmāyājī yo veda idaṃ me 'nenāṅgaṃ saṃskriyata idaṃ me 'nenāṅgamupadhīyate' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:946: nityanaimittikānuṣṭhānaprakṣīṇakalmaṣasya ca viśuddhasattvasyāviduṣa eva utpannavividiṣasya jñānottapattiṃ darśayatyātharvaṇī śrutiḥ-
GSP33vacbhamu:950: kḷptenaiva ca nityānāṃ karmaṇāṃ nityehitenopāttaduritanibarhaṇena puruṣasaṃskāreṇa jñānotpattāvaṅgabhāvopapattau na saṃyogapṛthaktvena sākṣādaṅgabhāvo yuktaḥ, kalpanāgauravāpatteḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:951: tathāhi- nityakarmaṇāmanuṣṭhānāddharmotpādaḥ, tataḥ pāpmā nivartate ; sa hi anityāśuciduḥkharūpe saṃsāre nityaśucisukhakhyātilakṣaṇena viparyāsena
GSP33vacbhamu:955: tato hānopāyaṃ paryeṣate ; paryeṣamāṇaścātmatattvajñānamasyopāya ityupaśrutya tajjijñāsate ; tataḥ śravaṇādikrameṇa tajjānātītyārādupakārakatvaṃ tattvajñānotpādaṃ prati cittasattvaśuddhyā karmaṇāṃ yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:960: evaṃ ca ananuṣṭhitakarmāpi prāgbhavīyakarmavaśāt yo viśuddhasattvaḥ saṃsārāsāratādarśanena niṣpannavairāgyaḥ, kṛtaṃ tasya karmānuṣṭhānena
GSP33vacbhamu:962: iyameva ca puruṣadhaureyabhedamadhikṛtya pravavṛte śrutiḥ- 'yadi vetarathā brahmacaryādeva pravrajet' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:964: ata eva na brahmacāriṇa ṛṇāni santi yena tadapākaraṇārthaṃ karmānutiṣṭhet
GSP33vacbhamu:965: etadanurodhācca 'jāyamāno vai brāhmaṇastribhirṛṇavā jāyate' iti gṛhasthaḥ saṃpadyamāna iti vyākhyeyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:968: jarāmaryavādo bhasmāntatāvādo 'ntyeṣṭayaśca karmajaḍānaviduṣaḥ prati, na tvātmatattvavidaḥ paṇḍitān /
GSP33vacbhamu:969: tasmāttasyānantaryamatha-śabdārthaḥ yadvinā brahmajijñāsā na bhavati yasmiṃstu sati bhavantī bhavatyeva /
GSP33vacbhamu:974: bhūtvā vanī bhavet vanī bhūtvā pravrajet' iti jābālaśrutirgārhasthyena hi
GSP33vacbhamu:978: iṣṭvā ca śaktito yajñairmano mokṣe niveśayet //
GSP33vacbhamu:986: na tatheha kramo vivakṣitaḥ, śrutyā tayaivānantaramaniyamasya darśitatvāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:989: ata eva 'yadahareva virajettadahareva pravrajet' iti śrutiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:994: mā bhūcchrauta ārtho vā kramaḥ ; pāṭhasthānamukhyapravṛttipramāṇakastu kasmānna bhavatītyata āha- śeṣaśeṣitve pramāṇābhāvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:995: śeṣāṇāṃ samidādīnāṃ śeṣiṇāṃ cāgneyādīnāṃ ekaphalavadupakāropanibaddhānāṃ ekaphalāvacchinnānām ekaprayogavacanopagṛhītānām ekādhikārikartṛkāṇāṃ ekapaurṇamāsyamāvāsyākālasaṃbaddhānāṃ yugapad anuṣṭhānāśakteḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:997: yatra tu na śeṣaśeṣibhāvaḥ nāpyekādhikārāvacchedaḥ yathā
GSP33vacbhamu:1000: na ceha dharmabrahmajijñāsayoḥ śeṣaśeṣibhāve śrutyādīnāmanyatamaṃ pramāṇamasatīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1001: nanu śeṣaśeṣibhāvābhāve 'pi kramaniyamo dṛṣṭaḥ yathā godohanasya puruṣārthasya dārśapaurṇamāsikairaṅgaiḥ saha, yathā vā 'darśapūrṇamāsābhyāmiṣṭvā somena yajeta' iti darśapūrṇamāsasomayoraśeṣaśeṣiṇorityata āha- adhikṛtādhikāre vā pramāṇābhāvāt- iti yojanā /
GSP33vacbhamu:1002: svargakāmasya hi darśapūrṇamāsādhikṛtasya paśukāmasya sato darśapūrṇamāsa-
GSP33vacbhamu:1007: paśukāmāsya' iti samabhivyāhārāt, yogyatvāccāsyāpāṃ praṇayanaṃ prati /
GSP33vacbhamu:1011: bhavet, yathāgneyādīnāṃ ṣaṇṇāmekasvargaphalāvacchinnānām ; yadi vā jijñāsyabrahmaṇaḥ aṃśo dharmaḥ syāt, yathā caturlakṣaṇīvyutpādyaṃ brahma
GSP33vacbhamu:1012: kenacitkenacit aṃśenaikena lakṣaṇena vyutpādyate, tatra caturṇāṃ lakṣaṇānāṃ jijñāsyābhedena parasparasaṃbandhe sati kramo vivakṣitaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:1016: jijñāsāyā vastuto jñānatantratvāt jñānaphalaṃ jijñāsāphalamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1017: na kevalaṃ svarūpataḥ phalabhedaḥ, tadutpādanaprakārabhedādapi tadbheda ityāha- taccānuṣṭhānāpekṣam
GSP33vacbhamu:1023: bhavitā ca bhāvakavyāpāranirvartyatayā tattantra iti tataḥ prāgjñānakāle nāstītyarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1025: na kevalaṃ svarūpato jijñāsyayorbhedaḥ, jñāpakapramāṇapravṛttibhedādapi bheda ityāha- codanāpravṛttibhedācca
GSP33vacbhamu:1026: codaneti vaidikaṃ śabdamāha, viśeṣeṇa sāmānyasya lakṣaṇāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:1027: pravṛttabhedaṃ vibhajate- yā hi codanā dharmasya iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1030: sā ca svasādhye puruṣavyāpāre bhāvanāyāṃ tadviṣaye ca yāgādau ; sa hi bhāvanāviṣayaḥ, tadadhīnanirūpaṇatvāt prayatnasya bhāvanāyāḥ, 'ṣiñ
GSP33vacbhamu:1032: bhāvanāyāstaddvāreṇa ca yāgāderapekṣitopāyatāmavagamayantī tatrecchopahāramukheṇa puruṣaṃ niyuñjānaiva yāgādidharmamavabodhayati nānyathā /
GSP33vacbhamu:1033: brahmacodanā tu puruṣamavabodhayatyeva kevalaṃ na tu pravartayantyavabodhayati /
GSP33vacbhamu:1035: nanu 'ātmā jñātavyaḥ' ityetadvidhiparairvedāntaiḥ tadekavākyatayāvabodhe pravartayadbhireva puruṣo brahmāvabodhyata iti samānatvaṃ dharmacodanābhirbrahmacodanānāmityata āha- na puruṣo 'vabodhe niyujyate //
GSP33vacbhamu:1036: ayamabhisaṃdhiḥ- na tāvadbrahmasākṣātkāre puruṣo niyoktavyaḥ, tasya brahmasvābhāvyena nityatvāt akāryatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:1043: api cātmajñānavidhipareṣu vedānteṣu nātmatattvaviniścayaḥ śābdaḥ syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:1044: na hi tadā ātmatattvaparāste, kiṃ tu tajjñānavidhiparāḥ, yatparāśca te ta
GSP33vacbhamu:1050: yasminnasati brahmajijñāsā na bhavati sati tu bhavantī bhavatyevetyarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1055: atha viveko jñānamātram, na niścayaḥ ; tathā sati eṣa viparyāsādanyaḥ saṃśayaḥ syāt ; tathā ca na vairāgyaṃ bhāvayet ; abhāvayankathaṃ brahmajijñāsāhetuḥ ? tasmādevaṃ vyākhyeyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:1058: etaduktaṃ bhavati- mā bhūt idaṃ ṛtaṃ nityam, idaṃ tadanṛtamanityamiti dharmiviśeṣayorvivekaḥ ; dharmimātrayornityānityayostaddharmayośca vivekaṃ niścinotyeva /
GSP33vacbhamu:1059: nityatvaṃ satyatvaṃ tadyasyāsti tannityaṃ satyam ; tathā cāsthāgocaraḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1061: tadeteṣvanubhūyamāneṣu yuṣmadasmatpratyayagocareṣu viṣayaviṣayiṣu yadṛtaṃ nityaṃ sukhaṃ vyavasthāsyate tadāsthāgocaro bhaviṣyati ;
GSP33vacbhamu:1062: yattvanityamanṛtaṃ bhaviṣyati tāpatrayaparītaṃ tattyakṣyata iti so 'yaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:1064: na khalu satyaṃ nāma na kiñcidastīti vācyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:1065: tadabhāve tadadhiṣṭhānasyānṛtasyāpyanupapatteḥ, śūnyavādināmapi śūnyatāyā eva satyatvāt
GSP33vacbhamu:1066: athāsya puruṣadhaureyasyānubhavopapattibhyāmevaṃ sunipuṇaṃ nirūpayataḥ ā ca satyalokāt ā cāvīceḥ jāyasva mriyasva iti viparivartamānaṃ kṣaṇamuhūrtayāmāhorātrārdhamāsamāsartvayanavatsarayugacaturyugamanvantarapralayamahāpralayamahāsargāvāntarasargasaṃsārasāgarormibhiraniśamuhyamānaṃ tāpatrayaparītamātmānaṃ jīvalokaṃ cāvalokya asminsaṃsāramaṇḍale anityāśuciduḥkhātmakaṃ prasaṃkhyānamupāvartate /
GSP33vacbhamu:1072: rāgādikaṣāyamadirāmattaṃ hi manaḥ teṣu teṣu viṣayeṣūccāvacamindriyāṇi pravartayat vividhāśca pravṛttīḥ puṇyāpuṇyaphalā bhāvayat puruṣamatighore vividhaduḥkhajvālājaṭāle saṃsārahutabhuji juhoti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1074: so 'yamasya vairāgyahetuko manovijayaḥ śama iti vaśīkarasaṃjña iti
GSP33vacbhamu:1076: vijitaṃ ca manastattvaviṣayaviniyogayogyatāṃ nīyate ; seyamasya yogyatā damaḥ, yathā dānto 'yaṃ vṛṣabhayuvā halaśakaṭādivahanayogyaḥ kṛta iti gamyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:1078: ata eva śrutiḥ- 'tasmācchānto dānta uparatastitikṣuḥ śraddhāvitto
GSP33vacbhamu:1082: tato 'sya saṃsārabandhanānmumukṣā bhavatītyāha- mumukṣutvaṃ ca iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1083: tasya ca nityaśuddhabuddhamuktasvabhāvabrahmajñānaṃ mokṣasya kāraṇamityupaśrutya tajjijñāsā bhavati dharmajijñāsāyāḥ prāgūrdhvaṃ ca ;
GSP33vacbhamu:1084: tasmātteṣāmevānantaryaṃ na dharmajijñāsāyā ityāha- teṣu hi iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1085: na kevalaṃ jijñāsāmātram, api tu jñānamapītyāha- jñātuṃ ca /
GSP33vacbhamu:1089: atraivaṃ paricodyate- satyaṃ yathoktasādhanasaṃpattyanantaraṃ brahmajijñāsā bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:1093: duḥkhānuṣaṅgadarśanātsukhe 'pi vairāgyamiti cet, hanta bhoḥ sukhānuṣaṅgādduḥkhe 'pyanurāgo na kasmādbhavati ? tasmāt sukhe upādīyamāne
GSP33vacbhamu:1096: tadyathā- matsyārthī saśalkānsakaṇṭakānmatsyānupādatte, sa yāvadādeyaṃ tāvadādāya nivartate ; yathā vā dhānyārthī sapalālāni dhānyānyāharati, sa yāvadādeyaṃ tāvadādāya nivartate /
GSP33vacbhamu:1098: na hi mṛgāḥ santīti śālayo nopyante, bhikṣukāḥ santīti sthālyo
GSP33vacbhamu:1100: api ca dṛṣṭaṃ sukhaṃ candanavanitādisaṅgajanma kṣayitālakṣaṇena duḥkhenāghrātatvādatibhīruṇā tyajyetāpi, na tvāmuṣmikaṃ svargādi,
GSP33vacbhamu:1102: śrūyate hi- 'apāma somamamṛtā abhūma' iti ; tathā ca 'akṣayyaṃ ha vai cāturmāsyayājinaḥ sukṛtaṃ bhavati' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1106: evaṃ prāpte āha bhagavānsūtrakāraḥ 'ataḥ' iti ; tasyārthaṃ vyācaṣṭe bhāṣyakāraḥ- yasmādveda eva iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1107: ayamabhisaṃdhiḥ- satyaṃ mṛgabhikṣukādayaḥ śakyāḥ parihartuṃ pācakakṛṣīvalādibhiḥ ; duḥkhaṃ tvanekavidhānekakāraṇasaṃpātajamaśakyaparihāram ; antataḥ sādhanāpāratantryakṣayitalakṣaṇayorduḥkhayoḥ samastakṛtakasukhāvinābhāvaniyamāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:1108: na hi madhuviṣasaṃpṛktamannaṃ viṣaṃ parityajya madhumiśraṃ śakyaṃ śilpivareṇāpi bhoktum /
GSP33vacbhamu:1114: atra ca brahmapadena tatpramāṇaṃ veda upasthāpitaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1115: sa ca yogyatvāt 'tadyatheha karmacitaḥ' ityādiḥ 'ataḥ' iti sarvanāmnā parāmṛśya hetupañcamyā nirdiśyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:1117: yathā svargādeḥ kṛtakasya sukhasya duḥkhānuṣaṅgaḥ tathā brahmaṇo 'pītyata
GSP33vacbhamu:1119: tenāyamarthaḥ- ataḥ svargādīnāṃ kṣayitāpratipādakāt brahmajñānasya ca paramapuruṣārthatāpratipādakāt āgamāt yathoktasādhanasaṃpat ; tataśca jijñāseti siddham /
GSP33vacbhamu:1121: ṣaṣṭhīsamāsapradarśanena prācāṃ vṛttikṛtāṃ brahmaṇe jijñāsā brahmajijñāseti caturthīsamāsaḥ parāsto veditavyaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1122: 'tādarthyasamāse prakṛtivikṛtigrahaṇaṃ kartavyam' iti kātyāyanīyavacanena yūpadārvādiṣveva prakṛtivikārabhūteṣu caturthīsamāsaniyamāt
GSP33vacbhamu:1127: brahmaṇo jijñāsetyukte tatrānekārthatvādbrahmaśabdasya saṃśayaḥ- kasya brahmaṇo jijñāsā ?- iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1128: asti brahmaśabdo vipratvajātau, yathā- brahmahatyeti ; asti ca vede,
GSP33vacbhamu:1129: yathā- brahmojjhamiti ; asti ca paramātmani, yathā- 'brahma veda brahmaiva bhavati' iti
GSP33vacbhamu:1130: tamimaṃ saṃśayamapākaroti- brahma ca vakṣyamāṇalakṣaṇam iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1131: yato brahmajijñāsāṃ pratijñāya tajjñāpanāya paramātmalakṣaṇaṃ praṇayati tato 'vagacchāmaḥ paramātmajijñāsaiveyaṃ na vipratvajātyādijijñāsā,
GSP33vacbhamu:1133: ṣaṣṭhīsamāsaparigrahe 'pi neyaṃ karmaṣaṣṭhī, kiṃ tu śeṣalakṣaṇā ;
GSP33vacbhamu:1134: saṃbandhamātraṃ ca śeṣa iti brahmaṇo jijñāsetyukte brahmasaṃbandhinī jijñāsetyuktaṃ bhavati
GSP33vacbhamu:1135: tathā ca brahmasvarūpapramāṇayuktisādhanaprayojanajijñāsāḥ sarvā brahmajijñāsārthā brahmajijñāsayāvaruddhā bhavanti, sākṣāt pāramparyeṇa vā
GSP33vacbhamu:1137: karmaṇi ṣaṣṭhyāṃ tu brahmaśabdārthaḥ karma ; sa ca svarūpameveti
GSP33vacbhamu:1139: bhavet- iti ye manyante tānpratyāhabrahmaṇa iti karmaṇi iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1141: icchāyāḥ pratipattyanubandho jñānam, jñānasya ca jñeyaṃ brahma /
GSP33vacbhamu:1142: no khalu jñānaṃ jñeyaṃ vinā nirūpyate, na ca jijñāsā jñānaṃ vinā, iti pratipattyanubandhatvāt prathamaṃ jijñāsā karmaivāpekṣate, na tu saṃbandhimātram, tadantareṇāpi sati karmaṇi tannirūpaṇāt na hi candramasamādityaṃ vopalabhya kasyāyamiti saṃbandhyanveṣaṇā bhavati
GSP33vacbhamu:1144: tasmātprathamamapekṣitatvāt karmatayaiva brahma saṃbadhyate, na tu saṃbandhitāmātreṇa, tasya jaghanyatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:1146: nanu satyaṃ na jijñāsyamantareṇa jijñāsā nirūpyate ; jijñāsyāntaraṃ tvasyā bhaviṣyati ; brahma tu śeṣatayā saṃbhantsyata ityata āha- jijñāsyāntara iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1149: nigūḍhābhiprāya eva dūṣayati- evamapi pratyakṣaṃ brahmaṇa iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1150: vācyasya karmatvasya jijñāsayā prathamamapekṣitasya prathamasaṃbandhārhasya cānvayaparityāgena paścātkathañcidapekṣitasya saṃbandhimātrasya saṃbandho, jaghanyaḥ prathamaḥ prathamaśca jaghanyaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:1153: cedakaḥ svābhiprāyamudghāṭayati- na vyarthaḥ brahmāśritāśeṣa iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1159: tadevamabhimataṃ samāsaṃ vyavasthāpya jijñāsāpadārthamāha- jñātum iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1165: nāpi tayorupāyaḥ ; tasminsatyapi sukhabhedasyādarśanāt, anuvartamānasya ca duḥkhasyānivṛtteḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:1168: na kevalaṃ jñānamiṣyate kiṃ tvavagatiṃ sākṣātkāraṃ kurvadavagatiparyantaṃ sanvācyāyā icchāyāḥ karma /
GSP33vacbhamu:1169: kasmāt ? phalaviṣayatvādicchāyāḥ tadupāyaṃ phalaparyantaṃ gocarayatīccheti śeṣaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1170: nanu bhavatvavagatiparyantaṃ jñānam ; kimetāvatāpīṣṭaṃ bhavati ? na hyanapekṣaṇīyaviṣayamavagatiparyantamapi jñānamiṣyata ityata āha- jñānena hi pramāṇenāvagantumiṣṭaṃ brahma /
GSP33vacbhamu:1171: bhavatu brahmaviṣayāvagatiḥ, evamapi kathamiṣṭetyata āha- brahmāvagatirhi puruṣārthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1173: vigalitanikhiladuḥkhānuṣaṅgaparamānandaghanabrahmāvagatirbrahmaṇaḥ svabhāva iti saiva niḥśreyasaṃ puruṣārtha iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1184: pratibhānapi na pratibhātīva parādhīnaprakāśa iva dehendriyādibhyo bhinno
GSP33vacbhamu:1185: 'pyabhinna iva bhāsata iti saṃsārabījāvidyādyanarthanibarhaṇātprāgaprāpta iva tasminsati prāpta iva bhavatīti puruṣeṇārthyamānatvātpuruṣārtha iti yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:1192: tacca na kevalebhyo vedāntebhyaḥ api tu brahmamīmāṃsopakaraṇebhya iti icchāmukhena brahmamīmāṃsāyāṃ pravartyate, na tu vedānteṣu
GSP33vacbhamu:1193: tadarthavivakṣāyāṃ vā ; tatra phalavadarthāvabodhaparatāṃ svādhyāyādhyayanavidheḥ sūtrayatā 'athāto dharmajijñāsā' ityanenaiva
GSP33vacbhamu:1195: yadyapi ca dharmamīmāṃsāvat vedārthamīmāṃsayā brahmamīmāṃsāpyākṣeptuṃ śakyate, tathāpi prācyā mīmāṃsayā na tadvyutpādyate, nāpi brahmamīmāṃsāyā adhyayanamātrānantaryamiti brahmamīmāṃsārambhāya nityānityavivekādyānantaryapradarśanāya cedaṃ sūtramārambhaṇīyamityapaunaruktyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:1197: etena sūtreṇa brahmajñānaṃ pratyupāyatā mīmāṃsāyāḥ pratipādyata ityuktam ;
GSP33vacbhamu:1198: tadayuktam, vikalpāsahatvāt, iti codayati- tatpunarbrahma iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1200: yadi prasiddham, vedāntavākyasamutthena niścayajñānena viṣayīkṛtam ; tato na jijñāsitavyam, niṣpāditakriye karmaṇi aviśeṣādhāyinaḥ sādhanasya sādhananyāyātipātāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:1201: athāprasiddhaṃ vedāntebhyaḥ, tarhi na tadvedāntāḥ pratipādayantīti sarvathāprasiddhaṃ naiva śakyaṃ jijñāsitum /
GSP33vacbhamu:1202: anubhūte hi priye bhavatīcchā na tu sarvathānanubhūtāpūrve /
GSP33vacbhamu:1206: sa cettannāvabodhayati, kutastasya tatra prāmāṇyam ? na ca pramāṇānantaraṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:1208: tasmātprasiddhasya jñātuṃ śakyasyāpyajijñāsanāt aprasiddhasyecchāyā aviṣayatvāt aśakyajñānatvācca na brahma jijñāsyamityākṣepaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1213: atra ca brahmetyādināvagamyena tadviṣayamavagamaṃ lakṣayati, tadastitvasya sati vimarśe vicārātprāganirṇayāt
GSP33vacbhamu:1218: muktau satyāmasyaite śuddhatvādayaḥ prathante, tatastu prāk dehādyabhedena
GSP33vacbhamu:1220: sadaiva muktaḥ sadaiva kevalo 'nādyavidyāvaśāttu bhrāntyā tathāvabhāsata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1221: tadevamanaupādhikaṃ brahmaṇo rūpaṃ darśayitvā avidyopādhikaṃ rūpamāha-
GSP33vacbhamu:1225: kutaḥ punarevaṃbhūtabrahmasvarūpāvagatiḥ ityata āha- brahmaśabdasya hi iti
GSP33vacbhamu:1226: na kevalam 'sadeva somyedam' ityādīnāṃ vākyānāṃ paurvāparyaparyālocanayā
GSP33vacbhamu:1237: pratītimeva apratītinirākaraṇena draḍhayati- na na iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1238: na na pratyeti 'ahamasmi' iti, kiṃ tu pratyetyeveti yojanā /
GSP33vacbhamu:1239: nanu 'ahamasmi' iti ca jñāsyati mā ca jñāsīdātmānamityata āha- yadi iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1241: ahaṅkārāspadaṃ hi jīvātmānaṃ cenna pratīyāt 'aham' iti na pratīyādityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1242: nanu pratyetu sarvo jana ātmānamahaṅkārāspadam, brahmaṇi tu kimāyātam
GSP33vacbhamu:1243: ityata āha- ātmā ca brahma ; tadaḥ tvamāsāmānādhikaraṇyāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:1244: tasmāttatpadārthasya śuddhabuddhatvādeḥ śabdataḥ tvaṃpadārthasya ca jīvātmanaḥ pratyakṣataḥ prasiddheḥ, padārthajñānapūrvakatvācca
GSP33vacbhamu:1245: vākyārthajñānasya, tvaṃpadārthasya brahmabhāvāvagamaḥ 'tattvamasi' iti vākyādupapadyata iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1246: ākṣeptā prathamakalpāśrayaṃ doṣamāha- yadi tarhi loka iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1248: tatra 'tattvamasi' iti vākyādyadi brahma ātmatvena prasiddhamasti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1249: 'ātmā brahmatvena' iti vaktavye 'brahma ātmatvena' iti abhedavivakṣayā gamayitavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:1250: pariharati- naḥ ; kutaḥ ? tadviśeṣaṃ prati vipratipatteḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1253: vivādādhikaraṇaṃ dharmī sarvatantrasiddhāntasiddho 'bhyupeyaḥ ; anyathā anāśrayā bhinnāśrayā vā vipratipattayo na syuḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1254: viruddhā hi pratipattayo vipratipattayaḥ ; na cānāśrayāḥ pratipattayo
GSP33vacbhamu:1255: bhavanti, anālambanatvāpatteḥ ; na ca bhinnāśrayā viruddhāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1256: na hi 'anityā buddhiḥ' 'nitya ātmā' iti pratipattivipratipattī /
GSP33vacbhamu:1257: tasmāttatpadārthasya śuddhatvādervedāntebhyaḥ pratītiḥ, tvaṃpadārthasya ca jīvātmano lokataḥ siddhiḥ sarvatantrasiddhāntaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1259: tasmāt sāmānyataḥ prasiddhe dharmiṇi viśeṣato vipratipattau yuktastadviśeṣeṣu saṃśayaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1260: tatra tvaṃpadārthe tāvadvipratipattīrdarśayati- dehamātram ityādinā bhoktaiva kevalaṃ na karttā ityantena /
GSP33vacbhamu:1261: atra dehendriyamanaḥkṣaṇikavijñānacaitanyapakṣe na tatpadārthanityatvādayaḥ tvaṃpadārthena saṃbadhyante, yogyatāvirahāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:1268: manyante, vedaprāmāṇyavādino 'pyaupacārikaṃ tatpadārthamavivakṣitaṃ vā manyanta iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1269: tadevaṃ tvaṃpadārthavipratipattidvārā tatpadārthe vipratipattiṃ sūcayitvā sākṣāttatpadārthe 'pi vipratipattimāha- asti tadvyatirikta īśvaraḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:1276: tasyāpi jīvātmabhyo 'pi vyatirekāt na tvaṃpadārthena sāmānādhikaraṇyamiti
GSP33vacbhamu:1278: bhokturjīvātmano 'vidyopādhikasya sa īśvaraḥ tatpadārtha ātmā ; tata īśvarādabhinno jīvātmā, paramākāśādiva ghaṭākāśādaya ityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1281: nanu santu vipratipattayaḥ tannimittaśca saṃśayaḥ ; tathāpi kimarthaṃ brahmamīmāṃsā ārabhyate ityata āha- tatrāvicārya.iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1283: api ca atattvajñānānnāstikye sati anarthaprāptirapītyāha- anarthaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:1286: vedāntamīmāṃsā tāvattarka eva, tadavirodhinaśca ye 'nye 'pi tarkā adhvaramīmāṃsāyāṃ nyāye ca vedapratyakṣādiprāmāṇyapariśodhanādiṣūktāḥ t
GSP33vacbhamu:1292: tadevaṃ prathamasūtreṇa mīmāṃsārambhamupapādya brahmamīmāṃsāmārabhate- janmādyasya yataḥ. /
GSP33vacbhamu:1293: etasya sūtrasya pātanikāmāha bhāṣyakāraḥ - brahma jijñāsitavyamityuktam ; kiṃlakṣaṇaṃ. punastadbrahma. /
GSP33vacbhamu:1294: atra yadyapi brahmasvarūpajñānasya pradhānasya pratijñayā tadaṅgānyapi pramāṇādīni pratijñātāni, tathāpi svarūpasya prādhānyāttadevākṣipya
GSP33vacbhamu:1296: tatra yadyāvadanubhūyate tatsarvaṃ parimitamaviśudadhamabuddhaṃ vidhvaṃsi ca ; na tenopalabdhena tadviruddhasya nityaśuddhabuddhasvabhāvasya brahmaṇaḥ svarūpaṃ śakyaṃ lakṣayitum /
GSP33vacbhamu:1297: na hi jātu kaścitkṛtakatvena nityaṃ lakṣayati /
GSP33vacbhamu:1298: na ca taddharmeṇa nityatvādinā tallakṣyate, tasyānupalabdhacaratvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:1300: evaṃ ca na śabdo 'pyatra prakramate, atyantāprasiddhatayā brahmaṇo 'padārthasyāvākyārthatvāt
GSP33vacbhamu:1303: mā bhūdanubhūyamānaṃ jagattaddharmatayā tādātmyena vā brahmaṇo lakṣaṇam ;
GSP33vacbhamu:1304: tadutpattyā tu bhaviṣyati deśāntaraprāptiriva saviturvrajyāyā iti tātparyārthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1310: pradhānakālagrahalokapālakriyāyadṛcchāsvabhāvābhāveṣūpaplavamāneṣu satsu sarvajñaṃ sarvaśaktisvabhāvaṃ brahma jagajjanmādikāraṇamiti kutaḥ saṃbhāvanetyata āha- asya jagata.iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1311: atra nāmarūpābhyāṃ vyākṛtasya.iti cetanabhāvakartṛkatvasaṃbhāvanayā pradhānādyacetanakartṛkatvaṃ nirupākhyakartṛkatvaṃ ca vyāsedhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:1312: yatkhalu nāmnā rūpeṇa ca vyākriyate taccetanakartṛkaṃ dṛṣṭam, yathā ghaṭādi /
GSP33vacbhamu:1313: vivādādhyāsitaṃ ca jagannāmnā rūpeṇa ca vyākṛtam ; tasmāccetanakartṛkaṃ saṃbhāvyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:1314: cetano hi buddhāvālikhya nāmarūpe ghaṭa iti nāmnā rūpeṇa ca kambugrīvādinā bāhyaṃ ghaṭaṃ niṣpādayati
GSP33vacbhamu:1315: ata eva ghaṭasya nirvartyasyāpyantaḥ saṃkalpātmanā siddhasya karmakārakabhāvaḥ 'ghaṭaṃ karoti' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1317: tathā cācetano buddhāvanālikhitaṃ karotīti na śakyaṃ saṃbhāvayitumiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1319: cetanā grahā lokapālā vā nāmarūpe buddhāvālikhya jagajjanayiṣyanti, kṛtam uktasvabhāvena brahmaṇetyata āha- anekakartṛbhoktṛsaṃyuktasya.iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1320: kecitkartāro bhavanti, yathā sūdartvigādayaḥ, na bhoktāraḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1321: kecittu bhoktāraḥ, yathā śrāddhavaiśvānareṣṭyādiṣu pitāputrādayaḥ, na kartāraḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1324: deśādīni ca tāni pratiniyatāti ceti vigrahaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1330: evaṃ kecitpratiniyataphalāḥ, yathā kecitsukhinaḥ kecidduḥkhinaḥ, evaṃ ya eva sukhinasta eva kadācidduḥkhinaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1331: sarvametadākasmikāparanāmni yādṛcchikatve ca svābhāvikatve cāsarvajñāsarvaśaktikartṛkatve ca na ghaṭate,
GSP33vacbhamu:1334: ekasyā api hi śarīraracanāyā rūpaṃ manasā na śakyaṃ cintayituṃ kadācit,
GSP33vacbhamu:1338: kasmātpunarjanmasthitibhaṅgamātramihādigrahaṇena gṛhyate na tu vṛddhipariṇāmāpakṣayā apītyata āha- anyeṣāmapi
GSP33vacbhamu:1341: tenālpāvayavādavayavino dvitantukāderanya eva mahānpaṭo jāyata iti janmaiva vṛddhiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1343: dharmiṇo hi hāṭakāderdharmalakṣaṇaḥ pariṇāmaḥ kaṭakamukuṭādiḥ tasyotpattiḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:1350: tathā sati hi tatpratipādake 'yato vā imāni bhūtāni' iti vedavākye buddhisthīkṛte jaganmūlakāraṇaṃ brahma lakṣitaṃ bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:1351: anyathā tu jāyate asti vardhate ityādīnāṃ grahaṇe tatpratipādakaṃ nairuktavākyaṃ buddhau bhavet ; tacca na mūlakāraṇapratipādanaparam,
GSP33vacbhamu:1352: mahāsargādūrdhvaṃ sthitikāle 'pi tadvākyoditānāṃ janmādīnāṃ bhāvavikārāṇāmupapatteḥ,- iti śaṅkānirākaraṇārthaṃ vedoktotpattisthitibhaṅgagrahaṇamityāha- yāska-. paripaṭhitānāṃ tu.iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1353: nanvevamapi utpattimātraṃ sūcyatām ; tannāntarīyakatayā tu sthitibhaṅgaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:1355: tribhirasyopādānatvaṃ sūcyate ; utpattimātraṃ tu nimittakāraṇasādhāraṇamiti nopādānatvaṃ sūcayet ; tadidamuktam- tatraiva.iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1357: tadanena prabandhena pratijñāviṣayasya brahmasvarūpasya lakṣaṇadvāreṇa saṃbhāvanoktā /
GSP33vacbhamu:1364: yadanye vaiśeṣikakādaya ita evānumānādīśvaraviniścayamicchanti, iti saṃbhāvanāhetutāṃ draḍhayitumāha- etadeva.iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1370: tatkiṃ brahmaṇi śabdādṛte na mānāntaramanusaraṇīyam ? tathā ca kuto
GSP33vacbhamu:1371: mananam ? kutaśca tadanubhavaḥ sākṣātkāraḥ ? ityata āha- satsu tu vedāntavākyeṣu.iti
GSP33vacbhamu:1373: śabdāvirodhinyā tadupajīvinyā ca yuktyā vivecanaṃ mananam /
GSP33vacbhamu:1376: yathā dharmo na puruṣabuddhisāhāyyam, evaṃ brahmaṇyapi kasmānna
GSP33vacbhamu:1382: yadyapi dharmajijñāsāyāmapi sāmagryāṃ pratyakṣādīnāṃ vyāpāraḥ tathāpi sākṣānnāsti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1387: nanu bhavatu brahmānubhavārthā jijñāsā ; tadanubhava eva tvaśakyaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:1392: svayamapuruṣārthatvāt, tadanuṣṭhānasādhyatvātpuruṣārthasya, anuṣṭhānasya ca vināpyanubhavaṃ śābdajñānamātrādeva siddheḥ ityāha- kartavye
GSP33vacbhamu:1401: puruṣasvātantryāt kartavye vidhipratiṣedhānāmānarthakyam, atadadhīnatvāt puruṣapravṛttinivṛttyoḥ ityata āha- vidhipratiṣedhāścātrārthavantaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:1409: yasmādgrahaṇāgrahaṇayoruditānuditahomayośca virodhāt samuccayāsaṃbhave tulyabalatayā ca bādhyabādhakabhāvābhāve sati agatyā vikalpaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1410: nārāsthisparśananiṣedhatadvāraṇāyośca viruddhayoratulyabalatayā na vikalpaḥ ; kiṃ tu sāmānyaśāstrasya sparśananiṣedhasya dhāraṇavidhiviṣayeṇa viśeṣaśāstreṇa bādhaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1411: etaduktaṃ bhavati- vidhipratiṣedhaireva sa tādṛśo viṣayo 'nāgatotpādyarūpa
GSP33vacbhamu:1412: upanītaḥ yena puruṣasya vidhiniṣedhādhīnapravṛttinivṛttyorapi svātantryaṃ bhavatīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1413: bhūte vastuni tu neyamasti vidhā, ityāha- na tu vastvevaṃ naivam.iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1417: bhūte 'pi vastuni vikalpo dṛṣṭaḥ, yathā 'sthāṇurvā puruṣo vā' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1418: tatkathaṃ na vastu vikalpyate, ityata āha- vikalpanāstu.iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1420: savāsanamanomātrayonayo vā yathā svapne ; savāsanendriyamanoyonayo vā yathā 'sthāṇurvā puruṣo vā' iti sthāṇau saṃśayaḥ, 'puruṣa eva' iti ca viparyāsaḥ ; anya.śabdena vastutaḥ sthāṇoranyasya puruṣasyābhidhānāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:1421: na tu puruṣatattvaṃ vā sthāṇutattvaṃ vāpekṣante,
GSP33vacbhamu:1423: tasmādayathāvastato vikalpanā na vastu vikalpayanti vā anyathayanti vetyarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1424: tattvajñānaṃ tu na buddhitantram, kiṃ tu vastutantram ; atastato vastuviniścayo yuktaḥ, na tu vikalpanābhya ityāha- na
GSP33vacbhamu:1426: evamuktena prakāreṇa bhūtavastuviṣayāṇāṃ jñānānāṃ prāmāṇyasya vastutantratāṃ prasādhya brahmajñānasya vastutantratāmāha- tatraivaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:1434: evaṃ ca maulikaṃ tadeva parīkṣaṇīyam, na tu vedāntavākyāni
GSP33vacbhamu:1442: yathā ca sāmānyato dṛṣṭamapyanumānaṃ brahmaṇi na pravartate tathopariṣṭānnipuṇataramupapādayiṣyāmaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:1446: śrutiśca 'yato vā' iti janma darśayati, 'yena jātāni jīvanti' iti jīvanaṃ stitim, 'yatprayanti-' iti tatraiva layam /
GSP33vacbhamu:1448: atra ca pradhānādiviṣayatvasaṃśaye nirṇayavākyam- ānandādhyeva iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1450: satyāmasti rajjvāmeva ca līyate, evamavidyāsahitabrahmopādānaṃ jagat brahmaṇyevāsti tatraiva ca līyata iti siddham /
GSP33vacbhamu:1455: na kevalaṃ jagadyonitvādasya bhagavataḥ sarvajñatā, śāstrayonitvādapi boddhavyā /
GSP33vacbhamu:1456: śāstrayonitvasya sarvajñatāsādhanatvaṃ samarthagate- mahata ṛgvedādeḥ śāstrasya.iti
GSP33vacbhamu:1457: cāturvarṇyasya cāturāśramyasya ca yathāyathaṃ niṣekādiśmaśānāntāsu brahmamuhūrtopakramapradoṣaparisamāpanīyāsu nityanaimittikakāmyakarmapaddhatiṣu ca brahmatattve ca śiṣyāṇāṃ śāsanāt śāstramṛgvedādiḥ ; ata eva mahāviṣayatvāt mahat /
GSP33vacbhamu:1460: purāṇanyāyamīmāṃsādayo daśa vidyāsthānāni ; taiḥ tayā tayā dvāropakṛtasya
GSP33vacbhamu:1462: purāṇādipraṇetāro hi maharṣayaḥ śiṣṭāḥ ; taiḥ tayā tayā dvārā vedān vyācakṣāṇaistadarthaṃ cādareṇānutiṣṭhadbhiḥ parigṛhīto veda iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1467: sarvajñasya hi jñānaṃ sarvaviṣayaṃ śāstrasyāpyabhidhānaṃ sarvaviṣayamiti sādṛśyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:1469: sarvajñasya guṇaḥ sarvaviṣayatā ; tadanvitaṃ śāsatram, asyāpi sarvaviṣayatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:1470: uktamarthaṃ pramāṇayati- yadyadvistarārthaṃ śāstraṃ yasmātpuruṣaviśeṣāt. saṃbhavati sa.puruṣaviśeṣaḥ tato 'pi.śāstrāt adhikataravijñānaḥ.iti yojanā /
GSP33vacbhamu:1471: adyatve 'pyasmadādibhiryatsamīcīnārthaviṣayaṃ śāstraṃ viracyate tatrāsmākaṃ vaktṛṇāṃ vākyājjñānamadhikaviṣayam
GSP33vacbhamu:1472: na hi te te asādhāraṇadharmā anubhūyamānā api śakyā vaktum /
GSP33vacbhamu:1474: vistarārthamapi vākyaṃ na vaktṛjñānena tulyaviṣayamiti kathayituṃ vistara.grahaṇam /
GSP33vacbhamu:1476: vedasya yasmāt mahato bhūtāt yoneḥ saṃbhavaḥ, tasya mahato bhūtasya
GSP33vacbhamu:1477: brahmaṇo niratiśayaṃ sarvajñatvaṃ sarvaśaktitvaṃ ca kimu vaktavyamiti yojanā /
GSP33vacbhamu:1479: atra ca anekaśākhābhedabhinnasya.ityādiḥ saṃbhava. ityanta upanayaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1483: devarṣayo hi mahāpariśrameṇāpi yatrāśaktāḥ tadayamīṣatprayatnena līlayaiva karotīti niratiśayamasya sarvajñatvaṃ sarvaśaktitvaṃ coktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:1484: aprayatnenāsya vedakartṛtve śrutiruktā 'asya mahato bhūtasya' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1485: ye 'pi tāvat varṇānāṃ nityatvamāsthiṣata tairapi padavākyādīnāmanityatvamabhyupāyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:1488: vyaktidharmaścānupūrvī na varṇadharmaḥ, varṇānāṃ nityānāṃ vibhūnāṃ ca kālato deśato vā paurvāparyāyogāt
GSP33vacbhamu:1489: vyaktiścānityeti kathaṃ tadupagṛhītānāṃ varṇānāṃ nityānāmapi padatā nityā
GSP33vacbhamu:1492: yathā hi yādṛśaṃ gātracalanādi nartakaḥ karoti tādṛśameva śikṣyamāṇānukaroti nartakī, na tu tadeva vyanakti, evaṃ yādṛśīmānupūrvīṃ vaidikānāṃ varṇapadādīnāṃ karotyadhyāpayitā tādṛśīmevānukaroti māṇavakaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:1494: tasmānnityānityavarṇavādināṃ na laukikavaidikapadavākyādipauruṣeyatve vivādaḥ ; kevalaṃ vedavākyeṣu puruṣasvātantryāsvātantrye vipratipattiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1495: yathāhuḥ- 'yatnataḥ pratiṣedhyā naḥ puruṣāṇāṃ svatantratā' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1497: vaiyāsikaṃ tu matamanuvartamānāḥ śrutismṛtītihāsādisiddhasṛṣṭipralayānusāreṇa anādyavidyopadhānalabdhasarvaśaktisarvajñānasyāpi paramātmano nityasya vedānāṃ yonerapi na teṣu svātantryam, pūrvapūrvasargānusāreṇa tādṛśānupūrvīviracanāt ; yathā hi yāgādibrahmahatyādayor'thānarthahetavo
GSP33vacbhamu:1500: agnirvā kledayati, āpo vā dahanti, tadvat /
GSP33vacbhamu:1502: anyathā tadeva vāgvajratayānarthahetuḥ, evaṃ sargāntareṣvapīti tadanurodhāt sarvajño 'pi sarvaśaktirapi pūrvapūrvasargānusāreṇa vedānviracayanna svatantraḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1505: na caikasya pratibhāne anāśvāsa iti yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:1506: na hi bahūnāmapyajñānāṃ vijñānāṃ vā āśayadoṣavatāṃ pratibhāne yukta āśvāsaḥ ; tattvajñānavatastvapāstasamastadoṣasyaikasyāpi pratibhāne yukta
GSP33vacbhamu:1509: tatpratyayena cārvācīnānāmapi tatra saṃpratyaya ityupapannaṃ brahmaṇaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:1514: tasyaiva tu lakṣaṇasyānena anumānatvāśaṅkāmapākṛtya āgamopadarśanena brahmaṇi śāstraṃ pramāṇamuktam
GSP33vacbhamu:1516: śāstrapramāṇakatvamuktaṃ brahmaṇaḥ pratijñāmātreṇa ; tadanena sūtreṇa pratipādanīyam ; ityutsūtraṃ pūrvapakṣamāracayati bhāṣyakāraḥ- kathaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:1521: na khalu laukikāni vākyāni pramāṇāntaraviṣayamarthamavabodhayanti svataḥ pramāṇam ;
GSP33vacbhamu:1526: yadi tvasaṃnidhānāttatparatvaṃ na rocayante, tataḥ saṃnihitopāsanādikriyāparatvaṃ vā vedāntānām
GSP33vacbhamu:1527: evaṃ hi pratyakṣādyanadhigatagocaratvenānapekṣatayā prāmāṇyaṃ ca prayojanavattvaṃ ca sidhyatīti tātparyārthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1531: asya vibhāgabhāṣyaṃ na hi.ityādi upapannā vā.ityantam /
GSP33vacbhamu:1533: akriyārthatve 'pi brahmasvarūpavidhiparā vedāntā bhaviṣyanti ; tathā ca 'vidhinā tvekavākyatvāt-'
GSP33vacbhamu:1536: utpattividherajñātajñāpanārthatvāt ; vedāntānāṃ cājñātaṃ brahma jñāpayatāṃ tathābhāvāt , ityata āha- na ca pariniṣṭhita.iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1543: na tvatra viniyogādayo na santi ; santo 'pyanyato
GSP33vacbhamu:1545: tasmāt bhāvanāviṣayo vidhirna siddhe vastuni bhavitumarhatīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1548: evaṃ ca sati uktarūpe brahmaṇi śabdasyātātparyāt pramāṇāntareṇa yādṛśamasya rūpaṃ vyavasthāpyate na tacchabdena virudhyate ;
GSP33vacbhamu:1560: 'yato vā imāni bhūtāni' iti tu vākyaṃ pūrvamudāhṛtaṃ jagadutpattisthitināśakāraṇamiti ceha smāritamiti na paṭhitam /
GSP33vacbhamu:1561: yena hi vākyamupakramyate yena copasaṃhriyate sa eva vākyārtha iti śābdāḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:1565: iti ca jīvasya brahmātmanopasaṃhārāt tatparataiva vākyasya /
