GSP33vacbhamu:1567: na ca tatparatvasya dṛṣṭasya sati saṃbhave 'nyaparatā adṛṣṭā yuktā kalpayitum, atiprasaṅgāt
GSP33vacbhamu:1568: na kevalaṃ kartṛparatā teṣāmadṛṣṭā, anupapannā cetyāha- na ca teṣām.iti
GSP33vacbhamu:1569: sāpekṣatvenāprāmāṇyaṃ pūrvapakṣabījaṃ smārayitvā dūṣayati- na ca pariniṣṭhitavastusvarūpatve 'pi.iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1570: ayamabhisaṃdhiḥ- puṃvākyanidarśanena hi bhūtārthatayā vedāntānāṃ sāpekṣatvamāśaṅkyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:1572: kiṃ puṃvākyānāṃ sāpekṣatā bhūtārthatvena, āho pauruṣeyatvena ? yadi bhūtārthatvena tataḥ pratyakṣādīnāmapi parasparāpekṣatvenāprāmāṇyaprasaṅgaḥ ; tānyapi hi bhūtārthānyeva /
GSP33vacbhamu:1573: atha puruṣabuddhipurvakatayā puṃvākyaṃ sāpekṣam, evaṃ tarhi atatpūrvakāṇāṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:1575: yadyucyeta- siddhe kilāpauruṣeyatve vedāntānāmanapekṣatayā prāmāṇyaṃ sidhyet ; tadeva tu bhūtārthatvena na sidhyati ; bhūtārthasya śabdānapekṣeṇa puruṣeṇa mānāntarataḥ śakyajñānatvādbuddhipūrvaṃ viracanopapatteḥ ; vākyatvādiliṅgakasya vedapauruṣeyatvānumānasyāpratyūhamutpatteḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1576: tasmātpauruṣeyatvena sāpekṣatvaṃ durvāram, na tu bhūtārthatvena /
GSP33vacbhamu:1577: kāryārthatve tu kāryasyāpūrvasya mānāntarāgocaratayā atyantānanubhūtapūrvasya tattvena samāropeṇa vā puruṣabuddhāvasamārohāt tadarthānāṃ vedāntānāmaśakyaracanatayā pauruṣeyatvābhāvādanapekṣaṃ pramāṇatvaṃ sidhyatīti prāmāṇyāya vedāntānāmapi kāryaparatvamātiṣṭhāmahe /
GSP33vacbhamu:1578: atra brūmaḥ- kiṃ punaridaṃ kāryamabhimatamāyuṣmataḥ yadaśakyaṃ puruṣeṇa jñātum ? apūrvamiti cet, hanta kutastyamasya liṅādyarthatvam ?
GSP33vacbhamu:1581: 'svargakāmo yajeta' iti sādhyasvargaviśiṣṭo niyojyo 'vagamyate ; sa ca tadeva kāryamavagacchati yatsvargānukūlam /
GSP33vacbhamu:1582: na ca kriyā kṣaṇabhaṅgurā āmuṣmikāya svargāya kalpata iti pāriśeṣyādvedata evāpūrve kārye liṅādīnāṃ saṃbandhagraha iti cet, hanta caityavandanādivākyeṣvapi svargakāmādipadasaṃbandhādapūrvakāryatvaprasaṅgaḥ ; tathā ca teṣāmapyaśakyaracanatvenāpauruṣeyatvāpātaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1583: spaṣṭadṛṣṭena pauruṣeyatvena vā teṣāmapūrvārthatvapratiṣedhe vākyatvādinā liṅgena vedāntānāmapi pauruṣeyatvamanumitamityapūrvārthatā na syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:1586: tenāpauruṣeyatve siddhe bhūtārthānāmapi vedāntānāṃ na sāpekṣatayā prāmāṇyavighātaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1587: na cānadhigatagantṛtā nāsti yena prāmāṇyaṃ na syāt, jīvasya brahmatāyā anyato 'nadhigamāt
GSP33vacbhamu:1592: iha tu 'tattvamasi' ityavagatiparyantādvākyārthajñānāt bāhyānuṣṭhānāyāsānapekṣātsākṣādeva puruṣārthapratilambhaḥ, 'nāyaṃ sarpo
GSP33vacbhamu:1595: etaduktaṃ bhavati- dvividhaṃ hīpsitaṃ puruṣasya ; kiñcidaprāptam, yathā grāmādi ; kiñcitpunaḥ prāptamapi bhramavaśādaprāptamityavagatam, yathā svagrīvāvanaddhaṃ graiveyakam /
GSP33vacbhamu:1596: evaṃ jihāsitamapi dvividham ; kiñcidahīnaṃ jīhāsati, yathā valayitacaraṇaṃ phaṇinam ; kiñcitpunarhīnameva jihāsati, yathā caraṇābharaṇe nūpure
GSP33vacbhamu:1598: tatrāprāptaprāptau cātyaktatyāge ca bāhyopāyānuṣṭhānasādhyatvāt tadupāyatattvajñānādasti parācīnānuṣṭhānāpekṣā
GSP33vacbhamu:1600: na hi sahasramapi rajjupratyayā vastusantaṃ phaṇinamanyathayitumīśate /
GSP33vacbhamu:1601: samāropite tu prepsitajihāsite tattvasākṣātkāramātreṇa bāhyānuṣṭhānānapekṣeṇaiva śakyete prāptumiva hātumiva /
GSP33vacbhamu:1602: samāropamātrajīvite hi te ; samāropitaṃ ca tattvasakṣātkāraḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:1604: tathehāpyavidyāsamāropitajīvabhāve brahmaṇyānande vastutaḥ śokaduḥkhādirahite samāropitanibandhanastadbhāvaḥ 'tattvamasi' iti vākyārthatattvajñānādavagatiparyantānnivartate /
GSP33vacbhamu:1605: tannivṛttau prāptamapyānandarūpamaprāptamiva prāptaṃ bhavati ; tyaktamapi śokaduḥkhādyatyaktamiva tyaktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:1606: tadidamuktam - brahmātmāvagamādeva.jīvasya sarvakleśasya savāsanasya viparyāsasya- sa hi kliśnāti jantūnataḥ kleśaḥ- tasya prakarṣeṇa hānāt puruṣārthasya,.duḥkhanivṛttisukhāptilakṣaṇasya siddheḥ.iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1610: yadi na virodhaḥ, santu tarhi vedāntā
GSP33vacbhamu:1611: devatāpratipādanadvāreṇopāsanāvidhiparā evetyata āha- na tu tathā
GSP33vacbhamu:1613: upāsyopāsakopāsanādibhedasiddhyadhīnopāsanā na nirastasamastabhedaprapañce vedāntavedye brahmaṇi saṃbhavatīti nopāsanāvidhiśeṣatvaṃ vedāntānāṃ tadvirodhitvāt ityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1615: yadi vidhivirahe 'pi vedāntānāṃ prāmāṇyam, hanta tarhi 'so 'rodīt'
GSP33vacbhamu:1616: ityādīnāmapyastu svatantrāṇāmevopekṣaṇīyārthānāṃ prāmāṇyam ; na hi hānopādānabuddhī eva prāmaṇasya phale, upekṣābuddherapi tatphalatvena prāmāṇikairabhyupetatvāt ; iti kṛtam 'barhiṣi rajataṃ na deyam'
GSP33vacbhamu:1618: svādhyāyavidhyadhīnagrahaṇatayā hi sarvo vedarāśiḥ puruṣārthatantra ityavagatam /
GSP33vacbhamu:1619: tatraikenāpi varṇena nāpuruṣārthena bhavituṃ yuktam ; kiṃ punariyatā 'so
GSP33vacbhamu:1621: na ca vedāntebhya iva tadarthāvagamamātrādeva kaścitpuruṣārtha upalabhyate
GSP33vacbhamu:1623: 'barhiṣi rajataṃ na deyam' ityayamapi niṣedhavidhiḥ svaniṣedhyasya
GSP33vacbhamu:1624: nindāmapekṣate ; na hyanyathā tataścetanaḥ śakyo nivartayitum /
GSP33vacbhamu:1625: tadyadi dūrato 'pi na nindāmavāpsyattato niṣedhavidhireva rajataniṣedhe ca nindāyāṃ ca darvihenatasvasya sāmarthyadvayamakalpayiṣyat /
GSP33vacbhamu:1626: tadevamuttaptayoḥ 'so 'rodīt' iti ca 'barhiṣi rajataṃ na deyam' iti ca padasaṃdarbhayorlakṣyamāṇanindādvāreṇa naṣṭāśvadagdharathavat parasparaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:1630: nanu vidhyasaṃsparśino vedasyānyasya na prāmāṇyaṃ dṛṣṭamiti kathaṃ vedāntānāṃ tadaspṛśāṃ tadbhaviṣyatītyata āha- na cānumānagamyaṃ.iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1633: yadyapi caiṣāmīdṛgbodhajanakatvaṃ kāryārthāpattisamadhigamyam, tathāpi tadbodhopajanane mānāntaraṃ nāpekṣante nāpīmāmevārthāpattim,
GSP33vacbhamu:1635: īdṛgbodhajanakatvaṃ ca kārye iva vidhīnām, vedāntānāmapi brahmaṇyastīti dṛṣṭāntānapekṣaṃ teṣāṃ brahmaṇi prāmāṇyaṃ siddhaṃ bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:1636: anyathā nendriyāntarāṇāṃ rūpaprakāśanaṃ dṛṣṭamiti cakṣurapi na rūpaṃ prakāśayediti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1644: yatra hi śabdā lokena na prayujyante na tatra teṣāṃ saṃgatigrahaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1648: tasmāt pratipitsitaṃ pratipipādayiṣannayaṃ lokaḥ pravṛttinivṛttihetubhūtamevārthaṃ pratipādayet, kāryaṃ cāvagate taddheturiti tadeva bodhayet /
GSP33vacbhamu:1652: api ca narāntarasya vyutpannasyārthapratyayamanumāya tasya ca padaśabdabhāvābhāvānuvidhānamavagamyaya śabdasya tadviṣayabodhakatvaṃ niścetavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:1654: kāryapratyaye tu narāntaravartini pravṛttinivṛttī sto hetū ityajñātasaṃgatitvānna brahmarūpaparā vedāntāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1663: na ca 'rajjuriyaṃ na bhujaṅgaḥ' iti yathākathañcillakṣaṇayā vākyārthatattvaniścayādyathā bhayakampādinivṛttiḥ, evam 'tattvamasi' iti vākyārthāvagamānnivṛttirbhavati sāṃsārikāṇāṃ dharmāṇām.
GSP33vacbhamu:1665: api ca yadi śrutabrahmaṇo bhavati sāṃsārikadharmanivṛttiḥ kasmāt punaḥ śravaṇasyopari mananādayaḥ śrūyante ? tasmātteṣāṃ vaiyarthyaprasaṅgādapi na brahmasvarūpaparā vedāntāḥ, kiṃ tvātmapratipattiviṣayakāryaparāḥ tacca kāryaṃ svātmani niyojyaṃ niyuñjānaṃ niyoga iti ca mānāntarāpūrvatayāpūrvamiti cākhyāyate
GSP33vacbhamu:1666: na ca viṣayānuṣṭhānaṃ vinā tatsiddhiriti svasiddhyarthaṃ tadeva kāryaṃ svaviṣayasya karaṇasyātmajñānasyānuṣṭhānamākṣipati
GSP33vacbhamu:1667: yathā ca kāryaṃ svaviṣayādhīnanirūpaṇamiti jñānena viṣeyeṇa nirūpyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:1668: evaṃ jñānamapi svaviṣayamātmānamantareṇāśakyanirūpaṇamiti tannirūpaṇāya tādṛśamātmānamākṣipati tadeva kāryam /
GSP33vacbhamu:1669: yathāhuḥ- 'yattu tatsiddhyarthamupādīyate ākṣipyate tadapi vidheyamiti tantre vyavahāraḥ' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1672: āropitatadbhāvasya tvanyasya nirūpakatve tena tannirūpitaṃ na syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:1677: 'yūpe paśuṃ badhnāti' iti bandhanāya viniyukte yūpe, tasyālaukikatvātko
GSP33vacbhamu:1679: 'yūpamaṣṭāśrīkaroti' ityādibhirvākyaistakṣaṇādividhipapairapi saṃskārāviṣṭaṃ viśiṣṭasaṃsthānaṃ dāru yūpa iti gamyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:1681: pravṛttinivṛttiparasya śāstratvaṃ na svarūpaparasya, kārya eva ca
GSP33vacbhamu:1682: saṃbandho na svarūpo, iti hetudvayaṃ bhāṣyavākyenopapāditam- pravṛttinivṛttiprayojanatvāt.ityādinā tatsāmānyādvedāntānāmapi tathaivārthavattvaṃ syāt.ityantena
GSP33vacbhamu:1683: na ca svatantraṃ kāryaṃ niyojyamadhikāriṇamanuṣṭhātāramantareṇeti niyojyabhedamāha- sati ca vidhiparatve. iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1684: 'brahma veda brahmaiva bhavati' iti siddhavadarthavādādavagatasyāpi brahmabhavanasya niyojyaviśeṣākāṅkṣāyāṃ brahma bubhūṣorniyojyaviśeṣasya rātrisatranyāyena pratilambhaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1685: piṇḍaputṛyajñānyāyena tu svargakāmasya niyojyasya kalpanāyāmarthavādasyāsamavetārthatayātyantaparokṣā vṛttiḥ syāditi /
GSP33vacbhamu:1687: amṛtatvaṃ ca amṛtatvādeva na kṛtakatvena śakyamanityamanumātum,
GSP33vacbhamu:1692: taddhi dṛśerupalabdhivacanatvāt śrāvaṇaṃ vā syāt pratyakṣaṃ vā /
GSP33vacbhamu:1694: tatra śrāvaṇaṃ na vidheyam, svādhyāyavidhinaivāsya prāpitatvāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:1702: arthavattyā mananādipratītyā cetyasya śeṣaḥ prapañco vidajavyākhyātaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1708: tacca sarvaṃ kāryaṃ ca vināśi ca /
GSP33vacbhamu:1711: etaduktaṃ bhavati- tvayāpyupāsanāvidhiparatvaṃ vedāntānāmabhyupagacchatā nityaśuddhabuddhatvādirūpabrahmātmatā jīvasya svābhāvikī
GSP33vacbhamu:1718: gāndharvaśāstrārthepāsanāvāsanāyā ivāpūrvānapekṣāyāḥ ṣaṭjādisākṣātkāre vedāntārthopāsanāvāsanāyā jīvasya brahmabhāvasākṣātkāre 'napekṣāyā eva sāmarthyāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:1721: na ca tatkāmaḥ kriyāmeva kāryamavagamiṣyati nāpūrvamiti sāṃpratam ; tasyā mānāntarādeva tatsādhanatvapratītervidhervaiyarthyāt
GSP33vacbhamu:1723: na ca brahmabhūyādanyadamṛtatvamārthavādikaṃ kiñcidasti, yena tatkāma upāsanāyāmadhikriyeta
GSP33vacbhamu:1724: viśvajinnyāyena tu svargakalpanāyāṃ tasya sātiśayatvaṃ kṣayiṣṇutvaṃ ceti na nityaphalatvamupāsanāyāḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:1725: tasmādbrahmabhūyasyāvidyāpidhānāpanayamātreṇāvirbhāvāt, avidyāpanayasya ca vedāntārthavijñānādavagatiparyantādeva saṃbhavāt, upāsanāyāḥ saṃskārahetubhāvasya saṃskārasya ca sākṣātkāropajanane manaḥsācivyasya ca
GSP33vacbhamu:1726: mānāntarasiddhatvāt. 'ātmetyevopāsīta' iti na vidhiḥ ; api tu vidhisarūpo
GSP33vacbhamu:1727: 'yam ; yathopāṃśuyājavākye 'viṣṇurupāṃśu yaṣṭavyaḥ' ityādayo vidhisarūpā na vidhayaḥ-iti tātparyārthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1729: tatra śrutiṃ darśayati- tathā ca śrutiḥ.iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1731: yatkila svābhāvikaṃ tannityam, yathā caitanyam ; svābhāvikaṃ cedam ;
GSP33vacbhamu:1733: pare hi dvayīṃ nityatāmāhuḥ-kūṭasthanityatā pariṇāminityatāṃ ca /
GSP33vacbhamu:1734: tatra nityamityukte mā bhūdasya pariṇāminityatetyāha- tatra kiñcit.iti
GSP33vacbhamu:1736: tathā hi-tatsarvātmanā vā pariṇamate ekadeśena vā ? sarvātmanā pariṇāme kathaṃ na tattvavyāhṛtiḥ ? ekadeśapariṇāme vā sa ekadeśastato bhinno vā
GSP33vacbhamu:1737: abhinno vā ? bhinnaścet kathaṃ tasya pariṇāmaḥ ? na hyanyasmin pariṇamamāne 'nyaḥ pariṇamati, atiprasaṅgāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:1738: abhede vā kathaṃ na sarvātmanā pariṇāmaḥ ?
GSP33vacbhamu:1739: bhinnābhinnaṃ taditi cet ; tathā hi-tadeva kāraṇātmanābhinnam, bhinnaṃ ca kāryātmanā, kaṭakādaya ivābhinnā hāṭakātmanā bhinnāśca kaṭakādyātmanā /
GSP33vacbhamu:1740: na ca bhedābhedayorvirodhānnaikatra samavāya iti yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:1741: viruddhamiti naḥ kva saṃpratyayaḥ ? yatpramāṇaviparyayeṇa vartate /
GSP33vacbhamu:1742: yattu yathā pramāṇenāvagamyate tasya tathābhāva eva /
GSP33vacbhamu:1743: 'kuṇḍalamidaṃ suvarṇam' iti sāmānādhikaraṇyapratyaye vyaktaṃ bhedābhedau cakāstaḥ ; tathā hi-ātyantike 'bhede 'nyatarasya dviravabhāsaprasaṅgaḥ ;
GSP33vacbhamu:1744: bhede cātyantike na sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ gavāśvavat ; ādhārādheyabhāve ekāśrayatve vā na sāmānādhikaraṇyam ; na hi bhavati kuṇḍaṃ badaramiti ;
GSP33vacbhamu:1748: kāraṇātmatvāt kāraṇasya ca sadrūpasya sarvatrānugamāt, sadrūpeṇābhedaḥ kāryasya jagataḥ ; bhedaḥ kāryarūpeṇa goghaṭādineti ; yathāhuḥkāryarūpeṇa nānātvamabhedaḥ kāraṇātmanā /
GSP33vacbhamu:1751: atrocyate-kaḥ punarayaṃ bhedo nāma, yaḥ sahābhedenaikatra bhavet ?
GSP33vacbhamu:1752: parasparābhāva iti cet, kimayaṃ kāryakāraṇayoḥ kaṭakahāṭakayorasti na vā ?
GSP33vacbhamu:1753: na cet, ekatvamevāsti, na ca bhedaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1758: api ca kaṭakasya hāṭakādabhede yathā hāṭakātmanā kaṭakamukuṭakuṇḍalādayo na bhidyante evaṃ kaṭakātmanāpi na bhidyeran, kaṭakasya hāṭakādabhedāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:1759: tathā ca hāṭakameva vastusat na kaṭakādayaḥ, bhedasyāpratibhāsanāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:1760: atha hāṭakatvenaivābhedo na kaṭakatvena ; tena tu bheda eva kuṇḍalādeḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1761: yadi hāṭakādabhinnaḥ kaṭakaḥ kathamayaṃ kuṇḍalādiṣu nānuvartate ?
GSP33vacbhamu:1762: nānuvartate cet kathaṃ hāṭakādabhinnaḥ kaṭakaḥ ? ye hi yasminnanuvartamāne
GSP33vacbhamu:1763: vyāvartante te tato bhinnā eva, yathā sūtrātkusumabhedāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1766: sattānuvṛttyā ca sarvavastvanugame 'idamiha nedam, idamevaṃ nedam' iti vibhāgo na syāt, kasyacit kvacit kadācit kathañcidvivekahetorabhāvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:1767: api ca dūrātkanakamityavagate na tasya kuṇḍalādayo viśeṣā jijñāsyeran,
GSP33vacbhamu:1770: nanvabhedo 'pyastīti kiṃ na jñātāḥ ? pratyuta jñānameva teṣāṃ yuktam ;
GSP33vacbhamu:1771: kāraṇābhāve hi kāryabhāva autsargikaḥ ; sa ca kāraṇasattayā apodyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:1772: asti cābhede kāraṇasatteti kanake jñāte jñātā eva kuṇḍalādaya iti tajjijñāsājñānāni cānarthakāni syuḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1773: tena yasmin gṛhyamāṇe yanna gṛhyate tattato bhidyate ; yathā karabhe gṛhyamāṇe 'gṛhyamāṇe rāsabhaḥ karabhāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:1774: gṛhyamāṇe ca dūrato hemni na gṛhyante tasya bhedāḥ kuṇḍalādayaḥ ; tasmātte hemno bhidyante
GSP33vacbhamu:1775: kathaṃ tarhi hema kuṇḍalamiti sāmānādhikaraṇyam iti cet, na hyādhārādheyabhāve samānāśrayatve vā vā sāmānādhikaraṇyamityuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:1776: athānuvṛttivyāvṛttivyavasthā ca hemni jñāte kuṇḍalādijijñāsā ca katham ?
GSP33vacbhamu:1778: tasmādbhedābhedayoranyatarasminnavaheye 'bhedo pādānaiva bhedakalpanā, na bhedopādānābhedakalpaneti yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:1779: bhidyamānatantratvādbhedasya, bhidyamānānāṃ ca pratyekamekatvāt, ekābhāve cānāśrayasya bhedasyāyogāt, ekatvasya ca bhedānadhīnatvāt, nāyamayaṃ iti ca bhedagrahasya pratiyogigrahasāpekṣatvāt, ekatvagrahasya
GSP33vacbhamu:1782: tasmāt kūṭasthanityataiva pāramārthikī. na pariṇāminityateti siddham /
GSP33vacbhamu:1783: vyomavat.iti ca dṛṣṭāntaḥ parasiddhaḥ, asmanmate tasyāpi kāryatvenānityatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:1788: vrīhīṇāṃ khalu prokṣaṇena saṃskārākhyoṃ'śo yathā janyate, naivaṃ brahmaṇi kaścidaṃśaḥ kriyādheyo 'sti, anavayavatvāt ; anaṃśatvādityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1792: sukhaṃ cāpratīyamānaṃ na puruṣārtha ityata āha-
GSP33vacbhamu:1794: tadevaṃ svamatena mokṣākhyaṃ phalaṃ nityaṃ śrutyādibhirupapādya kriyāniṣpādyasya tu mokṣasyānityatvaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:1797: api ca jñānajanyāpūrvajanito mokṣo naiyogika ityasyārthasya santi bhūyasyaḥ śrutayo nivārikā ityāha- api ca brahma veda.iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1798: avidyādvayapratibandhāpanayamātreṇa ca vidyāyā mokṣasādhanatvam, na svato 'pūrvotpādena vā ityatrāpi śrutirudāharati- tvaṃ hi naḥ pitā.iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1799: na kevalamasminnarthe śrutyādayaḥ, api tvakṣapādācāryasūtramapi nyāyamūlamastītyāha- tathā cācāryapraṇītam.iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1807: pāṭhāpekṣayā kāraṇamuttaram, kāryaṃ ca pūrvam ; kāraṇāpāye kāryāpāyaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:1809: janmāpāye daḥkhāpāyaḥ ; pravṛttyapāye janmāpāyaḥ ; doṣāpāye pravṛttyapāyaḥ ; mithyājñānāpāye doṣāpāyaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1810: mithyājñānaṃ cāvidyā rāgādyupajananakrameṇa dṛṣṭenaiva saṃsārasya paramaṃ nidānam /
GSP33vacbhamu:1812: tato 'vidyānivṛttyā brahmasvarūpāvirbhāvo mokṣaḥ ; na tu vidyākāryastajjanitāpūrvakāryo vā- iti sūtrārthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1813: tattvajñānānmithyājñānāpāya ityetāvanmātreṇa sūtropanyāsaḥ ; na tvakṣapādasaṃmataṃ tattvajñānamiha saṃmatam /
GSP33vacbhamu:1816: naikatvavijñānaṃ yathāvasthitavastuviṣayam, yena mithyājñānaṃ bhedāvabhāsaṃ nivartayanna vidhiviṣayo bhavet ; api tu saṃpadādirūpam /
GSP33vacbhamu:1817: tathā ca vidheḥ prāgaprāptaṃ puruṣecchayā kartavyaṃ sat vidhigocaro bhaviṣyati; yathā vṛttyantaratvena manaso viśvedevasāmyādviśvāndevānmanasi saṃpādya mana ālambanamavidyamānasamaṃ kṛtvā prādhānyena saṃpādyānāṃ viśveṣāmeva devānāmanucintanam, tena cānantalokaprāptiḥ ; evaṃ cidrūpasāmyājjīve brahmasvarūpaṃ saṃpādya jīvamālambanamavidyamānasamaṃ kṛtvā prādhānyena brahmānucintanam, tena cāmṛtatvaphalaprāptiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1821: bāhyā khalu vāyudevatā saṃvargaḥ ; bāhyā khalu vāyudevatā saṃvargaḥ ; sa hi vahnyādīn saṃvṛṅkte ; mahāpralayasamaye hi vāyurvahnyādīnsaṃvṛtya
GSP33vacbhamu:1823: yathāha draviḍācāryaḥ- 'saṃharaṇādvā saṃvaraṇādvā svātmībhāvādvāyuḥ saṃvargaḥ' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1824: adhyātmaṃ ca prāṇaḥ saṃvarga iti ; sa hi sarvāṇi vāgādīni saṃvṛṅkte ;
GSP33vacbhamu:1825: prāyaṇakāle hi sa eva sarvāṇīndriyāṇi saṃgṛhyotkrāmatīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1826: seyaṃ saṃvargadṛṣṭirvāyau prāṇe ca daśāśāgataṃ jagaddarśayati yathā, evaṃ jīvātmani bṛṃhaṇakriyayā brahmadṛṣṭismṛtatvāya phalāya kalpata iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1828: apūrvaviṣayatvāt, stutaśastravat; ātmā tu dravyaṃ karmaṇi guṇa iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1832: avekṣaṇaṃ guṇakarma vidhīyate, evaṃ kartṛtvena kratvaṅgabhūte ātmani 'ātmā
GSP33vacbhamu:1833: vā are draṣṭavyaḥ' iti darśanaṃ guṇakarma vidhīyate, 'yaistu dravyaṃ cikīrṣyate guṇastatra pratīyeta' iti nyāyāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:1836: darśapūrṇamāsaprakaraṇe hi samāmnātamājyāvekṣaṇaṃ tadaṅgabhūtājyasaṃskāra iti yujyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:1837: na ca 'ātmā vā are draṣṭavyaḥ' ityādi kasyacitprakaraṇe samāmnātam /
GSP33vacbhamu:1839: ityavyabhicaritakratusaṃbandhajuhūdvāreṇa juhūpadaṃ kratuṃ smārayadvākyena yathā parṇatāyāḥ

GSP33vacbhamu:2112: na hyupahitaṃ śataśo dṛṣṭamapyanupahitaṃ kvaciddṛṣṭamadṛṣṭaṃ bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:2113: tathā ca vartamānāpadeśā astikriyopahitā akāryārthā apyaṭavīvarṇakādayo loke bahulamupalabhyante
GSP33vacbhamu:2118: na hi pṛcchatā puruṣasya vā tarūṇāṃ vāstitvanāstitve pratipitsite ; kiṃ tu puruṣasya svāmibhedastarūṇāṃ ca prakārabhedaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:2119: praṣṭurapekṣitaṃ cācakṣāṇaḥ svāmibhedameva prakārabhedameva ca prativyakti, na punarastitvam, tasya tenāpratipitsitatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:2120: upapāditā ca bhūte 'pyarthe vyutpattiḥ prayojanavati padānām /
GSP33vacbhamu:2121: codayati- yadi nāmopadiṣṭaṃ.bhūtaṅ kiṃ tava,.upadeṣṭuḥ śroturvā prayojanaṃ syāt.? tasmādbhūtamapi prayojanavadevopadeṣṭavyaṃ nāprayojanam ; aprayojanaṃ ca brahma, tasyodāsīnasya sarvakriyārahitatvenānupakārakatvāt iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:2124: etaduktaṃ bhavati-yadyapi brahmodāsīnam, tathāpi tadviṣayaṃ śābdajñānamavagatiparyantaṃ vidyā svavirodhinīṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:2126: api ca ye 'pi kāryaparatvaṃ sarveṣāṃ padānāmāsthiṣata, tairapi 'brāhmaṇo
GSP33vacbhamu:2127: na hantavyaḥ', 'na surā pātavyā' ityādīnāṃ na kāryaparatā śakyā āsthātum /
GSP33vacbhamu:2128: kṛtyupahitamaryādaṃ hi kāryaṃ kṛtyā vyāptaṃ tannivṛttau nivartate,
GSP33vacbhamu:2131: viṣayaścāsya sādhyasvabhāvatayā bhāvārtha eva pūrvāparībhūto 'nyotpādānukūlo bhavitumarhati, na dravyaguṇau /
GSP33vacbhamu:2132: sākṣātkṛtivyāpyo hi kṛterviṣayaḥ ; na ca dravyaguṇayoḥ siddhayorasti kṛtivyāpyatā /
GSP33vacbhamu:2133: ata eva śāstrakṛdvacaḥ- 'bhāvārthāḥ karmaśabdāstebhyaḥ kriyā pratīyeta' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:2135: dravyaguṇaśabdānāṃ naimittikāvasthāyāṃ kāryāvamarśe 'pi, bhāvasya svataḥ dravyaguṇaśabdānāṃ tu bhāvayogātkāryāvamarśa iti bhāvārthebhya evāpūrvāvagatiḥ, na dravyaguṇaśabdebhya iti na ca 'dadhnā juhoti', 'saṃtatamāghārayati' ityādiṣu dadhyādīnāṃ kāryaviṣayatā ; tatrāpi hi homaghārabhāvārthaviṣayameva kāryam /
GSP33vacbhamu:2139: yadyapyatrāpi bhāvārthaviṣayameva kāryam, tathāpi bhāvārthānubandhatayā dravyaguṇāvaviṣayāvapi vidhīyete /
GSP33vacbhamu:2140: bhāvārtho hi kārakavyāpāramātratayāviśiṣṭaḥ kārakaviśeṣeṇa dravyādinā viśeṣyata iti dravyādistadanubandhaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:2141: tathā ca bhāvārthe vidhīyamāne sa eva sānubandho vidhīyata iti dravyaguṇāvaviṣayāvapi tadanubandhatayā vihitau bhavataḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:2142: evaṃ ca bhāvārthapraṇālikayā dravyādisaṃkrānto vidhirgauravādbibhyatsvaviṣayasya cānyataḥ prāptatayā tadanuvādena tadanubandhībhūtadravyādiparo bhavatīti sarvatra bhāvārthaviṣaya eva vidhiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:2145: nanu na bhavatyartho vidheyaḥ ; siddhe bhavitari labdharūpasya bhavanaṃ pratyakartṛtvāt ; na khalu gaganaṃ bhavati ; nāpyasiddhe,
GSP33vacbhamu:2146: asiddhasyāniyojyatvāt, gaganakusumavat ; tasmādbhavanena prayojyavyāpāreṇākṣiptaḥ prayojakasya bhāvayiturvyāpāro vidheyaḥ ; sa ca vyāpāro bhāvanā, kṛtiḥ, prayatna iti ; nirviṣayaścāsāvaśakyapratipattiḥ ato viṣayāpekṣāyāmāgneyaśabdopasthāpito dravyadevatāsaṃbandha evāsya viṣayaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:2147: nanu vyāpāraviṣayaḥ puruṣaprayatnaḥ kathamavyāpārarūpaṃ saṃbandhaṃ gocarayet ? na hi 'ghaṭaṃ kuru' ityatrāpi sākṣānnāmārthaṃ ghaṭaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:2148: puruṣaprayatno gocarayati ; api tu daṇḍādi hastādinā vyāpārayati /
GSP33vacbhamu:2149: tasmādghaṭārthāṃ kṛtiṃ vyāpāraviṣayāmeva pratipadyate, na tu svarūpato
GSP33vacbhamu:2151: uddeśyatayā tvasyāmasti ghaṭo na tu viṣayatayā /
GSP33vacbhamu:2155: kimuktaṃ bhavati”āgneyo bhavati”iti ? āgneyena yāgena bhāvayediti /
GSP33vacbhamu:2156: ata eva 'ya evaṃ vidvān paurṇamāsyāṃ yajate', 'ya evaṃ vidvānamāvāsyāṃ yajate' ityanuvādo bhavati 'yadāgneyaḥ' ityādivihitasya yāgaṣaṭkasya /
GSP33vacbhamu:2157: ata eva ca vihitānūditasya tasyaiva 'darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ svargakāmo
GSP33vacbhamu:2160: tathā ca 'na hanyāt', 'na pibet' ityādiṣu yadi kāryamabhyupeyeta,
GSP33vacbhamu:2162: evaṃ ca prajāpativratanyāyena paryudāsavṛttyāhananāpānasaṃkalpalakṣaṇayā tadviṣayo vidhiḥ syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:2164: na ca sati saṃbhave lakṣaṇā nyāyyā /
GSP33vacbhamu:2167: tasmāt 'na hanyāt', 'na pibet' ityādiṣu prasajyapratiṣedheṣu bhāvārthābhāvāttadvyāptāyāḥ kṛterabhāvaḥ ; tadabhāve ca tadvyāptasya
GSP33vacbhamu:2168: kāryasyābhāva iti na kāryaparatvaniyamaḥ sarvatra vākye ityāha- brahmaṇo na hantavya ityevamādyā.iti
GSP33vacbhamu:2169: nanu kasmānnivṛttireva kāryaṃ na bhavati, tatsādhanaṃ vetyata āha- na ca sā kriyā.iti
GSP33vacbhamu:2173: vidhivibhaktiśravaṇātkāryaṃ tāvadatra pratīyate ; tacca na bhāvārthamantareṇa ; na ca rāgataḥ pravṛttasya hananapānādāvakasmādaudāsīnyamupapadyate vinā vidhārakaprayatnam ;
GSP33vacbhamu:2174: tasmātsa eva pravṛttyunmukhānāṃ manovāgdehānāṃ vidhārakaḥ prayatno niṣedhavidhigocaraḥ kriyeti nākriyāparamasti vākyaṃ kiñcidapīti āha- na ca hananakriyānivṛttyaudāsīnyavyatirekeṇa nañaḥ śakyamaprāptakriyārthatvaṃ kalpayitum. /
GSP33vacbhamu:2175: kena hetunā na śakyamityata āha- svabhāvaprāptahantyarthānurāgeṇa.nañaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:2176: ayamarthaḥ- hananapānaparo hi vidhipratyayaḥ pratīyamānaste eva vidhatte
GSP33vacbhamu:2178: na caite śakye vidhātum, rāgataḥ prāptatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:2179: na cātra nañaḥ prasajyapratiṣedho vidheyaḥ. tasyāpyaudāsīnyarūpasya siddhatayā prāptatvāt
GSP33vacbhamu:2180: na ca vidhārakaḥ prayatnaḥ, tasyāśrutatvena lakṣyamāṇatvāt, sati saṃbhave ca lakṣaṇāyā anyāyyatvāt, vidhivibhakteśca rāgataḥ prāptapravṛttyanuvādakatvena vidhiviṣayatvāyogāt tasmādyatpibeddhanyādvetyanūdya tanneti niṣidhyate, tadabhāvo jñāpyate ;
GSP33vacbhamu:2183: siddhavat, sādhye ca sādhyavadbhāsata iti sādhyaviṣayo nañarthaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:2184: sādhyavadbhāsata iti nañarthaḥ kārya iti bhramaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:2186: nanu bodhayatu svasaṃbandhino 'bhāvaṃ nañ ; pravṛttyunmukhānāṃ tu manovāgdehānāṃ kuto 'kasmānnivṛttirityata āha- abhāvabuddhiścaudāsīnya.paripālana kāraṇam. /
GSP33vacbhamu:2188: ityādivacanaśravaṇasamanantaraṃ prayojyavṛddhasya pathyāśane pravṛttiṃ bhujaṅgāṅgulidānonmukhasya ca tato nivṛttimupalabhya bālo vyutpitsuḥ prayojyavṛddhasya pravṛttinivṛttihetū icchādveṣāvanumimīte tathā hi- icchādveṣahetuke vṛddhasya pravṛttinivṛttī,
GSP33vacbhamu:2195: ; api tu bhūyo bhūyaḥ svagatamālocayata uktakāraṇapūrvāveva
GSP33vacbhamu:2197: tasmādvṛddhasya svatantrapravṛttinivṛttī icchādveṣabhedau ca kartavyataikārthasamaveteṣṭāniṣṭasādhanabhāvāvagamapūrvāvityānupūrvyā siddhaḥ kāryakāraṇābhāva itīṣṭāniṣṭasādhanatāvagamātprayojyavṛddhapravṛttinivṛttī iti siddham sa cāvagamaḥ prāgabhūtaḥ śabdaśravaṇānantaramupajāyamānaḥ śabdaśravaṇahetuka iti pravartakeṣu vākyeṣu 'yajeta' ityādiṣu śabda eva
GSP33vacbhamu:2198: kartavyamiṣṭasādhanaṃ vyāpāramavagamayaṃstasyeṣṭasādhanatāṃ kartavyatāṃ cāvagamayati ; ananyalabhyatvādubhayoḥ, anantyalabhyasya ca śabdārthatvāt
GSP33vacbhamu:2199: yatra tu kartavyatānyata eva labhyate, yathā 'hanyāt', 'na pibet'
GSP33vacbhamu:2200: ityādiṣu, hananapānapravṛttyo rāgataḥ pratilambhāt, tatra tadanuvādena nañsamabhivyāhṛtā liṅādivibhaktiranyato 'prāptamanayoranarthahetubhāvamātramavagamayati /
GSP33vacbhamu:2203: hanyāt', 'na pibet' ityādivākyam, na tu kartavyatāparamiti
GSP33vacbhamu:2206: tayā khalvayaṃ cetana āpātato ramaṇīyatāṃ paśyannapyāyatimālocya pravṛttyabhāvaṃ nivṛttimavabudhya nivartate /
GSP33vacbhamu:2209: abhāvabuddhiścedaudāsīnyasthāpanākāraṇam, yāvadaudāsīnyamanuvarteta ; na cānuvartate ; na hyudāsīno 'pi viṣayāntaravyāsaktacittastadabhāvabuddhimān
GSP33vacbhamu:2210: ; na cāvasthāpakakāraṇābhāve kāryāvasthānaṃ dṛṣṭam ; na hi stambhāvapāte
GSP33vacbhamu:2218: na ca kavacāpagame ca asati ca śastraprahāre, rājanyajīvanāśa iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:2222: puruṣārthānupayogyupākhyānādiviṣayāvakriyārthatayā kriyārthatayā ca pūrvottarapakṣau ; na tūpaniṣadviṣayau, upaniṣadāṃ svayaṃ puruṣārtharūpabrahmāvagatamaparyanasānādityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:2223: yadapi.aupaniṣadātmajñānamapuruṣārthaṃ manyamānena uktam-kartavyavidhyanupraveśamantareṇa.iti, atra nigūḍhābhisaṃdhiḥ pūrvoktaṃ parihāraṃ smārayati- tatparihṛtam.iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:2226: satyaṃ na brahmajñānamātraṃ sāṃsārikadharmanivṛttikāraṇam, api tu sākṣātkāraparyantam /
GSP33vacbhamu:2232: atraiva sukhaduḥkhānutpādabhedena nidarśanadvayamāha- na hi dhanina.iti
GSP33vacbhamu:2236: yadi vāstavaṃ saśarīratvaṃ bhavet, na jīvatastannivarteta ;
GSP33vacbhamu:2237: mithyājñānanimittaṃ tu tat ; taccotpannatattvajñānena jīvatāpi śakyaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:2239: yatpunaraśarīratvaṃ tadasya svabhāva iti na śakyaṃ nivartayitum,
GSP33vacbhamu:2242: na mithyājñānanimittaṃ saśarīratvam api tu dharmādharmanimittam ; tacca svakāraṇadharmādharmanivṛttimantareṇa na nivartate ; tannivṛttau ca prāyaṇameveti na jīvato 'śarīratvamiti śaṅkate- tatkṛta.iti tat ityātmānaṃ parāmṛśati /
GSP33vacbhamu:2245: vāgbuddhiśarīrārambhajanitau hi tau nāsati śarīrasaṃbandhe bhavataḥ ;
GSP33vacbhamu:2246: tābhyāṃ tu śarīrasaṃbandhaṃ rocayamāno vyaktaṃ parasparāśrayatvaṃ doṣamāvahati ; tadidamāha- śarīrasaṃbandhasya.iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:2247: yadyucyeta satyamasti parasparāśrayatvam, na tveṣa doṣaḥ, anāditvāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:2249: yattu manyate-neyamandhaparamparātulyā anāditā ; na hi yato
GSP33vacbhamu:2250: dharmādharmabhedādya ātmaśarīrasaṃbandhabhedastata eva śarīrasaṃbandhāt sa dharmādharmabhedaḥ ; kiṃ tveṣa pūrvasmādātmaśarīrasaṃbandhātpūrvadharmādharmabhedajanmanaḥ ; eva tvātmaśarīrasaṃbandho 'nyasmāddharmādharmabhedāt -iti, taṃ pratyāha- kriyāsamavāyābhāvāt.iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:2255: ye tu dehādāvātmābhimāno na mithyā, api tu gauṇaḥ, māṇavakādāviva siṃhābhimāna iti manyante, tanmatamupanyasya dūṣayati- atrāhuḥ.iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:2256: prasiddho vastubhedo yasya puruṣasya sa tathoktaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:2258: yathā mandāndhakāre sthāṇurayamityagṛhyamāṇaviśeṣe vastuni puruṣāt sāṃśayikau puruṣaśabdapratyayau sthāṇuviṣayau ; tatra hi puruṣatvamaniyatamapi samāropitameva /
GSP33vacbhamu:2261: śuklabhāsvarasya dravyasya puraḥsthitasya sati śuktikārajatasādhāraṇye yāvadatra rajataviniścayo bhavati tāvatkasmācchuktiviniścaya eva na bhavati ? saṃśayo vā dvedhā yuktaḥ ; samānadharmadharmiṇo darśanāt upalabghyanupalabdhyavyavasthātaḥ ; viśeṣadvayasmṛteśca saṃskāronmeṣahetoḥ sādṛśyasya dviṣṭhatvenobhayatra tulyametaditi /
GSP33vacbhamu:2263: anena dṛṣṭasya hetoḥ samānatve 'pyadṛṣṭaṃ heturuktam ; tacca kāryadarśanonneyatvenāsādhāraṇamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:2268: jīvato viduṣo 'śarīratve ca śrutismṛtī udāharati- tathā ca.iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:2278: atha kasmānmananādividhireva na bhavatītyata āha- yadi hyavagatam.iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:2279: na tāvanmanananididhyāsane pradhānakarmaṇī apūrvaviṣaye amṛtatvaphale ityuktamadhastāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:2284: evaṃ ca siddharūpabrahmaparatve upaniṣadām, brahmaṇaḥ śāstrārthasya dharmādanyatvāt, bhinnaviṣayatvena śāstrabhedāt, 'athāto brahmajijñāsā'
GSP33vacbhamu:2285: ityasya śāstrārambhatvamupapadyata ityāha- evaṃ ca sati.iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:2286: itarathā tu dharmajijñāsaiveti na śāstrāntaramiti na śāstrāntarārambhatvaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:2288: na kevalaṃ siddharūpatvādbrahmātmaikyasya dharmādanyatvam, api tu tadvirodhādapītyupasaṃhāravyājenāha- tasmādahaṃ brahmāsmi.iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:2291: te ca sādhyasādhanetikartavyatābhedādhiṣṭhānā dharmotpādinaśca tadadhiṣṭhānā na brahmātmaikye sati prabhavanti, virodhāt ityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:2292: na kevalaṃ dharmapramāṇasya śāstrasyeyaṃ gatiḥ, api tu sarveṣāṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:2295: advaite hi viṣayaviṣayibhāvo nāsti ; na ca kartṛtvam, kāryābhāvāt ; na ca kāraṇatvam, ata eva /
GSP33vacbhamu:2297: atraiva brahmavidāṃ gāthā udāharati- api cāhuḥ.iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:2299: yathā svaduḥkhena duḥkhī, yathā svasukhena sukhī, tathā putrādigatenāpīti so 'yaṃ gauṇaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:2302: dehendriyādiṣu tvabhedānubhavānna gauṇa ātmābhimānaḥ ; kiṃ tu śuktau
GSP33vacbhamu:2305: tadasattve tu na lokayātrā, nāpi brahmātmaikatvānubhavaḥ, tadupāyasya śravaṇamananāderabhāvāt
GSP33vacbhamu:2310: bodhi.bodhaśīlaṃ yat kāryam., advaitasākṣātkāra iti yāvat, tadapi kathaṃ bhavet ?.kutastadasaṃbhava ityata āha- anveṣṭavyātmavijñānātprākpramātṛtvamātmanaḥ. /
GSP33vacbhamu:2312: etaduktaṃ bhavati- eṣa hi vibhāgo 'dvaitasākṣātkārakāraṇam, tato niyamena prāgbhāvāt ; tena tadabhāve kāryaṃ notpadyata iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:2313: na ca pramāturātmano 'nveṣṭavya ātmānya ityāha- anviṣṭaḥ syātpramātaiva pāpmadoṣādivarjitaḥ. uktaṃ hi grīvāsthagraiveyakanidarśanam /
GSP33vacbhamu:2315: apramāṇātkathaṃ pāramārthikādvaitānubhavotpattirityata āha- dehātmapratyayo yadvatpramāṇatvena kalpitaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:2318: etaduktaṃ bhavati- pāramārthikaprapañcavādibhirapi dehādiṣvātmābhimāno mithyeti vaktavyam, pramāṇabādhitatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:2322: yastu sākṣātkāro bhāvikaḥ, nāsau kāryaḥ, tasya brahmasvarūpatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:2323: avidyā tu yadyavidyāmucchindyājjanayedvā, na tatra kācidanupapattiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:2338: atra ca vipratipatteḥ pravādīnāṃ viśeṣānupalambhe sati saṃśayaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:2348: na ca jñānakriye cidātmani staḥ, tasyāpariṇāmitvādekatvācca /
GSP33vacbhamu:2350: yadyapi ca sāmyāvasthāyāṃ pradhāne samudācaradvṛttinī kriyājñāne na staḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:2352: tathā ca pradhānameva sarvajñaṃ ca sarvaśakti ca /
GSP33vacbhamu:2364: ' api cāhurvṛddhāḥ- yathāgryaprāye likhitaṃ dṛṣṭvā vadanti bhavedayamagryaḥ iti, tathedapi 'tā āpa aikṣanta' tatteja aikṣata ityādyupacāraprāye kṣutam tadaikṣata ityaupacārikameva vijñeyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:2365: anena jīvenātmanānupraviśya nāmarūpe vyākaravāṇi iti ca pradhānasya jīvātmatvaṃ jīvārthakāritayāha
GSP33vacbhamu:2366: yathā hi bhadraseno rājārthakārī rājñā bhadraseno mamātmetyupacaryate,
GSP33vacbhamu:2367: evaṃ tattvamasi ityādyāḥ śrutayo bhāktāḥ saṃpattyarthā vā draṣṭavyāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:2368: svamapīto bhavati iti ca niruktaṃ jīvasya pradhāne svakīye 'pyayaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:2372: vṛttīnāmanyāsāṃ pramāṇādīnāmabhāvastasya pratyayakāraṇaṃ tamastadālambamā nidrā jīvasya vṛttirityarthaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:2376: tasmādacetanaṃ pradhānaṃ jagadupādānamanuvadanti śrutaya iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:2381: sattvasaṃpattyā cedasya sarvajñatātha tamaḥsaṃpattyāsarvajñataivāsya kasmānna bhavatītyāha- tena ca sattvadharmeṇa jñāneneti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:2384: yatkhalu sātiśayaṃ tatkvacinniratiśayaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ, yathā kuvalāmalakabilveṣu,
GSP33vacbhamu:2389: etaduktaṃ bhavati- yadyapi rajastamasī api staḥ tathāpi puruṣārtaprayuktaguṇavaiṣamyātiśayātsattvasya niratiśayotkarṣe sārvajñyaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:2390: kāryamutpadyata iti pradhānavasthāyāmapi tanmātraṃ vivakṣitvāvivakṣitvā ca tamaḥkāryaṃ pradhānaṃ sarvajñamupacaryata iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:2392: nahi kiñcidekaṃ kāryaṃ janayedapi tu bahūni /
GSP33vacbhamu:2393: cidātmā caikaḥ, pradhānaṃ tu triguṇamiti tata eva kāryamutpattimarhati, na cidītmana ityarthaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:2394: tavāpi ca yogyatāmātreṇaiva cidātmanaḥ rvajñatābhyupagamo na
GSP33vacbhamu:2400: nāmarūpaprapañcalakṣaṇakāryadarśanādetatkāraṇamātravaditi sāmānyakalpamāyāmiti pramāṇaṃ, na tu tadacetanaṃ cetanamiti vā viśeṣakalpanāyāmastyanumānamityupariṣṭātpravedayiṣyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:2403: jagadbījaṃ tadeveṣṭaṃ cetane ca sa āñjasaḥ //
GSP33vacbhamu:2404: teṣu teṣu khalvāmnāyapradeśeṣu tadaikṣata ityevañjātīyakairvākyairīkṣituḥ kāraṇajjagajjanmākhyāyata iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:2414: pārthivatve tulya iva maṇerbimbodgrāhitā na loṣṭādīnām /
GSP33vacbhamu:2416: nanvata evāsya nekṣitṛtvaṃ, nityasya jñānasvabhāvabhūtasyekṣaṇasyākriyātvena brahmaṇastatprati
GSP33vacbhamu:2418: akriyānimittasya ca kārakatvanivṛttau tadvyāptasya tadviśeṣasya kartṛtvasya nivṛtteḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:2419: satyaṃ, brahmasvabhāvaścaitanyaṃ nityatayā na kriyā, tasya tvanavacchinnasya tattadviṣayopadhānamedāvacchedena
GSP33vacbhamu:2421: tathā caivaṃlakṣaṇa īkṣaṇe sarvaviṣaye brahmaṇaḥ svātantryalakṣaṇaṃ kartṛtvamupapannam /
GSP33vacbhamu:2422: yadyapi ca kūṭasthanityasyāpariṇāmina audāsīnyamasya vāstavaṃ tathāpyanādyanirvacanīyavidyāvacchinnasya vyāpāravattvabhavabhāsata iti kartṛtvopapattiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:2423: parairapi ca cicchekte- kūṭasthanityāyā vṛttīḥ prati
GSP33vacbhamu:2426: svayamevācetanāni, tadvṛttayā svaṃ vā paraṃ vā veditumutsahante /
GSP33vacbhamu:2427: no khalvandhāḥ sahasramapi pānthāḥ panthānaṃ vidanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:2428: cakṣuṣmatā caikena cedvedyate, sa eva tarhi mārgadarśī svatantraḥ kartā
GSP33vacbhamu:2430: evaṃ buddhisattvasya svayamacetanasya citibimbasaṃkrāntyā cedāpannaṃ caitanyasya jñātṛtvaṃ, citireva jñātrī svatantrā,
GSP33vacbhamu:2436: sarvathā bhavanmateṣaḍapi nedaṃ svābhāvikaṃ kvacidapi jñātṛtvaṃ, api tu sāṃvyavahārārikameveti paramārthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:2437: nityasyātmano jñānaṃ pariṇāma iti ca bhedābhedapakṣamapākurvadbhirapāstam
GSP33vacbhamu:2438: kūṭasthasya nityasyātmano 'vyāpāravata eva bhinnaṃ jñānaṃ dharma iti copariṣṭādapākariṣyate
GSP33vacbhamu:2439: tasmādvastuto 'navacchinnaṃ caitanyaṃ tattvānyatvābhyāmanirvacanīyāvyākṛtavyācikīrṣitanāmarūpaviṣayāvacchinnaṃ sajjñānaṃ kāryaṃ, tasya kartā īśvaro jñātā sarvajñaḥ sarvaśaktiriti
GSP33vacbhamu:2441: tathā ca śrutiḥ- tapasā cīyate brahma tato 'nnamabhijāyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:2442: annātprāṇo manaḥ satyaṃ lokāḥ karmasu cāmṛtam //
GSP33vacbhamu:2444: tasmādetadbrahma nāma rūpamannaṃ ca jāyate // iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:2449: vyācikīrṣāyāṃ copacaye sati tato nāmarūpamannamadanīyaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ saṃsāriṇāṃ vyācikīrṣitamabhijāyate
GSP33vacbhamu:2450: tasmādavyākṛtādvyācikīrṣitādannātprāṇo hiraṇyagarbho brahmaṇo jñānakriyāśaktyadhiṣṭhānaṃ jagatsūtrātmā sādhāraṇe jāyate, yathāvyākṛtāt vyacikīrṣitātpaṭādavāntarakāryaṃ dvitantukādi /
GSP33vacbhamu:2453: tebhyaśca satyākhyebhyo 'nukrameṇa lokāḥ bhūrādayaḥ teṣu manuṣṭādiprāṇino varṇāśramakrameṇa karmāṇi dharmādharmarūpāṇi jāyante /
GSP33vacbhamu:2458: yasya bhagavato jñānamayaṃ tapo dharmo nāyāsamayam, tasmādbrahmamaḥ pūrvasmādetatparaṃ kāryaṃ brahma /
GSP33vacbhamu:2459: kiñca nāmarūpamannaṃ ca vrīhiyavādi jāyata iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:2462: mumukṣoścāyathārthopadeśānupapatteḥ, muktivirodhitvāt, tejaḥprabhṛtīnāṃ ca mukhyāsaṃbhavenopacārāśrayaṇasya yuktisiddhatvāt, saṃśaye ca tatprāyapāṭhasya niścāyakatvāt, iha tu mukhyasyautsargikatvena niścaye sati saṃśayābhāvāt, anyathā kirātaśatasaṃkīrṇadeśanivāsino brāhmaṇāyanasyāpi kirātatvāpatteḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:2463: brahmaivekṣitranādyanirvācyāvidyāsacivaṃ jagadupādānaṃ, śuktiriva samāropitasya rajatasya, marīcaya iva jalasya, evaścadramā iva dvatīyasya
GSP33vacbhamu:2467: na ca pradhānaṃ paramāṇavo vā tadatiriktasarvajñeśvarādhiṣṭhitā jagadupādānamiti sāṃprataṃ kāryatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:2468: kāraṇātkāryāṇāṃ bhedābhāvāt kāraṇajñānena samastakāryaparijñānasya mṛdādinidarśanenāgamena prasādhitvāt, bhede ca tadanupapatteḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:2472: sadupādānatve hi siddhe jagatastadupādānaṃ cetanamacetanaṃ veti saṃśayya mīmāṃsyeta /
GSP33vacbhamu:2477: bahu syām' iti cācetanaṃ kāraṇamātmana eva bahubhāvamāha /
GSP33vacbhamu:2479: yadyapyākāśādyā bhūtasṛṣṭistathāpi tejo 'bannānāmeva trivṛtkaraṇasya vivakṣitatvāttatra tejasaḥ prāthamyāttejaḥ prathamamuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:2482: tadyathā- prācī pratīcī dakṣiṇodīcīti catasraḥ kalā brahmaṇaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:2485: tathā pṛthivyantarīkṣaṃ dyauḥ samudra ityaparaścatasraḥ kalā dvitīyaḥ pādo 'nantavānnāma
GSP33vacbhamu:2486: tathāgniḥ sūryacadramā vidyuditi catasraḥ kalāḥ, sa jyotiṣmānnāma tṛtīyaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:2488: prāṇaścakṣuḥ śrotraṃ vāgiti catasraḥ kālāḥ, sa caturthaṃ āyatanavānnāma
GSP33vacbhamu:2493: na cāvivakṣitārthasya dhātusvarūpasya cetanopādānasādhanatvasaṃbhava ityata āha- īkṣateriti.dhātvarthanirdeśo 'bhimataḥ, viṣayiṇaṃ niṣayalakṣaṇāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:2495: 'yaḥ sarvajñaḥ iti sāmānyataḥ; sarvavit iti viśeṣataḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:2500: sāmudācaradvṛtti tāvanna bhavati sattvaṃ, guṇavaiṣamyaṃ sāmyānupapatteḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:2501: na cāvyaktena rūpeṇa jñānamapapayujyate, rajatastamasostatpratibandhasyāpi sūkṣmeṇa rūpeṇa sadbhāvādityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:2502: apica caitanyapradhānavṛttivacano jānātirna cācetane vṛttimātre dṛṣṭacaraprayoga ityāha- apica nāsākṣiketi. /
GSP33vacbhamu:2503: kathaṃ tarhi yogināṃ sattvāśotkarṣahetukaṃ sarvajñatvamityata āha- yogināṃ tviti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:2504: sattvāṃśotkarṣo hi yogināṃ cetanyacakṣuṣmatāmupakaroti, nāndhasya pradhānasyetyarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:2505: yadi tu kāpilamatamapahāya hairaṇyagarbhamāsthīyeta tatrāpyāha- atha punaḥ sākṣinimittamiti. teṣāmapi hi prakṛṣṭasattvopādānaṃ puruṣaviśeṣasyaiva kleśakarmavipākāśayāparābhṛṣṭasya sarvajñatvaṃ, na tu pradhānasyācetanasya
GSP33vacbhamu:2508: cetanyasya śuddhasya nityatve 'pyupahitaṃ sadanityaṃ kāryaṃ, ākāśamiva ghaṭāvacchinnamityabhisaṃdhāya pariharati- idaṃ tāvadbhavāniti /
GSP33vacbhamu:2511: kiṃ vāstavaṃ karmābhāvamabhipretya vaiṣamyamāha bhavān uta tadvivakṣābhāvam /
GSP33vacbhamu:2512: tatra yadi tadvivakṣābhāvaṃ, tadā prakāśayatītyanena mā bhūtsāmyaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:2515: atha ca prakāśasvabhāva pratyāsta svātantryaṃ savituriti pariharati- na
GSP33vacbhamu:2519: asiddhatvātkarmābhāvasya, vivikṣitatvāccātra karmaṇa iti pariharati- karmāpekṣāyāṃ tviti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:2520: yāsāṃ sati karmaṇyavivakṣite śrutīnāmupapattistāsāṃ sati karmaṇi vivakṣite sutarāmityarthaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:2522: yasya bhagavata īśvarasya prasādāt tasya nityasiddhasyeśvarasya nityaṃ jñānaṃ bhavatīti kimu vaktavyamiti yojanā /
GSP33vacbhamu:2527: vastuto nityasya kāraṇānapekṣāṃ svarūpeṇoktvā vyatirekamukhenāpyāha- api cāvidyādimata ityādi. ādigrahaṇena kāmakarmādayaḥ saṃgṛhyante /
GSP33vacbhamu:2531: na tasya kāryamāvaraṇādyapagamo vidyate, anāvṛttatvāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:2537: anātmani vyomni ghaṭādyupādhikṛto bhavatvavacchedakavibhramaḥ, na tu ātmani svabhāvasiddhaprakāśe sa ghaṭata ityata āha- dṛśyate cātmana eva
GSP33vacbhamu:2545: śaṅkottaratvena vā svātantryeṇa vā pradhānanirākaraṇārthaṃ sūtram /
GSP33vacbhamu:2548: brahmaiva jñīpsitaṃ, tacca na prathamaṃ sūkṣmatayā śakyaṃ śvetaketuṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:2549: grāhayitumiti tatsaṃbaddhaṃ pradhānameva sthūlatayātmatvena grāhyate śvetaketurarundhatīmivātīva sūkṣmāṃ darśayituṃ tatsaṃnihitāṃ sthūlatārakāṃ darśayatīyamasāvarundhatīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:2553: api ca jagatkāraṇaṃ prakṛtya svapitītyasya niruktaṃ karvitī śrutiścetanameva jagatkāraṇaṃ brūte /
GSP33vacbhamu:2556: nahi mṛdātmā ghaṭa ātmīye 'pi pāthasi pralīyate 'pi tvātmabhūtāyāṃ mṛdyeva /
GSP33vacbhamu:2562: yathā hi tārkikāṇāṃ samayabhedeṣu parasparāhatārthatā, naivaṃ vedānteṣu parasparaparāhṛtiḥ, api tu teṣu sarvatra jagatkāraṇacetanyāvagatiḥ samāneti /
GSP33vacbhamu:2564: yathā hi sarveṣāṃ cakṣū rūpameva grāhayati, na punā rasādikaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:2568: 'tadaikṣata ityatra īkṣaṇamātraṃ jagatkāraṇasya śrutaṃ na tu sarvaviṣayam
GSP33vacbhamu:2569: jagatkāraṇasaṃbandhitayā tu tadarthātsarvaviṣayamavagataṃ, śvetāśvatarāṇāṃ tūpaniṣadi sarvajña īśvaro jagatkāraṇamiti sākṣāduktamiti viśeṣaḥ // 11 //
GSP33vacbhamu:2571: brahma jijñāsitavyamiti hi pratijñātaṃ, tacca śāstraikasamadhigamyaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:2572: śastraṃ ca sarvajñe sarvaśaktau jagadutpattisthitipralayakāraṇaṃ brahmaṇyeva pramāṇaṃ na pradhānādāviti nyāyato vyutpāditam /
GSP33vacbhamu:2573: na cāsti kaścidvedāntabhāgo yastadviparītamapi bodhayediti ca gatisāmānyāt ityuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:2579: yadyapi tatvato nirastasamastopādhirūpaṃ brahma tathāpi na tena rūpeṇa śakyamupadeṣṭumityupahitena rūpeṇopadeṣṭavyamiti /
GSP33vacbhamu:2585: tathā gatisāmānyamapi siddhavaduktaṃ, na tvadyāpi sādhitamiti
GSP33vacbhamu:2589: kathaṃ ca phalabheda ityata āha- eka eva tviti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:2592: nanu yadyeka ātmā kūṭasthanityo niratiśayaḥ sarvabhūteṣu gūḍhaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:2593: kathametasmin bhūtāśraye tāratamyaśrutayā ityata āha- yadyapyeyaka
GSP33vacbhamu:2595: yadyapi niratiśayakameva rūpamātmana eśvaryaṃ ca jñānaṃ cānandaśca,
GSP33vacbhamu:2596: tathāpyanādyātamaḥ samāvṛtāṃ teṣu teṣu prāṇabhṛdbhedeṣu kvacidasadiva,
GSP33vacbhamu:2598: kvacidatyantaprakarṣavadiva bhāsate, tatkasya hetoḥ, avidyatamasaḥ prakarṣanikarṣatāratamyāditi
GSP33vacbhamu:2599: tathottamaprakāśaḥ savitā dihmaṇḍalamokarūpeṇaiva prakāśenāpūrayannapi varṣāsu nikṛṣṭaprakāśa iva śaradi tu prakṛṣṭaprakāśa iva prathate,
GSP33vacbhamu:2608: ' ānandamaya iti hi vikāre prācurye ca mayaṭastulyaṃ mukhyārthatvamiti vikārārthānnamayādipadaprāyapāṭhādānandamayapadamapi vikārārthameveti yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:2609: na ca prāṇamayādiṣu vikārārthatvāyogātsvārthiko mayaṅiti yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:2610: prāṇādyupādhyavacchinno hyātmā bhavati prāṇādivikārāḥ, ghaṭākāśamiva ghaṭavikārāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:2613: priyādibhāgī śarīro jīvo na brahma yujyate //
GSP33vacbhamu:2614: ' na ca sarvāntaratayā brahmaivānandamayaṃ, na jīva iti sāṃpratam /
GSP33vacbhamu:2618: nahi devadatto balavānityukte sarvānsiṃhaśārdūlādīnapi prati halavānapratīyate 'pi tu samānajātīyanarāntaranapekṣya
GSP33vacbhamu:2620: na ca niṣkalasya brahmaṇaḥ priyādyavayavayogaḥ, nāpi śarīratvaṃ yujyata
GSP33vacbhamu:2622: tasmādupahitamevātropāsyatvena vivakṣitaṃ, na tu brahmarūpaṃ jñeyatveneti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:2623: api ca yadi prācuryārtho 'pi mayaṭ, tathāpi saṃsāryevānandamayaḥ, na tu brahma /
GSP33vacbhamu:2624: ānandaprācurya hi tadviparītaduḥkhalavasaṃbhave bhavati na tu tadatyantāsaṃbhave /
GSP33vacbhamu:2625: na ca paramātmano manāgapi duḥkhalavasaṃbhavaḥ, ānandaikarasatvādityāha- na ca saśarīrasya sata iti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:2626: aśarīrasya punarapriyasaṃbandho manāgapi nāstīti prācuryārtho 'pi mayaṅ nopapadyayata ityarthaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:2628: ānandamayāvayavasya tāvadbrahmaṇaḥ pucchasyāṅgatayā na prādhānyaṃ, api tvaṅgina ānandamayasyaiva brahmaṇaḥ prādhānyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:2629: tathāca tadhikāre paṭhitamabhyasyamānamānandapadaṃ tadbuddhimādhatta iti tasyaivānandamayasyābhyāsa iti yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:2630: jyotiṣṭomādhikāre 'vasante vasante jyotiṣā yajeta' iti jyotiḥpadamiva jyotiṣṭomābhyāsaḥ kālaviśeṣavidhiparaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:2641: mantre hi punaḥ 'anyo 'ntara ātmā' iti parabrahmaṇyāntaratvaśravaṇāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:2642: tasyaiva ca 'anyo 'ntara ātmānandamayaḥ' iti brāhmaṇe pratyabhijñānāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:2643: parabrahmaivānandamayamityāha sūtrakāraḥ- māntravarṇikameva ca gīyate. māntravarṇikameva paraṃ brahma brāhmaṇe 'pyānandamaya iti gīyata iti //15
GSP33vacbhamu:2645: syām' iti ca sṛjyamānānāṃ sraṣṭurānandamayādabhedaśravaṇāt, ānandamayaḥ para evetyāha /
GSP33vacbhamu:2649: rasaḥ sāro hyayamānandamaya ātmā 'rasaṃ hyevāyaṃ labdhvā'nandī bhavati' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:2651: so 'yaṃ jīvātmano labdhṛbhāvaḥ, ānandamayasya ca labhyatā, nābheda upapadyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:2652: tasmādānandamayasya jīvātmano bhede parabrahmatvaṃ siddhaṃ bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:2654: yadi labdhvā na labdhavyaḥ, kathaṃ tarhi paramātmano vastuto 'bhinnena
GSP33vacbhamu:2659: jīvo hyavidyayā parabrahmaṇo bhinno darśitaḥ, na tu jīvādapi /
GSP33vacbhamu:2660: tathā cānandamayaścejjīvaḥ, na jīvasyāvidyayāpi svato bhedo darśita iti na labdhṛlabdhavyabhāva ityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:2663: yathā parameśvarādbhinno jīvātmā draṣṭā na bhavatyevaṃ jīvātmano 'pi
GSP33vacbhamu:2664: draṣṭurna bhinnaḥ parameśvara iti jīvasyānirvācyatve parameśvaro
GSP33vacbhamu:2667: rajataṃ hi rāmāropitaṃ na śuktito bhidyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:2668: na hi tadbhedenābhedena vā śakyaṃ nirvaktum /
GSP33vacbhamu:2670: atraiva sarūpamātraṃ dṛṣṭāntamāha- yathā māyāvina iti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:2674: eṣa tāvadutsargo yat- brahma pucchaṃ pratiṣṭheti brahmaśabdātpratīyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:2676: ' tatra kiṃ pucchapadasamabhivyāhārāt annamayādiṣu cāsyāvayavaparatvena prayogāt, ihāpyavayavaparatvātpucchapadasya tatsamānādhikaraṇaṃ brahmapadamapi svārthatyāgena kathañcidavayavaparaṃ vyākhyāyātām /
GSP33vacbhamu:2680: ānandapadābhyāsena ca jyotiḥ padeneva jyotiṣṭoma anandamayo lakṣyatāṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:2681: utānandamayaṃ vikārārthamastu, brahmapadaṃ ca brāhmaṇyeva svārthe 'stu,
GSP33vacbhamu:2686: pucchapadaṃ hi vāladhau mukhyaṃ sadānandamayāvayave gauṇameveti mukhyaśabdārthalaṅghanamavayavaparatāyāmaṅikaraṇaparatāyāṃ ca tulyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:2691: api cānandamayapadasya brahmārthatve, brahma puccham iti na samañjasam /
GSP33vacbhamu:2699: tathā ca māntravarṇikasya brahmaṇā eva brahma pucchaṃ pratiṣṭhā iti
GSP33vacbhamu:2701: so 'kāmayeta' ityādyā api śrutayo brahmaviṣayā ityarthasaṃkṣepaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:2705: ānandamayaśabdena tadvākyasya brahma pucchaṃ pratiṣṭhā ityetadgataṃ brahmapadamupalakṣyate
GSP33vacbhamu:2706: etaduktaṃ bhavati- ānandamaya ityādivākye yat brahma pucchaṃ pratiṣṭhā iti brahmapadaṃ tatsvapradhānameveti
GSP33vacbhamu:2707: yattu brahmādhikaraṇameveti vaktavye brahma puccham ityāha śrutiḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:2708: tatkasya hetoḥ, pūrvamavayavapradhānaprayogāttatprayogasyaiva buddhau saṃnidhānāt tenāpi cādhiraraṇalakṣaṇopapatteriti /
GSP33vacbhamu:2710: yat satyaṃ jñānam' ityādinā mantravarṇena brahmoktaṃ tadevopāyabhūtena brāhmaṇena svapradhānyena gīyate- brahma pucchaṃ pratiṣṭhā iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:2711: avayavavacanatve tvasya mantre prādhānyaṃ, brāhmaṇe prādhānyamityupāyopeyayormantrabrāhmaṇayorvipratipattiḥ syāditi /
GSP33vacbhamu:2713: atra 'itaścānandamayaḥ iti bhāṣyasya sthāne itaśca brahma pucchaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:2716: atrāpi itaścānandamayaḥ ityasya ca ānandamayādhikāre ityasya ca bhāṣyasya sthāne brahma pucchaṃ pratiṣṭhā iti brahmapucchādhikāre iti ca paṭhitavayam /
GSP33vacbhamu:2719: ityanayorapi sūtrayorbhāṣye ānandamayasthāne brahma pucchaṃ pratiṣṭhā iti pāṭho draṣṭavyaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:2721: vikārasyānandamayasya brahma pucchamavayavaścetkathaṃ sarvasyāsya vikārajātasya sānandamayasya brahma pucchaṃ kāraṇamucyeta idaṃ sarvamasṛjata /
GSP33vacbhamu:2723: nahyānandamayavikārāvayavo brahma vikāraḥ san sarvasya kāraṇamupapadyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:2724: tasmādānandamayavikārāvayavo brahmeti tadavayavayogyānandamayo vikāra iha nopāsyatvena vivakṣitaḥsa kintu svapradhānamiha brahma pucchaṃ jñeyatveneti siddham // 1.9 //
GSP33vacbhamu:2727: 'pāstasamastaviśeṣabrahmapratipattyarthamupāyatāmātreṇa pañca kośā upādhayaḥ sthitāḥ, natu vivakṣaitāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:2728: brahmaiva tu pradhānaṃ brahma pucchaṃ pratiṣṭhā iti jñeyatvenopakṣiptamiti nirṇītam /
GSP33vacbhamu:2729: saṃprati tu brahma vivakṣitopādhimupasyatvenopakṣipyate, natu vidyākarmātiśayalabdhotkarṣo jīvātmādityapadavedanīya iti nirṇīyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:2730: tatra maryādādhārarūpāṇi saṃsāriṇi pare na tu /
GSP33vacbhamu:2732: piraṇyaśmaśruḥ ityādirūpaśravaṇāt, ya eṣo 'ntarāditye, ya eṣo 'ntarakṣiṇī
GSP33vacbhamu:2733: iti cādhārabhehaśravaṇāt, ye cāmuṣmātparāñco lokāsteṣāṃ ceṣṭe devakāmānāṃ ca ityaiśvaryādāśruteśca saṃsāryeva kāryakāraṇasaṃghātātmako rūpādisaṃpanna ihopāsyaḥ, natu paramātmā aśabdamasparśam ityādiśrutibhiḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:2734: apāstasamastarūpāśca, sve mahimni ityādiśrutibhirapākṛtādhāraśca, eṣa sarveśvaraḥ ityādiśrutibhiradhigatanirmaryādaiśvaryaśca śakya upāsyatveneha pratipattum /
GSP33vacbhamu:2735: sarvapāpmavirahaścādityapuruṣe saṃbhavati, śāstrasya manuṣyādhikāratayā devatāyāḥ puṇyupāpayoranadhikārāt
GSP33vacbhamu:2736: rūpādimattvānyānupapattyā ca kāryakāraṇātmake jīve upāsyatvena vivakṣite yattāvadṛgādyātmakatayāsya sarvātmakatvaṃ śrūyate tatkathañcidādityapuruṣasyaiva stuturiti ādityapuruṣa evopāsyo na paramātmatyevaṃ prāptam /
GSP33vacbhamu:2737: anādhāratve ca nityatvaṃ sarvagatatvaṃ ca hetuḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:2738: anityaṃ hi kāryaṃ kāraṇādhāramiti nānādhāraṃ, nityamapyasarvagataṃ ca yattasmādadharabhāvenāsthitaṃ tadeva tasyottarasyādhāra iti nānādhāraṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:2744: na cādityasya devatāyāḥ karmānadhikāre 'pi sarvapāpmavirahaḥ prāgbhavīyadharmarūpapāpmasaṃbhave sati /
GSP33vacbhamu:2745: na caiteṣāṃ prāgbhavīyo dharma evāsti na pāpmeti sāṃpratam /
GSP33vacbhamu:2749: naca vinigamanāhetvabhāvaḥ, tatra tatra sarvapāpmavirahasya bhūyobhūyo brahmaṇyeva śravaṇāt
GSP33vacbhamu:2755: rūpavattvaṃ cāsya parānugrahāya kāyanirmāṇena vā, tadvikāratayā vā sarvasya kāryajātasya, vikārasya ca vikāravato
GSP33vacbhamu:2757: naca brahmanirmitaṃ māyārūpamanuvadacchāstramaśāstraṃ bhavati, apitu tāṃ kurvat iti māśāstratvaprasaṅgaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:2762: api cādityadehābhimāninaḥ saṃsāriṇo 'ntaryāmī bhedenoktaḥ, sa evāntarāditya ityantaḥ śrutisāmyena pratyabhijñāyamāno bhavitumarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:2765: kasmātpunarvibhūtimattvaṃ parameśvaraparigrahe ghaṭata ityata āha- yadyadvibhūtimaditi. /
GSP33vacbhamu:2774: tatra 'ākāśa iti hovāca' iti kiṃ mukhyakāśapādānurodhena 'asya lokasya kā gitaḥ' iti, 'sarvāṇi ha vā imāni bhūtāni' iti 'jyāyā' itica 'parāyaṇam'
GSP33vacbhamu:2775: iti ca kathañcidvyākhyāyatāṃ, utaitadanurodhenākāśaśabdo bhaktyā parātmāne
GSP33vacbhamu:2779: ' 'asya lokasya kā gatiḥ' iti praśnottare 'ākāśa iti hovāca' ityākāśasya gatitvena pratipādyatayā prādhānyāt, 'sarvāṇi ha vā' ityādīnāṃ tu tadviśeṣaṇatayā guṇatvāt, 'guṇe tvanyāṭyakalpanā' iti bahūnyapyapradhānāni pradhānānurodhena netavyāni /
GSP33vacbhamu:2781: tena tadanuraktāyāṃ buddhau yadyadeva tadekavākyagatamupanipatati tattajjaghanyatayā upasaṃjātavirodhi tadānuguṇyenaiva vyavasthānamarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:2782: naca kkacidākāśaśabdo bhaktyā brahmaṇi prayukta iti sarvatra tena tatpareṇa bhavitavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:2783: nahi gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣa ityatra gaṅgapadamanupapattyā tīraparamiti yādāṃsi gaṅgāyāmityatrāpyanena tatpareṇa bhavitavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:2785: naca brahmaṇyapyākāśaśabdo mukhyaḥ, anaikārthatvasyānyāṭyatvāt, bhaktyā ca brahmaṇi prayogadarśanopapatteḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:2786: loke cāsya nabhasi nirūḍhatvāt, tatpūrvakatvācca vaidikārthapratītervaiparītyānupapatteḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:2787: tadānuguṇyena ca 'sarvāṇi ha vā' ityādīni bhāṣyakṛtā svayameva nītāni /
GSP33vacbhamu:2793: ' yadyapyākāśapadaṃ pradhānārthaṃ tathāpi yatpṛṣṭaṃ tadeva prativaktavyam
GSP33vacbhamu:2795: tadiha, 'asya lokasya kā gatiḥ' iti praśno dṛśyamānanāmarūpaprapañcamātragativiṣaya iti tadanurodhādya eva sarvasya lokasya gatiḥ sa evākāśaśabdena prativaktavyaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:2796: naca bhūtākāśaḥ sarvasya lokasya gatiḥ, tasyāpi lokamadhyapātitvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:2798: na cottare bhūtākāśaśravaṇādbhūtākāśakāryameva pṛṣṭamiti yuktaṃ, praśnasya prathamāvagato
GSP33vacbhamu:2800: naca praśnena pūrvapakṣarūpeṇānavasthitārthenottaraṃ vyavasthitārthaṃ na śakyaṃ niyantumiti
GSP33vacbhamu:2804: tathāhi-'sarvāṇi ha vā imāni bhūtānyakāśādeva samutpadyante' iti sarvaśabdaḥ kathañcidalpaviṣayo vyākhyeyaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:2806: na khalvapāmākāśa eva kāraṇamapi tu tejo 'pi /
GSP33vacbhamu:2807: evamannasyāpi nākāśameva kāraṇamapi tu pāvakapāthasī api /
GSP33vacbhamu:2813: tasmātsarveṣāṃ lokānāmiti praśnopakramāt, uttare ca tattadasādhāraṇabrahmaguṇaparāmarśāt pṛṣṭāyāśca gateḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:2818: lokasāmānyagateśca pṛṣṭatvāt, 'parāyaṇam' iti ca tasyaivopasaṃhārābrahmaiva pradhānam /
GSP33vacbhamu:2819: tathāca tadarthaṃ sat ākāśapadaṃ pradhānārthaṃ bhavati, nānyathā /
GSP33vacbhamu:2824: na cākāśaśabdo gauṇo 'pi vilambitapratipattiḥ, tatra tatra brahmaṇyākāśaśabdasya tatparyāyasya
GSP33vacbhamu:2825: prayogaprācuryādatyantābhyāsenāsyāpi mukhyavatpratipatteravilambanāditi darśanārthaṃ brahmaṇi prayogaprācuryaṃ vaidikaṃ nidarśitaṃ bhāṣyakṛtā /
GSP33vacbhamu:2826: tatraiva ca prathamāvagatānuguṇyenottaraṃ nīyate, yatra tadanyathā kartuṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:2828: yatra tu na śakyaṃ tatrottarānuguṇyenaiva prathamaṃ nīyata ityāha- vākyopakrame 'pīti. //22 //
GSP33vacbhamu:2830: udgīthe-'yā devatā prastāvamanvāyattā' ityukramya śrūyate-'katamā sā devateti prāṇa iti hovāca' uṣastiśkrāyaṇaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:2832: prastāva iti sāmno bhaktiviśeṣastamanvāyattā anugatā prāṇo devatā /
GSP33vacbhamu:2833: atra prāṇaśabdasya brahmaṇi vāyuvikāre ca darśanātsaṃśayaḥ-kimayaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:2835: tatra ata eva brahmaliṅgādeva prāṇo 'pi brahmaiva na vāyuvikāra iti yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:2841: tatra paurvāparyaparyālocanayā yatrārthe samañjasa āgamaḥ sa evārthastasya
GSP33vacbhamu:2843: iha tu saṃveśanodgamane bhūtānāṃ prāṇaṃ pratyucyamāne kiṃ brahma pratyucyate āho vāyuvikāraṃ pratīti viśaye 'yadā vai puruṣaḥ svapiti
GSP33vacbhamu:2844: prāṇaṃ tarhi vāgapyeti' ityādikāyāḥ śruteḥ sarvabhūtasārendriyasaṃveśanodgamanapratipādanadvārā sarvabhūtasaṃveśanodgamanapratipādikāyā mānāntarānugrahalabdhasāmarthyāyā
GSP33vacbhamu:2846: api cātrodgīthapratihārayoḥ sāmabhaktyorbrahmaṇo 'nye ādityaścānnaṃ ca devate abhihite kāryakāraṇasaṃghātarūpe, tatsāhacaryātprāṇo 'pi
GSP33vacbhamu:2852: ' no khalu svataḥsiddhapramāṇabhāvamapauruṣeyaṃ vacaḥ svaviṣayajñānotpāde vā tadvyavahāre vā mānāntaramapekṣate, tasyāpauruṣeyasya nirastasamastadoṣāśaṅkya svata eva niścāyakatvāt, niścāyakatvāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:2854: tasmādasaṃvādino vā cakṣuṣa iva rūpe tvagindriyasaṃvādino vā tasyaiva dravye nādārḍhyaṃ vā dārḍhyaṃ vā /
GSP33vacbhamu:2857: pratītau vā tatrāpi prāṇo brahmaiva bhavenna vāyuvikāraḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:2858: 'yadā suptaḥ svapnaṃ na kañcana paśyatyathāsminprāṇa evaikadhā bhavati'
GSP33vacbhamu:2860: na cāsminvāyuvikāre sarveṣāṃ bhūtānāṃ saṃveśanodgamane mānāntareṇa dṛśyete
GSP33vacbhamu:2865: indriyasaṃveśanodgamanaṃ tvavayutyānuvādenāpi ghaṭiṣyate, ekaṃ vṛṇīte dvau
GSP33vacbhamu:2869: tathā copāsakasya prāṇaprāptiḥ karmasamṛddhirvā phalaṃ bhavatīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:2874: idamāmananti-'atha yadataḥ paro divo jyotirdīpyate niśvataḥpṛṣṭheṣu sarvataḥ pṛṣṭheṣvanuttameṣūttameṣu lokeṣvidaṃ vāva tadyadidamasminnantaḥ puruṣe jyotiḥ' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:2875: yajjyotirato divo dyulokātparaṃ dīpyate prakāśate viśvataḥpṛṣṭheṣu viśveṣāmupari /
GSP33vacbhamu:2881: śrotragrāhyeṇa ca pihitakarṇena puṃsā ghoṣeṇa liṅgenānumīyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:2882: tatra śārīrasyoṣmaṇastvacā darśanaṃ dṛṣṭiḥ, ghoṣasya ca śravaṇaṃ śrutiḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:2883: tayośca dṛṣṭiśrutī jyotiṣa eva, talliṅgena tadanumānāditi /
GSP33vacbhamu:2884: atra saṃśayaḥ-kiṃ jyotiḥśabdaḥ teja uta brahmeti /
GSP33vacbhamu:2891: kokṣeyajyotiḥsārūpyaṃ ca cakṣuṣyo rūpavān śruto viśruto bhavatītyalpaphalatvaṃ ca svavākye śrūyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:2892: na jātu jvalanāparanāmā dīptirvinā tejo brahmaṇi saṃbhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:2897: audarye tu tejasyadhyasya bāhyaṃ teja upāsanametat phalānurūpaṃ yujyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:2899: etadupodbalāya ca nirastamapi maryādādhārabahutvamupanyastaṃ, iha tannirāsakāraṇābhāvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:2900: naca maryādāvattvaṃ tejorāśerna saṃbhavati, tasya sauryādeḥ sāvayavatvena
GSP33vacbhamu:2903: naca 'pādo 'sya sarvā bhūtāni tripādasyāmṛtaṃ divi' iti brahmapratipādakaṃ vākyāntaraṃ, 'yadataḥ paro divo jyotiḥśabdaṃ brahmaṇi vyavasthāpayatīti yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:2904: nahi saṃnidhānamātradvākyāntareṇa vākyāntaragatā śrutiḥ śakyā mukhyārthāntryāvayitum /
GSP33vacbhamu:2905: naca vākyāntare 'dhikaraṇatvena dyauḥ śrutā diva iti maryādāśrutau śakyā
GSP33vacbhamu:2907: apica vākyāntarasyāpi brahmārthatvaṃ prasādhyameva nādyāpi sidhyati,
GSP33vacbhamu:2908: tatkathaṃ tena niyantuṃ brahmaparatayā 'yadataḥ paraḥ' iti vākyaṃ śakyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:2910: tejaḥkathanaprastāve tamaḥkathanaṃ pratipakṣopanyāsena pratipakṣāntare dṛḍhā pratītirbhavatītyetadartham
GSP33vacbhamu:2921: 'ekaikāṃ trivṛtaṃ trivṛtaṃ karavāṇi' iti tejaḥprabhṛtyupāsanāmātraviṣayā śrutirna saṃkocayituṃ yuktetyarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:2922: evamekadeśini dūṣite paramasamādhātā pūrvapakṣī brūte- astu tarhi trivṛtkṛtameveti. bhāginī yuktā /
GSP33vacbhamu:2923: yadyapyādhārabahutvaśrutirbrahmaṇyapi kalpitopādhinibandhanā kathañcidupapadyate, tathāpi yathā kārye jyotiṣyatiśayenopapadyate na tathātretyata uktam- upapadyetatarāmiti /
GSP33vacbhamu:2928: brahmaṇyeva pradhānaṃ hi brahmacchando na tatra tu //
GSP33vacbhamu:2931: yatra punastatprasiddhamanyato na kathañcidāpyate, tatra vacanāni tvapūrvatvāditi sarvanāmnaḥ prasiddhārthatvaṃ balādapanīyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:2933: tadiha 'yadataḥ paro divo jyotiḥ' iti yacchabdasāmarthyāt dyumaryādenāpi
GSP33vacbhamu:2936: pūrvavākye ca dyusaṃbandhitayā tripādbrahma prasiddhamiti prasiddhyapekṣāyāṃ tadeva saṃbadhyate
GSP33vacbhamu:2937: naca pradhānasya prātipadikārthasya tattvena pratyabhijñāne tadviśeṣaṇasya vibhaktyarthasyānyatāmātreṇānyatā yuktā /
GSP33vacbhamu:2938: evaṃ ca tadvākyasthāni tejoliṅgānyasamañjasānīti brahmaṇyeva gamayitavyāni, gamitāni ca bhāṣyakṛtā /
GSP33vacbhamu:2940: athavā prakāśamātravacano jyotiḥśabdaḥ prakāśasya brahmeti brahmaṇi mukya iti jyotirbahmeti siddham /
GSP33vacbhamu:2942: prasiddhyapekṣāyāṃ pūrvavākyagataṃ prakṛtaṃ saṃnihitaṃ, aprasiddhaṃ tu kalpyaṃ na prakṛtam
GSP33vacbhamu:2946: kaukṣeyaṃ hi jyotirjīvabhāvenānupraviṣṭasya paramātmano vikāraḥ, jīvabhāve dehasya śaityāt, jīvataścauṣṇyājjñāyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:2949: chandobhidhānānneti cet na tathā cetorpaṇanigadāttathāhi darśanam. /
GSP33vacbhamu:2950: pūrvavākyasya hi brahmārthatve siddhe syādetadevaṃ, natu tadbrahmārthaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:2952: 'gāyatrī vā idaṃ sarvaṃ bhūtaṃ yadidaṃ kiñca' iti gāyatrīṃ prakṛtyedaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:2957: evaṃ 'gāyatrī vā idaṃ sarvam' ityakṣarasaṃniveśamātrasya gāyatryā na
GSP33vacbhamu:2961: tasmādgīyatrīdvārā brahmaṇa evopāsanā na gāyatryā iti pūrveṇaiva gatārthatvādanārambhaṇīyametat
GSP33vacbhamu:2964: tathāhi-gāyatrīdvārā brahmopāsaneti kor'thaḥ, gāyatrīvikāropādhino brahmaṇa upāsaneti /
GSP33vacbhamu:2967: tasmādasya sarvātmatvādikaṃ stutyarthaṃ, tadvaraṃ gāyatryā evāstu stutiḥ kathācitpraṇāḍyā
GSP33vacbhamu:2968: 'vāgvai gāyatrī vāgvā idaṃ sarvaṃ bhūtaṃ gāyati ca trāyate ca'
GSP33vacbhamu:2970: tathāca 'gāyatrī vā idaṃ sarvam' ityupakramya gāyatryā eva
GSP33vacbhamu:2971: hṛdayādibhirvyākhyāya ca 'saiṣā catuṣpadā ṣaḍvidhā gāyatrī' ityupasaṃhāro gāyatryāmeva samañjaso bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:2978: gāyatryākhyacchandodvāreṇa gāyatrīrūpavikārānugate brahmaṇi cetorpaṇaṃ cittasamādhānamanena brahmaṇavākyena nigadyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:2980: na gāyatrī brahmaṇo 'vacchedikā, utpalasyeva nīlatvaṃ, yena tadavacchinnatvamanaytra na syādavacchedakavirahāt
GSP33vacbhamu:2981: kintu yadetadbrahma sarvātmakaṃ sarvakāraṇaṃ satsvarūpeṇāśakyopadeśamiti tadvikāragāyatrīdvāreṇopalakṣyate
GSP33vacbhamu:2982: gāyatryāḥ sarvacchandovyāptyā ca savanatrayavyāptyā ca dvijātidvitīyajanmajananīyatayā ca śrutervikāreṣu madhye prādhānyena dvāratvopapatteḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:2987: tadevaṃ gāyatrīśabdasya mukhyārthatve gāyatryā brahmopalakṣyata ityuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:2988: saṃprati ti gāyatriśabdaḥ saṃkhyāsāmānyādgauṇyā vṛttyā brahmaṇyeva vartata iti darśayati- apara āheti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:2989: tathāhi-ṣaḍakṣaraiḥ pādairyathā gāyatrī catuṣpadā, evaṃ brahmāpi catuṣpāt
GSP33vacbhamu:2995: tathā-'ayaṃ vāva sa yo 'yamantaḥ puruṣa ākāśaḥ' /
GSP33vacbhamu:3006: bhūtapṛthivīśarīrahṛdayavākprāṇā iti ṣaṭ prakārā gāyatryākhyasya brahmaṇaḥ śrūyante /
GSP33vacbhamu:3007: pañca brahmapuruṣā iti ca, hṛdayayasuṣiṣu brahmapuruṣaśrutirbrahmasaṃbandhitāyāṃ vivakṣitāyāṃ saṃbhavati. /
GSP33vacbhamu:3008: asyārthaḥ-hṛdayasyāsya khalu pañca suṣayaḥ pañca chidrāṇi /
GSP33vacbhamu:3009: tāni ca devaiḥ prāṇādibhī rakṣyamāṇāni svargaprāptidvārāṇīti devasuṣayaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:3010: tathāhi-hṛdayasya yatprāṅmukhaṃ chidraṃ tatstho yo vāyuḥ sa prāṇaḥ, tena hi prayāṇakāle saṃcarate svargalokaṃ, sa eva cakṣuḥ, sa evāditya ityarthaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:3011: 'ādityo ha vai bāhyaḥ prāṇaḥ' iti śruteḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:3012: atha yo 'sya dakṣiṇaḥ suṣistatstho vāyuviśeṣo vyānaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:3013: tatsaṃbaddhaṃ śrotra taccandramāḥ, 'śrotreṇa sṛṣṭā viśaścandramāśca' iti śruteḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:3014: atha yo 'sya pratyaṅmukhaḥ suṣistatatstho vāyuviśeṣo 'pānaḥ sa ca vāksaṃbandhādvāk, 'vāgvā agniḥ' iti śruteḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:3015: atha yo 'syodaṅmukhaḥ suṣistatstho vāyuviśeṣaḥ sa udānaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:3019: tatsaṃbaddhāḥ pañca hārdasya brahmaṇaḥ puruṣā na gāyatryāmakṣarasaṃniveśamātre saṃbhavanti, kintu brahmaṇyeveti //26 //
GSP33vacbhamu:3022: yo hi śyeno vṛkṣāgre vastuto 'sti sa ca tataḥ paro 'pyastyeva /
GSP33vacbhamu:3025: yadā tu maryādaiva mukhyatayā prādhānyena vivakṣitā tadā lakṣaṇayādhāratvaṃ vyākhyeyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:3033: tatkatamadatra liṅgaṃ, liṅgābhāsaṃ ca katamadityatra vicāryate /
GSP33vacbhamu:3034: na cāyamarthaḥ 'ata eva prāṇaḥ' ityatra vicāritaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:3036: hitatamapuruṣārthasiddhiśca nikhilabhrūṇahatyādipāpāparāmarśaśca prajñātmatvaṃ cānandādiśca na mukhye prāṇe saṃbhavanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:3037: tathā 'eṣa sādhu karma kārayati' 'eṣa lokādhipatiḥ' ityādyapi /
GSP33vacbhamu:3039: vaktṛtvaṃ ca vākkaraṇavyāpāravattvaṃ yadyapi paramātmani svarūpeṇa na saṃbhavati tathāpyananyathāsiddhabahubrahmaliṅgavirodhaparihārāya jīvadvāreṇa brahmaṇyeva kathañcidvyākhyeyaṃ jīvasya brahmaṇo 'bhedāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:3041: tadeva brahma tvaṃ viddhi' iti vāgvadanasya brahma
GSP33vacbhamu:3056: adhyātmasaṃbandhabhūmnaśca parācīndre 'nupapatteḥ, indrasya devatāyā ātmani pratibuddhasya caramadehasya vāmadevasyeva prarabdhavipākakarmāśayamātraṃ bhogena kṣapayato brahmaṇa eva
GSP33vacbhamu:3057: sarvametatkalpata iti vigrahavadindrijīvaprāṇavāyuparityāgena brahmaivātra prāṇaśabdaṃ pratīyata iti pūrvapakṣābhāvādanārabhyametaditi /
GSP33vacbhamu:3058: atrocyate-'yo vai prāṇaḥ sā prajñā yā vā prajñā sa prāṇaiḥ saha hyetavasmin śarīre vasataḥ sahotkrāmataḥ' iti yasyaiva prāṇasya
GSP33vacbhamu:3059: prajñātmana upāsyatvamuktaṃ tasyaiva prāṇasya prajñātmanā sahotkramaṇamucyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:3060: naca brahmaṇyabede dvicanaṃ, na sahabhāvaḥ na cotkramaṇam /
GSP33vacbhamu:3071: siddhāntastu-satyaṃ padārthāvagamopapāyo vākyārthavagamaḥ, natu padārthāvagamaparāṇyeva padāni, api tvekavākyārthāvagamaparāṇi /
GSP33vacbhamu:3072: tameva tvekaṃ vākyārthaṃ padārthāvagamamantareṇa na śaknuvanti kartumityantarā tadarthameva tamapyavagamayanti, tena padāni viśiṣṭaikārthāvabodhanasvarasānyeva balabadbādhakopanitānnānārthabodhaparatāṃ nīyante /
GSP33vacbhamu:3074: tena yathopāṃśuyājavākye jāmitādoṣopakrame tatpratisamādhānopasaṃhāre caikavākyatvāya 'prajāpaturupāṃśu yaṣṭavyaḥ' ityādayo na pṛthagvidhayaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:3075: kintvarthavādā iti nirṇītaṃ, tathehāmāmevi vijānīhi' ityupakramya 'prāṇo
GSP33vacbhamu:3077: ityupasaṃhārādbrahmaṇyekavākyatvāvagatau satyāṃ jīvamukhyaprāṇaliṅge api tadanuguṇatayā netavye
GSP33vacbhamu:3079: yatpunarbhedadarśanaṃ 'saha hyetau' iti, tajjñānakriyāśaktibhedena buddhiprāṇayoḥ pratyagātmopādhibhūtayornirdeśaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:3086: naiṣa saṃdarbho brahmavākyameva bhavitumarhatīti, kintu tathāyogaṃ kiñcidatra jīvavākyaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:3089: prāṇāntarāṇīndriyāṇi, tāni hi mukhye prāṇe pratiṣṭhitāni /
GSP33vacbhamu:3096: pañca śabdādayaḥ, pañca pṛthivyādaya iti daśa bhūtamātrāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:3097: pañca buddhīndriyāṇi pañca buddhasya iti daśa prajñāmātrāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:3098: tadevaṃ svamatena vyākhyāya prācāṃ vṛttikṛtāṃ matena vyācaṣṭe- athaveti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:3099: pūrvaṃ prāṇasyaikamupāsanamaparaṃ jīvasyāparaṃ brahmaṇa ityupāsanātraividhyena vākyabhedaprasaṅgo dūṣaṇamuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:3100: iha tu brahmaṇa ekasyaivopāsātrayaviśiṣṭasya vidhānānna vākyabeda ityabhimānaḥ prācāṃ vṛttikṛtām
GSP33vacbhamu:3104: iha tu siddharūpaṃ brahma na vidhiviṣayo bhavitumarhati, abhāvārthatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:3106: vākyāntarebhyaśca brahmavagateḥ prāptatvāttadanūdyāprāptopāsanā bhāvārthaḥ vidheyastasya ca bedādvidhyāvṛttilakṣaṇo vākyabedo 'tisphuṭa iti bāṣyakṛtā nodghāṭitaḥ, svavyākhyānenaivoktaprayatvāditi sarvaṃvadātam //31 //
GSP33vacbhamu:3107: iti śrīvācaspatimiśraviracite bhāṣyavibhāge bhāmatyāṃ prathamasyādhyāyasya prathamaḥ pādaḥ iti prathamasyādhyāyasya spaṣṭabrahmaliṅgaśrutisamanvayākhyaḥ prathamaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:3110: atha dvitīyaṃ pādamāripsuḥ pūrvoktamarthaṃ smārayati vakṣyamāṇopayogitayā-
GSP33vacbhamu:3113: na caite sākṣātpūrvamupapāditā iti kathaṃ hetubhāvena na śakyā upadeṣṭumityata uktam- samastajagatkāraṇasyeti. yadyapyete na pūrvaṃ kaṇṭhata uktāstathāpi brahmaṇo jagajjanmādikāraṇatvopapadānenādhikaraṇasiddhāntanyāyenopakṣiptā ityupapannasteṣāmuttaratra hetubhāvenopanyāsa ityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:3117: tatra kaiva kathā manomayādīnāmarthāntaraṃ prasiddhānāṃ padānāṃ brahmagocaratvanirṇayaṃ pratītyabhiprāyaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:3123: yatastasmādbrahmaṇo jāyata iti tajjaṃ, tasmiṃśca līyata iti tallaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:3124: tasmiṃścāniti sthitikāle ceṣṭata iti tadanaṃ jagat tasmātsarvaṃ khalvidaṃ jagadbrahma /
GSP33vacbhamu:3125: ataḥ kaḥ kasminrajyate kaśca kaṃ dveṣṭīti rāgadveṣarahitaḥ śāntaḥ sannupāsīta /
GSP33vacbhamu:3126: atha khalu kratumayaḥ puruṣo yathākraturasmiṃlloke puruṣo bhavati tathetaḥ pretya bhavati sa kratuṃ kurvīta manomayaḥ prāṇaśarīra ityādi. /
GSP33vacbhamu:3127: tatra saṃśayaḥ-kimiha manomayatvādibhirdharmaiḥ śārīra ātmopāsyatvenopadiśyate āhosvidbrahmeti
GSP33vacbhamu:3131: 'kratum' ityādivākyena vihitāṃ kratubhāvanāmanūdya 'sarvam' ityādivākyaṃ śamaguṇe vidhiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:3132: tathā ca 'sarvaṃ khalvidaṃ brahma' iti vākyaṃ prathamapaṭhitamapyarthālocanayā parameva, tadarthopajīvitvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:3133: evaṃ ca saṃkalpavidhiḥ prathamo nirviṣayaḥ sannaparyavasyanviṣayāpekṣaḥ svayamanirvṛtto na vidhyantareṇopajīvituṃ śakyaḥ, anupapadākatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:3136: manomayatvādi ca kāryakāraṇasaṃghātātmano jīvātmana eva nirūḍhamiti jīvātmanopāsyenoparaktopāsanā na paścāt brahmaṇā saṃbaddhumarhati,
GSP33vacbhamu:3138: naca 'sarvaṃ khalvidam' iti vākyaṃ brahmaparamapi tu śamahetuvannigadārthavādaḥ śāntatāvidhiparaḥ, 'śūrpeṇa juhoti' 'tena
GSP33vacbhamu:3140: na cānyaparādapi brahmāpekṣitatayā svīkriyata iti yuktaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:3147: evaṃ karmakartṛvyapadeśaḥ saptamīpraṇamāntatā cābhede 'pi jīvātmani kathañcidbhedopacāreṇa rāhoḥ śira itivaddraṣṭavyā /
GSP33vacbhamu:3148: 'etadbrahma' iti ca jīvaviṣayaṃ, jīvasyāpi dehādibṛṃhaṇatvena brahmātvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:3151: tasmājjīva evopāsyatvenātra vivakṣitaḥ, na paramātmeti prāptam /
GSP33vacbhamu:3156: ' bhavedetadevaṃ yadi prāṇaśarīra ca sarvanāmārthaṃ saṃprāpya
GSP33vacbhamu:3159: tadeva tu manovikāro vā manaḥpracuraṃ vā kimarthamityadyāpi na vijñāyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:3160: tadyatraiṣa śabdaḥ samavetārtho bhavati sa samāsārthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:3161: na caiṣa jīva eva samavetātho na brahmaṇīti, tasya 'aprāṇo hyamanāḥ'
GSP33vacbhamu:3163: vikārāṇāṃ ca svakāraṇādabhedātteṣāṃ ca manomatayā brahmaṇastatkāraṇasya manomayatvopapatteḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:3166: tatra prathamaṃ dvārasya buddhisthatvāttadevopāsyamastu, na punarjaghanyaṃ brahma /
GSP33vacbhamu:3168: tadetadatra saṃpradhāryam-kiṃ brahmaliṅgairjīvānāṃ tadabhinnānāmastu tadvattā, tathāca jīvasya manomayatvādibhiḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:3169: prathamamavagamāttasyaivopāsyatvaṃ, uta na jīvasya brahmaliṅgavattā tadabhinnasyāpi /
GSP33vacbhamu:3170: jīvaliṅgaistu brahma tadvata, tathāca brahmaliṅgānāṃ darśanāt, teṣāṃ ca jīve 'nupapatterbrahmaivopāsyamiti
GSP33vacbhamu:3171: vayaṃ tu paśyāmaḥ-'samāropyasya rūpeṇa viṣayo rūpavānbhavetṣa viṣayasya tu rūpeṇa samāropyaṃ na rūpavat //
GSP33vacbhamu:3172: ' samāropitasya hi rūpeṇa bhujaṅgasya bhīṣaṇatvādinā rajjū rūpavatī, natu rajjūrūpeṇābhigamyatvādinā bhujaṅgo rūpavān /
GSP33vacbhamu:3174: bhujaṅgadaśāyāṃ tu na nāsti vāstavī rajjuḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:3177: tasmādbrahmaliṅgadarśanājjīve ca tadasaṃbhavādbrahmaivopāsyaṃ na jīva iti siddham /
GSP33vacbhamu:3178: etadupalakṣaṇaṇāya ca 'sarvaṃ khalvidaṃ brahma' iti vākyamupanyastamiti //1 //
GSP33vacbhamu:3189: yatparaṃ vedavākyaṃ tattenopāttaṃ vivakṣitam, atatpareṇa cānupāttamavivakṣitamityarthaḥ //2
GSP33vacbhamu:3190: yathā satyasaṃkalpatvādayo brahmaṇyupapadyante, evaṃ śārīre 'pyupapatsyante, śārīrasya brahmaṇo 'bhedāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:3191: śārīraguṇā iva manomayatvādayo brahmaṇītyata āha sūtrakāraḥ- anupapattestu na śārīraḥ. //3 //
GSP33vacbhamu:3192: yattadavocāma samāropyadharmāḥ samāropaviṣaye saṃbhavanti, natu viṣayadharmāḥ samāropya iti
GSP33vacbhamu:3194: atrāha codakaḥ- kaḥ punarayaṃ śārīro nāmeti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:3195: na tāvadbhedapratiṣedhādbhedavpadeśācca bhedābhedāvekatra tāttvikau bhavitumarhato virodhādityuktam
GSP33vacbhamu:3200: para evātmā dehendriyamanobuddhyupādhibhiravicchidyamāno bālaiḥ śārīra ityupacaryate. anādyavidyāvacchedalabdhajīvabhāvaḥ para evātmā svato bhedenāvabhāsate /
GSP33vacbhamu:3201: tādṛśāṃ ca jīvānāmavidyā, natu nirūpādhino brahmaṇaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:3202: na cāvidyāyāṃ satyāṃ jīvātmavibhāgaḥ, sati ca jīvātmavibhāge
GSP33vacbhamu:3205: naca sarvajñasya sarvaśakteśca svataḥ kuto 'kasmātsaṃsāritā, yo hi paratantraḥ so 'nyena bandhanāgāre praveśyeta, natu svatantra iti vācyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:3208: na caitāvatā īśvarasyānīśatā na hyupakaraṇādyapekṣitā kartuḥ svātantryaṃ vihanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:3215: kaṭhavallīṣu paṭhyate-yasya brahma ca kṣatraṃ cobhe bhavata odamaḥ. /
GSP33vacbhamu:3216: mṛtyuryasyopasetacanaṃ ka itthā veda yatra sa iti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:3218: attṛtvaṃ ca bhoktṛtā vā saharntṛtā vā syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:3219: naca prastutasya paramātmano bhoktṛtāsti, 'anaśrannanyo 'abhicākaśīti' iti śrutyā bhoktṛtāpratiṣedhāt
GSP33vacbhamu:3221: tadyadi bhoktṛtvamattṛtvaṃ tato muktasaṃśayaṃ jīvātmaiva pratipattavyaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:3222: brahmakṣatrādi cāsya kāryakāraṇasaṃghāto bhogāyatanatayā vā sākṣādvā /
GSP33vacbhamu:3224: atha tu saṃhartṛtā bhoktṛtā, tatastrayāṇāmagnijīvaparamātmanāṃ praśnopanyāsopalabdheḥ saṃhartṛtvasyāviśeṣādbhavati
GSP33vacbhamu:3226: tatraudanasya bhogyatvena loke prasiddherbhoktṛtvameva prathamaṃ buddhau
GSP33vacbhamu:3229: 'na jāyate mriyate' iti ca tasyaiva stutiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:3233: yadi tu saṃhartṛtvamattṛtvaṃ tathāpyagnirattā, 'agnirannādaḥ' iti śrutiprasiddhibhyām /
GSP33vacbhamu:3236: tatra yadi jīvasya bhogāyatanatayā tatsādhanatayā ca kāryakāraṇasaṃghātaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:3238: nahyodano bhogāyatanaṃ, nāpi bhogasādhanaṃ, api tu bhogyaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:3239: naca bhogāyatanasya bhogasādhanasya vā bhogyatvaṃ mukhyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:3242: kasyacitkrūrasattvasya vyāghrādeḥ kaścidbhavet na tu sarvathā sarvajīvasya
GSP33vacbhamu:3243: tena brahmakṣatraviṣayamapi sarvajīvasyāttṛtvaṃ na vyāpnoti, kimaṅga punarmṛtyūpasecanavyāptaṃ carācaram /
GSP33vacbhamu:3246: naca lākṣaṇikabhogyatvānurodhena 'mṛtyuryasyopasecanam' iti, 'brahma ca kṣatraṃ ca' iti ca śrutī saṃkocamarhataḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:3247: naca brahmakṣatre evātra vivakṣite, mṛtyūpasecanena prāṇabhṛnmātropasthāpanāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:3252: tathāca 'na jāyate mriyate vā vipaścit' iti prakṛtasya na hānaṃ bhaviṣyati /
GSP33vacbhamu:3253: 'ka itthā veda yatra saḥ' iti ca durjñānatopapatsyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:3260: autsargikasya mukhyatābalātpūrvasiddhāntapakṣāsaṃbhavena pakṣāntaraṃ kalpayiṣyata iti manvānaḥ saṃśayamākṣipati- atrāhākṣepteti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:3266: astu vā mukhya eva, tathāpi na doṣa ityāha- yadveti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:3267: svātantryalakṣaṇaṃ hi kartṛtvaṃ tacca pāturiva pāyayiturapyastīti so 'pi
GSP33vacbhamu:3269: ata eva cāhuḥ-'yaḥ kārayati sa karotyeva' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:3270: evaṃ karaṇasyāpi svātantryavivakṣayā kathañcitkartṛtvaṃ, yathā kāṣṭhāni pacantīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:3272: tadevaṃ saṃśayaṃ samādhāya pūrvapakṣaṃ gṛhṇāti- buddhikṣetrajñāviti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:3275: ' naca pibantāvitivatpraviṣṭapadamapi lākṣaṇikaṃ yuktaṃ, sati mukhyārthatve lākṣaṇikārthatvāyogāt, buddhijīvayośca guhāpraveśopapatteḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:3279: jīvo hi bhoktṛtayā buddhiśca bhogasādhanatayā dharmasya gocare sthitau, na tu brahma, tasya tadāyattatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:3281: tatrāpi prete vicikitsāpanuttaye buddherbhedena paralokī jīvo darśanīya iti buddhirucyate
GSP33vacbhamu:3283: brahmaṇaiva sarūpeṇa na tu buddhyā virūpayā //1 //
GSP33vacbhamu:3286: gauḥ sadvitīyetyukte sajātīyenaiva gavāntareṇāvagamyate, na tu vijātīyenāśvādinā /
GSP33vacbhamu:3287: tadiha cetano jīvaḥ sarūpeṇa cetanāntareṇaiva brahmaṇā sadvitīyaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:3289: tadevam 'ṛtaṃ pibantau' ityatra prathamamavagate brahmaṇi tadanurodhena caramaṃ guhāśrayatvaṃ śālagrāme hariritavadvyākhyeyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:3290: bahulaṃ hi guhāśrayatvaṃ brahmaṇaḥ śrutaya āhuḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:3293: evañca prathamāvagatabrahmānurodhena sukṛtalokavartitvamapi tasya lakṣaṇayā chatrinyāyena gamayitavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:3294: chāyātapatvamapi jīvasyāvidyāśrayatayā brahmaṇaśca śuddhaprakaśasvabhāvasya tadanāśrayatayā mantavyam //11 //
GSP33vacbhamu:3295: imameva nyāyaṃ 'dvā suparṇā' ityatrāpyudāharaṇe kṛtvācintayā yojayati- eṣa eva nyāya iti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:3296: atrāpi kiṃ buddhijīvau uta jīvaparamātmānāviti saṃśaṭya karaṇarūpāyā api buddheredhāṃsi pacantītivatkartṛtvopacārābuddhijīvāviha pūrvapakṣayitvā siddhāntayitavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:3298: taddarśanāditi ca 'samāne vṛkṣe puruṣo nimagnaḥ' ityatra mantre /
GSP33vacbhamu:3299: na khalu mukhye kartṛtve saṃbhavati karaṇe kartṛtvopacāro yukta iti
GSP33vacbhamu:3309: astu tarhyasyādhikaraṇasya pūrvapakṣe eva brāhmaṇārthaḥ, vacanāvirodhe nyāyasyābhāsatvādityata āha- nāpyasyādhikaraṇasya pūrvapakṣaṃ bhajata
GSP33vacbhamu:3311: evaṃ hi pūrvapakṣamasya bhajeta, yadi hi kṣetratre saṃsāriṇi paryavasyeta /
GSP33vacbhamu:3312: tasya tu brahmarūpatāyāṃ paryavasyanna pūrvapakṣamapi svīkarotītyarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:3314: tāvetau. sattvakṣetrajñau na ha vā evaṃvidi raja ādhvaṃsata iti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:3316: etāvataiva vidyopasaṃhārājjīvasya brahmātmatāparatāsya lakṣyata ityāha- tāvatā ceti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:3319: anaśnan jīvo brahmābhicākaśītītyukte śaṅkate, yadi jīvo brahmātmanā
GSP33vacbhamu:3320: nāśnāti, kathaṃ tarhyanminbhoktṛtvāvagamaḥ, caitanyasamānādhikaraṇaṃ hi bhoktṛtvamavabhāsata iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:3322: etaduktaṃ bhavati-nedaṃ bhoktṛtvaṃ jīvasya tattvataḥ, apitu buddhisattvaṃ mukhādirupapariṇataṃ citicchāyāpattyopapannacaitanyamiva bhuṅkte natu tattvato jīvaḥ paramātmā bhuṅkte /
GSP33vacbhamu:3331: parokṣaṃ brahma na tathā pratibimbe tu yujyate //1 //
GSP33vacbhamu:3334: 'ṛtaṃ pibantau ityatra hi jīvaparamātmānau prathamamanagatāviti tadanurodhena guhāpraveśādayaḥ paścādavagatā vyākhyātāḥ, tadvidihāpi 'ya
GSP33vacbhamu:3335: eṣo 'kṣiṇi puruṣo dṛśyate' iti pratyakṣābhidhānātprathamamavagate chāyāpuruṣe tadanurodhenāmṛtatvābhayatvādayaḥ stutyā kathañcidvyākhyeyāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:3340: kaṃ ca khaṃ cetyādi tu vākyamagnīnāṃ nācāryavākyaṃ niyantumarhi /
GSP33vacbhamu:3341: 'ācāryastu te gatiṃ vaktā' iti ca gatyantarābhiprāyaṃ, na tūktapariśiṣṭābhiprāyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:3343: saṃbhavamātreṇa tu jīvadevate upanyaste, bādhakāntaropadarśanāya caiṣa dṛśyata ityasyātrābhāvāt
GSP33vacbhamu:3345: evaṃ prāpta ucyate- ya eṣa iti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:3348: ' saṃnihitāśca puruṣātmādiśabdāste ca na yāvatsvārthamabhidadhati tāvatsarvanāmabhyāṃ nārthatuṣo 'bhidhīyata iti kutastadarthasyāparokṣatā /
GSP33vacbhamu:3349: puruṣātmaśabdau ca sarvanāmanirapekṣau svarasato jīve vā paramātmani vā vartete iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:3350: naca tayoṣcakṣuṣi pratyakṣadarśanamiti nirapekṣapuruṣapadapratyāyitārthānurodhena ya eṣa iti dṛśṭata iti ca yathāsaṃbhavaṃ vyākhyeyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:3352: viduṣaḥ śāstrata upalabdireva dṛḍhatayā pratyakṣavaduparyate praśaṃsārthamityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:3353: api ca tadeva caramaṃ prathamānuguṇatayā nīyate yannetuṃ śakyam, alpaṃ ca /
GSP33vacbhamu:3356: tathā sati kiṃ nāma nāmṛtaṃ syāditi vyarthamamṛtapadam /
GSP33vacbhamu:3362: nanu sarvagatasyeśvarasya kasmādviśiṣeṇa cakṣureva sthānamupadiśyata iti,
GSP33vacbhamu:3373: sa eva puṇyaphalāni vāmāni nayati lokamiti vāmanīḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:3376: taduktaṃ śrutyā-'tameva bhāntamanubhāti sarvaṃ tasya bhāsā sarvamidaṃ vibhāti' iti //13
GSP33vacbhamu:3380: sthānino hi sthānaṃ mahadvṛṣṭaṃ, yathā yādasāmabdhiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:3381: tatkathamatyalpaṃ cakṣuradhiṣṭhānaṃ paramātmanaḥ paramamahata iti śaṅkārthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:3383: sthānānyādayo yeṣāṃ te sthānādayo nāmarūpaprakarāsteṣāṃ vyapadeśātsarvagatasyaikasthānaniyamo nāvakalpate /
GSP33vacbhamu:3385: viśeṣatastu brahmaṇastāni tānyupāsanāsthānānīti tairasya yukto vyapadeśaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:3386: apica prakṛtānusārādapi brahmaivātra pratyetavyaṃ, natu pratibimbajīvadevatā ityāha sūtrakāraḥ -sukhaviśiṣṭābhādhānādeva ca. /
GSP33vacbhamu:3387: evaṃ khalūpākhyāyate-upakosalo ha vai kāmalāyanaḥ satyakāme jābāle brahmacaryamuvāsa /
GSP33vacbhamu:3394: brahmavidyāsūcire-'prāṇo brahma kaṃ brahma khaṃ brahma' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:3395: athopakosala uvāca, vijānāmyahaṃ prāṇo brahmeti, sa hi sūtrātmā
GSP33vacbhamu:3397: kintu kaṃ ca khaṃ ca brahmetyetanna vijānāmi /
GSP33vacbhamu:3398: nahi viṣayendriyasaṃparkajaṃ sukhamanityaṃ lokasiddhaṃ khaṃ ca bhūtākāśamacetanaṃ brahma bhavitumarhati
GSP33vacbhamu:3399: athainamagnayaḥ pratyūcuḥ-'yadvāva kaṃ tadeva khaṃ yadeva khaṃ tadeva kam' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:3401: evaṃ saṃbhūyoktvā pratyekaṃ ca svaviṣayāṃ vidyāmūcuḥ-'pṛthivyagnirannamādityaḥ' ityādanā
GSP33vacbhamu:3402: punasta enaṃ saṃbhūyocuḥ, eṣā somya te 'smidvidyā pratyekamuktā svaviṣayā vidyā, ātmavidyā cāsmābhiḥ saṃbhūya pūrvamuktā prāṇo brahma kaṃ khaṃ brahmeti, ācāryastu te gatiṃ vaktā, brahmavidyeyamuktāsmābhirgatimātraṃ tvavaśiṣṭaṃ noktaṃ, tattu vidyāphalaprāptaye jābālastavācāryo
GSP33vacbhamu:3404: evaṃ vyavasthite 'yadvāva kaṃ tadeva khaṃ yadeva khaṃ tadeva kam'
GSP33vacbhamu:3405: ityetadvyācaṣṭe bhāṣyakāraḥ- tatra khaṃśabda iti pratīkābhiprāyeṇeti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:3411: laukikasya mukhasya sādhanapāracantryaṃ kṣayiṣṇutā cāmayastena saha vartata iti sāmayaṃ sukham
GSP33vacbhamu:3415: sukhaśabdasamānādhikaraṇo hi khaṃśabdo bhūtākāśamarthaṃ parityajya brahmaṇi guṇogena vartate
GSP33vacbhamu:3416: tādṛśā ca khena sukhaṃ viśiṣyamāṇaṃ sāmayādvyāvṛttaṃ nirāmayaṃ bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:3419: brahmapadaṃ kaṃpadasyopari prayujyamānaṃ śiraḥ, evaṃ khaṃpadasyāpi brahmapadaṃ śiro yayoḥ kaṅkhaṃpadayoste brahmaśirasī, tayorbhāvo brahmaśirastvam /
GSP33vacbhamu:3420: astu prastute kimāyātamityata āha- tadevaṃ vākyopakrama iti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:3421: nanvagnibhiḥ pūrvaṃ nirdiśyatāṃ brahma, 'ya eṣo 'kṣiṇi' ityācāryavākye 'pa
GSP33vacbhamu:3422: tadevānuvartanīyamiti tu kuta ityāha- ācāryastu te gatiṃ vakteti ca gatimātrābhidhānamiti. yadyapyete bhinnavaktṛṇī vākye tathāpi pūrveṇa vaktnā ekavākyatāṃ gamite,
GSP33vacbhamu:3425: gatirnoktā, tāṃ ca kiñcidadhikamādhyeyaṃ pūrayitvācāryo vakṣyatīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:3428: vīkṣyopakosalamuvāca, brahmavida iva te somya mukhaṃ prasannaṃ bhāti, ko
GSP33vacbhamu:3430: upakosalastu hrīṇo bhītaśca ko nu māmanuśiṣyāt bhagavan proṣite tvayītyāpātato 'pajñāya nirbadhyamāno yathāvadagnīnāmanuśāsanamavocat /
GSP33vacbhamu:3431: tadupakṣutya cācāryaḥ suciraṃ kliṣṭa upakosale samupajātadaryārdrahṛdayaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:3432: pratyuvāca, somya kila tubhyamagnayo na brahma sākalyenāvocan, tadahaṃ tubhyaṃ sākalyena vakṣyami, tadanubhavamāhātmyāt 'yathā puṣpakarapalāśa āpo na śliṣyanta evamevaṃvida pāpaṃ karma na śliṣyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:3433: ityevamuktavatyācārya āhopakosalaḥ, bravītu me bhagavāniti, tasmai hovācācāryo 'rcirādikāṃ gatiṃ vaktumanāḥ, yaduktamagnibhiḥ prāṇo brahma
GSP33vacbhamu:3434: kaṃ brahma khaṃ brahmeti tatparipūraṇāya 'eṣo 'kṣiṇi puruṣo dṛśyate'
GSP33vacbhamu:3436: etaduktaṃ bhavati-ācāryeṇa ye sukhaṃ brahmākṣisthānaṃ saṃyadvāmaṃ vāmanībhāmanītyevaṅguṇakaṃ prāṇasahitamupāsate te sarve 'pahatapāpmāno
GSP33vacbhamu:3437: 'nyatkarma kurvantu mā vākārṣuḥ, arciṣamarcirabhimāninīṃ devatāmabhisaṃbhavanti pratipadyante, arciṣo 'harahardevatāṃ, ahna āpūryamāṇapakṣaṃ śuklapakṣadevatāṃ, tataḥ ṣaṇmāsān, yeṣu māseṣūttarāṃ diśameti savitā te ṣaṇmāsā uttarāyaṇaṃ taddevatāṃ pratipadyante, tebhyo māsebhyaḥ saṃvatsaradevatāṃ, tata ādityaṃ, ādityāccandramasaṃ, candramaso
GSP33vacbhamu:3441: sa tādṛśaḥ puruṣa etānsatyalokasthaṃ kāryaṃ brahma gamayati, sa eṣa devapatho devairarcirādibhirnetṛbhirupalakṣita iti devapathaḥ, sa eva ca
GSP33vacbhamu:3442: brahmaṇā gantavyenopalakṣita iti brahmapathaḥ, etena pathā pratipadyamānāḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:3443: satyalokasthaṃ brahma imaṃ mānavaṃ manoḥ sargaṃ kiṃbhūtamāvartaṃ janmajarāmaraṇapaunaḥ punyamāvṛttistatkartāvarto mānavo lokastaṃ nāvartante /
GSP33vacbhamu:3444: tathāca smṛtiḥ-'brahmaṇā saha te sarve saṃprāpte pratisaṃcare /
GSP33vacbhamu:3450: kalpanāgauravaṃ cāsminpakṣe prasajyata ityāha- nacopāsanākāla iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:3452: vijñānātmano hi na pradeśe upāsanānyatra dṛṣṭacarī, brahmaṇastu tatra śrutapūrvetyarthaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:3459: pravṛttiniyamalakṣaṇaṃ hi kāryaṃ cetanasya śarīriṇaḥ svaśarīrendriyādau vā śarīreṇa vā vāsyādau dṛṣṭaṃ nāśarīrasya brahmaṇo bhavitumarhati /
