GSP33vacbhamu:3462: tasmātparamātmanaḥ śarīrendriyādirahahitasyāntaryāmitvābhāvāt, pradhānasya vā pṛthivyādyabhimānavatyā devatāyā vāṇimādyaiśvaryayogino yogino vā jīvātmano vāntaryāmitā syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:3465: śrutānāmabhāvāt, anātmatvācca 'eṣa ta ātmā' iti śruteranupapatterna pradhānasyāntaryāmitā
GSP33vacbhamu:3466: yadyapi pṛthivyādyabimānino devasyātmatvamasti, adṛṣṭatvādayaśca saha dṛṣṭṛtvādibhirupapadyante, śarīrendriyādiyogācca, 'pṛthivyeva
GSP33vacbhamu:3467: yasyāyatanamagnirloko mano jyotiḥ' ityādiśruteḥ, tathāpi tasya pratiniyataniyamanāt 'yaḥ sarvaṃllokānantaro yamayati yaḥ sarvāṇi bhūtānyantaro yamayati' iti śrutivirodhādanupapatteḥ, yogī tu yadyapi
GSP33vacbhamu:3468: lokabhūtaviśatayā sarvāṃllokānsarvāṇi ca bhūtāni niyantumarhati tatra tatrānekavidhadehendriyādinirmāṇena 'sa ekadhā bhavati tridhā bhavati'
GSP33vacbhamu:3469: ityādiśrutibhyaḥ, tathāpi 'jagadvyāpāravarjaṃ prakaraṇāt' iti vakṣyamāṇena nyāyena vikāraviṣaye vidyāsiddhānāṃ vyāpārabhāvātso 'pi nāntaryāmī /
GSP33vacbhamu:3470: tasmātpāriśeṣyājjīva eva cetano dehendriyādimān dṛṣṭṛtvādisaṃpannaḥ svayamadṛśyādiḥ svātmani vṛttivirodhāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:3473: 'ya ātmani tiṣṭhan' iti cābhede 'pi kathañcidbhedopacārāt 'sa bhagavaḥ kasminpratiṣṭhitaḥ sve mahimni' itivat /
GSP33vacbhamu:3474: 'yamātmā na veda' iti ca svātmani vṛttivirodhābhiprāyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:3475: 'yasyātmā śarīram' ityādi ca sarvaṃ 'sve mahimni' itivadyojanīyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:3476: yadi punarātmano 'pi niyantūranyo niyantā bhavet veditā vā tatastasyāpyanya ityanavasthā syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:3478: tadupārjitau hi dharmājharmau niyacchata ityanayā dvārā jīvo niyacchati /
GSP33vacbhamu:3486: tathāca sarvaṃ vikārajātaṃ tadavidyāśaktipariṇāmastasya śarīrendriyasthāne vartata iti yathāyathaṃ pṛthivyādidevatādikāryakaraṇaistāneva pṛthivyādidevatādīñchaknoti niyantum /
GSP33vacbhamu:3488: nahi niyantrantaraṃ tena niyamyate, kintu yo jīvo niyantā lokasiddhaḥ sa
GSP33vacbhamu:3490: tathāca 'nānyo 'to 'sti draṣṭā' ityādyā api śrutaya upapannārthāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:3495: bhavati, 'yaḥ sarvāṃllokān' 'yaḥ sarvāṇi bhūtāni' ityatra ya ityekavacanamupapadyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:3497: 'ya ātmani tiṣṭhan' ityādau cābhede 'pi bhedopacārakleśo na bhaviṣyati /
GSP33vacbhamu:3520: nityaṃ satkiṃ pariṇāmi nityaṃ, netyāha- avyayam. /
GSP33vacbhamu:3530: na jātu rajjvāṃ kuñjara iti viparyasyanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:3532: tatkasya hetoḥ, atyantavairūpyāt. tasmātpradhānameva jaḍaṃ jaḍasya jagato yoniriti yujyate
GSP33vacbhamu:3538: ato yaḥ pradhānātparaḥ paramātmā sa sarvavit /
GSP33vacbhamu:3540: atha tathāprāmāṇikatvānna tatra parituṣyati, astu tarhi nāmarūpabījaśaktibhūtamavyākṛtaṃ bhūtasūkṣmaṃ, pradīyate hi tena
GSP33vacbhamu:3548: sati bādhake 'syānāśrayaṇaṃ, iha tu bādhakaṃ nāstītyarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:3550: iha tvavidyāśaktereva jagadyonitvasaṃbhave na dvārādvāribhāvo yayukta iti pradhānamevātra vākye jagadyonirucyata iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:3551: atha yoniśabdo nimittakāraṇaparastathāpi brahmaiva nimittaṃ na tu jīvātmeti vinigamanāyāṃ na heturastīti saṃśayena pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:3553: yaḥ sarvajña iti śrutyā sarvajñasya sa ucyate //1 //
GSP33vacbhamu:3559: yattu sārūpyābāvānna cidātmanaḥ pariṇāmaḥ prapañca iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:3563: na khalu bāhyasārūpyanibandhana eva sarvo vibhrama iti niyamanimittamasti /
GSP33vacbhamu:3567: tasmāt paramātmavivartatayā prapañcastadyoniḥ, bhujaṅga iva rajjuvivartatayā tadyoniḥ, na tu tatpariṇāmatayā /
GSP33vacbhamu:3568: tasmāttaddharmasarvavittvokterliṅgāt 'yattadadreśyam' ityatra brahmaivopadiśyate jñeyatvena, natu pradhānaṃ jīvātmā vopāsyatveneti siddham /
GSP33vacbhamu:3569: na kevalaṃ liṅgādapi tu 'parā vidyā' iti samākhyānādapyetadeva pratipattavyamityāha- apica dve vidye iti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:3572: avacchinno hi jīvātmā bogyebhyo viṣayebyo vyatirikta iti tajjñānena na sarvaṃ jñātaṃ bhavati
GSP33vacbhamu:3578: rūpyante 'neneti rūpaṃ, yajño rūpamupādhiryeṣāṃ te yajñarūpāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:3580: ṛtuyajanenopādhinā ṛtvikśabdaḥ pravṛtta iti yajñopādhaya ṛtvijaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:3583: ta ete 'ṣṭādaśa yajñarūpāḥ, yeṣvṛtvigādiṣūktaṃ karma yajñaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:3593: kimāgamikaṃ sāṃkhyābhimataṃ pradhānaṃ, tathāca bahusamañjasaṃ syādityata
GSP33vacbhamu:3596: tadetatparamatenākṣepasamādhānābhyāṃ vyākhyāya svamatena vyācaṣṭe- anye punarmanyanta iti. punaḥśabdo 'pi pūrvasmādviśeṣaṃ dyotayannasyeṣṭatāṃ sūcayati /
GSP33vacbhamu:3599: saṃnidheśca prakaraṇaṃ balīya iti jāyamānaparityāgena viśvayonereva prakaraṇino rūpābhidhānamiti cet na, prakaraṇinaḥ śarīrendriyādirahitasya vigrahavattvavirodhāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:3600: na caitāvatā mūrdhādiśrutayaḥ prakaraṇavirodhātsvārthatyāgena sarvātmatāmātraparā iti yuktam,
GSP33vacbhamu:3602: siddhe ca prakaraṇināsaṃbandhe jāyamānamadhyapātitvaṃ jāyamānagrahaṇe kāraṇamupanyastaṃ bhāṣyakṛtā
GSP33vacbhamu:3603: tasmāddhiraṇyagarbha eva bhagavān prāṇātmanā sarvabhūtāntaraḥ kāryo nirdiśyata iti sāṃpratam
GSP33vacbhamu:3607: prācīna śālasatyayajñendradyumnajanabuḍilāḥ sametya mīmāṃsāṃ cakruḥ- ko na ātmā kiṃ brahmeti. ātmetyukte jīvātmani pratyayo mā bhūdata uktaṃ kiṃ brahmeti /
GSP33vacbhamu:3608: te ca mīmāṃsamānā niścayamanadhigacchantaḥ kaikeyarājaṃ vaiśvanaravidyāvidamupaseduḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:3609: upasadya cocuḥ- ātmanamevemaṃ vaiśvānaraṃ saṃpratyadhyeṣi.smarati tameva no brūhītyupakramya dyusūrvāyvākāśavāripṛthivīnāmiti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:3612: prāṇo vāyuḥ pṛthagvartmātmā pṛthak vartma yasya vāyoḥ sa pṛthagvartmā sa evātmā svabhāve yasya sa pṛthagvartmātmā /
GSP33vacbhamu:3613: saṃdeho dehasya madhyabhāgaḥ sa ākāśo bahulaḥ sarvagatatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:3615: āpaḥ, yato 'dbhyo 'nnamannācca rayirdhanaṃ tasmādāpo rayiruktāstāsāṃ ca mūtrībhūtānāṃ bastiḥ sthānamiti bastireva rayirityuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:3617: tadevaṃ vaiśvānarāvayaveṣu dyusūryānilākāśajalāvaniṣu mūrdhacakṣuḥprāṇasaṃdehabastipādeṣvekaikakasmina vaiśvānarabuddhyā viparītatayopāsakānāṃ prācīnaśālādīnāṃ mūrdhapātāndhatvaprāṇotkramaṇadehaśīrṇatābastibhedapādaślathībhāvadūṣaṇairupāsanānāṃ nindayā mūrdhādisamastabhāvamupadiśyāmnāyate-'yastvetamevaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:3619: sa sarveṣu lokeṣu dyupabhṛtiṣu, sarveṣu bhūteṣu sthāvarajaṅgameṣu,
GSP33vacbhamu:3629: nanu 'ko na ātmā kiṃ brahma' ityupakrame ātmabrahmaśabdayoḥ paramātmani
GSP33vacbhamu:3630: rūḍhatvena taduparaktāyāṃ buddhau vaiśvānarāgnyādayaḥ śabdāstadanurodhena paramātmanyeva kathañcinnetuṃ yujyante natu prathamāvagatau brahmātmaśabdau caramāvagatavaiśvānarādipadānurodhenānyathayituṃ yujyete /
GSP33vacbhamu:3631: yadyapi ca vājasaneyināṃ vaiśvānaravidyopakrame 'vaiśvānaraṃ ha vai bhagavān saṃprati veda taṃ no brūhi' ityatra nātmaśabdau staḥ, tathāpi tatsamānārthaṃ chāndogyavākyaṃ tadupakramamiti tena niścitārthena
GSP33vacbhamu:3637: naca sarvapāpmapradāha iti pāriśeṣyātparamātmaiva vaiśvānara iti niścite kutaḥ punarityamāśaṅkā- śabdādibhyo 'ntaḥ pratiṣṭhānānneti cediti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:3640: api cāntaḥpratiṣṭhatatvaṃ ca prādeśamātratvaṃ ca na sarvavyāpino
GSP33vacbhamu:3647: athavā agniśarīrāyā devatāyā aiśvaryayogāt dyumūrdhatvādaya upapadyanta iti śahkiturabhisaṃdhiḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:3651: na tvatra caramatyānanyathāsiddhiḥ, pratīkopadeśena vā mano brahmetivat,
GSP33vacbhamu:3652: tadupādhyupadeśena vā manomayaḥ prāṇaśarīro bārūpa itivadupapatteḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:3653: vyutpattyā vā vaiśvānarāgniśabdayorbrahmavacanatvānnānyathāsiddhiḥtha tathāca brahmāśrayasya pratyayasyāśrayāntare jāṭharavaiśvānarāhvaye kṣepeṇa vā jāṭhavaiśvānaropādhini vā brahmaṇyupāsye vaiśvānaradharmāṇāṃ brahmadharmāṇāṃ ca samāveśa upapadyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:3654: asaṃbhavāditi sūtrāvayavaṃ vyācaṣṭe- yadi ceha parameśvaro na
GSP33vacbhamu:3656: puruṣamapi cainamadhīyata iti sūtrāvayavaṃ vyācaṣṭe- yadi ca kevala
GSP33vacbhamu:3660: ata eṣa yatpuruṣa iti puruṣamanūdya na vaiśvānaro vidhīyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:3662: evaṃ ca parameśvaradṛṣṭirhi jāṭhare vaiśvānara ihopadaiśyata iti bhāṣyaṃ virudhyeta /
GSP33vacbhamu:3664: 'sa yo haitamevamagniṃ vaiśvānaraṃ puruṣaṃ puruṣavidhaṃ puruṣe
GSP33vacbhamu:3667: tasmāt 'sa eṣo 'gnirvaiśvānaro yat' iti yadaḥ pūrveṇa saṃbandhaḥ, puruṣa iti tu tatra puruṣadṛṣṭerupadeśa iti yuktam //24 //
GSP33vacbhamu:3668: ata eva na devatā bhūtaṃ ca /
GSP33vacbhamu:3670: 'yo bhānunā pṛthivīṃ dyāmutemām' iti mantravarṇo 'pi na kevalauṣṇyaprakāśavibhavamātrasya bhūtāgneramamīdṛśaṃ mahimānamāhaga, api tu brahmavikāratayā tādrūpyeṇeti bhāvaḥ //27 //
GSP33vacbhamu:3672: yadetatprakṛtaṃ mūrdhādiṣu cubukānteṣu puruṣāvayaveṣu dyuprabhṛtīnpṛthivīparyantāṃstrailokyātmano vaiśvānarasyāvayavān saṃpādya puruṣavidhatvaṃ kalpitaṃ tadabhiprāyeṇedamucyate 'puruṣavidhaṃ puruṣe
GSP33vacbhamu:3693: tatraiva trailokyātmano vaiśvānarasyāvayavānsaṃpādayanprādeśamātraṃ vaiśvānaraṃ darśayati atraiva jābālaśrutisaṃvādamāha sūtrakāraḥ- āmananti cainamasmin. /
GSP33vacbhamu:3696: ata eva hi śrutiḥ-'anena jīvenātmanā' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:3700: iti śrīvācaspatimiśraviracite śārīrakamīmaṃsābhāṣyavibhāge bhāmatyāṃ prathamasyādhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ //2 //
GSP33vacbhamu:3707: ' pārāvāramathyapātī hi setuḥ tābhyāmavacchidyamāno jalavidhārako loke
GSP33vacbhamu:3718: tathāca pāravatyamṛtavyatirikte setāvanuśriyamāṇe pradhānaṃ vā sāṃkhyapārikalpitaṃ bhavet
GSP33vacbhamu:3719: tat khalu svakāryopahitamaryādatayā puruṣaṃ yāvadagacchadbhavatīti pāravat, bhavati ca dyubhvādyāyatanaṃ, tatprakṛtitvāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:3722: bhavati cāsya jñānamapavargopayogi, tadabhāve pradhānādvivekena puruṣasyānavadhāraṇādapavanupargāpatteḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:3723: yadi tvasminpramāṇābhāvena na parituṣyasi, astu tarhi nāmarūpabījaśaktibhūtamavyākṛtaṃ bhūtasūkṣmaṃ dyubhvādyāyatanaṃ, tasmin prāmāṇike sarvasyoktasyopapatteḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:3725: atha tu sākṣācchutyuktaṃ dyubhvādyāyatanamādriyame, tato vāyurevāstu /
GSP33vacbhamu:3726: 'vāyunā vai gautama sūtreṇāya ca lokaḥ paraśca lokaḥ sarvāṇi ca bhūtāni saṃdṛbdhāni bhavanti' iti śruteḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:3727: yadi punarasya dyubhvādyāyatanasya sārvajñyaśruteratrāpi na parituṣyami,
GSP33vacbhamu:3728: bhavatu tato hiraṇyagarbha eva bhagavān sarvajñaḥ sūtrātmā dyubhvādyāyatanam /
GSP33vacbhamu:3729: tasya hi kāryatvena pāravattvaṃ cāmṛtātparabrahmaṇo bhedaścetyādi sarvamupapadyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:3730: ayamapi 'vāyunā vai gotama sūtreṇa' iti śrutimupanyasyatā sūcitaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:3736: ' nahi mṛddārumayo mūrtaḥ pārāvāramadhyavartī pāthasāṃ vidhārako
GSP33vacbhamu:3737: lokasiddhaḥ setuḥ pradhānaṃ vāvyākṛtaṃ vā vāyurvā jīvo vā sūtrātmā vābhyupeyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:3739: so 'smākaṃ pāravattāvarjaṃ vidharaṇatvamātreṇa yogamātrādrūḍhiṃ parityajya pravartsyati /
GSP33vacbhamu:3745: tathā cāmṛtasyeti ca seturiti ca brahmaṇi dyubhvādyāyatane upapatsyete /
GSP33vacbhamu:3746: atra ca svaśabdāditi tantroccaritatamātmaśabdāditi ca sadāyatanā iti sacchabdāditi ca brahmaśabdāditi ca sūcayati /
GSP33vacbhamu:3749: āyatanāyatanavbhāvaḥ sarvaṃ brahmeti ca sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ hiraṇyagarbhepyupapadyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:3750: tathāca sa evātrāstvamṛtatvasya seturityāśaṅkya śrutivākyena sāvadhāraṇenottaramāha- tatrāyatanāyatanavadbhāvaśravaṇāditi. /
GSP33vacbhamu:3758: nātra dyubhvādyāyatanasya setunocyate yena pāravattā syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:3759: kintu 'jānatha' iti yajjñānaṃ kīrtitaṃ, yaśca 'vāco vimuñcatha' iti
GSP33vacbhamu:3762: naca prādhānyādeṣa iti sarvanāmnā dyubhvādyāyatanamātmaiva parāmṛśyate, na tu tajjñānavāgvimocane iti sāṃpratam /
GSP33vacbhamu:3769: brahmaṇaśca muktopasṛpyatvaṃ 'yadā sarve pramucyante' ityādau śrutyantare prasiddham /
GSP33vacbhamu:3776: yathā 'carmaṇi dvīpinaṃ hanti' iti carmārthamiti gamyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:3785: svayaṃ ca bhāṣyakṛdatra hetumāha- na copādhiparicchinnasyeti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:3791: kasmātpṛthagyogakaraṇaṃ, yāvatā 'na prāṇabhṛdanumāne' ityeka eva yogaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:3793: 'bhedavyapadeśāt' ityādinā hi prāṇabhṛdeva niṣidhyate, na pradhānaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:3796: na khalu hiraṇyagarbhādiṣu jñāteṣu sarvaṃ jñātaṃ bhavati kintu brahmaṇyeveti //6 //
GSP33vacbhamu:3798: yadi jīvo hiraṇyagarbho vā dyubhvādyāyatanaṃ bhavet, tatastatprakṛtyā
GSP33vacbhamu:3801: naca jīvātmaiva dyubhvādyāyatanaṃ, tathā sati sa evātra kathyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:3802: tatkathanāya ca brahmāpi kathyate, anyathā siddhānte 'pi
GSP33vacbhamu:3805: prāṇabhṛnmātraprasiddhajīvātmadhigamāyātyantānavagatamalaukikaṃ brahmāvabodhyata iti subhāṣitam- yadāpi paiṅgyupaniṣatkṛtena vyākhyāneneti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:3806: tatra hi 'anaśrannanyo 'abhicākaśīti' iti jīva upādhirahitena rūpeṇa brahmasvabhāva udāsīno 'bhoktā darśitaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:3808: tathā cetthaṃbhūtaṃ jīvaṃ kathayatānena mantravarṇena dyubhvādyāyatanaṃ brahmaiva kathitaṃ bhavati, upādhyavacchinnaśca jīvaḥ pratiṣiddho
GSP33vacbhamu:3814: nāradaḥ khalu devarṣiḥ karmavidanātmavittayā śocyamātmānaṃ manyamāno bhagavantamātmajñamājānasiddhaṃ mahāyoginaṃ sanatkumāramupasasāda /
GSP33vacbhamu:3816: tadupaśrutya sanatkumāreṇa 'nāma brahmetyupāstva' ityukte nāradena pṛṣṭaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:3818: tatra sanatkumārasya prativacanam-'vāgvāva nāmno bhūyasī' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:3821: kartavyākartavyavivekaḥ saṃkalpaḥ, tasya kāraṇaṃ pūrvāparaviṣayanimittaprayojananirūpaṇaṃ cittam /
GSP33vacbhamu:3823: prāṇasya ca samastakriyākārakaphalabhedena pitrādyātmatvena ca rathāranābhidṛṣṭāntena sarvapratiṣṭhatvena ca prāṇabhūyastvadarśino
GSP33vacbhamu:3824: 'tivāditvena ca nāmādiprapañcādaśāntādbhūyastvamuktvāpṛṣṭa eva nāradena sanatkumāra ekagranthena 'eṣa tu vā ativadati yaḥ satyenātivadati' iti
GSP33vacbhamu:3826: tadupaśrutya nāradena 'sukhaṃ tveva bhagavo vijijñāse' ityukte sanatkumāraḥ 'yo vai bhūmā tatsukham' ityupakramya bhūmānaṃ vyutpādayāṃbabhūva-'yatra nānyatpaśyati' ityādinā /
GSP33vacbhamu:3828: tatra saṃśayaḥ-kiṃ prāṇo bhūmā syādāho paramātmeti /
GSP33vacbhamu:3832: ' naca prāṇāt kiṃ bhūya iti pṛṣṭam /
GSP33vacbhamu:3835: apica bhūmeti bhāvo na bhavitāramāntareṇa śakyo nirūpayitumiti bhavitāramapekṣamāṇaḥ prāṇasyānantaryeṇa buddhisaṃnidhānāttameva bhavitāraṃ prāpya nirvṛṇoti /
GSP33vacbhamu:3838: na cātmanaḥ prakaraṇādātmaiva buddhaistha iti tasyaiva bhūmā syāditi yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:3843: tadetatsaṃśayabījaṃ darśayatā bhāṣyakāreṇa sūcitaṃ pūrvapakṣasādhanamiti na punaruktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:3844: naca bhūyobhūyaḥ praśnātparamātmaiva nāradena jijñāsita iti yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:3846: tadevaṃ prāṇa eva bhūmeti sthite yadyattadvirodhitayā vacaḥ pratibhāti tattadanuguṇatayā neyam
GSP33vacbhamu:3849: 'eṣa tu vā ativadati' iti tuśabdena prāṇadarśino 'tivādino vyavacchidya satyenātilāditvaṃ vadan kathaṃ prāṇasya bhūmānamabhidadhītetyata āha- prāṇameva tviti /
GSP33vacbhamu:3852: etaduktaṃ bhavati-nāyaṃ tuśabdaḥ prāṇātivāditvādvayavacchinatti, apitu tadativāditvamaparityajya pratyuta tadanukṛṣya tasyaiva prāṇasya satyasya śravaṇamananaśraddhāniṣṭhakṛtibhirvijñānāya niścayāya satyenātivadatīti prāṇavratamevātivāditvamucyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:3856: athāgamāvirodhinyāyaniveśanaṃ mananaṃ, matvā ca guruśiṣyasabrahmacāribhiranusūyubhiḥ saha saṃvādya tattvaṃ śraddhatte /
GSP33vacbhamu:3857: śraddhānantaraṃ ca viṣayāntaradarśī niraktastato vyāvṛttastattvajñānābhyāsaṃ karoti, seyamasya kṛtiḥ prayatnaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:3858: atha tattvajñānābhyāsaniṣṭhā bhavati, yadanantarameva tattvavijñānamanubhavaḥ prādurbhavati
GSP33vacbhamu:3860: apyāhuḥ-'bhūtārthabhāvanāprakarṣaparyantajaṃ yogijñānam' iti bhāvanāprakarṣasya prayanto niṣṭhā tasmājjāyate tattvānubhava iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:3861: tasmātprāṇa eva bhūmeti prāpte 'bhidhīyate-'eṣa tu vā ativadati yaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:3863: tatra satyaśabdaḥ paramārthe nirūḍhavṛttiḥ śrutyā paramārthamāha /
GSP33vacbhamu:3866: tathāca 'eṣa tu vā ativadati yaḥ satyenātivaditi' iti brahmaṇo 'tivāditaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:3867: śrutyānyanirapekṣayā liṅgādibhyo balīyasyāvagamitaṃ kathamiva saṃnidhānamātrāt śrutyādyapekṣādatidurbalātkathaṃ citprāṇaniṣayatvena śakyaṃ vyākhyātum /
GSP33vacbhamu:3868: evaṃ ca prāṇādūrdhvaṃ brahmaṇi bhūtāmavagamyamāno na prāṇaviṣayo
GSP33vacbhamu:3870: evaṃ cānātmavida ātmānaṃ vividiṣornāradasya praśne paramātmānamevāsmai vyākyāsyāmītyabhisaṃdhimānsanatkumāraḥ sopānārohaṇanyāyena sthūlādārabhya tattadbhūmavyutpādanakrameṇa bhūmānamatidurjñānatayā paramasūkṣmaṃ vyutpādayāmāsa /
GSP33vacbhamu:3871: naca praśnapūrvatāpravāhapatitenottareṇa sarveṇa praśnapūrveṇaiva bhavitavyamiti niyamo 'stītyādisugamena bhāṣyeṇa vyutpaditam /
GSP33vacbhamu:3872: vijñānādisādhanaparamparā mananaśraddhādiḥ, prāṇāntare cānuśāsane tatāvanmātreṇaiva prakaraṇasamāpterna prāṇasyānyāyattatocyeta /
GSP33vacbhamu:3873: tadabhidhāne hi sāpekṣatvena na prakaraṇaṃ samāpyeta /
GSP33vacbhamu:3874: tasmānnedaṃ prāṇasya prakaraṇamapi tu yadāyattaḥ prāṇastasya, sa cātmetyātmana eva prakaraṇam
GSP33vacbhamu:3879: saṃdaṃśanyāyena hi bhrūma etatprakaraṇaṃ, sa codbhūmā prāṇaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:3882: na kevalaṃ śruterbhūmātmatā paramātmanaḥ, liṅgādapītyāha sūtrakāraḥ- dharmopapatteśca. /
GSP33vacbhamu:3883: yadapi pūrvapakṣiṇā kathañcinnītaṃ tadanubhāṣya bhāṣyakāro dūṣayati -yo
GSP33vacbhamu:3896: sarvaṃ hi rūpadheyaṃ nāmadheyasaṃbhinnamanubhūyate, gaurayaṃ vṛkṣo 'yamiti
GSP33vacbhamu:3905: 'tadyathā śaṅkunā sarvāṇi saṃtṛṇṇānyevamoṅkāreṇa sarvā vāk' iti śruteḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:3906: ata oṃkārātmakāḥ pṛthivyādayo 'mbarāntā iti varṇā evākṣaraṃ na paramātmeti prāptam /
GSP33vacbhamu:3907: evaṃ prāpte 'bhidhīyate-akṣaraṃ paramātmaiva, na tu varṇāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:3910: na khalvambarāntāni pṛthivyādīni varṇā dhārayitumarhanti, kintu paramātmaiva /
GSP33vacbhamu:3912: naca nāmadheyātmakaṃ rūpadheyamiti yuktaṃ, svarūpabhedāt, upāyabhedāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:3915: rūpadheyāni tu ghaṭapaṭādīni ghaṭatvapaṭatvādisāmānyātmakāni cakṣurādīndriyāgrāhyāṇi madhudhāraṇaprāvaṇādyarthakriyāṇi ca bhedenānubhūyante iti kuto nāmasaṃbhedaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:3917: na khalu śabdātmako 'yaṃ piṇḍa ityanubhavaḥ, kintu yo nānādeśakālasaṃplutaḥ piṇḍaḥ so 'yaṃ saṃnihitadeśakāla ityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:3920: piṇḍa eva hi dṛṣṭaḥ sansaṃjñāṃ smārayituṃ kṣamaḥ //1 //
GSP33vacbhamu:3921: saṃjñā hi smaryamāṇāpi pratyakṣatvaṃ na bādhate /
GSP33vacbhamu:3922: saṃjñinaḥ sā taṭasthā hi na rūpācchādanakṣamā //2 // iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:3928: ye tu pradhānaṃ pūrvapakṣayitvānena sūtreṇa paramātmaivākṣaramiti siddhāntayanti cairambarāntadhṛterityanena kathaṃ pradhānaṃ nirākriyata iti vācyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:3934: nahyavaśyaṃ prāptipūrvakā eva pratiṣedhā bhavanti, aprāpteṣvapi nityānuvādānāṃ darśanāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:3938: praśāsanamājñā cetanadharmo nācetane pradhāne vāvyākṛte vā saṃbhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:3944: anenaiva sūtreṇa jīvasyāpyakṣaratā niṣiddhetyata āha- tatheti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:3948: akṣarasya cakṣurādyupādhiṃ vārayantī śrutiraupādhikasya jīvasyākṣaratāṃ niṣedhatītyarthaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:3954: ' 'brahma veda brahmaiva bhavati' iti śruteḥ sarvagataparabrahmavedena
GSP33vacbhamu:3955: tadbhāvāpattau 'sa sāmabhirunnīyate brahmalokam iti na deśaviśeṣaprāptirupapadyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:3957: na cekṣaṇasya loke tattvaviṣayatvena prasiddheḥ parasyaiva
GSP33vacbhamu:3960: paro hi puruṣo dhyānaviṣayaḥ, parātparastu darśanaviṣayaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:3961: naca tattvaviṣayameva sarvaṃ darśanaṃ, anṛtaviṣayasyāpi tasya darśanāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:3962: naca mananaṃ darśanaṃ, tacca tattvaviṣayameveti sāṃpratam /
GSP33vacbhamu:3977: tadanurodhena ca parātpara ityatra parāditi jīvaghanaviṣayaṃ draṣṭavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:3978: tasmāttu paraḥ puruṣo dhyātavyaśca draṣṭavyaśca bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:3979: tadidamuktam- na cātra jīvaghanaśabdena prakṛto 'bhidhyātavyaḥ paraḥ puruṣaḥ parāmṛśyateḥ.kintu jīvaghanāt parāt paro yo dhyātavyo draṣṭavyaśca tameva kathayituṃ jīvaghano jīvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:3983: sa hi samastakaraṇātmanaḥ sūtrātmano hiraṇyagarbhasya bhagavato nivāsabhūmitayā karaṇaparivṛtānāṃ jīvānāṃ saṃghāta iti bhavati jīvaghanaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:3985: ata eva cāsya deśaviśeṣādhigatiḥ phalamupādhimattvāt, krameṇa ca samyagdarśanotpattau muktiḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:3986: 'brahma veda brahmaiva bhavati' iti tu nirupādhibrahmavedanaviṣayā śrutiḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:3989: 'atha yadidamāsmin brahmapure daharam' sūkṣmaṃ guhāprāyaṃ puṇḍarīkasaṃniveśaṃ veśma 'daharo
GSP33vacbhamu:3990: 'sminnantarākāśastasminyadantastadanveṣṭavyam' āgamācāryopadeśābhyāṃ śravaṇaṃ ca, tadavirodhinā tarkeṇa mananaṃ ca, tadanveṣaṇam /
GSP33vacbhamu:3995: tatra prathamaṃ tāvadevaṃ saṃśayaḥ-kiṃ daharākāśādanyadeva kiñcidanveṣṭavyaṃ vijijñāsitavyaṃ ca uta daharākāśa iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:3996: yadāpi daharākāśo 'nveṣṭavyastadāpi kiṃ bhūtākāśa āho śārīra ātmā kiṃ vā paramātmeti /
GSP33vacbhamu:3999: tatra prathamaṃ tāvadbhūtākāśa eva dahara iti pūrvapakṣayati -tatrākāśaśabdasya bhūtākāśe rūḍhatvāditi. /
GSP33vacbhamu:4000: eṣa tu bahutarottarasaṃdarbhavirodhāttucchaḥ pūrvapakṣa ityaparitoṣeṇa pakṣāntaramālambate pūrvapakṣī-athavā jīvo dahara iti prāptam /
GSP33vacbhamu:4007: tadiha śarīraṃ brahmavikāro 'pi na brahmaṇā vyapadeṣṭavyam, brahmaṇaḥ sarvavikārakāraṇatvenātisādhāraṇyāt
GSP33vacbhamu:4009: apica brahmapura iti saptamyadhikaraṇe smaryate, tenādheyenānena saṃbaddhavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:4010: naca brahmaṇaḥ sve mahimni vyavasthitasyānādheyasyādhārasaṃbandha kalpate
GSP33vacbhamu:4012: tasmādbrahmaśabdo rūḍhiṃ parityajya dehādibṛṃhaṇatayā jīve yaugike vā bhākto vā vyākhyeyaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:4017: jīvasya puraṃ bhavatu śarīraṃ, puṇḍarīkadaragocaratā tvanyasya bhaviṣyati,
GSP33vacbhamu:4018: vatsarājasya pura ivojjayinyāṃ bhaitrasya sajñmetyata āha- tatra purasvāmina iti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:4019: ayamarthaḥveśma khalvadhikaraṇamanirdiṣṭhādheyamādheyaviśeṣāpekṣāyāṃ purasvāminaḥ prakṛtatvāttenaivādheyena saṃbaddhaṃ sadanapekṣaṃ nādheyāntareṇa saṃbandhaṃ kalpayati /
GSP33vacbhamu:4020: nanu tathāpi śarīramevāsya bhogāyatanamiti ko hṛdayapuṇḍarīkasya viseṣo yattadevāsya sajñmetyata āha- manaupādhikaśca jīva iti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:4021: nanu mano 'pi calatayā sakaladehavṛtti paryāyeṇetyata āha- manaśca
GSP33vacbhamu:4029: agatyā bhedamāropya gatau satyāṃ na yujyate //
GSP33vacbhamu:4030: ' asti tu daharākāśasya brahmatvena bhūtākāśādbhedenopamānasya gatiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:4033: na bhūtākāśamānatvaṃ brahmaṇo 'tra vidhīyate, yena 'jyāyānākāśāt' iti śrutivirodhaḥ syāt, api tu bhūtākāśopamānena puṇḍarīkopādhiprāptaṃ daharatvaṃ nivartyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:4034: apica sarva evottare hetavo daharākāśasya bhūtākāśatvaṃ vyāsedhantītyāha-
GSP33vacbhamu:4036: nāpi daharākāśo jīva ityāha- yadyapyātmaśabda iti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:4039: ' dehe hi brahmopalabhyata ityasādhāraṇatayā deho brahmapuramiti
GSP33vacbhamu:4042: astu vā brahmapuraṃ jīvapuraṃ, tathāpi yathā vatsarājasya pure ujjayinyāṃ maitrasya sajñma bhavati, evaṃ jīvasya pure hṛtpuṇḍarīkaṃ brahmasadanaṃ bhaviṣyati, uttarebhyo brahmaliṅgebhyo brahmaṇo 'vadhāraṇāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:4043: brahmaṇo hi bādhake pramāṇe balīyasi jīvasya ca sādhake pramāṇe sati brahmaliṅgāni kathañcidabhedavivakṣayā jīve vyākhyāyante /
GSP33vacbhamu:4044: na ceha brahmaṇo bādhakaṃ pramāṇaṃ, sādhakaṃ vāsti jīvasya /
GSP33vacbhamu:4047: tasmāt sati saṃbhave brahmaṇi, talliṅgānāṃ nābrahmaṇi vyākhyānamucitamiti
GSP33vacbhamu:4049: śravaṇamananamanuvidya brahmānubhūya caraṇaṃ cārasteṣāṃ kāmeṣu caraṇaṃ bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:4051: daharākāśasyānveṣyatve siddhe tatra vicāro yujyate, natu tadanveṣṭavyam,
GSP33vacbhamu:4058: athākāśaparameva kasmānna bhavatītyata āha- taṃ cedbrūyariti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:4060: tadvāva vijijñāsitavyam' ityupadiṣṭe 'tevāsinākṣiptam-'kiṃ tadatra vidyate yadanveṣṭavyam'
GSP33vacbhamu:4073: no khalvabhyupagamā eva doṣatvena ityata āha- tatra vākyaśeṣa iti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:4074: vākyaśeṣo hi daharākāśātmavedanasya phalavattvaṃ brūte, yacca phalavat tatkartavyatayā codyate, yacca kartavyaṃ tadicchitīti 'tadanveṣṭavyaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:4079: tataścākāśādhārau tāveva parāmṛśyate ityata āha- asminkāmāḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:4084: nanu satyakāmajñānasyaitatphalaṃ, tadanantaraṃ nirdeśāt, na tu daharākāśavedanasyetyata āha- samuccayārthena caśabdeneti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:4085: 'asminkāmāḥ' iti ca 'eṣaḥ' iti caikavacanāntaṃ na dve dyāvāpṛthivyau parāmnaṣṭumarhatīti daharākāśa eva parāmraṣṭavya iti samudāyārthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:4086: tadanena krameṇa 'tasminyadantaḥ' ityatra tacchabdo 'nantaramapyākāśamatilaṅgasya hṛtpuṇḍarīkaṃ parāmṛśatatyuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:4089: uttarebhya ityasya prapañcaḥ etameva daharākāśaṃ prakramya batāho kaṣṭamidaṃ vartate jantūnāṃ tattvāvabodhavikalānāṃ, yadebhiḥ svādhīnamapi brahma na prāpyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:4090: tadyathā cirantananirūḍhanibiḍamalapihitānāṃ kaladhautaśakalānāṃ pathi patitānāmuparyapari saṃcaradbhirapi pānthairdhanāyadbhirgrāvakhṇḍanivahavibhrameṇaitāni nopādiyanta ityabisaṃdhimatī sādbhutamiva sakhedamiva śrutaḥ pravartate-'imāḥ sarvāḥ prajā aharahargacchantya etaṃ brahmalokaṃ na vindanti' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:4091: svāpakāle hi sarva evāyaṃ vidvānavidvāṃśca jīvaloko hṛtpuṇḍarīkāśrayaṃ daharākāśākhyaṃ brahmalokaṃ prāpto 'pyanādyavidyātamaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:4093: so 'yaṃ brahmalokaśabdastadgatiśca pratyahaṃ jīvalokasya daharākāśasyaiva brahmarūpalokatāmāhatuḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:4094: tadetadāha bhāṣyakāraḥ- itaśca parameśvara eva daharo yasmāddaharavākyaśeṣa iti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:4098: yadyapi suṣuptasya brahmabhāve laukikaṃ na pramāṇāntaramasti, tathāpi vaidikīmeva prasiddhiṃ sthāpayitumucyate, īdṛśī nāmeyaṃ vaidiko
GSP33vacbhamu:4100: yathā śrutyantare yathā ca loke tatheha brahmalokaśabdo 'pīti yojanā /
GSP33vacbhamu:4108: vyāvartayaddaharākāśaprāptāvevāvatiṣṭhate, naca daharākāśo brahmaṇo lokaḥ kintu tadbrahmeti brahma ca tallokaśceti karmadhārayaḥ siddho bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:4111: yatkhalu puṇḍarīkasthamantaḥkaraṇaṃ tasminviśuddhe pratyāhṛtetarakaraṇānāṃ yogināṃ nirmala ivodake candramaso bimbamatisvacchaṃ caitanyaṃ jyotiḥsvarūpaṃ brahmāvalokyata iti //15 //
GSP33vacbhamu:4115: kutaḥ, asya dhāraṇalakṣaṇasya mahimno 'sminneveśvara eva śrutyantareṣūpalabdheḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:4119: sāṃpratikī, yathā rathāṅganāmā cakravāka iti lakṣaṇā,
GSP33vacbhamu:4121: ye tvākāśaśabdo brahmaṇyapi mukhya eva nabhovadityācakṣate, taiḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:4122: 'anyāyaścānekārthatvam' iti ca 'ananyalabhyaḥ śabdārthaḥ' iti ca mīmāṃsakānāṃ mudrābhedaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:4125: naca brahmaṇyeva mukhyo nabhasi tu tenaiva guṇayogena vartsyatīti vācyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:4127: nanu 'yāvanvā ayamākāśastāvāneṣo 'ntarhṛdaya ākāśaḥ' iti vyatirekanirdeśānna lakṣaṇā yuktā
GSP33vacbhamu:4128: nahi bhavati gaṅgāyāḥ kūlamiti vivakṣite gaṅgāyā gaṅgeti prayogaḥ tatkimidānīṃ 'paurṇamāsyāṃ paurṇamāsyā yajeta' 'amāvasyāyāmamāvāsyayā'
GSP33vacbhamu:4131: yaccoktaṃyatra śabdārthapratītistatra lakṣaṇā' yatra punaranyārthe niścite
GSP33vacbhamu:4136: naca 'ya evaṃ vidvān paurṇamāsīṃ yajeta ya evaṃ vidvānamāvāsyām' ityatra paurṇamāsyamāvāsyāśabdau na lākṣaṇikau /
GSP33vacbhamu:4139: samyak prasīdatyasmin jīvo viṣayendriyasaṃyogajanitaṃ kāluṣyaṃ jahātīti suṣuptiḥ saṃprasādo jīvasyāvasthābedaḥ na brahmaṇaḥ tathā śarīrātsamutthānamapi śarīrāśrayasya jīvasya, natvanāśrayasya brahmaṇaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:4141: evaṃ vākyaśeṣagatābhyāmeva saṃprasādasamutthānābhyāṃ daharākāśo jīvaḥ kasmānnāvagamyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:4144: saṃprasādasamutthanābhyāṃ hi jīvaparāmarśo na jīvaparaḥ, kintu tadīyatāttvikarūpabrahmabhāvaparaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:4145: tathā caiṣa parāmarśo brahmaṇa eveti na saṃprasādasamutthāne jīvaliṅgam,
GSP33vacbhamu:4146: api tu brahmaṇa eva tādarthyādityagre vakṣyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:4149: daharākāśameva prakṛtyopākhyāyate-yamātmānamanviṣya sarvaṃśca lokānāpnoti sarvāṃśca kāmān, tamātmānaṃ vividiṣantau surāsurarājavindrivirocanau
GSP33vacbhamu:4151: āgatya ca dvātriṃśataṃ varṣāṇi tatparicaraṇaparau brahmacaryamūṣatuḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:4153: tāvūcatuḥ, ya ātmāpahatapāpmā tamāvāṃ vividiṣāva iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:4154: tataḥ prajāpatiruvāca, ya eṣo 'kṣiṇi puruṣo dṛśyate eṣa
GSP33vacbhamu:4158: prajāpatiṃ ca prapacchatuḥ, atha yo 'yaṃ bhagavo 'psu dṛśyate, yaścādarśo,
GSP33vacbhamu:4159: yaśca svaṅgādau katama eteṣvasau atavaika eva sarveṣviti /
GSP33vacbhamu:4161: asmābhirakṣisthāna ātmopadiṣṭaḥ, etau ca chāyāpuruṣaṃ pratipannau, tadyadi vayaṃ bhrāntau stha iti brūmastataḥ svātmani samāropitapāṇḍityabahumānau vimānitau santau daurmanasyena yathāvadupadeśaṃ na gṛhṇīyātām,
GSP33vacbhamu:4169: punaretayośchāyātmavibhramamapaninīṣuryathaiva hi chāyāpuruṣa upajanāpāyadharmābhedenāvagamyamāna ātmalakṣaṇavirahānnātmaivevamevedaṃ śarīraṃ nātmā, kintu tato bhinnamityanvayavyatirekābhyāmetau
GSP33vacbhamu:4172: tau ca sādhvalaṅkṛtau suvasanau chinnanakhalomānau bhūtvā tathaiva cakratuḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:4174: tadupaśrutya prajāpatiraho batādyāpi na praśānta enayorvibhramaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:4178: tayorvirocano dehānupātitvācchāyāyā deha evātmatattvamiti matvā nijasadanamāgatya tathaivāsurānupadiśyate
GSP33vacbhamu:4179: devendrastvaprāptanijasadano 'dhvanyeva kiñcidvaralakalmaṣatayā chāyātmani śarīrahuṇadoṣānuvidhāyini taṃ taṃ doṣaṃ paribhāvayan nāhamatra
GSP33vacbhamu:4180: chāyātmadarśane bhogyaṃ paśyāmīti prajāpatisamīpaṃ samitpāṇiḥ punarevevāya āgataśca prajāpatināgamanakāraṇaṃ pṛṣṭaḥ pathi paribāvitaṃ jagad /
GSP33vacbhamu:4182: tatpunarapi tatprakṣayāyā carāparāṇi dvātriṃśataṃ varṣāṇi brahmacaryaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:4184: sa ca tathā caritatbrahmacaryaḥ surendraḥ prajāpatimupasasāda /
GSP33vacbhamu:4186: darśitaḥ so 'yaṃ ya eṣa svapne mahiyamāno vanitādibhiranekadhā svapnopabhogān bhuñjāno virahatīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:4188: yadyapyayaṃ chāyāpuruṣavanna śarīradharmānanupatati, tathāpi śokabhayādivividhabādhānubhavānna tatrāpyasti svastiprāptirityuktavati maghavati punaraparāṇi cara dvātriṃśataṃ varṣāṇi svacchaṃ brahmacaryamidānīmapyakṣīṇakalmaṣo 'sītyūce prajāpatiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:4189: athāsminnevaṅkāramupasanne maghavati prajāpatiruvāca, ya eṣa ātmāpahatapāpmādiguṇo darśito 'kṣiṇi ca svapne ca sa eṣa yo
GSP33vacbhamu:4192: yathā hi jāgradvā svapnagato vāyamahamasmīti imāni bhūtāmani ceti vijānāti naivaṃ suṣuptaḥ kiñcidapi vedayate, tadā khalvayamacetayamāno 'bhāvaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:4195: eva muktavati maghavati batādyāpi na te kalmaṣakṣayo 'bhūt /
GSP33vacbhamu:4198: caturthe ca paryāye pañca varṣāṇītyekottaraṃ śataṃ varṣāṇi brahmacaryaṃ carataḥ sahasrākṣasya sopedire /
GSP33vacbhamu:4199: athāsmai brahmacaryasaṃpadunmṛditakalmaṣāya maghavate ya eṣo 'kṣiṇi yaśca svapne suṣupte anusyūta eṣa ātmāpahatapāpmādiguṇako darśitaḥ, tameva
GSP33vacbhamu:4200: 'maghavan martyaṃ vai śarīram' ityādinā vispaṣṭaṃ vyācaṣṭe prajāpatiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:4202: śarīrendriyāntaḥkaraṇasaṃbandhi, na tvātmanaḥ. sa punaretāneva śarīrādīn
GSP33vacbhamu:4204: yadā tvayamapahatapāpmatvādilakṣaṇamudāsīnamātmānaṃ caitanyānandaghane rūpe vyavasthitaḥ samastalokakāmān prāpto bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:4205: etasyaiva hi paramānandasya mātrāḥ sarve kāmāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:4209: ' evaṃ vyavasthita uttarādvākyasaṃdarbhātprājāpatyāt akṣiṇi ca svapne
GSP33vacbhamu:4210: suṣupte ca caturtho ca paryāye 'eṣa saṃprasādo 'smāccharīrātsamutthāya'
GSP33vacbhamu:4216: jīvasya caitat sarvamiti sa evāpahatapāpmādiguṇaḥ śrutyokta iti nāpahatapāpmādibiḥ paraṃ brahma gamyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:4223: pāpmādiḥ śarīrādyabhāve na bhavati dhūma iva dhūmadhvajābāva iti śaṅkārthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:4225: ayamabhisaṃdhiḥ-paurvāparyālocanayā tāvadupaniṣadāṃ śuddhabuddhamuktamekamaprapañcaṃ brahma tadatiriktaṃ ca sarvaṃ tadvivarto rajjoriva bhujaṅga ityatra tātparyamavagamyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:4226: tathāca jīvo 'pyavidyākalpitadehendriyādyupahitaṃ rūpaṃ brahmaṇo na tu svabāvikaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:4228: āvirbhūtabrahmarūpe tu nirupādhau saṃbhavanto brahmaṇa eva na jīvasya /
GSP33vacbhamu:4229: evaṃ ca brahmaivāpahatāpāpmādiguṇaṃ śrutyuktamiti tadeva daharākāśo na jīva iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:4231: svarūpāvirbhāve cedbrahmaiva na jīvaḥ, tarhi vipratiṣiddhamidamabhidhīyate jīva āvirbhūtasvarūpa iti, ata āha- bhūtapūrvagatyeti /
GSP33vacbhamu:4235: dehendriyādyapyupajanāpāyadha4makaṃ nātmetyudaśarāvadṛṣṭāntena śarīrātmatāyā vyutthānaṃ bādha iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:4237: dravyāntarasaṃsṛṣṭaṃ hi tenābhibhūtaṃ tasmādvivicyamānaṃ vyajyate hematārakādi /
GSP33vacbhamu:4240: dṛṣṭyādayo hyasya svarūpaṃ, te ca saṃsārāvasthāyāṃ bhāsanta iti kathaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:4248: yadyapi sphaṭikādayo japākusumādisaṃnihitāḥ, saṃnidhānaṃ ca saṃyuktasaṃyogātmaka, tathā ca saṃyuktāḥ, tathāpi na sākṣājjapādikusumasaṃyogina ityetāvatā dṛṣṭācintatā iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:4253: tadanena śravaṇamananadhyānābhyāsādvivekavijñānamuktvā tasya vivekavijñānasya phalaṃ kevalātmarūpasākṣātkāraḥ svarūpeṇābhiniṣpattiḥ, sa ca sākṣātkāro vṛttirūpaḥ prapañcamātraṃ pravilāpayan svayamapi prapañcarūpatvātkatakaphalavatpravilīyate tathāca nirmṛṣṭanikhilaprapañcajālamanupasargamaparādhīnaprakāśamātmajyotiḥ siddhaṃ bhavati
GSP33vacbhamu:4255: atra copasaṃpattāvuttarakālāyāmapi ktvāprayogo mukhaṃ vyādāya svapitītīvanmantavyaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:4256: yadhā ca vivikesākṣātkāraḥ śarīrātsamutthānaṃ, na tu śarīrāpādānakaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:4259: na kevalaṃ 'sa yoha vai tatparamaṃ brahma veda brahmaiva bhavati'
GSP33vacbhamu:4263: praticchāyātmavajjīvaṃ paramātmano vastuto bhinnamapyamṛtābhayātmatvena grāhayitvā paścātparamātmānamṛtābhayādimantaṃ prajāpatirgrāhyati, na tvayaṃ jīvasya paramātmabhāvamācaṣṭe chāyātmana ivetyata āha- nāpi praticchāyātmāyamakṣilakṣita iti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:4266: kiñca dvitīyādiṣvapi paryāyeṣu 'etaṃ tveva te bhūyo 'nuvyākhyāyasyāmi'
GSP33vacbhamu:4267: ityupakramātprathamaparyāyanirdiṣṭo na chāyāpuruṣaḥ, api tu tato 'nyo
GSP33vacbhamu:4268: dṛṣṭātmeti darśayati, anyathā prajāpateḥ pratārakatvaprasaṅgādityata āha-
GSP33vacbhamu:4270: atha chāyāpuruṣa eva jīvaḥ kasmānna bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:4271: tathāca chāyāpuruṣa evaitamiti parāmṛśyata ityata āha- kiñcāhamadya svapne hastinamiti. kiñcite samuccayābhidhānaṃ pūrvopapattisāhityaṃ brūte, tacca śaṅkānirākaraṇadvāreṇa /
GSP33vacbhamu:4278: kena prakareṇa na jānātītyata āha- ayamahamasmīmāni bhūtāni ceti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:4280: 'nahi vijñāturvijñāterviparilopo vidyate 'vināśitvāt' ityanenāvināśitvaṃ siddhavaddhetukurvatā suptotthitasyātmapratyabhijñānamuktam, ya evāhaṃ jāgaritvā suptaḥ sa evaitarhi jāgarmīti ācāryadeśayamatamāha- kecittviti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:4281: yadi hyetamityanenānantaroktaṃ cakṣuradhiṣṭhānaṃ puruṣaṃ parāmṛśṭa tasyātmatvamucyeta tato na bhavecchāyāpuruṣaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:4289: kartā bhoktā ca vastuto bhavet, tatastadāśrayāḥ karmavidhaya uparudhyeran
GSP33vacbhamu:4292: na cābhede brahmaṇo jīvānāṃ brahmaguṇānāmasaṃbhavo jīveṣviti teṣāmabhiprāyaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:4296: naca vastusato brahmaṇo guṇāḥ samāropiteṣu jīveṣu saṃbhavanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:4297: no khalu vastusatyā rajjvā dharmāḥ sevyatvādayaḥ samāropite bhujaṅge saṃbhavinaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:4300: avidyākalpitaṃ ca kartṛtvabhoktṛtvaṃ yathālokasiddhamupāśritya karmavidhayaḥ pravṛttāḥ, śyenādividhaya iva niṣiddhe 'pi 'na hiṃsyātsarvā
GSP33vacbhamu:4304: nanu brahmacedatra vaktavyaṃ kṛtaṃ jīvaparāmarśenetyuktamityata āha- anyārthaśca parāmarśaḥ. /
GSP33vacbhamu:4305: jīvasyopādhikalpitasya brahmabhāva upadeṣṭavyaḥ, na cāsau jīvamaparāmṛśya
GSP33vacbhamu:4313: ' balīyasā hi saureṇa tejasā mandaṃ tejaścandratārakādyabhibhūyamānaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:4315: ye 'pi pidhāyakāḥ pradīpasya gṛhaghaṭādayo na te svabhāsā pradīpaṃ bhāsayitumīśate /
GSP33vacbhamu:4316: śrūyate ca-'tasya bhāsā sarvamidaṃ vibhāti' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:4319: nahi gāvo varāhamanudhāvantīti kṛṣṇavihaṅgānudhāvanamupapadyate gavām, api tu tādṛśasūkarānudhāvanam
GSP33vacbhamu:4320: tasmādyadyapi 'yasmin dyauḥ pṛthivī cāntarikṣamotam' iti brahma prakṛtaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:4323: tatra taṃ tasyeti ca sarvanāmapadāni pradarśanīyamevāvamrakṣyanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:4325: nahi 'tena raktaṃ rāgāt' 'tasyāpatyam' ityādau pūrvoktaṃ kiñcidasti /
GSP33vacbhamu:4326: tasmātpramāṇāntarāpratītamapi tejo 'ntaramalaukikaṃ śabdādupāsyatvena gamyata iti prāpte ucyate-'brahmaṇyeva hi talliṅgaṃ na tu tejasyalaukike /
GSP33vacbhamu:4327: tasmānna tadupāsyatve brahma jñeyaṃ tu gamyate //
GSP33vacbhamu:4329: sūryādīnāmanubhānamupapadyatām, kiṃvā 'bhārūpaḥ satyasaṃkalpaḥ' iti śrutyantaraprasiddhena brahmaṇo bhānena sūryādīnāṃ bhānamupapādyatāmiti
GSP33vacbhamu:4330: viśaye na śrutasaṃbhave 'śrutasya kalpanā yujyata ityaprasiddhaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:4331: nālaukikamupāsyaṃ tejo yujyate, api tu śrutiprasiddhaṃ brahmaiva jñeyamiti /
GSP33vacbhamu:4336: tathā tadeva cākṣuṣaṃ tejo bāhyasauryāditejāpyāyitaṃ rūpādi prakāśayati
GSP33vacbhamu:4339: nahi tejontarasya tejo 'ntarāpekṣāṃ vyāsedhāmaḥ, kintu tadbhānamanubhānam /
GSP33vacbhamu:4347: vanhyayaḥ piṇḍayostu yadyapi dahanakriyā na bhidyate tathāpi dravyabhedena kriyābhedaṃ kalpayitvā kriyāsādṛśyaṃ vyākhyeyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:4348: tadevamanukṛteriti vibhajya tasya ceti sūtrāvayavaṃ vibhajate- tasya ceti caturthamiti. jyotiṣāṃ sūryādīnāṃ brahma jyotiḥprakāśakamityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:4352: brahmaṇi tu niḥśeṣajagadavabhāsake na sarvaśabdasya vṛttiḥ saṃkucatīti- tatraśabdamāharanniti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:4358: tena bhavatu nāma prakaraṇālliṅgaṃ balīyaḥ, śrutistu liṅgādbalīyasīti śrautamiha brahmaiva gamyata iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:4360: dṛṣṭārthatvādityāha- anantaraṃ ca hiraṇyamaye pare kośa iti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:4361: asminvākye jyotiṣāṃ jyotirityuktaṃ, tatra kathaṃ tat jyotiṣāṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:4365: ayamabhiprāyaḥ-'na tatra sūryo bhāti' iti neyaṃ satisaptamī, yataḥ sūryādīnāṃ tasmin satyabhibhavaḥ pratīyeta /
GSP33vacbhamu:4367: tena na tatra brahmaṇi prakāśayitavye sūryādayaḥ prakāśakatayā bhānti,
GSP33vacbhamu:4368: kintu brahmaiva sūryādiṣu prakāśayitavyeṣu prakāśakatvena bhāti /
GSP33vacbhamu:4369: tacca svayaṃprakāśam, agṛhyo nahi gṛhyata ityādiśrutibhya iti. //22 //
GSP33vacbhamu:4384: ātmaśabdo hyayaṃ svabhāvavacano vā jīvavacano vā brahmavacano vā syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:4385: tatra svabhāvasya svabhavitradhīnanirūpaṇatayā svasya ca bhavituranirdeśānna jñāyate kasya madhya iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:4386: naca jīvaparayorasti madhyamañjaseti naiṣa sthānanirdeśo vispaṣṭaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:4390: antaḥkaraṇaṃ ca prāyeṇa hṛtkamalakośasthānaṃ, hṛtkamalakośaśca manuṣyāṇāmaṅguṣṭhamātra iti tadavacchinno jīvātmāpyaṅguṣṭhamātraḥ, nabha iva vaṃśaparvāvacchinnamaratnimātram /
GSP33vacbhamu:4393: nahi sarveśasya brahmaṇo yamena balānniṣkarṣaḥ kalpate /
GSP33vacbhamu:4394: yamo hi jagau-'hariguruvaśago 'smi na svatantraḥ prabhavati saṃyamane mamāpi viṣṇuḥ' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:4395: tenāṅguṣṭhamātratvasya jīve niśchayādāpekṣikaṃ kiñcidbhūtabhavyaṃ prati jīvasyeśānatvaṃ vyākhyeyam
GSP33vacbhamu:4400: ' iha hi bhūtabhavyamātraṃ prati niraṅkuśamīśānatvaṃ pratīyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:4401: prāk pṛṣṭaṃ cātra brahma 'anyatra dharmādanyatrādharmāt' ityādinā /
GSP33vacbhamu:4402: tadanantarasya saṃdarbhasya tatprativacanateciteti 'etadvai tat' iti brahmābhidhānaṃ yuktam
GSP33vacbhamu:4403: tathā cāṅguṣṭhamātratayā yadyapi jīve 'vagamyate tathāpi na tatparametadvākyaṃ, kintvaṅguṣṭhamātrasya jīvasya brahmarūpatāpratipādanaparam /
GSP33vacbhamu:4407: paramātmanaikatvaṃ pratipādyate, tathehāpyaṅguṣṭhaparimitasya vijñānātmana īśānaśrutyā brahmabhāvaḥ pratipādya iti yuktam //24 //
GSP33vacbhamu:4410: na cānyaḥ paramātmāna iha grahaṇamarhatīti na jīvaparametadvākyamityarthaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:4414: antaḥsaṃjñānāṃ mokṣamāṇānāṃ ca kāmyeṣu karmasvadhikāraṃ niṣedhati- śaktatvāditi.tiryagdevarṣīṇāmaśaktānāmadhikāraṃ nivartayati /
GSP33vacbhamu:4421: jīvasya hi tattvaṃ paramātmabhāvaḥ, tadvaktavyam, naca tajjīvamanabhidhāya śakyaṃ vaktumiti jīva ucyata ityarthaḥ //25 //
GSP33vacbhamu:4426: devadīnāṃ vividhavicitrānandabhogabhogināṃ vairāgyābhāvānnārthitvaṃ brahmavidyāyāmityata āha- tatrārthitvaṃ tāvanmokṣaviṣayamiti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:4428: nanu devādīnāṃ vigrahādyabhāvendriyārthasaṃnikarṣajāyāḥ pramāṇādivṛtteranupapatteravidvattayā sāmarthyābhāvena nādhikāra ityata āha -tadā sāmarthyamiti teṣāmiti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:4432: na khalu vidhivat gurumukhādgṛhyamāṇo vedaḥ phalavatkarmabrahmāvabodhahetuḥ, api tvadhyayanottarakālaṃ nigamaniruktalavyākaraṇādividitapadatarthasaṃgateradhiśābdanyāyatattvasya puṃsaḥ smaryamāṇaḥ sa ca manuṣyāṇāmiha janmanīva devadīnāṃ prāci bhave vidhivadhīta āmnāya iha janmani smaryamāṇaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:4433: ata eva svayaṃ pratibhāto vedaḥ saṃbhavatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:4444: tathāca vigrahādyabhāvācchabdopahitārthor'thopahito vā śabdo devatetyacetanatvānna tasyāḥ kkacidapyadhikāra iti śaṅkārthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:4448: saiva kuta ityata āha- darśanāt.śrutiṣu smṛtiṣu ca /
GSP33vacbhamu:4451: nahi laukikena pramāṇenādṛṣṭatvādāgamena dṛṣṭamadṛṣṭaṃ bhavati, mā bhūdyāgādīnāmapi svargādisādhanatvamadṛṣṭamiti manuṣyaśararasya mātāpitṛsaṃyogajatvaniyamādapi pitroḥ saṃyoge kutaḥ saṃbhavaḥ, saṃbhave vānagnito 'pi dhūmaḥ syāditi bādhadarśanamiti cet /
GSP33vacbhamu:4452: hanta kiṃ śarīratvena hetunā devādiśarīramapi mātāpitṛsaṃyogajaṃ siṣādhayiṣasi /
GSP33vacbhamu:4456: bhūtavaśināṃ hi devādīnāṃ nānākāyacikīrṣāvaśādbhūtakriyotpattau bhūtānāṃ parasparasaṃyogena nānākāyamasutpādāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:4457: dṛṣṭā ca vaśina icchāvaśādvaye kriyā, yathā viṣavidyāvida icchāmātreṇa
GSP33vacbhamu:4464: antārdhānaṃ cāñjanādinā manujānāmiva teṣāṃ prabhavatāmupapadyate, tena saṃnihitānāmapi na kratudeśe darśanaṃ bhaviṣyati /
GSP33vacbhamu:4466: vaiśvadevaśāstrasya hi nividi 'kati devāḥ' ityupakramya nividaivottaraṃ dattaṃ śākalyāya yājñavalkyena- trayaśca trī ca śatā trayaśca trī ca
GSP33vacbhamu:4469: etaduktaṃ bhavati-vaiśvadevasya nividi kati devāḥ śasyamānāḥ prasaṃkhyātā iti śākalyena pṛṣṭe yājñavalkyasyottaraṃ-'trayaśca trī ca śatā' ityādi /
GSP33vacbhamu:4470: yāvatsaṃkhyākā vaiśvadevanividi saṃkhyātā devāsta etāvanta iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:4471: punaśca śākalyena 'katame te' iti saṃkhyeyeṣu pṛṣṭeṣu
GSP33vacbhamu:4472: yājñavalkyasyottaram- mahimāna evaiṣāmete trayastriṃśattveva devā iti. aṣṭau vasava ekādaśa rudrā dvādaśādityā indraśca prajāpatiśceti trayastriṃśaddevāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:4473: tatrāgniśca pṛthivī ca vāyuścāntarikṣaṃ cādityaśca dyauśca candramāśca nakṣatrāṇi ceti vasavaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:4474: ete hi prāṇināṃ karmaphalāśrayeṇa kāryakāraṇasaṃghātarūpeṇa pariṇamanto jagadidaṃ sarvaṃ vāsayanti, tasmādvasavaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:4475: katame rudrā iti daśeme puruṣe prāṇāḥ buddhikarmendriyāṇi daśa, ekādaśaṃ ca mana iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:4477: te hi prāyaṇakāla utkrāmantaḥ puruṣaṃ rodayantīti rudrāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:4478: katama ādityā iti dvādaśamāsāḥ saṃvatsarasyāvayavāḥ punaḥ punaḥ paruvartamānāḥ prāṇabhṛtāmāyūṃṣu ca karmaphalopabhogaṃ cādāpayantītyādityāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:4479: aśanirindraḥ, sā hi balaṃ, sā hīndrasya paramā īśatā, tayā hi sarvānprāṇinaḥ pramāpayati, tena stanayitnuraśanirindraḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:4480: yajñaḥ prajāpitirita, yajñasādhanaṃ ca yajñarūpaṃ ca paśavaḥ prajāpatiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:4481: eta eva trayastriṃśaddevāḥ ṣaṇṇāmagniṣṭathivīvāṭvantarikṣādityadivāṃ mahimāno na tato bhidyante
GSP33vacbhamu:4483: te tu ṣaḍagniṃ pṛthivīṃ caikūkṛtyāntarikṣaṃ vāyuṃ caikīkṛtya divaṃ cādityaṃ caikīkṛtya trayo lokāstraya eva devā bhavanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:4484: eta eva ca trayo 'nnaprāṇayorantarbhavanto 'nnaprāṇau dvau devau bhavataḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:4489: katama eka iti, sa evādhyardhaḥ prāṇa eko brahma /
GSP33vacbhamu:4490: sarvadevātmatvena bṛhattvādbrahma tadeva tyadityācakṣate parokṣābhidhāyakena śabdena /
GSP33vacbhamu:4495: tadeva parisphuṭaṃ darśayituṃ vyatirekaṃ tāvadāha- kkacideka iti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:4496: na khalu bahuṣu śrāddheṣveko brāhmaṇo yugapadaṅgabhāvaṃ gantumarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:4498: yathaikaṃ brāhmaṇamuddiśya yugapannamaskāraḥ kriyate bahubhistathā svasthānasthitāmekāṃ devatāmuddiśya bahubhiryajamānairnānādeśāvasthitairyugapaddhavistyajyate, tasyāśca tatrāsaṃnihitāyā apyaṅgabhāvo bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:4501: gotvādivatpūrvāvamarśābhāvādupādherapyekasyāpratīteḥ pācakādivadākāśaṣādiśabdavadvyaktivacanā eva vasvādiśabdāḥ tasyāśca nityatvāttayā saha saṃbandho nityo bhavet /
GSP33vacbhamu:4502: vigrahādiyoge tu sāvayavatvena vasvādīnāmanityatvāttataḥ pūrvaṃ vasvādiśabdo na svārthena saṃbaddha āsīn, svārthasyaivābhāvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:4503: tataścotpanne vasvādau vasvādiśabdasaṃbandhaḥ prādurbhavandevadattādiśabdasaṃbandhavatpuruṣabuddhiprabhava iti tatpūrvako vākyārthapratyayo 'pi puruṣabuddhyadhīnaḥ syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:4504: puruṣabuddhiśca mānāntarādhīnajanmeti mānāntarāpekṣayā prāmāṇyaṃ vedasya vyāhanyeteti śaṅkārthaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:4507: vasutvādijātivācakācchabdāttajjātīyāṃ vyaktiṃ cikīrṣitāṃ buddhivāsikhya tasyāḥ prabhavanam
GSP33vacbhamu:4509: etaduktaṃ bhavati-yadyapi na śabda upādānakāmaṃ vasvādīnāṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:4511: na caitāvatā śabdārthasaṃbandhasyānityatvaṃ, vasvādijātervā tadupādhervā yayā kayācidākṛtyāvacchinnasya nityatvāditi /
GSP33vacbhamu:4512: imamevārtamākṣepasamādhānābhyāṃ vibhajate- nanu janmādyasya yata iti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:4515: tathāca tadeva pramāṇāntarāpekṣavākyatvādaprāmāṇyamāpatitamityata āha- utsargo 'pyayaṃ vācaḥ saṃpradāyapravartanātmaka iti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:4517: etaduktaṃ bhavati-svayaṃbhuvo vedakartṛtve 'pi na kālidāsādivatsvatantratvamapi tu pūrvasṛṣṭyanusāreṇa
GSP33vacbhamu:4524: ayamabhisaṃdhiḥ-vācakaśabdaprabhavatvaṃ hi devānāmabhyupetavyaṃ, avācakena teṣāṃ buddhāvanālekhanāt
GSP33vacbhamu:4525: tatra na tāvadvasvādīnāṃ vakārādayo varṇā vācakāḥ, teṣāṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:4527: api caite pratyekaṃ vā vākyārthamabhidadhīran militā vā /
GSP33vacbhamu:4530: nāpa militāḥ, teṣāmekavaktṛprayujyamānānaṃ rūpato vyaktito vā pratikṣaṇamapavargiṇāṃ mithaḥ sāhityasaṃbhavābhāvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:4532: naca svarūpasāhityābhāve 'pi varṇānāmāgneyādīnāmiva saṃskāradvārakamasti sāhityamiti sāṃprataṃ, vikalpāsahatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:4533: ko nu khalvayaṃ saṃskāro 'bhimataḥ, kimapūrvamāgneyādijanyamiva, kiṃvā bhāvanāparanāmā smṛtiprasavabījam
GSP33vacbhamu:4546: nahi yaiva bahnerdahanaśaktiḥ saiva tasya prakāśanaśaktiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:4547: nāpi dahanaśakteḥ prakāśanaśaktiḥ.apica vyutkrameṇoccaritebhyo varṇebhyaḥ saivāsti smṛtibījaṃ vāsanetyarthapratyayaḥ prasajyeta /
GSP33vacbhamu:4558: na sphoṭa iti tu na mṛṣyāmaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:4563: na cāyamasīti bādhake ekapadavākyānubhavaḥ śakyo mithyetivaktum /
GSP33vacbhamu:4565: upādhiḥ khalvekadhīgrāhyatā vā syāt, ekārthadhīhetutā vā /
GSP33vacbhamu:4567: tathā sati dhavasvadirapalāśā iti na jātu syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:4572: tasmādayamabādhito 'nupādhiśca padavākyagocara ekanirbhāsānubhāvo varṇātiriktaṃ vācakamekamavalambena sa sphoṭa iti taṃ ca dhvanayaḥ pratyekaṃ vyañjayanto 'pi na drāgitveva viśadayanti, yena drāgārthadhīḥ syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:4573: api tu ratnatattvajñānavadyathāsvaṃ dvitricatuṣpañcaṣaḍdarśanajanitasaṃskāraparipākasacivacetolabdhajanmani carame cetasi cakāsti viśadaṃ padavākyatattvamiti prāganutpannāyāstadanantaramarthadhiya udaya iti nottareṣāmānarthakyaṃ dhvanīnām /
GSP33vacbhamu:4577: pratyekamavyaktāmarthadhiyamādhāsyanti prāñco varṇāḥ, caramastu tatsacivaḥ sphuṭatarāmiti yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:4580: arthadhiyastvapratyakṣāyā mānāntarajanmano vyakta evopajano na vā syānna punarasphuṭa iti na samaḥ samādhiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:4581: tasmānnityaḥ sphoṭa eva vācako na varṇā iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:4582: tadetadācāryadeśīyamataṃ svamatamupapādayannapākaroti- varṇā eva tu na śabda iti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:4583: evaṃ hi varṇātiriktaḥ sphoṭo 'byupeyeta, yadi varṇānāṃ vācakatvaṃ na
GSP33vacbhamu:4585: dvidhī ca vācakatvaṃ varṇānāṃ, kṣaṇikatvenāśakyasaṃgatigrahatvādvā vyastasamastaprakāradvayābhāvādvā
GSP33vacbhamu:4599: na cedaṃ pratyabhijñānaṃ gatvādijātiviṣayaṃ na gādivyaktiviṣayaṃ, tāsāṃ pratinaraṃ bhedopalambhādata eva śabdabedopalambhādvāktṛbheda unnīyate
GSP33vacbhamu:4602: yathā kālakṣīṃ ca svastimatīṃ cekṣamāṇasya vyaktibhedaprathāyāṃ satyāmeva tadanugatamekaṃ sāmānyaṃ prathate, tathā kiṃ gakārādiṣu bhedena prathamāneṣveva gatvamekaṃ tadanugataṃ cakāsti, kiṃvā yathā gotvamājānata
GSP33vacbhamu:4603: ekaṃ bhinnadeśaparimāṇasaṃsthānavyaktyupadhānabhedādbhinnadeśamivālpamiva mahadiva dīrghamiva vāmanamiva tathāgavyaktirājānata ekāpi vyañjakabhedāttadharmānupātinīva prathata iti bhavanta eva vidāṅkurvantu /
GSP33vacbhamu:4604: tatra havyaktibhedamaṅgīkṛtyāpi yo gatvasyaikasya paropadhānabhedakalpanāprayāsaḥ sa varaṃ gavyaktāvevāstu kimantargaḍunā gatvenābhyupetena /
GSP33vacbhamu:4608: tathā sati daśa gakarānudacārayaccaitra iti hi pratyayaḥ syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:4610: na caiṣa jātyabhiprāyo 'bhyāso yathā śatakṛtvastittirīnupāyuṅkta devadatta iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:4612: atra hi sorastāḍaṃ krandato 'pi gakārādivyaktau lokasyoccāraṇābhyāsapratyayasya vinirvṛttiḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:4613: codakaḥ pratyabhijñānabādhakamutthāpayatiṃ- kathaṃ hyekasminkāle bahūnāmuccārayatāmiti. yat yugapadviruddhadharmasaṃsargavat tat nān, yathā gavāśvādirdviśaphaikaśaphakeśaragalakambalādimān
GSP33vacbhamu:4616: na codāttādayo vyañjakadharmāḥ, na varṇadharmā iti sāṃpratam /
GSP33vacbhamu:4620: nahi guṇagocaramindriyaṃ guṇinamapi gocarayati, mā bhūvan ghrāṇarasanaśrotrāṇāṃ gandharasaśabdagocarāṇāṃ tadvantaḥ pṛthivyudakākāśā gocarāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:4621: evaṃ ca mā nāma bhūdvāyugocaraṃ śrotram, tadguṇāṃstūdāttādīn gocarayiṣyati /
GSP33vacbhamu:4623: naca śabdasya pratyabijñānāvadhṛtaikatvasya svarūpata udāttādayo dharmāḥ parasparavirodhino 'paryāyeṇa saṃbhavanti. tasmādyathā mukhasyaikasya maṇikṛpāṇadarpaṇādyupadhānavaśānnānādeśaparimāṇasaṃsthānabhedavibhramaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:4625: viruddhanānādharmasaṃsargavibhramaḥ, na tu bhāviko nānādharmasaṃsarga iti sthite 'bhyupetya parihāramāha bhāṣyakāraḥ- athavā dhvanikṛta iti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:4629: dhvanisvarūpaṃ praśnapūrvakaṃ varṇebhyo niṣkarṣayati -kaḥ punarayamiti. na cāyamanirdhāritaviśeṣavarṇatvasāmānyamātrapratyayo na tu varṇātiriktadabhivyañjakadhvanipratyaya iti sāṃpratam /
GSP33vacbhamu:4632: tasmādavarṇātmako vaiṣa śabdaḥ, śabdātirikto vā dhvaniḥ, śabdavñjakaḥ śrāvaṇo 'bhyupeyaḥ ubhayathāpi cākṣu vyañjaneṣu ca tattaddhvanibhedopadhānenānunāsikatvādayo 'vagamyamānāstaddharmā eva śabde pratīyante na tu svataḥ śabdasya dharmāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:4633: tathā ca yeṣāmanunāsikatvādayo dharmāḥ parasparaviruddhā bhāsante bhavatu teṣāṃ dhvanīnāmanityatā
GSP33vacbhamu:4635: yeṣu tu varṇeṣu pratyabhijñānaṃ na teṣāmanunāsikatvādayo dharmā iti nānityāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:4637: yadyeṣa parasyāgraho dharmiṇyagṛhyamāṇe taddharmā na śakyā grahītumiti,
GSP33vacbhamu:4640: tadanena prabandhena kṣaṇikatvena varṇānāmaśakyasaṃgatigrahatayā yadavācakatvamāpāditaṃ varṇānāṃ tadapākṛtam /
GSP33vacbhamu:4648: yadi gakārādivilakṣaṇamavabhāsayet, gakārādirūṣitaḥ pratyayo na syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:4650: padatattvamekaṃ pratyekamabhivyañjayanto dhvanayaḥ prayatnabhedabhinnāstulyasthānakaraṇaniṣpādyatayānyonyavisadṛśatattatpadavyañjakadhvanisādṛśyena svavyañjanīyasyaikasya padatattvasya mitho visadṛśānekapadasādṛśyānyāpādayantaḥ sādṛśyopadhānabhedādekamapyabhāgamapi nāneva bhāgavadiva bhāsayanti, mukhyamivaikaṃ niyatavarṇaparimāṇasthānasaṃśtānabhedamapi maṇikṛpāṇadarpaṇādayo
GSP33vacbhamu:4652: evaṃ ca kalpitā evāsya bhāgā varṇā iti cet, tatkimidānīṃ varṇabhedānasatyapi bādhake mithyeti vaktumadhyavasito 'si /
GSP33vacbhamu:4653: ekadhīreva nānātvasya biketi cet, hantāsyāṃ nānā varṇāḥ prathanta iti nānātvāvabhāsa ekaikatvaṃ kasmānna bādhate /
GSP33vacbhamu:4655: no khalu senāvanabuddhī gajapadātituragādīnāṃ campakāśokakiṃśukādīnāṃ ca bhedamapabādhamāne udīyete, api tu bhinnānāmeva satāṃ kenacidekenopādhināvacchinnānāmekatvāmāpādayataḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:4658: tasmātpratyekavarṇānubhavajatitabhāvanānicayalabdhajanmani nikhilavarṇāvagāhini smṛtijñāna ekasminbhāsamānānāṃ varṇānāṃ tadekavijñānaviṣayatayā vaikārthadhīhetutayā vaikatvamaupacārikamavagantavyam na caikārthadhīhetutvenaikatvamekatvena caikārthadhīhetubhāva iti parasparāśrayam /
GSP33vacbhamu:4660: na ca tatprathanānantaraṃ vṛddhasyārthadhīrnonnīyate, tadunnayanācca teṣāmekārthadhiyaṃ prati kārakatvamekamavagamyaikapadatvādhyasānamiti nānyonyāśrayam /
GSP33vacbhamu:4661: na caikasmṛtisamārohiṇāṃ kramākramaviparītakramaprayuktānāmabhedo varṇānāmiti yathākathañcitprayuktebhya etebhyor'thapratyayaprasaṅga iti vācyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:4662: uktaṃ hi-'yāvanto yādṛśā ye ca padārthapratipādane /
GSP33vacbhamu:4665: nanu paṅktibuddhāvekasyāmakramāyāmapi vāstavī śālādīnāmasti paṅgiriti tathaiva prathā yuktā, naca tatheha varṇānāṃ nityānāṃ vibhūnāṃ cāsti
GSP33vacbhamu:4666: vāstavaḥ kramaḥ, pratyayopādhistu bhavet, sacaika iti, kutastyaḥ krama eṣāmiti cet, /
GSP33vacbhamu:4668: tathāhi-jārārājeti padayoḥ prathayantyoḥ smṛtidhiyostattve 'pi varṇānāṃ kramabhedātpadabhedaḥ sphuṭataraṃ cakāsti /
GSP33vacbhamu:4676: santvanityā eva varṇāstathāpi gatvādyavacchedenaiva saṃgatigraho 'vanādiśca vyavahāraḥ setsyatītyāha- athāpi nāmeti. //28 //
GSP33vacbhamu:4678: nanu prācyāmeva mīmāṃsāyāṃ vedasya nityatvaṃ siddhaṃ tatkiṃ punaḥ sādhyata ityata āha- svatantrasya karturasmaraṇādeva hi sthite vedasya nityatva
GSP33vacbhamu:4681: tasmānnityo vedaḥ jagadutpattihetutvāt, īśvaravaditi siddhameva nityatvamanena dṛḍhīkṛtam
GSP33vacbhamu:4691: antaḥkaraṇādyupādhikalpitā hi te tadvicchede na sthātumarhanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:4692: naca brahmaṇastadvāsanā, tasya vidyātmanaḥ śuddhasvabhāvasya tadayogāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:4693: brahmaṇaśca sṛṣṭyādāvantaḥkaraṇāni tadavacchinnāścha jīvāḥ prādurbhavanto napūrvakarmāvidyāvāsanāvanto bhavitumarhanti, apūrvatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:4698: yadyapi mahāpralayasamaye nāntaḥkaraṇādayaḥ samudācaradvṛttayaḥ santi tathāpi svakāraṇe 'nirvācyāyāmavidyāyāṃ līnāḥ sūkṣmeṇa śaktirūpeṇa
GSP33vacbhamu:4703: te cāvadhaiṃ prāpya parameśvarecchāpracoditā yathā kūrmadehe nilīnānyaṅgāni tato niḥsaranti, yathā vā varṣāpāye prāptamṛdbhāvāni maṇḍūkaśarīrāṇi tadvāsanāvāsitatayā ghanaghanāghanāsārāvasekasuhitāni
GSP33vacbhamu:4705: etaduktaṃ bhavati-yadyapīśvarātprabhavaḥ saṃsāramaṇḍalasya, tathāpīśvaraḥ prāṇabhṛtkarmāvidyāsahakārī tadanurūpameva sṛjati /
GSP33vacbhamu:4706: naca sargapralayapravāhasyānāditāmantareṇaitadupapadyata iti sargapralayābyupagaṃme 'pi saṃsārānāditā na virudhyata iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:4710: bhavatvanāditā saṃsārasya, tathāpi mahāpralayāntarite kutaḥ smaraṇaṃ vedānāmityata āha- anādau ca saṃsāre yathā svāpaprabodhayoriti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:4712: tathāpi karmavikṣepasaṃskārasahitalayalakṣaṇā vidyāvaśeṣatāsāmyena svāpapralayāvasthayārabheda iti draṣṭavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:4713: nanu nāparyāyeṇa sarveṣāṃ suṣuptāvasthā, keṣāñcittadā prabodhāt, tebhyasya suptotthitānāṃ grahaṇasaṃbhavāt, prāyaṇakālaviprakarṣayośca vāsanocchedakāraṇayorabhāvena satyāṃ vāsanāyāṃ smaraṇopapatteḥ śabdārthasaṃbandhavedavyahārānucchedo yujyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:4714: mahāpralayastvaparyāyeṇa prāṇabhṛnmātravatartī, prāyaṇakālaviprakarṣau ca tatra saṃskāramātrocchedahetū sta iti kutaḥ suṣuptavatpūrvaprabodhavyavahāravaduttaprabodhavyavahāra iti codayati- syādetat /
GSP33vacbhamu:4724: yathāvā ā ca manuṣyebhya ā ca kṛmibhyo jñānādīnāmanubhūyate nikarṣaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:4725: evamā manuṣyebhya eva ā ca bhagavato hiraṇyagarbhajjñānādīnāṃ prakarṣe 'pi
GSP33vacbhamu:4732: asyāṃ tu sṛṣṭāvanya eva deśaḥ, anya eva caiṣāmarthāḥ, anya eva varṇāśramāḥ, dharmāccānarthor'thaścādharmāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:4735: tathāca pūrvavyavahārocchedācchabdārthasaṃbandhaśca vedaścānityau prasajyeyātāmityata āha- prāṇināṃ ca sukhaprāptaya iti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:4736: yathāvastusvabhāvasāmarthyaṃ hi sargaḥ pravartate, natu svabhāvasāmarthyamanyathayitumarhati
GSP33vacbhamu:4737: nahi jātu sukhaṃ tattvena jihāsyate, duḥkhaṃ copāditsyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:4740: tathā sati vastusāmarthyaniyamābhāvātsarvaṃ sarvasmādbhavediti pipāsurapi dahanamāhṛtya pipāsāmupaśamayet, śītārto vā toyamāhṛtya śītārtimiti /
GSP33vacbhamu:4742: evaṃ ya eva vedā asminkalpe ta eva kalpāntare, ta eva caiṣāmarthā ta eva ca varṇāśramāḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:4751: brahmavidyāsvadhikāraṃ devarṣīṇāṃ brūvāṇaḥ praṣṭavyo jāyate, kiṃ sarvāsu brahmavidyā svaviśeṣeṇa sarveṣāṃ kiṃvā kāsucideva keṣāñcit /
GSP33vacbhamu:4754: asau vā ādityo devamadhvityatra hi manuṣyā ādityaṃ madhvadhyāsenopāsīran. upāsyopāsakabhāvo hi bhedādhiṣṭhāno na svātmanyādityasya devatāyāḥ saṃbhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:4758: ayamarthaḥ-'asau vā ādityo devamadhu' iti devānāṃ modahetutvānmadhviva
GSP33vacbhamu:4763: yāni ca somājyapayaḥprabhṛtīnyagnau hūyate tānyādityaraśmibhiragnisaṃvalitairūtpannapākānyamṛtībhāvamāpannānyadityamaṇḍalamṛṅmantramadhunaiparnīyante yathā hi bhramarāḥ puṣpebhya āhṛtya makarandaṃ svasthānamānayantyevamṛṅmantrabhramarāḥ prayogasamavaitārthasmaraṇādibhirṛgvedavihitebhyaḥ karmakusumebhya āhṛtya tanniṣpannaṃ makarandamādityamaṇḍalaṃ lohitābhirasya prācībhī raśmināḍībhirānayanti, tadamṛtaṃ vasava upajīvanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:4768: athāsyādityamadhunaḥ pratīcībhī raśmināḍībhiḥ kṛṣṇābhiḥ sāmavedavihitakarmakusumebhya āhṛtyau hutaṃ somādi pūrvavadamṛtabhāvamāpannaṃ sāmamantrastotrabhramarā ādityamaṇḍalamānayanti, tadamṛtamādityā upajīvanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:4769: athāsyādityamadhuna udīcibhiratikṛṣṇābhī raśmināḍībhirathavedavihitebhyaḥ karmakusumebhya āhṛtyāgnau hutaṃ somādi
GSP33vacbhamu:4772: aśvamedhe vācaḥ stome ca pāriplavaṃ śaṃsanti iti śravaṇāditihāsapurāṇamantrāṇāmapyasti prayogaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:4774: athāsya yā ādityamadhuna ūrdhvā raśmināḍyo gopyāstābhirupāsanabhramarāḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:4776: tā etā ādityavyapāśrayāḥ pañca rohitādayo raśmināḍya ṛgādisaṃbaddhāḥ krameṇopadiśyeti yojanā
GSP33vacbhamu:4777: etadevāmṛtaṃ dṛṣṭvopalabhya yathāsvaṃ samastaijha karaṇairyaśastejahandriyasākalyavīryānnādyānyamṛtaṃ tadupalabhyāditye tṛpyati /
GSP33vacbhamu:4778: tena khalvamṛtena devānāṃ vasvādīnāṃ modanaṃ vidadhadādityo madhu /
GSP33vacbhamu:4779: etaduktaṃ bhavati-na kevalamupāsyopāsakabhāva ekasminvirudhyate, api tu jñātṛjñeyabhāvaśca prāpyaprāpakabhāvaśceti /
GSP33vacbhamu:4782: ākāśasya hi sarvagatatvaṃ rūpādihīnatve ca brahmaṇā sārūpyaṃ, tasya caitasyākāśasya brahmaṇaścatvāraḥ pādā agnyādayaḥ 'agniḥ pādaḥ' ityādinā darśitāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:4783: yathā hi goḥ pādā na gavā viyujyatanta, evamagnyādayo 'pi nākāśena sarvagatenetyākāśasya pādāḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:4784: tadevamākāśasya catuṣpado brahmadṛṣṭiṃ vidhāya svarūpeṇa vāyuṃ saṃvargaguṇakamupāsyaṃ vidhātuṃ mahīkaroti-vāyurvāva saṃvargaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:4785: tathā svarūpeṇaivādityaṃ brahmadṛṣṭyopāsyaṃ vidhātuṃ mahikaroti- ādityo
GSP33vacbhamu:4788: yadyucyeta nāviśeṣaṇa sarveṣāṃ devarṣīṇāṃ sarvāsu brahmavidyāsvadhikāraḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:4796: tatra 'jagṛbhmāte dakṣiṇamindrahasatam' iti ca, 'kāśirindra it' iti ca /
GSP33vacbhamu:4799: indro vṛtrāṇi jighrate' iti vigrahavattvaṃ devatāyā mantrārthavādā abhivadanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:4800: tathā havirbhojanaṃ devatāyā darśayanti 'addhīndra piba caprasthitasya'
GSP33vacbhamu:4802: yatheśanam-'indro diva indra īśe pṛthivyā indro apāmindra itparvatānām /
GSP33vacbhamu:4803: indro vṛdhāmindra inmedhirāṇāmindraḥ kṣeme yoge havya indraḥ' iti, tathā
GSP33vacbhamu:4805: tathā varivasitāraṃ prati devatāyāḥ prasādaṃ prasannāyāśca phaladānāṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:4806: darśayati-'āhutibhireva devān hutādaḥ prīṇāti tasmai prītā iṣamūrjaṃ ca
GSP33vacbhamu:4807: yacchanti' iti, 'tṛpta evainamindra prajayā paśubhistarpayati' iti ca /
GSP33vacbhamu:4810: laukikā api devatāvigrahādipañcakaṃ smaranti coparacaranti ca /
GSP33vacbhamu:4811: tathāhi-yamaṃ daṇḍahastamālikhanti, ruṇaṃ pāśahastam, indraṃ vajrahastam /
GSP33vacbhamu:4814: tathāsyāḥ prasādaṃ ca prasannāyāśca phaladānamāhuḥ-prasanno 'sya paśupatiḥ putro 'sya jātaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:4818: na khalupratyakṣādivyatirikto loko nāma pramāṇāntaramasti, kintu pratyakṣādimūlā lokaprasiddhiḥ satyatāmaśrute, tadabhāve tvandhaparamaprāvanmūlābhāvādvipalvate /
GSP33vacbhamu:4820: na cetihāsādi mūlaṃ bhavitumarhati, tasyāpi pauriṣeyatvena pratyakṣādyapekṣaṇāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:4822: nanūktaṃ mantrārthavādebhyo vigrahādipañcakaprasiddhiriti, ata āha- arthavādā apīti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:4823: vidhyuddeśenaikavākyatāmāpadyamānā arthavādā vidhiviṣayaprāśastyalakṣaṇāparā na svārthe pramāṇaṃ bhavitumarhanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:4824: 'yatparaḥ śabdaḥ sa śabdārthaḥ' iti hi śābdanyāyavidaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:4825: pramāṇāntareṇa tu yatra svārthe 'pi samarthyate, yathā vāyoḥ kṣepiṣṭatvam,
GSP33vacbhamu:4827: yatra tu na pramāṇāntaramasti, yathā vigrahādipañcake, sor'thaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:4831: na caikaṃ vākyamubhayaparaṃ bhavatīti vākyaṃ bhidyeta /
GSP33vacbhamu:4834: mantrāśca vrīhyādivacchutyādibhistatra tatra viniyujyamānāḥ pramāṇabhāvananupraveśinaḥ kathamupayujyantāṃ teṣa teṣu karmasvityapekṣāyāṃ dṛṣṭe prakāre saṃbhavati nādṛṣṭakalpanocitā /
GSP33vacbhamu:4835: dṛṣṭaśca prakāraḥ prayogasamavetārthasmāraṇaṃ, smṛtvā cānutiṣṭhanti khalvanuṣṭhātāraḥ padārthān
GSP33vacbhamu:4836: autsargikī cārthaparatā padānamityapekṣitaprayogasamavetārthasmaraṇatātparyāṇāṃ mantrāṇāṃ nānadhigate vigrahādāvapi tātparyaṃ yujyata iti na tebhyo 'pi tatsiddhiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:4837: tasmāddevatāvigrahavattādibhāvagrahapramāṇābāvāt prāptā ṣaṣṭhapramāṇagocaratāsyeti prāptam evaṃ prāpte 'bhidhīyate-bhāvaṃ tu bādarāyaṇe 'sti hi /
GSP33vacbhamu:4847: nahi śvitrinirṇejanaparaṃ śveto dhāvatīti vākyamitaḥ sārameyagamanaṃ gamayitumarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:4851: nahyudakāharaṇārthinā ghaṭadarśanāyonmīlitaṃ cakṣurghaṭapaṭau vā paṭaṃ vā kevalaṃ nopalabhate
GSP33vacbhamu:4852: tadevamekadeśini pūrvapakṣiṇā dūṣite paramasiddhāntavādyāha- atrocyate viṣama upanyāsa iti. ayamabhisaṃdhiḥ-loke viśiṣṭārthapratyāyanāya padāni prayuktāni tadantareṇa na svārthamātrasmāraṇe paryavasyanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:4853: nahi svārthasmāraṇamātrāya loke padānāṃ prayogo dṛṣṭapūrvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:4855: na caitānyasmāritasvārthāni sākṣādvākyārthaṃ pratyāyayitumīśate iti svārthasmāraṇaṃ vākyārthamitathe 'vāntaravyāpāraḥ kalpitaḥ padānām /
GSP33vacbhamu:4856: naca yadarthaṃ yattattena vinā paryavasyatīti na svārthamātrabhidhāne paryavasānaṃ padānām
GSP33vacbhamu:4865: yatra tu vākyasyaikasya vākyāntareṇa saṃbandhastatra lokānusārato bhūtārthavyutpattau ca siddhāyamekaikasya vākyasya tattadviśiṣṭārthapratyāyanena paryavasitavṛttinaḥ paścātkutaściddhetoḥ prayojanāntarāpekṣāyāmanvayaḥ kalpyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:4866: yathā 'vāyurvai kṣepiṣṭhā devatā vāyumeva svena bhāgadheyenopadhāvati sa
GSP33vacbhamu:4867: evainaṃ bhūtiṃ gamayati vāyavyaṃ śvetamālabheta' ityatra /
GSP33vacbhamu:4868: iha hi yadi na svādhyāyādhyāyanavidhiḥ svādhyāyaśabdavācyaṃ vedarāśiṃ puruṣārthatāmaneṣyattato bhūtārthamātraparyavasitā nārthavādā vidhyuddeśenaikavākyatāmāgamiṣyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:4869: tasmāt svādhyāyavidhivaśātkaimarthyākāṅkṣāyāṃ vṛttāntadigocarāḥ santastatpratyāyanadvāreṇa vidheyaprāśastyaṃ lakṣayanti, na punaravivakṣitasvārthā eva tallakṣaṇe prabhavanti, tathā sati lakṣaṇaiva
GSP33vacbhamu:4872: ata eva gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣa ityatra gaṅgāśabdaḥ svārthasaṃbaddhabheva tīraṃ lakṣayati na tu samudratīraṃ, tatkasya hetoḥ, svārthapratyāsattyābhāvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:4874: ata eva yatra pramāṇāntaraviruddhārtā arthavādā dṛśyante, yathāḥ-'ādityo
GSP33vacbhamu:4875: vai yūpaḥ' 'yajamānaḥ prastaraḥ' ityevamādayaḥ, tatra yathā pramāṇāntarāvirodhaḥ, yathā ca stutyārthatā, tadubhayasiddhyarthaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:4877: tasmādyatra sor'thorthavādānāṃ pramāṇāntaraviruddhastatra guṇavādena prāśastyalakṣaṇeti lakṣitalakṣaṇā /
GSP33vacbhamu:4882: pramātā hyavyutpannaḥ prathamaṃ yathā pratyakṣādibhyor'thamavagacchati na
GSP33vacbhamu:4885: nanvevaṃ mānāntaravirodhe 'pi kasmādguṇavādo bhavati, yāvatā śabdavirodhe mānāntarameva kasmānna bādhyate, vedāntairivādvaitaviṣayaiḥ pratyādayaḥ prapañcagocarāḥ, kasmādvār'thavādavadvedāntā api guṇavādena na nīyante /
GSP33vacbhamu:4886: atrocyate-lokānusārato dvividho hi viṣayaḥ śabdānām, dvārataśca tātparyataśca /
GSP33vacbhamu:4887: yathaikasminvākye padānāṃ padārthā dvārato vākyārthaśca tātparyato viṣayaḥ evaṃ vākyadvayaikavākyatāyāmapi
GSP33vacbhamu:4888: yatheyaṃ devadattīyā gauḥ kretavyetyekaṃ vākyam, eṣā bahukṣīretyaparaṃ tadasya bahukṣīratvapratipādanaṃ dvāram /
GSP33vacbhamu:4891: yathā viṣaṃ bhakṣayeti vākyaṃ mā asya gṛhe bhuṅkṣveti vākyāntarārthaparaṃ sat /
GSP33vacbhamu:4892: yatra tu tātparyaṃ tatra mānāntaravirodhe pauruṣeyapramāṇameva bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:4896: yatra tu pramāṇāntaraṃ virodhakaṃ nāsti, yathā devatāvagrahādau, tatra dvārato 'pi viṣayaḥ pratīyamāno na śakyastyaktum /
GSP33vacbhamu:4897: naca guṇavādena netuṃ, ko hi mukhye saṃbhavati gauṇamātrayodatiprasaṅgāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:4898: tathā satyanadhigataṃ vigrahādi pratipādayam vākyaṃ bhidyeteti cet addhā /
GSP33vacbhamu:4903: naca yasya yatra na tātparyaṃ tasya tatrāprāmāṇyaṃ, tathā ,sati
GSP33vacbhamu:4904: viśiṣṭaparaṃ vākyaṃ viśeṣaṇeṣvapramāṇamiti viśiṣṭaparamapi na syāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:4913: naca bhūtārthamapyapauruṣeyaṃ vaco mānāntarāpekṣaṃ svārthe, yena mānāntarāsaṃbhave bhavedapramāṇamityuktam
GSP33vacbhamu:4915: tātparyaikye 'pi yadi vākyabhedaḥ, kathaṃ tarhyarthaikatvādekaṃ vākyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:4918: sa tu padārthāntaraviśiṣṭaḥ padārtha ekaḥ kkacid dvārabhūtaḥ kkacid dvārītyetāvān viśeṣaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:4919: nanvevaṃ sati odanaṃ bhuktvā grāmaṃ gacchatītyatrāpi vākyabhedaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:4920: anyo hi saṃsargaḥ odanaṃ bhuktveti, anyastu grāmaṃ gacchatīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:4923: bhuktveti hi samānakartṛkatā pūrvakālatā ca pratīyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:4925: tasmādyāvati padābhyāṃ viśiṣṭārthapratyayaparyavasānāt pañcaṣaṭpadavati vākye ekasminnānātvaprasaṅgaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:4926: nānātve 'pi viśeṣāṇānāṃ viśeṣyasyaikatvāt, tasya ca sakṛcchutasya
GSP33vacbhamu:4929: tasmādvidhivākyādarthavādavākyamanyaditi vākyayoreva svasvavākyārthapratyayāvasitavyāpārayoḥ paścātkutaścidapekṣāyāṃ parasparānvaya iti siddham /
GSP33vacbhamu:4931: devatāmuddiśya haviravamṛśya ca tadviṣayasvatvatyāga iti yāgaśarīram /
GSP33vacbhamu:4933: naca rūparahitā cetasi śakyata ālekhitumiti yāgavidhinaiva tadrūpāpekṣimā yādṛśamanyaparebhyo 'pi mantrārthavādebhyastadrūpamavagataṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:4936: yathā hi 'vrātyo vrātyastomena yajate' iti vrātyasvarūpāpekṣāyāṃ yasya
GSP33vacbhamu:4937: pitā pitāmaho vā somaṃ na pibet sa vrātya iti vidhināpekṣitaṃ sadarthavādato 'vagamyamānaṃ vidhipramāṇakam, tathā devatārūpamapi /
GSP33vacbhamu:4938: nanūddeśo rūpajñānamapekṣate na punā rūpasattāmapi, devatāyāḥ samāropeṇāpi ca rūpajñānamupapadyata iti samāropitameva rūpaṃ devatāyā
GSP33vacbhamu:4942: tasya tu rūpasyāsati bādhake 'nubhāvarūḍhaṃ tathābhāvaṃ parityajyānyathātvamananubhūyamānamasāṃprataṃ kalpiyatum /
GSP33vacbhamu:4945: vidhyapekṣāyāmanyaparādapi vākyādavagator'thaḥ svīkriyate, tadapekṣaiva tu nāsti, śabdarūpasya devatābhāvāt, tasya ca mānāntaravedyatvādityata āha- naca śabdamātramiti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:4946: na kevalaṃmantrārthavādato vigrahādisiddhiḥ, api tu itihāsapurāṇalokasmaraṇebhyo mantrārthavādamūlebhyo vā pratyakṣādamūlebhyo
GSP33vacbhamu:4950: tadevaṃ mantrārthavādādisiddhe devatāvigrahādau gurvādipūjāvaddevatāpūjātmako yāmo devatāprasādādidvāreṇa
GSP33vacbhamu:4953: na caivaṃ yajñakarmaṇo devatāṃ prati guṇabhāvāddevatātaḥ phalotpāde yāgabhāvanāyāḥ śrutaṃ phalavattvaṃ yāgasya ca tāṃ prati tatphalāṃśaṃ vā prati śrutaṃ karaṇatvaṃ hātavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:4959: phalavattvāt pradhānatvamubhayasminnapi pakṣe samānaṃ, natu devatāyā vigrahādimatyāḥ prādhānyamiti na dharmamīmāṃsāyāḥ sūtram-'api vā śabdapūrvatvādyajñakarma pradhānaṃ guṇatve devatāśrutiḥ' iti virudhyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:4964: nirmṛṣṭanikhiladuḥkhānuṣaṅge śāśvatika ānande kasya nāma cetanasyārthitā
GSP33vacbhamu:4967: dvividhaṃ hi sāmarthyaṃ nijaṃ cāgantukaṃ ca /
GSP33vacbhamu:4975: 'gniralaukiko na śūdrasyātīti nāhavanīyādisādhye karmaṇi śūdrasyādhikāra iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:4976: naca tathā brahmavidyāyāmalaukikamasti sādhanaṃ yacchūdrasya na syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:4980: tadadhyayanaṃ puruṣārthe vā niyamyet, yathā dhanārjane pratigrahādi /
GSP33vacbhamu:4983: nahi 'svādhyāyo 'dhyetavyaḥ' iti kañcit kratuṃ prakṛtya paṭhyate, yathā darśapūrṇamāsaṃ prakṛtya 'vrīhīnavahanti' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:4986: nahi yathā juhvādi avyabhicaritakratusaṃbaddhamevaṃ svādhyāya iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:4995: na cādhyayanaṃ vā svādhyāyo vā tadarthajñānaṃ vā prāgvidheḥ puruṣecchādhīnapravṛttiḥ, yena puruṣārthaḥ syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:4999: tathā cādhyayanavidheraniyāmakatvācchūdrasyādhyayanena vā pustakādipāṭhena vā sāmarthyamastīti so 'pi brahmavidyāyāmadhikriyeta /
GSP33vacbhamu:5000: mā bhūdvādhyayanābhāvātsarvatra brahmavidyāyāmadhikāraḥ, saṃvargavidyāyāṃ tu bhaviṣyati /
GSP33vacbhamu:5001: 'aha hāretvā śūdra' iti śūdraṃ saṃbodhya tasyāḥ pravṛtteḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:5004: tasmādyathānadhīyānasyeṣṭau niṣādasthapateradhikāro vacanasāmarthyādevaṃ saṃvargavidyāyāṃ śūdrasyādhikāro bhaviṣyatīti prāptam /
GSP33vacbhamu:5005: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ- na śūdrasyādhikāraḥ vedādhyayanābhāvāditi. /
GSP33vacbhamu:5009: piṇḍapitṛyajñavat svargaṃ vā, suvarṇaṃ bhāryamitivadārthavādikaṃ vā phalaṃ kalpayitvā viniyogabhaṅgena svādhyāyenādhīyītetyevamarthaḥ kalpatāṃ, kiṃvā paramaprayāpyanyato 'pekṣitamadhigamya nirvṛṇotviti viṣaye, na dṛṣṭadvāreṇa paramparayāpyanyato 'pekṣitapratilambhe ca yathāśrutiviniyogopapattau ca saṃbhavantyāṃ śrutiviniyogabhaṅgenādhyayanādevāśrutādṛṣṭaphalakalpanocitā /
GSP33vacbhamu:5011: tena hi puruṣeṇa sa prāpyate, prāptaśca
GSP33vacbhamu:5012: phalavatkarmabrahmāvabodhamabhyudayaniḥśreyasaprayojanamupajanayati, natu suvarṇadhāraṇādau dṛṣṭadvāreṇa kiñcit paramparayāpyastyapekṣitaṃ puruṣasya, tasmādviparivṛtya sākṣāddhāraṇādeva viniyogabhaṅgena phalaṃ kalpyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:5013: yadā cādhyanasaṃskṛtena svādhyāyena phalavatkarmabrahmāvabodho bhāvyamāno 'byudayaniḥśreyasaprayojana iti sthāpitaṃ tadā yasyādhyayanaṃ tasyaiva karmabrahmāvabodho 'bhyudayaniḥśreyasaprayojano nānyasya, yasya
GSP33vacbhamu:5015: pustakādipaṭhitasvādhyāyajanyor'thāvabodhaḥ śūdrāṇāṃ na phalāya kalpata iti śāstrīyasāmarthyābhāvānna śūdro brahmavidyāyāmadhikriyata iti siddham
GSP33vacbhamu:5028: asmākaṃ tu anyaparādapi vākyādasati bādhake pramāṇāntareṇārtho
GSP33vacbhamu:5032: vidhyuddeśagatatve tvayaṃ nyāyo 'podyate vacanabalanniṣādasthapativanna tveṣa vidhyuddeśagata ityuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:5034: apica kimarthavādabalādvidyāmātre 'dhikāraḥ śūdrasya kalpate saṃvargavidyāyāṃ vā na tāvadvidyāmātra ityāha- kāmaṃ cāyamiti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:5037: astu tarhi saṃvargavidyāyāmeva śūdrasyādhikāra ityata āha- arthavādasthatvāditi. /
GSP33vacbhamu:5038: tatkimetacchūdrapadaṃ pramattagītaṃ, na caityadyuktaṃ, tulyaṃ hi sāṃpradāyikamityata āha- śakyate cāyaṃ śūdraśabda iti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:5041: sa ca teṣu teṣu grāmanagaraśṛṅgāṭakeṣu vividhānāmannapānānāṃ pūrṇānatithibhya āvasathān karayāmāsa
GSP33vacbhamu:5043: athāsya rājño dānaśauṇḍasya guṇagārimasotaṣitāḥ santo devarṣayo haṃsarūpamāsthāya tadanugrahāya tasya nidāghasamaye doṣā harmyatalasthasyopari mālāmābadhyājagmuḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:5044: teṣāmagresaraṃ haṃsaṃ saṃbodhya pṛṣṭhataḥ patannekatamo haṃsaḥ sādbhutamabhyuvāda /
GSP33vacbhamu:5045: bho bho bhallākṣa jānaśruterasya pautrāyaṇasya dyuniśaṃ dyuloka āyataṃ jyotistinmā prasāṅkṣīrmaitattvā dhākṣīditi /
GSP33vacbhamu:5051: yasmādayaṃ varākastasmātkamenaṃ kiṃbhūtametaṃ santaṃ prāṇimātraṃ jānaśrutimāttha /
GSP33vacbhamu:5053: tasya hi bhagavataḥ puṇyajñānasaṃbhārasaṃbhṛtasya raikkasya brahmavido dharme trailokyodaravartiprāṇabhṛnmātradharmo 'ntarbhavati na punā raikkadharmakakṣāṃ kasyaciddharmo 'vagāhata iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:5054: athaiṣa haṃsavacanādātmano 'tyantanikarṣamutkarṣakāṣṭhāṃ ca raikkasyopaśrutya viṣaṇṇāmānaso jānaśrutiḥ kitava ivākṣaparājitaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:5056: tato niśāvasānapiśunamanibhṛtavandāruvṛndaprārabdhastutisahasrasaṃvalitaṃ maṅgalatūryanirdhoṣamākarṇya talpatalastha eva rājā ekapade yantānaramāhūyādideśa, vayasya, raikkāhvayaṃ brahmavidamekaratiṃ sayugvānamativivikteṣu teṣu teṣu
GSP33vacbhamu:5058: sa ca tatra tatrānviṣyan kkacidativivekte dese śakaṭasyādhastāt pāmānaṃ kaṇḍūyamānaṃ brāhmaṇāyanamadrākṣīt
GSP33vacbhamu:5059: taṃ ca dṛṣṭvā raikko 'yaṃ bhaviteti pratibhāvānupaviśya savinayamaprākṣīt,
GSP33vacbhamu:5060: tvamasi he bhagavan, sayugvā raikka iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:5061: tasya ca raikkabhāvānumatiṃ ca taistairiṅgitairgārhasthyecchāṃ dhanāyāṃ connīya yantā rājñe nivedayāmāsa /
GSP33vacbhamu:5062: rājā tu taṃ niśamya gavāṃ ṣaṭśatāni niṣkaṃ ca hāraṃ cāśvatarīrathaṃ cādāya satvaraṃ raikkaṃ praticakrame /
GSP33vacbhamu:5064: hai raikka, gavāṃ ṣaṭśatānīmāni niṣkaśca hāra ścāyamaśvatarīrathaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:5066: tamevamuktavantaṃ prati sāṭopaṃ ca saspṛhaṃ covāca raikkaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:5067: aha hāretvā śūdra, tavaiva saha gobhirastviti /
GSP33vacbhamu:5069: hāreṇa yuktā itvā gantrī ratho hāretvā sa gobhiḥ saha tavaivāstu,
GSP33vacbhamu:5070: kimetanmātreṇa mama dhanenākalpavartino gārhasthyasya nirvāhānupayogineti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:5071: āharetveti tu pāṭhonarthakatayā ca gobhiḥ sahetyatra pratisaṃbandhyanupādānena cācāryairdūṣitaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:5072: tadasyāmākhyāyikāyāṃ śakyaḥ śūdraśabdena jānaśrutī rājanyo 'pyavayavavyutpattyā vaktum
GSP33vacbhamu:5073: sa hi raikkaḥ parokṣajñatāṃ cikhyāpayiṣurātmano jānaśruteḥ śūdreti śucaṃ sūcayāmāsa /
GSP33vacbhamu:5074: kathaṃ punaḥ śūdraśabdena śugutpannā sūcyata iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:5081: tasmāttadādravaṇāditi tacchabdena śugvā jānaśrutirvā raikko vā parāmṛśyata ityuktam //34 //
GSP33vacbhamu:5083: itaśca na jātiśūdro jānaśrutiḥ yatkāraṇaṃ.prakaraṇanirūpeṇa kriyamāṇe kṣatriyatvamasya jānaśruteravagamyate caijñarathena liṅgāditi vyācakṣāṇaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:5085: caitrarathenābhipratāriṇā niścitakṣātriyatvena samānāyāṃ saṃvargavidyāyāṃ samabhivyāhārālliṅgātsaṃdigdhakṣatriyabāvo jānaśrutiḥ kṣatriyo niścīyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:5086: 'atha ha śaunakaṃ ca kāpeyamabhipratāriṇaṃ ca kākṣaseniṃ sūdena pariviṣyamāṇau brahmacārī bibhikṣe' iti prasiddhayājakatvena kāpeyenābhiprayāriṇo yogaḥ pratīyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:5093: etena vai citrarathaṃ kāpeyā ayājayanniti.chandogānāṃ dvirātre śrūyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:5095: eṣa cābhipratāri citrarathādanyaḥ sanneva kāpeyānāṃ rājyo bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:5096: yadi caitrarathiḥ syāt samānānvayānāṃ hi prāyeṇa samānānvayā yājakā bhavanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:5100: kṣattṛpreṣaṇe cārthasaṃbhave ca tādṛśasya vadānyapraṣṭhasyaiśvaryaṃ prāyeṇa kṣatriyasya dṛṣṭaṃ yudhiṣṭhirādivaditi //35 //
GSP33vacbhamu:5102: na kevalamupanītādhyayanavidhiparāmarśena na śūdrasyādhikāraḥ kintu teṣu teṣu vidyopadeśeṣūpanayanasaṃskāraparāmarśāt śūdrasya tadabhāvābhidhānādbrahmavidyāyāmanadhikāra iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:5106: tacca dvijātīnāmiti dvijātaya eva niṣiddhopanayanā adhikriyante na śūdra iti //36 //
GSP33vacbhamu:5108: satyakāmo ha vai jābālaḥ pramītapitṛkaḥ svāṃ mātaraṃ jabālāṃ prapaccha,
GSP33vacbhamu:5109: ahamācāryakule brahmacaryaṃ cariṣyāmī, tadbravītu bhavatī kiṅgotro 'hamiti
GSP33vacbhamu:5114: sa hovāc, nāvijñātagotra upanīyata iti kiṅgotro 'sīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:5115: athovāca satyakāmo nāhaṃ veda svaṃ gotraṃ, svāṃ mātaraṃ jabālāmapṛcchaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:5118: tenāsminna śūdratvasaṃbhāvanāstīti tvāṃ dvijātijanmānamupaneṣya ityupanetamanuśāsituṃ ca jābālaṃ gautamaḥ pravṛttaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:5126: prāṇavajraśrutihalādvākyaṃ prakaraṇaṃ ca bhaṅktvā vāyuḥ pañcavṛttirādhyātmiko bāhyaścātra pratipādyaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:5129: vāyureva hi vāhyo dhūmajyotiḥsalilasaṃvalitaḥ parjanyabhāvena pariṇato vidyutstanayitnuvṛṣṭyaśanibhāvena vivartate /
GSP33vacbhamu:5130: yadyapi ca sarvaṃ jagaditi savāyukaṃ pratīyate tathāpi sarvaśabda āpekṣiko
GSP33vacbhamu:5134: amṛtaśabdo 'pi maraṇābhāvavacano na sārvakālikaṃ tadabhāvaṃ brūte,
GSP33vacbhamu:5139: savāyukasya jagataḥ kampanāt, paramātmaiva śabdātpramita iti
GSP33vacbhamu:5141: brahmaṇonahi bibhdetajjagatkṛtnnaṃ svavyāpāre niyamena pravartate na tu maryādāmativartate
GSP33vacbhamu:5142: etaduktaṃ bhavati-na śrutisaṃkocamātraṃ śrutyarthaparityāge hetuḥ, api tu pūrvāparavākyaikavākyatāprakaraṇābhyāṃ saṃvalitaḥ śrutisaṃkocaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:5148: yatkhalu pṛṣṭaṃ tadeva pradhānaṃ prativaktavyamiti tasya prakaraṇam /
GSP33vacbhamu:5151: 'apapunarmṛtyuṃ jayati' iti śrutyā hyapamṛtyorvijaya ukto natu paramamṛtyuvijaya ityāpe..kitvaṃ (?), tacca tatraiva prakaraṇāntarakaraṇena hetunā /
GSP33vacbhamu:5156: atra hi jyotiḥśabdasya tejasi mukhyatvāt, brahmaṇi jaghanyatvāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:5162: ādityaścārcirādyapekṣayā paraṃ jyotirbhavatīti tadupasaṃpadya tasya samīpe bhūtvā svena rūpeṇābhiniṣpadyate, kāryabrahmalokaprāptau krameṇa mucyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:5163: brahmajyotiḥpakṣe tu brahma bhūtvā kā parā svarūpaniṣpattiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:5165: sā hi brahmabhūyātprācīnā na tu parācīnā /
GSP33vacbhamu:5167: tasmāttisṛbhiḥ śrutibhiḥ prakaraṇabādhanātteja evātra jyotiriti prāptam /
GSP33vacbhamu:5172: yatkhalu pratijñāyate, yacca madhye parāmṛśyate, yaccopasaṃhriyate, sa eva pradhānaṃ prakaraṇārthaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:5173: tadantaḥpātinastu sarve tadanuguṇatayā netavyāḥ, natu śrutyanurodhamātreṇa prakaraṇādapakraṣṭavyā iti hi lokasthitiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:5174: anyathopāṃśuyājavākye jāmitādoṣopakrame tatpratisādhānopasaṃhāre ca tadantaḥ pātino 'viṣṇurupāṃśu yaṣṭavyaḥ' ityādayo vidhiśrutyanurodhena pṛthagvidhayaḥ prasajyeran /
GSP33vacbhamu:5175: tatkimidānīṃ 'tisra eva sāhnasyopasadaḥ kāryā dvādaśāhīnasya' iti prakaraṇānurodhātsāmudāyaprasiddhibalalabdhamahargāṇābhidhānaṃ parityajyāhīnaśabdaḥ kathamapyavavavyutpattyā sānnaṃ jyotiṣṭomamabhidhāya tatraiva dvādaśopasattāṃ vidhattām /
GSP33vacbhamu:5176: sa hi kṛtsnavidhānānna kutaścidapi hīyate kratorityahīnaḥ śakyo vaktum /
GSP33vacbhamu:5178: avayavaprasiddheḥ samudāyaprasiddhirbalīyasīti śrutyā prakaraṇabādhanānna dvādaśopakratomahīnaguṇayukte jyotiṣṭome śaknoti vidhātum /
GSP33vacbhamu:5182: tenānapakṛṣṭenaiva dvādaśāhīnasyetivākyena sāhnasya tisra usapadaḥ kāryā iti vidhiṃ stotuṃ dvādaśāhavihitā dvādaśopasattā tatprakṛtitvena ca sarvāhīneṣu prāptā nivītādivadanūdyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:5189: naca dvadaśāhīnasyetivadyathoktātmadhyānasādhanānuṣṭhānaṃ stotumeṣa saṃprasāda iti vacamarcirādimārgamanuvadatīti yuktam, stutilakṣaṇāyāṃ svābhidheyasaṃsargatātparyaparityāgaprasaṅgāt dvādaśāhīnasyeti tu vākye svārthasaṃsargatātparye prakaraṇavicchedasya prāptānuvadamātrasyā
GSP33vacbhamu:5196: iha tu svārthasaṃsargatātparye noktadoṣaprasaṅga iti paurvāparyālocanayā prakaraṇānurodhādrūḍhimapi pūrvakālatāmapi parityajya prakaraṇānuguṇyena jyotiḥ paraṃ brahma pratīyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:5199: naca kramamuktyabhiprāyaṃ svena rūpeṇābhiniṣpadyata iti vacanam /
GSP33vacbhamu:5201: tathā ca śrutiḥ-'na tasmāt prāṇā utkrāmanti atraiva samavanīyante' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:5203: arcirādimārgasya hi kāryabrahmalokaprāpakatvaṃ na tu brahmabhūyahetubhāvaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:5206: tasmānna jyotirādityamupasaṃpadya saṃprasādasya jīvasya svena rūpeṇa pāramārthikena brahmaṇābhiniṣpattirāñjasīti śruteratrāpi kleśaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:5207: apica paraṃ jyotiḥ sa uttamapuruṣa itihaivopariṣṭādviśeṣaṇāttejaso vyāvartya puruṣaviṣayatvenāvasthāpanājjyotiḥpadasya, parameva brahma jyotiḥ na tu teja iti siddham //40 //
GSP33vacbhamu:5210: vyutpāditaṃ, tathāpi tadvadatra paramātmaliṅgadarśanābhāvānnāmarūpanirmahaṇasya bhūtākāśe 'pyavakāśadānenopapatterakasmānna rūḍhiparityāgasyāyogāt, nāmarūpe antarā brahmeti ca nākāśasya nāmarūpayornirvahiturantarālatvamāha, api tu brahmaṇaḥ, tena bhūtākāśo nāmarūpayornirvahitā brahma caitayorantarālaṃ madhyaṃ sāramiti yāvat /
GSP33vacbhamu:5211: na tu nirvoḍaiva brahma, antarālaṃ vā nirvāḍhṛ /
GSP33vacbhamu:5216: bhūtākāśaṃ ca vikāratvena nāmarūpāntaḥpāti sat kathamātmānamudvahet /
GSP33vacbhamu:5217: nahi suśikṣito 'pi vijñānī svena skandhenātmānaṃ voḍhumutsahate /
GSP33vacbhamu:5218: naca nāmarūpaśrutiraviśeṣataḥ pravṛttā bhūtākāśavarjaṃ nāmarūpāntare saṃkocayituṃ sati saṃbhave yujyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:5219: naca nirvāhakatvaṃ niraṅkuśamavagataṃ brahmaliṅgaṃ kathañcitkleśena paratantre netumucitam 'anena jīvenātmanānupraviśya nāmarūpe vyākaravāṇi'
GSP33vacbhamu:5221: brahmarūpatayā ca jīvasya vyākartṛtve brahmaṇa eva vyākartṛtvamuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:5223: tathā ca te nāmarūpe yadantaretyayamarthāntaravyapadeśa upapanno bhavatyākāśasya /
GSP33vacbhamu:5224: tasmādarthāntaravyapadeśāt, tathā 'tadbrahma tadamṛtam' iti vyapadeśādbrahmaivākāśamiti siddham suṣuptyutkrāntyorbhedena. /
GSP33vacbhamu:5228: tameva ca 'yo 'yaṃ vijñānamayaḥ prāṇeṣu' ityādiśrutisaṃdarbha ādimadhyāvasāneṣvāmṛśatīti tadanuvādaparo bhavitumarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:5229: evaṃ ca saṃsāryātmaiva kiñcidapekṣya mahān, saṃsārasya cānāditvenānāditvādaja ucyate, na tu tadatiriktaḥ kaścidatra nityaśuddhabuddhamuktatvabhāvaḥ pratipādyaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:5230: yattu suṣuptyutkrāntyoḥ prājñenātmanā saṃpariṣvakta iti bhedaṃ manyase,
GSP33vacbhamu:5231: nāsau bhedaḥ kintvayamātmaśabdaḥ svabhāvavacanaḥ, tena suṣuptyutkrāntyavasthāyāṃ viśeṣaviṣayābhāvātsaṃpiṇḍitaprajñeva
GSP33vacbhamu:5235: patyādayaśca śabdāḥ saṃsāriṇyeva kāryakaraṇasaṃghātātmakasya jagato jīvakarmārjitatayā tadbhogyatayā ca yojanīyāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:5236: tasmātsaṃsāryevānūdyate na tu paramātmā pratipadyata iti prāptam /
GSP33vacbhamu:5242: tatpratipādakā hi śataśa āgamāḥ 'īkṣaternāśabdam' 'gatisāmānyāt' ityādibiḥ sūtrasaṃdarbhairupapāditāḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:5245: naca prājñasya paramātmano jīvādbhedena saṃkīrtanaṃ sati saṃbhave rāhoḥ śira itivadaupacārikaṃ yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:5246: naca prājñaśabdaḥ prajñāprakarṣaśālini nirūḍhavṛttiḥ kathañcidajñaviṣayo vyākhyātumucitaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:5251: 'yaṃ vijñānamayaḥ' ityādinā jīvātmānaṃ lokasiddhamanūdya tasya paramātmabhāvo 'nanadhigataḥ pratipādyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:5253: anadhigatārthāvabodhanaparaṃ hi śābdaṃ pramāṇaṃ, na tvanuvādamātraniṣṭhaṃ bhavitumarhati
GSP33vacbhamu:5255: evaṃ ca mahattvaṃ cājatvaṃ ca sarvagatasya nityasyātmanaḥ saṃbhavānnāpekṣikaṃ kalpayiṣyate
