GSP33vacbhamu:5258: api tvavasthānāmupajanāpāyadharmakatvena tadatiriktamavasthārahitaṃ paramātmānaṃ vivakṣati, uparitanavākyasaṃdarbhālocanāditi //42 //
GSP33vacbhamu:5261: vaśaḥ sāmarthyaṃ sarvasya jagataḥ prabhavatyayam, vyūhāvasthānasamartha iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:5262: ata eva sarvasyeśānaḥ, sāmarthyena hyayamuktena sarvasyeṣṭe,
GSP33vacbhamu:5266: kiñca sa evaṃbhūto hyadyantarjyotiḥ puruṣo vijñānamayo na sādhunā karmaṇā bhūyānutkṛṣṭo bhavatītyevamādyāḥ śrutayo 'saṃsāriṇaṃ paramātmānameva pratipādayanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:5270: iti prathamādhyāyasya jñeyabrahmapratipādakāspaṣṭaśrutisamanvayākhyastṛtīyaḥ pājaḥ. prathamādhyāye caturthaḥ pādaḥ. /
GSP33vacbhamu:5273: brahmajījñāsāṃ pratijñāya brahmaṇo lakṣaṇamuktam-'janmādyasya yataḥ' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:5274: taccedaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ na pradhānādau gataṃ, yena vyabhicārādalakṣaṇaṃ syāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:5276: gatisāmānyaṃ ca vedāntavākyānāṃ brahmakaraṇavādaṃ prati vidyate, na pradhānakāraṇavādaṃ pratīti prapañcitamadhastatena sūtrasaṃdarbheṇa /
GSP33vacbhamu:5278: naca 'mahataḥ paramavyaktam' ityādīnāṃ pradhāne samanvaye 'pi vyabhāciraḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:5279: nahyete pradhānakāraṇatvaṃ jagata āhuḥ, apitu pradhānasadbhāvamātram /
GSP33vacbhamu:5280: naca tatsadbhāvamātreṇa 'janmādyasya yataḥ' iti brahmalakṣaṇasya kiñciddhīyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:5281: tasmādanarthaka uttaraḥ saṃdarbha ityata āha- brahmajijñāsāṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:5288: evaṃ ca lakṣaṇavyabhicārādavyabhicārāya yukta uttarasaṃdarbhārambha iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:5303: laukikī hi prasiddhī rūḍhirvedārthanirṇaye nimittaṃ, tadupāyatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:5304: yathāhuḥ-'ya eva laukikāḥ śabdāsta eva vaidikāsta eva caiṣāmarthāḥ' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:5305: natu parīkṣakāṇāṃ pāribhāṣikī, pauruṣeyī hi sā na
GSP33vacbhamu:5317: pradhāsyākāṅkṣāvato vacanaṃ prakaraṇamiti gantavyaṃ viṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padaṃ pradhānamiti tadākāṅkṣāmavatārayati- taiścendriyādibhirasaṃyatairiti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:5320: nanvāntaratvena yadi śreṣṭhatvaṃ tadendriyāṇāmeva bāhyebhyo gandhāhibhyaḥ śreṣṭhatvaṃ syādityata āha- arthā ye śabdādaya iti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:5321: nāntaratvena śreṣṭhatvamapi tu pradhānatayā, tacca vivakṣādhīnaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:5322: grahebhyaścendriyebhyo 'tigrahayārthānāṃ pradhānyaṃ śrutyā vivakṣitamitīndriyebhyor'thānāṃ prādhānyātparatvaṃ bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:5323: ghrāṇajihvāvākcakṣuḥ śrotramanohastatvaco hi indriyāṇi śrutyāṣṭau grahā uktāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:5325: na caitani svarūpavato vaśīkartumīśate, yāvadasmai puruṣaśave gandharasanāmarūpaśabdakāmakarmasparśānnopaharanti
GSP33vacbhamu:5326: ata eva gandhādayo 'ṣṭāvatigrahāḥ, tadupahāreṇa grahāṇāṃ grahatvopapatteḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:5331: kasmātpumān rathitvenopakṣipto gṛhyata ityata āha- ātmaśabdāditi. /
GSP33vacbhamu:5338: tadevaṃ sarvāsāṃ buddhīnāṃ prathamajahiraṇyagarbhabuddhyekanīḍatayā hiraṇyagarbhabuddhermahattvaṃ cāpanādā(copanādānā?)tmatvaṃ ca /
GSP33vacbhamu:5340: nanvetasminpakṣe hiraṇyagarbhabuddherātmatvānna rathita ātmano bhokturatropādānamiti na rathamātraṃ pariśiṣyate 'pi tu rathavānapītyata āha- etasmiṃstu pakṣa iti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:5341: yathā hi samāropitaṃ pratibimbaṃ bimbānna vastuto bhidyate tathā na paramātmano vijñānātmā vastuto bhidyata iti paramātmaiva rathavānihopāttastena rathamātraṃ parisiṣṭamiti /
GSP33vacbhamu:5342: atha rathādirūpakakalpanāyāḥ śarīrādiṣu kiṃ prayojanamityata āha -śarīrendriyamanobuddhiviṣayavadenāsaṃyuktasya hīti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:5345: naca jīvasya brahmatvaṃ mānāntarasiddhaṃ, yenātra nāgamo 'pekṣyetyāha- tathāceti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:5353: nanvevaṃ sati pradhānamevābyupetaṃ bhavati, sukhaduḥkhamohātmakaṃ hi jagadevaṃbhūtādeva kāraṇādbhavitumarhati, kāraṇātmakatvātkāryasya /
GSP33vacbhamu:5359: pradhānaṃ hi sāṃkhyānāṃ seśvarāṇāmanīśvarāṇāṃ veśvarāt kṣetrajñebhyo vā vastuto bhinnaṃ śakyaṃ nirvaktum /
GSP33vacbhamu:5360: brahmaṇastviyamavidyā śaktirmāyādiśabdavācyā na śakyā tattvenānyatvena vā nirvaktum /
GSP33vacbhamu:5367: yadi brahmaṇo 'vidyāśaktyā saṃsāraḥ pratīyate hanta muktānāmapi
GSP33vacbhamu:5369: tadvināśe vā samastasaṃsārocchedaḥ tanmūlavidyāśakteḥ samucchedādityata āha- muktānāṃ ca punaḥ. /
GSP33vacbhamu:5375: tena yasyaiva jīvasya vidyotpannā tasyaivāvidyāpanīyate na jīvāntarasya,
GSP33vacbhamu:5378: pradhānasyaikatvena taducchede sarvocchedo 'nucchede vā na kasyacidityanirmokṣaprasaṅgaḥ. pradhānabhede 'pi
GSP33vacbhamu:5379: caitadavivekakhyātilakṣaṇāvidyāsadasattvanibandhanau bandhamokṣau, tarhi kṛtaṃ pradhānena, avidyāsadasadbhāvābhyāmeva tadupapatteḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:5380: na cāvidyopādhibhedādhīno jīvabhedo jīvabhedādhīnaścāvidyopādhibheda iti parasparāśrayādubhayāsiddhiriti sāṃpratam /
GSP33vacbhamu:5384: nahyacetanaṃ caitanānadhiṣṭhitaṃ kāryāya paryāptamiti svakāryaṃ kartuṃ parameśvaraṃ nimittatayopādānatayā vāśrayate, prapañcavibhramasya hīśvarādhiṣṭhānatvamahivibhramasyeva rajjvadhiṣṭhānatvam, tena yathāhivibhramo rajjūpādāna evaṃ prapañcavibhrama īśvaropādānaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:5386: itīśvarāśrayetyucyate, na tvādhāratayā, vidyāsvabhāve brahmaṇi tadanupapatteriti /
GSP33vacbhamu:5387: ata evāha- yasyāṃ svarūpapratibodharahitāḥ śerate saṃsāriṇo jīvā iti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:5389: jīvānāṃ svarūpaṃ vāstavaṃ brahma, tadbodharahitāḥ śerata iti laya uktaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:5392: yadyapi jīvāvyaktayoranāditvenāniyataṃ paurvāparyaṃ tathāpyavyaktasya pūrvatvaṃ vivakṣitvaitaduktam
GSP33vacbhamu:5403: na cākāhkṣāṃ vinaikavākyatvam, ubhayaṃ ca prakṛtamityubhayaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:5411: kintu duḥśodhatvātsūkṣmasyaiva śarīrasya, natu ṣāṭkauśikasya sthūlasyaṣa
GSP33vacbhamu:5412: etaddhi dṛṣṭabībhatsatayā sukaraṃ vairāgyaviṣayatvena śodhayitumityata āha- na caivaṃ. mantavyamiti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:5413: viṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padamavagamayituṃ paraṃ paramatra pratipādyatvena prastutaṃ na tu vairāgyāya śodhanamityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:5414: alaṃ vā vivādena, bhavatu sūkṣmameva śarīraṃ pariśodhyaṃ, tathāpi na sāṃkhyābhimatamatra pradhānaṃ paramityabhyupetyāha- sarvathāpi tviti. jñeyatvāvacanācca. /
GSP33vacbhamu:5416: sāṃkhyaiḥ khalu pradhānādvivekena puruṣaṃ niḥśreyasāya jñātuṃ vā vibhūtyai vā pradhānaṃ jñeyatvenopakṣipyate
GSP33vacbhamu:5417: na ceha jānīyāditi copāsīteti vā vidhivibhaktiśrutirasti, api tvavyaktapadamātram /
GSP33vacbhamu:5419: jñeyatvāvacanasyāsiddhimāśaṅkya tatsiddhipradarśanārthaṃ sūtram- vadatīti cenna prājño hi prakaraṇāt. /
GSP33vacbhamu:5422: varapradānopakramā hi mṛtyunaciketaḥ saṃvādavākyapravṛttirāmāpteḥ kaṭhavallīnāṃ lakṣyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:5423: mṛtyuḥ kila na ciketase kupitena pitrā prahitāya tuṣṭastrīnvarān pradadau
GSP33vacbhamu:5424: naciketāstu pathamena vareṇa pituḥ saumanasyaṃ vavre, dvitīyenāgnividyām,
GSP33vacbhamu:5427: nanu tatra varapradāne pradhānagocare staḥ praśnapartivacane /
GSP33vacbhamu:5428: tasmātkaṭhavallīṣvagnijīvaparamātmaparaiva vākyapravṛttirna tvanupakrāntapradhānaparā bhavitumarhatītyāha- itaśca na pradhānasyāvyaktaśabdavācyatvamiti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:5429: 'hantaḥ ta idaṃ pravakṣyāmi guhyaṃ brahma sanātanam' ityanena vyavahitaṃ jīvaviṣayaṃ 'yathā tu maraṇaṃ prāpyātmā bhavati gautama'
GSP33vacbhamu:5431: atrāha codakaḥ-kiṃ jīvaparamātmanoreka eva praśnaḥ, kiṃ vānyo jīvasya
GSP33vacbhamu:5432: 'yeyaṃ prete' manuṣya iti praśāntaḥ, anyaśca paramātmanaḥ 'anyatra
GSP33vacbhamu:5438: varapradānānantarbhāve praśnasya tadvat pradhānākhyānamapyanantarbhūtaṃ varapradāne 'stu 'mahataḥ paramavyakta'mityākṣepaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:5443: vāstavaśca jīvaparamātmanorabhedastatra tatra śrutyupanyāsena bhagavatā bhāṣyakāreṇa darśitaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:5445: 'yeyaṃ prete' iti hi naciketasaḥ praśnamupaśrutya tattatkāmaviṣayamalobhaṃ cāsya pratītya mṛtyuḥ 'vidyābhīpsinaṃ naciketasaṃ manye' ityādinā naciketasaṃ praśasya praśnamapi tadīyaṃ praśaṃsannasminpraśne
GSP33vacbhamu:5447: yadi punarjīvātprājño bhidyeta, jīvagocaraḥ praśnaḥ, prājñagocaraṃ cottaramiti kiṃ kena saṃgaccheta
GSP33vacbhamu:5448: apica yadviṣayaṃ praśnamupaśrutya mṛtyunaiṣa praśaṃsito naciketāḥ yadi tameva bhūyaḥ pṛcchettaduttare cāvadadhyāt tataḥ praśaṃsā dṛṣṭārthā syāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:5449: praśnāntare tvasāvasthāne prasāritā satyadṛṣṭārthā syādityāha- yatpraśneti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:5454: sāṃkhyānāṃ mahattattvaṃ sattāmātraṃ, puruṣārthakriyākṣamaṃ sattasya bhāvaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:5456: yā yā puruṣārthakriyā śabdādyupabhogalakṣaṇā ca sattvapuruṣānyatākhyātilakṣaṇā ca sā sarvā mahati buddhau samāpyata iti mahattattvaṃ sattāmātramucyata iti //7 //
GSP33vacbhamu:5458: ajāśabdo yadyapi chāgāyāṃ rūḍhastathāpyadhyātmavidyādhikārānna tatra kartitumarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:5460: tatra kiṃ svatantraṃ pradhānamanena mantravarṇenānūdyatāmuta pārameśvarī māyāśaktistejo 'bannavyākriyākāraṇamucyatām kiṃ tāvatprāptaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:5464: sā hi pradhānalakṣaṇā prakṛtirna jāyata ityajā ca ekā ca lohitaśuklakṛṣṇā ca /
GSP33vacbhamu:5465: yadyapi lohitatvādayo varṇā na rajaḥprabhṛtiṣu santi, tathāpi lohitaṃ kusumbhādi rañjayati,
GSP33vacbhamu:5467: evaṃ prasannaṃ pāthaḥ śuklaṃ, sattvamapi prasannamiti śuklam /
GSP33vacbhamu:5469: pareṇāpi nāvyākṛtasya svarūpeṇa lohitatvādiyoga āstheyaḥ, kintu tatkāryasya tejo 'bannasya rohitvādikāraṇa upacaraṇīyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:5470: kāryasārūpeṇa vā kāraṇe kalpanīyaṃ, tadasmākamapi tulyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:5471: 'ajo hyeko juṣamāṇo 'nuśete jahātyenāṃ bhuktabhogāmajo 'nyaḥ' iti tvātmabhedaśravaṇāt sāṃkhyasmṛterevātra mantravarṇe pratyabhijñānaṃ na
GSP33vacbhamu:5476: avayavāḥ pradhānasmaikasya sattvarajastamāṃsi teṣāṃ dharmā lohitatvādayastairiti /
GSP33vacbhamu:5479: tathāhi-maitradāreṣu narmadāyāṃ maitrasya sukhaṃ, tat kasya hetoḥ, taṃ prati sattvasya samudbhavāt
GSP33vacbhamu:5480: tathāca tatsapatnīnāṃ duḥkhaṃ, tat kasya hetoḥ, tāḥ prati rajaṛsamudbhavāt, tathā caitrasya tāmavindato moho viṣādaḥ, sa kasya hetoḥ, taṃ prati tamaḥsamudbhavāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:5484: viṣayā hi śabdādayaḥ prakṛtivikārastraiguṇyena sukhaduḥkhamohātmāna indriyamano 'haṅkārapraṇālikayā buddhisattvamupasaṃkrāmanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:5485: tena tadbuddhisattvaṃ pradhānavikāraḥ sukhaduḥkhamohātmakaṃ śabdādirūpeṇa pariṇamate /
GSP33vacbhamu:5486: citiśaktistvapariṇāminyapratisaṃkramāpi buddhisattvādātmano vivekabudhyamānā buddhivṛttyaiva viparyāsenāvidyayā buddhisthānsukhādīnātmanyabhimanyamānā sukhādimatīva bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:5495: evaṃ prāpte 'bhidhīyate-na tāvat 'ajo hyeko juṣamāṇo 'nuśete jahātyenāṃ bhuktabhogamajo 'nyaḥ' ityetadātmabhedapratipādanaparamapi tu siddhamātmabhedaṃnūdya bandhamokṣau pratipādayatīti sa cānūdito bhedaḥ 'eko devaḥ sarvabhūteṣu gūḍhaḥ sarvavyāpī
GSP33vacbhamu:5498: tathāca na sāṃkhyaprakriyāpratyabhijñānamityajāvākyaṃ camasavākyavatpariplavamānaṃ na svatantrapradhānaniścayāya paryāptam /
GSP33vacbhamu:5500: uttarasūtramavatārayituṃ śaṅkate- tatra tvidaṃ tacchira iti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:5505: pratipattavyā, 'rohitaśuklakṛṣṇām' iti rohitādirupatayā tasyā eva pratyabhijñānāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:5507: tasyā aprāmāṇikatayā śrutahānyaśrutakalpanāprasaṅgāt, rañjanādinā ca rohitādyupacārasya sati mukhyārthasaṃbhave 'yogāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:5509: ajāpadasya ca samudāyaprasiddhiparityāgena na jāyata ityavayavaprasiddhyāśrayaṇe doṣaprasaṅgāt
GSP33vacbhamu:5511: api cāyamapi śrutikalāpo 'smaddarśanānuguṇo na sāṃkhyasmṛtyanuguṇa ityāha
GSP33vacbhamu:5515: yathāhuḥ-'puruṣasya tu śuddhasya nāśuddhā vikṛtirbavet' ityāśayavatīva śrutiḥ pṛcchati /
GSP33vacbhamu:5518: te brahmavido dhyānayogenātmānaṃ gatāḥ prāptā apaśyanniti yojanā /
GSP33vacbhamu:5520: avidyā śaktiryoniḥ, sā ca pratijīvaṃ nānetyuktamato vīpsopapannā /
GSP33vacbhamu:5528: nanu kiṃ chāgā lohitaśuklakṛṣṇaivānyādṛśīnāmapi chāgānāmupalambhādityata āha- yadṛcchayeti. bahubarkarā bahuśāvā /
GSP33vacbhamu:5532: pañcajanā iti hi samāsārthaḥ pañcasaṃkhyayā saṃbadhyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:5536: evaṃ cātmani pcamanujānāmākāśasya ca pratiṣṭhānamiti nistātparyaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:5540: tatrāpi kiṃ pañca prāṇādayo vākyaśeṣagatā vivakṣyante uta tadatiriktā anya eva vā kecit /
GSP33vacbhamu:5546: tasmātkānicideva tattvānīha pañca pratyekaṃ pañcasaṃkhyāyogīni pañcaviṃśatitattvāni bhavanti
GSP33vacbhamu:5548: pañcaviṃśatitattvāni smaryanta iti tānyevānena mantreṇocyanta iti nāśabdaṃ pradhānādi /
GSP33vacbhamu:5549: na cādhāratvenātmano vyavasthānātsvātmani cādhārādheyabhāvasya virodhāt ākāśasya ca vyatirecanāt, trayoviṃśatirjanā iti syānna pañca pañcajanā iti
GSP33vacbhamu:5552: tathāca satyātmākāśābhyāṃ saptaviṃśatisaṃkhyāyāṃ pañcaviṃśatitattvānīti svasiddhāntavyākopa iti cet, na mūlaprakṛtitvamātreṇaikīkṛtya sattvarajastamāṃsi pañcaviṃśatitattvopapatteḥ hirugbhāvena tu teṣāṃ saptaviṃśatitvāvirodhaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:5555: nāsāvanyasya vikṛtirapi tu prakṛtireva tadidamuktam- mūleti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:5558: evamahaṅkāratattvaṃ mahato vikṛtiḥ, prakṛtiśca tadeva tāmasaṃ sat pañcatanmātrāṇām /
GSP33vacbhamu:5565: yadyapi pṛthivyādayo goghaṭādīnāṃ prakṛtistathāpi na te pṛthivyādibhyastattvāntaramiti na prakṛtiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:5568: evaṃ prāpte 'bhidhīyate -na saṃkhyopasaṃgrahādapi pradhānādīnāṃ śrutimattvāśaṅkā kartavyā
GSP33vacbhamu:5572: na khalu sattvarajastamohadahaṅkārāṇāmekaḥ kriyā dā guṇo vā dravyaṃ vā jātirvā dharmaḥ pañcatanmātrādibhyo vyāvṛttaḥ sattvādiṣu cānugataḥ kaścidasti /
GSP33vacbhamu:5575: nāpi pāṇāpādapāyūpasthamanasāṃ, yenaikenāsādhāraṇenopagṛhītāḥ pañca pañcakā bhavitumarhati
GSP33vacbhamu:5576: pūrvapakṣaikadeśinamutthāpayati- athocyeta pañcaviṃśasaṃkhyaiveyamiti. yadyapi parasyāṃ saṃkhyāyāmavāntarasaṃkhyā dvitvādikā nāsti tathāpi tatpūrvaṃ tasyāḥ saṃbhavāt paurvāparyalakṣaṇayā pratyāsattyā parasaṃkhyopalakṣaṇārthaṃ pūrvasaṃkhyopanyasyata iti dūṣayati- ayamevāsminpakṣe doṣa iti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:5577: naca pañcaśabdo janaśabdena samasto 'samastaḥ śakyo vaktumityāha- paraścātra pañcaśabda iti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:5578: nanu bhavatu samāsastathāpi kimityata āha- samastatvācceti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:5579: api ca vīpsāyāṃ pañcakadvayagrahaṇe daśaiva tattvānīti na
GSP33vacbhamu:5581: na caikā pañcasaṃkhyā pañcasaṃkhyāntareṇa śakyā viśeṣṭum /
GSP33vacbhamu:5584: tadevaṃ pūrvapakṣaikadeśini dūṣite paramapūrvapakṣiṇamutthāpayati -nanvāpannapañcasaṃkhyākā janā eveti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:5585: atra tāvadrūḍhau satyāṃ na yogaḥ saṃbhavatīti vakṣyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:5588: pañcapūlītyatra yadyapi pṛthaktvaikārthasaṃvāyinī pañcasaṃkhyāvacchedikāsti tathāpīha samudāyino 'vacchinatti na samudāyaṃ samāsapadagamyamatastasmin kati te samudāyā ityapekṣāyāṃ padāntarābhihitā
GSP33vacbhamu:5590: pañcajanā ityatra tu pañcasaṃkhyayotpattiśiṣṭatayā janānāmavacchinnatvātsamudāyasya ca pañcapūlīvadatrāpratīterna padāntarābhihitā saṃkhyā saṃbadhyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:5596: nahyupasarjanaṃ viśeṣaṇena yujyate pañcaśabda eva tāvatsaṃkhyeyopasarjanasaṃkhyāmāha viśeṣatastu pañcajanā ityatra samāse /
GSP33vacbhamu:5597: viśeṣaṇāpekṣāyāṃ tu na samāsaḥ syāt, asāmarthyāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:5598: nahi bhavati ṛddhasya rājapuruṣa iti samāso 'pi tu (pada) vṛttireva ṛddhasya rājñaḥ puruṣa iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:5602: yadi sattvarajastamāṃsi pradhānenaikīkṛtyātmākāśau tattvebhyo vyatiricyete tadā siddhāntavyākopaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:5603: atha tu sattvarajastamāṃsi mitho bhedena vivakṣyante tathāpi vastutattvavyavasthāpane ādhāratvenātmā niṣkṛṣyatām /
GSP33vacbhamu:5608: naca rūḍhau satyāmavayavaprasiddhergrahaṇaṃ, sāpekṣatvāt, nirapekṣatvācca rūḍheḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:5609: tadyadi rūḍhau mukhyor'thaḥ prāpyate tataḥ sa eva grahītavyo 'tha tvasau na vākye saṃbandhārhaḥ pūrvāparavākyavirodhī vā /
GSP33vacbhamu:5612: nirūḍhavṛttistadaparityāgenaiva nipatyādānasādṛśyenārthavādikena kratuviśeṣe vartate, tathā pañcajanaśabdo 'vayavārthayogānapekṣa
GSP33vacbhamu:5614: yathā saptarṣiśabdo vasiṣṭha ekasmin saptasu ca vartate /
GSP33vacbhamu:5617: rūḍhau satyāṃ pcaviṃśatereva saṃkhyāyā abhāvātkathaṃ tattveṣu vartate //11
GSP33vacbhamu:5618: evaṃ ca ke te pañcajanā ityapekṣāyāṃ kiṃ vākyaśeṣagatāḥ prāṇādayo gṛhyantāmuta pañcaviṃśatistattvānīti viśaye tattvānāmaprāmāṇikatvāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:5619: prāṇādīnāṃ ca vākyaśeṣe śravaṇāttatparityāge śrutahānyaśrutakalpanāprasaṅgātprāṇādaya eva pañcajanāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:5620: naca kāṇḍavamādhyandinayorvirodhānna prāṇādīnāṃ vākyaśeṣagatānāmapi grahaṇamiti sāṃpratam, virodhe 'pi tulyabalatayā ṣoḍaśigrahaṇavadvikalpopapatteḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:5626: tasya kathaṃ prāṇādiṣvajaneṣu prayoga iti vyākhyeyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:5627: anyathā tu pratyastamitāvayavārthe samudāyaśabdārthe janaśabdārtho nāstītyaparyanuyoga eva
GSP33vacbhamu:5630: nanu satyāmavayavaprasiddhau samupāyaśaktikalpanamanupapannaṃ, saṃbhavati ca pañcaviṃśatyāṃ tattveṣvavayavaprasiddhirityata āha- samāsabalācceti. syādetat /
GSP33vacbhamu:5631: samāsabalāccedrūḍhirāsthīyate hanta na dṛṣṭastarhi tasya prayogo
GSP33vacbhamu:5634: janeṣu tāvatpañcajanaśabdaśca prathamaḥ prayogo lokeṣu dṛṣṭa ityasati prathamaprayoga ityasiddhamiti sthavīyastayānabhidhāyābhyupetya prathamaprayogābhāvaṃ samādhatte-śakyodbhidādivaditi /
GSP33vacbhamu:5638: atha samanvayalakṣaṇe keyamakāṇḍe virodhāvirodhacintā, bhavitā hi tasyāḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:5640: ayamarthaḥ nānekaśākhāgatatattadvākyālocanayā vākyārthāvagame paryavasite sati pramāṇāntaravirodhena vākyārthāgateraprāmāṇyamāśaṅkyāvirodhavyutpādanena prāmāṇyavyavasthāpanamavirodhalakṣaṇārthaḥ prāsaṅgikaṃ tu tatra sṛṣṭiviṣayāṇāṃ vākyānāṃ parasparamavirodhapratipādanaṃ na tu lakṣaṇārthaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:5642: iha tu-vākyānāṃ sṛṣṭipratipādakānāṃ parasparavirodhe brahmaṇi jagadyonau na samanvayaḥ seddhumarhati
GSP33vacbhamu:5643: tathāca na jagatkāraṇatvaṃ brahmaṇo lakṣaṇaṃ, naca tatra gatisāmānyaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:5644: naca tatsiddhaye pradhānasyāśabdatvapratipādanaṃ, tasmādvākyānāṃ virodhāvirodhābyāmuktārthākṣepasamādhānābhyāṃ samanvayaḥ evopapādyata iti samanvayalakṣaṇe saṃgatamidamadhikaraṇam /
GSP33vacbhamu:5652: sṛṣṭyā ca kāryeṇa tatkāraṇatayā brahma lakṣitam /
GSP33vacbhamu:5653: sṛṣṭivipratipattau tatkāraṇatāyāṃ brahmalakṣaṇe vipratipattau satyāṃ bhavati tallakṣye brahmaṇyapi vipratipatti /
GSP33vacbhamu:5655: vedāntāstu kartrādipratipādanena karmavidhiparatayopacaritārthā avivakṣitārthā vā japopayogina iti prāptam /
GSP33vacbhamu:5658: evaṃ prāpta ucyate-'sargakramavivāde 'pi na sa sṛṣṭari vidyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:5664: piṇḍopakaraṇastu paṭati ghṛtapūrṇaṃ, tadasya devadattasya sarvatraitāsmin
GSP33vacbhamu:5665: kartṛtvācchakyaṃ vaktuṃ devadattāccakrādi saṃbhūtaṃ tasmāccakrādeḥ kumbhādīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:5667: nahyastyasaṃbhavaḥ sarvatrāsmin kāryajāte kramavatyapi devadattasya sākṣātkarturanusyūtatvāt
GSP33vacbhamu:5668: tathehāpi yadyapyākāśādikrameṇaiva sṛṣṭistathāpyākāśānakālānilādau tatra tatra sākṣāt parameśvarasya kartṛtvācchakyaṃ vaktuṃ parameśvarādākāśaḥ saṃbhūta iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:5669: śakyaṃ ca vaktuṃ parameśvarādanalaḥ saṃbhūta ityādi /
GSP33vacbhamu:5670: yadi tvākāśādvāyurvāyosteja ityuktvā tejaso vāyurvāyorākāśa iti brūyādbhavedvirodhaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:5674: eṣā hi svavyāpāramabhidhānakrameṇa kurvatī nābhidheyānāṃ kramaṃ niruṇāddhi
GSP33vacbhamu:5675: te tu yathākramāsthitā evākrameṇocyante-yathā kramavanti jñānāni jānātīti
GSP33vacbhamu:5680: naca sṛṣṭivigānaṃ sraṣṭari tadadhīnanirūpaṇe vigānamāvahatīti vācyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:5687: tena 'phalavatsaṃnidhāvaphalaṃ tadaṅgam' iti sṛṣṭivijñānaṃ sraṣṭṛbrahmavijñānāṅgaṃ tadanuguṇaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:5689: tathāca śrutiḥ-'annena somya śuṅgenāpo mūlamanviccha' ityādikā /
GSP33vacbhamu:5693: api tu 'guṇe tvanyāyakalpanā' iti tadanuguṇatayā vyākhyeyā /
GSP33vacbhamu:5694: yacca kāraṇe vigānam'asadvā idamatra asīt' iti, tadapi 'tadapyeṣa śloko
GSP33vacbhamu:5699: 'taddhaika āhurasadevedamatra āsīt' iti tu nirākāryatayopanyastamiti na kāraṇe vivāda iti sūtre caśabdastvarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:5701: ākāśādiṣu sṛjyamāneṣu kramavigāne 'pi na sraṣṭari vigānam /
GSP33vacbhamu:5703: yathaikasyāṃ śrutau vyapadiṣṭaḥ parameśvaraḥ sarvasya kartā tathaiva
GSP33vacbhamu:5704: śrutyantareṣūkteḥ, kena rūpeṇa, kāraṇatvena, aparaḥ kalpo yathā
GSP33vacbhamu:5705: vyapadiṣṭaḥ krama ākāśādiṣu, 'ātmana ākāśaḥ saṃbhūta ākāśādvāyurvāyoragniragnerāpo 'dbhyaḥ pṛthivī' iti, tasyaiva kramasyānapabādhanena 'tattejo 'sṛjata' ityādikāyā api sṛṣṭerukterna
GSP33vacbhamu:5713: vyakriyata iti ca karmakartari karmaṇi vā rūpaṃ, na cetanatiriktaṃ kartāraṃ pratikṣipati kintūpasthāpayati /
GSP33vacbhamu:5714: nahi lūyate kedāraḥ svayameveti vā lūyate kedāra iti vā lavitāraṃ devadattādiṃ pratikṣipati
GSP33vacbhamu:5718: nanu 'brahma te bravāṇi' iti brahmābhidhānaprakaraṇāt, upasaṃhāre ca 'sarvān pāpmano 'pahatya sarveṣāṃ ca bhūtānāṃ śraiṣṭhyaṃ svārājyaṃ paryeti
GSP33vacbhamu:5719: ya evaṃ veda' iti niratiśayaphalaśravaṇādbrahmavedanādanyatra tadasaṃbhavāt, ādityacandrādigatapuruṣakartṛtvasya ca 'yasya vaitatkarma'
GSP33vacbhamu:5720: iti cāsyāsatyavacchede sarvanāmnā pratyakṣasiddhasya jagataḥ paramārśena,
GSP33vacbhamu:5722: ucyate-brahma te bravaṇīti bālākinā gārgyeṇa brahmābhidhānaṃ pratijñāya
GSP33vacbhamu:5724: yasya cājātaśatroḥ 'yo vai bālāke eteṣāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ kartā yasya
GSP33vacbhamu:5725: vaitatkarma' iti vākyaṃ na tena brahmābhidhānaṃ pratijñātam /
GSP33vacbhamu:5730: kārye tu kriyata iti vyutpattyā vartate /
GSP33vacbhamu:5733: vākyaśeṣe ca 'athāsmin prāṇa evaikadhā bhavati' iti śravaṇātparispandalakṣaṇasya ca karmaṇo yatropapattiḥ sa eva veditavyatayopadiśyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:5737: upakramānurodhena copasaṃhāre sarvaśabdaḥ sarvān pāpmana iti ca sarveṣāṃ bhūtānāmiti cāpekṣikavṛttirvahūn pāpmano bahūnāṃ bhūtānāmityevaṃparo draṣṭavyaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:5739: yadi tu dṛptabālākimabrahmaṇi brahmābhidhāyinamapodyājātaśatrorvacanaṃ brahmaviṣayamevānyathā tu taduktādviśeṣaṃ vivakṣorabrahmābhidhānamasaṃbaddhaṃ syāditi manyate, tathāpi naitadbrahmābhidhānaṃ bhavitumarhati, apitu jīvābhidhānameva, yatkāraṇaṃ veditavyatayopanyastasya puruṣāṇāṃ karturvedanāyopetaṃ bālakiṃ prati
GSP33vacbhamu:5740: bubodhayiṣurajātaśatruḥ suptaṃ puruṣamāmantryāmāntraṇaśabdāśravaṇāt prāṇādīnāmabhoktṛtvamasvāmitvaṃ pratibodha yaṣṭighātotthānāt prāṇādivyatiriktaṃ jīvaṃ bhoktāraṃ svāminaṃ pratibodhayati /
GSP33vacbhamu:5741: parastādapi 'tadyathā śreṣṭhī svairbhuṅkte yathā vā svāḥ śreṣṭhinaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:5742: bhuñjantyevamevaiṣa prajñātmaitairātmabhirbhuṅkte evamevaita ātmāna enamātmānaṃ bhuñjanti' iti śravaṇāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:5743: yathā śreṣṭhī pradhānaḥ puruṣaḥ svairbhṛtyaiḥ karaṇabhūtairviṣayān
GSP33vacbhamu:5744: bhuṅkte, yathā vā svā bhṛtyāḥ śreṣṭhinaṃ bhuñjanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:5747: te hyādityādaya ālokavṛṣṭyādinā sācivyamācaranto jīvātmānaṃ bhojayanti,
GSP33vacbhamu:5756: ye ca praśnaprativacane-'kkaiṣa etad bālāke puruṣo 'śayiṣṭa yadā suptaḥ svapnaṃ na kañcana paśyati' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:5759: tasmājjīvaprāṇayoranyatara iha grāhyo na raparameśvara iti prāptam /
GSP33vacbhamu:5762: ' yathā hi kenacinmaṇilakṣaṇajñamamāninā kāce maṇireva veditavya ityakte parasya kāco 'yaṃ maṇirna tallakṣaṇāyogādityabhidhāya ātmano viśeṣaṃ jijñāpayiṣostattvābhidhānamasaṃbaddham amaṇau maṇyabhidhānaṃ na pūrvavādino viśeṣamāpādayati svayamapi mṛṣābhidhānāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:5764: evamajātaśatruṇā dṛptabālākerabrahmavādino viśeṣamātmano darśayatā jīvaprāṇābhidhāne asaṃbaddhamuktaṃ syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:5769: tasmāt 'brahma te bravāṇi' iti brahmaṇopakramāt, sarvān pāpmano 'pahatya
GSP33vacbhamu:5770: sarveṣāṃ ca bhūtānāṃ śraiṣṭhyaṃ svarājyaṃ paryeti ya evaṃ veda' iti ca sati saṃbhave sarvaśruterasaṃkocānniratiśayena
GSP33vacbhamu:5771: brahmavedanādanyataśca tadanupapatteḥ, ādityādipuruṣakartṛtvasya ca svātantryalakṣaṇasya mukhyasya brahmaṇyeva saṃbhavādanyeṣāṃ hiraṇyagarbhādīnāṃ tatpāratantryāt, 'kkaiṣa etadbālāke'
GSP33vacbhamu:5772: ityāderjīvādhikaraṇabhavanāpādanapraśnasya 'yadā suptaḥ svapnaṃ na kañcana paśyatyathāsmin prāṇa evaikadhā bhavati' ityāderuttasya ca brahmaṇyevopapatterbrahmaviṣayatvaṃ niścīyate atha kasmānna bhavato hiraṇyagarbhagocare eva praśnottare,
GSP33vacbhamu:5774: paṭhati-etasmādātmanaḥ prāṇā yathā yathāyatanaṃ pratiṣṭhanta iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:5776: yadyapi ca jīvo nātmano bhidyate tathāpyupādhyavacchinnasya paramātmano jīvatvenopādhibhedādbhedamāropyādhārādheyabhāvo draṣṭavyaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:5777: evaṃ ca jīvabhavanādhāratvamapādānatvaṃ ca paramātmana upapannam /
GSP33vacbhamu:5778: tadevaṃ bālākyajātaśatrusaṃvādavākyasaṃdarbhasya brahmaparatve sthite yasya vaitatkarma.iti vyāpārābhidhāne na saṃgacchata iti karmaśabdaḥ kāryābhidhāyī bhavati, etaditisarvanāmaparāmṛṣṭaṃ ca tatkāryaṃ, sarvanāma cedaṃ saṃnihitaparāmarśi, naca kiñcidiha śabdoktamasti saṃnihitam /
GSP33vacbhamu:5779: na cādityādipuruṣāḥ saṃnihitā api parāmarśārhāḥ bahutvāt puṃliṅgatvācca /
GSP33vacbhamu:5785: kintu kṛtsnameva jagadyasya kāryamiti vāśabdena sūcyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:5796: nirdiśyantāṃ puruṣāḥ kāryāstadviṣayā tu kṛtiranirdiṣṭā tatphalaṃ vā kāryasyotpattista yasyedaṃ karmeti nirdekṣyete, tataḥ kutaḥ paunaruktyamityata āha- nāpi puruṣaviṣayasyeti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:5800: nanu yadīdamā jagatparāmṛṣṭaṃ tatastadantarbhūtāḥ puruṣā apīti ya eteṣāṃ puruṣāṇāmiti punaruktamityata āha- etaduktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:5802: nanu 'prāṇa evaikadhā bhavati' ityādikādapi vākyājjīvātiriktaḥ kutaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:5803: pratīyata ityato vākyāntaraṃ paṭhati- etasmādātmanaḥ prāṇā iti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:5806: yato niḥsaṃbodho 'taḥ svacchatārūpamiva rūpamasyeti svacchatārūpo na tu svacchataiva /
GSP33vacbhamu:5810: ghaṭapaṭādivijñānaṃ tadrihitaṃ svarūpamātmanaḥ yadi vijñānamityevocyeta tatastadaviśiṣṭamanavacchinnaṃ sadbrahmaiva syāttacca nityamiti nopādhijanitaṃ nāpi tadrihitaṃ svarūpaṃ brahmasvabhāvasyāprahāṇāt ata uktam- viśeṣeti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:5811: yadā tu layalakṣaṇāvidyopabṛṃhito vikṣepasaṃskāraḥ samudācarati tadā viśeṣavijñānotpādātsvapnajāgarāvasthātaḥ paramātmano rūpādbhraṃśarūpamāgamanamiti /
GSP33vacbhamu:5815: nanvatrākāśaṃ śayanasthānaṃ tatkutaḥ paramātmapratyaya ityata āha- ākāśaśabdaśceti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:5817: yadapi ca dvāsaptatisahasrahitābhidhānāḍīsaṃcāreṇa suṣuptyavasthāyāṃ purītadavasthānamuktaṃ tadapyantaḥkaraṇasya /
GSP33vacbhamu:5821: tatra mandadhiyāṃ nedaṃ prāṇanirākaraṇāyeti buddhirmā bhūdityāśayavānāha-
GSP33vacbhamu:5831: nanu maitreyībrāhmaṇopakrame yājñavalkyena gārhasthyāśramāduttamāśramaṃ yiyāsatā maitraiṭyā bhāryāyāḥ kātyāyanyā sahārthasaṃvibhāgakaraṇa ukte maitreyī yājñavalkyaṃ pratimamṛtatvārthinī prapaccha, yannu ma iyaṃ bhagoḥ sarvā pṛthvī vittena pūrṇā syātkimahaṃ tanāmṛtā syāmuta neti tatra neti hovāca yājñavalkyaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:5832: yathaivopakaraṇavatāṃ jīvitaṃ tathaiva te jīvitaṃ syādamṛtatvasya tu nāśāsti vittena /
GSP33vacbhamu:5833: evaṃ vittenāmṛtatvāśā bhavedyadi vittasādhyāni karmāṇyamṛtatve upayujyeran
GSP33vacbhamu:5834: tadeva tu nāsti, jñānasādhyatvādamṛtatvasya karmaṇāṃ ca jñānavirodhināṃ tatsahabhāvitvānupapatteriti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:5835: sā hovāca maitreyī yenāhaṃ nāmṛtā syāṃ kimahaṃ tenaṃ kuryāṃ yadeva bhagavān veda tadeva me brūhi /
GSP33vacbhamu:5837: tatrāmṛtatvasādhanajñānopanyāsāya vairāgyapūrvakatvāttasya rāgaviṣayeṣu teṣu teṣu patijāyādiṣu vairāgyamutpādayituṃ yājñavalkyo 'na vā are patyuḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:5839: ātmaipādhikaṃ hi priyatvameṣāṃ na tu sākṣāt priyāṇyetāni /
GSP33vacbhamu:5840: tasmādetebhyaḥ patijāyādibhyo viramya yatra sākṣātprema sa eva ātmā vā are draṣṭavyaḥ śrotavyo mantavyo nididhyāsitavyaḥ. /
GSP33vacbhamu:5842: vā are darśanena śravaṇādisādhanenedaṃ jagatsarvaṃ viditaṃ bhavatīti vākyaśeṣaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:5843: yato nāmarūpātmakasya jagatastattvaṃ pāramārthikaṃ rūpamātmaiva bhujaṅgasyeva samāropitasya tattvaṃ rajjuḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:5844: tasmādātmani vidite sarvamidaṃ jagattattvaṃ viditaṃ bhavati, rajjvāmiva viditāyāṃ samāropitasya bhujaṅgasya tattvaṃ viditaṃ bhavati,
GSP33vacbhamu:5845: yatastasmādātmaiva draṣṭavyo na tu tadatiriktaṃ jagat svarūpeṇa draṣṭavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:5847: yato 'brahma taṃ parādāt' brāhmaṇajātirbrahmaṇo 'hamityevamabhimāna iti yāvat /
GSP33vacbhamu:5851: ātmaiva jagatastattvaṃ na tu tadatiriktaṃ kiñcittaditi /
GSP33vacbhamu:5853: yat khalu yadgrahaṃ vinā na śakyate grahītuṃ tattato na vyatiricyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:5854: yathā rajataṃ śuktikāyāḥ, bhujaṅgo vā rajjoḥ, dundubhyādiśabdasāmānyādvā tattacchabdabhedaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:5855: na gṛhyante ca cidrūpagrahaṇaṃ vinā sthitikāle nāmarūpāṇi /
GSP33vacbhamu:5859: na kevalaṃ sthitikāle nāmarūpaprapañcaścidātmātirekeṇāgrahaṇāccidātmano na vyatiricyate 'pi tu nāmarūpotpatteḥ prāgapi cidrūpāvasthānāt tadupādānatvācca nāmarūpaprapañcasya tadanatirekaḥ, rajjūpādānasyeva bhujaṅgasya rajjoranatireka ityetadvṛṣṭāntena sādhayati bhagavatī
GSP33vacbhamu:5861: are 'sya mahato bhūtasya niḥśvasitametadyadṛgvedaḥ' ityādinā caturvidho mantra uktaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:5868: yadā ca nāmadheyasyeyaṃ gatistadā tatpūrvakasya rūpadheyasya kaiva katheti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:5869: na kevalaṃ tadupādānatvāttato na vyatiricyate nāmarūpaprapañcaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:5871: yathā sāmudramevāmbhaḥ pṛthivītejaḥ saṃparkāt kāṭhinyamupagataṃ saindhavaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:5872: khilyaḥ, sa hi svākāre samudre kṣipto 'mbha eva bhavati, evaṃ cidambhodhau līnaṃ jagacchideva bhavati na tu tato 'tiricyata iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:5874: dṛṣṭāntaprabandhamuktvā dārṣṭāntike yojayati- evaṃ vā are idaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:5883: etebhyaḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvena vyavasthaitebhyo bhūtebhyaḥ samutthāya sāmyenotthāya /
GSP33vacbhamu:5884: kāryakāraṇasaṃghātasya hyavacchedādduḥ khitvaśokitvādayastadavacchinne cidātmani tadviparīte 'pi pratīyante, yathodakapratibimbite candramasi toyagatāḥ kampādayaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:5887: brahmasvarūpasākṣātkāra upāvartate tadā nirmṛṣṭanikhilavāsanāvidyāmalasya kāryakāraṇasaṃghātabhūtasya vināśe tānyeva bhūtāni naśyantyani tadupādhiścidātmanaḥ khilyabhāvo vinaśyati /
GSP33vacbhamu:5889: na pretya saṃjñāstīti saṃjñāmātraniṣedhādātmā nāstīti manyamānā sā maitreyī hovāca, atraiva mā bhagavānamūmuhanmohitavān na pretya saṃjñāstīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:5890: sa hovāca yājñavalkyaḥ svābhiprāyaṃ, dvaite hi rūpādiviśeṣasaṃjñānibandhano duḥkhitvādyabhimānaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:5891: ānandajñānaikarasabrahmādvayānubhave tu tat kena kaṃ paśyet, brahma vā kena vijānīyāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:5893: etaduktaṃ bhavati-na saṃjñāmātraṃ mayā vyāsedhi, kintu viśeṣasaṃjñeti /
GSP33vacbhamu:5895: pratijñāya tadupapādanāt, upasaṃhāre ca mahadbhūtamanantamityādinā ca
GSP33vacbhamu:5896: brahmarūpabhidhānāt, dvaitanindayā cādvaitaguṇakīrtanādbrahmaiva maitreyībrahmaṇe pratipādyaṃ na jīvātmeti nāsti pūrvapakṣa
GSP33vacbhamu:5900: nāpijñānakartṛtvamakartuḥ sākṣācca mahato bhūtasya vijñānātmabhāvena samuttānābhidhānaṃ vijñānātmana eva draṣṭavyatvamāha /
GSP33vacbhamu:5901: anyathā brahmaṇo draṣṭavyatvapare 'smin brāhmaṇo tasya vijñānātmatvena
GSP33vacbhamu:5902: samutthānābhidhānamanupayuktaṃ syāttasya tu draṣṭavyamupayujyata ityupakramamātraṃ pūrvapakṣaḥ kṛtaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:5905: tadevaṃ paurvāparyālocanayā maitreyībrāhmaṇasya brahmadarśanaparatve sthite bhoktrā jīvātmanopakramamācāryadeśīyamatena tāvatsamādhatte sūtrakāraḥ- pratijñāsiddherliṅgamāśmaradhyaḥ. /
GSP33vacbhamu:5906: yathā hi vahnervikārā vyuccaranto visphuliṅgā na vahneratyantaṃ bhidyante,
GSP33vacbhamu:5908: parasparavyāvṛttyabhāvaprasaṅgāt, tathā jīvātmano 'pi brahmavikāra na brahmaṇo 'tyantaṃ bhidyante, cidrūpatvābhāvaprasaṅgāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:5909: nāpyatyantaṃ na bhidyante, parasparaṃ vyāvṛttyabhāvaprasaṅgāt, sarvajñaṃ pratyupadeśavaiyarthyācca
GSP33vacbhamu:5911: tatra tadvijñānena sarvavijñānapratijñāsiddhaye vijñānātmaparamātmanorabhedamupādāya paramātmani darśayitavye vijñānātmanopakrama ityāśmaradhya ācāryo mene //20 //
GSP33vacbhamu:5914: jīvo hi paramātmano 'tyantaṃ bhinna eva san
GSP33vacbhamu:5917: yathāhuḥ pāñcarātrikāḥ-'āmukterbheda eva syājjīvasya ca parasya ca /
GSP33vacbhamu:5922: saṃprati svābhāvikameva jīvasya nāmarūpaprapañcāśrayatvalakṣaṇaṃ kāluṣyaṃ pārthivānāmaṇūnāmiva śyāmatvaṃ kevalaṃ pākeneva /
GSP33vacbhamu:5923: jñānadhyānādinā tadapanīya jīvaḥ parātparataraṃ puruṣamupaitītyāha- kkacicca jīvākṣayamapīti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:5929: ākāśa iva ghaṭamaṇikādikalpitāvacchedo ghaṭākāśo maṇikākāśo na tu paramākāśādanyastadvikāro vā /
GSP33vacbhamu:5933: atha vikāraḥ paramātmano jīvaḥ kasmānna bhavatyākāśādivadityāha- naca
GSP33vacbhamu:5935: nahi yathā tejaḥprabhṛtīnāmātmavikāratvaṃ śrūyate evaṃ jīvasyeti /
GSP33vacbhamu:5943: bhedastattvamasīti jīvātmano brahmabhāvatattvopadeśaśravaṇamanananididhyāsanaprakarṣaparyantajanmanā sākṣātkāraṇe vidyayā śakyaḥ samūlakāṣaṃ kaṣituṃ, rajjvāmahivibhrama iva rajjutattvasākṣātkāreṇa, rājaputrasyeva va mlecchakule vardhamānasyātmani samāropito mlecchabhāvo rājaputro 'sīti āptopadeśena na tu mṛdvikāraḥ śarāvādiḥ śataśo 'pi mṛnmṛditi cintyamānastajjanmanā mṛdbhāvasākṣātkāreṇa śakyo nivartayituṃ, tatkasya hetoḥ, tasyāpi mṛdo bhinnābhinnasya tāttvikatvāt, vastutastu jñānenocchettumaśakyatvāt, so
GSP33vacbhamu:5945: api ca jīvasyātmavikāratve tasya jñānadhyānādisādhanānuṣṭhānāt svaprakṛtāvapyaye sati nāmṛtatvasyāśāstītyapuruṣārthatvamamṛtatvaprāpiśrutivirodhaśca
GSP33vacbhamu:5946: kāśakṛtsnamate tvetadubhayaṃ nāstītyāha- evaṃ ca satīti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:5947: nanu yadi jīvo na vikāraḥ kintu brahmaiva kathaṃ tarhi
GSP33vacbhamu:5948: tasminnāmarūpāśrayatvaśrutiḥ, kathañca 'yathāgneḥ śrudrā visphuliṅgā' iti brahmavikāraśrutirityāśaṅkāmupasaṃhāravyājena nirākaroti- ataśca
GSP33vacbhamu:5955: aikāntike hyādvaite ātmano 'nyakarmakaraṇe 'kena kaṃ paśyet' iti ātmanaśca karmatvaṃ 'vijñātāramare kena vijānīyāt' iti śakyaṃ niṣeddhum /
GSP33vacbhamu:5957: na kevalaṃ kāśakṛtsnīyadarśanāśrayaṇena bhūtapūrvagatyā vijñātṛtvamapi tu
GSP33vacbhamu:5959: kasmāt punaḥ kāśakṛtsnasya matamāsthīyate netareṣāmācāryāṇāmityata āha- darśitaṃ tu purastāditi. /
GSP33vacbhamu:5960: kāśakṛtsnīyasya matasya śrutiprabandhopanyāsena punaḥ śrutimattvaṃ smṛtimattvaṃ copasaṃhāropakramamāha- ataśceti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:5967: apica yadi jīvaparamātmanorbhedābhedāvāsthīyeyātāṃ tatastayormitho virodhātsamuccayābhāvādekasya balīyastve nātmani nirapavādaṃ vijñānaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:5969: atha tvagṛhyamāṇaviśeṣatayā na balābalāvadhāraṇaṃ,tataḥ saṃśaye sati na
GSP33vacbhamu:5971: suniścitārthaṃ ca jñānaṃ mokṣopāyaḥ śrūyate-'vedāntavijñānasuniścitārthāḥ' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:5975: nanu yadi kṣetrajñaparamātmanorabhedo bhāvikaḥ, kathaṃ tarhi vyapadeśabuddhibhedau kṣetrajñaḥ paramātmeti kathañca nityaśuddhabuddhamuktasvabhāvasya bhagavataḥ saṃsāritā /
GSP33vacbhamu:5980: tadatra saṃsāritvāsaṃsāritvavidyāvidyāvattvarūpaviruddhayadharmasaṃsargudbuddhivyapadeśabhedāccāsti jīveśvarayorbhedo 'pi bhāvika ityata āha- sthite ca paramātmakṣetrajñātmaikatveti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:5981: na tāvadbhedadābhedāvekātra bhāvikau bhavitumarhata iti viprapañcitaṃ prathame pāde /
GSP33vacbhamu:5982: dvaitadarśananindayā caikāntikādvaitapratipādanaparāḥ paurvāparyālocanayā sarve vedāntaḥ pratīyante
GSP33vacbhamu:5984: nīlamaṇikṛpāṇakācādyupadhānabhedātkālpaniko jīvānāṃ bhedo buddhivyapadeśabhedau vartayati, idaṃ bimbamavadātamimāni ca pratibimbāni nīlotpalāśaśayāmalāni vṛttadīrghādibhedabhāñji bahūnīti, evaṃ paramātmanaḥ śuddhasvabhāvājjīvānamabheda aikāntike 'pyanirvacanīyānādyavidyopadhānabhedātkālpaniko jīvānāṃ bhedo buddhivyapadeśabhedāvayaṃ ca paramātmā śuddhavijñānānandasvabhāva ime ca
GSP33vacbhamu:5986: avidyopadhānaṃ ca yadyapi vidyāsvabhāve paramātmani na sākṣādasti tathāpi tatpratibimbakalpajīvadvāreṇa parasminnucyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:5987: na caivamanyonyāśrayo jīvavibhāgāśrayāvidyā, avidyāśrayaśca jīvavibhāga iti, bījāṅkuravadanāditvāt
GSP33vacbhamu:5988: ata eva kānuddiśyaiva īśvaro māyāmāracayatyanārthikāṃ, uddeśyanāṃ sargādau jīvānāmabhāvāt, kathaṃ cātmānaṃ saṃsāriṇaṃ vividhavedanābhājaṃ kuryādityādyanuyogo niravakāśaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:5992: yadi na jīvān brahma bhidyate, hanta jīvaḥ sphuṭa iti brahmāpi tathā syāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:5993: tathā ca 'nihitaṃ guhāyām' iti nopapadyata ityata āha- nahi satyamiti. yathāhi bimbasya maṇikṛpāṇādayo guhā evaṃ brahmaṇo 'pi pratijīvaṃ bhinnā avidyā guhā iti
GSP33vacbhamu:5994: yathā pratibimbeṣu bhāsamāneṣu bimbaṃ tadabhinnamapi guhyamevaṃ jīveṣu bhāsamāneṣu tadabhinnamapi brahma guhyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:5995: astu tarhi brahmaṇo 'nyadguhyamityata āha- naca brahmaṇo 'nya iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:5996: ye tu.āśamarathyaprabhṛtayaḥ nirbandhaṃ kurvanti te vedāntārthamiti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:5997: brahmaṇaḥ sarvātmanā bhagaśo vā pariṇāmābhyupagame tasya kāryatvādanityatvācca tadaśrito mokṣo 'pi tathā syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:5999: evaṃ ye nadīsamudranidarśanenāmukterbhedaṃ muktasya cābhedaṃ jīvasyāsthiṣata teṣāmapi nyāyenāsaṃgatiḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:6003: kiṃ pāthaḥ paramāṇava utaiṣāṃ saṃsthānabheda āhosvittadārabdho 'vayavī /
GSP33vacbhamu:6004: tatra saṃsthānabhedasya vāvayavino vā samudraniveśe vināśāt kasya samudreṇaikatā /
GSP33vacbhamu:6005: nadīpāthaḥ paramāṇūnāṃ tu samudrapāthaḥ paramāṇubhyaḥ pūrvavasthitebhyo bheda eva nābhedaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:6007: ye tu kāśakṛtsnīyameva matamāsthāya jīvaṃ paramātmanoṃ'śamācakhyusteṣāṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:6008: kathaṃ 'niṣphalaṃ niṣkriyaṃ śāntam' iti na śrutivirodhaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:6009: niṣphalamiti sāvayavatvaṃ vyāsedhi na tu sāṃśatvam, aṃśaśca jīvaḥ paramātmano nabhasa iva karṇanemimaṇḍalāvacchinnaṃ nabhaḥ śabdaśravaṇayogyaṃ, vāyoriva ca śarīrāvacchinnaḥ pañcavṛttiḥ prāṇa iti cet
GSP33vacbhamu:6011: karṇanemimaṇḍalāvacchinnamaṃśa iti cet, hanta tarhi prāptāprāptavivekena
GSP33vacbhamu:6013: naca karṇanemimaṇḍalāvacchinnamaṃśa iti cet, hanta tarhi prāptāprāptavivekena karṇanemimaṇḍalaṃ vā tatsaṃyogo vetyuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:6014: naca karṇanemimaṇḍalaṃ tasyāṃśaḥ, tasya tato bhedāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:6018: nabhodharmatve hi tadanavayavaṃ sarvatrābhinnamiti tatsaṃyogaḥ sarvatra pratheta /
GSP33vacbhamu:6022: vyāpyaivāsti kevalaṃ pratisaṃbandhyadhīnanirūpaṇatayā na sarvatra nirūpyata iti cet, na nāma nirūpyatām /
GSP33vacbhamu:6023: tatsaṃyuktaṃ tu nabhaḥ śravaṇayogyaṃ sarvatrāstīti sarvatra śravaṇaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:6024: naca bhedābhedayoranyatareṇāṃśaḥ śakyo nirvaktum na cobhābhyāṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:6026: tasmādanirvacanīyānādyavidyāparikalpita evāṃśo nabhaso na bhāvika iti yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:6027: naca kālpaniko jñānamātrāyattajīvitaḥ kathamavijñāyamāno 'sti, asaṃścāṃśaḥ kathaṃ śabdaśravaṇalakṣaṇāya kāryāya kalpate, na jātu rajjvāmajñāyamāna
GSP33vacbhamu:6035: api ca bhāvikāṃśavādināṃ mate bhāvikāṃśasya jñānenocchettumaśakyatvānna jñānadhyānasādhano mokṣaḥ syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:6037: evaṃ jīvo brahmaṇoṃ'śa iti kāśakṛtsnīyaṃ matamiti siddham //22 //
GSP33vacbhamu:6040: vedāntānāṃ brahmaṇi samanvaye darśite samāptaṃ samanvayalakṣaṇamiti kimaparamavaśiṣyate yadarthamidamārabhyata iti śaṅkāṃ nirākartuṃ saṃgatiṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:6042: atra ca lakṣaṇasya saṃgatimuktvā lakṣaṇenāsyādhikaraṇasya saṃgatiruktā /
GSP33vacbhamu:6043: etaduktaṃ bhavati-satyaṃ jagatkāraṇe brahmaṇi vedāntānāmuktaḥ samanvayaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:6044: tatra kāraṇabhāvasyobhayathā darśanājjagatkāraṇatvaṃ brahmaṇaḥ kiṃ nimittatvenaiva, utopādānatvenāpi
GSP33vacbhamu:6045: tatra yadi prathamaḥ pakṣastata upādānakāraṇānusāraṇe sāṃkhyasmṛtisiddhaṃ pradhānamabhyupeyam
GSP33vacbhamu:6046: tathā ca 'janmādyasya yataḥ' iti brahmalakṣaṇamasādhu, ativyāpteḥ pradhāne 'pi gatatvāt
GSP33vacbhamu:6048: yadi tūttaraḥ pakṣastato nātivyāptirnāpyavyāptiriti sādhu lakṣaṇam /
GSP33vacbhamu:6053: āgamasya kāraṇamātre paryavasānādanumānasya tadviśeṣaniyamamāgamo na pratikṣipatyapi tvanumanyata evetyāha- pāriśeṣyādbrahmaṇo 'nyaditi. /
GSP33vacbhamu:6057: somyaikena mṛtpiṇḍena' iti ca dṛṣṭāntaḥ, paramātmanaḥ prādhānyaṃ sūcayataḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:6058: yathā somaśarmaṇaikena jñātena sarve kaṭhā jñātā bhavanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:6060: na kevalaṃ brahma nimittakāraṇaṃ, kutaḥ, pratijñādṛṣṭāntayoranuparodhāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:6066: ' tadihāpi pratijñādṛṣṭāntau mukhyārthāveva yuktau na tu 'yajamānaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:6069: nimittakāraṇaṃ tu kāryādatyantabhinnamiti na tajjñāne kāryajñānaṃ bhavati
GSP33vacbhamu:6073: nahi tadānīṃ brahmaṇi jñāte sarvaṃ vijñātaṃ bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:6076: yata iti ca pañcamī na kāraṇamātre smaryate api tu prakṛtau, 'janikartuḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:6081: etayā khalu svātantryalakṣaṇena kartṛtvena nimittatvaṃ darśitam /
GSP33vacbhamu:6085: sākṣāditi ceti sūtrāvayavamanūdya tasyārthaṃ vyācaṣṭe- ākāśādeveti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:6086: śrutirbrahmaṇo jagadupādānatvamavadhārayantī upādānāntarābhāvaṃ sākṣādeva darśayatīti sākṣāditi.sūtrāvayavena darśitamiti yojanā //25 //
GSP33vacbhamu:6098: tyacca parokṣamata evānirvācyamidantayā vāṭvākāśalakṣaṇaṃ, kathaṃ ca tadbrahmaṇo rūpaṃ yadi tasya brahmopādānaṃ, tasmātpariṇāmādbrahma bhūtānāṃ prakṛtiriti //26 //
GSP33vacbhamu:6104: āgamāttatsiddhiriti cet, hanta tarhi yādṛśamīśvaramāgamo gamayati tādṛśo 'bhyupagatavyaḥ sa ca nimittakāraṇaṃ copādānakāraṇaṃ ceśvaramavagamayati /
GSP33vacbhamu:6106: iyaṃ copādānapariṇāmādibhāṣā na vikārābhiprāyeṇāpi tu tathā sarpasyopādānaṃ rajjurevaṃ brahma jagadupādānaṃ draṣṭavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:6107: na khalu nityasya niṣphalasya brahmaṇaḥ sarvātmanaikadeśena vā pariṇāmaḥ saṃbhavati, nityatvādanekadeśatvādityuktam
GSP33vacbhamu:6108: naca mṛdaḥ śaravādayo bhidyante, na cābhinnāḥ, na vā bhinnābhinnāḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:6111: tasmādadvaitopakramādupasaṃhārācca sarva eva vedāntā aikāntikādvaitaparāḥ santaḥ sākṣādeva kkacidadvaitamāhuḥ, kkaciddvaitaniṣedhena,
GSP33vacbhamu:6113: etāvatāpi tāvadbhedo niṣiddho bhavati, na tūpādānatvābhidhānamātreṇa vikāragraha āstheyaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:6116: mā bhūtpradhānaṃ jagadupādānaṃ tathāpi na brahmopādānatvaṃ sidhyati,
GSP33vacbhamu:6117: paramāṇavādīnāmapi tadupādānānāmupaplavamānatvāt, teṣāmapi hi kiñcidupodbalakamasti vaidikaṃ liṅgamityāśaṅkāmapanetumāha sūtrakāraḥ- etena sarve vyākhyātā vyākhyātāḥ. /
GSP33vacbhamu:6119: 'pratijñālakṣaṇaṃ lakṣyamāṇe padasamanvayaḥ vaidikaḥ sa ca tatraiva
GSP33vacbhamu:6121: ' iti śrīmadvācaspatimiśraviracite śrīmacchārīrakabhāṣyavibhāge bhāmatyāṃ prathamādhyāyasya caturthaḥ pādaḥ //4 //
GSP33vacbhamu:6127: vṛttavartiṣyamāṇayoḥ samanvayavirodhaparihāralakṣaṇayoḥ saṃgatipradarśanāya sukhagrahaṇasya caitanyoḥ saṃkṣepatastātparyārthamāha-
GSP33vacbhamu:6132: tantryate vyutpādyate mokṣasādhanamaneneti tantraṃ, tadevākhyā yasyāḥ sā
GSP33vacbhamu:6135: na khalvamūṣāṃ smṛtīnāṃ manvādismṛtivadanyo 'vakāśaḥ śakyo vaditumṛte mokṣasādhanaprakāśanāt
GSP33vacbhamu:6139: prasādhitaṃ khalu dharmamīmāṃsāyāṃ 'virodhe tvanapekṣaṃ syādasati hyanumānam' ityatra, yathā śrutiviruddhānāṃ smṛtīnāṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:6140: durbalatayānapekṣaṇīyatvaṃ tasmānna durbalānurodhena balīyasīnāṃ śrutīnāṃ yuktamupavarṇanam, api tu svataḥsiddhapramāṇabhāvāḥ śrutayo durbalāḥ smṛtīrbādhanta eveti yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:6143: āpātataḥ samādhānamuktvā paramasamādhānamāha pūrvapakṣī- kapilaprabhṛtīnāṃ cārṣamiti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:6145: tenaiṣa vedarāśirbrahmaprabhavaḥ sannājānasiddhānāvaraṇabhūtārthamātragocaratabuddhaipūrvako yathā tathā kapilādīnāmapi śrutismṛtiprathitājānasiddhabhāvānāṃ smṛtayo
GSP33vacbhamu:6150: api ca tarko 'pi kapilādismṛtiranumanyate, tasmādapyetadeva prāptam /
GSP33vacbhamu:6152: yathā hi śrutīnāmavigānaṃ brahmaṇi gatisāmānyāt, naiṣaṃ smṛtīnāmavigānamasti pradhāne, tāsāṃ bhūyasīnāṃ brahmopādānatvapratipādanaparāṇāṃ tatra tatra darśanāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:6153: tasmādavigānācchraita evārtha āvastheyo na tu smārto vigānāditi /
GSP33vacbhamu:6154: tatkimidānīṃ parasparavigānātsarvā eva smṛtayo 'vaheyā ityata āha- vipratipattau ca smṛtīnāmiti /
GSP33vacbhamu:6160: na tāvatkapilādaya īśvaravadājānasiddhāḥ, kintu viniścatavedaprāmāṇyānāṃ teṣāṃ tadanuṣṭhānavatāṃ prāci bhave 'smiñjanmani siddhiḥ, ata evājānasiddhā ucyante /
GSP33vacbhamu:6164: apramāṇena ca na vedārtho 'tiśaṅkituṃ yuktaḥ pramāṇasiddhatvāttasya /
GSP33vacbhamu:6165: tadevaṃ vedavirodhe siddhavacanamapramāṇamuktvā siddhānāmapi parasparavirodhe tadvacanādanāścāsa iti pūrvoktaṃ smārayati- siddhavyapāśrayakalpanāyāmapīti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:6168: kathaṃ teṣāṃ vacanamapramāṇaṃ, tadaprāmāṇye śruterapyaprāmāṇyaprasaṅgādityata āha- yā tu śrutiriti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:6169: na tāvatsiddhānāṃ parasparaviruddhāni vacāṃsi pramāṇaṃ bhavitumarhanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:6173: tasmācchutisāmānyamātreṇa bhramaḥ sāṃkhyapraṇetā kapilaḥ śrauta iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:6176: tataśca teṣāṃ smṛtiḥ kapilasmṛtiviruddhāvaheyetyata āha- bhavati cānyā manoriti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:6178: na kevalaṃ manoḥ smṛtiḥ smṛtyantarasaṃvādinī, śrutisaṃvādinyapītyāha- śrutiśceti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:6181: bhavatu vedaviruddhaṃ kāpilaṃ vacastathāpi dvayorapi puruṣabuddhiprabhavatayā ko vinigamanāyāṃ heturyato vedavirodhi kāpilaṃ vaco nādaraṇīyamityata āha- vedasya hi nirapekṣamiti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:6184: sa hi bhagavān yādṛśaṃ pūrvasmin sarge cakāra śāstraṃ tadanusāreṇāsminnapi sarge praṇītavān
GSP33vacbhamu:6185: evaṃ pūrvatarānusāreṇa pūrvasmin pūrvatāmanusāreṇa ca pūrvatara ityanādirayaṃ śāstreśvarayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:6186: tatreśvarasya na śāstrārthajñānapūrvā śāstrakriyā yenāsya kapilādivatsvātantryaṃ bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:6189: śāstraṃ ca svatobodhakatayā puruṣasvātantryābhāvena nirastamastadoṣāśaṅkaṃ sadanapekṣaṃ sākṣādeva svārthe pramāṇam /
GSP33vacbhamu:6192: tasmāttāsāmarthapratyayāṅgaprāmāṇyaviniścayāya yāvatsmṛtyanubhavau kalpete tāvatsvataḥ siddhapramāṇabhāvayānepakṣayaiva śrutyā svārtho viniścāyita iti śīghratarapravṛttayā śrutyā smṛtyartho bādhyata iti yuktam mahadahaṅkārau tāvadaprasiddhau, ahaṅkāraprakṛtikatvena tanmātrāṇyapyaprasiddhāni smartuṃ na śakyanta ityāha- itareṣāṃ ceti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:6193: nanu 'mahataḥ paramavyaktam' itiśrutiprasiddhāni mahadādīnītyata āha- yadapīti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:6195: sāṃkhyasmṛtermahadādiṣviva pradhāne 'pi prāmāṇyaṃ neti niścīyata ityarthaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:6196: sāṃkhyasmṛterbādhe 'pi taduktayuktīnāṃ kathaṃ bādha cārṣajñānamatra mūlamupapadyata iti yuktam
GSP33vacbhamu:6197: tasmānna kāpilasmṛteḥ pradhānopādānatvaṃ jagata iti siddham //2 //
GSP33vacbhamu:6199: nānena yogaśāstrasya hairaṇyagarbhapātañjalādeḥ sarvathā prāmāṇyaṃ nirākriyate, kintu jagadupādānasvatantrapradhānatadvikāramahadahaṅkārapañcatanmātragocaraṃ prāmāṇyaṃ nāstītyucyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:6203: kintu yogasvarūpatatsādhanatadavāntaraphalavibhūtitatparamaphalakaivalyavyutpādanaparāṇi tacca kiñcinnimittīkṛtya vyutpādyamiti pradhānaṃ savikāraṃ nimittīkṛtaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:6205: anyaparādapi cānyanimittaṃ tatpratīyamānamabhyupeyeta, yadi na mānāntareṇa
GSP33vacbhamu:6209: ata eva yogaśāstraṃ vyutpādayitāha sma bhagavān vārṣagaṇyaḥ-'guṇānāṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:6213: yogaṃ vyutpipādayiṣatā nimittamātreṇeha guṇā uktāḥ, na tu bhāvataḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:6216: tadanenābhisaṃdhināha- etena sāṃkhyasmṛtipratyākhyānena yogasmṛtirapi.pradhānādiviṣayatayā pratyākhyātā draṣṭavyeti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:6220: yogaśāstrāttu pradhānādisattā vijñāpayiṣyate bahulaṃ hi yogaśāstrāṇāṃ vedena saha saṃvādo dṛśyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:6225: naca tadapramāṇaṃ pradhānādau, pramāṇaṃ ca yamādāviti yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:6227: yathāhuḥ-'prasaraṃ na labhante hi yāvatkkacana markaṭāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:6230: seyaṃ labdhaprasarā pradhānādau yogāpramāṇatāpiśācī sarvatraiva durvārā bhavedityasyāḥ prasaraṃ niṣedhatā pradhānādyabhyupeyamiti nāśabdaṃ pradhānamiti śaṅkārthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:6236: tasmānna pradhānādiparaṃ tat, kintu tannimittīkṛtya yogavyutpādanaparamityuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:6241: adhyātmaviṣayāḥ santi sahasraṃ smṛtayo bauddhārhatakāpālikādīnāṃ, tā api kasmānna nirākriyanta ityata āha- satīṣvapīti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:6242: tāsu khalu bahulaṃ vedārthavisaṃvādinīṣu śiṣṭānādṛtāsu kaiścideva tu puruṣāpasadaiḥ paśuprāyairmlecchādibiḥ parigṛhītāsu vedamūlatvāśaṅkaiva nāstīti na nirākṛtāḥ, tadviparītāstu sāṃkhyayogasmṛtaya iti tāḥ pradhānādiparatayā vyudasyanta ityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:6247: sāṃkhyā samyagbuddhirvaidikī tayā vartanta iti sāṃkhyāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:6251: anye 'pi yamaniyamādayo bāhyā āntarāśca dhāraṇādayo yogopāyā draṣṭavyāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:6265: nanvastu virodhaḥ, tathāpi tarkādare ko heturityata āha- yathā ca śrutīnāmiti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:6266: sāvakāśā vahvayo 'pi śrutayo 'navakāśaikaśrutivirodhe tadanuguṇatayā yathā nīyante evamanavakāśaikatarkavirodhe tadanuguṇatayā bahvayo 'pi śrutayo guṇakalpanādibhirvyākhyānamarhantītyarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:6267: api ca brahmasākṣātkāro virodhitayānādimavidyāṃ nivartayan dṛṣṭenaiva rūpeṇa mokṣasādhanamiṣyate
GSP33vacbhamu:6268: tatra brahmasākṣātkārasya mokṣasādhanatayā pradhānasyānumānaṃ dṛṣṭasādharmyeṇādṛṣṭaviṣayaṃ viṣayato 'ntaraṅgaṃ, bahiraṅgaṃ tvatyantaparokṣagocaraṃ śābdaṃ jñānaṃ, tena pradhānapratyāsattyāpyanumānameva balīya ityāha- dṛṣṭasādharmyeṇa ceti. api ca śrutyāpi brahmaṇi tarka ādṛta ityāha- śrutiriti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:6271: jagadbrahmasarūpaṃ ca neti no tasya vikriyā //
GSP33vacbhamu:6274: ' tathāhi-eka eva strīkāyaḥ sukhaduḥkhamohātmakatayā patyuśca sapartnānāṃ ca caitrasya ca straiṇasya tāmavindato 'paryāyaṃ sukhaduḥkhaviṣādānādhatte
GSP33vacbhamu:6276: tasmātsukhaduḥkhamohātmatayā ca svarganarakādyuccāvacaprapañcatayā ca jagadaśuddhamacetanaṃ ca, brahma tu cetanaṃ viśuddhaṃ ca, niratiśayatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:6277: tasmātpradhānasyāśuddhasyācetanasya vikāro jaganna tu brahmaṇa iti yuktam
GSP33vacbhamu:6278: ye tu cetanabrahmavikāratayā jagaccaitanyamāhustānpratyāha- acetanaṃ cedaṃ jagaditi. /
GSP33vacbhamu:6282: tatkāryakaraṇabuddhyādiniyogadvāreṇa tūpakariṣyatītyata āha- niratiśayā hyakartāraścetanā iti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:6288: paramasādhānaṃ tu sūtrāvayavena vaktuṃ tamevāvatārayati- na cetaradapi vilakṣaṇatvamiti. sūtrāvayavābhisaṃdhimāha- anavagamyamānameva hīdamiti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:6289: śabdārthāt khalu cetanaprakṛtitvāccaitanyaṃ pṛthivyādīnāmavagamyamānamupodvalitaṃ mānāntareṇa sākṣācchūyamāṇamapyacaitanyamanyathayet /
GSP33vacbhamu:6290: mānāntarābhāve vārthor'thaḥ śrutyarthenāpabādhanīyaḥ, na tu tadbalena
GSP33vacbhamu:6293: na pṛthivyādīnāṃ caitanyamāthameva, kintu bhūyasīnāṃ śrutīnāṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:6298: naitāḥ śrutayaḥ sākṣānmṛdādīnāṃ vāgādīnāṃ ca caitanyamāhuḥ, api tu tadadhiṣṭhātrīṇāṃ devatānāṃ cidātmanāṃ, tenaitacchutibalena na mṛdādīnāṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:6302: bhoktṛṇāmupakāryatvādbhūtendriyāṇāṃ copakāratvāt sāmye ca tadanupapatteḥ sarvajanaprasiddheśca 'vijñānaṃ cābhavat' iti śruteśca viśeṣaścetanācetanalakṣaṇaḥ prāguktaḥ sa nopapadyeta /
GSP33vacbhamu:6303: devatāśabdakṛto vātra viśeṣo viśeṣaśabdenocyata ityāha- api ca kauṣītakinaḥ prāṇasaṃvāda iti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:6306: api ca bhūyasyaḥ śrutayaḥ 'agnirvāg bhūtvā mukhaṃ prāviśadvāyuḥ prāṇo bhūtvā nāsike prāviśadādityaścakṣurbhūtvākṣiṇī prāviśat' ityādaya indriyaviśeṣagatā devatā darśayanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:6309: api ca prāṇasaṃvādavākyaśeṣe prāṇānāmasmadādiśarīrāṇāmiva kṣetrajñādhiṣṭhitānāṃ vyavahāraṃ darśayan prāṇānāṃ kṣetrajñādhiṣṭhānena caitanyaṃ draḍhayatītyāha- prāṇasaṃvādavākyaśeṣe ceti /
GSP33vacbhamu:6311: yadyapi prathame 'dhyāye māktatvena varṇitaṃ tathāpi mukhyatayāpi kathañcinnetuṃ śakyamiti draṣṭavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:6314: prakṛtivikārabhāve hetuṃ sārūpyaṃ vikalpa dūṣayati- vilakṣaṇatvena ca kāraṇeneti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:6325: sikatāṃ bhakṣayet' ityādīnāṃ mānāntarāpekṣatā, na tu 'darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:6329: evaṃbhūtatvāviśeṣe 'pi pṛthivyādīnāṃ mānāntaragocaratvaṃ, na tu bhūtasyāpi
GSP33vacbhamu:6331: yadi smṛtyāgamasiddhaṃ brahmaṇastarkāviṣayatvaṃ, kathaṃ tarhi śravaṇātiriktamananavidhānamityata āha- yadapi śravaṇavyatirekeṇeti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:6338: mato hi bhāvyamāno bhāvanāyā viṣayatayānubhūto bhavatīti mananamanubhavāṅgam /
GSP33vacbhamu:6342: api ca cetanakāraṇavādibhiḥ kāraṇasālakṣaṇye 'pi kāryasya kathañciccaitanyāvirbhāvānāvirbhāvābhyāṃ vijñānaṃ cāvijñānaṃ cābhavaditi jagatkāraṇe yojayituṃ śakyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:6355: atha cidātmanaḥ kāraṇasya jagataḥ kāryādbhedaḥ, tathā cedaṃ jagatkāryaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:6356: sattve 'pi cidātmanaḥ kāraṇasya prāgutpatternāsti, nāsti cedasadutpadyata iti satkāryavādavyākopa ityāha- yadi cetanaṃ śuddhamiti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:6362: api tu kāraṇarūpeṇa śakyaṃ sattvena nirvaktumiti /
GSP33vacbhamu:6363: evaṃ ca kāraṇasattaiva kāryasya sattā na tato 'nyeti kathaṃ tadutpatteḥ prāk sati kāraṇe bhavatyasat /
GSP33vacbhamu:6364: svarūpeṇa tūtpatteḥ prāgutpannasya dhvastasya vā sadasattvābhyāmanirvācyasya na sato 'sato votpattiriti nirviṣayaḥ satkāryavādapratiṣedha ityarthaḥ //7 //
GSP33vacbhamu:6367: yathā hi yūṣādiṣu hiṅgisaindhavādīnāmavibhāgalakṣaṇo layaḥ svagatarasādibhiryūṣaṃ rūṣayatyevaṃ brahmaṇi viśuddhyādidharmiṇi jagalliyamānamavibhāgaṃ gacchadbrahma svadharmeṇa rūṣayet /
GSP33vacbhamu:6368: na cānyathā layo lokasidda iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:6370: nahi samudrasya phenormibudbudādipariṇāmo vā rajjvāṃ sarpadhārādivibhrame vā niyamo dṛṣṭaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:6371: samudro hi kadācitphenormikūpeṇa pariṇāmate kadācidbudbudādinā, rajjvāṃhi kaścitsarpa iti viparyasyati kaściddhāreti /
GSP33vacbhamu:6378: tatra ca taddharmārūṣaṇe santi sahasraṃ dṛṣṭāntāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:6379: tava tu kāraṇe kāryasya laye kāryadharmarūṣaṇe na dṛṣṭāntalavo 'pyastītyarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:6380: syādetat yadi kāryasyāvibhāgaḥ kāraṇe, kathaṃ kāryadharmārūṣaṇaṃ kāraṇasyetyata āha- ananyatve 'pīti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:6381: yathā rajatasyāropitasya pāramārthikaṃ rūpaṃ śukti4na ca śuktī rajatameva
GSP33vacbhamu:6383: api ca sthityutpattipralayakāleṣu triṣvapi kāryasya kāraṇādabhedamabhidadhatī śrutiranatiśaṅkanīyā sarvaireva vedavādibhiḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:6384: tatra sthityutpattyoryaḥ parihāraḥ sa pralaye 'pi samānaḥ kāryasyāvidyāsamāropitatvaṃ nāma, tasmānnāpītimātramanuyojyamityāha- atyalpaṃ cedamucyata iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:6394: pratyuktaḥ, kāraṇābhāve kāryābhāvasya pratiniyamāt, tattvajñānena ca saśaktino mithyājñānasya samūlaghātaṃ nihatatvāditi //9 //
GSP33vacbhamu:6397: prāgutpatterasatkāryavadaprasaṅgo 'pītau tadvatprasaṅgaśca pradhānopādānapakṣa eva nāsmatpakṣa iti yadyapyupariṣṭātpratipādayiṣyāmastathāpi guḍajihvikayā samānatvāpādanamidānīmiti mantavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:6414: api ca yena tarkeṇa tarkāṇāmapratiṣṭhāmāha sa eva tarkaḥ pratiṣṭhito
GSP33vacbhamu:6415: 'bhyupeyaḥ, tadapratiṣṭhāyāmitarāpratiṣṭhānābhāvādityāha- nahi pratiṣṭhitastarka eveti. api ca tarkāpratiṣṭhāyāṃ sapalalokayātrocchedaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:6419: sati caiṣa pūrvapakṣaviṣaye tarke pratiṣṭhārahite pravartate, tadabhāve vicārapravṛtteḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:6422: na vayamanyatra tarkapramāṇayāmaḥ, kintu jagatkāraṇasattve svābhāvikapratibandhavanna liṅgamasti
GSP33vacbhamu:6425: bhūtārthagocarasya hi samyagjñānasya vyavasthitavastugocaratayā vyavasthānaṃ loke dṛṣṭaṃ, yathā pratyakṣasya /
GSP33vacbhamu:6426: vaidikaṃ cedaṃ cetanajagadupādānaviṣayaṃ vijñānaṃ vedotthatarketikartavyatākaṃ vedajanitaṃ vyavasthitam /
GSP33vacbhamu:6427: vedānapekṣeṇa tu tarkeṇa jagatkāraṇabhedamavasthāpayatāṃ tārkikāṇāmanyonyaṃ vipratipattestattvanirdhāraṇakāraṇābhāvācca na tatastattvavyavastheti na tataḥ samyagjñānam /
GSP33vacbhamu:6433: na cāsya kāraṇātmatve kiñcidabhūtamasti, yadarthamayaṃ puruṣo yateta /
GSP33vacbhamu:6435: tasyā api kāraṇātmatvena sattvāt, asattve vābhivyaṅgyasyāpi tadvatprasaṅgena kāraṇātmatvavyāghātāt
GSP33vacbhamu:6436: nahi tadeva tadānīmevāsti nāsti ceti yujyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:6437: kiṃ cedaṃ maṇimantrauṣadhamindrajālaṃ kāryeṇa śikṣitaṃ yadidamajātāniruddhātiśayamavyavadhānamavidūrasthānaṃ ca tasyaiva tadavasthendriyasya puṃsaḥ kadācitpratyakṣaṃ parokṣaṃ ca, yenāsya kadācitpratyakṣamupalambhanaṃ kadācidanumānaṃ kadācidāgamaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:6441: athāpi syāt kāryāntarāṇi piṇḍakapālaśarkarācūrṇakaṇaprabhṛtāni kumbhaṃ vyavadadhate, tataḥ kumbhasya pārokṣyaṃ kadāciditi /
GSP33vacbhamu:6443: tasya kāryajātasya kāraṇātmanaḥ sadātanatvena sarvadā vyavadhānena kumbhasyātyantānupalabdhiprasaṅgāt
GSP33vacbhamu:6448: naca bhede gavāśvavat kāryakāraṇabhāvānupapattiriti sāṃpratam, abhede 'pi
GSP33vacbhamu:6454: tasmādyatredamalpatāramyaṃ viśrāmyati yato na kṣodīyaḥ saṃbhavati tajjagato mūlakāraṇaṃ paramāṇuḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:6455: kṣodīnnamupādeyaṃ jagatkāryamabhidadhatī śrutiḥ pratiṣṭhitaprāmāṇyatarkavirodhātsahasrasaṃvatsarasatragatasaṃvatsaraśrutivatkathañcijjaghanyatvavṛttyā vyākhyāyetyadhikaṃ śaṅkamānaṃ prati sāṃkhyadūṣaṇamatidiśati- eteneti.sūtreṇa /
GSP33vacbhamu:6459: tena vaiśeṣikādyabhimatasya tarkasya śuṣkatvenāvyavasthiceḥ sūtramidaṃ sāṃkhyadūṣaṇamatidiśati
GSP33vacbhamu:6460: yatra kathañcidvedānusāriṇī manvādibhiḥ śiṣṭaiḥ parigṛhītasya sāṃkhyata4kasyaiṣā gatistatra paramāṇvādivādasyātyantavedabāhyasya manvādyupekṣitasya ca kaiva katheti /
GSP33vacbhamu:6462: sṛṣṭyādayo hi vyutpādyāste na kiñcitsadasadvā pūrvapakṣanyāyotprekṣitamapyudāhṛtya vyutpādyanta iti kenacidaṃśenetyuktam
GSP33vacbhamu:6469: pravṛttā hi śrutiranapekṣatayā svataḥpramāṇatvena na pramāṇāntaramapekṣate
GSP33vacbhamu:6470: pravartamānā punaḥ sphuṭatarapratiṣṭhitaprāmāṇyatarkavirodhena mukhyārthātpracyāvya jaghanyavṛttitāṃ nīyate, yathā mantrārthavādāvityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:6483: yadikāraṇāt paramārthabhūtādananyatvamākāśādeḥ prapañcasya kāryasya kutastarhi na vaiśeṣikādyuktadoprapañcāvatāra ityata āha- vyatirekeṇābhāvaḥ kāryasyāvagamyata iti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:6484: na khalvananyatvamityabhedaṃ brūmaḥ, kintu bhedaṃ vyasedhāmaḥ, tataśca nābhedāśrayadoṣaprasaṅgaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:6487: evaṃ hi brahmavijñānena sarvaṃ jagattattvato jñāyeta yadi brahmaiva tattvaṃ jagato bhavet
GSP33vacbhamu:6488: yathā rajjvāṃ jñātāyāṃ bhujaṅgatattvaṃ jñātaṃ bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:6491: atraiva vaidiko dṛṣṭāntaḥ- yathā somyaikena mṛtpiṇḍeneti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:6493: mṛdi jñātāyāṃ kathaṃ mṛmnayaṃ ghaṭādi jñātaṃ bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:6498: vācayā kevalamārabhyate vikārajātaṃ, na tu tattvato 'sti, yato nāmadheyamātrametat /
GSP33vacbhamu:6499: yathā puruṣasya caitanyamiti rāhoḥ śira iti vikalpamātram /
GSP33vacbhamu:6502: tasmādghaṭaśarāvodañcanādīnāṃ tattvaṃ mṛdeva, tena mṛdi jñātāyāṃ yeṣāṃ sarveṣāmeva tattvaṃ jñātaṃ bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:6503: tadidamuktam- na cānyathaikavijñānena sarvavijñānaṃ saṃpadyata iti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:6506: ye hi dṛṣṭanaṣṭasvarūpā na te vastusanto yathā mṛgatṛṣṇikodakādayaḥ, tathā ca sarvaṃ vikārajātaṃ tasmādavastusat /
GSP33vacbhamu:6509: kintu sarvadā sarvatra sarvathāstyeva, na nāsti /
GSP33vacbhamu:6510: na caivaṃ vikārajātaṃ, tasya kadācit kathañcit kutracidavasthānāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:6511: nahi rūpaṃ kadācit kkacit kathañcidvā gandho bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:6512: atha yasya sadasattve dharmau, te ca svakāraṇādhīnajanmatayā kadācideva
GSP33vacbhamu:6513: bhavataḥ, tattarhi vikārajātaṃ daṇḍāyamānaṃ sadātanamiti na vikāraḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:6524: athāsyāsattvaṃ nāma kiñcinna jāyate kintu sa eva na bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:6525: yathāhuḥ-'na tasya kiñcidbhavati na bhavatyeva kevalam' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:6526: athaiṣa prasajyapratiṣedho nirucyatāṃ, kiṃ tatsvabhāvo bhāva uta bhāvasvabhāvaḥ sa iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:6527: tatra pūrvasmin kalpe bhāvānāṃ tatsvabhāvatayā tucchatayā jagacchūnyaṃ prasajyeta /
GSP33vacbhamu:6530: kalpanāmātranimittatve 'pi niṣedhasya bhāvanityatāpattistadavasthaiva tasmādbhinnamasti kāraṇādvikārajātaṃ na vastu sat /
GSP33vacbhamu:6532: tadanena pramāṇena siddhamanṛtatvaṃ vikārajātasya kāraṇasya nirvācyatayā sattvaṃ 'mṛttiketyeva satyam' ityādinā prabandhena dṛṣṭāntatayānuvadati
GSP33vacbhamu:6534: 'yatra laukikaparīkṣakāṇāṃ buddhisāmyaṃ sa dṛṣṭāntaḥ' iti cākṣapādasūtraṃ pramāṇasiddho dṛṣṭānta ityetatparaṃ, na punarlokasiddhatvamatra vivakṣitam, anyathā teṣāṃ paramāṇvādirna dṛṣṭāntaḥ syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:6537: anekābhiḥ śaktibhiryāḥ pravṛttayo nānākāryasṛṣṭayastadyuktaṃ brahmaikaṃ nānā ceti /
GSP33vacbhamu:6539: yadi punarekatvameva vastusadbhavet tato nānātvābhāvādvaidikaḥ karmakāṇḍāśrayo laukikaśca vyavahāraḥ samasta evocchidyeta /
GSP33vacbhamu:6541: evaṃ cānekātmakatve brahmaṇo mṛdādidṛṣṭāntā anurūpā bhaviṣyantīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:6543: idaṃ tāvadatra vaktavyam, mṛdātmanaikatvaṃ ghaṭaśarāvādyātmanā nānātvamiti
GSP33vacbhamu:6544: vadataḥ kāryakāraṇayoḥ parasparaṃ kimabhedo 'bhimataḥ, āho bhedaḥ, uta bhedābhedāviti /
GSP33vacbhamu:6545: tatrābheda aikāntike mṛdātmaneti ca ghaṭaśarāvādyātmaneti collekhadvayaṃ niyamaśca nopapadyate
GSP33vacbhamu:6551: nahi dharmiṇoḥ kāryakāraṇayoḥ saṃkare taddharmāvekatvanānātve na saṃkīryete iti saṃbhavati
GSP33vacbhamu:6553: evaṃ ghaṭaśarāvādyātmanā nānātvaṃ yāvadbhavati tāvanmṛdātmanā nānātvaṃ bhavet /
GSP33vacbhamu:6561: na brahmaṇo jīvabhāvaḥ kālpanikaḥ, kintu bhāvikaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:6562: aṃśo hi saḥ, tasya karmasāhitena jñānena brahmabhāva ādhīyata ityata āha-
GSP33vacbhamu:6565: yaduktaṃ nānātvāṃśena tu karmakāṇḍāśrayo laukikaśca vyavahāraḥ setsyatīti,
GSP33vacbhamu:6567: yāvadabādhaṃ hi sarvo 'yaṃ vyavahāraḥ svapnadaśāyāmiva tadupadarśitapadārthajātavyavahāraḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:6568: sa ca yathā jāgradanasthāyāṃ bādhakānnivartate evaṃ tattvamasyādivākyaparibhāvanābhyāsaparipākabhuvā śārīrasya brahmātmabhāvasākṣātkāreṇa bādhakena nivartate /
GSP33vacbhamu:6570: 'yatra tvasya sarvamātmaivābhūttat kena kaṃ paśyet' ityādinā mithyājñānādhīno vyavahāraḥ kriyākārakādilakṣaṇaḥ samyagjñānenāpanīyata itri na brūte, kintvavasthābhedāśrayo vyavahāro 'vasthāntaraprāptyā
GSP33vacbhamu:6572: naca tāvatāsau mithyājñānanibandhano bhavatyevamatrāpītyata āha- na cāyaṃ vyavahārābhāva iti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:6574: na khalvetadvākyamavasthāviśeṣaviniyataṃ brahmātmabhāvamāha jīvasya, api tu na bhujaṅgo rajjuriyamitivat sadātanaṃ tamabhivadati /
GSP33vacbhamu:6575: api ca satyānṛtābhidhānenāpyetadeva yuktamityāha- taskaradṛṣṭāntena ceti /
GSP33vacbhamu:6577: nahi jātu kāṣṭhasya daṇḍakamaṇḍalukuṇḍalaśālinaḥ kuṇḍalitvajñānaṃ daṇḍavattāṃ kamaṇḍalumattāṃ bādhate /
GSP33vacbhamu:6585: ekatvaikāntābhyupagame tu teṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ bhedaviṣayāṇāṃ bādhitatvādaprāmāṇyaṃ prasajyeta /
GSP33vacbhamu:6589: na kevalaṃ vidhiniṣedhākṣepeṇāsya mokṣaśāstrasyākṣepaḥ svarūpeṇāsyāpi bhedāpekṣatvādityāha- mokṣaśāstrasyāpīti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:6592: bhavet, na khalvalīkāddhūmaketanajñānaṃ samīcīnamityāha-kathaṃ cānṛtena mokṣaśāstreṇeti /
GSP33vacbhamu:6596: nahi pratyakṣādibhirarthaṃ paricchidya pravartamāno vyavahāre visaṃbādyate sāṃsārikaḥ kaścit
GSP33vacbhamu:6606: 'kathaṃ cānṛtena mokṣaśāstreṇa' iti yaduktaṃ tadanubhāṣya dūṣayati- kathaṃ tvasatyeneti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:6608: 'pi jñānanicayo 'satyaḥ, so 'pi hi vṛttirūpaḥ kāryatayā nirodhadharmā,
GSP33vacbhamu:6611: yatkhalu satyaṃ na tadutpadyata iti kutastasyāsatyādutpādaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:6613: sāṃvyavahārikaṃ tu satyatvaṃ vṛttirūpasya brahmasākṣātkārasyeva śravaṇādīnāmapyabhinnam /
GSP33vacbhamu:6614: tasmādabhyupetya vṛttisvarūpasya brahmasākṣātkārasya paramārthasatyatāṃ vyabhicārodbhāvanamiti mantavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:6615: yadyapi sāṃvvahārikasya satyādeva bhayātsatyaṃ maraṇamutpadyate tathāpi bhayaheturahistajjñānaṃ vāsatyaṃ tato bhayaṃ satyaṃ jāyata ityasatyātsatyasyotpattiruktā /
GSP33vacbhamu:6616: yadyapi cāhijñānamapi svarūpeṇa sattathāpi na tajjñānatvena bhayaheturapi tvanirvācyāhirūṣitatvena
GSP33vacbhamu:6619: na ca brūmaḥ sarvasyādasatyātsatyasyopajanaḥ, yataḥ samāropitadhūmabhāvāyā dhūmamahiṣyā vahnijñānaṃ satyaṃ syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:6620: nahi cakṣuṣo rūpajñānaṃ satyamupajāyata iti rasādijñānenāpi tataḥ satyena bhavitavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:6621: yato niyamo hi sa tādṛśaḥ satyānāṃ yataḥ kutaścit kiñcideva jāyata iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:6622: evamasatyānāmapi niyamo yataḥ kutaścidasatyātsatyaṃ kutaścidasatyaṃ, yathā dīrghatvādervarṇeṣu samāropitatvāviśeṣe 'pyajīnamityato
GSP33vacbhamu:6625: na cobhayatra dīrghasamāropaṃ prati kaścidasti bhedaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:6628: yathā sāṃsāriko jāgradbhujaṅgaṃ dṛṣṭvā palāyate tataśca na
GSP33vacbhamu:6629: daṃśavedanāmāpnoti, pipāsuḥ salilamālokya pātuṃ pravartate tatastadāsādya pāyaṃpāyamāpyāyitaḥ sukhamanubhavati, evaṃ svapnāntike 'pi tadavasthaṃ sarvamityasatyātkāryasiddhiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:6634: laukiko hi suptotthito 'vagamyaṃ bādhitaṃ manyate na tadavagatiṃ, tena yadyapi parikṣakā anirvācyarūṣitāmavagatimanirvācyāṃ niścinvanti tathāpi
GSP33vacbhamu:6637: yadākhalvayaṃ caitrastārakṣavīṃ vyāttavikaṭadaṃṣṭrākarālavadanāmuttabdhabambhramanmastakāvacumbilāṅgūlāmatiroṣāruṇastabdhaviśālavṛttalocanāṃ romāñcasaṃcayotphullamīṣaṇāṃ sphaṭikācalabhittipratibimbitāmabhyamitrīṇāṃ tanumāsthāya svapne pratibuddho mānuṣīmātmanastanuṃ paśyati tadobhayadehānugatamātmānaṃ pratisaṃdadhāno dehātiriktamātmānaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:6638: niścinoti, na tu dehamātram, tanmātratve dehavatpratisaṃdhānābhāvaprasaṅgāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:6641: asatyācca satyapratītiḥ śrutisiddhānvayavyatirekasiddhā cetyāha- tathāca śrutiriti /
GSP33vacbhamu:6644: nahi saṃketayitāraḥ saṃketayantīdṛśena rekhābhedenāyaṃ varṇaḥ pratyetavyo
GSP33vacbhamu:6647: yaccoktamekatvāṃśena jñānamokṣavyavahāraḥ setsyati, nānātvāṃśena tu karmakāṇḍāśrayo laukikaśca vyavahāraḥ setsyatīti, tatrāha- api cāntyamidaṃ pramāṇamiti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:6648: yadi khalvekatvāvagatinibandhanaḥ kaścidasti vyavahāraḥ, tadavagateḥ sarvettaratvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:6650: samastapramāṇatatphalatādvyahārānapabādhamānaivodīyate, naitasyāḥ parastātkiñcidanukūlaṃ pratikūlaṃ cāsti, yadapekṣena, yena ceyaṃ pratikṣipyeta, tatrānukūlapratikūlanivāraṇānnātaḥ paraṃ kiñcidākāṅkṣyamiti
GSP33vacbhamu:6653: antyā cediyamavagatirniṣprayojanā tarhi tathā ca prekṣāvadbhirupādīyeta,
GSP33vacbhamu:6654: prayojanavattve vā nāntyā syādityata āha- na
GSP33vacbhamu:6656: nahīyamutpannā satī paścādavidyāṃ nivartayati yena nāntyā syāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:6663: mā bhūdekatvanibandhano vyavahāro 'nekatvanibandhanastvasti, tadeva hi sakalāmudvahati lokayātrām, atastatsiddhyarthamanekatvasya kalpanīyaṃ tāttvikatvamityata āha- prākceti. vyavahāro hi buddhipūrvakāriṇāṃ buddhyopapadyate, na tvasyāstāttvikatvena,
GSP33vacbhamu:6665: satyaṃ ca tadavisaṃvādāt, anṛtaṃ ca vicārāsahatayānirvācyatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:6666: antyasyaikātmyajñānasyānapekṣatayā bādhakatvaṃ, anekatvajñānasya ca pratiyogigrahāpekṣayā durbalatvena bādhyatvaṃ vadan prakṛtamupasaṃharati-
GSP33vacbhamu:6670: kintu śrautamevāsya tāttvikatvamiti codayati- nanu mṛdāditi. /
GSP33vacbhamu:6672: mṛdādidṛṣṭāntena hi kathañcitpariṇāma unneyaḥ, naca śakya unnetum,
GSP33vacbhamu:6674: sākṣātkūṭasthanityatvapratipādikāstu santi sahasraśaḥ śrutaya iti na pariṇāmadharmatā brahmaṇaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:6675: atha kūṭasthasyāpi pariṇāmaḥ kasmānna bhavatītyata āha- na hyekasyeti. śaṅkate- sthitigativaditi. /
GSP33vacbhamu:6676: yathaikabāṇāśraye gatinivṛtti evamekasminbrahmaṇi pariṇāmaśca tadabhāvaśca kauṭasthyaṃ bhaviṣyata iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:6680: naca dharmiṇo vyatiricyate dharmo yena tadupajanāpāye 'pi dharmī kīṭasthaḥ syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:6682: vāṇādayastu pariṇāminaḥ sthityā gatyā ca pariṇāmanta iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:6683: api ca svādhyāyādhyayanavidhyāpāditārthavattvasya vedarāśerekenāpi varṇenānarthakena na bhavitavyaṃ kiṃ punariyatā jagato brahmayonitvapratipādakena vākyasaṃdarbheṇa /
GSP33vacbhamu:6684: tatra phalavadbrahmadarśanasamāmnānasaṃnidhāvaphalaṃ jagadyonitvaṃ samāmnāyamānaṃ tadarthaṃ sattadupāyatayāvatiṣṭhate nārthāntarārthamityāha-
GSP33vacbhamu:6687: tadananyatvamityasya sūtrasya pratijñāvirodhaṃ śrutivirodhaṃ ca codayati-
GSP33vacbhamu:6691: nāma ca rūpaṃ ca te eva bījaṃ tasya vyākaraṇaṃ kāryaprapañcastadapekṣatvādaiśvaryasya /
GSP33vacbhamu:6692: etaduktaṃ bhavati-na tāttvikamaiśvaryaṃ sarvajñatvaṃ ca brahmaṇaḥ kintvavidyopādhikamiti tadāśrayaṃ pratijñāsūtraṃ, tattvāśrayaṃ ti tadananyatvasūtram, tenāvirodhaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:6695: kāraṇasya bhāvaḥ sattā copalambhaśca tasmin kāryasyopalabdherbhāvācca /
GSP33vacbhamu:6698: tathā ca prabhārūpānuviruddhabodhyena cākṣuṣeṇa na vyabhicāraḥ, nāpi vahnibhāvābhāvānuvidhāyibhāvābhāvena dhūmabhedeneti siddhaṃ bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:6700: kāraṇādananyatvaṃ.bhedābhāvaḥ kāryasya, yatkāraṇaṃ yasmātkāraṇāt bhāva eva kāraṇasyeti. asya vyatirekamukhena gamakatvamāha- naca niyameneti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:6706: pāṭhāntareṇedameva sūtraṃ vyācaṣṭe- na kevalaṃ śabdādeveti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:6707: paṭa iti pratyakṣabuddhyā tantava evātānavitānāvasthā ālambyante, na tu tadatiriktaḥ paṭaḥ pratyakṣamupalabhyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:6710: arthakriyāyāṃ ca pratyekamasamarthā apyanārabhyaivārthāntaraṃ kiñcinmilitāḥ kurvanto dṛśyante, yathā grāvāṇa ukhādhāraṇamekam,
GSP33vacbhamu:6712: naca samavāyādbhinnayorapi bhedānavasāyaḥ anavasāya iti sāṃpratama,
GSP33vacbhamu:6714: bhede hi siddhe samavāyaḥ samavāyācca bhedaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:6718: anayā ca diśā mūlakāraṇaṃ brahmaiva paramārthasat, avāntarakāraṇāni ca tanvādayaḥ sarve 'nirvācyā evetyāha- tathā ca tantuṣviti. //15 //
GSP33vacbhamu:6721: na kevalaṃ śrutiḥ, upapattiścātra bhavati yacca yadātmaneti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:6722: nahi tailaṃ sikatātmanā sikatāyāmasti yathā ghaṭo 'sti mṛdi mṛdātmanā /
GSP33vacbhamu:6725: tena yathā sikatāyāstailaṃ na jāyata evamātmano 'pi jaganna jāyeta, jāyate
GSP33vacbhamu:6728: yathā hi ghaṭaḥ sarvadā sarvatra ghaṭa eva nā jātvasau kkacitpaṭo bhavatyevaṃ sadapi sarvatra sarvadā sadeva na tu kkacitkadācidasadbhavitumarhatītyupapāditamadhastāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:6730: sattvaṃ cet kimato yadyevamityata āha- ekaṃ ca punariti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:6733: tataścābhinnasattānanyatvādete api mitho na bhidyete iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:6738: vayaṃ tu paśyāmo bhedagrahasya pratiyogigrahapekṣatvādbhedagrahamantareṇa ca pratiyogigrahasaṃbhavādanyonyasaṃśrayāpatteḥ, abhedagrahasya ca nirapekṣatayā tadanupapatterekaikāśrayatvācca bhedasyaikābhāve
GSP33vacbhamu:6745: atiśayo hi dharmo nāsatyatiśayavati kārye bhavitumarhatīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:6746: nanu na kāryasyātiśayo niyamaheturapi tu kāraṇasya śaktibhedaḥ, sa cāsatyapi kārye kāraṇasya sattvātsannevetyata āha- śaktiśceti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:6751: anabhyupagamyamāne ca.samavāyasya samavāyibhyāṃ saṃbandhe vicchedaprasaṅgo 'vayavāvayavidravyaguṇādīnāṃ mithaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:6754: yathā hi sattvāyogādravyaguṇakarmāṇi santi, sattvaṃ tu svabhāvata eva saditi na sattvāntarayogamapekṣate, tathā samavāyaḥ samavāyibhyāṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:6757: naca saṃyogasya kāryatvāt kāryasya ca samavāyikāraṇādhīnajanmatvāt asamavāye ca tadanupapatteḥ samavāyakalpanā saṃyoga iti vācyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:6760: saṃbandhyadhīnanirūpaṇaḥ samavāyo yathā saṃbandhidvayabhede na bhidyate tannāśe ca na naśyatyapi tu nitya eka evaṃ saṃyogo 'pi bhavet /
GSP33vacbhamu:6762: athaitatprasaṅgabhiyā saṃyogavatsamavāyo 'pi pratisaṃbandhimithunaṃ bhidyate cānityaścetyabhyupeyate, tathā sati yathaikasmānnimittakāraṇādeva
GSP33vacbhamu:6763: jāyata evaṃ saṃyogo 'pi nimittakāraṇādeva janiṣyata iti samānam /
GSP33vacbhamu:6765: saṃbandhāvagame hi saṃbandhakalpanābījaṃ na tādātmyāvagamaḥ, tasya nānātvaikāśrayasaṃbandhavirodhāditi
GSP33vacbhamu:6769: atha samastāvayavavyāsaṅgyapi katipayāvayavasthāno grahīṣyata ityata āha-
GSP33vacbhamu:6772: bahutvasaṃkhyā hi svarūpeṇaiva vyāsajya saṃkhyeyeṣu vartate ityekamasaṃkhyeyāgrahaṇe 'pi na gṛhyate, samastavyāsaṅgitvāttadrūpasya /
GSP33vacbhamu:6773: avayavī tu na svarūpeṇāvayavānvyāpnotiṃ, api tvavayavaśaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:6774: tena yathā sūtramavayavaiḥ kusumāni vyāpnuvanna samastakusumagrahaṇamapekṣate katipayakusumasthānasyāpi
GSP33vacbhamu:6779: yadyapi gotvasya sāmānyasya viśeṣā anirvācyā na paramārthasantastathā ca kkāsya pratyekaparisamāptiriti, tathāpyabhyupetyedamuditamiti mantavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:6783: yadyucyeta ghaṭaśabdastadavayaveṣu vyāpārāviṣṭatayā pūrvāparībhāvamāpanneṣu ghaṭopajanābhimukheṣu tādarthyanimittādupacārātprayujyate, teṣāṃ ca siddhatvena
GSP33vacbhamu:6784: kartṛtvamastītyupapadyate ghaṭo bhavatīti prayoga ityata āha- ghaṭasya
GSP33vacbhamu:6786: utpādanā hi siddhānāṃ kapālakulālādīnāṃ vyāpāro notpattiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:6793: evañca ghaṭo bhavatītila ghaṭavyāpārasya dhātūpāttatvāttatrāsya kartṛtvamupapadyate, taṇḍulānāmiva satāṃ viklittau viklidyanti taṇḍulā iti
GSP33vacbhamu:6795: etaduktaṃ bhavati-notpattirnāma kaścidvyāpāraḥ, yenāsiddhasya kathamatra kartṛtvamityanuyujyeta, kintu svakāraṇasamavāyaḥ, svasattasvāyo vā, sa cāsato 'pyaviruddha iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:6797: api ca prāgutpatterasattvaṃ kāryasteti kāryābhāvasya bhāvena
GSP33vacbhamu:6800: atyantābhāvasya bandhyāsutasya mā bhūnmaryādanupākhyo hi saḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:6801: ghaṭaprāgabhāvasya tu bhaviṣyatā ghaṭenopākhyeyasyāsti maryādetyata āha- yadi bandhyāputraḥ kārakavyāpārāditi. /
GSP33vacbhamu:6802: uktametadadhastādyathā na jātu ghaṭaḥ paṭo bhavatyevamasadapi sanna bhavatīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:6805: prāk prasiddhamapi kāryaṃ kadācitkāraṇena yojayituṃ vyāpāror'thavānmavedityata āha-tadananyatvācceti
GSP33vacbhamu:6807: uktametadyathā bhujaṅgatattvaṃ na rajjorbhidyate, rajjureva hi tat,
GSP33vacbhamu:6808: kālpanikastu bhedaḥ, evaṃ vastutaḥ kāryatattvaṃ na kāraṇādbhidyate kāraṇasvarūpameva hi tat, anirvācyaṃ tu kāryarūpaṃ bhinnamivābhinnamiva cāvabhāsata iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:6816: śabdāntarācceti sūtrāvayavamavārya vyācaṣṭe- evaṃ yukteḥ kāryasyeti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:6820: iti ca sūtre nigadavyākhyātena bhāṣyeṇa vyākhyāte //19 //
GSP33vacbhamu:6822: yadyapi śārīrātparamātmano bhedamāhuḥ śrutayastathāpyabhedamapi darśayanti śrutayo bahvayaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:6823: naca bhedābhedāvekatra samavetau virodhāt, naca bhedastāttvika ityuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:6826: upahitaṃ cāsya rūpaṃ śārīraḥ, tena mā nāma jīvāḥ paramātmatāmātmano 'nubhūvan, paramātmā tu tānātmano 'bhinnānanubhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:6833: satyamayaṃ paramātmana sarvajñatvādyathā jīvān vastuta ātmano 'bhinnān
GSP33vacbhamu:6834: paśyati, paśyatyevaṃ na bhāvata eṣāṃ sukhaduḥkhādivedanāsaṅgostyavidyāvaśāttveṣāṃ tadvadabhimāna iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:6835: tathā ca teṣāṃ sukhaduḥkhādivedanāyāmapyahamudāsīna iti na teṣāṃ bandhanāgāraniveśe 'pyastikṣatiḥ kācinmameti na hitākaraṇādidoṣāpattiriti
GSP33vacbhamu:6840: yadi brahmaviṣarto jagat, hanta sarvasyaiva jīvavacaitanyaprasaṅga ityata
GSP33vacbhamu:6844: brahma khalvekamadvitīyatayā parānapekṣaṃ krameṇotpadyamānasya jagato vivadhavicitrarūpasyopādānamupeyate tadanupapannam /
GSP33vacbhamu:6848: na cākramātkāraṇāt kāryakramo jujyato, samarthasya kṣepāyogādadvitīyatayā ca kramavattatsahakārisamavadhānāpapatteḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:6850: ekaikaṃ mṛdādi kārakaṃ teṣāṃ tu sāmagryaṃ sādhanam, tato hi kāryaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:6851: sādhayatyeva, tasmānnādvitīyaṃ brahma jagadupādānamiti prāpte, ucyate- kṣīravaddhi. /
GSP33vacbhamu:6852: idaṃ tāvadbhavān pṛṣṭo vyācaṣṭām-kiṃ tāttvikamasya rūpamapekṣyemucyate utānādināmarūpabījasahitaṃ kālpanikaṃ sārvajñyaṃ sarvaśaktitvam /
GSP33vacbhamu:6853: tatra pūrvasmin kalpe kiṃ nāma tato 'dvitīyādasahāyādupajāyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:6855: tathā ca śrutiḥ-'na tasya kāryaṃ karaṇaṃ ca vidyate' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:6858: te 'pi hi bāhyacetanādikāraṇānapekṣā eva kālaparivaśena svata eva
GSP33vacbhamu:6862: tathā ca śrutiḥ-'māyāṃ tu prakṛtiṃ vidyānmāyinaṃ ti maheśvaram' iti kāryakrameṇa utparipāko 'pi kramavānunneyaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:6865: yadi tu cetanatve satīti viśeṣamānna kṣīrādibhirvyabhicāraḥ, dṛṣṭā hi kulālādayo bāhyamṛdādyapekṣāḥ, cetanaṃ ca brahmeti, tatredamupatiṣṭhate- devādivadapi loke. /
GSP33vacbhamu:6868: nanu na brahmaṇastattvataḥ pariṇāmo yena kārtsnyabhāgavikalpenākṣipyeta /
GSP33vacbhamu:6869: avidyākalpitena tu nāmarūpalakṣaṇena rūpabhedena vyākṛtāvyākṛtātmanā tattvānyatvābhyāmanirvacanīyena pariṇāmādivyavahārāspadatvaṃ brahma pratipadyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:6871: nahi candramasi taimirikasya dvitvakalpanā candramaso dvitvamāvahati /
GSP33vacbhamu:6875: yadyapi śrutiśatādaikāntikādvaitapratipādanaparāt pariṇāmo vastuto niṣiddhastathāpi kṣīrādidevatādṛṣṭāntena punastadvāstavatvaprasaṅgaṃ pūrvapakṣopapattyā sarvathāyaṃ pakṣo na ghaṭayituṃ śakyata ityapabādhya śrutestu śabdāmūlatvāt.'ātmani caivaṃ' 'vicitrāśca hi' iti sūtrābhyāṃ vivartadṛḍhīkaraṇenaikāntikādvayalakṣaṇaḥ śrutyarthaḥ pariśodhyata
GSP33vacbhamu:6884: svapnadṛgātmā hi manasaiva svarūpānupamardena rathādīn sṛjati //28 //
GSP33vacbhamu:6888: yadyapi samudāyaḥ sāvayavastathāpi pratyekaṃ sattvādayo niravayavāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:6889: nahyasti saṃbhavaḥ sattvamātraṃ pariṇamate na rajastamasī iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:6898: nahyasti saṃbhavaḥ sa eva tadānīṃ tatra vartate na vartate ceti /
GSP33vacbhamu:6899: tathā coparyadhaḥpārśvasthāḥ ṣaḍapi paramāṇavaḥ samānadeśā iti prathimānupapatteraṇumātraḥ piṇḍaḥ prasajyeta /
GSP33vacbhamu:6901: aśakyaṃ ca sāvayavatvamupetuṃ, tathā satyanantāvayavatvena sumerurājasarṣapayoḥ samānaparimāṇatvaprasaṅgaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:6903: āpātamātreṇa sāmyamuktam, paramārthatastu bhāvikaṃ pariṇāmaṃ vā karyakāraṇabhāvaṃ vecchatāmeṣa durvāro doṣo na punarasmākaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:6905: vicitraśaktitvamuktaṃ brahmaṇa, tatra śrutyupanyāsaparaṃ sūtram- sarvopetā ca taddarśanāt. //30 //
GSP33vacbhamu:6907: kulālādibhyastāvadbāhyakaraṇāpekṣebhyo devādīnāṃ bāhyanapekṣāṇāmāntarakaraṇāpekṣasṛṣṭhīnāṃ pramāṇena dṛṣṭo yathā viśeṣo nāpahnotuṃ śakyaḥ, yathā tu jāgratsṛṣṭerbāhyakaraṇāpekṣāyāstadanapekṣāntarakaraṇamātrasādhyā dṛṣṭā svapne rathādisṛṣṭiraśakyāpahnotum, evaṃ sarvaśakteḥ parasyā devatāyā āntarakaraṇānapekṣāyā jagatsarjanaṃ śrūyamāṇaṃ na sāmānyato
GSP33vacbhamu:6912: prekṣāvataśca pravṛttiḥ svaparahitāhitaprāptiparihāraprayojanā satī nāprayojanālpāyāsāpi saṃbhavati, kiṃ punaraparimeyānekavidhoccāvacaprapañcajagadvibhramaviracanā mahāprayāsā /
GSP33vacbhamu:6921: bhavedetadevaṃ yadi prekṣāvatpravṛttiḥ prayojanavattayā vyāptā bhavet /
GSP33vacbhamu:6922: tatastannivṛttau nivarteta, śiṃśāpātvamiva vṛkṣatānivṛttau, na tvetadasti,
GSP33vacbhamu:6924: anyathā 'na kurvīta vṛthā ceṣṭām' iti dharmasūtrakṛtāṃ pratiṣedho
GSP33vacbhamu:6927: api cādṛṣṭahetukotpattikī śvāsapraśvāsalakṣaṇā prekṣāvatāṃ kriyā prayojanānusaṃdhānamantareṇa dṛṣṭā /
GSP33vacbhamu:6928: na cāsyāṃ cetanasyāpi caitanyamanupayogi, saṃprasāde 'pi bhāvāditi yuktam,
GSP33vacbhamu:6931: yathā ca svārthaparārthasaṃpadāsāditasamastakāmānāṃ kṛtakṛtyatayānākūlamanasāmakāmānāmeva līlāmātrātsatyapyanuniṣpādini prayojane naiva taduddeśena pravṛttirevaṃ brahmaṇo 'pi jagatsarjane pravṛttirnānupapannā /
GSP33vacbhamu:6932: dṛṣṭaṃ ca yadalpabalavīryabuddhināmaśakyamatiduṣkaraṃ vā tadanyeṣāmanalpabalavīryabuddhīnāṃ suśakamīṣatkaraṃ vā /
GSP33vacbhamu:6935: na cāyaṃ na pītaḥ saṃkṣipya culukena helayeva kalaśayoninā mahāmuninā /
GSP33vacbhamu:6936: na cādyāpi na dṛśyante līlāmātravinirmitāni mahāprāsādapramadavanāni śrīmannṛganarendrāṇāmanyeṣāṃ manasāpi duṣkarāṇi nareśvarāṇam /
GSP33vacbhamu:6937: tasmādupapannaṃ yadṛcchayā vā svabhāvādvā līlayā vā jagatsarjanaṃ bhagavato maheśvarasyeti
GSP33vacbhamu:6938: api ca neyaṃ pāramārthikī sṛṣṭiryenānuyujyeta prayojanam, api tvanādyavidyānibandhanā /
GSP33vacbhamu:6939: avidyā ca svabhāvata eva kāryonmukhī na prayojanamapekṣate /
GSP33vacbhamu:6942: sā ca caitanyacchuritā jagadutpādaheturutu cetano jagadyonirākhyāyata
GSP33vacbhamu:6944: api ca na brahma jagatkāraṇamapi tattayā vivakṣantyāgamā api tu jagati brahmātmabhāvam /
GSP33vacbhamu:6945: tathā ca sṛṣṭeravivakṣāyāṃ tadāśrayo doṣo nirviṣaya evetyāśayenāha- brahmātmabhāveti. //33 //
GSP33vacbhamu:6948: uttarastūcyate-uccāvacamadhyamasukhaduḥkhabhedavatprāṇabhṛtprapañcaṃ ca sukhaduḥkhakāraṇaṃ sudhāviṣādi cānekavidhaṃ viracayataḥ prāṇabhṛdbhedopāttapāpapuṇyakarmāśayasahāyasyātrabhavataḥ parameśvarasya na caiṣamyanairghaṇye prasajyete /
GSP33vacbhamu:6949: nahi sabhyaḥ sabhāyāṃ niyukto yuktavādinaṃ yuktavādyasīti cāyuktavādinamayuktavādyasīti bruvāṇa, sabhāpatirvā yuktavādinamanugṛhṇannayuktavādinaṃ ca nigṛhṇannanukto dviṣṭo vā
GSP33vacbhamu:6950: bhavatyapi tu madhyastha iti vītarāgadveṣa iti cākhyāyate, tadvadīśvaraḥ puṇyakarmāṇamanugṛhṇannapuṇyakarmāṇaṃ ca nigṛhṇanmadhyastha eva nāmadhyasthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:6954: ata eva na nairghṛṇyamapi saṃharataḥ samastān prāṇabhṛtaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:6959: na ca 'eṣa hyeva sādhu karma kārayati yamebhyo lokebhya unninīṣate eṣa evāsādhu karma kārayati taṃ yamadho niniṣate' iti śruterīśvara eṣa
GSP33vacbhamu:6960: dveṣapakṣapātābhyāṃ sādhvasādhunī karmaṇī kārayitvā svargaṃ narakaṃ vā lokaṃ nayati, tasmādvaiṣamyadoṣaprasaṅgānneśvaraḥ kāraṇamiti vācyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:6962: yasmāt karma kārayitveśvaraḥ prāṇinaḥ sukhaduḥkhinaḥ sṛjati iti
GSP33vacbhamu:6964: naca vaiṣamyamātramatra brūmo na tvīśvarakāraṇatvaṃ vyāsedhāma iti vaktavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:6966: tasmādīśvarasya savāsanakleśāparāmarśamabhivadantīnāṃ bhūyasīnāṃ śrutīnāmanugrahāyonninīṣate 'dho ninīṣata ityetadapi tajjātīyapūrvakarmābhyāsavaśātprāṇina ityevaṃ neyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:6972: tathā ca māyākārasyevāṅgasākalyavaikalyabedena vicitrān prāṇino darśayato na vaiṣamyadoṣaḥ, sahasā saṃharato vā na nairdhṛṇyam, evamasyāpi bhagavato vividhavicitraprapañcamanirvācyaṃ viśvaṃ darśayataḥ saṃharataśca svabhāvādvā līlayā vā na kaściddoṣaḥ //34 //
GSP33vacbhamu:6973: iti sthite śaṅkāparihāraparaṃ sūtram- na karmāvibhāgāditi cennānāditvāt. /
GSP33vacbhamu:6975: anāditvāditi siddhavaduktaṃ, tatsādhanārthaṃ sūtram- upapadyate cāpyupalabhyate ca. /
GSP33vacbhamu:6976: akṛte karmaṇi puṇye pāpe vā tatphalaṃ bhoktāramadhyāgacchet, tathā ca vidhiniṣedhaśāstramanarthakaṃ bhavet pravṛttinivṛttyabhāvāditi /
GSP33vacbhamu:6982: puṇyāpuṇyapravṛttihetubhūtarāgadveṣanidānaṃ, sa ca rāgādibiḥ sahitaḥ svakāryairna śarīraṃ sukhaduḥkhabhogāyatanamantareṇa saṃbhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:6985: naca pūrvaśarīramantareṇa mohādiriti pūrvapūrvaśarīrāpekṣo mohādirevaṃ pūrvapūrvamohādyapekṣaṃ pūrvapūrvaśarīramityanāditaivātra bhagavatī cittamanākulayati /
GSP33vacbhamu:6988: rāgādveṣamohā rāgādayasta eva hi puruṣaṃ sāsāraduḥkhamanubhāvya kleśayantīti kleśāsteṣāṃ vāsanāḥ karmaparvṛttyanuguṇāstābhirākṣiptāni pravarttitāni karmāṇi tadapekṣā layalakṣaṇā avidyā /
GSP33vacbhamu:6992: tadevamanāditve siddhe 'sadeva somyedamagra āsīdekamevādvitīyam' iti prāk sṛṣṭeravibhāgāvadhāramaṃ samudācaradrūparāgādiniṣedhaparaṃ na
GSP33vacbhamu:6996: dṛśyate sarvasya cetanādhiṣṭhitasyaiva loke pravṛttiriti lokānusāro darśitaḥ /
