GSP33vacbhamu:6998: sarvasya jagata upādānakāraṇaṃ nimittakāraṇaṃ cetyupapāditam- mahāmāyamiti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:7001: iti śrīvācaspatimiśraviracite bhagavatpādaśārīrikabhāṣyavibhāge bhāmatyāṃ dvitīyasyādhyāyasya prathamaḥ pādaḥ //1 //
GSP33vacbhamu:7006: iha hi pāde khatantrā vedanirapekṣāḥ pradhānādisiddhiviṣayāḥ sāṃkhyādiyuktayo nirākariṣyante
GSP33vacbhamu:7008: nahīdaṃ śāstramucchṛṅkhalatarkaśāstravatpravṛttamapi tu vedāntavākyāni brahmaparāṇīti pūrvapakṣottarapakṣābhyāṃ viniścetum /
GSP33vacbhamu:7011: nahi vedāntavākyāni nirṇetavyānīti nirṇīyante, kintu mokṣamāṇānāṃ tattvajñānotpādanāya
GSP33vacbhamu:7012: yathā ca vedāntavākyebhyo jagadupādānaṃ brahmāvagamyate, evaṃ sāṃkhyādyanumānebhyaḥ pradhānādyacetanaṃ jagadupādānamavagamyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:7013: na caitadeva cetanopādānamacetanopādānaṃ ceti samuccetuṃ śakyaṃ, virodhāt
GSP33vacbhamu:7014: na ca vyavasthite vastuni vikalpo yujyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:7017: tasmāttadvirodhānna brahmaṇi samanvayo vedāntānāṃ sidhyatīti na tatastattvajñānaṃ seddhumarhati
GSP33vacbhamu:7018: naca tattvajñānādṛte mokṣa iti svatantrāṇāmapyanumānānāmābhāsīkaraṇamiha śāstresaṃgatameveti
GSP33vacbhamu:7019: yadyevaṃ tataḥ parakīyānumānanirāsa eva kasmātprathamaṃ na kṛta ityata āha- - vedāntārthanirṇayasya ceti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:7021: punaḥparapakṣādhikṣepaḥ, sa hi sarāgatāmāvahatīti codayati- - nanu
GSP33vacbhamu:7025: naca parapakṣadūṣaṇamantareṇa tattvanirṇayaḥ śakyaḥ kartumiti tatvanirṇayāya vītarāgeṇāpi parapakṣo dūṣyate na tu parapakṣatayeti na vītarāgakathātvavyāhatirityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:7028: yāni hi yena rūpeṇā sthaulyādā ca saukṣmyātsamanvīyante tāni tatkaraṇāni
GSP33vacbhamu:7029: dṛṣṭāni, yathā dhaṭādayo rucakādayaścā sthaulyādā ca saukṣmyānmṛtsuvarṇānvitāstatkaraṇāḥ, tathā cedaṃ bāhyamādhyātmikaṃ ca bhāvajātaṃ suḥkhaduḥkhamohātmanānvitamupalabhyate, tasmāttadapi suḥkhaduḥkhamohātmasāmānyakāraṇakaṃ bhavitumarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:7030: tatra jagatkāraṇasya yeyaṃ sukhātmatā tatsattvaṃ, yā duḥkhātmatā tadrajaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:7031: yā ca mehātmatā tattama iti traiguṇyakāraṇasiddhiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:7033: yathā maitradāreṣu padmāvatyāṃ maitrasya sukhaṃ, tat kasya hetoḥ,taṃprati
GSP33vacbhamu:7035: tatsapatnīnāṃ ca duḥkhaṃ,tatkasya hetoḥ, tāḥ pratyasyā rajoguṇasamudbhavāt
GSP33vacbhamu:7036: caitrasya tu straiṇasya tāmavindato moho viṣādaḥ,tat kasya hetoḥ, taṃ pratyasyāstamoguṇasamudbhavāt
GSP33vacbhamu:7039: tacca triguṇaṃ pradhānaṃ pradhīyate kriyate 'nena jagaditi,pradhīyate
GSP33vacbhamu:7041: tacca mṛtsuvarṇavadacetanaṃ cetanasya puruṣasya bhogāpavargalakṣaṇamarthaṃ sādhayituṃ svabhāvata eva pravartate,na tu kenacitpravartyate. tathā
GSP33vacbhamu:7042: hyāhuḥ--- 'puruṣārtha eva heturna kenacitkāryate karaṇam' iti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:7047: yadi tāvadacetanaṃ pradhānamanadhiṣṭhitatvena mṛtsuvarṇādau dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇi vyāpterupalabdherviruddhatvāt
GSP33vacbhamu:7049: tasmāt kṛtakatvamiva nityatvasādhanayā prayuktaṃ sādhyaviruddhena vyāptaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:7050: viruddham,evaṃ samanvayādi cetanānadhiṣṭhitatve sādhya iti racanānupapatteriti darśitam /
GSP33vacbhamu:7051: yaducyeta dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇyacetanaṃ tāvadupādānaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ,tatra yadyapi taccetanaprayuktamapi dṛśyate, tathāpi tatprayuktatvaṃ hetoraprayojakaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:7056: sa ca svabhāvapratibandhaḥ śaṅkitasamāropitopādhinirāse sati niścīyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:7058: tau cānvayavyatirekau na tathopādānācaitanye yathopādānācaitanye yathā cetanaprayuktatve 'tiparisphuṭau
GSP33vacbhamu:7060: evamapi cetanaprayuktatvaṃ nābhyupeyeta yadi pramāṇāntaravirodho bhavet,
GSP33vacbhamu:7062: cakāreṇa suḥkhaduḥkhādisamanvayalakṣaṇasya hetorasiddhatvaṃ samuccinotītyāha -- anvayādyanupapatteśceti. āntarāḥ khalvamī suḥkhaduḥkhamohaviṣādā bāhyebhyaścandanādibhyo
GSP33vacbhamu:7064: yadi punareta eva suḥkhaduḥkhādisvabhāvā bhaveyustataḥsvarūpatvādhemante 'pi candanaḥ sukhaḥ syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:7068: evaṃ kaṇṭakaḥ kramelakasya sukha iti manuṣyādīnāmapi prāṇabhṛtāṃ sukhaḥ syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:7070: tasmādasukhādisvabhāvā api candanakuṅkumādayo jātikālāvasthādyapekṣayā sukhaduḥkhādihetavo na tu svayaṃ sukhādisvabhāvā iti ramaṇīyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:7071: tasmātsukhādirūpasamanvayo bhāvānāmasiddha iti nānena tadrūpaṃ kāraṇamavyaktamunnīyata iti
GSP33vacbhamu:7077: parimāṇāditi sāṃkhyīyaṃ hetumupanyasyati- - tathā parimitānāṃ bhedānāmiti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:7082: yadi tāvatparimitatvamiyattā, sā nabhaso 'pi nāstītyavyāpako hetuḥ parimāṇāditi /
GSP33vacbhamu:7083: atha na yojanādimitatvaṃ parimāṇamiyattāṃ nabhaso brūmaḥ kintvavyāpitām,
GSP33vacbhamu:7085: nahi kāryaṃ kāraṇavyāpi, kintu kāraṇaṃ kāryavyāpīti parimitaṃ nabhastanmātrādyavyāpitvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:7086: hanta sattvarajastamāṃsyapi na parasparaṃ vyāpnuvanti, naca tattvāntarapūrvakatvameteṣāmiti vyabhicāraḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:7087: nahi yathā taiḥ kāryajātamāviṣṭamevaṃ tāni parasparaṃ viśanti,mithaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:7090: nahi citiśaṅktiḥ kūṭasthanityā taiḥ saṃsṛjyate, tataśca tadavyāpakā guṇā
GSP33vacbhamu:7092: evaṃ citiśaktirapi guṇairasaṃsṛṣṭeti sāpi parimitetyanaikāntikatvaṃ parimitatvasya hetoriti
GSP33vacbhamu:7096: na kevalaṃ racanābhedā na cetanādhiṣṭhānamantareṇa bhavantyapi tu sāmyāvasthāyāḥ pracyutirvaiṣamyaṃ, tathā ca yadudbhūtaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:7097: balīyastadaṅgyabhibhūtaṃ ca tadanuguṇatayā sthitamaṅgam, evaṃ hi guṇapradhānabhāve satyasya mahadādau kārye kā pravṛttiḥ, sāpi cetanādhiṣṭhānameva gamayati /
GSP33vacbhamu:7101: ityayamapi hetuḥ sāṃkhyīyo viruddha evetyuktaṃ vakroktyā /
GSP33vacbhamu:7103: ayamabhiprāyaḥ-- tvayā kilaupaniṣadenāsmadhetūn dūṣayitvā kevalasya cetanasyaivānyanirapekṣasya jagadupādānatvaṃ nimittatvaṃ ca samarthanīyam
GSP33vacbhamu:7106: aupaniṣadastu cetanahetukāṃ tāvadeṣa sāṃkhyaḥ pravṛttimabhyupagacchatu paścāt svapakṣamata eva samādhāsyāmītyabhisaṃdhimānāha-- satyametat. /
GSP33vacbhamu:7110: acetanāśrayaiva sarvā pravṛttirdṛśyate na tu cetanāśrayā kācidapi /
GSP33vacbhamu:7115: na tāvaccetanaḥ pravṛtyāśrayatayā tatprayojakatayā vā pratyakṣamīkṣyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:7118: sadbhāvamātraṃ tu tatra cetanasya gamyate rathādivailakṣaṇyājjīvaddehasya
GSP33vacbhamu:7120: mā bhūdākāśa utpattimatāṃ ghaṭādīnāṃ nimittakāraṇamasti hi sarvatreti /
GSP33vacbhamu:7121: tadanena dehātirikte satyapi cetane tasya na pravṛttiṃ prati nimittabhāvo
GSP33vacbhamu:7123: yataścāsya na pravṛttihetubhāvo 'sti ata eva pratyakṣe dehe sati pravṛttidarśanādasati cādarśanāddehasyaiva caitanyamiti laukāyatikāḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:7124: pratipannāḥ, tathā ca na cidātmanimittā pravṛttiriti siddham /
GSP33vacbhamu:7125: tasmānna racanāyāḥ pravṛttervā cidātmakāraṇatvasiddhirjagata iti aupaniṣadaḥ pariharati-- tadabhidhīyate--- na brūma iti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:7126: na tāvat pratyakṣānumānāgamasiddhaḥ śārīro vā paramātmā vāsmābhiridānīṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:7127: sādhanīyaḥ, kevalamasya pravṛtti prati kāraṇatvaṃ vaktavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:7128: tatra mṛtaśarīre vā rathādau vānadhiṣṭhite cetanena pravṛtteradarśanāt tadviparyaye ca pravṛttidarśanādanvayavyatirekābhyāṃ cetanahetukatvaṃ pravṛtterniścīyate, na tu cetanasadbhāvamātreṇa,
GSP33vacbhamu:7133: dehaḥ svayaṃ cetanaḥ karacaraṇādimān svavyāpāreṇa pravartayatīti yuktaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:7134: na tu tadatiriktaḥ kūṭasthanityaścetano vyāpārarahito jñānaikasvabhāvaḥ pravṛttyabhāvāt pravartako yukta iti codayati-- nanu taveti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:7138: sāṃkhyānāṃ hi svadeśasthā rūpādaya indriyaṃ vikurvate, tena tadindrayamarthaṃ prāptamarthākāreṇa pariṇamata iti sthitiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:7140: yeṣāmacetanaṃ cetanaṃ cāsti teṣāmetadyujyate vaktuṃ cetanādhiṣṭhitamacetanaṃ pravartata iti
GSP33vacbhamu:7142: yeṣāṃ tu cetanātiriktaṃ nāstyadvaitavādināṃ, teṣāṃ pravartyābhāve kaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:7145: kāraṇabhūtayā layalakṣaṇayāvidyayā prāksargopacitena ca vikṣepasaṃskāreṇa yat pratyupasthāpitaṃ nāmarūpaṃ tadeva māyā, tadāveśenāsya codyasyāsakṛtprayuktatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:7146: etaduktaṃ bhavati-- neyaṃ sṛṣṭirvastusatī yenādvaitino vastusato dvitīyasyābhāvādanuyujyeta
GSP33vacbhamu:7147: kālpanikyāṃ tu sṛṣṭāvasti kālpanikaṃ dvitīyaṃ sahāyaṃ māyāmayam /
GSP33vacbhamu:7150: na caivaṃ brahmopādānatvavyāghātaḥ, brahmaṇa eva māyāveśenopādānatvāttadadhiṣṭhānatvājjagadvibhramasya, rajatavibhramasyeva śuktikādhiṣṭhānasya śuktikopādānatvamiti niravadyam //2 //
GSP33vacbhamu:7152: yathā payombunoścetanānadhiṣṭhitayoḥ svata eva pravṛttirevaṃ pradhānasyāpīti śaṅkārthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:7153: tatrāpi cetanādhiṣṭhitatvaṃ sādhyaṃ, na ca sādhyenaiva vyabhicāraḥ, tathā
GSP33vacbhamu:7157: na ca sapakṣeṇa vyabhicāra iti śaṅkānirākaraṇasyārthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:7160: nanu 'upasaṃhāradarśanāt' ityatrānapekṣasya pravṛttirdaśitā, iha tu sarvasya cetanāpekṣā pravṛttiḥ pratipādyata iti kuto na virodha ityata
GSP33vacbhamu:7162: sthūladarśilokābhiprāyānurodhena taduktaṃ na tu paramārthata ityarthaḥ //3
GSP33vacbhamu:7164: yadyapi sāṃkhyānāmapi vicitrakarmavāsanāvāsitaṃ pradhānaṃ sāmyāvasthāyāmapi tathāpi na karmavāsanāḥ sargasyeśate, kintu pradhānameva svakārye pravartamānamadharmapratibaddhaṃ sanna sukhamayīṃ sṛṣṭiṃ kartumutsahata iti dharmeṇādharmapratibandho 'panīyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:7169: tataśca pratibandakāpanayasādhane dharmādharmavāsane api saṃnihite ityāgantorapekṣaṇīyasyābhāvāt sadaiva sāmyena pariṇameta vaiṣamyeṇa vā, na tvayaṃ kādācitkaḥ pariṇāmabheda upapadyeta /
GSP33vacbhamu:7170: īśvarasya tu mahāmāyasya cetanasya līlayā vā yadṛcchayā vā svabhāvavaicitryādvā karmaparipākāpekṣasya pravṛttinivṛttī upapadyete eveti //4 //
GSP33vacbhamu:7172: dhenūpayuktaṃ hi tṛṇapallavādi yathā svabhāvata eva cetanānapekṣaṃ kṣīrabhāvena pariṇamate na tu tatra dhenūcaitanyamapekṣyate, upayogamātre tadapekṣatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:7173: evaṃ pradhānamapi svabhāvata eva pariṇaṃsyate kṛtamatra cetaneneti śaṅkārthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:7174: dhenūpayuktasya tṛṇādeḥ kṣīrabhāve kiṃ nimittāntaramātraṃ niṣidhyate, uta cetanam /
GSP33vacbhamu:7175: na tāvannimittāntaraṃ, dhenudehasthasyaudaryasya vahnyādibhedasya nimittāntarasya saṃbhavāt
GSP33vacbhamu:7176: buddhipūrvakārī tu tatrāpīśvara eva sarvajñaḥ saṃbhavatīti śaṅkānirākaraṇasyārthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:7183: na kevalaṃ tāttviko bhogo 'nādheyātiśayasya kūṭasthanityasya puruṣasya na
GSP33vacbhamu:7185: yena hi prayojanena pradhānaṃ pravartitaṃ tadanena kartavyaṃ, bhogena caitatpravartitamiti tameva kuryānna mokṣaṃ, tenāpravartitatvādityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:7187: citeḥ sadā viśuddhatvānnaitasyāṃ jātu karmānubhavavāsanāḥ santi /
GSP33vacbhamu:7189: tathā ca pradhānapravṛtteḥ prāk citirmuktaiveti nāpavargārthamapi tatpravṛttiriti /
GSP33vacbhamu:7195: bhogasya ca sakṛcchabdādyupalabghimātrādeva samāptatvānna tadarthaṃ punaḥ pradhānaṃ pravartetetyayatnasādhyo mokṣaḥ syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:7197: kṛtabhogamapi pradhānamāsattvapuruṣānyatākhyāteḥ kriyāsamabhihāreṇa bhojayatīti cet, atha puruṣārthāya pravṛttaṃ kimarthaṃ sattvapuruṣānyatākhyātiṃ karoti /
GSP33vacbhamu:7201: tasmādubhayārthamapi na pradhānasya pravṛttirupapadyata iti siddhor'thābhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:7208: sā ca sarjanīyamantareṇānarthikā syāditi yatpradhānena śabdādi sṛjyate tadeva dṛkśakterdṛśyaṃ bhavatīti tadubhayārthavatvāya sarjanamiti śaṅkārthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:7210: yathā hi pradhānasya sargaśaktirekaṃ puruṣaṃ prati caritārthāpi puruṣāntaraṃ prati pravartate 'nucchedāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:7211: evaṃ dṛkśaktirapi taṃ puruṣaṃ pratyarthavattvāyānucchedātsarvadā pravartetetyanirmokṣaprasaṅgaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:7212: sakṛddṛśyadarśanena vā caritārthatve na bhūyaḥ pravarteteti sarveṣāmekapade nirmokṣaḥ prasajyeteti sahasā saṃsāraḥ samucchidyeteti //6
GSP33vacbhamu:7215: mā bhūtpuruṣārthasya śaktyarthavattvasya vā pravartakatvam, puruṣa eva dṛkśaktisampannaḥ paṅguriva pravṛttiśaktisaṃpannaṃ pradhānamandhamiva pravartayiṣyatīti śaṅkā /
GSP33vacbhamu:7217: na kevalamabhyupetahānam,ayuktaṃ caitadbhavaddarśanālocanenetyāha- kathaṃ codāsīna iti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:7221: yadi pradhānāvasthā kūṭasthanityā, tato na tasyāḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:7223: yathāhuḥ-- 'nityaṃ tamāhurvidvāṃso yaḥ svabhāvo na naśyati' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:7230: yatsāmyāvasthayā suciraṃ paryaṇamatkathaṃ tadevāsati vilakṣaṇapratyayopanipāte vaiṣamyamupaiti
GSP33vacbhamu:7231: anapekṣasya svato vāpi vaiṣamye na kadācitsāmyaṃ bhavedityarthaḥ //8 //
GSP33vacbhamu:7234: aṅgitvānupapattilakṣaṇo doṣastāvanna bhavadbhiḥ śakyaḥ parihartumiti vakṣyāmaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:7240: karmendriyāṇi pañca, saptamaṃ ca mana iti saptendriyāṇi /
GSP33vacbhamu:7247: nahi tapirastiriva kartṛsthabhāvakaḥ, kintu paciriva karmasthabhāvakaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:7249: tathā ca tapyena karmaṇā tāpakasamavetakriyāphalaśālinā tāpakādanyeva bhavitavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:7252: anyatve tu tapyasya tāpakāccaitrasamavetagamanakriyāphalabhājo gamyasyeva nagarasya tapyatvopapatti
GSP33vacbhamu:7255: nahi svabhāvādbhāvo viyojituṃ śakya iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:7256: jaladheśca vīcitaraṅgaphenādayaḥ svabhāvāḥ santa āvirbhāvatirobhāvadharmāṇo na tu tairjaladhiḥ kadācidapi mucyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:7260: sannarthinaṃ dunoti, tadartho tapyastāpakaścārthaḥ, tau cemau loke
GSP33vacbhamu:7264: tadevamaupaniṣadaṃ matamasamañjasamuktvā sāṃkhyaḥ svapakṣe tapyatāpakayorbhede mokṣamupapādayati-- jātyantarabhāve tviti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:7265: dṛgdarśanasaktyoḥ kila saṃyogastāpanidānaṃ, tasya heturavivekadarśanasaṃskāro 'vidyā, sā ca vivekakhyātyā vidyayā
GSP33vacbhamu:7270: atra ca na sākṣātpuruṣasyāpariṇāmino bandhamokṣau, kintu buddhisattvasyaiva citicchāyāpattyā labdhacaitanyasya /
GSP33vacbhamu:7274: yathā jayaḥ parājayo vā yogheṣu vartamānaḥ prādhānyātsvāminyapadiśyate ,
GSP33vacbhamu:7282: tāpo hi sāṃvyavahārika eva na pāramārthika atyasakṛdāveditam /
GSP33vacbhamu:7283: bhavedeṣa doṣo yadyekātmatāyāṃ tapyatāpakāvanyonyasya viṣayaviṣayibhāvaṃ pratipadyeyātāmi.tyasmadabhyupagama iti śeṣaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:7284: sāṃkhyo 'pi hi bhedāśrayaṃ tapyatāpakabhāvaṃ bruvāṇo na puruṣasya
GSP33vacbhamu:7286: kevalamanena sattvaṃ tapyam ,abhyupeyaṃ tāpakaṃ ca rajaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:7287: darśitaviṣayattvāttu buddhisatve tapye tadavibhāgāpatyā puruṣo 'pyanutapyata iva na tu tapyate 'pariṇāmitvādityuktaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:7293: sahādarśanena nimittena vartata iti sanimittaḥ saṃyogastadapekṣatvāditi /
GSP33vacbhamu:7297: kevalamiyaṃ buddhisattvasya tāpakarajojanitā, tasya ca buddhisatvasya
GSP33vacbhamu:7300: tasya tu buddhisatvasya sāttvikyā vivekakhyātyā tāmasīyamavivekakhyātirnivartanīyā /
GSP33vacbhamu:7302: tathā vicchinnāpi chinnabadarīva punastamasodbhūtena sattvamabhibhūya vivekakhyātimapodya śataśikharāvidyāvirbhāvyeteti bateyamapavargakathā tapasvino dattajalāñjaliḥ prasajyeta /
GSP33vacbhamu:7305: malinatāmupaiti,na ca tadvastuto malinaṃ , naca bimbātpratibimbaṃ vastuto
GSP33vacbhamu:7306: bhidyate, atha tasmin pratibimbe malinādarśopadhānānmalinatā padaṃ labhate
GSP33vacbhamu:7307: tathā cātmano malinaṃ mukhaṃ paśyan devadattastapyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:7308: yadā tūpādhyapanayādbimbameva kalpanāvaśāt pratibimbaṃ taccāvadātamiti tattvamavagacchati tadāsya tāpaḥ praśāmyati naca malinaṃ me mukhamiti /
GSP33vacbhamu:7309: evamavidyopadhānakalpitāvacchedo jīvaḥ paramātmapratibimbakalpaḥ kalpitaireva śabdādibhiḥ saṃparkāttapyate natu tattvataḥ paramātmano 'sti
GSP33vacbhamu:7313: nirmṛṣṭanikhilasavāsanakleśajālaḥ kevalaḥ svastho bhavati, na cāsya punaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:7320: 'etena śiṣṭāparigrahā api vyākhyātāḥ' ityasya prapañca ārabhyate-- tatra vaiśeṣikā brahmakāraṇatvaṃ dūṣayāṃbabhūvuḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:7323: śuklaistantubhirārabdhaḥ paṭaḥ śuklaḥ, na jātvasau kṛṣṇo bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:7331: tatra ca prathamaṃ tāvadadṛṣṭavatkṣetrajñasaṃyogātparamāṇau karma, tato
GSP33vacbhamu:7332: 'sau paramāṇvantareṇa saṃyujyadvyaṇukamārabhate. bahavastu paramāṇavaḥ saṃyuktā na sahasā sthūlamārabhante, paramāṇutve sati bahutvāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:7334: yadi hi ghaṭopagṛhītāḥ paramāṇavo ghaṭamārabheran na ghaṭe pravibhajyamāne kapālaśarkarādyupalabhyeta, teṣāmanārabdhatvāt,ghaṭasyaiva tu tairārabdhatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:7335: tathā sati mudgaraprahārāt ghaṭavināśe na kiñcidupalabhyeta,
GSP33vacbhamu:7338: tasmānna bahūnāṃ paramāṇūnāṃ dravyaṃ prati samavāyikāraṇatvam, api tu dvāveva paramāṇū dyvaṇukamārabhete /
GSP33vacbhamu:7341: tadapi hi dvyaṇukameva bhavenna tu mahat /
GSP33vacbhamu:7346: tasmāttenāpi tatkaraṇadvyaṇukavadaṇunaiva bhavitavyaṃ, tathā ca puruṣopabhogātiśayābhāvādadṛṣṭanimittatvācca viśvanirmāṇasya bhogārtatvāttatkāraṇena ca dvyaṇukena tanniṣpatteḥ kṛtaṃ dvyaṇukāśrayeṇa
GSP33vacbhamu:7348: ārambhārthavattvāya bahubhireva dvyaṇukaistryaṇukaṃ caturaṇukaṃ vā dravyaṃ mahaddīrghamārabdhavyam
GSP33vacbhamu:7351: tryaṇukādibhirārabdhaṃ tu kāryadravyaṃ kāraṇabahutvādvā kāraṇamahatvādvā kāraṇapracayabhedādvā mahadbhavatīti prakriyā /
GSP33vacbhamu:7352: tadetayaiva prakriyayā kāraṇasamavāyino guṇāḥ kāryadravye samānajātīyameva gumāntaramārabhanta iti dūṣaṇamadūṣaṇīkriyate,vyabhicārādityāha-- mahaddīrghavadvā hṛsvaparimaṇḍalābyām. /
GSP33vacbhamu:7353: yathā mahad dravyaṃ tryaṇukādi hṛsvād dvyaṇukājjāyate,na tu mahattvaguṇopajanane dvyaṇukagataṃ mahattvamapekṣate,tasya hṛsvatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:7354: yathā vā tadeva tryaṇukādi dīrdhaṃ hṛsvād dvyaṇukājjāyate, na tu tadgataṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:7357: yathā dvyaṇukamaṇu hṛsvaparimāṇaṃ parimaṇḍalāt paramāṇoraparimaṇḍalaṃ jāyata evaṃ cetanādbrahmaṇo 'cetanaṃ jaganniṣpadyata iti sūtrayojanā /
GSP33vacbhamu:7360: na dvyaṇuke 'ṇutvamapi paramāṇuvarti pārimāṇḍalyamārabhate, tasya hi dvitvasaṃkhyāyonitvādityapi draṣṭavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:7362: yadāhi dve dve dvyaṇuke.iti paṭhitavye pramādādekaṃ dvepadaṃ na paṭhitam /
GSP33vacbhamu:7364: itarathā hi dvyaṇukameva tadapi syānna tu mahadityuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:7365: athavā dve iti dvitve , yathā 'hyekayordvivacanaikavacane' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:7368: tadevaṃ yojanīyam-- dvyaṇukādhikaraṇe ye dvitve te yadā caturaṇukamārabhete saṃkhyeyānāṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:7370: evaṃ vyavasthitāyāṃ vaiśeṣikaprakriyāyāṃ taddūṣaṇasya vyabhicāra uktaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:7371: athāvyavasthitā tathāpi tadavastho vyabhicāra ityāha-- yadāpi bahavaḥ paramāṇava iti. nāṇu jāyate no hṛsvaṃ jāyate iti yojanā /
GSP33vacbhamu:7375: kāraṇagatā guṇā na kārye samānajātīyaṃ guṇāntaramārabhanta ityetāvataiveṣṭasiddhau na tadhetvanusāreṇa khedanīyaṃ mana ityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:7376: api ca satparimāṇāntaramākrāmati notpatteśca prāk parimāṇāntaraṃ saditi kathamākrāmet /
GSP33vacbhamu:7392: paramāṇūnāmādyasya karmaṇaḥ kāraṇābhyupagame 'nabhyupagame vā na karmātastadabhāvastasya dvyaṇukādikrameṇa sargasyābhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:7393: athavā yadyaṇusamavāyyadṛṣṭamathavā kṣetrajñasamavāyi , ubhayathāpi tasyācetanasya cetanānadhiṣṭhitasyāpravṛtteḥ karmabhāvo 'tastadabhāvaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:7396: athavā saṃyogotpattyarthaṃ vibhāgotpattyarthamubhayathāpi na karmātaḥ sargahetoḥ saṃyogasyābhāvāt pralayahetorvibhāgasyābhāvāttadabhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:7406: nodanasaṃskārāvabhighātena samānayogakṣemau, gurutvadravatve ca paramāṇugate sadātane iti karmasātatyaprasaṅgaḥ. dvitīyaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:7413: yadyapi paramāṇukṣetrajñayoḥ saṃyogaḥ paramāṇukarmajastathāpi tatpravāhasya sātatyamiti bhāvaḥ. sarvātmanā cedupacayābhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:7414: ekadeśena hi saṃyoge yāvaṇvorekadeśau nirantarau tābhyāmanye ekadeśāḥ saṃyogenāvyāptā iti prathamopapadyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:7415: sarvātmanā tu nairantarye paramāṇāvekasmin paramāṇvāntarāṇyapi saṃmāntīti na prathamā syādityarthaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:7420: tāmimāṃ śaṅkāṃ sūddhārāmāha-- paramāṇūnāṃ kalpitā iti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:7421: nahyasti saṃbhavo niravayava ekastadaiva tenaiva saṃyuktaścāsaṃyuktaśceti,
GSP33vacbhamu:7428: nanvabhighātanodanādayaḥ pralayārambhasamaye kasmādvibhāgārambhakakarmahetavo na saṃbhavantyata āha-- nahi tatrāpi kiñcinniyatamiti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:7433: yadyapi śarīrādipralayārambhe 'sti duḥkhabhogastathāpyasau pṛthivyādipralaye nāstītyabhipretyedamuditamiti mantavyam //12 //
GSP33vacbhamu:7436: na tāvat svatantraḥ samavāyo 'tyantaṃ bhinnaḥ samavāyibhyāṃ samavāyinau
GSP33vacbhamu:7438: tasmādanena samavāyisaṃbandhinā satā samavāyinau ghaṭanīyau, tathā ca samavāyasya saṃbandhāntareṇa samavāyisaṃbandhe 'bhyupagamyamāne 'navasthā
GSP33vacbhamu:7439: athāsau saṃbandhibhyāṃ saṃbandhe na saṃbandhāntaramapekṣate saṃbandhisaṃbandhanaparamārthatvāt
GSP33vacbhamu:7441: na ca tasmin sati samabanghināvasaṃbanghinau bhavataḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:7442: tasmāt svabhāvādeva samavāyaḥ samavāyinorna saṃbandhāntareṇeti nānavastheti codayati-- nanvihapratyayagrāhyā iti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:7447: naca tasmin sati saṃyogināvasaṃyoginau bhavata iti tulyacarcaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:7448: yadyucyeta guṇaḥ saṃyogaḥ , naca dravyāsamaveto guṇo bhavati, na cāsya samavāyaṃ vinā samavetatvaṃ, tasmātsaṃyogasyāsti samavāya iti
GSP33vacbhamu:7450: yadyasamavāye 'syāguṇatvaṃ bhavati kāmaṃ bhavatu na naḥ kācitkṣatiḥ,tadidamuktam-- guṇaparibhāṣāyāśceti. paramārthatastu dravyāśrayītyuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:7451: tacca vināpi samavāyaṃ svarūpataḥ saṃyogasyopapadyata eva /
GSP33vacbhamu:7452: naca kāryatvātsamavāyyasamavāyikāraṇāpekṣitayā saṃyogaḥ samavāyīti yuktamca ajasaṃyogasyātathātvaprasaṅgāt
GSP33vacbhamu:7453: api ca samavāyasyāpi saṃbandhyadhīnasadbhāvasya saṃbandhinaścaikasya dvayorvā vināśitvena vināśitvātkāryatvam /
GSP33vacbhamu:7454: nahyasti saṃbhavo guṇo vā guṇaguṇinau vāvayavo vāvayavāvayavinau vā na sto
GSP33vacbhamu:7457: tathā ca yathaiṣa nimittakāraṇamātrādhīnotpāda evaṃ saṃyogo 'pi /
GSP33vacbhamu:7458: atha samavāyo 'pi samavāyyasamavāyikāraṇe apekṣate tathāpi saivānavastheti
GSP33vacbhamu:7460: yadyucyeta saṃbandhināvasau ghaṭayati nātmānamapi saṃbandhibhyāṃ, tat kimasāvasaṃbaddha eva saṃbandhibhyām,evaṃ cedatyantabhinno 'saṃbaddhaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:7463: tasmātsaṃyogaḥ saṃyoginoḥ samavāyena saṃbaddha iti vaktavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:7470: yat kila bhūtabhautikānāṃ mūlakāraṇaṃ tadrūpādimān paramāṇurnitya iti
GSP33vacbhamu:7471: bhavadbhirabhyupeyate, tasya cedrūpādimattvamabhyupeyeta paramāṇutvanityatvaviruddhe sthaulyānityatve prasajyeyātāṃ, so 'yaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:7473: niyatā prāptirhi prasaṅgalakṣaṇaṃ , tadanena prasaṅgena jagatkāraṇaprasiddhaye pravṛttaṃ sādhanaṃ rūpādimannityaparamāṇusiddheḥ pracyāvya brahmagocaratāṃ nīyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:7476: paramāṇunityatvasādhanāni ca teṣāmupanyasya dūṣayati-- yacca nityatve kāraṇamiti /
GSP33vacbhamu:7481: tenānityamiti laukikena niṣedhenānyatra nityatvasadbhāvaḥ kalpanīyaḥ, te cānye paramāṇava iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:7484: vyapadeśasya ca pratītipūrvakasya tadabhāve nirmūlasyāpi darśanāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:7487: yadi satāṃ paramāṇūnāṃ paridṛśyamānasthūlakāryāṇāṃ pratyakṣeṇa kāraṇāgrahaṇamavidyā tayā nityatvam, evaṃ sati dvyaṇukasyāpi nityatvam /
GSP33vacbhamu:7488: athādravyatve satīti viśeṣyeta.tathā sati na dvyaṇuke vyabhicāraḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:7491: 'dravyatvamavidyamānakāraṇabhūtadravyatvamucyate, tathā ca punaruktamityāha-- tasya ceti. api cādravyatve sati sattvādityata eveṣṭārthasiddheravidyeti vyartham /
GSP33vacbhamu:7492: athāvidyāpadena dravyavināśakāraṇadvayāvidyamānatvamucyate,dvividho hi dravyanāśaheturavayavavināśo 'vayavavyatiṣaṅgavināśaśca, tadubhayaṃ paramāṇau nāsti, tasmānnityaḥ paramāṇuḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:7495: yadi hi saṃyogasacivāni bahūni dravyāṇi dravyāntaramārabheranniti prakriyā sidhyet sidhyet dravyadvayameva(?) tadvināśakāraṇamiti /
GSP33vacbhamu:7497: na tāvat tantvādhārastadvyatiriktaḥ paṭo nāmāsti yaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:7500: tathāhi-- mṛdvā suvarṇaṃ vā sarveṣu ghaṭarucakādiṣvanugataṃ sāmānyamanubhūyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:7501: na caite ghaṭarucakādayo mṛtsuvarṇābhyāṃ vyatiricyanta ityuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:7503: tasmānmṛtsuvarṇe eva tena tenīkāreṇa pariṇamamāne ghaṭa iti ca rucaka iti ca kapālaśarkarākaṇamiti ca śakalakaṇikācūrṇamiti ca vyākhyāyete /
GSP33vacbhamu:7505: na tu ghaṭādayo vā kapālādiṣu kapālādayo vā ghaṭādiṣu ca rucakādayo vā śakalādiṣu śakalādayo vā rucakādiṣu pratyabhijñāyante yatra kāryakāraṇabhāvo bhavet /
GSP33vacbhamu:7506: na ca vinaśyantameva ghaṭakṣaṇaṃ pratītya kapālakṣaṇo 'nupādāna
GSP33vacbhamu:7507: evotpadyate tatkimupādānapratyabhijñāneneti vaktavyam, etasyā api vaināśikaprakriyāyā upariṣṭānnirākariṣyamāṇatvāt
GSP33vacbhamu:7509: evaṃ vyavasthite yathā suvarṇadravyaṃ kāṭhinyāvasthāmapahāya dravāvasthayā
GSP33vacbhamu:7510: parigaṇitaṃ, na ca tatrāvayavavibhāgaḥ sannapi dravatve kāraṇaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:7511: paramāṇūnāṃ bhavanmate tadabhāvena dravatvānupapatteḥ, tasmādyathā evaṃ guṇādayo na dravyādyanadhīnanirūpaṇāḥ, api tu yadā yadā nirūpyante tadā
GSP33vacbhamu:7512: tadā tadākāratayaiva prathante na tu prathāyāmeṣāmasti svātantryaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:7513: tasmānnātiricyante dravyādapi tu dravyameva sāmānyarūpaṃ tathā tathā prathata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:7516: na tadadhīnotpādatāṃ tadadhīnatvamācakṣmahe kintu tadākāratāṃ, tathā ca na
GSP33vacbhamu:7520: yatra hi dvāvākāriṇau vibhinnābhyāmākārābhyāmavagamyate tau saṃbaddhāsaṃbaddhau vā vaiyadhikaraṇyena pratibhāsete,yatheha kuṇḍe dadhi yathā vā gauraśva iti, na tathā guṇakarmasāmānyaviśeṣasamavāyāḥ, teṣāṃ dravyakāratayākārāntarāyogena dravyādākāriṇo 'nyatvenākāritayā
GSP33vacbhamu:7527: yadi tu saṃyoginoḥ kāryayoḥ saṃbandhibhyāmanyadeśatve yutasiddhistato
GSP33vacbhamu:7529: pṛthaggatimattvaṃ yutasiddhistato 'nyāyutasiddhiḥ, tathā cākāśaparamāṇvoḥ paramāṇvośca saṃyuktayoryutasiddhiḥ siddhā bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:7540: evaṃ lakṣaṇe 'pi hi samavāye guṇaguṇinorabhyupagamyamāne saṃbaddhe iti pratyayaḥ syānna tādātmyapratyayaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:7542: sa cedāsthito 'pi na pratyayamimamupapādayet kṛtaṃ tatkalpanayā /
GSP33vacbhamu:7545: tadgocaratve hi paṭe śukla ityevamākaraḥ syānna tu paṭaḥ śukla iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:7548: nahyagnirmāṇavaka ityupacaritāgnibhāvo māṇavakaḥ pratyakṣeṇa dahanātmanā prathate /
GSP33vacbhamu:7550: guṇādisadbhāve tadbhede ca pratyakṣānubhavādanyasya pramāṇasyābhāvāttasya ca bhrāntatve sarvābhāvaprasaṅgāt
GSP33vacbhamu:7553: api cāyutasiddhaśabdo 'pṛthagutpattau mukhyaḥ, sā ca bhavanmate na
GSP33vacbhamu:7556: atha bhavatu kāraṇasya yutasiddhiḥ, kāryasya tvayutasiddhi kāraṇātirekeṇābhāvādityāśaṅkyānyathā dūṣayati-- evamapīti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:7557: saṃbandhidvayādhīnasadbhāvo hi saṃbandho nāsatyekasminnapi saṃbandhini bhavitumarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:7558: naca samavāyo nityaḥ svatantra iti coktamadhastāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:7559: naca kāraṇasamavāyādananyā kāryasyotpattiriti śakyaṃ vaktum, evaṃ hi sati
GSP33vacbhamu:7561: utpattau ca samavāyasya saiva kāryasyāstu kiṃ samavāyena /
GSP33vacbhamu:7565: kāryakāraṇayoḥ saṃyogavibhāgau na vidyate itīdaṃ duruktaṃ syāt. /
GSP33vacbhamu:7568: mā bhūdaprāptiḥ kāryakāraṇayoḥ, prāptistvanayoḥ saṃyoga eva kasmānna
GSP33vacbhamu:7574: naca tantupaṭayoḥ saṃbandhastathā, utpannamātrasyaiva paṭasya tantusaṃbandhāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:7576: saṃyogajo 'pi hi saṃyogo bhavadbhirabhyupeyate na kriyāja evetyarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:7577: na cāprāptipūrvikaiva prāptiḥ saṃyogaḥ, ātmākāśasaṃyoge nitye tadabhāvāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:7579: api ca saṃbandhirūpātirikte saṃbandhe siddhe tadavāntarabhedāya lakṣaṇabhedo 'nuśrīyeta sa eva tu saṃbandhyatirikto 'siddhaḥ, uktaṃ hi parastādatiriktaḥ saṃbandhibhyāṃ saṃbandho 'saṃbaddho na saṃbandhinau ghaṭayitumiṣṭe /
GSP33vacbhamu:7581: tasmādupapattyanubhavābhyāṃ na kāryasya kāraṇādanyatvam, api tu kāraṇasyaivāyamanirvācyaḥ pariṇāmabheda iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:7582: tasmāt kāryasya kāraṇādanatirekān kiṃ kena saṃbaddhaṃ, saṃyogasya ca saṃyogibhyāmanatirekāt kastayoḥ saṃyoga ityāha-- nāpi saṃyogasyeti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:7589: kṣotriyaḥ, parāpekṣayā tu pitā putraḥ pautro bhrātā jāmāteti /
GSP33vacbhamu:7593: kāryakāraṇayostu tādātmye 'pyanirvācyasya kāryasya bhedaṃ vivakṣitvā saṃbandhino.rityuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:7602: kiñcānyat.dvābhyāmaṇubhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāṃ sāvayavasya kāryasya dvyaṇukasyākāśeneva saṃśleṣānupapattiḥ. /
GSP33vacbhamu:7603: saṃśleṣaḥ saṃgraho yata ekasaṃbandhyākarṣe saṃbandhyantarākarṣo bhavati tasyānupapattiriti
GSP33vacbhamu:7604: ata eva saṃyogādanyaḥ kāryakāraṇadravyayorāśrayāśritabhāvo 'nyathā. nopapadyata ityavaśyaṃ kalpanīyaḥ samavāya iti cet. /
GSP33vacbhamu:7612: tathā ca paramāṇavaḥ, tasmātsāvayavā anityāḥ syuḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:7613: aparicchinnatve cākāśādivat paramāṇutvavyāghātaḥ śaṅkate-- yāṃstvamiti. nirākaroti-- na /
GSP33vacbhamu:7615: kiṃ sūkṣmatvāt paramāṇavo na vinaśyantyatha niravayavatayā tatra pūrvasmin kalpe idamuktam-- vastubhūtāpīti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:7620: prathamānaścāśvaśaphākāratāṃ nīyamānaḥ puroḍāśatāmāpadyate,tatra piṇḍo naśyati puroḍāśaścotpadyate, nahi tatra piṇḍāvayavasaṃyogā vinaśyanti,api
GSP33vacbhamu:7621: tu saṃyuktā eva santaḥ paraṃ prathanena nudyamānā adhikadeśavyāpakā bhavanti, evamagnisaṃyogena suvarṇadravyāvayavāḥ saṃyuktā eva santo dravībhāvamāpadyante, natu mitho vibhajyante /
GSP33vacbhamu:7624: evamantareṇāpyavayavasaṃyogavināśaṃ paramāṇavo vinaṅkṣyantyanye cotpatsyanta iti sarvamavadātam samudāya ubhayahetuke 'pi tadaprāptiḥ. /
GSP33vacbhamu:7627: te hi paramāṇvākāśādikkālātmamanasāṃ ca sāmānyaviśeṣasamavāyānāṃ ca guṇānāṃ ca keṣāñcinnityatvamabhyupetya śeṣāṇāṃ niranvayavināśamupayanti,
GSP33vacbhamu:7629: tena tadupanyāso vaināśikatvasāmyena sarvavaināśikān smārayatīti tadanantaraṃ vaināśikamatanirākaraṇamiti
GSP33vacbhamu:7633: tadidaṃ dūṣaṇāya vaināśikamatamupanyasituṃ tatprakārabhedānāha-- sa ca bahuprakāra iti. vādivaicitryāt khalu , kecitsarvāstitvameva rāddhāntaṃ pratipadyante
GSP33vacbhamu:7636: atha tvatrabhavatāṃ sarvajñānāṃ tattvapratipattibhedo na saṃbhavati,tattvasyaikarūpyādityetadaparitoṣeṇāha-- vineyabhedādvā. /
GSP33vacbhamu:7640: ye tu prakṛṣṭamatayastebhyaḥ sākṣādeva śūnyatātattvaṃ pratipādyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:7652: rūpyante ebhiriti rūpyanta iti ca vyutpatyā saviṣayāṇīndriyāṇi rūpaskandhaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:7653: yadyapi rūpyamāṇāḥ pṛthivyādayo bāhyāstathāpi kāyasthatvādvā indriyasaṃbandhādvā bhavantyādhyātmikāḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:7655: vedanāskandho yā priyāpriyānubhayaviṣayasparśe suḥkhaduḥkhatadrahitaviśeṣāvasthā cittasya jāyate sa vedanāskandhaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:7656: saṃjñāskandhaḥ savikalpapratyayaḥ saṃjñāsaṃsargayogyapratibhāsaḥ, yathā ḍitthaḥ kuṇḍalī gauro brāhmaṇo gacchatītyevañjātīyakaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:7657: saṃskāraskandho rāgādayaḥ kleśāḥ,upakleśāśca madamānādayaḥ, dharmādharmau ceti /
GSP33vacbhamu:7665: cetano hi kulālādiḥ sarvaṃ mṛddaṇḍādyupasaṃhṛtya samudāyātmakaṃ ghaṭamāracayan dṛṣṭaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:7666: nahyasati mṛddaṇḍādivyāpārīṇi viduṣi kulāle svayamacetanā mṛddaṇḍādayo vyāpṛtya jātu ghaṭamāracayanti
GSP33vacbhamu:7667: na cāsati kuvinde tantuvemādayaḥ paṭaṃ vayante /
GSP33vacbhamu:7669: kāryotpādānuguṇaṃ ca kāraṇasamavadhānaṃ cetanaprekṣādhīnamasatyāṃ cetanaprekṣāyāṃ na bhavitumutsahata iti kāryotpattiścetanaprekṣādhīnatvavyāptā vyāpakaviruddhopalabdhyā cetanānadhiṣṭhitebhyaḥ kāraṇebhyo vyāvartamānā cetanādhiṣṭhitatva avāvatiṣṭhata iti pratibandhasiddhiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:7670: yadyucyeta addhā cetanādhīnaiva kāryotpattiḥ, asti tu cittaṃ cetanaṃ ,
GSP33vacbhamu:7671: taddhīndriyādiviṣayasparśe satyabhijvalat tatkāraṇacakraṃ yathāyathā kāryāya paryāptaṃ tathātathā prakāśayadacetanāni kāraṇānyadhiṣṭhāya
GSP33vacbhamu:7672: kāryamabhinirvartayatīti, tatrāha-- cittābhijvalanasya ca samudāyasidydhadhīnatvāt. na khalu bāhyābhyāntarasamudāyasiddhimantareṇa cittābhijvalanaṃ , tatastu tāmicchan duruttaramitaretarāśrayamāviśediti
GSP33vacbhamu:7681: yadyucyeta asamavahitānyeva kāraṇāni kāryaṃ kariṣyanti parasparānapekṣāṇi,
GSP33vacbhamu:7682: kṛtamatra samavadhāyayitrā cetanenetyata āha-- nirapekṣapravṛttyabhyupagame ceti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:7683: yadyucyate astyālayavijñānamahaṅkārāspadaṃ pūrvāparānusaṃghātṛ, tadeva kāraṇānāṃ pratisaṃghātṛ bhaviṣyatīti,tatrāha-- āśayasyāpīti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:7684: yat khalvekaṃ yadi sthiramāsthīyeta tato nāmāntareṇātmaiva /
GSP33vacbhamu:7686: naca tatsaṃtānastasyānyatve nāmāntareṇātmābhyupagato 'nanyatve ca vijñānameva ,tacca kṣaṇikamevetyuktadoṣāpattiḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:7691: tena vyāpāravatā vyāpārātpūrvaṃ vyāpārasamaye ca bhavitavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:7702: atha punarayaṃ pratītyasamutpādo dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāṃ bhavati hetūpanibandhataśca pratyayopanibandhataśca
GSP33vacbhamu:7704: tatra bāhyasya pratītyasamutpādasya hetūpanibandhaḥ-- yadidaṃ bījādaṅkuro 'ṅkurātpatraṃ patrātkāṇḍaṃ kāṇḍānnālo nālādgarbho garbhācchūkaḥ śūkātpuṣpaṃ puṣpātphalamiti /
GSP33vacbhamu:7705: asati bīje 'ṅkuro na bhavati, yāvadasati puṣpe phalaṃ na bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:7706: sati tu bīje 'ṅkuro bhavati, yāvat puṣpe sati phalamiti /
GSP33vacbhamu:7707: tatra bījasya naivaṃ bhavati jñānamahamaṅkuraṃ nirvartayāmīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:7708: . aṅkurasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati jñānamahaṃ bījena nirvartita iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:7709: evaṃ yāvatpuṣpasya naivaṃ bhavatyahaṃ phalaṃ nirvartayāmīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:7711: tasmādasatyapi caitanye bījādīnāmasatyapi cānyasminnadhiṣṭhātari kāryakāraṇabhāvaniyamo dṛśyate
GSP33vacbhamu:7715: hetuṃ hetuṃ pratyayante hetvantarāṇīti,teṣāmayamānānāṃ bhāvaḥ pratyayaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:7718: tatra ca pṛthivīdhāturbījasya saṃgrahakṛtyaṃ karoti yato 'ṅkuraḥ kaṭhino
GSP33vacbhamu:7721: ākāśadhāturbījasyānāvaraṇakṛtyaṃ karoti, ṛturapi bījasya pariṇāmaṃ karoti,
GSP33vacbhamu:7722: tadeteṣāmavikalānāṃ dhātūnāṃ samavāye bīje rohityaṅkuro jāyate nānyathā /
GSP33vacbhamu:7723: tatra pṛthivīdhātornaivaṃ bhavatyahaṃ bījasya saṃgrahakṛtyaṃ karomīti,yāvadṛtornaivaṃ bhavatyahaṃ bījasya pariṇāmaṃ karomīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:7725: tathādhyātmikaḥ pratītyasamutpādo dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāṃ bhavati hetūpanibandhataḥ pratyayopanibandhataśca
GSP33vacbhamu:7726: tatrāsya hetūpanibandho yadidamavidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārā yāvajjātipratyayaṃ jarāmaraṇādaya udapatsyanta /
GSP33vacbhamu:7728: saṃskārāṇāmapi naivaṃ bhavati vayamavidyayā nirvartitā iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:7729: evaṃ yāvajjātyā api naivaṃ bhavatyahaṃ jarāmaraṇādyabhinirvartayāmīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:7730: jarāmaraṇādīnāmapi naivaṃ bhavati vayaṃ jātyādibhirnirvartitā iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:7731: atha ca satsvavidyādiṣu svayamacetaneṣu cetanāntarānadhiṣṭhiteṣvapi saṃskārādīnāmutpattiḥ,bījādiṣviva satsvacetaneṣu cetanāntarānadhiṣṭhiteṣvapyaṅkurādīnām /
GSP33vacbhamu:7740: yastu nāmarūpāṅkuramabhinirvartayati pañcavijñānakāryasaṃyuktaṃ sāsravaṃ ca manovijñānaṃ,so 'yamucyate vijñānadhātuḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:7741: yadā hyādhyātmikāḥ pṛthivyādidhātavo bhavantyavikalāstadā sarveṣāṃ samavāyādbhavati kāyasyotpattiḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:7742: tatra pṛthivyādidhātūnāṃ naivaṃ bhavati vayaṃ kāyasya kāṭhinyādi nirvartayāma iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:7743: kāyasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati jñānamahamebhiḥ pratyayairabhinirvartita iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:7747: tatraiteṣveva ṣaṭsu dhātuṣu yaikasaṃjñā, piṇḍasaṃjñā, nityasaṃjñā,
GSP33vacbhamu:7751: mūlakāraṇaṃ, tasyāmavidyāyāṃ satyāṃ saṃskārā.rāgadveṣamohā viṣayeṣu pravartante /
GSP33vacbhamu:7755: ṣaḍāyatanaṃ,.nāmarūpendriyāṇāṃ trayāṇāṃ saṃnipātaḥ sparśaḥ,.sparśādvedanā sukhādikā, vedanāyāṃ satyāṃ kartavyametatsukhaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:7758: tato bhavo.bhavatyasmājjanmeti bhavo dharmādharmau, taddhetukaḥ skandhaprādurbhāvo jātiḥ.janma
GSP33vacbhamu:7763: tadutthaṃ pralapanaṃ hā mātaḥ,hā tāta, hā ca me putrakalatrādīti paridevanā. /
GSP33vacbhamu:7768: janmādayo ghaṭīyantravadaniśamāvartamānāḥ santīti tadetairavidyādibhi rākṣiptaḥ saṃghāta.iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:7770: ayamabhisaṃdhiḥ-- yat khalu hetūpanibandhaṃ kāryaṃ tadanyānapekṣaṃ hetumātrādhīnotpādatvādutpadyatāṃ nāma /
GSP33vacbhamu:7780: na caikasmādeva kāraṇātkāryasiddheḥ kimanyaiḥ kāraṇairiti vācyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:7782: na caiko 'pitatkāraṇasamarthaṃ ityanya udāsata iti yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:7783: nahi te prekṣāvanto yenaisamālocayeyurasmāsu samartha eko 'pi kārye iti kṛtaṃ naḥ saṃnidhineti
GSP33vacbhamu:7785: tāṃśca sarvananapekṣān pratītya kāryamapi na netpattumarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:7786: naca svamahimnā sarve kāryamutpādayanto 'pi nānākāryāṇāmīsate tatraiva teṣāṃ sāmarthyāt
GSP33vacbhamu:7787: na ca kāraṇabhedāt kāryabhedaḥ, sāmagryā ekatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:7790: yadyantyakṣaṇaprāptā anapekṣāḥ svakāryopajanane, hantānena krameṇa tataḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:7791: pūrve tataḥ pūrve sarva evānapekṣāstattatsvakāryopajanana iti kusūlasthatvāviśeṣe 'pi yena bījakṣaṇena kusūlasthena
GSP33vacbhamu:7793: 'napekṣa eva bījakṣaṇaḥ svakāryopajanane evaṃ sarva eva
GSP33vacbhamu:7794: tadantarānantapavartino bījakṣaṇa anapekṣā iti kusūlanihitabīja eva syāt kṛtī kṛṣīvalaḥ kṛtamasya duḥkhabahulena kṛṣikarmaṇā /
GSP33vacbhamu:7795: yena hi bījakṣaṇena svakṣaṇaparamparayāṅkuro janayitavyastasyānapekṣāsau kṣaṇaparamparā kusūla evāṅkuraṃ kariṣyatīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:7796: tasmātparasparāpekṣā evāntyā vā madhyā vā pūrve vā kṣaṇāḥ kāryopajanana iti vaktavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:7799: tadidamuktam-- bhavedupapannaḥ saṃghāto yadi saṃghātasya kiñcinnimittamavagamyeteti /
GSP33vacbhamu:7806: tatra na tāvat kāraṇamanyathānupapadyamānaṃ kāryamutpādayati, kintu svasāmarthyena /
GSP33vacbhamu:7809: .tacca sthirapakṣe 'pi satyapi ca bhoktaryaghiṣṭhātāraṃ cetanamantareṇa na saṃbhavati kimaṅga,punaḥ kṣaṇikeṣu bhāveṣu /
GSP33vacbhamu:7810: bhokturbhogenāpi kadācidākṣipyeta saṃghātaḥ,sa tu bhoktāpi nāstīti
GSP33vacbhamu:7812: api ca bahava upakāryopakārakabhāvena sthitāḥ kāryaṃ janayanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:7818: yadā hi pratyayopanibandhaḥ pratītyasamutpādo bhavettadā cetano
GSP33vacbhamu:7821: hetuḥ svabhāvata eva kāryasaṃghātaṃ kariṣyati kevala iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:7822: astu tāvadyathā kevalādhetoḥ kāryaṃ nopajāyata iti, anyonyāśrayaprasaṅgo
GSP33vacbhamu:7824: saṃprati pratyayopanibandhanaṃ pratītyasamutpādamāstāya codayati-- atha manyase saṃghātā eveti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:7825: asthirā api hi bhāvāḥ sadā saṃhatā evodayante vyante ca /
GSP33vacbhamu:7827: tathā ca kṛtamatra saṃhantrā cetaneneti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:7830: sa khalu saṃghātasaṃtativarti dharmādharmāhvayaḥ saṃskārasaṃtāno yathāyathaṃ sukhaduḥkhe janayannāgantukaṃ kañcanānāsādya svata eva
GSP33vacbhamu:7836: tasmādanenāgatantukānapekṣasya saṃdhātasaṃtānasyaiva sadṛśajanane visadṛśajanane vā svabhāva āstheyaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:7839: aprāptabhogo hi bhogamāptukāmastatsādhane pravartata iti pratyātmasiddham
GSP33vacbhamu:7840: seyaṃ pravṛttirbhogādanyasmin sthire bhoktari bhogatatsādhanasamayavyāpini kalpyate nāsthire
GSP33vacbhamu:7842: nahi bhogo bhogāya kalpate nāpyanyo bhogāyānyasya /
GSP33vacbhamu:7844: tatra bubhukṣumumukṣū cet sthirāvāsthīyeyātāṃ tadābhyupetahānam, asthairyā vā pravṛttiprasaṅga ityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:7857: kāraṇasya hi kāryotpādāt prākkālasattār'thavatī na kāryakālā, tadā kāryasya siddhatvena tatsidydharthāyāḥ sattāyā anupayogāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:7859: bhūtvā vyāpṛtya bhāvāḥ prayeṇa hi kāryaṃ kurvanto loke dṛśyante /
GSP33vacbhamu:7860: tathā ca sthiratvam, itarathā tu lokavirodha iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:7862: yathāhuḥ-- 'bhūtiryeṣāṃ kriyā saiva kārakaṃ saiva cocyate 'iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:7863: bhavatyevaṃ vyāpāravattā tathāpi kṣaṇikasya na kāraṇatvamityāha-- tathāpi naivopapadyate.kṣaṇikasya kāraṇabhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:7865: yadi ca na kāryasamaye kāraṇaṃ sat kathaṃ teṣāṃ tadātmanānubhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:7866: naca kāraṇasādṛśyaṃ kāryasya na tu tādātmyamiti vācyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:7868: anugame vā tadeva kāraṇaṃ, tathā ca tasya kāryatādātmyamiti siddhimakṣaṇikatvamityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:7869: sarvathā vailakṣaṇye tu hetuphalabhāvastantughaṭādāvapi prāptaṃ ityatiprasaṅga ityāha-- vinaiva veti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:7873: api ca cotpādanirodhayorvikalpatraye 'pi vastunaḥ śāśvatatvaprasaṅga ityāha-- api cotpādanirodhau nāmeti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:7884: evaṃ sukhādīnāmapi caittānāṃ cittābhinnahetujānāṃ catvāryotānyeva kāraṇāni
GSP33vacbhamu:7885: seyaṃ pratijñā caturvidhān hetūn pratītya cittacaittā utpadyanta ityabhāvakāraṇatva uparudhyeta
GSP33vacbhamu:7890: bhāvapratīpā saṃkhyā buddhiḥ pratisaṃkhyā , tayā nirodhaḥ pratisaṃkhyānirodhaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:7895: hetuphalabhāvena hi vyavasthitāḥ saṃtānina evodayavyayadharmāṇaḥ saṃtānāḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:7896: tatra yo 'sāvantyaḥ saṃtānī, yannirodhātsaṃtānocchedena bhavitavyam, sa kiṃ phalaṃ kiñcidārabhate na vā /
GSP33vacbhamu:7899: anārambhe tu bhavedantyaḥ saḥ, kintu syādasan, arthakriyākāritāyāḥ sattālakṣaṇasya virahāt
GSP33vacbhamu:7900: tadasatve tajjanakamapyasajjanakatvenāsadityanena krameṇāsantaḥ sarva eva saṃtānina iti tatsaṃtāno nitarāmasanniti kasya pratisaṃkhyayā nirodha- /
GSP33vacbhamu:7901: naca sabhāgānāṃ saṃtānināṃ hetuphalabhāvaḥ saṃtānaḥ, tasya visabhāgotpādo nirodhaḥ, visabhāgotpādaka eva cakṣaṇaḥ saṃtānasyāntyaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:7903: kathañcitsārūpye vā visabhāge 'pyantataḥ sattayā tadastīti na
GSP33vacbhamu:7907: atra tāvadutpannamātrāpravṛttasya bhāvasya na pratisaṃkhyānirodhaḥ saṃbhavati, tasya puruṣaprayatnāpekṣābhāvādityastyeva dūṣaṇaṃ, tathāpi doṣāntaramubhayasminnapi nirodho brūte-- na hi bhāvānāmiti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:7908: yato niranvayo vināśo na saṃbhavatyato nirūpākhyo 'pi na saṃbhavati,
GSP33vacbhamu:7912: avasthāstu viśeṣākhyā upajanāpāyadharmāṇaḥ, tāsāṃ sarvasāmanirvacanīyatayā svato na paramārthasattvam
GSP33vacbhamu:7914: tasya ca sarvatra pratyabhijñāyamānatvānna vināśa ityavasthāvato
GSP33vacbhamu:7920: pratyabhijñāyamānaṃ, yenāsya na niranvayo nāśaḥ syādityata āha-- aspaṣṭapratyabhijñānāsvapīti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:7921: atrāpi tattoyaṃ tejasā mārtaṇḍamaṇḍalamambudatvāya nīyata ityanumeyaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:7923: śakyaṃ tatra vaktum'udambindau ca sindhau ca toyabhāvona bhidyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:7938: tasmādguṇo bhūtvā gandhādivadasādhāraṇendriyagrāhyo yadravyamanumāpayati tadākāśaṃ pañcamaṃ bhūtaṃ vastviti /
GSP33vacbhamu:7944: vibhajate-- api vaināśikaḥ sarvasya vastuna iti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:7945: yastu satyapyetasminnupalabdhṛsmartroranyatve 'pi samānāyāṃ saṃtatau kāryakāraṇabhāvāt smṛtirupapatsyata iti manyamāno na parituṣyati taṃ prati pratyabhijñāsamājñātapratyakṣavirodhamāha-- api ca darśanasmaraṇayoḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:7951: naca sādṛśyanibandhanaṃ pratyabhijñānaṃ, pūrvāparakṣaṇadarśina ekasyābhāve tadanupapatteḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:7953: ayamarthaḥ-- vikalpapratyayo 'yaṃ, vikalpaśca svākāraṃ bāhyatayādhyavasyati, na tu tattvataḥ pūrvāparau kṣaṇau tayoḥ sādṛśyaṃ vā gṛhṇāti /
GSP33vacbhamu:7957: nānāpadārthasaṃbhinnavākyārthābhāsastāvadayaṃ vikalpaḥ prathate tatraite nānāpadārthā na prathanta iti bruvāṇaḥ svasaṃvedanaṃ bādheta /
GSP33vacbhamu:7958: na caikasya jñānasya nānākāratvaṃ saṃbhavati, ekatvavirodhāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:7959: naca tāvantyeva jñānānīti yuktaṃ, tathāsati pratyākāraṃ jñānānāṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:7963: yadyucyeta astytasmin vikalpe tenedaṃ sadṛśamiti padadvayaprayogo na tviha tattedantāspadau padārthau tayośca sādṛśyamiti vivakṣitam, api tvevamākāratā jñānasya kalpiteti, tatrāha-- yadā hi lokaprasiddhaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:7967: na caitatsarvamasati vikalpānāṃ bāhyālambanatve 'sati ca lokaprasiddhapadārthakatve bhavitumarhati
GSP33vacbhamu:7968: jñānākāratve hi vikalpapratibhāsināṃ nityatvānityatvādīnāmekārthaviṣayatvābhāvāt jñānānāṃ ca dharmiṇāṃ bhedānna virodhaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:7970: na cālaukikārthenānityaśabdenātmani vibhutvaṃ vivakṣitvānityaśabdaṃ prayuñjāno laukikārthaṃ nityaśabdamātmani prayuñjānena vipratipadyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:7971: tasmādanena svapakṣaṃ pratitiṣṭhāpayiṣatā parapakṣasādhanaṃ ca nirācikīrṣatā vikalpānāṃ lokasiddhapadārthakatā bāhyalambanatā ca vaktavyā
GSP33vacbhamu:7972: yadyucyeta dvividho hi vikalpānāṃ viṣayo grāhyaścādhyavaseyaśca /
GSP33vacbhamu:7974: tathāca pakṣapratipakṣaparigrahalakṣaṇā vipratipattiḥ prasiddhapadārthakatvaṃ copapadyata ityata āha-- evamevaiṣor'tha iti niścitaṃ yattadeva vaktavyaṃ, tato 'nyaducyamānaṃ bahupralāpitvamātmanaḥ kevalaṃ prakhyāpayet. /
GSP33vacbhamu:7983: nahi jātu sahasramapi śilpino ghaṭaṃ paṭayitumīśate /
GSP33vacbhamu:7985: api ca tathāsati yukta iti pratyayaḥ syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:7988: yadi gṛhyamāṇe tadā kiṃ vikalpenāho tatsamayajenāvikalpakena /
GSP33vacbhamu:7994: na ca tatsamayabhāvinā nirvikalpakena gṛhyamāṇe bāhye vikalpenāgṛhīte tatra vikalpaḥ svākāramāropayitumarhati.
GSP33vacbhamu:7995: na hi rajatajñānāpratibhāsini purovartini vastuni rajatajñānena śakyaṃ rajatamāropayitum /
GSP33vacbhamu:7996: agṛhyamāṇe tu bāhye svākāra ityeva syānna bāhya iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:7998: api cāyaṃ vikalpaḥ svasaṃvedanaṃ santaṃ vikalpaṃ kiṃ vastusantaṃ svākāraṃ gṛhītvā paścādbāhyamāropayati, atha yadā svākāraṃ gṛhṇāti tadaivāropayati /
GSP33vacbhamu:7999: na tāvat kṣaṇikatayā kramavirahiṇo jñānasya kramavartinī grahaṇāropaṇe kalpete /
GSP33vacbhamu:8003: bāhyaṃ cāropyamāṇamaviśadaṃ sattato 'nyadeva syānna tu svākāraḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:8005: na ca bhedāgrahamātreṇa samāropābhidhānaṃ, vaiśadyāvaiśadyarūpatayā bhedagrahasyoktatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:8007: pravṛttiḥ, hanta tarhi trailokyata evānena na bhedo gṛhīta iti yatra
GSP33vacbhamu:8012: api ca sādṛśyanibandhanaḥ saṃvyavahārastenedaṃ sadṛśamityevamākārabuddhinibandhano bhavenna tu tadevedamityākārabuddhinibandhana ityāha-- na cāyaṃ sādṛśyātsaṃvyavahāra iti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:8013: nanu jvālādiṣu sādṛśyādasatyāmapi sādṛśyabuddhau tadbhāvāvagamananibandhanaḥ saṃvyahāro dṛśyate yathā tatheheti bhaviṣyatīti pūrvāparitoṣeṇāha-- bhavedapi kadacidbāhyavastunīti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:8014: tathāhi -- vividhajanasaṃkīrṇagopureṇa puraṃ niviśamānaṃ narāntarebhya ātmanirdhāraṇāyāsādhāraṇaṃ cihnaṃ vidadhatamupahasanti pāśupataṃ pṛthagjanā iti //25 //
GSP33vacbhamu:8022: na kevalamarthādāpadyate, darśayanti ca,-- nānupamṛdya prādurbhāvāditi. etadvibhajyate-- vinaṣṭāddhikileti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:8025: ayamabhisaṃdhiḥ-- kūṭastho hi kāryajananasvabhāvo vā syādatatsvabhāvo vā /
GSP33vacbhamu:8026: sa cetkāryajananasvabhāvastato yāvadanena kāryaṃ kartavyaṃ tāvatsahasaiva kuryāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:8029: yadyucye samartho 'pi kramavatsahakārisacivaḥ krameṇa kāryāṇi karotīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:8036: bhede tūpakārasya tasmin sati kāryasya bhāvādasati cābhāvātsatyapi kūṭasthe kāryānutpādādanvayavyatirekābhyāmupakāra eva kāryakārī na bhāva iti nārthakriyākārī bhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:8037: taduktam- varṣātapābhyāṃ kiṃ vyomnaścarmaṇyasti tayoḥ phalam /
GSP33vacbhamu:8040: tathā cākiñcitkarādapi cet kūṭasthātkāryaṃ jāyeta, sarvaṃ sarvasmājjāyeteti sūktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:8051: viśeṣaṇayoge vā so 'pi bhāvaḥ syānna nirūpākhya ityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:8052: viśeṣaṇayogamabhāvasyābhyupetyāha- nāpyabhāvaḥ kasyacidutpattiheturiti. api ca yadyenānanvitaṃ na tattasya vikāraḥ, yathā ghaṭaśarāvodañcānādayo hemnānanvitā na hemavikāraḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:8058: sthiro 'pi bhāvaḥ kramavatsahakārisamavadhānāt krameṇa kāryāṇi karoti /
GSP33vacbhamu:8060: sa cāsya sahakāribhirādhīyamānā upakāro na bhinno nāpyabhinnaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:8065: tathā ca śrutiḥ- mṛttiketyeva satyam' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:8066: apica ye 'pi sarvato vilakṣaṇāni svalakṣaṇāni vastusantyāsthiṣata,
GSP33vacbhamu:8067: teṣāmapi kimiti bījajātīyebhyo 'ṅkurajātīyānyeva jāyante kāryāṇi, natu kramelakajātīyāni /
GSP33vacbhamu:8068: nahi bījādbījāntarasya vā kramelakasya vātyantavailakṣaṇye kaścidviśeṣaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:8069: naca bījāṅguratve sāmānye paramārthasatī, yenaitayorbhāvikaḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvo bhavet /
GSP33vacbhamu:8073: prapañcastu brahmatatvasamīkṣānyāyakaṇikayoḥ kṛta iti neha pratamyate vistarabhayāt //26.
GSP33vacbhamu:8079: atha pramātā pramāṇaṃ prameyaṃ pramitiriti hi catusṛṣu vidhāsu tatvaparisamāptirāsāmānyatamābhāve 'pi tattvasyāvyavasthānāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:8080: tasmādanena vijñānaskandhamātraṃ tattvaṃ vyavasthāpayatā catasro vidhā
GSP33vacbhamu:8082: nahyasti saṃbhavo vijñānamātraṃ catasro vidhāścetyata āha-- tasmiṃśca vijñānavāde buddhyārūḍhena rūpeṇeti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:8083: yadyapyanubhavānnānyo 'nubhāvyo 'nubhavitānubhavanaṃ, tathāpi buddhyārūḍhena buddhiparikalpitenānyastha evaiṣa pramāṇaprameyaphalavyavahāraḥ pramātṛvyavahāraścetyapi draṣṭavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:8086: na hi brahmavādino nīlādyākārāṃ vittimabhyupagacchanti, kintvanirvacanīyaṃ nīlāditi /
GSP33vacbhamu:8089: bāhyavādinorapi vaibhāṣikasautrāntikayoḥ kālpanika eva pramāṇaphalavyavahāro 'bhimata ityāha-- satyapi. bāhyer'tha iti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:8091: nahi khadiragocare paraśau palāśe dvaidhībhāvo bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:8095: na ca jñānaṃ svalakṣaṇamanaṃśamaṃśābhyāṃ vastusabhdyāṃ yujyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:8102: tathā cāhuḥ-- 'nahi vittisattaiva tadvedanā yuktā, tasyāḥ sarvatrāviśeṣāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:8104: praśnapūrvakaṃ bāhyārthābhāva upapattīrāha-- kathaṃ. punaravamyata iti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:8105: sa hi vijñānālambanatvābhimato bāhyor'thaḥ paramāṇustāvanna saṃbhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:8111: kimayaṃ pratibhāsasya jñānasya dharma uta pratibhāsanakāler'thasya dharmaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:8112: yadi pūrvaḥ kalpaḥ, advā, tathāsati hi svāṃśālambanameva
GSP33vacbhamu:8116: tathā hi-- rūpaparimāṇava eva nirantaramutpannā ekavijñānopārohiṇaḥ sthaulyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:8122: pratibhāsadaśāpannānāṃ tu teṣāṃ bhaviṣyati bahutvādivatsāṃvṛtaṃ sthaulyam
GSP33vacbhamu:8126: sāṃvṛtaṃ grahaṇaṃ nānyatra ca vastugraho bhramaḥ //2 //
GSP33vacbhamu:8130: gandharasasparśaparamāṇvantaritā hi te rūpaparamāṇavo na nirantarāḥ tasmādārātsāntareṣu vṛkṣeṣvekadhanavanapratyayavadeṣa sthūlapratyayaḥ paramāṇuṣu sāntareṣu bhrānta eveti paśyāmaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:8131: tasmāt kalpanāpoḍhatve 'pi bhrāntatvāddhaṭādipratyayasya pītaśaṅkhādijñānavanna pratyakṣatā paramāṇugocaratvābhyupagame /
GSP33vacbhamu:8141: apratibhāsamānasadbhāve ca pramāṇābhāvānna bāhyālambanāḥ pratyayā iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:8143: nahi yathendriyamarthaviṣayaṃ jñānaṃ janayatyevaṃ vijñānamaparaṃ vijñānaṃ janayitumarhati
GSP33vacbhamu:8147: nahyasti saṃbhavo 'pratyutpanno dharmī dharmāścāsya pratyutpannā iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:8149: taccānākāraṃ sadājānato bhedābhāvāt kathamarthabhedaṃ vyavasthāpayediti tadbhedavyavasthāpanāyākārabhedo 'syaiṣitavyaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:8150: taduktam-- 'na hi vittisattaiva tadvedanā yuktā, tasyāḥ sarvatrāviśeṣāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:8153: sa cedvijñānasya nārthasadbhāve kiñcana pramāṇamastītyāha-- apicānubhavamātreṇa sādhāraṇātmano jñānasyeti /
GSP33vacbhamu:8155: yadyena saha niyatasahopalambhanaṃ tattato na bhidyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:8158: niṣedhyo hi bhedaḥ sahopalambhāniyamena vyāpto yathā bhinnāvaśvinau nāvaśyaṃ sahopavabhyete kadācidabhrāpidhāne 'nyatarasyaikasyopalabdheḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:8164: yo yaḥ pratyayaḥ sa sarvo bāhyānāvambanaḥ, yathā svapnamāyādipratyayaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:8165: tathā caiṣa vivādādhyāsitaḥ pratyaya iti svabhāvahetuḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:8166: bāhyānālambanatā hi pratyayatvamātrānubandhinī vṛkṣateva śiṃśapātvamātrānubandhinīti tanmātrānubandhini nirālambanatve sādhye bhavati pratyayatvaṃ svabhāvahetuḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:8169: sa hi mene ye yasmin satyapi kādācitkāste sarve tadatiriktahetusāpekṣāḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:8171: tathā ca vivādādhyāsitāḥ satyapyālayavijñānasaṃtāne ṣaḍapi pravṛttipratyayā iti svabhāvahetuḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:8175: nanvekasaṃtatipatitānāmālayavijñānānāṃ tatpravṛttivijñānajananaśaktirvāsanā , tasyāśca svakāryopajanaṃ pratyābhimukhyaṃ paripākastasya ca pratyayaḥ svasaṃtānavartī pūrvakṣaṇaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:8180: nanvevamekasyaiva nīlajñānopajanasāmarthyaṃ tatprabodhasāmarthyaṃ ceti kṣaṇāntarasyaitanna syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:8181: satve vā kathaṃ kṣaṇabhedātsāmarthyabheda ityālayasaṃtānavartinaḥ sarve samarthā iti samarthahetusadbhāve kāryakṣepānupapatteḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:8182: svasaṃtānamātrādhīnatve niṣedhyasya kādācitkatvasya viruddhaṃ sadātanatvaṃ tasyopalabdhyā kādācitkatvaṃ nivartamānaṃ hetvantarāpekṣatve vyavatiṣṭhata iti pratibandhasiddhiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:8183: naca jñānasaṃtānāntaranibandhanatvaṃ sarveṣāmiṣyate pravṛttivijñānānāṃ vijñānavādibhirapi tu kasyacideva vicchinnagamanavacanapratibhāsasya pravṛttivijñānasya /
GSP33vacbhamu:8184: api ca sattvāntarasaṃtānanimittatve tasyāpi sadā saṃnidhānānna kādācitkatvaṃ syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:8185: na hi sattvāntarasaṃtānasya deśataḥ kālato vā viprakarṣasaṃbhavaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:8187: tasmādasati bāhyer'the pratyayavaicitryānupapatterastyānumāniko bāhyārtha iti sautrāntikāḥ pratipedire, tānnirākaroti-- vāsanāvaicitryādityāha.vijñānavādī /
GSP33vacbhamu:8190: tathāhi-- bāhyanimittakatve 'pi kathaṃ kadācit nīlasaṃvedanaṃ kadācit pītasaṃvedanam /
GSP33vacbhamu:8192: atha pītasaṃnidhāne 'pi kimiti nīlajñānaṃ na bhavati, pītajñānaṃ bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:8196: evaṃ tarhi kṣaṇānāmapi svakāraṇabhedanibandhaḥ śaktibhedo bhaviṣyati /
GSP33vacbhamu:8197: saṃtānino hi kṣaṇāḥ kāryabhedahetavaste ca pratikāryaṃ bhidyante ca /
GSP33vacbhamu:8198: na ca saṃtāno nāma kaścideka utpādakaḥ kṣaṇānāṃ yadabhedāt kṣaṇā na bhidyeran /
GSP33vacbhamu:8199: nanūktaṃ na kṣaṇabhedābhedābhyāṃ śaktibhedābhedau, bhinnānāmapi kṣaṇānāmekasāmarthyopalabdheḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:8200: anyathaika eva kṣaṇe nīlajñānajananasāmarthyaṃ iti na bhūyo nīlajñānāni jāyeran. tatsamarthasyātītatvāt, kṣaṇāntarāṇāṃ cāsāmarthyāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:8201: tasmāt kṣaṇabhede 'pi na sāmarthyabhedaḥ, saṃtānabhede tu sāmarthyaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:8204: yadi bhinnānāṃ saṃtānānāṃ naikaṃ sāmarthyaṃ, hanta tarhi nīlasaṃtānānāmapi
GSP33vacbhamu:8207: tasmātsaṃtānāntarāṇāmiva kṣaṇāntarāṇāmapi svakāraṇabhedādhīnopajanānāṃ keṣāñcideva sāmarthyabhedaḥ keṣāñcinneti vaktavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:8208: tathā caikālayajñānasaṃtānapatiteṣu kasyacideva jñānakṣaṇasya sa tādṛśaḥ sāmarthyātiśayo vāsanāparanāmā svapratyayāsāditaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:8209: yato nīlākāraṃ pravṛttivijñānaṃ jāyate na pītākāram /
GSP33vacbhamu:8210: kasyacittu sa tādṛśo yataḥ pītākāraṃ jñānaṃ na nīlākāramiti vāsanāvaicitryādeva svapratyayāsāditājjñānavaicitryasiddherna tadatiriktārthasadbhāve kiñcanāsti pramāṇamiti paśyāmaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:8219: sa hyupalambhābhāvādvādhyavasīyeta, satyapyupalambhe tasya bāhyāviṣayatvādvā, satyapi bāhyaviṣayatve bāhyārthabādhakapramāṇasadbhāvādvā /
GSP33vacbhamu:8220: na tāvat sarvathopalambhābhāva iti praśnapūrvakamāha-- kasmāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:8222: nahi sphuṭatare sarvajanīna upalambhe sati tadabhāvaḥ śakyo vaktumityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:8225: upalabdhigrāhiṇā hi sākṣiṇopalabdhirgṛhyamāṇā bāhyaviṣayatvenaiva gṛhyate nopalabdhimātramityarthaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:8229: idamatrākūtam-- ghaṭapaṭādayo hi sthūlā bhāsante na tu paramasūkṣmāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:8230: tatredaṃ nānādigdeśavyāpitvalakṣaṇaṃ sthaulyaṃ yadyapi jñānākāratvenāvaraṇānāvaraṇalakṣaṇena viruddhadharmasaṃsargeṇa yujyate jñānopādheranāvṛtatvādeva tathāpi taddeśatvātaddeśatvakampatvaraktāraktatvalakṣaṇairviruddhadharmasaṃsargairasya nānātvaṃ prasajyamānaṃ jñānākāratve 'pi na śakyaṃ śakreṇāpi vārayitum /
GSP33vacbhamu:8233: na ca tāvat paramāṇvābhāsamekajñānam, ekasya nānātmatvānupapatteḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:8235: na ca yāvanta ākārāstāvantyeva jñānāni, tāvatāṃ jñānānāṃ mitho
GSP33vacbhamu:8237: na ca tatpṛṣṭhabhāvī samastajñānākārasaṃkalanātmaka ekaḥ sthūlavikalpo vijṛmbhata iti sāṃpratam
GSP33vacbhamu:8239: yathāha dharmakīrtiḥ- 'tasmānnārthe na ca jñāne sthūlābhāsastadātmanaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:8242: tasmādbhavatāpi jñānākāraṃ sthaulyaṃ samarthayamānena pramāṇapravṛttyapravṛttipūrvakau saṃbhavāsaṃbhavā.vāstheyau /
GSP33vacbhamu:8244: yacca jñānasya pratyarthaṃ vyavasthāyai viṣayasārūpyamāsthitaṃ, naitena viṣayo 'pahnotuṃ śakyaḥ, asatyarthe tatsārūpyasya tadvyavasthāyāścānupapatterityāha- na ca jñānasya viṣayasārūpyāditi.. yaśca sahopalambhaniyama uktaḥ śo 'pi vkalpaṃ na sahate /
GSP33vacbhamu:8245: yadi jñānārthayoḥ sāhityenopalambhastato viruddho heturnābhedaṃ sādhayitumarhati, sāhityasya tadviruddhabhedavyāptatvādabhede tadanupapatteḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:8248: api ca kimekatvenopalambha āho eka upālambho jñānārthayoḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:8252: yathā hi sarvaṃ cākṣuṣaṃ prabhārūpānuviddhaṃ buddhibodhyaṃ niyamena
GSP33vacbhamu:8253: manujairupalabhyate, na caitāvatā ghaṭādirūpaṃ prabhātmakaṃ bhavati,kintu
GSP33vacbhamu:8256: api ca yatraikavijñānagocarau ghaṭapaṭau tatrārthabhedaṃ vijñānabhedaṃ cādyavasyanti pratipattāraḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:8257: na caitadekātmye 'vakalpata ityāha-- tathā ghaṭadarśanaṃ paṭajñānamiti. tathārthābhede 'pi vijñānabhedadarśanānna vijñānātmakatvamarthasyetyāha--
GSP33vacbhamu:8259: api ca svarūpamātraparyavasitaṃ jñānaṃ jñānāntaravārtānabhijñamiti yayorbhedaste dve na gṛhīte iti bhedo 'pi tadgato na gṛhīta iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:8261: evaṃ svamasādhāraṇamanyato vyāvṛtaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ yasya tadapi yadvyāvartate yataśca vyāvartate tadanekajñānasādhyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:8271: evaṃ mokṣapratijñā ca yo mucyate yataśca mucyate yena mucyate tadanekajñānasādhyā /
GSP33vacbhamu:8272: evaṃ vipratipannaṃ pratipādayituṃ pratijñeti yatpratipādayati yena pratipādayati yaśca tadanekajñānasādhyetyasatyekasminnanekārthajñānapratisaṃghātari nopapadyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:8273: tatsarvaṃ vijñānasya svāṃśālambane 'nupapannamityāha-- api ca dvayorvijñānayoḥ pūrvottarakālayoriti. api ca bhedāśrayaḥ karmaphalabhāvo nābhinne jñāne bhavitumarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:8274: no khalu chidā chidyate kintu dāru /
GSP33vacbhamu:8276: tadihāpi na jñānaṃ svāṃśena jñeyamātmani vṛttivirodhādapi tu
GSP33vacbhamu:8287: taccet jñānāntareṇa pratīyeta tadapratītaṃ nārthaviṣayaṃ jñānamaparokṣayitumarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:8288: evaṃ tattadityanavasthā tasmādanavasthāyā bibhyatā varaṃ svātmani vṛttirāsthitā /
GSP33vacbhamu:8289: apica yathā pradīpo na dīpāntaramapekṣate, evaṃ jñānamapi na
GSP33vacbhamu:8294: ayamarthaḥ-- satyamapratyakṣasyopalambhasya nārthadṛṣṭiḥ prasidhyati, na tūpalabdhāraṃ prati tatpratyakṣatvāyopalambhāntaraṃ prārthanīyam, apitu tasminnindriyārthasaṃnikarṣādantaḥ karaṇavikārabheda utpannamātra eva prabhāturarthaścopalambhaśca pratyakṣau bhavataḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:8295: artho hi nilīnasvabhāvaḥ pramātāraṃ prati svapratyakṣatvāyāntaḥkaraṇavikārabhedamanubhavamapekṣate, anubhavastu jaḍo 'pi svacchatayā caitanyūbimbodgrahaṇāya nānubhavāntaramapekṣate,
GSP33vacbhamu:8297: nahyasti saṃbhavo 'nubhava utpannaśca,na ca pramātuḥ pratyakṣo bhavati,
GSP33vacbhamu:8299: tasmādyathā chettā chidayā chedyaṃ vṛkṣādi vyāpnoti, na tu chidā
GSP33vacbhamu:8300: chidāntareṇa, nāpi chidaiva chetrī, kintu svata eva devadattādiḥ, yathā vā paktā pākyaṃ pākena vyāpnoti nanu pākaṃ pākāntareṇa, nāpi pāka eva paktā kintu svata eva devadettādiḥ, evaṃ pramātā prameyaṃ nīlādi pramayā vyāpnoti na tu pramāṃ pramāntareṇa, nāpi pramaiva pramātrī, kintu svata eva pramāyāḥ pramātā vyāpakaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:8301: na ca pramātari kūṭasthanityacaitanye pramāpekṣāsaṃbhavo yataḥ pramātuḥ pramāyāḥ pramātrantarāpekṣāyāmanavasthā bhavet /
GSP33vacbhamu:8309: grāhyatvaṃ ca jñānasya na grāhakakriyājanitaphalaśālitayā yathā
GSP33vacbhamu:8313: grāhyo 'pyarthaḥ pramātāraṃ prati satyāṃ saṃvidi prakaṭaḥ saṃvidapi
GSP33vacbhamu:8316: syādetatṣa yatprakāśate tadanyena prakāśyate yathā jñānārthau tathā ca sākṣiti nāsti pratyayasākṣiṇorvaiṣamyamityata āha-- svayaṃsiddhasya ca sākṣiṇo 'pratyākhyeyatvāt. /
GSP33vacbhamu:8319: tathāhi-- pramātā saṃdihāno 'pyasaṃdigdho viparyasyannapyaviparītaḥ parokṣamarthamutprekṣamāṇo 'pyaparokṣaḥ smarannapyanubhavikaḥ prāṇabhṛnmātrasya /
GSP33vacbhamu:8323: kiñcoktena krameṇa jñānasya svayamavagantṛtvābhāvātpramāturanabhyupagame ca pradīpavadvijñānamavabhāsakāntaranirapekṣaṃ svayameva prathata iti bruvatāpramāṇagamyaṃ vijñānamanavagantṛkamityuktaṃ syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:8328: na phalasya kartṛtvaṃ karmatvaṃ vāstīti pradīpavatkartrantarameṣitavyaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:8329: tathā ca na siddhasādhanamiti pariharati-- na /
GSP33vacbhamu:8331: nanu sākṣisthāne 'stvasmadabhimatameva vijñānaṃ tathā ca nāmnyeva vipratipattirnārthā iti śaṅkate-- sākṣiṇo 'vagantuḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:8335: bhavanti hi vijñānasyotpādādayo dharmā abhyupetāstathā cāsya phalatayā
GSP33vacbhamu:8341: tvayāpi cāvaśyaṃ jāgratpratyayasyābādhitatvamāstheyaṃ, tena hi svapnapratyayo bādhito mithyetyavagamyate
GSP33vacbhamu:8342: jāgratpratyayasya tu bādhyatve svapnapratyayasyāsau na bādhako bhavet /
GSP33vacbhamu:8344: tathā ca na svapnapratyayo mithyeti sādhyavikalo dṛṣṭāntaḥ syāt svapnavaditi /
GSP33vacbhamu:8345: tasmādbādhābādhābhyāṃ vaidharmyānna svapnapratyayadṛṣṭāntena jāgratpratyayasya śakyaṃ nirālambanatvamadhyavasātum
GSP33vacbhamu:8352: saṃskārajatvātsmṛtiḥ, sāpi ca nidrādoṣādviparītāvartamānamapi pitrādi vartamānatayā bhāsayati
GSP33vacbhamu:8355: api ca svataḥprāmāṇye siddhe jāgratpratyayānāṃ yathārthatvamanubhavasiddhaṃ nānumānenānyathayituṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:8358: na ca kāraṇābhāve kāryamutpattumarhatītyāśayavānāha- api cānubhavavirodhaprasaṅgāditi /
GSP33vacbhamu:8370: yadi sākāraṃ vijñānaṃ saṃbhavati bāhyaścārthaḥ sthūlasūkṣmavikalpenāsaṃbhavī hantaivamarthajñāne sattena tāvadvicāraṃ na sahete /
GSP33vacbhamu:8379: tadetannirācikīrṣurāha- - śūnyavādipakṣastu sarvapramāṇavipratiṣiddha iti tannirākaraṇāya nādaraḥ kriyate. /
GSP33vacbhamu:8381: taiḥ khalu satsaditi gṛhyamāṇaṃ yathābhūtamaviparītaṃ tattvaṃ vyavasthāpyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:8383: sadasatośca vicārāsahatvaṃ vyavasthāpayatā sarvapramāṇavipratiṣiddhaṃ vyavasthāpitaṃ bhavati
GSP33vacbhamu:8385: yadyucyeta tāttvikaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ pramāṇānāmanena vicāreṇa vyudasyate na sāṃvyavahārikam /
GSP33vacbhamu:8386: tathāca bhinnaviṣayatvānna sarvapramāṇavipratiṣedha ityata āha-- nahyeyaṃ sarvapramāṇaprasiddho lalokavyavahāro 'nyattatvamanadhigamya
GSP33vacbhamu:8388: pramāṇāni hi svagocare pravartamānāni tattvamidamityeva pravartante /
GSP33vacbhamu:8390: na punaḥ sāṃvyavahārikaṃ naḥ prāmāṇyaṃ na tu tāttvikamityeva pravartante /
GSP33vacbhamu:8392: yathā śuktikeyaṃ na rajataṃ marīcayo na toyamekaścandro na candradvayamityādi, tadvadihāpi samastapramāṇagocaraviparītatattvāntaravyavasthāpanenātāttvikatvameṣāṃ pramāṇānāṃ bādhakena darśanīyaṃ na tvavyavasthāpitatattvāntareṇa pramāṇāni
GSP33vacbhamu:8394: vicārāsahatvaṃ vastūnāṃ tattvaṃ vyavasthāpayadbādhakamatāttvikatvaṃ pramāṇānāṃ darśayatīti cet, kiṃ punaridaṃ vicārāsahatvaṃ vastu
GSP33vacbhamu:8395: yattattvamabhimataṃ, kiṃ tadvastu paramārthataḥ sadādīnāmanyatamat kevalaṃ vicāraṃ na sahate, atha vicārāsahatvena nistattvameva /
GSP33vacbhamu:8396: tatra paramārthataḥ sadādīnīmanyatamadvicāraṃ na sahata iti vipratiṣiddham
GSP33vacbhamu:8399: atha nistattvaṃ cet kathamanyatamattattvamavyavasthāpya śakyamevaṃ vaktum
GSP33vacbhamu:8402: so 'pi ca vicāraṃ na sahata ityuktaṃ bhavadbhiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:8404: āropaśca tattvādhiṣṭhāno dṛṣṭo yathā śuktikādiṣu rajatādeḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:8405: na cet kiñcidasti tattvaṃ kasya kasminnāropaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:8406: tasmānniṣprapañcaṃ paramārthasabrahmānirvācyaprapañcātmanāropyate, tacca tattvaṃ vyavasthāpyātāttvikatvena sāṃvyavahārikaṃ pramāṇānāṃ bādhakenopapadyata iti yuktamutpaśyāmaḥ //31 //
GSP33vacbhamu:8408: virājate- kiṃ bahunā.uktena yathāyathā.granthator'thataśca ayaṃ vaināśikasamaya iti. granthatastāvatpaśyanātiṣṭhanāmiddhapoṣadhādyasādhupadaprayogaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:8410: evaṃ kṣaṇikatvamabhyupetya 'utpādādvā tathāgatānāmanutpādādvā sthitaivaiṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā dharmasthititā'iti nityatāmupaitītyādi bahūnnetavyamiti //32 //
GSP33vacbhamu:8422: pudgalāstikāyāḥ ṣoḍhā- pṛthivyādīni catvāri bhūtāni sthāraṃ jaṅgamaṃ cti
GSP33vacbhamu:8430: tatra mithyā pravṛttirāsravaḥ. samyakpravṛttī tu saṃvaranirjarau /
GSP33vacbhamu:8432: indriyadvārā hi pauruṣaṃ jyotirviṣayān spṛśadrūpādijñānarūpeṇa pariṇamata iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:8438: sā hyāsravasrotaso dvāraṃ saṃvṛṇotāti saṃvara ucyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:8440: sa hi niḥśeṣaṃ puṇyāpuṇyaṃ sukhaduḥkhopabhogena jarayatīti nirjaraḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:8446: tatra samyag jñānaṃ na mokṣasādhanaṃ, nahi jñānādvastusiddhiratiprasaṅgāditi viparyayo jñānāvaraṇīyaṃ karmocyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:8447: āhartadarśanābhyāsānna mokṣa iti jñānaṃ darśanāvaraṇīyaṃ karma /
GSP33vacbhamu:8448: bahuṣu vipratiṣiddheṣu tīrthakarairupadarśiteṣu mokṣamārgeṣu viśeṣānavadhāraṇaṃ mohanīyaṃ karma /
GSP33vacbhamu:8451: aghātāni karmāṇi, tadyathā vedanīyaṃ karma śuklapudgalavipākahetuḥ,taddhi
GSP33vacbhamu:8453: śuklapudgalārambhakavedanīyakarmānuguṇaṃ nāmikaṃ karma, taddhi śuklapudgalasyādyāvasthāṃ kalalabuddhudādimārabhate
GSP33vacbhamu:8459: anye tūrdhvagamanaśīlo hi jīvo dharmādharmāstikāyena baddhastaddhimokṣādyadūrdhvaṃ gacchetyeva sa mokṣa iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:8461: tatra sarvatra cemaṃ saptabhaṅgīnayaṃ nāma nyāyamavatārayanti, syādasti,
GSP33vacbhamu:8462: syānnāsti, syādasti ca nāsti ca, syādavaktavyaḥ, syādasti cāvaktavyaśca,
GSP33vacbhamu:8463: syānnāsti cāvaktavyaśca, syādasti ca nāsti cāvaktavyaśceti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:8468: yadi punarayamanekāntadyotakaḥ syācchabdo na bhavet syādastītivākye syātpadamanarthakaṃ syāt tadidamuktam-- 'arthayogitvāt'iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:8469: anaikāntadyotakatve tu syādasti kathañcidastīti syātpadātkathañcidartho 'stītyanenānuktaḥ pratīyata iti nānarthakyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:8472: 'kiṃvṛtte pratyaye khalvayaṃ cinnipātavidhinā sarvathaikāntatyāgāt saptasvekānteṣu yo bhaṅgastatra yo nayastadapekṣaḥ san heyopādeyabhedāya syādvādaḥ kalpate /
GSP33vacbhamu:8473: tathāhi-- yadi vastvastyevetyevaikāntatastat sarvathā sarvadā sarvatra sarvātmanāstyeveti na tadīpsājihāsābhyāṃ kvacit kadācit kathañcit kaścit pravarteta nivarteta vā prāptāprāpaṇīyatvāt, heyahānānupapatteśca /
GSP33vacbhamu:8474: anaikāntapakṣe tu kvacit kadācit kasyacit kathañcit sattve hānopādāne prekṣāvatāṃ kalpete iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:8476: vibhājate-- na hyekasmindharmaṇi.paramārthasati paramārthasatāṃ yugapatsattvādīnāṃ dharmāṇāṃ.parasparaparihārasvarūpāṇāṃ samāveśaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:8478: etaduktaṃ bhavati-- satyaṃ yadasti vastutastatsarvathā sarvadā sarvatra sarvātmanā nirvacanīyena rūpaṇāstyeva na nāsti, yathā pratyagātmā /
GSP33vacbhamu:8479: yattu kvacit kathañcit kadācit kenacidātmanāstītyucyate, yathā prapañcaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:8480: tadvyavahārato na tu paramārthataḥ, tasya vicārāsahatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:8481: na ca pratyayamātraṃ vāstavatvaṃ vyavasthāpayati, śuktimarumarīcikādiṣu rajatatoyāderapi vāstavatvaprasaṅgāt
GSP33vacbhamu:8482: laukikānāmabādhena tu tadvyavasthāyāṃ dehātmābhimānasyāpyabādhena tāttvikatve sati lokāyatamatāpātena nāstikatvaprasaṅgāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:8483: paṇḍitarūpāṇāṃ tu dehātmābhimānasya vicārato bādhanaṃ prapañcasyāpyanaikāntasya tulyamiti
GSP33vacbhamu:8484: api ca sadasattvayoḥ parasparaviruddhatvena samuccayābhāve vikalpaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:8486: tasmāt sthāṇurvā puruṣo veti jñānavat saptatvapañcatvanirdhāraṇasya phalasya nirdhārayituśca pramātustatkaraṇasya pramāṇasya ca tatprameyasya ca saptatvapañcatvasya sadasattvasaṃśaye sādhu samarthitaṃ tīrthakaratvabhṛṣebheṇātmanaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:8487: nirdhāraṇasya caikāntasattve sarvatra nānekāntavāda ityāha-- ya ete sapta padārthā iti. śeṣamatirohitārtham //33 //
GSP33vacbhamu:8492: ye hi paricchinnāste sarve 'nityā yathā ghaṭādayastathā cātmeti /
GSP33vacbhamu:8496: manuṣyakāyaparimāṇo hi jīvo na hastikāyaṃ kṛtsnaṃ vyāptumarhatyalpatvādityātmanaḥ kṛtsnaśarīrāvyāpitvādakārtsnyam, tathā ca na śarīraparimāṇatvamiti /
GSP33vacbhamu:8497: tathā ca hastiśīraraṃ parityajya yadā puttikāśarīro bhavati tadā na tatra kṛtsnaḥ puttikāśarīre saṃmīyetetyakārsnyamātmanaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:8501: yathā hi pradīpo ghaṭamahāharmyodaravartī saṃkocavikāśavānevaṃ jīvo 'pi
GSP33vacbhamu:8508: yacca jīvāvayavānāmānantyamuditaṃ tadanupapannataramityāha-- api ca śarīramātreti. //34
GSP33vacbhamu:8512: kiṃ cātmano nityatvābhyupagame āgacchatāmapagacchatāṃ cāvayavānāmiyattānirūpeṇena cātmajñānābhāvānnāpavarga iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:8515: kiṃ caite jīvāvayavāḥ pratyekaṃ vā cetayeran samūho vā /
GSP33vacbhamu:8516: teṣāṃ pratyekaṃ caitanye bahūnāṃ cetanānāmekābhiprāyatvaniyamābhāvāt kadācidviruddhadikkriyatvena śarīramunmathyeta /
GSP33vacbhamu:8517: samūhacaitanye tu hastiśarīrasya puttikāśarīratve dvitrāvayavaśeṣo jīvo na cetayet /
GSP33vacbhamu:8522: na ca paryāyāt parimāṇānavasthāne 'pi saṃtānābhyupagamenātmano nityatvādavirodho bandhamokṣayoḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:8529: evaṃ hi mokṣāvasthābhāvi jīvaparimāṇaṃ nityaṃ bhavet,yadyabhūtvā na bhavet /
GSP33vacbhamu:8538: ekaśarīraparimāṇatā na dīpyā, kintvekaparimāṇatāmātramaṇurmahān veti vivekaḥ //36 //
GSP33vacbhamu:8544: sa ca nānākleśakarmavipākāśayairaparāmṛṣṭaḥ puruṣaviśeṣa īśvaraḥ pradhānapuruṣābhyāmanyaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:8552: paśava ātmānasteṣāṃ pāśo bandhanaṃ taddhimokṣo duḥkhāntaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:8564: tena śrutasiddyarthamadṛṣṭāni dṛṣṭaviparītasvabhāvāni subahūnyapi kalpamānāni na lohagandhitāmāvahanti pramāṇavattvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:8565: yastu tatra kathañciddṛṣṭānusāraḥ kriyate sa suhṛdbhāvamātreṇa /
GSP33vacbhamu:8566: āgamānapekṣitamanumānaṃ tu dṛṣṭasādharmyeṇa pravartamānaṃ dṛṣṭavivaryaye tuṣādapi bibhetitarāmiti
GSP33vacbhamu:8571: ayamarthaḥ-- yadīśvaraḥ karuṇāparādhīno vītarāgastataḥ praṇinaḥ kapūye karmaṇi na pravartayet,taccotpannamapi nādhitiṣṭhet,tāvanmātreṇa prāṇināṃ duḥkhānutpādāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:8572: na hīśvarādhīnā janāḥ svātantryeṇa kapūyaṃ karma kartumarhanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:8573: tadanadhiṣṭhitaṃ vā kapūyaṃ karma phalaṃ prasotumutsahate /
GSP33vacbhamu:8574: tasmātsvatantro 'pīsvaraḥ karmabhiḥ pravartyata iti dṛṣṭaviparītaṃ kalpanīyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:8578: pūrvakarmaṇeśvaraḥ saṃpratitane karmaṇi pravrartyate teneśvareṇa saṃpratitanaṃ karma svakārye pravartyeta iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:8583: tathehāpi dvāvapi pravartyāviti kaḥ kaṃ pravartayedityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:8585: asmākaṃ tu nāyaṃ samaya iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:8587: na ca kāruṇyaṃ doṣa ityata āha-- svārthaprayukta eva ceti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:8588: kāruṇye hi satyasya duḥkhaṃ bhavati tena tatprahāṇāya pravartata iti kāruṇikā api svārthaprayuktā eva pravartanta iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:8589: nanu svārthaprayukta eva pravartatāmevamapi ko doṣa ityata āha-- svārthavatvādīsvarasyeti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:8594: aprāptipūrvikā hi prāptiḥ saṃyogo na sarvagatānāṃ saṃbhavatyaprāpterabhāvānniravayavatvācca
GSP33vacbhamu:8597: tasmādavyāpyavṛttitāyāḥ saṃyogasya vyāpikāyā nivṛttestadvyāpyasya saṃyogasya vinivṛttiriti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:8601: nāpi yogyatālakṣaṇaḥ kāryagamyasaṃbandha ityāha-- nāpyanya iti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:8608: āgamo hi pravṛttiṃ prati na dṛṣṭāntamapekṣata ityadṛṣṭapūrve tadviruddhe ca pravartituṃ samarthaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:8622: tasmādrūpādihīnaṃ karaṇaṃ vyāpārayata īsvarasya bhogādiprasaktiḥ tathā cānīśvaratvamiti bhāvaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:8628: api ca sarvatrānumānaṃ pramāṇayataḥ pradhānapuruṣeśvarāṇāmapi saṃkhyābedavattvamantavattvaṃ ca dravyatvāt saṃkhyānyatve sati prameyatvādvānumātavyaṃ, tataścāntavattvamasarvajñatā vā /
GSP33vacbhamu:8631: svarūpaparimāṇamapi.yasya yādṛśamaṇu mahat paramamahaddīrghaṃ hrasvaṃ ceti /
GSP33vacbhamu:8632: atha mā bhūdeṣa doṣa ityuttaro vikalpaḥ. /
GSP33vacbhamu:8634: yasya tvanta eva nāsti tasya tadagrahaṇaṃ nāsarvajñatāmāvahati /
GSP33vacbhamu:8645: yadyapyanekaśilpaparyavadātaḥ paraśuṃ kṛtvā tena palāśaṃ chinatti,yadyapi
GSP33vacbhamu:8646: ca prayatnenendriyārthātmamanaḥ saṃnikarṣalakṣaṇaṃ jñānakaraṇamupādāyātmārthaṃ vijānāti, tathāpi saṃkarṣaṇo 'karaṇaḥ kathaṃ pradyumnākhyaṃ manaḥ karaṇaṃ kuryāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:8655: mā bhūdabyupagamena doṣaḥ, prakārāntareṇa tvayameva doṣaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:8658: na tāvadete parasparaṃ bhinnā īśvarāḥ parasparavyāhatecchā bhavitumarhanti
GSP33vacbhamu:8661: saṃbhūya ceśanāyāṃ pariśuddho na kaściddīśvaraḥ syāt, siddhāntahāniśca /
GSP33vacbhamu:8668: guṇibhyaḥ khalvātmabhyo jñānādīn guṇān bhedenoktvā punarabhedaṃ brūte-- ātmāna evaite bhagavanto vāsudevā iti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:8672: iti śrīvācaspatimiśraviracite śārīrakabhagavatpādabhāṣyavibhāge bhāmatyāṃ dvitīyādhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ //2 //
GSP33vacbhamu:8673: iti dvitīyādhyāyasya sāṃkhyādimatānāṃ duṣṭatvapradarśanaṃ nāma dvitīyaḥpādaḥ. dvidīyādhyāye tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ. /
GSP33vacbhamu:8677: tatra sṛṣṭiśrutīnāṃ parasparavirodhamāha- vedānteṣu tatra tatreti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:8681: iha hi pūrvapakṣe śrutīnāṃ mitho virodhaḥ pratipādyate, siddhānte tvavirodhaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:8683: tasyābhisaṃdhiḥ-yadyapi taittirīyake viyadutpattiśrutirasti tathāpi tasyāḥ pramāṇāntaravirodhādbahuśrutivirodhācca gauṇatvam /
GSP33vacbhamu:8684: tathāca viyato nityatvāttejaḥpramukha eva sargaḥ, tathāca na virodhaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:8689: athāsti tataḥ śrutivirodha iti tatparihārāya prayatnāntaramāstheyamityarthaḥ //1 //
GSP33vacbhamu:8691: taittirīye hi sargaprakaraṇe kevalasyākāśasyaiva prathamaḥ sargaḥ śrūyate
GSP33vacbhamu:8692: chāndogye ca kevalasya tejasaḥ prathamaḥ sargaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:8694: śrutasiddhyarthaṃ khalvaśrutaṃ kalpyate na tu tadvidhātāya, vihanyate cāsahāyatvaṃ śrutaṃ kalpitena sasahāyatvena /
GSP33vacbhamu:8699: na khalviha sarge kṣīrāddadhi jāyate sargāntare ti dadhnaḥ kṣīramiti bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:8700: tasmātsargaśrutayaḥ parasparavirodhinyo nāsminnarthe pramāṇaṃ bhavitumarhantīti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ siddhāntyekadeśī sūtreṇa svābhiprāyamāviṣkaroti- gauṇyasaṃbhavāt. /
GSP33vacbhamu:8703: samavāṭyasamavāyinimittakāraṇebhyo hi kāryasyotpattirniyatā tadabhāve na bhavitumarhati dhūma iva dhūmadhvajābhāve /
GSP33vacbhamu:8705: apica ya utpadyante teṣāṃ prāgutpatteranubhavārthakriye nopalabhyte utpannasya ca dṛśyete, yathā tejaḥprabhṛtīnām /
GSP33vacbhamu:8706: na cākāśasya tādṛśo viśeṣa utpādānutpādayorasti, tasmānnotpadyata ityāha-
GSP33vacbhamu:8730: dvitīyaṃ codyamapākaroti- ata eva ca brahmavijñāneneti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:8732: api cāvyatiriktadeśakālamākāśaṃ brahmaṇā ca brahmakāryaiśca tadabhinnasvabhāvairataḥ kṣīrakumbhaprakṣiptakatipayapayobinduvadbrahmaṇi tatkārye ca vijñāte nabho viditaṃ bhavatītyāha- api ca sarvaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:8735: brahmavivartātmatayājagatastadvikārasya vastuto brahmaṇābhede brahmaṇi jñāte jñānamupapadyate
GSP33vacbhamu:8737: tasmādākāśamapi tadvivartatayā tadvikāraḥ sattajjñānena jñātaṃ bhavati nānyathā /
GSP33vacbhamu:8738: avikāratve tu tatastattvāntaraṃ na brahmaṇi vidite viditaṃ bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:8741: nahi kṣīrasya pūrṇakumbhe kṣīre gṛhyamāṇe satsvapi pāthobinduṣu pāthastattvaṃ prati jñātatvamasti vijñāne /
GSP33vacbhamu:8742: tasmānna te kṣīre vidite viditā iti pratijñādṛṣṭāntapracayānuparodhāya viyata utpattirakāmenābhyupeyeti
GSP33vacbhamu:8743: tadevaṃ siddhāntaikadeśini dūṣitepūrvapakṣī svapakṣe viśeṣamāha- satyaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:8750: nanvasahāyaṃ tejaḥ prathamamavagamyamānaṃ sasahāyatvena virudhyata ityuktamata āha- nahīyaṃ śrutistejojanipradhāneti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:8752: sa ca śrutyantareṇa virodhinā bādhyate, jaghanyatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:8757: yadyekaṃ vākyamanekārtha na bhavatyekasya vyāpāradvāsaṃbhavāt, hanta bhoḥ kathamekasya sraṣṭuranekavyāpāratvamaviruddhamityata āha- sraṣṭā tveko 'pīti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:8761: nacāsminnartha ekasya vākyasya vyāpāro 'pi tu bhinnānāṃ vākyānāmityāha- nacāsmābhiriti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:8765: na caiṣa sṛṣṭiparo 'pi tu śamapara ityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:8769: siṃhāvalokitanyāyena viyadanutpattivādinaṃ pratyāha- apica chāndogya iti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:8772: apica bhrāntimūlaṃ caitadvacanam 'ekamevādvitīyam' iti toye kṣīrabuddhivat
GSP33vacbhamu:8778: nahi māṇavake siṃhatvamupacarya na siṃhādanyo 'sti manāgapi māṇavaka iti
GSP33vacbhamu:8780: tasmādbrahmatvamaikāntikaṃ jagato vivakṣitaṃ śrutyā na tvaupacārikam /
GSP33vacbhamu:8781: abhyāse hi bhūyastvamarthasya ūvati natvaspatvamapi prāgevaupacārikamityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:8783: niḥśeṣavacanaḥ svarasataḥ sarvaśabdo nāsati śrutyantaravirodhe ekadeśavaviṣayo yujyata ityarthaḥ ākāśasyotpattau pramāṇāntaravirodhamuktamanubhāṣya tasya pramāṇāntarasya pramāṇāntaravirodhenāpramāṇabhūtasya na gauṇatvāpādanasāmarthyamata āha- yāvadvikāraṃ tu vibhāgo lokavat. /
GSP33vacbhamu:8784: so 'yaṃ prayogaḥ-ākāśadikklāmanaḥramāṇavo vikārāḥ, ātmanyatve sati vibhaktatvāt, ghaṭaśarāvodañcanādivaditi
GSP33vacbhamu:8787: śūnyavādaśca nirākṛtaḥ svayameva śrutyopanyasya 'kathamasataḥ sajjāyeta' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:8798: tatra prakāśātmikāyāḥ siddhestāvadanāgantukatvamāha- nahyātmātmana iti. upapāditametadyathā saṃśayaviparyāsapārokṣyānāspadatvātkadāpi nātmā
GSP33vacbhamu:8800: ata eva śrutiḥ-'tameva bhāntamanubhāti sarvaṃ tasya bhāsā sarvamidaṃ vibhāti' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:8804: pramāpramāṇaprameyāṇāṃ vartamānātītānāgatatve 'pi pramātuḥ sadā vartamānatvenānubhavādapracyutasvabhāvasya nāgantukaṃ sattvam /
GSP33vacbhamu:8805: traikālyāvacchedena hyāgantukatvaṃ vyāptaṃ, tatpramātuḥ sadāvartamānādvyavartamānamāgantukatvaṃ svavyāpyamādāya nivartata iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:8808: nanu jīvataḥ pramāturmā bhūdanyathābhāvo mṛtasya tu bhaviṣyatītyata āha- tathā bhasmībhavasyapīti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:8811: yasya tu na tadasyātmano na tasya tatkalpanaṃ yuktam,
GSP33vacbhamu:8814: tadanena prabandhena pratyanumānenākāśānutpattyanumānaṃ tūṣayitvānaikāntikatvenāpi dūṣayati-yattūkaṃ samānajātīyamiti /
GSP33vacbhamu:8816: yatra hi kṣīraṃ dadhibhāvena pariṇamate tatra nāvayavānāmanekeṣāmupādanatvamabhyupagantavyaṃ kintūpāttameva kṣīramekamupādeyadadhibhāvena pariṇamate /
GSP33vacbhamu:8820: yadyabhyāse bhūyastvamarthasya bhavati nālpatvaṃ dūrata evopacaritatvaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:8833: bhūyasīḥ śrutīrapekṣya dve api śrutī śabdamātramukte //8 //
GSP33vacbhamu:8837: naca vacanamadṛṣṭvā pūrvaḥ pakṣa iti yuktam, adhītavedasya brahmajijñāsādhikārādarśanānupapatterata āha- viyatpavanayoriti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:8842: na cātmanaḥ kāraṇavattve 'navasthā lohagandhitāmāvahatyanāditvāt kāryakāraṇaparamparāyā iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:8847: sadekasvabhāvaṃ hi brahma śrūyate tadasati bādhake nānyathayitavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:8848: uktametadvikārāḥ sattvenānubhūtā api katipayakālakalātikrame vinaśyanto dṛśyanta ityanirvacanīyāstraikālyāvacchedāditi
GSP33vacbhamu:8849: na cātmā tādṛśastasya śruteranubhāvādvā vartamānaikasvabhāvatvaina prasiddhestadidamāha- sanmātraṃ hi brahmeti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:8850: etaduktaṃ bhavati-yatsvabhāvādvicalati tadanirvacanīyaṃ nirvacanīyopādānaṃ yuktaṃ, na tu viparyayaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:8851: yathā rajjūpādānaḥ sarpo na tu sarpopādānā rajjuriti /
GSP33vacbhamu:8853: naca niradhiṣṭhāno vibhrama ityāha- nāpyasata iti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:8856: pāramārthiko hi kāryakāraṇabhāvo 'nādirnānavasthāyā duṣyati. samāropastu vikārasya na samāropitopādāna ityupapāditaṃ mādhyamikamataniṣedhādhikāre,
GSP33vacbhamu:8871: naca sākṣādbrahmajatvasaṃbhave tadvaṃśyatvena tajjatvaṃ paraṃparayāśrayituṃ yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:8873: evaṃ prāpte ucyate-yuktaṃ paśuyāgavājapeyoraṅgāṅginornānātvattatra sākṣādvājapeyāsaṃbandhe kleśena paraṃparāśrayaṇam /
GSP33vacbhamu:8875: sākṣādeva brahmopādānatvopapatteḥ kārakavibhakterbalīyastvānurodhenobhayathopapadyamānāḥ śrutayaḥ kāṃsyabhojinyāyena niyamyanta iti yuktamiti rāddhāntaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:8877: yathā tasyāḥ śṛtam.iti tu dṛṣṭāntaḥ paramparāmātrasāmyena na tu sarvathāṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:8882: annaśabdo 'yaṃ vyutpattyā ca prasiddhyā ca vrīhiyavādau tadvikāre caudane pravartate /
GSP33vacbhamu:8883: śrutiśca prakaraṇādbalīyasī, sā ca vākyaśeṣeṇopodbalitā 'yatra kkacana
GSP33vacbhamu:8884: varṣati' ityetena tasmādabhyavahārthaṃ vrīhiyavādyevātrādbhyo jāyata iti vivakṣitam /
GSP33vacbhamu:8886: nahi pṛthivyapi kṛṣṇā, lohitādirūpāyā api darśanāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:8887: tataśca śrutyantareṇa 'adbhyaḥ pṛthivī pṛthivyā oṣadhayaḥ' ityādinā virodha iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:8889: tatra kim 'adbhyaḥ pṛthivī' iti pṛthivīśabdo 'nnaparatayā nīyatāmuta
GSP33vacbhamu:8892: iti ca punaḥ śrutyanurodhācca vākyaśeṣasya cānyathāpyupapatterannaśabdo
GSP33vacbhamu:8896: idānīmākāśādibhūtādhiṣṭhātryo devatāḥ kiṃ svatantrā evottarottarabhūtasarge pravartanta uta parameśvarāpekṣāyāṃ pramāṇābhāvāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:8897: prastāvasya ca liṅgasya ca pāramparyeṇāpi mūlākāraṇasya brahmaṇa
GSP33vacbhamu:8902: naca cetanānāṃ svakāryasvātantryamityetadapyaikāntikaṃ paratantrāṇāmapi teṣāṃ bahulamupalabdherbhṛtyāntevāsyādivat
GSP33vacbhamu:8903: tasmālliṅgaprastāvasāmañjasyāya sa īśvara eva tena tenākāśādibhāvenopādānabhāvenāvatiṣṭhamānaḥ svayamadhiṣṭhāya nimittakāraṇabhūtastaṃ taṃ vikāraṃ vāṭvādikaṃ sṛjatīti yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:8906: parameśvara evāntaryamibhāvenāviṣṭa īkṣitā, tasmātsarvasya kāryajātasya sākṣātparameśvara evādhiṣṭhātā nimittakāraṇaṃ na tvākāśādibhāvamāpannaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:8909: utpattau mahābhūtānāṃ kramaḥ śruto nāpyaye 'pyayamātrasya śrutatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:8913: tatra kramabhedāpekṣāyāṃ kiṃ dṛṣṭo 'pyayakramo ghaṭādīnāṃ mahābhūtāpyayakramaniyāmako 'stvāho śrauta utpattikrama iti viśaye śrautasya śrautāntaramabhyarhitaṃ samānajātīyatayā tasyaiva buddhisāṃnidhyāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:8916: ucyate-apyayasya kramāpekṣāyāṃ khalūtpattikramo niyāmako bhavet, na tvastyapyayasya kramāpekṣā, dṛṣṭānumānopanītena kramabhedena śrutyanusāriṇo 'pyayakramasya bādhyamānatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:8925: tadevaṃ bhāvanopayoginau bhūtānāmutpattipralayau vicārya buddhīndriyamanasāṃ kramaṃ vicārayati
GSP33vacbhamu:8926: atra ca vijñāyate 'neneti vyutpattyā vijñānaśabdenendriyāṇi ca buddhiṃ ca brūte /
GSP33vacbhamu:8927: tatraiteṣāṃ kramāpekṣāyāmātmānaṃ ca bhūtāni cāntarā samāmnānāttenaiva pāṭhena kramo niyamyate
GSP33vacbhamu:8929: yata ātmanaḥ karaṇāni karaṇebhyaśca bhūtānīti pratīyate, tasmādātmana ākāśa iti bhajyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:8930: annamayamiti ca mayaḍānandamaya itivat na vikārārtha iti prāpte 'bhidhīyate-vibhaktatvāttāvanmanaḥprabhṛtīnāṃ kāraṇāpekṣāyāmannamayaṃ mana ityādiliṅgaśravaṇādapekṣitārthakathanāya vikārārthatvameva mayaṭo yuktam,
GSP33vacbhamu:8934: evaṃ codbhūtavikārā mana ādayo bhūtānāṃ parastādutpadyanta iti yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:8936: bhavatvātmana eva karaṇānāmutpattiḥ, na khalvetāvatā bhūtairātmano
GSP33vacbhamu:8942: devadattādināmadheyaṃ tāvajjīvātmano na śarīrasya, tannāmne śarīrasya śrāddhadikaraṇānupapatteḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:8943: tanmṛto devadatto jāto devadatta iti vyapadeśasya mukhyatvaṃ manvānasya pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ, mukhyatve śāstroktāmuṣmikasvargādiphalasaṃbandhānupapteḥ śāstravirodhāllaukikavyapadeśo bhākto vyākhyeyaḥ bhaktiśca śarīrasyotpādavināśau tatastatsaṃyoga iti /
