GSP33vacbhamu:8945: ata eva smaranti 'evamenaḥ śamaṃ yāti bījagarbhasamudbhavam' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:8949: mā bhūtāmasya śarīrodayavyayābhyāṃ sthūlāvutpattivināśau, ākāśāderiva tu mahāsargādau tadante cotpattivināśau jīvasya bhaviṣyata iti
GSP33vacbhamu:8960: 'yathāgneḥ śrudrā visphaliṅgaḥ' iti ca śrutiḥ sākṣādeva brahmavikāratvaṃ jīvānāṃ darśayati
GSP33vacbhamu:8961: 'yathā sūdīptāt pāvakāt' iti ca brahmaṇo jīvānāmutpattiṃ ca tatrāpyayaṃ ca sākṣāddarśayati
GSP33vacbhamu:8968: evaṃ hi kasyāñcicchākhyāyāmāmnātasya katipāyāṅgasahitasya karmaṇaḥ śākhāntarīyāṅgopasaṃhāro na bhavet /
GSP33vacbhamu:8970: tasmādākāśavajjīvātmāna utpadyanta iti prāpta ucyate-bhavedevaṃ yadi jīvā brahmaṇo bhidyeran
GSP33vacbhamu:8974: upādhīnā ca manomaya ityādīnāṃ śruterbhūyasīnaṃ ca nityatvājatvādigocarāṇāṃ śrutīnāṃ darśanāt
GSP33vacbhamu:8975: iti ca praśnottarābhyāmanekadhopapādanādavibhāgasya ca 'eko devaḥ sarvabhūteṣu gūḍhaḥ' iti śrutyaivoktatvānnityā jīvātmano na vikārā na
GSP33vacbhamu:8979: karmaṇā hi jānātyartho vyāptastadabhāve na bhavati dhūma iva dhūmadhvajābhāve, suṣuptyādyavasthāsu ca jñeyasyābhāvāttadvyāpyasya
GSP33vacbhamu:8985: asti hi jñānotpādanaśaktirnijā jīvānāṃ, na tu vyomna ivendriyādisaṃnikarṣe
GSP33vacbhamu:8987: tasmājjaḍā eva jīvā iti prāpte 'bhidhīyate-yadāgantukajñānaṃ jaḍasvabhāvaṃ tatkadacit parokṣaṃ kadācit saṃdigdhaṃ kadācidviparyastaṃ, yathā ghaṭādi,
GSP33vacbhamu:8995: tathāca nityacaitanyavādinyaḥ śrutayo na kathañcit kleśena vyākhyātavyā bhavanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:9004: sarvatra nityaprāptasya vā sarvātmakasya vā tadasaṃbhāvāditi //19 //
GSP33vacbhamu:9007: taccācalato 'pi tatra sato dehasvāmyanivṛttyopapadyate na tu gatyāgatī /
GSP33vacbhamu:9008: tayoścalane nirūḍhayoḥ kartṛsthabhāvayorvyāpinyasaṃbhavāditi madhyamaṃ parimāṇaṃ mahattvaṃ śarīrasyaiva /
GSP33vacbhamu:9010: gatyāgatī ca paramanahati na saṃbhavato 'ta pāriśeṣyādaṇutvasiddhiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9011: gatyāgatibhyāṃ ca prādeśikatvasiddhau maraṇamapi dehādapasarpaṇameva jīvasya na tu tatra sataḥ svāmyanivṛttimātramiti siddhamityāha- satyośca
GSP33vacbhamu:9017: yata utkrāntyādiśrutibhirjīvānāmaṇutvaṃ prasādhitaṃ tato vyāpakātparamātmanasteṣāṃ tadvikāratayā bhedaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9018: tathāca mahattvānanyādiśrutayaḥ paramātmaviṣayā na jīvaviṣayā ityavirodha ityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9019: yadi jīvā aṇavastato 'yo 'yaṃ vijñānamayaḥ parameṣu' iti kathaṃ śārīro
GSP33vacbhamu:9022: yathā hi garbhastha eva vāmadevo jīvaḥ paramārthadṛṣṭyātmano brahmatvaṃ pratipede, evaṃ vikārāṇāṃ prakṛtervāstavādabhedāttatparimāṇatvavyapadeśa
GSP33vacbhamu:9027: uddhṛtya mānamunmānaṃ bālāgrāduddhṛtaḥ śatatamo bhāgastasmādapi śatatamāduddhṛtaḥ śatatamo bhāga iti tadidamunmānam /
GSP33vacbhamu:9030: aṇurātmā na śarīravyāpīti na sarvāṅgīṇaśaityopalabdhiḥ syādityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9032: tvaksaṃyukto hi jīvaḥ tvakca sakalaśarīravyāpinīti tvagvyāpyātmasaṃbandhaḥ sakalaśaityopalabdhau samartha ityarthaḥ //23 //
GSP33vacbhamu:9034: candanabindoḥ pratyakṣato 'lpīyastvaṃ buddhvā yuktā kalpanā bhavati, yasya tu saṃdigdhamaṇutvaṃ sarvāṅgīṇaṃ ca kāryamupalabhyate tasya vyāpitvamautsargikamapahāya neyaṃ kalpanāvakāśaṃ labhata iti śaṅkārthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9038: yadyapi pūrvoktābhiḥ śrutibhiraṇutvaṃ siddhamātmanastathāpi vaibhācchutyantaramupanyastam guṇādvā lokavat. /
GSP33vacbhamu:9039: ye tu sāvayavatvāccandanabindoraṇusaṃcāreṇa dehavyāptirupapadyate na tvātmano 'navayavasyāṇusaṃcāraḥ saṃbhavī, tasmādvaiṣamyamiti manyante tān
GSP33vacbhamu:9044: etadapi śaṅkādvāreṇa dṛṣayitvā dṛṣṭāntāntaramāha- vyatireko gandhavat /
GSP33vacbhamu:9048: viśleṣānupraveśābhyāṃ ca sannapi viśleṣaḥ sūkṣmatvānnopalakṣyate iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:9053: upalabhyamāno vā sūkṣma upalabhyeta na sthūla ityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9059: mahadalpayoḥ saṃyogo 'lpamavaruṇaddhi na mahāntaṃ, na jātu ghaṭakarakādisaṃyogā nabhaso tabho vyaśruvate 'pitvalpāneva
GSP33vacbhamu:9060: ghaṭakarakādīn, itarathā yatra nabhastatra sarvatra ghaṭakarakādyupalambha iti, te 'pi nabhaḥparimāṇaḥ prasajyeranniti /
GSP33vacbhamu:9062: yadyapyantaḥkaraṇamaṇu tathāpi tasyatvacā saṃbaddhatvāttvacaśta samastaśarīravyāpitvādekadeśe 'pyadhiṣṭhitā tvagadhiṣṭhitaiveti śarīravyāpī jīvaḥ śaknoti sarvāṅgīṇaṃ śaityamanubhavituṃ tvagindriyeṇa gaṅgāyām /
GSP33vacbhamu:9063: aṇustu jīvo yatrāsti tasminneva śarīrapradeśo tadanubhavenna sarvāṅgīṇaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:9065: kaṇṭakatodanasya tu prādeśikatayā na sarvāṅgīṇopalabdhiriti vaiṣamyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:9068: ata eva hi hemante viṣaktāvayavāpyadravyagate 'tisāndre śītasparśe
GSP33vacbhamu:9069: 'nubhūyamānepyanudbhūtaṃ rūpaṃ nopalabhyate yathā, tathā mṛgamadādīnāṃ gandhavāhaviprakīrṇasūkṣmāvayavānāmatisāndre gandhe 'nubhūyamāne
GSP33vacbhamu:9070: rūpasparśau nānubhūyete tatkasya hetoḥ, anudbhūtatvāttayorgandhasya codbhūtatvāditi /
GSP33vacbhamu:9073: apica caitanyaṃ nāma na gumo jīvasya guṇānaḥ, kintu rūpabhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9074: naca svabhāvasya vyāpitve bhāvasyāvyāpitvaṃ, tattvapracyuterityāha- yadi ca caitanyamiti. tadevaṃ śrutismṛtītihāsapurāṇasiddhe jīvasyāvikāritayā paramātmatve, tathā śrutyāditaḥ paramamahattve ca, yā nāmāṇutvaśrutayastāstadanurodhena buddhiguṇasāratayā vyākhyeyā ityāha- tadguṇasāratvāditi. tadvyācaṣṭe- tasyā buddheriti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:9077: apitu yo 'yaṃ mithyājñānadveṣādyanuṣaktaḥ sa eva pratyātmamanubhavagocaraḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:9078: naca brahmasvabhāvasya jīvātmanaḥ kūṭasthanityasya svata icchādveṣānupaṅgasaṃbhava iti buddhiguṇānāṃ teṣāṃ tadabhedādhyāsena taddharmatvādhyāsaḥ, upadarāvādhyastasyeva candramaso bimbasya toyakampe kamapvattvādhyāsa ityupapāditamadhyāsabhāṣye /
GSP33vacbhamu:9079: tathāca buddhyādyupādhikṛtamasya jīvatvamiti buddherantaḥkaraṇasyāṇutayā so 'pyaṇuvyapadeśabhāgbhavati, nabha iva karakopahitaṃ karakaparimāṇam.
GSP33vacbhamu:9100: antaḥkaraṇe 'pi sati tasya nityasaṃnidhānāt kasmānnityopalabdhyanupalabdhī na prasajyete /
GSP33vacbhamu:9102: tāvasatyevāntaḥ karaṇe ātmano vendriyāṇāṃ vā stāṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:9115: nanu 'tadguṇasāratvāt' ityanenaiva jīvasya kartṛtvaṃ bhoktṛtvaṃ ca labdhameveti tadvyutpādanamanarthakamityata
GSP33vacbhamu:9116: tasyaivaiṣa prapañco ye bhoktaiva na karteti tannirākaraṇārthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9117: 'śāstraphalaṃ prayoktari tallakṣaṇatvāt' ityāha sma bhagavān jaiminiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9124: buddhiścetkartrī bhoktā cātmā tato yasyāpekṣitopāyo bhoktuna tasya kartṛtvaṃ yasya kartṛtvaṃ naca tasyāpekṣitopāyā iti kiṃ kena saṃgatamiti śāstrasyānarthakatvamavidyamānābhidheyatvaṃ tathā cāprayojanakatvaṃ syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:9125: yathā ca tadguṇasāratayāsyāvastusadapi bhoktṛtvaṃ sāṃvyavahārikamevaṃ kartṛtvamapi sāṃvyavahārikaṃ na tu bhāvikam /
GSP33vacbhamu:9128: vihāraḥ saṃcāraḥ kriyā, tatra svātantryaṃ nākartuḥ saṃbhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:9131: tadeteṣāṃ prāṇānāmindriyāṇāṃ vijñānena buddhyā vijñānaṃ grahaṇaśaktimādāyopādāyetyupādāne svātantryaṃ nākartuḥ saṃbhavati //35 //
GSP33vacbhamu:9135: sarvatra hi buddhiḥ karaṇarūpā karaṇatvenaiva vyapadiśyate na kartṛtvena,
GSP33vacbhamu:9136: iha tu kartṛtvena, tasyā vyapadeśe viparyayaḥ syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:9145: karaṇādīni kārakāntarāṇi kartā prayuṅkte na tvayaṃ kārakāntaraiḥ prayujyata ityetāvanmātramasya svātantryaṃ na tu kāryakriyāyāṃ na kārakāntarāṇyapekṣata iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:9146: īdṛśaṃ hi svātantryaṃ neśvarasyāpyatrabhavato 'stītyutsannasaṃkathaḥ kartā syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:9147: tathā cāyamadṛṣṭaparipākavaśādiṣṭamabhiprepsustatsādhanavibhrameṇāniṣṭopāyaṃ vyāpārayannaniṣṭaṃ prāpnuyādityaniyamaḥ kartṛtvaṃ ceti na virodhaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9150: svaviṣayamupanayanti, tena viṣayāvacchinnameva caitanyaṃ vṛttiriti vijñānamiti cākhyāyate, tatra cāsyāsti svātantryamityarthaḥ //37 //
GSP33vacbhamu:9154: aviparyayāya tu karaṇāntarakalpanāyāṃ nāmni visaṃvāda iti //38 //
GSP33vacbhamu:9163: so 'yamiha kartātmā samādhāvupadiśyamāna ātmanaḥ kartṛtvamavaitīti sūtrārthaḥ //39 //
GSP33vacbhamu:9169: naca svābhāvike kartṛtve saṃbhavatyasatyapavāde tadaupādhikaṃ yuktam.
GSP33vacbhamu:9178: naca nityodāsīnasya kūṭasthasya nityasyāsakṛcchutasya saṃbhavati, tasya ca kadācidapyasaṃsarge kathaṃ tacchaktiyogo nirviṣayāyāḥ śakteraṃsabhavāt tathāca yadi tatsidhyarthaṃ tadviṣaḥ kriyāveśo 'byupeyate tathā sati tatsvabhāvasya svabhāvocchedābhāvādbhāvanāśaprasaṅgaḥ, naca muktasyāsti kriyāyoga iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:9185: tathāca tayākṣiptaṃ śakyaṃ sadaiva syāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9189: asmākaṃ tu na mokṣaḥ sādhyaḥ, apitu brahmasvarūpaṃ tacca nityamiti /
GSP33vacbhamu:9195: parasmādanyaścetsa buddhyādisaṃghāta eveti, tasyaiva tarhi muktisaṃsārau
GSP33vacbhamu:9201: api tvavidyopasthāpitānāṃ buddhyādisaṃghātānāṃ bhedāttattadbuddhyādisaṃghātabhedopadhāna ātmaiko 'pi bhinna iva viśuddho
GSP33vacbhamu:9202: 'pyaviśuddha iva tataścaikabuddhyādisaṃghātāpagame tatra mukta ivetaratra baddha iva yathā maṇikṛpāṇādyupadhānabhedādekameva mukhaṃ nāneva
GSP33vacbhamu:9203: dīrghamiva vṛttamiva śyāmamivāvadātamiva anyatamopadhānavigame tatra muktamivānyatropahitamiveti naikamuktau sarvamuktaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9204: tasmānna paramātmano makṣasaṃsārau, nāpi buddhyādisaṃghātāsya kintu
GSP33vacbhamu:9212: takṣṇaḥ pāṇyādayaḥ santi tairayaṃ vāsyādīn vyāpārayan bhavatu duḥkhī,
GSP33vacbhamu:9213: paramātmā tvanavayavaḥ kena manaḥprabhṛtīni vyāpārayoditi vaiṣamyaṃ takṣṇo dṛṣṭāntenetyata āha- takṣadṛṣṭāntaśceti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:9214: yathā svaśarīremodāsīnastakṣā sukhī, nāsyādīni tu karaṇāni vyāpārayan
GSP33vacbhamu:9215: duḥkhī, tathā svātmanātmodāsīnaḥ sukhī, manaḥprabhṛtīni tu karaṇādīni
GSP33vacbhamu:9216: vyāpārayan duḥkhītyetāvatāsya sāmyaṃ na tu sarvathā /
GSP33vacbhamu:9217: yathātmā ca jīvo 'vayavāntarānapekṣaḥ svaśarīraṃ vyāpārayatyevaṃ manaḥprabhṛtīni tu karaṇāntarāṇi vyāpārayatīti pramāṇasiddhe niyogaparyanuyogānupapattiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9219: yatparaṃ hi śāstraṃ sa eva śāstrārthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9221: tena yathālokasiddhaṃ kartāramapekṣya svaviṣaye pravartamānaṃ na puṃsaḥ svābhāvikaṃ kartṛtvamavagamayitutsahate,
GSP33vacbhamu:9224: aupādhikaṃ hi kartṛtvaṃ nopādhyapagame saṃbhavatīti svābhāvikameva yujyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9225: apica yatrāpi karaṇamasti tatrāpi kevalasyātmanaḥ kartṛtvaśravaṇātsvābhāvikameva yuktamityāha- tathopādāne 'pīti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:9228: apica svapne yādṛśaṃ jñānaṃ tādṛśo vihāro 'pītyāha- vihāro 'pi ca tatreti /
GSP33vacbhamu:9230: yadyapi kartṛvibhaktiḥ kevale kartari śrūyate tathāpi karmakaraṇopadhānakṛtamasya kartṛtvaṃ na śuddhasya, nahi paraśusahāyaśchettā kevalaśchettā bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:9231: nanu yadi na kevalasya kartṛtvamapi tu karaṇādisahitasyaiva, tathā sati karaṇādiṣvati kartṛvibhaktiḥ syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:9232: na caitadastītyāha- bhavati na loka iti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:9234: api ceyamupādānaśrutiḥ karaṇavyāpāroparamamātraparā na svātantryaparā kartṛvibhaktistu bhāktī
GSP33vacbhamu:9239: viklidyanti taṇḍulā jvalanti kāṣṭhāni sthālīti hi svavyāpāre sarveṣāṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:9240: kartṛtvaṃ, tatkiṃ buddhyādīnāṃ kartṛtvameva na karaṇatvamityata āha- upalabdhyapekṣaṃ tveṣāṃ karaṇatvam. /
GSP33vacbhamu:9241: nanvevaṃ sati tasyāmevātmanaḥ svābhāvikaṃ kartṛtvamastvityata āha- naca
GSP33vacbhamu:9243: nahi nitye svabhāve cāsti bhāvasya vyāpārityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9248: nahi śarīrādi yasyāṃ kriyāyāṃ gamyaṃ tasyāmeva gantṛ bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:9249: etaduktaṃ bhavati-yadi buddhirupalabdhī bhavet, tatastasyā upalabdhṛtvamātmanyadhyavasyeta
GSP33vacbhamu:9252: yadā caupalabdhau buddherakartṛtvaṃ tadā yaduktaṃ buddherupalabdhṛtve karaṇāntaraṃ kalpanīyaṃ, tathāca nāmamātre visaṃvāda iti tanna bhavatītyāha- na caivaṃ sati karaṇāntarakalpanā. buddherupalabdhṛtvābhāvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:9253: caitanyamidānīmakaraṇaṃ buddhirupalabdhāvātmā cānapalabdha etyata āha- buddhe karaṇatvābhyupagamāt. /
GSP33vacbhamu:9255: kartṛtvaṃ, nāpi buddheḥ karaṇatvaṃ, kintu caitanyameva viṣayāvacchinnaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:9257: tasya tu tattadviṣayāvacchede vṛttau buddhyadīnāṃ karaṇatvamātmanaśca tadupadhānenāhaṅkārapūrvakaṃ kartṛtvaṃ yujyata iti //40 //
GSP33vacbhamu:9259: yadetajjīvānāmaupādhikaṃ kartṛtvaṃ tatpravartanālakṣaṇeṣu rāgādiṣu satsu neśvaramaparaṃ pravartakaṃ kalpayitumarhati, ati prasaṅgāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:9260: naceśvaro dveṣapakṣapātarahito jīvān sādhvasādhuni karmaṇi pravartayitumarhati, yena dharmādharmāpekṣayā jagadvaicitryamāpadyeta /
GSP33vacbhamu:9261: sa hi svatantraḥ kāruṇiko dharma eva jantūn pravartayennādharme /
GSP33vacbhamu:9262: tataśca tatpreritā jantavaḥ sarve dhārmikā eveti sukhina eva syurna duḥkhunaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9263: svatantrāstu rāgādiprayuktāḥ pravartamānā dharmādharmaparcayavanto vaicitryamanubhavantīti yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:9264: evañca vidhiniṣedhayorarthavattvamitarathā tu sarvathā jīvā avastatantrā itīśvareṇaiva pravartyanta iti kṛtaṃ vidhiniṣedhābyām /
GSP33vacbhamu:9266: tasmāt 'eṣa hyeva sādhu karma kārayati' ityādayaḥ śrutayaḥ samastavidhiniṣedhaśrutivirodhāllokavirodhāccaiśvaryapraśaṃsāparatayā neyā iti prāpte 'bhidhīyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:9267: 'eṣa hyeva sādhu karma kārayati' ityādayastāvcachutayaḥ sarvavyāpāreṣu jantūnāmīśvaratantratāmāhuḥ, tadasati pratibandhake na praśaṃsāparatayā vyākhyātumucitam /
GSP33vacbhamu:9268: naca śrutisiddhasya kalpanīyatā, yena pravartakeṣu rāgādiṣu satsu tatkalpanā virudhyeta /
GSP33vacbhamu:9269: na ceśvaratantratve dharma eva jantūnāṃ pravṛtteḥ sukhitvameva na vaicitryamiti yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:9275: nahīśvaraḥ prabalatarapavana iva jantūn pravartayatyapi tu taccaitanyamanurudhyamāno rāgādyupahāramukhena
GSP33vacbhamu:9277: tadanenābhisaṃdhinoktam-parāyatte 'pi hi kartṛtvaṃ karotyeva jīva iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:9278: tasmādvidhiniṣedhaśāstravirodhāllokasya sthūladarśitvāt 'eṣa hyeva sādhu ka4ma kārayati' ityādiśruteḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9281: ' iti smṛteśceśvaratantrāmāmeva jantūnāṃ kartṛtvaṃ, na tu svatantrāmāmiti
GSP33vacbhamu:9283: īśvara eva vidhiniṣedhayosthāne niyujyeta yadvidhiniṣedhayoḥ phalaṃ tadīśvareṇa tatpratipāditadharmādharmanirapekṣeṇa kṛtamiti vidhiniṣedhayorānarthakyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:9284: na kevalamānarthakyaṃ viparītaṃ cāpadyeta ityāha- tathā
GSP33vacbhamu:9295: na ca 'brahmadāśā brahmakitavāḥ' ityādyāśca śrutayo dāśā brahma kitavā brahmetyādipratipādanaparā jīvānāṃ brahmaṇo bhede 'vakalpyante /
GSP33vacbhamu:9296: na caitābhirbhedābedapratipādanaparābhiḥ śrutibiḥ sākṣādaṃśatvapratipādakācca mantravarṇāt 'pādo 'sya viśvā bhūtāni'
GSP33vacbhamu:9298: niratiśayopādhisaṃpadā ca vibhūtiyogeneśvaraḥ svāṃśānāmapi nikṛṣṭopādhīnāmīṣṭa iti yujyate
GSP33vacbhamu:9300: apica jīvānāṃ brahmāṃśatve tadgatā vedanā brahmaṇo bhavet /
GSP33vacbhamu:9302: tataśca brahmabhūyaṅgatasya samastajīvagatavedanānubhavaprasaṅga iti varaṃ saṃsāra eva mukteḥṣa tatra hi svagatavedanāmātrāmanubhavānna bhūri duḥkhamanubhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:9303: muktastu sarvajīvavedanābhāgiti prayatnena muktiranarthabahulatayā parihartavyā syāditi /
GSP33vacbhamu:9305: naca brahmaiva sadasantastu jīvā iti yuktaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:9312: yena ca vākyamupakramyate madhye ca parāmṛśyate ante copasaṃhriyate tatraiva tasya tātparyam
GSP33vacbhamu:9314: naca yatparāstadaupacārikaṃ yuktam, abhyāse hi bhūyastvamarthasya bhavati nālpatvamapi prāgevopacaritatvamityuktam
GSP33vacbhamu:9315: tasmadvaite bāvike sthite jīvabhāvastasya brahmaṇo 'nādyanirvacanīyāvidyapadhānabhedādekasyaiva bimbasya darpaṇādyupādhibhedātpratibimbabhedāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9317: naca mokṣasyānarthabahulatā, yataḥ pratibimbānāmiva śyāmatāvadātatādirjīvānāmeva nānāvedanābhisaṃbandho brahmaṇastu bimbasyeva na tadabhisaṃbandhaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9318: yathāca darpaṇāpanaye tatpratibimbaṃ bimbabhāve 'vatiṣṭhate na kṛpāṇe pratibimbatamapi
GSP33vacbhamu:9319: evamavidyopadhānavigame jīve brahmabāveti siddhaṃ jīvo brahmāṃśa iva tattantratayā na tvaṃśa iti tātparyārthāḥ //43 //
GSP33vacbhamu:9321: tadyathā-buddhikarmendriyāṇi bāhyāni daśa buddhimanasī vṛttibhedamātreṇa bhinne apyekīkṛtyaikamantaḥ karamaṃ śarīraṃ pca viṣayā iti saptadaśako
GSP33vacbhamu:9326: puruṣārthe 'pi niyamāṃśe pravṛtte- kaḥ punardehasaṃbandha iti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:9327: nahi kūṭasthanityasyātmanoparimāmino 'sti dehena saṃyogaḥ samavāyo vānyo vā kaścit saṃbandhaḥ sakaladharmātigatvādityabhisaṃdhiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9328: uttaram- dehādirayaṃ saṃghāto 'hamevetyātmani viparītapratyayotpattiḥ. ayamarthaḥ-satyaṃ nāsti kaścidātmano dehādibhiḥ pāramārthikaḥ saṃbandhaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:9332: so 'yaṃ sāṃvṛttastādātmyalakṣaṇaḥ saṃbandho na pāramārthika ityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9336: yadi sūkṣmasthūladehādisaṃghāto 'vidyopadarśita ekamevādvitīyaṃ brahmāsmīti samyagdarśanamabhimatam, addhā tadvantaṃ prati
GSP33vacbhamu:9340: āmuṣmikaphaleṣu ka4masu darsapūrṇamāsādiṣu niyojyatvamiti cotpariharati- na /
GSP33vacbhamu:9343: yo hyātmanaḥ ṣāṭkauśikāddehādupapattyāvyatirekaṃ veda, na tu samastabuddhyādisaṃghātavyatirekaṃ, tasyāmuṣmikaphaleṣvādhikāraḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9344: samastabuddhyādivyatirekavedinastu karmabhoktṛtvābhimānarahitasya nādhikāraḥ karmaṇi tathāca na yatheṣṭaceṣṭā, abhimānavikalasya tasyā apyabhāvāditi //48 //
GSP33vacbhamu:9345: yeṣāṃ tu sāṃkhyānāṃ vaiśeṣikāṇāṃ vā sukhaduḥkhavyavasthāṃ pāramārthikīmicchatāṃ bahava ātmānaḥ sarvagatāsteṣāmevaiṣa vyatikaraḥ prāpnoti /
GSP33vacbhamu:9346: tatra praśnapūrvakaṃ sāṃkhyān prati vyatikramaṃ tāvadāha- kathamiti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:9347: yādṛśastādṛśo guṇaṃsaṃbandhaḥ sarvān puruṣān pratyaviśiṣṭa iti tatkṛte sukhaduḥkhe sarvān pratyaviśiṣṭe /
GSP33vacbhamu:9348: naca karmanibandhanā vyavasthā, karmaṇaḥ prākṛtatvena prakṛteśca
GSP33vacbhamu:9351: ayamarthaḥ-na pradhānaṃ svavibhūtīkhyāpanāya pravartate, kintu puruṣārtham /
GSP33vacbhamu:9352: yaṃ ca puruṣaṃ pratyanena bhogāpavargau puruṣārthau sādhitau taṃ prati samāptādhikāratayā nivartate puruṣāntaraṃ tu pratyasamāpyādhikāraṃ pravartate /
GSP33vacbhamu:9353: evaṃ na muktasaṃsārivyavasthopapatteḥ sukhaduḥkhavyavasthāpi bhaviṣyatīti nirākaroti -nahīti. sarveṣāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ vibhutvāt pradhānasya ca sādhāraṇyadamuṃ puruṣaṃ pratyanenārthaḥ sādhita ityetadeva nāsti /
GSP33vacbhamu:9356: bhavatu sāṃkhyānāmavyavasthā, pradhānasamavāyādadṛṣṭasyasa, pradhānasya ca sādhāraṇyāt
GSP33vacbhamu:9357: kāṇādādīnāṃ tvātmasamavāpyadṛṣṭaṃ pratyātmamasādhāraṇaṃ tatkṛtaśca manasā sahātmanaḥ svasvāmibhāvalakṣaṇaḥ saṃbandho 'nādiradṛṣṭabhedānāmanāditvāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:9361: nahi tasya manasa ātmānatarairyaḥ saṃyogaḥ sa eva svāmināpi,
GSP33vacbhamu:9366: bhede hi tatkalpanā tataśca bheda iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:9368: bhāṣyakṛtā tu prauḍhavāditayā kāṇādān pratyapyadṛṣṭāniyamādityādīni sūtrāṇi yojitāni /
GSP33vacbhamu:9370: iti śrīnācaspatimiśraviracite bhagavatpādaśārīrakabhāṣyavibhāge bhāmatyāṃ dvitīyādhyāyasya tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ //3 //
GSP33vacbhamu:9372: virodhaparipārākhyastṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ dvitīyādhyāye caturthaḥ pādaḥ. tathā prāṇaḥ. /
GSP33vacbhamu:9373: yadyapi brahmavedane sarvavedanapratijñātādupapādanaśrutivirodhādbahutarādvaitaśrutivirodhācca prāṇānāṃ sargādau sadbhāvaśrutirviyadasmṛtatvādiśrutaya ivānyathā kathañcinnetumucitā,
GSP33vacbhamu:9377: śabdaikapramāṇasamadhigamyā hi mahābhūtotpattistasyā yatra śabdo nivartate tatra tatpramāṇabhāvena tadabhāvaḥ pratīyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:9383: rāddhāntastu syādetadevaṃ yadi sargādau prāṇasadbhāvaśrutirananyathāsiddhā bhavet /
GSP33vacbhamu:9386: tatrādhikāripuruṣaḥ prajāpatirapranaṣṭa eva trailokyamātraṃ pralīnamatastadīyān prāṇānapekṣya sā śrutirupapannārthā /
GSP33vacbhamu:9387: tasmādbhūyasīnāṃ śrutīnāmanugrahāya sarvavijñānapratijñopapattyarthasya cottarasya saṃdarbhasya gauṇatve tu pratājñātārthānugumyābhāvenānapekṣitārthatvaprasaṅgātprāṇā api nabhovadbrahmaṇo vikārā iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:9388: naca caityavandanādivatsarvathā prāṇānāmutpattyaśrutiḥ, kkacit khalveṣāmutpattyaśravaṇamutpattiśrutistu tatra tatra darśitā /
GSP33vacbhamu:9409: atha gaumaṃ tathāpi brahmakartṛkāyāṃ nāmarūpavyākriyāyāmupakramopasaṃhāraparyālocanayā śrutyantaraprasiddheśca brahmakāryatvaprapañcārthameva prāṇādīnāmāpemayatvādyabhidhānamityuktaiva tatrāpi prāṇasṛṣṭiriti siddham //4 //
GSP33vacbhamu:9417: tadyathā-ghrāṇarasanavākcakṣuḥ-śrotramanohastatvagiti, ta ete grahāḥ, eṣāṃ tu viṣayā atigrahāstvaṣṭāveva 'prāṇo vai grahaḥ so 'pānenātigraheṇa gṛhīto
GSP33vacbhamu:9420: tadyathā- sapta. vai śīrṣaṇyāḥ prāṇāḥ dvāvavāñcāviti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:9421: dve śrotre dve cakṣuṣī dve ghrāṇe ekā vāgiti sapta /
GSP33vacbhamu:9424: nava vai puruṣe prāṇā.sta uktā nābhirdaśamīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:9426: tadyathā-buddhīndriyāṇi ghrāṇādīni pañca karmendriyāṇyapi hastādīni pañca ātmaikādaśa, āpnotyadhiṣṭhānenetyātmā manaḥ sa ekādaśa iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:9432: atra praśnapūrvaṃ pūrvapakṣaṃ gṛhṇāti- kiṃ tāvat prāptaṃ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9438: ye sapta śīrṣaṇyāḥ śrotrādayaste prāṇā ityukte itareṣāmaśīrṣaṇyānāṃ hastādīnāmaprāṇatvaṃ gamyate
GSP33vacbhamu:9439: yathā dakṣiṇenākṣṇā paśyatītyukte vāmena na paśyatīti gamyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:9440: etaduktaṃ bhavati-yadyapi śrutivipratiṣedo yadyapi ca pūrvasaṃkhyāsu na parāsāṃ saṃkhyānāṃ niveśastathāpyavacchedakatvena bahvīnāṃ saṃkhyānāmasaṃbhavādekasyāṃ kalpyamānāyāṃ saptatvameva yuktaṃ prāthamyāllāghavācca, vṛttibhedamātravivakṣayā tvaṣṭatvādayo gamayitavyā
GSP33vacbhamu:9442: evaṃ prāpta ucyate- hastādayastu sthite 'to naivam. /
GSP33vacbhamu:9450: naca siddhe vastuni anuṣṭhāna iva vikalpaḥ saṃbhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:9453: 'sruveṇāvadyapi' iti māṃsapuroḍāśāvadānāsaṃbhavāt, saṃbhavācca dravāvadānasya sruvāvadāne dravāṇīti vyavasthāpyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:9454: evamihāpi rūpādibuddhipañcakakāryavyavasthātaścakṣurādibuddhīndriyakaraṇapañcakavyavasthā nahyandhādayaḥ satsvapītareṣu ghrāṇādiṣu gandhādyupalabdhyānumitasadbhāveṣu rūpādīnupalabhante
GSP33vacbhamu:9456: nahi jātu mūkādayaḥ satsvapi viharaṇādyavagatasadbhāveṣu pādādiṣu buddhīndriyeṣu vā vacanādimanto bhavanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:9458: ekamapi cāntaḥkaraṇamanekakriyākāri bhaviṣyati, yathā pradīpa eko
GSP33vacbhamu:9461: ekameva tvantaḥkaraṇaṃ mananānmana iti cābhimānādahaṅkāra iti cādhyavasāyādbuddhiriti cākhyāyate
GSP33vacbhamu:9464: tadevamekādaśānāṃ kāryāṇāṃ vyavasthānādekādaśa prāṇā iti śrutirāñjasī /
GSP33vacbhamu:9466: tatrāvayutyanuvādena saptāṣṭanavadaśasaṃkhyāśrutayo yathaikaṃ vṛṇīte dvau iti trīn vṛṇīta ityetadānuguṇyāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:9467: dvādaśatrayodaśasaṃkhyāśrutī tu kathañcidvṛttibhedena bhedaṃ vivakṣitvopāsanādiparatayā netavye
GSP33vacbhamu:9469: apica śīrṣaṇyānāṃ prāṇānāṃ yatsaptatvābidhānaṃ tadapi caturṣvevavyavasthāpanīyam, pramāṇāntaravirodhāt
GSP33vacbhamu:9470: na khalu dve cakṣuṣī, rūpolabdhilakṣaṇasya kāryasyābedāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:9471: pihitaikacakṣuṣastu na tādṛśī rūpopalabdhidharbhavati yādṛśī samagracakṣuṣaḥ, tasmādekameva cakṣuradhiṣṭhānabhedena tu
GSP33vacbhamu:9477: saptānāmeva gatiśruterviśeṣitatvāditi vyākhyātuṃ śaṅkate- nanu sarvaśabdo 'pyatreti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:9480: tasmātsarvaśabdasya prakṛtāpekṣatvātsaptaiva prāṇā utkrāmanti na pāṇyādaya iti prāptam /
GSP33vacbhamu:9490: tasmācchutyantarebhyaḥ smṛteśca sarvaśabdārthāsaṃkocācca sarveṣāmutkrameṇa sthite 'sminnaivaṃ yaduktaṃ saptaiveti, kintu pradarśanārthaṃ saptatvasaṃkhyeti siddham //6 //
GSP33vacbhamu:9493: vṛttisteṣāṃ śarīradeśatayā prādeśikī tannibandhanā ca gatyāgatiśrutiriti
GSP33vacbhamu:9497: sarvagatatve 'pi dehāvacchinnānāmeva karaṇatvaṃ tena na vyavahitaviprakṛṣṭavastūpalambhaprasaṅga iti cet, hanta prāptāprāptāvivekena śarīrāvacchinnānāmeva teṣāṃ karaṇatvamindriyatvamiti na vyāpināmindriyabhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9498: tathāca nāmamātre visaṃvādo nārthe 'smābhistadindriyamucyate bhavadbhistu vṛttiriti siddhamaṇavaḥ prāṇā iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:9502: 'nāsadāsīt' ityadhikṛtya pravṛtte brahmasūkte nāsadāsīye sargātprāgānīditi prāṇavyāpāraśravaṇādasati ca vyāpārānupapatte
GSP33vacbhamu:9503: prāṇasadbhāvājjyeṣṭhatvaśruteśca na brahmavikāraḥ prāṇa iti manvānasya bahuśrutivirodhe 'pi ca śrutyoretayorgatimapaśyataḥ pūrvapakṣaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9504: rāddhāntastu bahuśrutivirodhādevānīditi na prāṇavyāpārapratipādinī, kintu sṛṣṭikāraṇamānīt jīvati sma āsīditi yāvat /
GSP33vacbhamu:9510: atra hi 'yaḥ prāṇaḥ sa vāyuḥ' iti śrutervāyureva prāṇa iti pratibāti /
GSP33vacbhamu:9511: athavā 'prāṇa eva brahmaṇaścaturthaḥ pādaḥ sa vāyunā jyotiṣā' iti vāyorbhedena prāṇasya śravaṇādetadvirodhādvaraṃ tantrāntarīyameva prāṇasya
GSP33vacbhamu:9512: svarūpamastu, śrutī ca viruddhārthe kathañcinneṣyete iti sāmānyakaraṇavṛttireva prāṇo 'stu
GSP33vacbhamu:9513: na cātrāpi karaṇebhyaḥ pṛthakprāṇasyānukramaṇaśrutivirodho vṛttivṛttimatorbhedāditi pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9515: sa hi militānāṃ vendriyāṇāṃ vṛttirbhavet pratyekaṃ vā /
GSP33vacbhamu:9519: na ca tvagekasādhyaṃ, tathā sati sāmānyavṛttitvānupapatteḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9520: apica yatsaṃbhūya kārakāṇi niṣpādayanti tatpradhānavyāpārānuguṇāvāntaravyāpāreṇaiva yathā vayasāṃ prātisviko vyāpāraḥ pañjaracālanānuguṇaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9521: na cendriyāṇāṃ prāṇe pradhānavyāpāre janayitavye 'sti tādṛśaḥ kaścidavāntaravyāpārastadanuguṇaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:9522: ye ca rūpādipratyayā na te tadanuguṇāḥ, tasmānnendriyāṇāṃ sāmānyavṛttiḥ prāṇastathā ca vṛttivṛttimatoḥ kathañcidbhedavivakṣayā na pṛthagupadeśo
GSP33vacbhamu:9524: tasmānna kriyā, nāpi vāyumātraṃ prāṇaḥ, kintu vāyubheda evādhyātmāmāpannaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:9527: yathā cakṣurādīnāṃ jīvaṃ prati guṇabhūtatvājjīvasya ca śreṣṭhatvājjīvaḥ svatantra evaṃ prāṇo 'pi prādhānyāt śreṣṭhatvācca svatantraḥ prāpnoti /
GSP33vacbhamu:9528: naca dvayoḥ svatantrayorekasmin śarīre ekavākyatvamupapadyata ityaparyāyaṃ viruddhānekadikkriyatayā deha unmathyeta /
GSP33vacbhamu:9530: yadyapi cakṣurādyapekṣayā śreṣṭhatvaṃ prādhānyaṃ ca prāṇasya tathāpi saṃhatatvādacetanatvādbhautikatvāccakṣurādibiḥ sahaśiṣṭatvāccaca puruṣārthatvāt puruṣaṃ prati pāratantryaṃ śayanāsanādivadbhavet /
GSP33vacbhamu:9531: tathāca yathā mantrītareṣu naiyogikeṣu pradhānamapi rājānamapekṣyāsvatantra evaṃ prāṇo 'pi cakṣurādiṣu pradhānamapi jīve
GSP33vacbhamu:9533: syādetaccakṣurādibiḥ saha śāsanena karaṇaṃ cet prāṇaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9536: ekādaśakaraṇagaṇanavyākopaśceti doṣaṃ pariharati- akaraṇatvācca na doṣastathāhi darśayati. na prāṇaḥ paricchedadhāraṇādikaraṇamasmābhirabhyupeyate yenāsya viṣayāntaramanviṣyeta /
GSP33vacbhamu:9537: ekādaśatvaṃ ca karaṇānāṃ vyākupyetāpi tu prāṇāntarāsaṃbhavi dehendriyavidhāraṇakāraṇaṃ prāṇaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:9538: tacca śrutiprabandhena darśitaṃ na kevalaṃ śarīrendriyadhāraṇamasya kāryam
GSP33vacbhamu:9544: yadyapi mithyājñāne 'pyasti vastuśūnyatā tathāpi na tasya vyavahārahetutāsti /
GSP33vacbhamu:9550: yadyapi cātrābhāvapratyayālambanā vṛttirneṣyate tathāpi vikṣepasaṃskāralakṣaṇā manovṛttirihāstyeveti sajñavamavadātam //12 //
GSP33vacbhamu:9554: yathā vibhuna ākāśasya kuṭakarakādyavacchedātkuṭādisāmyamiti prāpta āha- aṇuśca. /
GSP33vacbhamu:9557: yattvasya vibhutvānmānaṃ tadādhidaivikena sūtrātmanā samaṣṭivyaṣṭirūpeṇa na tvādhyātmikena rūpeṇa /
GSP33vacbhamu:9559: prāṇasyāhuḥ svarūpato na tu karakākāśavatparopādhikatayā kathañcinnatavyā iti //13 //
GSP33vacbhamu:9561: yaddhi tatkāryaṃ kurvaddṛṣṭaṃ tatsvamahimnaiva karotityeṣa tāvadutsargaḥtha parādhiṣṭhānaṃ tu tasya balavatpramāṇāntaravaśāt.
GSP33vacbhamu:9566: naca 'agnirvāgbhūtvavā mukhaṃ prāviśat' ityādiśrutibhyo devatānāmapyadhiṣṭhātṛtvamabhyupagantuṃ yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:9568: apica ya indriyāṇāmadhiṣṭhātā sa eva bhokteti devatānāṃ bhoktṛtvena svāmitvaṃ śarīra iti na jīvaḥ svāmī syādbhoktā ca /
GSP33vacbhamu:9569: tasmādagnyādyupacāro vāgādiṣu prakāśakatvādinā kenacinnimittena gamayitatavyo natu svarūpeṇāgnyādidevatānāṃ mukhādyanupraveśa iti prāptam
GSP33vacbhamu:9570: evaṃ prāpte ucyate-nānāvidhāsu tāvacchutiṣu smṛtiṣu ca tatra tatra vāgādiṣvagnyādidevatādhiṣṭhānavagamyate
GSP33vacbhamu:9573: saṃbhavati tu devatānāmindriyādyārṣeṇa jñānena sākṣātkṛtavatīnāṃ tatsvarūpabhedatadupayogabhedavijñānam
GSP33vacbhamu:9574: tasmāttāstā eva devatāstattatkaraṇādhiṣṭhātrya iti yuktaṃ na tu jīvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9576: anekeṣāmadhiṣṭhātaṇāmekaḥ parameśvaro 'sti niyantāntaryāmī tadśādvipratipitsavo 'pi na vipratipattumarhanti
GSP33vacbhamu:9579: nahi yantā rathamadhitiṣṭhinnapi tatsādhyavijayāderbhoktāpi tu svāmyeva /
GSP33vacbhamu:9580: evaṃ devatā adhiṣṭhātryo 'pi na bhoktryastāsāṃ tāvnamātrasya śrutatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:9582: naca narādiśarīrocitaṃ duḥkhabahulamupabhogaṃ sukhamapyo devatā arhanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:9583: tasmāt prāṇānāmadhiṣṭhātryo devatā iti siddham, śeṣamatirohitārtham //14
GSP33vacbhamu:9586: indriyāṇyevāsya jyeṣṭhasya ca prāṇasya vṛttayo bhaviṣyanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:9593: naca bhedena vyapadeśo bhedasādhanam 'etasmājjāyate prāṇaḥ' ityādirmanaso
GSP33vacbhamu:9595: smṛtivaśāttu tasyendriyatve indriyāmāmapi prāṇādbhedena vyapadiṣṭānāmapyasti prāṇasvabhāvatve 'hanta asyaiva rūpamasāma' iti śrutiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9596: tasmādupapatteḥ śruteśca prāṇasyaiva vṛttasya ekādaśendriyāṇi na tattvāntarāṇīti prāptam /
GSP33vacbhamu:9597: evaṃ prāpta ucyate-mukhyāt prāṇāttattvāntarāṇīndriyāmi, tatra tatra bhedena vyapadeśāt
GSP33vacbhamu:9604: yāpi ca prāṇarūpatāmindriyāṇāmabhidadhāti śrutiḥ, tatrāpi paurvāparyālocanāyāṃ bheda eva pratīyata ityuktaṃ bhāṣyakṛtā /
GSP33vacbhamu:9605: tasmādbahuśrutivirodhāt pūrvāparavirodhācca prāṇarūpatābhidhānamindriyāṇāṃ prāṇāyattatayā bhāktaṃ gamayitavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:9608: naca prāṇe bhedavyapadeśabāhulyaṃ tathā netuṃ yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:9610: tathā jyeṣṭhe prāṇaśabdasya mukhyatvādindriyeṣu tatastattvāntareṣu lākṣaṇikaḥ prāṇaśabda iti yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:9611: naca mukhyatvānurodhenāvagatabhedayoraikyaṃ yuktaṃ, mā bhūdgaṅgādīnāṃ tīrādibhiraikyamiti
GSP33vacbhamu:9612: anye tu bhedaśabdādhyayāhārabhiyā bhedaśruteśceti paunaruktyabhiyā ca tacchabdasya cānantaroktaparamārthakatvādanyathā varṇayāñcakruḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9613: kimekādaśaiva vāgādaya indriyāṇyāho prāṇo 'pīti viśaye indrasyātmano liṅgamindriyaṃ, tathāca vāgādivatprāṇasyāpīndraliṅgamindriyāmiti vāgādivatprāṇo 'pīndriyamiti prāptam /
GSP33vacbhamu:9617: indraliṅgatā tu vyutpattimātranimittaṃ yathā gacchatīti gauriti /
GSP33vacbhamu:9621: tasmādrūḍhervāgādaya evendriyāṇi na prāṇa iti siddham /
GSP33vacbhamu:9625: sṛṣṭiṃ vidhāyopadiśyate-'seyaṃ devataikṣata hantāhamimāstisro devatā anena jīvenātmanānupraviśya nāmarūpe vyākaravāṇi tāsāṃ trivṛtaṃ trivṛtamekaikāṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:9628: niṣpannamiti punarīkṣāṃ kṛtavatī bahubhavanameva prayojanamuddiśya kathaṃ hantedānīmahamimā yathoktāsteja ādyāstisro devatāḥ pūrvasṛṣṭāvubhūtena saṃprati smaraṇasaṃnidhāpitena jīvena prāṇādharaṇakartrātmanānupraviśya buddhyādibhūtamātrāyāmadarśa iva mukhabimbaṃ toya iva candramaso bimbaṃ chāyāmātratayānupraviśya nāma ca rūpaṃ ca te vyākaravāṇi vispaṣṭaṃ karavāṇīdamasya nāmedaṃ ca rūpamiti /
GSP33vacbhamu:9629: tāsāṃ tisṛṇāṃ devatānāṃ trivṛtaṃ trivṛtaṃ tejo 'bannātmanā tryātmikāṃ tryātmikāmekaikāṃ devatāṃ karavāṇīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:9631: yadi jīvakartṛkaṃ tataḥ 'ākāśo ha vai nāma nāmarūpayornirvahitā'
GSP33vacbhamu:9634: tatra ḍitthaḍavitthādināmakaraṇe ca ghaṭapaṭādirūpakaraṇe ca jīvakartṛtvadarśanādihāpi trivṛtkaraṇe nāmarūpakaraṇe cāsti saṃbhāvanā jīvasya /
GSP33vacbhamu:9635: tathāca yogyatvādanena jīveneti vyākaravāṇīti pradhānakriyayā saṃbadhyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:9638: tasya tu kkacitsākṣādasaṃbhavātparamparāśrayaṇaṃ, sākṣātsaṃbhavaśca yogyatayā darśitaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9643: yadi punarasya sākṣātkartṛbhāvo bhavedanena jīvenetyanarthakaṃ syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:9645: prayojakakartustatsākṣātkartā karaṇaṃ bhavati pradhānakriyoddeśena prayojakena prayojyakarturvyāpanāt
GSP33vacbhamu:9646: tasmādatra jīvasya kartṛtvaṃ nāmarūpavyākaraṇe 'nyatra tu parameśvarasyeti virodhādanadhyavasāya iti prāptam /
GSP33vacbhamu:9647: evaṃ prāpta ucyate-parameśvarasyaivehāpi nāmarūpavyākartṛtvamupadiśyate na tu jīvasya, tasya pradhānakriyāsaṃbandhaṃ pratyayogyatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:9648: nanvanyatra ḍitthajavitthādināmaka4maṇi ghaṭaśarāvādirūpakarmaṇi ca kartṛtvadarśanādihāpi yogyatā saṃbhāvyata iti cet /
GSP33vacbhamu:9655: anupraviśya vyākaravāṇīti samānakartṛtve ktvaḥ smaraṇāt praveśanakarturjīvasyaiva vyākartṛtvamupadiśyate 'nyathā tu parameśvarasya vyākartṛtve jīvasya praveṣṭṛtve bhinnakartṛkatvena ktvaḥ prayogo
GSP33vacbhamu:9661: tathāhi-yo 'nnasyāṇiṣṭho bhāgastanmanastejasastu yo 'ṇiṣṭho bāgaḥ sa vāgityatra hi kāṇādānāṃ sāṃkhyānāṃ cāsti vipratipattiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9668: vāṅmanasa iti vaktavye māṃsādyabhidhānaṃ siddhena saha sādhyasyopanyāso dṛṣṭāntalābhāya /
GSP33vacbhamu:9669: yathā māṃsādi bhaumādyevaṃ vāṅmanase api taijasabhaume ityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9673: tasmādasati bādhake śrutirāñjasī nānyathā kathañcinnetumuciteti kañciddoṣamityuktaṃ taṃ doṣaṃ darśayannāha pūrvapakṣī- yadi sarvameva iti. //21 //
GSP33vacbhamu:9675: tribṛtkaraṇāviśeṣe 'pi yasya ca yatra bhūyastvaṃ tena tasya vyapadeśa ityarthaḥ //22 //
GSP33vacbhamu:9676: iti śrīmadvācaspatimiśraviracite śrīmadbhagavatpādaśārīrakabhāṣyavibhāge bhāmatyāṃ dvitīyasyādhyāyasya caturthaḥ pādaḥ //4 //
GSP33vacbhamu:9683: smṛtinyāyaśrutivirodhaparihāreṇa hi anadhyavasāyalakṣaṇamaprāmāṇyaṃ parihṛtaṃ tathāca niścalīkṛte tārtīyo vicāro bhavatyanyathā tu nirbījatayā na sidhyediti /
GSP33vacbhamu:9684: avāntarasaṃgatiṃ darśayitun tatra va jīvavyatiriktāni tattvāni
GSP33vacbhamu:9693: naca śrūyate tasmānna bhūtapariṣvakto raṃhasyapi tu karaṇamātrapariṣvaktaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:9698: iha hi kāyārambhaṇāmagnihotrāpūrvapariṇāmalakṣaṇaṃ śraddhāditvena pañcadhā pravibhajya dyuprabhṛtiṣvagniṣu hetavyatvenopāsanamuttaramārgapratipattisādhanaṃ vivakṣantyāha śrutiḥ-'asau vāva loko gautamāgniḥ' ityādi /
GSP33vacbhamu:9700: śraddhāpūrvamāhavanīyāgnisamiddhūmārciraṅgāravisphuliṅgabhāvite kartrādikārakabhāvite cāntarikṣaṃ krameṇotkrāmya dyulokaṃ praviśantyau sūkṣmabhūte dravadravyapayaḥprabhṛtyapsaṃbandhādapśabdavācye,
GSP33vacbhamu:9704: yathāgnihotrādhikaraṇamāhavanīya evaṃ śraddhaśabdavācyāgnihotrāhutipariṇāmāvasthārūpāḥ sūkṣmā yā āpaḥ śraddhābhāvitāstadadhikaraṇaṃ dyulokaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9706: tena hīddho 'sau dyuloko dīpyate 'taḥ samindhanātsamit tasyādityasya raśmayo dhūmā indhanādivādityādraśmīnāṃ samutthānāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:9712: parjanyo vāva gautamāgniḥ parjanyo nāma vṛṣṭyupakaraṇābhimānī devatāviśeṣaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9714: vāyunā hi parjanyo 'gniḥ samidhyate, purovātādiprābalye vṛṣṭidarśanāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:9721: tasmindevā yajamānaprāṇā agnirūpāḥ somaṃ rājānaṃ juhvati tasya somasyāhutervarṣaṃ bhavati
GSP33vacbhamu:9722: etaduktaṃ bhavati-śraddhākhyā āpo dyulokamāhutitvena praviśya candrākāreṇa pariṇatāḥ satyo dvitīye paryāye parjanyāgnau hutā vṛṣṭitvena pariṇamanta iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:9724: 'pṛthivī vāva gautamāgniḥ' tasya pṛthivyākhyasyāgnaiḥ saṃvatsara eva samit /
GSP33vacbhamu:9725: saṃvatsareṇa kālena hi samiddhā bhūmirvrīhyādiniṣpattaye kalpate /
GSP33vacbhamu:9727: rātrirarciḥ pṛthivyā śyāmāyā anurūpā śyāmatayā rātriragnerivānurupamarciḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:9728: diśoṅgārāḥ prage rātrirūpārciḥśamane upaśāntānāṃ prasannānāṃ diśāṃ darśanāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:9730: tasminnagnau śraddhāsomapariṇāmakrameṇāgatā apo vṛṣṭirūpeṇa pariṇatā devā juhvati tasyā āhuterannaṃ vrīhiyavādi bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:9732: vācā khalvayaṃ tālvādyaṣṭasthānasthitayā varṇapadavākyābhivyaktikrameṇārthajātaṃ prakāśayan samidhyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:9738: tā evāpaḥ śraddhādipariṇāmakrameṇāgatāḥ vrīhyādirūpeḥ pariṇatā satyaḥ puruṣe 'gnau hutāstāsāṃ pariṇāmo retaḥ saṃbhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:9739: yoṣā vāva gautamāgniḥ tasyā upastha eva samit /
GSP33vacbhamu:9740: tena hi sā putrādyutpādanāya samidhyate yadupamantrayate sa dhūmaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9741: strīsaṃbhavādupamantraṇasya lomāni vā dhūmaḥ yonirarciḥ lohitatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:9744: tasminnetasminnagnau devā reto juhvati tasyā āhutergarbhaḥ saṃbhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:9745: evaṃ śraddhāsomavarṣānnaretohavakrameṇa yoṣāgniṃ prāpyāpo garbhākhyā bhavanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:9747: yataḥ pañcamyāmāhutāvāpaḥ puruṣavacaso bhavanti tasmādadbhiḥ pariveṣṭito jīvo rahatīti gamyate
GSP33vacbhamu:9748: etaduktaṃ bhavati-śraddhāśabdavācyā āpa ityagre vakṣyati tāsāṃ trivṛtkatatayā tejo 'nnāvinābhāvenābgrahaṇena tejonnayorapi saṃgraha ityetadapi vakṣyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:9749: yadyapyetāvatāpi bhūtaveṣṭitasya jīvasya raṃhaṇaṃ nāvagamyate tejobannānāṃ pañcamyāmāhutau puruṣavacastvamātraśravaṇāt, tathāpīṣṭādikāriṇāṃ dhūmādinā pitṛyāṇena pathā candralokaprāptikathanaparayā 'ākāśāccandramasameṣa somo
GSP33vacbhamu:9750: rāṭ' iti śrutyā saha 'śraddhāṃ juhvati tasyā āhuteḥ somo rājā saṃbhavati'
GSP33vacbhamu:9752: tathāhi-yā evāpo hutā dvitīyasyāmāhutau somabhāvaṃ gatāstābhireṣa pariṣvakto jīva iṣṭādikārī candrabhūyaṃ gataścandralokaṃ prāpta iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:9753: nanu svatantrā āpaḥ śraddhādikrameṇa somabhāvamāpnuvantu tābhirapariṣvakta eva tu jīvaḥ sendriyamātro gatvā somabhāvamanubhavatu /
GSP33vacbhamu:9757: evaṃ hi śrutisāmānyaṃ kalpeta yadi yena rūpeṇa yena ca krameṇāpāṃ somabhāvastenaiva jīvasyāpi somabhāvo bhavet /
GSP33vacbhamu:9760: ato dadhipayaḥprabhṛtayo dravabhūyastvādāpo hutāḥ sūkṣmībhūtā iṣṭādikāriṇamāśritā nondhanena vidhinā dehe hūyamāne hutāḥ satya āhutimapya iṣṭādikāriṇaṃ pariveṣṭya svargaṃ lokaṃ nayantīti codayati- nanvanyā śrutiriti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:9761: ayamarthaḥ-evaṃ hi sūkṣmadehapariṣvakto raṃhet yadyasya sthūlaṃ śarīraṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:9768: paramātmaiva copādhikalpitāvacchedo jīva ityākhyāyate, tasya ca dehendriyāderupādheḥ pradeśikatvānna tatra san dehāntaraṃ gantumarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:9769: tasmātsūkṣmadehapariṣvakto raṃhatikarmopasthāpitaḥ pratipattavyaḥ prāptavyo yo dehastadviṣayāyā bhāvanāyā utpādanāyā dīrghībhāvamātraṃ jalūkayopamīyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:9773: ālayavijñānasaṃtāna ātmā tasya vṛttiḥ ṣaṭ pravṛttivijñānāni /
GSP33vacbhamu:9779: te hi śarīrātmavādino bhasmībhāvamātmana āhurna kasyacidgamanamiti //1 //
GSP33vacbhamu:9785: yastu gandhasvedapākaprāṇāvakāśadānadarśanāddehasya pāñcabhautikatvaṃ paśyaṃstejobannātmakatvena tryātmakatve na parituṣyati, taṃ pratyāha- punaśca tryātmaka iti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:9787: ato na sa deho bhūtāntarāṇi pratyākhyāya kevalābhiradbhirārabdhuṃ śakyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:9789: pṛthivīdhātuvarjamitarateja ādyapekṣayā kāryasya śarīrasya lohitādidravabhūyastvāttatkaraṇayoścopādānanimittayordravabhūyastvādapāṃ puruṣavacastvoktirna punarbhūtāntaranirāsārthā //2 //
GSP33vacbhamu:9791: prāṇānāṃ jīvaddehe sāśrayatvamavagataṃ gacchati jīvaddehe tadanuvidhāyinaḥ prāṇā api gacchantīti dṛṣṭam /
GSP33vacbhamu:9793: sa caiṣāmanuvidheyaḥ sūkṣmo deho bhūtendriyamaya iti gamyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:9796: śrāvite 'pi spaṣṭe jīvasya prāṇaiḥ saha gamane 'gnyādigatiśaṅkā
GSP33vacbhamu:9802: pañcamyāmāhutāvapāṃ puruṣavacastvaprakāre pṛṣṭe prathamāyāmāhutau anapāṃ śraddhāyā hetavyatābhidhānasaṃbhavaddhamanupapannaṃ ca /
GSP33vacbhamu:9803: nahi yathā paśvādibhyo hṛdayādayo 'vayavā avadāya niṣkṛṣya hūyante, evaṃ śraddhā buddhiprasādalakṣaṇā niṣkraṣṭuṃ vā hotuṃ vā śakyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:9809: agnihotre ṣaṭsūtkrāntigatipratiṣṭhātṛptipunarāvṛttilokapratyutthāyiṣvagnisamiddhūmārciraṅgāravisphuliṅgeṣu praśnāḥ ṣaṭ, teṣāṃ yaḥ samāhāraḥ ṣaṇṇāṃ sā ṣaṭpraśnī, tasyā nirūpaṇaṃ prativacanam //6 sūtrāntaramavatārayituṃ śaṅkate- kathaṃ punariti /
GSP33vacbhamu:9811: kriyāsamabhihāreṇāpyāyanāpakṣayau yathā somasya tathā bhakṣayanti somamayāṃllokānityarthaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:9812: ata uttaraṃ paṭhati- bhāktaṃ vānātmavisttvāttathāhi darśayati. /
GSP33vacbhamu:9815: devopājīvitāmātreṇa bhākto gamayitavyo na tu carvaṇanigaraṇābhyāṃ mukhya iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:9816: atraivārthe śrutyantaraṃ saṃgacchata ityāha- tathāhi darśayati. /
GSP33vacbhamu:9818: yathā hi balīvardādayo bhuñjanā api svaphalaṃ svāmino halādivahanenopakurvāṇā bhogyāḥ, evaṃ paramatattvamavidvāṃsa iṣṭādikāriṇa
GSP33vacbhamu:9819: iha dadhipayaḥpuroṭāśādināmuṣmiṃśca loke paricārakatayā devānāmupabhogyā iti śrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9822: yo hi pañcāgnividyāṃ na vedaṃ taṃ devā bhakṣayantīti nindyate pañcāgnividyāṃ stotuṃ tasyā eva prakṛtatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:9832: ca yatkiñceha karma kutaṃ tasyāntaṃ prāpyeti śravaṇāt, prāyaṇasya caikapraghaṭṭakena sakalakarmābhivyañjakatvāt
GSP33vacbhamu:9839: tathāca ramaṇīyacaraṇāḥ kapūyacaraṇā ityācārameva yoninimittamupadiśati na tu karma /
GSP33vacbhamu:9840: stāṃ vā karmaśīle dve apyaviśeṣeṇānuśayastathāpi yadyapyayamiṣṭāpūrtakārī svayaṃ niranuśaye bhuktabhogatvāttathāpi pitrādigatānuśayavaśāttadvipākān jātyāyurbhogaṃścandralokādavaruhyānubhaviṣyati smaryate hyanyasya sukṛtaduṣkṛtābhyāmanyasya
GSP33vacbhamu:9844: tasmādyāvatsaṃpātamityupakramānurodhāt 'yat kiñceha karoti' iti ca śrutyantarānusārādramaṇīyacaraṇatvaṃ saṃbandhyantaragatamiṣṭāpūrtakāriṇi bhāktaṃ gamayitavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:9845: tathāca niranuśayānāmeva bhuktabhogānāmavaroha iti prāpta ucyate-yena
GSP33vacbhamu:9846: karmakalāpena phalamupabhojitaṃ tasminnatīte 'pi sānuśayā eva candramaṇḍalādavarohanti
GSP33vacbhamu:9856: homaṃ vidhatte nāpi madhyāhnādāvapi tu sāyaṃprātaḥkālāpekṣayā /
GSP33vacbhamu:9863: nahi yāvantaḥ saṃpātā yāvatāṃ vā puṃsāṃ saṃpātāste sarve tatreṣṭādikāriṇā bhogena kṣayaṃ nīyante
GSP33vacbhamu:9868: api ceṣṭāpūrtakārīha janmani kevalaṃ na tanmātramakārṣīdapi tu godohanenāpaḥ praṇayan paśuphalamapyapūrvaṃ samacaiṣīt /
GSP33vacbhamu:9869: evamaharniśaṃ ca vāṅmanaḥ śarīraceṣṭābhiḥ puṇyāpuṇyamihāmutropabhogyaṃ saṃcitavato na martyalokādibhogyaṃ candraloke bhagyaṃ bhavitumarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:9870: naca svaphalavirodhino 'nuśayasya ṛte prayāścittādātmajñānādvādattaphalasya dhvaṃsaḥ saṃbhavati
GSP33vacbhamu:9873: anye tu sakalakarmakṣaye parāvṛttiśaṅkā nirbījeti manyamānā anyathādhikaraṇaṃ varṇayāñcakrurityāha- kecittāvadāhuti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:9877: tatreṣṭādīnāṃ bhogena samūlakāṣaṃ kaṣitatvānniranuśayā evānupabhuktakarmavaśādāvartanta iti prāpta ucyate-sānuśayā evāvartanta iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:9879: yathā bhāṇḍasthe madhuni sarpiṣi vā kṣālite 'pi bhāṇḍalepakaṃ taccheṣaṃ madhu vā sarpirvā na kṣālayituṃ śakyamiti dṛṣṭamevaṃ tadanusārādetadapi pratipattavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:9881: yathā sevako hāstikāśvīyapadātivrātaparivṛto mahārājaṃ sevamānaḥ kālavaśācchatrapādukāvaśeṣo na sevitumarhatīti dṛṣṭaṃ tanmūlā ca laukikī smṛtiriti dṛṣṭasmṛtibhyāṃ sānuśayā evāvartanta iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:9890: iha janmani hi paryāyeṇa sukhaduḥkhe bhujyamāne dṛśyete /
GSP33vacbhamu:9895: na cābhivyaktaṃ ca karma phalaṃ na datta iti ca saṃbhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:9897: apica prāṇasyābhivyañjakatve svargarakatatiryagyonigatānāṃ jantūnāṃ tasmiñjanmani karmasvanadhikārānnāpūrvakarmopajanaḥ pūrvakṛtasya kramāśyasya prāyaṇābhivyaktatayā phalopabhogena prakṣayānnāsti teṣāṃ karmāśya iti na te saṃsareyuḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9899: kiñca svasamavetameva prāyamenābhivyajyate 'pūrvaṃ na parasamavetaṃ, yena pitrādigatena karmaṇā varteranniti /
GSP33vacbhamu:9902: anena niranuśayā evāvarohantīti pūrvapakṣabījaṃ nigūḍhamuddhāṭya nirasyati
GSP33vacbhamu:9907: tathāca ramaṇīyacaraṇāḥ kapūyacaraṇā ityanenānuśayopalakṣaṇātsiddhaṃ sānuśayānāmevāvarohaṇamiti ānarthakyamiti cenna tadapekṣatvāt. /
GSP33vacbhamu:9908: 'ācārahīnaṃ na punaranti vedāḥ' iti hi smṛtyā vedapadena vedārthamupalakṣayantyā vedārthānuṣṭhānaśeṣatvamācārasyoktaṃ na tu svatantra ācāraḥ phalasya sādhanaṃ, tena vedārthānuṣṭhānopakārakatayācārasya nānarthakyaṃ kratvarthasya /
GSP33vacbhamu:9912: bādaristu mukhya eva caraṇaśabdaḥ karmaṇītyāha- sukṛtaduṣkṛte eveti tu
GSP33vacbhamu:9917: 'ye vai ke cāsmāllokātprayanti candramasameva te sarve gacchanti' iti kauṣītakināṃ samāmnānāt, dehārambhasya ca candralokagamanamantareṇānupapatteḥ pañcamyāmāhutāvityāhitisaṃkhyāniyamāt tathāhi-dyusomavṛṣṭyannaretaḥpariṇāmakrameṇa tā evāpo yoṣidagnau hutāḥ puruṣavacaso bhavantītyaviśeṣeṇa śrutam /
GSP33vacbhamu:9920: pathyantarasyāśruteḥ, 'jāyasva mriyasveti tṛtīyaṃ sthānam' iti ca sthānatvamātreṇāvagamātpathitvenāpratīteścandralokādavatīrṇānāmapi ca tatsthānatvasaṃbhavādasaṃpūreṇa prativacanopapatteḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:9921: ananyamārgatayā ca tadbhogavirahiṇāmapi grāmaṃ gacchan vṛkṣamūlānyupasarpatītivatsaṃyamanādiṣu yamavaśyatāyai candralokagamanopapatteḥ, 'na katareṇavacana'
GSP33vacbhamu:9924: sthānatayāvagatasya na mārgatvaṃ tathāpi vettha yathāsau mārgo na saṃpūryate ityasya prativacanāvasare mārgadvayaniṣedhapūrvaṃ tṛtīyaṃ sthānamabhivadannasaṃpūraṇāya tatpratipakṣamācakṣīta /
GSP33vacbhamu:9925: yadi punastenaiva mārgeṇāgatya janmamaraṇaprabandhavat sthānamadhyāsīta naitattṛtīyaṃ sthānaṃ bhavet /
GSP33vacbhamu:9926: nahīṣṭādikāriṇaścandramaṇḍalādavaruhya ramaṇīyaṃ ninditāṃ vā yoniṃ pratipadyamānāstṛtīyaṃ sthānaṃ pratipadyante /
GSP33vacbhamu:9929: tadyadi kṣudrajantavo 'pyanenaiva pathāvaroheyuḥ, naitadeṣāṃ janmamaraṇaprabandhavattṛtīyaṃ sthānaṃ bhavet /
GSP33vacbhamu:9930: tato 'vagacchāmaḥ saṃyamanaṃ sapta ca yātanābhūmīryamavaśatayā pratipadyamānā aniṣṭādikāriṇo na candramaṇḍalādavarohantīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:9931: tasmāt 'ye vai ke ca' itīṣṭādikāriviṣayaṃ na sarvaviṣayam /
GSP33vacbhamu:9940: yadyapi yathetamākāśamākāśādvāyumityato na tādātmyaṃ sphuṭamavagamyate tathāpi vāyurbhūtvetyādeḥ sphuṭataraṃ tādātmyāvagamādyathetamākāśamityetadapi tādātmya evāvatiṣṭhate /
GSP33vacbhamu:9942: manuṣyaśarīrasya nandikeśvarasya devadeharūpapariṇāmasmaraṇāddevadehasya ca nahuṣasya tiryaktvasmaraṇāt
GSP33vacbhamu:9944: gauṇyāṃ ca vṛttau lakṣaṇāśabdaḥ prayukto guṇe lakṣaṇāyāḥ saṃbhavāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:9947: samāno bhāvo rūpaṃ yeṣāṃ te sabhāvāsteṣāṃ bhāvaḥ sābhāvyaṃ sārūpyaṃ sādṛśyamiti yāvat /
GSP33vacbhamu:9949: etadeva vyatirekamukhena vyācaṣṭe- nahyanyasyānyabhāvo mukhya upapadyate. /
GSP33vacbhamu:9952: yadi tu devājagaśarīre samasamaye syātāṃ na devaśarīramajagaraśarīraṃ śilpiśatenāpi kriyate
GSP33vacbhamu:9953: nahi dadhipayasī samasamaye parasparātmanī śakye saṃpādayituṃ, tathehāpi sūkṣmaśarīrākāśayoryugapadbhāvānna parasparātmatvaṃ bhavitumarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:9956: nanvākāśabhāvena saṃyogamātraṃ lakṣyatāṃ kiṃ sādṛśyenetyata āha- vibhutvāccākāśeneti. //22 //
GSP33vacbhamu:9958: 'durniṣprapataram' iti duḥkhena niḥsaraṇaṃ brūte na tu vilambeneti manyate pūrvapakṣī /
GSP33vacbhamu:9959: vinā sthūlaśarīraṃ na sūkṣmaśarīre duḥkhabhāgīti durniṣprapataraṃ vilambaṃ lakṣayatīti rāddhāntaḥ anyādhiṣṭhiteṣu pūrvavadabhilāpāt. /
GSP33vacbhamu:9960: ākāśasārūpyaṃ vāyudhūmādisaṃparko 'nuśayināmukta ihedānīṃ vrīhiyavā oṣādhivanaspatayastilamāṣā iti jāyanta iti śrūyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:9963: tatra manuṣyo jāyate devo jāyata ityādau prayoge janeḥ śarīraparigrahe prasiddhatvādatrāpi vrīhyādiśarīraparigraha eva janirmukhyārtha iti vrīhyādiśarīrā evānuśayina iti yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:9964: naca ramaṇīyacaraṇāḥ kapūyacaraṇā itivat karmaviśeṣāsaṃkīrtanāmāttadabhāve vrīhyādīnāṃ śarīrabhāvābhāvātkṣetrajñānantarādhiṣṭhitānāmeva yatsaṃparkamātramiti sāṃpratam /
GSP33vacbhamu:9968: sāmānyaśāstrasya hiṃsāmānyadvāreṇa viśeṣopasarpaṇaṃ vilambeneti sākṣādviśeṣaspṛśaḥ śāstracchīghratarapravṛttāddurbalatvāditi sāṃpratam /
GSP33vacbhamu:9969: nahi balavadityeva durbalaṃ bādhate kintu sati virodhe /
GSP33vacbhamu:9971: 'agnīṣomīyaṃ paśumālabhet ' iti hi kratuprakaraṇe samāmnātaṃ kratvarthatāmasya gamayati na tvapanayati niṣedhāpāditāmasya puruṣaṃ pratyanarthahetutām /
GSP33vacbhamu:9972: tenāstu niṣedhādasya puruṣaṃ pratyanarthahetutā vidheścha kratvarthatā ko virodhaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9974: na kratostatra vaiguṇyaṃ yathā coditasiddhitaḥ' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:9975: tasmājjanermukhyārthatvādvrīhyādiśarīrā anuśayino jāyanta iti prāpte 'bhidhīyate-bhavedetadevaṃ yadi ramaṇīyacaraṇāḥ kapūyacaraṇā
GSP33vacbhamu:9979: naca tadgataiyaiḥ paśuhiṃsāyā 'na hiṃsyāt' iti niṣedātkratvarthāyā api
GSP33vacbhamu:9982: tathāhi-na hiṃsyāditi niṣedhasya niṣedhyādhīnanirūpaṇatayā yadarthaṃ niṣedhyaṃ tadartha eva niṣedho vijñāyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:9983: na caitat 'nānṛtaṃ vadet' 'na tau paśau karoti' itivatkasyacitprakaraṇe samāmnātaṃ yenānṛtatavadanavadasya niṣedhasya kratvarthate niṣedho 'pi
GSP33vacbhamu:9985: paśau niṣiddhayorājyabhāgayoḥ kratvarthatvena niṣedhasyāpi kratvarthatvaṃ bhavet /
GSP33vacbhamu:9987: tasmādanārabhyādhītena na hiṃsyādityanenābhihitasya vidhyupahitasya puruṣavyāpārasya vidhivibhaktivirodhātprakṛtyarthahiṃsākarmabhāvyatparityāgena puruṣārtha eva bhāvyo 'vatiṣṭhate /
GSP33vacbhamu:9989: kevalaṃ tasya rāgataḥ prāptatvāttadanuvādena nañarthaṃ vidhirupasaṃkrāmati, tena puruṣārtho niṣedhya iti tadadhīnanirūpaṇo niṣedho 'pi puruṣārtho bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:9990: tathā cāyamarthaḥ saṃpadyate-yatpuruṣārthaṃ hananaṃ tanna kuryāditi /
GSP33vacbhamu:9991: kratvarthasyāpi na niṣedhe hiṃsāyāḥ kratūpakārakatvamapi kalpyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:9992: naca dṛṣṭe puruṣokārakatve pratyarthini sati tatkalpanāspadam /
GSP33vacbhamu:9993: naca svātantryapāratantrye sati saṃyogapṛthaktve svādiratādivadekatra saṃbhavataḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9994: tasmātpuruṣārthapratiṣedho na kratvarthamapyāskandatīti śuddhasukhaphalatvameveṣṭādīnāṃ na sthāvaśarīropabhogyaduḥkhaphalatvamapīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:9999: vrīhyādibhāvamāpannāḥ khalvanuśayinaḥ puruṣairupabhuktā retaḥ sigbhāvamanubhavantī śrūyate
GSP33vacbhamu:10001: vrīhyādidehatve hi vrīhyādiṣu lūneṣvavahantinā phalīkṛteṣu ca vrīhyādidehavināśādanuśayinaḥ pravaseyuriti kathamanuśayināṃ retaḥsigbhāvaḥ saṃsargamātre tu saṃsargiṣu vrīhyādiṣu naṣṭeṣvapi na saṃsargiṇo 'nuśayinaḥ pravaseyuriti retaḥsigbhāva upapadyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:10004: sadyo jāto hi bālo na retaḥ sigbhavatyapi tu cirajātaḥ prauḍhayauvanaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:10006: tatkimidānīṃ sarvatraivānuśayināṃ saṃsargamātraṃ tathāca ramaṇīyacaraṇā ityādiṣu tathābhāva āpadyeteti netyāha- yoneḥ śarīram. /
GSP33vacbhamu:10008: iti śrīvācaspatimiśraviracite śārīkamīmāṃsābhāṣyavibhāge bhāmatyāṃ tṛtīyasyādhyāyasya prathamaḥ pādaḥ //
GSP33vacbhamu:10009: iti tṛtīyādhyāyasya gatyāgaticintayā vairāgyanirūpaṇākhyaḥ prathamaḥ pādaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:10010: tṛtīyādhyāye dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ. saṃdhye sṛṣṭirāha hi. //1 //
GSP33vacbhamu:10011: idānīṃ tu tasyaiva jīvasyāvasthābhedaḥ svayañjyotiṣṭvasiddhyartha prapañcayate- kiṃ prabodha iva svapne 'pi pāramārthikī
GSP33vacbhamu:10013: yadyapi brahmaṇo 'nyasyānirvācyatayā jāgratsvapnāvasthāgatayorubhayorapi sargayormāyamayatvaṃ tathāpi yathā jāgratsṛṣṭirbrahmātmabhāvasākṣātkārātprāganuvartate /
GSP33vacbhamu:10015: evaṃ kiṃ svapnasṛṣṭirāhosvit pratidinameva nivartata iti vimarśārthaḥ //
GSP33vacbhamu:10021: ayamabhisaṃdhiḥ-iha hi sarvāṇyeva mithyājñānānyudāharaṇaṃ teṣāṃ satyatvaṃ pratijñāyate
GSP33vacbhamu:10025: atathātvasya tvapratīyamānasya tathābhāvaprameyavirodhena kalpanāspadatvāt bādhakapratyayādatathātvamiti cet /
GSP33vacbhamu:10031: yathāhi kṣīraṃ dṛṣṭaṃ kālāntare dadhi bhavati, evaṃ rajataṃ dṛṣṭaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:10034: yadyasya tīvrātapaklāntisahitaṃ cakṣuḥ sa tasya rajatarūpatāṃ gṛhṇāti /
GSP33vacbhamu:10035: yasya tu kevalamālokamātropakṛtaṃ, sa tasyaiva śuktirūpatāṃ gṛhṇāti /
GSP33vacbhamu:10036: evamutpalamapi nīlalohitaṃ divā saurībhirbhābhirabhivyaktaṃ nīlatayā gṛhyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:10038: evamasatyāṃ nidrāyāṃ sato 'pi rathādīnna gṛhṇāti nidrāṇastu gṛhṇātīti sāmagrībhedādvā kālabhedādvā virodhābhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10045: imamarthaṃ śrutirapi darśayati-'atha rathān rathayogān pathaḥ sṛjate' iti
GSP33vacbhamu:10046: naca 'na tatra rathā na rathayogā na canthāno bhavanti' iti virodhādupacaritārthāṃ sṛjata iti śrutirvyākhyeyā /
GSP33vacbhamu:10047: sṛjata iti hi śruterbahuśrutisaṃvādātpramāṇāntarasaṃvādācca balīyastvena tadanuguṇatayā na tatra rathā ityasyā bhāktatvena vyākhyānāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:10048: jāgradavasthādarśanayogyā na santi na tu rathā na santīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:10055: tadyathā svapne śuklāmbaradharaḥ śuklamālyānulepano brāhmaṇāyanaḥ priyavrataṃ pratyāha-priyavrata, pañcame 'hani
GSP33vacbhamu:10057: sa ca jāgrattathātmano mānamanubhūya svapnapratyayaṃ satyamabhimanyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:10059: iti prāpte ucyate- māyāmātraṃ tu kātsnaryenānabhivyaktasvarūpatvāt. /
GSP33vacbhamu:10061: na tāvat kṣīrasyeva dadhi rajatasya pariṇāmaḥ śuktiḥ saṃbhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:10062: nahi jātvīśvaragṛhe cirasthitānyapi rajatabhājanāni śuktibhāvamanubhavanti dṛśyante /
GSP33vacbhamu:10063: na cetarasya rajatānubhavasamaye 'nyo 'nākulendriyo na tasya śuktibhāvamanubhavati pratyeti ca /
GSP33vacbhamu:10066: pāramārthike hāsya toyabhāve tatsādhyāmudānyopaśamalakṣaṇārthakriyāṃ kuryānmarīcisādhyāmapi rūpaprakāśalakṣaṇām /
GSP33vacbhamu:10069: tadarthakriyākāritvavyāptaṃ toyatvaṃ mātrayāpi tāmakurvattoyameva na syāt
GSP33vacbhamu:10072: tathāhi-asamarthavidhāpāti toyametaditi manvāno na tṛṣṇayāpi marīcitoyamabhidhāvet yathā marīcīnanubhavan
GSP33vacbhamu:10074: kimaparāddhaṃ marīciṣu toyaviparyāsena sarvajanīnena yattamatilaṅghya viparyāsāntaraṃ kalpyate
GSP33vacbhamu:10076: tatrāpi rajatajñānaṃ pūrvamutpannaṃ bādhyamuttaraṃ tu bādhakaṃ śuktijñānaṃ prāptipūrvakatvātpratiṣedhasya
GSP33vacbhamu:10077: rajatajñānātprākprāpakābhāvena śukteraprāptāyāḥ pratiṣedhasaṃbhavātpūrvajñānaprāptaṃ tu rajataṃ śuktijñānamapabadhitumarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:10081: naca vartamānarajatāvabhāsi jñānaṃ bhaviṣyattāmasyāgocarayanna bhaviṣyatā svasamayavartinīṃ śuktiṃ gocarayatā pratyayena bādhyate, kālabhedena virodhābhāvāditi yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:10082: mā nāmāsya jñāsītpratyakṣaṃ bhaviṣyattāṃ tatpṛṣṭhabhāvi tvanumānamupakārabhāvahetumivāsati vināśapratyayopanipāte sthemānamākalayati /
GSP33vacbhamu:10084: tathāca rajatagocaraṃ pratyakṣaṃ vastutaḥ sthirameva rajataṃ gocarayet /
GSP33vacbhamu:10085: tathāca bhaviṣyacchuktikājñānakālaṃ, rajataṃ vyāpnuyāditi virodhācchuktijñānena bādhyate
GSP33vacbhamu:10091: yadi cirasthāyitvaṃ yogyatā na sā pratyakṣagocaraḥ śakteratīndriyatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:10092: atha kālāntaravyāpitvaṃ, tadapyayuktaṃ, kālāntareṇa bhaviṣyatendriyasya saṃyogāyogāttadupahitasīmno vyāpitvasyātīndriyatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:10094: tasmādatyantābhyāsavaśena pratyakṣānantaraṃ śīgratarotpannavinaśyadavasthānumānasahitapratyakṣābhiprāyemeva cirasthāyīti gṛhyata iti mantavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:10100: yattu satyaṃ svapnadarśanamuktaṃ tatrāpyākhyātrā brāhmaṇāyanenākhyāte saṃvādābhāvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:10102: tādṛśasyaiva bahulaṃ visaṃvādadarśadarśitaśca visaṃvādo bhāṣyakṛtā kātsnryenānabhivyaktiṃ vivṛṇvatā /
GSP33vacbhamu:10104: rajanīsamaye 'pi hi bhāratādvarṣāntare ketumālādau vāsaro bhavatīti bhārate varṣa ityuktam sūcakaśca hi śruterācakṣate ca tadvidaḥ. /
GSP33vacbhamu:10110: prājñavyāpāratvena pāramārthikatvānumānaṃ pratyakṣeṇa bādhakapratyayena virudhyamānaṃ nātmānaṃ labhata iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10116: iha hi nāḍīpuritatparamātmāno jīvasya suṣuptāvasthāyāṃ sthānatvena śrūyante /
GSP33vacbhamu:10120: yadā nāḍyo vā purītadvā suṣuptasthānaṃ tadā viparītagrahaṇanivṛttāvapi na jīvasya paramātmabhāva iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:10121: avidyānivṛttāvapi jīvasya paramātmabhāvāya kāraṇāntaramapekṣitavyaṃ tacca karmaiva na tu tattajñānaṃ viparītajñānanivṛttimātreṇa tasyopayogāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:10125: ata tu paramātmaiva nāḍīpurītasmṛtidvārā suṣuptisthānaṃ tato viparītajñānanivṛtterasti mātrayā paramātmabhāva upayogaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10126: tayā hi tāvadeṣa jīvastadavasthāno bhavati kevalam /
GSP33vacbhamu:10127: tattvajñānābhāvena samūlakāṣamavidyāyā akāṣājjāgratsvapnalakṣaṇaṃ jīvasya vyutthānaṃ bhavati
GSP33vacbhamu:10129: kiṃ tāvaprāptaṃ, nāḍīpurītatparamātmasu sthāneṣu suṣuptasya jīvasya nilayaṃ prati vikalpaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:10130: yathā bahuṣu prāsādeṣveko narendraḥ kadācitkkacinnilīyate kadācitkkacidevameko jīvaḥ kadācinnāḍīṣu kadācitpurītati kadācidbrahmaṇīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:10131: yathā nirapekṣā vrīhiyavāḥ kratusādhanībhūtapuroḍāśaprakṛtitayā śrutā ekārthā vikalpyante, evaṃ saptamīśrutyā vāyatanaśrutyā vekanilayanārthāḥ parasparānapekṣā nāḍyadayo 'pi vikalpamarhanti yatrāpi nāḍībhiḥ pratyavasṛpya purītati śeta iti nāḍība3hmaṇorādhārayoḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:10133: prāṇaśabdaṃ ca brahma 'athāsmin prāṇe brahmaṇi sa jīva ekadhā bhavati'
GSP33vacbhamu:10137: evaṃ tābhireva saṃcaramāṇasya kadācidbrahmaivādhāra iti siddhamādhāratve nāḍīpurītatparamātmanāmanapekṣatvam
GSP33vacbhamu:10139: prāpte 'bhidhīyate-jīvaḥ samuccayenaivaitāni nāḍyādīni svāpāyopaiti na vikalpena /
GSP33vacbhamu:10143: vikalpa āśritastatra gatiranyā na vidyate' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:10144: prakṛtakratusādhanībhūtapuroḍāśadravyaprakṛtitayā hi parasparānapekṣau vrīhiyavau vihitauśakrutaścaitau pratyekaṃ puroḍāśamabhinirvartayitum /
GSP33vacbhamu:10148: sa hi yathā vihitānyaṅgānyabhisamīkṣya pravartamāno naitānyanyathayitaṃ śakroti /
GSP33vacbhamu:10150: na cāṅgānurodhena pradhānābhyāso 'gosave ubhe kuryāt' itivadyuktaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10152: na cāṅgabhūtaindravāyavādigrahānurodhena yathā pradhānasya somayāgasyāvṛttirevamatrāpīti yuktam
GSP33vacbhamu:10156: grahaṇāni pṛthakprakalpanāni saṃskārā vidhīyante, natu somayāgoddeśenendravāyvādayo devatāścodyante, yena tāsāṃ yāganiṣpattilakṣaṇaikārthatvena vikalpaḥ syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:10159: naca yāvanmātramekamūrdhvapātraṃ vyāpnoti tāvanmātraṃ gṛhītvā pariśaṣṭaṃ tyajyeteti yujyate
GSP33vacbhamu:10161: evaṃ taddṛṣṭārthaṃ bhavedyadi tatsarvaṃ yāga upayujyeta /
GSP33vacbhamu:10163: tasmātsakalasya somarasasya yāgaśeṣatvena saṃskārārhatvādekaikena ca grahamena sakalasya saṃskartṛmaśakyatvāttadavayavasyaikena
GSP33vacbhamu:10165: ata eva samuccayadarśanaṃ 'daśautānadhvaryuḥ prātaḥ savane grahan gṛhṇāti' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:10170: teṣāṃ ca samuccaye sati yāvadyaduddeśena gṛhītaṃ tāvattasyai devatāyai tyaktavyamityarthādyāgasyāvṛttyā bhavativyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:10171: yadi punaḥ pṛthakkṛtānyapyekīkṛtya kāñcana devatāmuddiśya tyajeran,
GSP33vacbhamu:10175: iha tvabhyāsakalpanāpramāṇābhāvātpuroḍāśadravyasya cāniyamena prakṛtidravye yasminkasmiṃścitprāpte ekaikā parasparānapekṣā vrīhiśrutiryavaśrutiśca niyāmikaikārtatayā vikalpamarhataḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10180: sā coktā bhāṣyakṛtā- yatrāpi nirapekṣā iva nāḍīḥ. suptisthānatvena śrāvayatītyādinā. /
GSP33vacbhamu:10183: nanu yadi brahmaiva nilayanasthānaṃ tāvanmātramucyatāṃ kṛtaṃ nāḍyupanyāsenetyata āha- apicātreti. apiceti /
GSP33vacbhamu:10187: pittenābhivyāptakaraṇo na bāhyānviṣayānvedeti taddvārā sukhaduḥkhābhāvena tatkāraṇapāṣmāsparśena nāḍīstutiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10188: yadā tu tejo brahma tadā sugamam /
GSP33vacbhamu:10189: apica nāḍyaḥ purītadvā jīvasyopādhyādhāra eva bhavatīti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:10192: tathāhi-nāḍyaḥ purītadvā jīvasyopādhīnāṃ karaṇānāmāśrayo jīvastu brāhmāvyatirekātsvamahipratiṣṭhaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:10194: vikalpa tu vyatirekaṃ brahmaṇa ādhāratvamucyate jīvaṃ prati /
GSP33vacbhamu:10195: tathāca suṣuptāvasthāyāmupādhīnāmasamudācārājjīvasya brahmātmatvameva brahmādhāratvaṃ na tu nāḍīpurītādhāratvam /
GSP33vacbhamu:10196: tadupādhikaraṇamātrādhāratayā tu suṣuptadaśārambhāya jīvasya nāḍīpurītadādhāratvamityatulyārthatayā na vikalpa iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:10202: na ceyamātmatādātmyaṃ vinā nāḍyādiṣu paramātmavyatirikteṣu sthāneṣūpapadyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:10203: tatra hi sthito 'yaṃ jīva ātmavyatirekābhimānī sannavaśyaṃ viśeṣajñānavān bhavet /
GSP33vacbhamu:10204: tathāhi śrutiḥ-'yatra vā anyadiva syāttatrānye 'nyatpaśyet' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:10206: 'yatra tvasya sarvamātmaivābhūtatkena kaṃ paśyedvijānīyāt' iti śruteḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10213: aupādhike tu paricchede yatropādhisaṃnihitastanmātraṃ na jānīyānna tu sarvam /
GSP33vacbhamu:10215: tasmātsarvaviśeṣavijñānapratyastamayīṃ suṣuptiṃ na samapradhānatayāganyedivaditi vadanvikalpamapyapākaroti- naca
GSP33vacbhamu:10218: naca suṣuptāvasthāyāṃ jīvasya svarūpeṇa nāḍyādisthānatvapratipādena kiñcitprayojanaṃ brahmabhūyapratipādena tvasti /
GSP33vacbhamu:10219: tasmānna samapradhānabhāvena samuccayo nāpi vikalpa iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10224: sa vānyo veti īśvaro veti saṃbhavamātreṇopanyāsaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10227: yadvi dvyahādinirvartanīyamekasya puṃsaścoditaṃ karma tasya pūrvedyuranuṣṭhitasyāsti smṛtiriti vakyavye 'nuḥ pratyabhijñānasūcanārthaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:10231: jīvaḥ pratinyāyaṃ saṃprasāde suṣuptāvasthāyāṃ buddhāntāyādravati āgacchati pratiyoni /
GSP33vacbhamu:10232: yohi vyāghrayoniḥ suṣupto buddhāntamāgacchan sa vyāghra eva bhavati na jātyantaram /
GSP33vacbhamu:10233: tadidamuktam- na iha vyāghro vā siṃho veti /
GSP33vacbhamu:10235: yo hi jīvaḥ suptaḥ sa śarīrāntaraṃ uttiṣṭhati śarīrāntaragatastu suptajīvasaṃbandhini śarīra uttiṣṭhati, tataśca na śarīrāntare
GSP33vacbhamu:10237: apica na jīvo nāma kaścitparasmādanya iti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:10241: evamanādyanirvacanīyāvidyopadhānabhedopādhikalpito jīvo na vastutaḥ paramātmano bhidyate tadupādyudbhavābhibhavābhyāṃ codbhūta ivābhibhūta iva pratīyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:10242: tataśca suṣuptādāvapi abhibhūta iva jāgradavasthādiṣudbhūta iva /
GSP33vacbhamu:10243: tasya cāvidyātadvāsanopādheranāditayā kāryakāraṇabhāvena pravahataḥ suvivecatayā tadupahito jīvaḥ suviveca iti //9 //
GSP33vacbhamu:10248: tadyathā kaścitsuptotthitaḥ prāha sukhamahamasvāpsaṃ laghūni me gātrāṇi prasannaṃ me mana iti, kaścitpunarduḥkhasamasvāpsaṃ gurūṇi me gātrāṇi bhramatyanavasthitaṃ me mana iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:10252: evaṃ prāpta ucyate-yadyapi viśeṣavijñānopaśamena mohasuṣuptayoḥ sāmyaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:10255: bāhyendriyavyāpārabhāvābhāvābhyāṃ tu bhede tayoḥ suṣuptamohayorapi prayojanabhedātkāraṇabhedāllakṣaṇabhedācca bhedaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10258: yadyapi satyapi mohe na maraṇaṃ tathāpyasati mohe na maraṇamiti maraṇārtho mohaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10259: musalasaṃpātādinimittatvānmohasya śramādinimittatvācca suṣuptasya sukhanetrādivikāralakṣaṇatvānmohasya prasannavadanatvādilakṣaṇabhedācca suṣuptasyāsuṣuptasya tvavāntarabhede 'pi
GSP33vacbhamu:10261: tasmāt suṣuptamohāvasthayorbrahmaṇā saṃpattāvapi suṣupte yādṛśī saṃpattirna tādṛśī moha ityardhasaṃpattiruktā
GSP33vacbhamu:10267: yadyapi 'tadananyatvamārambhaṇaśabdādibhyaḥ' ityatra niṣprapañcameva brahmopapāditaṃ tathāpi prapañcaliṅgānāṃ bahvīnāṃ śrutīnāṃ darśanādbhavati
GSP33vacbhamu:10275: tasmādubhayaliṅgakaśāstraprāmāṇyādubhayarūpatā brahmaṇaḥ pāramārthikīti prāpta ucyate-na sthānata upādhito 'pi parasya brahmaṇa ubhayacihnatvasaṃbhavaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10277: pāramārthikatve hyupādhijanitasya rūpasya brahmaṇaḥ pariṇāmo bhavet /
GSP33vacbhamu:10279: tatpāriśeṣyātsphaṭikamaṇeriva svabhāvasvacchaghavalasya lākṣārasavasekopādhirūpaṇimā sarvagandhatvādiraupādhiko brahmaṇyadhyasya iti paśyāmo nirviśeṣatāpratipādanārthatvācchutīnām /
GSP33vacbhamu:10290: kiṃ sāllakṣaṇaṃ ca prakāśalakṣaṇaṃ ca brahma kiṃ sallakṣaṇameva brahmeti prakāśalakṣaṇameveti tatra pūrvapakṣaṃ gṛhṇāti- prakāśavaccāvaiyarthyāt. /
GSP33vacbhamu:10293: brahmaṇi sacchuteḥ siddhāntayati- āha ca tanmātram. /
GSP33vacbhamu:10295: nahi sattvaṃ nāma prakāśarūpādanyat, yathā sarvagandhatvādayo 'pi tu prakāśarūpameva saditi nobhayarūpatvaṃ brahmaṇa ityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10298: bhede na sthānato 'pīti nirākṛtamiti nādhikaraṇāntaraṃ prayojayati /
GSP33vacbhamu:10300: sarveṣāṃ ca sādhāraṇe pravilayārthatve sati 'arūpavadeva hi
GSP33vacbhamu:10302: evaṃ hi tasyāvakāśaḥ syādyāda kāścidupāsanāparatayā rūpamācakṣīran kāścinnīrūpabrahmapratipādanaparā bhaveyuḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10303: sarvāsāṃ tu pravilayārthatvena nīrūpabrahmapratipādanārthatve ukto vinigamanaheturna syādityarthaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:10308: vāstavasya vā prapañcasya pravilayaḥ sarpiṣa ivāgnisaṃyogāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:10310: na tāvadvāstavaḥ sarvasādhāraṇaḥ pṛthivyādiprapañcaḥ puruṣamātreṇa śakyaḥ samucchettum /
GSP33vacbhamu:10311: apica prahlādaśukādibhiḥ puruṣadhaureyaiḥ samūlamunmūlitaḥ prapañca iti śūnyaṃ jagadbhavet
GSP33vacbhamu:10314: samāropitarūpastu prapañco brahmatattvajñāpanaparaireva vākyairbrahmatattvamavabodhayadbhiḥ śakyaḥ samucchettumiti kṛtamatra vidhinā /
GSP33vacbhamu:10315: nahi vidhiśatenāpi vinā tattvāvabodhanaṃ pravartasvātmajñāna iti vā kuru prapañcapravilayaṃ veti pravartitaḥ śaknoti prapañcapravilayaṃ kartum /
GSP33vacbhamu:10316: na cāsyātmajñānavidhiṃ vinā vedāntārthabrahmatattvāvabodho na bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:10317: maulikasya svādhyāyādhyayanavirodhereva vivakṣitārthatayā sakalasya vedarāśeḥ phalavadarthāvabodhanaparatāmāpādayato vidyamānatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:10321: tasmāt 'jartilayavāgvā juhuyāt' itivadvidhisarūpā ete 'ātmā vā are draṣṭavya' ityādayo na tu vidhaya iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:10322: tadidamuktam- draṣṭavyādiśabdā api tattvābhimudhīkaraṇapradhānā na tattvāvabodhavidhipradhānā iti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:10323: apica brahmatattvaṃ niṣprapañcamuktaṃ na tatra niyojyaḥ kaścitsaṃbhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:10324: jīvo hi niyojyo bhavet, sa cetprapañcapakṣe vartate ko niyojyastasyocchinnatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:10334: naca tacchakyaṃ vāpi yuktamityāha- naca pramāṇāntareṇeti /
GSP33vacbhamu:10337: athaitacchāstramaniyojyabrahmātmatvaṃ ca jīvasya pratipādayati jīvaṃ ca niyuktaṃ tato dvyarthaṃ ca viruddhārtha ca syādityāha- atheti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:10340: nahi tadvākyaṃ tasya niyojyatāmāhāpi tu laukikapramāṇasiddhāṃ niyojyatāmāśritya darśapūrṇamāsau vidhatte /
GSP33vacbhamu:10341: idaṃ tu niyojyatāmapanayati ca niyuṅkte ceti durghaṭamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10343: paurvāparyālocanayā vedāntānāṃ tattvaniṣṭhatā śrutā na śrutā niyoganiṣṭhatetyarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10350: prakṛtaitāvattvaṃ hi pratiṣedhati tato vravīti ca bhūyaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10352: dve eva brahmaṇo rūpe brahmaṇaḥ paramārthato 'rūpasyādhyāropite dve eva rūpe tābhyāṃ hi tadrūpyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:10355: atra pṛthivyaptejāṃsi trīṇi bhūtāni brahmaṇo rūpaṃ mūrtaṃ mūrcchitāvayavamitaretarānupraviṣṭāvayavaṃ kaṭhinamiti yāvat /
GSP33vacbhamu:10361: tasyaitasya brahmarūpasya tejo 'bannasya caturviśeṣaṇasyaiṣa rasaḥ sāro ya eṣa savitā sapati
GSP33vacbhamu:10366: tasyaitasyāmūrtasyāmṛtasyaitasya yata etasya tyasyaiṣa raso ya eṣa gatasmin savitṛmaṇḍale puruṣaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10367: karaṇātmako hiraṇyagarbhaprāṇāhvayastyasya hyeṣa rasaḥ sāro nityaparokṣatā ca sāmyamityadhidaivatam
GSP33vacbhamu:10368: athādhyātmamidameva mūrtaṃ yadanyatprāṇāntarākāśābhyāṃ bhūtatrayaṃ rīrārambhakametanmartyametatsthitametatsattasyaitasya mūrtasyaitasya martyasyaitasya sthitasyaitasya sata eṣa raso yaccakṣuḥ sato hyoṣa rasa iti athāmūrtaṃ prāṇaśca yaścāyamantarātmannākāśa etadamṛtametadyadetattyaṃ tasyaitasyāmūrtasyaitasyāmṛtasyaitasya yata etasya tyasyaiṣa raso yo 'yaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:10370: liṅgasya hi karaṇātmakasya hiraṇyagarbhasya dakṣiṇamakṣyadhiṣṭhānaṃ śruteradhigatam /
GSP33vacbhamu:10371: tadevaṃ brahmaṇa aupādhikayormūrtāmūrtayorādhyātmikādhidaivikayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvena vibhāgo vyākhyātaḥ sattyacchabdavācyayoḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10372: athedānīṃ tasya karaṇātmanaḥ puruṣasya liṅgasya rūpaṃ vaktavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:10374: tadevaṃ niravaśeṣaṃ savāsanaṃ satyarūpamuktvā yattatsatyasya satyamuktaṃ brahma tatsvarūpāvadhāraṇārthamidamārabhyate
GSP33vacbhamu:10375: yataḥ satyasya rūpaṃ niḥśeṣamuktamato 'vaśiṣṭaṃ satyasya yatsatyaṃ tasyānantaraṃ taduktihetukaṃ svarūpaṃ vakyavyamityāha- athāta
GSP33vacbhamu:10379: atraivamarthenetinā yatsaṃnihitaṃ parāmṛṣṭaṃ tanniṣidhyate nañā saṃnihitaṃ ca mūrtāmūrtaṃ savāsanaṃ rūpadvayam /
GSP33vacbhamu:10381: tatredaṃ vicāryate-kiṃ rūpadvayaṃ savāsanaṃ brahma ca sarvameva ca
GSP33vacbhamu:10382: pratiṣidhyate, uta brahmaivātha savāsanaṃ rūpadvayaṃ brahma tu pariśiṣyata iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:10383: yadyapi teṣu teṣu vedāntapradeśeṣu brahmasvarūpaṃ pratipāditaṃ tadasadbhāvajñānaṃ ca ninditam
GSP33vacbhamu:10384: 'astītyevopalabdhavyaḥ' iti cāsya sattvamavadhāritaṃ tathāpi sadbodharūpaṃ tadbrahma savāsanamūrtāmūrtarūpasādhāraṇatayā ca sāmānyaṃ tasya caite
GSP33vacbhamu:10390: ata eva nahyetasmāditi netyanyatparamastīti niṣedhāt paraṃ nāstīti sarvaniṣedhameva tattvamāha śrutiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10395: yathāhuḥ-'yena yasyābhisaṃbandho dūrasthasyāpi tena saḥ' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:10398: brahmaṇastu vāṅmanasāgocaratayā sakalapramāṇavirahāt, katarasyāstu niṣedha iti viśaye prapañcapratiṣedhe
GSP33vacbhamu:10399: brahmapratiṣedho tvavyākopādbrahmaiva pratiṣedhena saṃbadhyate yogyatvānna prapañcastadvaiparītyāt, vīpsā tu tadatyantābhāvasūcanāyeti madhyamaḥ pakṣaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10400: tatra prathamaṃ pakṣaṃ nirākaroti- na tāvadubhayapratiṣedha upapadyate
GSP33vacbhamu:10402: ayamabhisaṃdhiḥ-upādhayo hyamī pṛthivyādayo 'vidyākalpitā na tu śoṇakarkādaya iva viśeṣā aśvatvasya /
GSP33vacbhamu:10410: tadidamuktam- apariśiṣyamāṇe cānyasminya itaraḥ pratiṣeddhumārabhyate tasya pratiṣedbhumaśakyatvāttasyaiva
GSP33vacbhamu:10412: madhyamaṃ pakṣaṃ pratikṣipati- nāpi brahmapratiṣedha upapadyate. /
GSP33vacbhamu:10416: tathāca yastasya śabdaḥ prāpakaḥ sa tatpara iti sa brahmaṇi pramāṇamiti kathamasya niṣedho 'pi pramāṇavān /
GSP33vacbhamu:10417: naca paryudāsādhikaraṇapūrvapakṣanyāyena vikalpaḥ vastuni siddhasvabhāve tadanupapatteḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10424: upakramaparāmarśopasaṃhāraparyālocanayā hi vedāntānāṃ sarveṣāmeva brahmaparatvamupapāditaṃ prathame 'dhyāye /
GSP33vacbhamu:10425: na cāsatyāmākāṅkṣāyāṃ dūratasthena pratiṣedhenaiṣāṃ saṃbandhaḥ saṃbhavati
GSP33vacbhamu:10426: yacca vāṅmanasātītatayā brahmaṇastatpratiṣedhasya na pramāṇāntaravirodha iti tatrāha- vāṅmanasātītatvamapīti. pratipādayanti vedāntā mahatā prayatnena brahma /
GSP33vacbhamu:10428: idānīṃ tu niṣprayojanamityuktaṃ 'prakṣālanāddhi paṅkasya' iti nyāyāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:10429: tasmādvedāntavācā manasi saṃnidhānādbrahmaṇo vāṅmanasātītatvaṃ nāñjasamapi tu pratipādanaprakriyopakrama eṣaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10430: yathā gavādayo viṣayāḥ sākṣācchṛṅgagrāhikayā pratipādyante pratiyante ca naivaṃ brahma /
GSP33vacbhamu:10432: nanu prakṛtapratiṣedhe brahmaṇo 'pi kasmānna pratiṣejha ityata āha- yaddhi prakṛtaṃ prapañcitaṃ ceti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:10433: pradhānaṃ prakṛtaṃ prapañcasya pradhānaṃ na brahma tasya ṣaṣṭhyantatayā prapañcāvacchekatvenāpradhānatvādityarthaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:10434: tato 'nyadbravītīti neti netīti pratiṣedhādanyadbhūyo bravītīti tannirvacanam /
GSP33vacbhamu:10435: nahyetasmādityasya yadā nahyetasmāditi neti netyādiṣṭādbrahmaṇo 'nyatparamastīti vyākhyānaṃ tadā prapañcapratiṣedhādanyadbrahmaiva
GSP33vacbhamu:10437: yadā tu nahyetasmāditi sarvanāmnā pratiṣedho brahmaṇa ādeśaḥ parāmṛśyate tadāpi prapañcapratiṣedhamātraṃ na pratipattavyamapi tu tena pratiṣedhena bhāvarūpaṃ brahmopalakṣyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:10438: kasmādtyata āha- tato bravīti ca bhūya iti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:10440: atha brahmaṇo nāmadheyaṃ nāma satyasya satyamiti tadvyācaṣṭe śrutiḥ-'prāṇā
GSP33vacbhamu:10443: tat khalu satyamitarāpekṣayā tasyāpi paraṃ satyaṃ brahma /
GSP33vacbhamu:10444: tadevaṃ yataḥ pratiṣedhasya parastadbravīti tasmānna prapañcapratiṣedhamātraṃ brahmāpi tu bhāvarūpamiti /
GSP33vacbhamu:10445: tadevaṃ pūrvasmin vyākhyāne nirvacanaṃ bravītīti vyākhyātam /
GSP33vacbhamu:10450: kuṇḍalādirūpeṇa tu bheda ityuktaṃ tena viṣayabhedādbhedābhedayoravirodha ityekaviṣayatvena vā sarvadopalabdheravirodhaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10451: viruddhamiti hi naḥ kka saṃpratyayo na yatpramāṇenopalabhyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:10452: āgamataśca pramāṇādekagocarāvapi bhedābhedau pratīyamānau na virodhamāvahataḥ savitṛprakāśayoriva pratyakṣātpramāṇādbhedābhedāviti //27
GSP33vacbhamu:10457: sa evaṃ bruvāṇaḥ praṣṭavyo jāyate, kimahitvakuṇḍalatve vastuno bhinne
GSP33vacbhamu:10459: yadi bhinne, ahitvakuṇḍalatve bhinne iti vaktavyaṃ na tu vastunastābhyāṃ bhedābhedau /
GSP33vacbhamu:10462: atha vastuno na bhidyete ahitvakuṇḍalatve tathā sati ko bhedābhedayorviṣayabhedastayorvastuno 'nanyatvenābhedāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:10463: na caikaviṣayatve 'pi sadānubhūyamānatvādbhedābhedayoravirodha svarūpaviruddhayorapyavirodhe kka nāma virodho vyavatiṣṭheta /
GSP33vacbhamu:10466: prapañcitaṃ caitadasmābhiḥ prathamasūtra iti neha prapañcitam /
GSP33vacbhamu:10471: yathāha śrutiḥ-'tameva viditvātimṛtyumeti nānyaḥ panthā vidyate 'yanāya' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:10480: tadyathā prācī pratīcī dakṣiṇodīcīti catasraḥ kalā avayavā iva kalāḥ sa prakāśavānnāma prathamaḥ pādaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10481: etadupāsanāyāṃ prakāśavān mukhyo bhavatīti prakāśavān pādaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10482: athāparāḥ pṛthivyantarikṣaṃ dyauḥ samudra iti catasraḥ kalā eṣa dvitīyaḥ pādo 'nantatavānnāma
GSP33vacbhamu:10485: athāgniḥ sūryaścandramā vidyuditi catasraḥ kalāḥ sa jyotiṣmānnāma pādastṛtīyastadupāsanājjyotiṣmān bhavatīti jyotiṣmān pādaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10486: atha ghrāṇaścakṣuḥ śrotraṃ vāgiti catasraḥ kalāścaturthaḥ pāda āyatanavānnāma /
GSP33vacbhamu:10487: ete ghrāṇādayo hi gandhādiviṣayā mana āyatanamāśritya bhogasādhanaṃ bhavantītyāyatanavānnāma pādaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10498: yathā hi tantavaḥ paṭaṃ vidhārayanti tadupādānatvādevaṃ brahmāpi jagadvidhārayati tadupapādakatvāt
GSP33vacbhamu:10505: manaso brahmapratīkasya samāropitabrahmabhāvasya vāgghrāṇaścakṣuḥ śrotramiti catvāraḥ pādāḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:10506: mano hi vaktavyaghrātavyadraṣṭavyaśrotavyān gocarān vāgādibhiḥ saṃcaratīti saṃcaraṇasādhāraṇatayā manasaḥ pādastadidamadhyātman /
GSP33vacbhamu:10507: ākāśasya brahmapratīkasyāgnirvāyurādityo diśa iti catvāraḥ pādāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10508: te hi vyāpino nabhasa udara iva goḥ pādā vilagnā upalakṣyanta iti pādastadidamadhidaivatam
GSP33vacbhamu:10509: tadanena pādavaditi vaidikaṃ nidarśanaṃ vyākhyāya laukikaṃ cedaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:10516: yathā saudhajālamārganiveśinyaḥ savitṛbhāso jālamārgopādhibedādbhinnā bhāsante tadvigame tu gabhastimaṇḍalenaikībhavantyatastena saṃbadhyanta evamihāpīti //34 //
GSP33vacbhamu:10518: ekībhāvaḥ kasmādiha saṃbandhaḥ kathañcidvyākhyāyate na mukhya evetyetatsūtreṇa pariharati- upapattaśca. /
GSP33vacbhamu:10520: svabhāvaścedanena saṃbandhatvena spṛṣṭastataḥ svābhāvikastādātmyānnātiricyata iti tarkapāda upapāditamityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10521: tathā bhedo 'pi trividho vānyādṛśaḥ svābhāvika ityarthaḥ //35 //
GSP33vacbhamu:10525: brahmādvaitasiddhāvapi na sarvagatatvaṃ sarvavyāpitā sarvasya brahmaṇā svarūpeṇa rūpavattvaṃ sidhyatītyata āha- anena
GSP33vacbhamu:10526: setvādinirākaraṇena.parahetunirākaraṇenānyapratiṣedhasamāśrayaṇena ca svasādhanopanyāsena ca sarvagatatvamapyātmanaḥ siddhaṃ bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:10527: advaita siddhe sarvo 'yamanirvacanīyaḥ prapañcāvabhāso brahmādhiṣṭhāna iti
GSP33vacbhamu:10531: nityaśuddhabuddhamuktasvabhāvasya brahmaṇaḥ kuta īśvaratvaṃ kutaśca phalahetutvamapītyata āha- tasyaiva brahmaṇo vyāvahārikyāmiti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:10540: atha karmaṇa eva phalaṃ kasmānna bhavatītyata āha- karmaṇastvanukṣaṇavināśinaḥ.pratyakṣavināśina iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:10542: upāttamapi phalaṃ bhoktumayogyatvādvā karmāntarapratibandhādvā na bhujyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10544: nahi svarga ātmānaṃ labhatāmityadhikāriṇaḥ kāmayante kintu bhogyo 'smākaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:10546: tena yādṛśamebhiḥ kāmyate tādṛśasya phalatvamiti bhogyameva satphalamiti /
GSP33vacbhamu:10547: naca tādṛśaṃ karmānantaramiti kathaṃ phalaṃ, tadapi svarūpeṇa /
GSP33vacbhamu:10548: apica svarganarakau tīvratame sukhaduḥkhe iti tadviṣayeṇānubhavena bhogāparanāmnāvaśyaṃ bhavitavyam
GSP33vacbhamu:10549: tasmādanubhavayogye ananubhūyamāne śaśaśṛṅgavanna sta iti niścīyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:10550: codayati- athocyeta mā bhūtkarmānantaraṃ phalotpādaḥ karmākāryādapūrvātphalamutpatsyata iti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:10552: yadyadacetanaṃ tattatsarvaṃ cetanādhiṣṭhitaṃ pravartata iti pratyakṣagamābhyāmavadhāritam
GSP33vacbhamu:10559: nanu 'svargakāmo yajeta' ityādayaḥ śrutayaḥ phalaṃ prati na sādhanatayā
GSP33vacbhamu:10561: tathāhi-yadi yāgādaya eva kriyā na tadatiriktā bhāvanā tathāpi na eva
GSP33vacbhamu:10562: svapadebhyaḥ pūrvāparībhūtāḥ sādhyasvabhāvā avagamyanta iti na sādhyāntaramapekṣanta iti na svargeṇa sādhyāntareṇa saṃbaddhumarhanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:10563: athāpi taditarekiṇī bhavānāsti tathāpyasau bhāṣyapekṣāpi svapadopāttaṃ pūrvāgataṃ na bhāvyaṃ dhātvarthamapahāya na bhinnapadopāttaṃ puruṣaviśeṣaṇaṃ ca svargādi bhāṣyatayā svīkartumarhati na caikasmin vākye sādhyadvayasaṃbandhasaṃbhavaḥ, vākyabhedaprasaṅgāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:10564: na kevalaṃ śabdato vastutaśca puruṣaprayatnasya bhāvanāyāḥ sākṣāddhātvartha eva sādhyo na tu svargādistasya tadavyāpyatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:10565: svargādestu nāmapadābhidheyatayā siddharūpasyākhyātavācyaṃ sādhyaṃ dhātvarthe prati 'bhūtaṃ bhavyāyopadiśyate' iti nyāyātsādhanatayā guṇatvenābhisaṃbandhaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10566: tathāca pāramarṣe sūtram-'dravyāṇāṃ karmasaṃyoge guṇatvenābhisaṃbandhaḥ' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:10568: tathāca karmaṇo yāgāderduḥkhatvena puruṣeṇāsamīhitatvāt, samīhitasya ca svargāderasādhyatvānna yāgādayaḥ puruṣasyopakurvanyanupakāriṇāṃ caiṣāṃ na puruṣa īṣṭe anīśānaśca na teṣu saṃbhavatyadhikārītyadhikārābhāvapratipāditānarthakyaparihārāya kṛtsnasyaivāmnāyasya nirmṛṣṭanikhiladuḥkhānuṣaṅganityasukhamayabrahmajñānaparatvaṃ bhedaprapañcavilayanadvāreṇa tathāhi-sarvatraivāmnāye
GSP33vacbhamu:10569: kkacitkasyacidbhedasya pravilayo gamyate-yathā 'svargakāmo yajeta' iti śarīrātmabhāvapraliyaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:10575: niṣedhavākyāni ca sākṣādeva pravṛttiniṣedhena vidhivākyāni cānyāyi
GSP33vacbhamu:10578: yathā viṣaṃ bhuṅkṣava māsya gṛhe bhuṅkṣveti /
GSP33vacbhamu:10581: tanniṣedhena tu brahmaṇi praṇidhānamādadhacchāstraṃ śāstra bhavet /
GSP33vacbhamu:10583: kathaṃ tarhi vidhiḥ kimatra kathaṃ pravartanāmātratvādvidhestasya cādhikāramantareṇāpyupapatteḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:10584: nahi yo yaḥ pravartayati sa sarvo 'dhikṛtamapekṣate /
GSP33vacbhamu:10585: pavanādeḥ pravartakasya tadanapekṣatvāditiśaṅkāmapācikīrṣarāha- tatra ca vidhiśruterviṣayabhāvopagamādyāgaḥ svargasyotpādaka iti gamyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:10592: na tvajñādiriva niyoktṛprayojanastatrābhiprāyasya pravartakatvāt, tasya cāpauruṣeye 'saṃbhavāt
GSP33vacbhamu:10594: tathāca 'svargakāmo yajeta' ityādiṣu svargakāmādeḥ samīhitopāyā gamyante yāgādayaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10599: na caite sākṣādbhāvanābhāvyā api kartrapekṣitasādhanatāvidhyupahitamaryādā bhāvanoddeśyā bhavitumarhanti, yena puṃsāmanupakārakāḥ santo
GSP33vacbhamu:10605: phalārthapravṛttabhāvanābhāvyatvalakṣaṇena ca yāgādisādhyatvena phalārthapravṛttabhāvanābhāvyatvarūpasya phalasādhyatvasya samapradhānatvābhāvenaikavākyasamavāyasaṃbhavāt, bhāvanābhāvyatvamātrasya ca yāgādisādhyatvasya karaṇe 'pyavirodhāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:10608: phalasya sākṣādbhāvanāvyāpyatvavirahiṇo 'pi taduddeśyatayā sarvatra vyāpitayā vyavasthānātsvargasādhane yāgādau svargakāmāderadhikāra iti siddham /
GSP33vacbhamu:10609: na cāprāptārthaviṣayāḥ sāṃgrahaṇyādiyāgavidhayaḥ parisaṃkhyāyakā niyāmakā vā bhavitumarhanti
GSP33vacbhamu:10610: na cādhikārābhāve dehātmapravilayo vādhikāribhedapravilayo vā śakya upapādayitum /
GSP33vacbhamu:10612: svarasataḥ pratīyamāner'the vākyasya tādarthye saṃbhavati na saṃpātāyātaparatvamucitam /
GSP33vacbhamu:10620: etaduktaṃ bhavati-karmaṇo hi phalaṃ prati yatsādhanatvaṃ śrutaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:10622: naca vyāpāravati satyeva vyāpāro nāsatīti yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:10624: asatyapi ca tailapānakarmaṇi tena puṣṭau kartavyāyāmantarā tailapariṇāmabhedānāṃ tadavāntaravyāpāratvāt
GSP33vacbhamu:10625: tasmātkarmakāryamapūrve karmaṇā phale kartavye tadavāntaravyāpāra iti yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:10626: yadā punaḥ phalopajananānyathānupapattyā kiñcitkalpyate tadā phalasya vā pūrvāvasthā
GSP33vacbhamu:10632: nahi jātu mṛtpiṇḍadaṇḍādayaḥ kumbhakārādyanadhiṣṭhitāḥ kumbhādyārambhāya vibhavavanto dṛṣṭāḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:10634: tasmādacetanaṃ karma vāpūrve vā na cetanānadhiṣṭhitaṃ svatantraṃ svakārye pravartitumutsahate naca caitanyamātraṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:10636: tasmāttattatprāsādāṭṭālagopuratoraṇādyupajananidarśanasahasraiḥ supariniścitaṃ yathā cetanādhiṣṭhānādacetanānāṃ kāryārambhakatvamiti tathā caitanyaṃ devatāyā asati bādhake śrutismṛtītihāsapurāṇaprasiddhaṃ na śakyaṃ pratiṣedhdhumityapi spaṣṭaṃ niraṭaṅki devatādhikaraṇe /
GSP33vacbhamu:10637: laukikaśceśvaro dānaparicaraṇapraṇāmañjalikaraṇastutimayībhiratiśraddhāgarbhābhirbhaktibhirārādhitaḥ prasannaḥ svānurūpamārādhakāya phalaṃ prayacchati virodhataścāpakriyābhirvirodhakāyāhitāmityapi suprasiddham /
GSP33vacbhamu:10638: tadiha kevalaṃ karma vāpūrvaṃ vā cetanānadhiṣṭhitamacetanaṃ phalaṃ prasūta iti dṛṣṭaviruddham
GSP33vacbhamu:10639: yathā vinaṣṭaṃ karma na phalaṃ prasūta iti kalpyate dṛṣṭavirodhādevamihāpīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:10640: tathā devapūjācmako yāgo devatāṃ naprasādayan phalaṃ prasūta ityapi dṛṣṭaviruddham /
GSP33vacbhamu:10646: naca śubhāśubhakāriṇāṃ tadanurūpaṃ phalaṃ prasuvānā devatā dveṣapakṣapātavatīti yujyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:10647: nahi rājā sādhukāriṇamanugṛhṇannigṛhṇan vā pāpakāriṇaṃ bhavati dviṣṭo rakto vā tadvadalaukiko 'pīśvaraḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10648: yathā ca paramāpūrve kartavye utpattyapūrvāṇāmaṅgāpūrvāṇāṃ copayogaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10651: tasmāddṛṣṭāvirodhena devatārādhanāt phalaṃ na tvapūrvātkarmaṇo vā kevalādvirodhato hetuvyapadeśaśca śrautaḥ smārtaśca vyākhyātaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10652: ye punarantaryimivyāpārāyā phalotpādanāyā nityatvaṃ sarvasādhāraṇatvamiti manyamānā bhāṣyakārīyamadhikaraṇaṃ dūṣavibhāge bhāmatyāṃ tṛtīyasyādhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ //2 //
GSP33vacbhamu:10653: iti tṛtīyādhyāyasya tattvampadārthapariśodhanākhyo dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ tṛtīyādhyāye tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ. /
GSP33vacbhamu:10655: pūrveṇa saṃgatimāha- vyākhyātaṃ vijñeyasya brahmaṇa iti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:10656: nirūpādhibrahmatattvagocaraṃ vijñānaṃ manvāna ākṣipati- nanu vijñeyaṃ brahmeti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:10657: sāvayavasya hyavayavānāṃ bhedāttadavayavaviśiṣṭabrahmagocarāṇi vijñānāni gocarabhedādbhidyerannityavayavā brahmaṇo nirākṛtāḥ pūrvāparādītyanena /
GSP33vacbhamu:10658: naca nānāsvabhāvaṃ brahma yataḥ svabhāvabhedādbhinnāni jñānānītyuktam- ekarasamiti /
GSP33vacbhamu:10660: nanvekamapyanekarūpaṃ loke dṛṣṭaṃ, yathā somaśarmaiko 'pyācāryo māyulapitā putro bhrātā bhartā jāmātā dvijottama ityanekarūpa ityata uktam- ekarūpatvācca. /
GSP33vacbhamu:10661: ekasmin gocare saṃbhavanti bahūni vijñānāni na tvanekākāraṇītyuktam- anekarūpāṇi. /
GSP33vacbhamu:10664: tattadguṇopādhānabrahmaviṣayā upāsanāḥ prāṇādiviṣayāśca dṛṣṭādṛṣṭakamuktiphalā viṣayabhedādbhidyanta ityarthaḥ /
