GSP33vacbhamu:10665: tata upapanno vimarśa ityāha- teṣveṣā cintā. /
GSP33vacbhamu:10670: kiṃ tāvat prāptam, jyotiṣṭomasya prakrāntatvādyajeteti tadanuvādājjyotiriti prātipadikamātraṃ paṭhitvā etenetyanukṛṣya karmasāmānādhikaraṇyena karmanāmavyavasthāpanāt, karmaṇaścānuvādyatvena tattantrasya nāmno 'pi tathaiva vyavasthāpanāt, jyotiḥśabdasya 'vasante
GSP33vacbhamu:10671: vasante jyotiṣā' iti ca jyotiṣṭome yogadarśanāt nāmaikadeśena ca
GSP33vacbhamu:10675: dvādaśaśatadakṣiṇāyāścotpattyaśiṣṭatayā samaśiṣṭatayā sahasradakṣiṇayā saha vikalpopapatteḥ, prakṛtasyaiva jyotiṣṭomasya sahasradakṣiṇālakṣaṇaguṇavidhānārthamayamanuvādo na tu karmāntaramiti prāptam /
GSP33vacbhamu:10676: evaṃ prāpta ucyate-bhavetpūrvasmin guṇavidhiryadi tadeva prakaraṇaṃ syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:10678: tathāhi saṃnidhāvapi pūrvāsaṃbaddhārthaṃ saṃjñāntaraṃ pratīyamānam 'anyāyaścānekārthatvam' iti nyāyādutsargator'thāntarārthatvātpūrvabuddhiṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:10680: na jātu dehi devadattāya gāmatha devāya vājinamiti devaśabdāddevadattaṃ vājibhājamavasyanti laukikāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10683: na caikatrānupapattyā lakṣaṇayā jyotiḥśabdo jyotiṣṭome pravṛtta ityasatyāmanupapattau lākṣaṇiko yuktaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10684: nahi gāṅgāyāṃ ghoṣa ityatra gāṅgāpadaṃ lākṣaṇikamiti mīno gāṅgāyāmityatrāpi lākṣaṇikaṃ bhavati
GSP33vacbhamu:10685: bhede 'pi ca prathamaṃ saṃjñāntareṇollikhite yajiśabdasāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ karmanāmadheyatāmātratāmāvahati natu saṃjñāntaropajanitāṃ bhedadhiyamapanetumutsahate /
GSP33vacbhamu:10688: bhavatu saṃjñāntarātkarmabhedaḥ prastute tu kimāyātamityata āha- asti cātra vedāntāntaravihiteṣviti. yathaiva kāṭhakādisamākhyā granthe prayujyanta evaṃ jñāne 'pi laukikāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10689: na cāsti viśeṣo yato granthe mukhyāvijñāne gauṇī bhavet /
GSP33vacbhamu:10692: tathāca yadā jyotiṣṭomasaṃnidhau śrūyamāṇaṃ samākhyāntaraṃ tatpratikamapi karmaṇo bhedakaṃ tadā kaiva kathā śākhāntarīye viprakṛṣṭatame
GSP33vacbhamu:10694: tathā rūpabhedo 'pi karmabhedasya pratipādakaḥ prasiddho yathā
GSP33vacbhamu:10696: idamāmnayate-'tapte payasi dadhyānayati sā vaiśvadevyāmikṣā' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:10699: atredaṃ saṃdihyate-kiṃ pūrvāsminneva karmaṇi vājinaṃ guṇo vidhīyate uta
GSP33vacbhamu:10701: kiṃ tāvat prāptam, dravyadevatāntaraviśiṣṭakarmāntaravidhau vidhigauravaprasaṅgāt karmāntarāpūrvāntarakalpanāgauravaprasaṅgācca na karmāntaravidhānamapi tu pūrvasminneva karmaṇi vājinadravyavidhiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10702: na cotpattiśiṣṭamikṣāguṇāvarodhāttatra vājinamalabdhāvakāśaṃ karmāntaraṃ gocarayatīti yuktam
GSP33vacbhamu:10703: ubhayorapi vākyayoḥ samasamayapravṛtterāmikṣāvājinayorutpattau samaṃ śiṣyamāṇatvena nāmikṣāyāḥ śiṣṭatvam /
GSP33vacbhamu:10705: na ca vaiśvadevītyatra śrauta āmikṣāsaṃbandho viśveṣāṃ devānāṃ yena vājinasaṃbandhādvākyagamyādbalavānbhavedubhayorapi padāntarāpekṣapratītitayā vākyagamyatvāviśeṣāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:10707: astu vā śrautatvaṃ tathāpi vājibhya iti padaṃ vājamannamāmikṣā tadeṣāmastīti vyutpattyā tatsaṃbandhino viśvāndevānupalakṣayati /
GSP33vacbhamu:10708: yadyapi viśvadevaśabdādvājipadaṃ bhinnaṃ, yena ca śabdena codanā tenaivoddeśe devatātvaṃ na śabdāntareṇānyathārthaikatvena sūryādityapadayoḥ sūryādityacarvorekadaivatyaprasaṅgāt, tathāpi vājinnitīneḥ sarvanāmārthe smaraṇāt saṃnihitasya ca sarvanāmārthatvāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:10709: viśveṣāṃ devānāṃ ca viśvadevāpadena saṃnidhāpanāttatpadapuraḥsarā evaite vājipadenopasthāpyā na tu sūryādityapadavatsvatantrāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10710: tathāca tadupalakṣaṇārthaṃ vājipadaṃ viśvadevopahitāmeva devatāmupalakṣayatīti na śabdāntarāddevatābhedaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:10711: tataścāmikṣāsaṃbandhopajīvanena viśvebhyo vājinaṃ vidhīyamānaṃ nāmikṣayā bādhyate kintu tayā saha samuccīyata iti na karmāntaramapi tu vākyābhyāṃ dravyayuktamekaṃ karma vidhīyata iti prāpta ucyate-syādetadevaṃ yadi vaiśvadevīti taddhitaśrutyāmikṣā nocyeta /
GSP33vacbhamu:10712: taddhitasya tvasyeti sarvanāmārthe smaraṇāt saṃnihitasya ca viśeṣyasya sarvanāmārthatvāttatraiva taddhitasyāpi vṛttirnatu viśveṣu deveṣaṣu /
GSP33vacbhamu:10714: nanvevaṃ sati kasmādvaiśvadevīśabdamātrādeva nāmikṣāṃ pratīmaḥ kimiti cāmikṣāpadamapekṣāmahe
GSP33vacbhamu:10717: idaṃ tu saṃnihitaviśeṣābhidhāyi tatsaṃnidhimapekṣamāṇaṃ saṃnidhāpakamāmikṣāpadamapekṣata iti kuta āmikṣāpadānapekṣa āmikṣāpratyayaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10719: ataśca satyāmapi padāntarāpekṣāyāṃ yatpadaṃ padāntarāpekṣamabhidhatte tatpramāṇabhūtaprathamabhāvipadāvagamyatvācchrautaṃ balīyaśca /
GSP33vacbhamu:10720: yattu paryavasitābhidhānapadābhihitapadārthavagamagamyaṃ tattaccaramapratītivākyagamyaṃ durbalaṃ ceti taddhitaśrutyavagatāmikṣālakṣaṇaguṇāvarodhātpūrvakarmāsaṃyogi vājinadravyaṃ sasaṃbandhi pūrvasmādbhinatti vājipadaṃ kathañcidyaugikaṃ sāpekṣāvṛtti viśvadevaśabdāṃ devatāṃ vaiśvadevīpadādāmikṣādravyaṃ pratyupasarjanībhūtāmavagatāmupalakṣayiṣyati /
GSP33vacbhamu:10723: prāmāṇike ca vidhikalpanāgaurave abhyupetavye eva pramāṇasya tattvaviṣayatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:10724: tasmādyatheha pūrvakarmāsaṃbhavino guṇātkarmabheda evamihāpi pañcāgnividyāyāḥ ṣaḍagnividyā bhinnā, evaṃ prāṇasaṃvādeṣūnādhikabhāvena vidyābeda iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:10731: naca tānyeva karmāṇi bhūmibhojanādijanitamupakāramākāṅkṣanti nākāṅkṣanti ceti yujyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:10733: astu prastute kimāyātamityata āha- asti cātreti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:10738: kiṃ tāvatprāptaṃ, dhātvarthānubandhabhedena śabdāntarādhikaraṇe bhāvanābhedābhidhānāddhātvarthasya ca dhātubhedamantareṇa bhedānupapatteḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:10739: 'samidho yajati' iti prathamabhāvinā vākyena vihitā karmabhāvanā viparīvartamānoparitanairvākyaranūdyate
GSP33vacbhamu:10746: tena prāthamyābhāvāt prāptamityeva nāstīti kasya ko 'nuvādaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10748: guṇaśravaṇe hi guṇaviśiṣṭakarmavidhāne vidhigauravabhiyā guṇamātravidhānalāghavāya karmānuvādapekṣāyāṃ viparivṛtterupakāraḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10749: yathā 'dadhnā juheti' iti dadhividhipare vākye viparivṛttyapekṣāyām
GSP33vacbhamu:10751: na cātra guṇādbhedaḥ, samidādipadānāṃ karmanāmadheyānāṃ guṇavacanatvābhāvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:10752: agṛhyamāṇaviśeṣatayā ca kiṃvacanavihitakiṅkarmānuvādena kasya guṇavidhitvamiti na vinigamyate
GSP33vacbhamu:10753: na cāpūrvā nāma jyotirādivadvidhānasaṃbandhaṃ prathamamavagataṃ, yataḥ pūrvabuddhivicchedena vidhīyamānaṃ ka4ma pūrvasmātsaṃjñāto vyavacchindyāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:10754: kintu prathamata eva karmasāmānādhikaraṇyenāvagatāḥ samidādayastadvaśātkarmanāmadheyatāṃ pratipadyamānā
GSP33vacbhamu:10755: 'nuvādā vidhitve vidhayo na tu svātantryeṇa kasyacidīśate /
GSP33vacbhamu:10756: tasmāt svarasasiddhāprāptakarmavidhiparatvātkarmaṇyayamabhyāso bhāvanānubandhabhūtāni bhindāno bhāvanāṃ bhinatti yathā tathā śākhāntaravihitā api vidyāḥ śākhāntaravihitābhyo vidyābhyo 'bhyāso
GSP33vacbhamu:10770: tadvyācaṣṭe- sarvavedāntapratyayāni.sarvavedāntapramāṇāni vijñānāni tasmiṃstasmin vedānte tāni tānyeva bhavitumarhanti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:10774: atra ca codyata iti codanā puruṣaprayatnaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10777: tasya devatoddeśena tyāgasyāsecanādikasyāvacchedyaḥ puruṣaprayatnaḥ sa eva śākhāntare yathaivamihāpi prāṇajyeṣṭhatvaśreṣṭhatvavedanaviṣayaḥ puruṣaprayatnaḥ sa eva śākhāntareṣvapīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:10780: yathā yāgasya yadekasyāṃ śākhāyāṃ dravyadevatārūpaṃ tadeva śākhāntareṣvapīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:10785: yathotpannasya tasya sarvatra pratyabhijñāyamānatvādiha tvagniṣūtvapattigata eva guṇabheda iti kathaṃ vaiśvadevīvanna bhedaka iti viśeṣaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10788: pañcaiva sāṃpādikā agnayo vājasaneyināmapi chāndogyānāmiva vidhīyante /
GSP33vacbhamu:10790: vaiśvadevyāṃ tūtpattau guṇo vidhīyata iti bhavatu bhedaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10792: athavā bhavatu vājasaneyināṃ ṣaṣṭhāgnividhānaṃ mā ca bhūcchāndogyānāṃ tathāpi pañcatvasaṃkhyāyā avidhānānnotpattiśiṣṭatvaṃ saṃkhyāyāḥ kintūtpanneṣvagniṣu pracayaśiṣṭā saṃkhyānūdyate sāṃpādikānagnīnavacchetuṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:10794: apratyabhijñāyamānāyāśca saṃkhyāyā anuvādyatvenānutpattervidhīyamānasya cādhikasya ṣoḍaśigrahaṇavadvikalpasaṃbhavānna śākhāntare jñānabhedaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10795: utpattiśiṣṭatve 'siddhe prāṇasaṃvādādayo 'pi prāṇasaṃvādādayo 'pi bhavanti pratyabhijñānādabhinnāstāsu tāsu śākhāsviti //2 //
GSP33vacbhamu:10796: svādhyāyasya tathātvena hi samācāre 'dhikārācca savavacca tanniyamaḥ. /
GSP33vacbhamu:10797: yairātharvaṇikagranthopāyā vidyā veditavyāṃ teṣāmeva śirovratapūrvādhyayanaprāptagranthabodhitā phalaṃ prayacchati nānyathā /
GSP33vacbhamu:10798: anyeṣāṃ tu chāndogyādīnāṃ saiva vidyā cīrṇaśirovratānāṃ phaladetyātharvaṇagranthādhyayanasaṃbandhādavagamyate
GSP33vacbhamu:10802: savā homāḥ sapta sauryādayaḥ śataudanāntā śataudanāntā ātharvaṇikānāṃ ta ekasminnevārtharvaṇike 'gnau kriyante na tretāyām //3 //
GSP33vacbhamu:10804: bhūyobhūyo vidyaikatvasya vedadarśanādyatrāpi saguṇabrahmavidyānāṃ na sākṣādveda ekatvamāha tāsāmapi tatprāyapaṭhitānāṃ tadvidhānāṃ prāyadarśanādekatvameva /
GSP33vacbhamu:10805: tathāhyagryaprāye likhitaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhavedayamagrya iti buddhiriti /
GSP33vacbhamu:10807: etā hi pauruṣeyyaḥ samākhyāḥ kāṭakādipravacanayogāttāsāṃ śākhānāṃ na tūpāsanānām /
GSP33vacbhamu:10808: nahyetāḥ kāṭhādibhiḥ proktā naca kaṭhādyanuṣṭhānamāsāmitarānuṣṭhānebhyo viśeṣyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:10809: naca kāṭhaproktānimittamātreṇa granthe pravṛttau tadyogācca kathañcillakṣaṇayopāsanāsu pravṛttau saṃbhavantyāmupāsanābhidhānāmapyāsāṃ śakyaṃ kalpayitum /
GSP33vacbhamu:10811: kaṭhādipuruṣapravacananimittāścaitāḥ samākhyāḥ kaṭhādibhyaḥ prāk nāsanniti tannibandhano jñānabhedo nāsīdidānīṃ cāstīti durghaṭamāpadyeta /
GSP33vacbhamu:10814: yuktaṃ yadekaśākhāgato yajatyabhyāsaḥ samidādīnāṃ bhedaka iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:10817: aśaktirapi na bhedahetuḥ svādhyāyo 'dhyetavya iti svaśākhāyāmadhyayananiyamaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10822: tadevamasati bādhake codanādyaviśeṣātsarvavedāntapratyayāni karmāṇi tāni tānyeveti siddham kañcidviśeṣamāśaṅkya pūrvatantraprasādhitam /
GSP33vacbhamu:10826: śākhāntaroktānāṃ tadaṅgāntarāṇāṃ na śākhāntarokte tasminnupasaṃhāro bhavitumarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:10830: tasmādyathā naimittikaṃ karma sakalāṅgavadvihitamapi aśaktau yāvacchakyamaṅgamanuṣṭhātuṃ tāvanmātrajanyenopakāreṇaupakṛtaṃ bhavatyevamihāpyaṅgāntarāvidhānādeva bhaviṣyatīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:10831: evaṃ prāpta ucyate-sarvatraikatve karmaṇaḥ sthite gṛhamedhīyanyāyena
GSP33vacbhamu:10833: nahi tadeva karma sattadaṅgamapekṣate nāpekṣate ceti yujyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:10834: naimittike tu nimittānurodhādavaśyakartavye sarvāṅgopasaṃhārasya sadātanatvāsaṃbhavādupakārāvacchedaḥ kalpyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:10837: iha tu śākhāntare katipayāṅgavidhānaṃ tāni vidhatte netarāṇi parisaṃcaṣṭe /
GSP33vacbhamu:10839: tasmāttattvena karmaṇāṃ sarvāṅgasaṅgama autsargiko 'sati balavati bādhake nāpavadituṃ yukta iti //5 //
GSP33vacbhamu:10842: tataḥ kānīyasā eva devā jyāyasā asurāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10845: śāstrayuktyaparikalpitamatayastāmasavṛttipradhānā asurā asubhiḥ prāṇairanindriyairagṛhītaisteṣu teṣu viṣayeṣu ramanta ityasurā ata eva te jyāyāṃsaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10851: te ha devā ūcuḥ, hanta asurān yajña udgīthenātyayāma asurān jayāmāsminnābhicārike yajña
GSP33vacbhamu:10853: te ha vācamūcurityādinā saṃdarbheṇa vākprāṇacakṣuḥśrotramanasāmāsurapāpmaviddhatayā ninditvā atha hemamāsanyamāsye ūvamāsanyaṃ mukhāntarbilasthaṃ mukhyaṃ prāṇaṃ prāṇābhimānavatīṃ devatāmūcustvaṃ na udgāyeti /
GSP33vacbhamu:10854: tathetyabhyupagamya tebhya eva prāṇa udagāyat te 'surā viduranena prāṇenodgātrā no 'smān devā atyeṣyantīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:10855: tamabhidrutya pāpmanāvidhyannasurā yathāśmānamṛtvā prāpya mṛttvālloṣṭo vā vidhvaṃsata evaṃ vidhvaṃsamānā viṣvañco 'surā vineśuḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10858: viṣayaṃ darśayitvā vimṛśati- tatra saṃśaya iti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:10861: ekatrodgātṛtvenocyate prāṇa ekatra codgānatvena kriyākartrośca sphuṭo bheda ityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10864: na kevalaṃ śākhāntare, ekasyāmapi śākhāyāṃ dṛṣṭametanna ca tatra vidyābheda ityāha- vājasanetyake 'pi ceti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:10865: bahutararūpapratyabhijñānānugrahāya comityanenāpi udgīthāvayavena udgītha eva lakṣaṇīya iti pūrvapakṣaḥ //6 //
GSP33vacbhamu:10867: bahutarapratyabhijñāne 'pi upakramabhedāttanurodhena copasaṃhāravarṇanādekasminvākye tasyaiva codgīthasya punajhapunaḥ saṃkīrtanāllakṣaṇāyāṃ ca chāndogye vājasaneyake pramāṇābhāvādvidyābheda iti rāddhāntaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10874: evaṃ hi śrūyate-'vivā etaṃ prajayā paśubhirardhayati vardhayatyasya bhrātṛvyaṃ yasya havirniruptaṃ purastāccandramā abhyudeti sa tredhā taṇḍulānvibhajedye madhyamāḥ syustānagnaye dātre puroḍāśamaṣṭākapālaṃ nirvapedye sthiviṣṭhāstānindrāya pradātre dadhaṃścaruṃ ye kṣodiṣṭhāstān
GSP33vacbhamu:10876: tatra saṃdehaḥ-kiṃ kālārādhe yāgāntaramidaṃ codyata uta teṣveva karmasu
GSP33vacbhamu:10878: eṣa tāvadatra viṣayaḥ-amāvāsyāyāmeva darśakarmārthaṃ vedikriyāgnipraṇayanakriyā vratādiśca yajamānasaṃskāraḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10881: yasya tu yajamānasya kutaścidbhamanibandhanāccaturdaśyāmevāmāvāsyābuddhau pravṛttaprayogasya candramā abhyudīyate tatredaṃ śrūyate-'yasya
GSP33vacbhamu:10883: tena yajamānenābhyuditenāmāvāsyāyāmeva nimittādhikāraṃ parisamāpya purastadahareva vedyuddharaṇādikarma kṛtvā pratipadi darśaḥ pravartayitavyaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10884: tatrābhāyudaye kiṃ naimittikamidaṃ karmāntaraṃ darśāccodyata uta tasminneva darśakarmaṇi pūrvadevatāpanayanena devanāntaraṃ vidhīyata iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:10886: yadi hi pūrvadevatābhyo havīṃṣi vibhajediti śrūyate tatastānyeva havīṃṣi devatāntareṇa yujyamānāni na karmāntaraṃ gamayitumarhanti kintu prakṛtameva karma taddhaviṣkamapanītapūrtadevatākaṃ devatāntarayuktaṃ syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:10887: atra punastredhā taṇḍulān vibhajediti haviṣa eva madhyamādikrameṇa vibhāgaśravaṇādanapanītā haviṣi pūrvadevatā iti pūrvadavatāvaruddhe haviṣi devatāntaramalabdhāvakāśaṃ śrūyamāṇaṃ karmāntarameva gocarayet /
GSP33vacbhamu:10888: apica prāpte pūrvasmin karmaṇi dadhnastaṇḍulānāṃ cendrādidevatā saṃbandhaśca vidhātavyaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10889: carutvaṃ cātra vihitaṃ nāstīti tadapiva vidhātavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:10891: karmāntaraṃ tvapūrvaṃ śakyamekenaiva prayatnenānekaguṇaviśiṣṭaṃ vidhātumiti nimitte karmāntarameva vidhīyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:10892: darśastu lupyate kālāparādhāditi prāpta ucyate-na karmāntaram /
GSP33vacbhamu:10895: bhavedetadevaṃ yadā tredhā taṇḍulān vibhajediti taṇḍulānāṃ tredhā vibhāgavidhānaparametadvākyaṃ syādapi tu vākyāntaraprāptaṃ taṇḍulānāṃ tredhātvamanūdya vibhajedityetāvadvidhatte tatra vākyānyapanīte pūrvavat devatāsaṃbandhe haviṣastasminneva karmaṇyapratyūhaṃ devatāntarasaṃbandhaṃ vidhātuṃ śaknuvanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:10901: prakṛte hi karmaṇi taṇḍulapeṣaṇaprathanaṃ puroḍāśapākādi dadhipayasī ca prāptāni tatrābhyudayanimitte dadhiyuktānāṃ payoyuktānāṃ ca taṇḍulānāṃ vibhajediti vākyena pūrvadevatāpanayaṃ kṛtvā ye madhyamā ityādibhirvākyairdevatāntarasaṃbandhaḥ kṛtaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10903: iti puroḍāśanivṛttau tadarthasya prathanasyāpi nivṛttiranivṛttastu pāko
GSP33vacbhamu:10907: tasmāttadevedaṃ karma na tu karmāntaramiti siddham /
GSP33vacbhamu:10909: 'yaḥ paśukāmaḥ syātso 'māvāsyāmiṣṭvā vatsānapākuryādye sthaviṣṭhāstānagnaye sanimate 'ṣṭhākapālaṃ nirvapedye madhyamāstān viṣṇave
GSP33vacbhamu:10910: śipiviṣṭāya śṛte caruṃ ye kṣodiṣṭhāstanindrāya pradātre dadhaṃścarum' iti
GSP33vacbhamu:10911: atra hi amāvāsyāmiṣṭveti samāpte yāge paśukāmeṣṭividhānaṃ nātra pūrvasya karmaṇo 'nanuvṛtteryāgāntaravidhiriti yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:10915: parasmāt paro varācca varīyāniti parovarīyānudgīthaḥ paramātmarūpaḥ saṃpannaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10922: saṃjñaikatvaṃ tu śrutibāhyatayā bahiraṅgaṃ ca pauruṣeyatayā sāpekṣaṃ ca /
GSP33vacbhamu:10927: yathā māṇavake 'nivṛttāyāmeva māṇavakabuddhivyāpadeśavṛttau siṃhabuddhivyapadeśavṛttiḥ siṃho māṇavaka iti, evaṃ pratimāyāṃ vāsudevabuddhirnāmni ca brahmabuddhistathoṅkāga udgīthabuddhivyapadeśāviti
GSP33vacbhamu:10932: vyākhyāyāṃ ca paryāyāṇamapi sahaprayogo yathā sindhuraḥ karī pikaḥ kokila iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:10935: pratyanuvākaṃ pratyṛcamupakrame ca samāptau cokāraḥ sardavedavyāpīti kiṅgato 'yamoṅkārastattadāpyādiguṇaviśiṣṭastasmai tasmai kāmāvāptyādiphalāyopāsyatvenādhikriyata ityapekṣāyāmudgīthapadeneti
GSP33vacbhamu:10937: udgīthapadenokārādyavayavaghaṭitasāmabhaktibhedābhidhāyinā samudāyasyāvayavabhāvānupapattestatsaṃbandhavayava oṃkāro lakṣyate, na punaroṅkāreṇāvayavina udgīthasya lakṣaṇā /
GSP33vacbhamu:10939: dṛṣṭaśca samudāyaśabdo 'vayave lakṣaṇayā yathā grāmo dagdhaḥ paṭo dagdha
GSP33vacbhamu:10947: lakṣaṇāyā hi lakṣaṇīyaparatvaṃ padasya tasyaiva vākyārthāntarbhāvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:10948: yathā gāṅgāyāṃ ghoṣa iti lakṣyamāṇasya tīrasya vākyārthe 'ntarbhāvo
GSP33vacbhamu:10950: gaurvāhīka ityatra tu gosaṃbandhitīṣṭhanmūtrapurīṣādilakṣaṇayā na tatparatvaṃ gośabdasya /
GSP33vacbhamu:10956: evaṃ hi vijñānāndayorapi sphuṭataraḥ pravṛttinimittabhedaḥ satyapi brahmaṇyaikārthye /
GSP33vacbhamu:10960: evaṃśabdasya sannihitaprakārabhedaparāmarśārthatvātsākṣācchabdopasthāpitasya ca saṃnidhānācchākhāntaragatasya cānukramatayā(?) saṃnidhānābhāvānna kauṣītakiprāṇasaṃvādavākye prāṇasya vasiṣṭhatvādibhirguṇairupāsyatvamapi tu jyeṣṭhatreṣṭhatvamātreṇeti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10961: siddhāntastu-satyaṃ saṃnihitaṃ parāmṛśati evaṅkāro na tu śabdopāttamātraṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:10963: kintu yacchabdābhihitārthanāntarīyakatayā prāptaṃ tadapi hi buddhau saṃnihitaṃ saṃnihitameva
GSP33vacbhamu:10964: yathā 'yasya parṇamayī juhūrbhavati' ityavyabhicāritakratusamanvayayā juhvopasthāpitaḥ kratuḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:10965: tasmādupāsyaphalapratyabhijñānāttadavyabhicāriṇaḥ prakārabhedasyehānuktasyāpi buddhau saṃnidhānātprakṛtaparāmarśinaivaṅkāreṇa parāmarśo yukta iti siddhaṃ kauṣītakibrāhmaṇagatena tāvadevaṅkāreṇa śakyate parāmraṣṭum /
GSP33vacbhamu:10966: tathāpyabhyupetyāpi brūma ityāśayavatā bhāṣyakṛtoktam- tathāpi tasminneva vijñāne vājasaneyibrāhmaṇagateneti
GSP33vacbhamu:10968: kevalasya śrutasya hāniritarasahitasya cākṣutasya kalpanā na cetyarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10976: nahi brahmaṇo dharmiṇaḥ sattve kaścidviśeṣa iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10980: vidheyastu puruṣaprayatnatantraḥ puruṣaprayatnaśca yatra yāvadguṇaviśiṣṭe brahmaṇi coditaḥ sa tāvatyevāvatiṣṭhate nāvihitamapi guṇaṃ cotarīkartumarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:10982: tasmādānandavijñānādayo brahmatattvātmatayoktā yatra yatra brahma śrūyate tatra tatrānuktā api labhyante /
GSP33vacbhamu:10990: kimatra sarveṣāmevārthādīnāṃ paratvaṃ pratipādayiṣitam, āho puruṣasyaiva tatpratipādanārthaṃ cetareṣāṃ paratvapratipādanam /
GSP33vacbhamu:10991: tatra pratyekamarthādiparatvapratipādanaśruteḥ śrūyamāṇatattatparatve ca saṃbhavati na tattadatikarme sarveṣāmekaparatvādhyavasānaṃ nyāṭyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:10999: puruṣaṃ nirguṇaṃ prāpya kālasaṃkhyā na vidyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:11001: prāmāṇikasya vākyabhedasyābhyupeyatvāt pratyekaṃ teṣāmarthādīnāṃ paratvaparāṇyetāni vākyānīti prāptaya ucyate-indriyebhyaḥ parā hyarthā ityeṣa tāvatsaṃdarbho vastutattvapratipādanaparaḥ pratīyate nādhyānavidhiparaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:11003: tadatra yatpratyasya sākṣātprayojanavattvaṃ dṛśyate tatpratyayaparatvaṃ sarveṣām /
GSP33vacbhamu:11014: puruṣaśabdavācyasya cātmanaḥ svayaṃ śrutyaiva duradhigamatvāvadhāraṇādvastutaśca duradhigamatvādarthādīnāṃ ca sugamatvāttatparatvamevārthādiparatvābhidhānasyetyarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:11018: arthādiparatve tu svarūpeṇa vivakṣite nāpekṣitaṃ śrutirācaṣṭe ityāha- apica so 'dhvanaḥ pāramāpnotīti. //15 //
GSP33vacbhamu:11020: śrutismṛtyorhi lokasṛṣṭiḥ parameśvarādhiṣṭhitā parameśvarahiraṇyagarbhakartṛkopalabdhā seyamiha mahābhūtasargamanabhidhāya prāthamikī lokasṛṣṭirupalabhyamānāvāntareśvarakāryā prāgutpatterātmaikatvāvadhāraṇaṃ cāvāntareśvarasaṃbandhitayā gamayati /
GSP33vacbhamu:11025: apica tābhyo gāmānayadityādayaśca vyavahāraḥ śrutyoktā viśeṣavatsvātmaparamātmaṣu prasiddhāḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:11035: ākāśapūrvikāyāṃ vastuto brahmaṇaḥ sṛṣṭau yathā kkacittejaḥpūrvakasṛṣṭyabhidhānaṃ na virudhyate 'etasmādātmana ākāśaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:11037: ākāśaṃ vāyuṃ sṛṣṭveti hi tatra pūrayitavyamevahāpi mahābhūtāni sṛṣṭveti kalpanīyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:11038: sarvaśākhāpratyayatvena jñānasya śrutisidvyarthamaśrutopalabdhau yatnavatā bhavitavyaṃ na punaḥ śrute mahābhūtāditve sargasya śaithilyamādaraṇīyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:11039: apica svādhyāyavidhyadhīnagrahaṇo vedarāśiradhyayanavidhyāpāditaprayojanavadarthamabhidadhāno yathā yathā prayojanādhikyamāpnoti tathā tathānumanyatetarām /
GSP33vacbhamu:11042: naca lokasargo 'pi hiraṇyagarbhavyāpāro 'pi tu tadanupraviṣṭasya paramātmana ityatraivoktam
GSP33vacbhamu:11043: tasmādātmaivāgna ityupakramāttadvyāpāreṇa cekṣaṇena madhye parāmarśādupariṣṭācca bhedajātaṃ mahābhūtaiḥ sahānukamya brahmapratiṣṭhatvena brahmaṇa upasaṃhārādbrahmābhilāpatvamevāsyeti niścīyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:11044: yatra tu puruṣavidhādiśravaṇaṃ tasya bhavettvanyaparatvaṃ gatyantarābhāvāditi sarvamavadātam
GSP33vacbhamu:11047: tatra sacchabdasyāviśeṣeṇātmani cānātmani ca pravṛtternātmārthatvaṃ kintu samastavastvanugatasattāsāmānyārthatvaṃ tathā copakramabhedādbhinnārthatvam /
GSP33vacbhamu:11048: sa ātmā tattvamasīti copasaṃhāra upakramānurodhena saṃpattyarthatayā vyākhyeyaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:11050: tadvijñānena ca sarvavijñānaṃ mahāsāmānyasya sattāyāḥ samastavastuvistāravyāpitvādityevaṃ prāpta ucyate-ātmagṛhītirvājasaneyināmiva chāndogyānāmapyuttarātma ātmā tattvamasīti tādātmyopadeśāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:11051: astu tāvadātmavyātiriktasya prapañcasya sadasattvābhyāmanirvācyatayā na sattvaṃ sattvaṃ tvātmadhātoreva tattvena nirvācyatvāttasmādātmaiva sanniti
GSP33vacbhamu:11053: sacchabdasya sattāsāmānyābhidhāyitvātprativyakti ca tasya pravṛtterātmani cānyatra ca sacchabdapravṛtteḥ saṃśaye satyupasaṃhārānurodhena sadevetyātmanyevāvasthāpyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:11054: nītārthopakramānurodhena hyupasaṃhāravarṇanā na punaḥ saṃdigdhārthenopakrameṇopasaṃhāro varṇanīyaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:11057: na khalvākārādvṛkṣe jñāte śiṃśapādayastadviśeṣā jñātā bhavanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:11059: atra ca pūrvasmin pūrvapakṣe hiraṇyagarbhopāsanā siddhānte tu brahmabhāvaneti //16 //
GSP33vacbhamu:11062: ananaṃ prāṇanaṃ anaḥ prāṇaḥ taṃ prāṇamanagnaṃ kurvantaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:11064: manyanta iti mananaṃ jñānaṃ tadvyānaparyantamiti cintanamuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:11066: khuraravamātreṇāpātata ubhayavidhānapakṣaṃ gṛhītvā madhyamaṃ pakṣamālambate pūrvapakṣī- athavācanameveti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:11067: yadyevamanagnatāsaṃkīrtanasya kiṃ prayojanamityata āha- tasyaiva tu stutyarthamiti. ayamabhisandhiḥ-yadyapi smārtaṃ prāyatyārthamācamanamasti tathāpi
GSP33vacbhamu:11070: jyotiṣṭomaprakaraṇe samāmnāto nānṛtaṃ vadediti pratiṣedho jyotiṣṭomāṅgatayārthavāniti /
GSP33vacbhamu:11075: abhiprāyasthaṃ pūrvapakṣabījaṃ nirākaroti- na ceyaṃ śrutiriti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:11077: iha tu smārtamācamanaṃ sakalakarmāṅgatayā vihitaṃ prāṇopāsanāṅgamapīti vyāpakena smārtenācamanavidhinā punaruktatvādanarthakam /
GSP33vacbhamu:11078: naca smārtasyānena paunarukyaṃ tasya ca vyāpakatvādetasya ca pratiniyaviṣayatvāditi /
GSP33vacbhamu:11079: madhyamaṃ pakṣamapākṛtya prathamapakṣamapākaroti- ata eva ca
GSP33vacbhamu:11086: na cānagnatāsaṃkalpo 'nyataḥ prāpto yataḥ stāvako bhavet /
GSP33vacbhamu:11087: na cācamanamanyato 'prāptaṃ yena vidheyaṃ satstūyetetyāha- svayaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:11089: api caikasya karmaṇa ekārthataivetyucitaṃ tasya balavatpramāṇavaśādananyagatitve satyanekārthatā kalpyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:11090: saṃkalpe tu karmāntare vidhīyamāne nāyaṃ doṣa ityāha- na caivaṃ satyekasyācamanasyeti. apica dṛṣṭicodanāsāhaca4yāddṛṣṭicodanaiva nyāṭyā na cācamanacodanetyāha- apica yadidaṃ kiñceti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:11091: yathā hi śvādimaryādasyānnasyāttumaśakyatvādannadṛṣṭiścodyate evamihāpyapāṃ paridhānāsaṃbhavāddṛṣṭireva codyata ityannadṛṣṭividhisāhacaryādgamyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:11092: aśabdatvaṃ ca yadyapi dṛṣṭyabhyavahārayostulyaṃ tathāpi dṛṣṭiḥ śābdadṛśyanāntarīyakatayā sākṣācchabdena kriyamāṇopalabhyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:11094: kiñca chāndogyānāṃ vājasaneyināṃ cācamane prāyeṇācāmantīti vartamānāpadeśaḥ evaṃ yatrāpi vidhivibhaktistatrāpi jartilayavāgvavā vā juhuyāditivadvidhitvamavivakṣitam /
GSP33vacbhamu:11100: dvayorvidyāvidhyorekaśākhāgatayoragṛhmamāṇaviśeṣatayā kasya ko 'nuvāda iti viniścayābhāvādajñātajñāpanāpravṛttapravartanārūpasya ca vidhitvasya svarasasiddherubhayatropasanābhedaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:11106: tatra bhūyāṃso guṇā yasya karmaṇo vidhīyante tatra tasya pradhānasya vidhiritaratra tu tadanuvādena katipayaguṇavidhiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:11107: yathā yatra chatracāmarapatākāhāstikāścīyaśaktikayāṣṭīkadhānuṣkakārpāṇikaprāsikapadātipracayastatrāsti rājeti gamyate na tu katipayagajavājipadātibhāji tadamātye, tathehāpi /
GSP33vacbhamu:11113: yadyekasyāmapi śākhāyāṃ tattvena pratyabhijñānādupāsanasya tatra vihitānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ saṃkaraḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:11116: satyasya ca pradhānasya prakṛtatvādadhidaivamityasya viśeṣaṇatayopasarjanatvenāprastutvātprastutasya ca satyasyābhedātpūrvavadguṇasaṃkaraḥ //20 //
GSP33vacbhamu:11117: iti prāpta ucyate- na vā viśeṣāt. /
GSP33vacbhamu:11118: satyaṃ yatra svarūpamātrasaṃbandho dharmāṇāṃ śrūyate tatraivaṃ svarūpasya pratyabhijñāyamānatvāttanmātrasaṃbandhitvācca dharmāṇām /
GSP33vacbhamu:11119: yatra tu saviśeṣaṇaṃ pradhānamavagamyate tatra saviśeṣaṇasyaiva tasya dharmābhisaṃbandho na nirviśeṣaṇasya nāṭyanyaviśeṣaṇasahitasya /
GSP33vacbhamu:11122: yathā cācāryasya gacchato 'nugamanaṃ vihitaṃ na tiṣṭhato bhavati,
GSP33vacbhamu:11129: brahma bhūtānāṃ prathamaṃ tu jajñe tenārhati brahmaṇā spardhituṃ kaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:11130: ' brahma jyeṣṭhaṃ yeṣāṃ tāni brahmajyeṣṭhā jajñe āsa /
GSP33vacbhamu:11131: yadyapi tāsu tāsu śāṇḍilyādividyāsvāyatanabhedaparigraheṇādhyatmikāyatanatvaṃ saṃbhṛtyādīnāṃ guṇānāmādhidaikatvamityāyatanabhedaḥ pratibhāti, tathāpi jyāyān diva
GSP33vacbhamu:11132: ityādinā saṃdarbheṇādhidaivikavibhūtipratyabhijñānātṣoḍaśakalādyāsu ca vidyāsvāyatanāśravaṇādantato brahmāśrayatayā sāmyena pratyabhijñāsaṃbhavāt saṃbṛtyādīnāṃ guṇānāṃ śāṇḍilyādividyāsu ṣoḍaśakalādividyāsu copasaṃhāra iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:11133: rāddhāntastu-mithaḥ samānaguṇaśravaṇaṃ pratyabhijñāya yadvidyā apūrvānapi tatrāśrutānguṇānupasaṃhārayati na tviha saṃbhṛtyādiguṇakabrahmavidyāyaṃ śāṇḍilyādividyāgataguṇaśravaṇamasti /
GSP33vacbhamu:11134: yā tu kācidādhidaivikī vibhūtiḥ śāṇḍilyādividyāyaṃ śrūyate tasmāstatprakaraṇādhīnatvāttāvanmātraṃ grahīṣyate naitāvanmātreṇa saṃbhṛtyādīnanukraṣṭumarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:11139: tasmātsaṃbhṛtiśca dyuvyāptiśca tadidaṃ saṃbhṛtidyuvyāptyapi cātaḥ pratyabhijñānābhāvānna śāṇḍilyādividyāsūpasaṃhriyata iti siddham //23 //
GSP33vacbhamu:11144: yajñasya svarūpaṃ yajamānastasya ca cetanatvādviduṣa iti sāmānādhikaraṇyasaṃbhavaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:11146: evaṃ prāpta ucyate yādṛśaṃ tāṇḍināṃ paiṅgināṃ ca puruṣayajñasaṃpādanaṃ tadāyuṣaśca tredhā vyavasthitasya savanatrayasaṃpādanam /
GSP33vacbhamu:11154: ātmanastu cetanasya yajamānatvaṃ ca vidvattvaṃ copapadyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:11155: tathā cāyamarthaḥ-evaṃ viduṣaḥ puruṣasya yaḥ saṃbandhī yajñaḥ tasya
GSP33vacbhamu:11156: saṃbandhitayā yajamāna ātmā tathā cātmano yajamānatvaṃ ca vidvatsaṃbandhitā ca yajñasya mukhye syātāmitarachātmaśabdasya svarūpavācitve viduṣo yajñasyeti ca yajamāno yajñasvarūpamiti ca gauṇe syātām /
GSP33vacbhamu:11158: tasmātpuruṣayajñatā taittirīye nāstīti tayā tāvanna sāmyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:11159: naca patnīyajamānavedavidyādisaṃpādanaṃ taittirīyāṇāmivi tāṇḍināṃ paiṅgināṃ vā vidyate savanasaṃpattirapyeṣāṃ vilakṣaṇaiva /
GSP33vacbhamu:11161: apica tasyaivaṃ viduṣa ityanuvādaśrutau satyāmanekārthavidhāne vākyabhedadoṣaprasaktirityarthaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:11162: api ceyaṃ paiṅgināṃ tāṇḍināṃ ca puruṣayajñavidyāphalāntarayuktā svatantrā pratīyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:11168: ātharvaṇikādyupaniṣadārambhe te te mantrāstāni tāni ca pravargyādīti karmāṇi samamnātīni /
GSP33vacbhamu:11171: saphalā hi sarvā vidyā āmnātāstatsannidhau mantrāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:11172: karmāṇi ca samāmnātāni 'phalavatsannidhāphalaṃ tadaṅgam' iti nyāyādvidyāṅgābhāvena vijñāyante
GSP33vacbhamu:11175: pramāṇāni, nahi yathā darśapūrṇamāsāvārabhya samidādayaḥ samāmrātāstathā kāñcidvidyāmārabhya mantrā vā karmāṇi vā samāmrātāni /
GSP33vacbhamu:11177: naca śrutasvāṅgaparipūrṇā vidyā etānākāṅkṣitumarhati yena prakaraṇāpaditasāmānyasaṃbandhānāṃ saṃnidhirviśeṣasaṃbandhāyā bhavedityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:11180: mantrāṇāṃ tu svādhyāyavidhyāpāditapuruṣārthabhāvanāṃ karmaṇāṃ ca pravargyādīnāṃ svavidhyāpāditapuruṣārthabhāvānāṃ puruṣābhilaṣitamākāṅkṣatāṃ saṃnidhānādanyatārākāṅkṣānibandho raktapaṭanyāyena saṃbandhaḥ tatrāpi ca vidyānāṃ phalavattvāttādarthyamaphalānāṃ mantrāṇāṃ karmaṇāṃ ca
GSP33vacbhamu:11184: idaṃ khalu nivṛttākāṅkṣāyā vidyāyāḥ saṃnidhāne śrutamanākāṅkṣāyā sākāṅkṣasyāpi saṃbaddhumasāmarthyāttasyā apyākāhkṣāmutthāpayati /
GSP33vacbhamu:11186: asamarthasya copakārakatvānupapatteḥ prakaraṇinaṃ prati upakārasāmarthyamātmanaḥ kalpayati
GSP33vacbhamu:11187: naca satyapi sāmarthye tatra śrutyā aviniyuktaṃ sadaṅgatāmupagantumarhatītyanayā paramparayā saṃnidhiḥ śrutimarthāpattyā kalpayati /
GSP33vacbhamu:11192: yadyapi ca pravargyo na kiñcidārabhya śrūyate tathāpi vākyasaṃyogena kratusaṃyogena kratusaṃbandhaṃ pratipadyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:11195: yadyapi jyotiṣṭomavikṛtāvapi santyupasadastathāpi tatrānumānikyo jyotiṣṭome tu pratyakṣavihitāstena śīghrapravṛttitayā jyotiṣṭomāṅgataiva vākyenāvagamyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:11196: apica prakṛtau vihitasya pravargyasya codakenopasadvattadvikṛtāvapi prāptiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:11197: prakṛtau vā adviruktatvāditi nyāyājjyotiṣṭome eva vidhānamupasadā saha
GSP33vacbhamu:11202: yathā 'agnaye tvā juṣṭaṃ nirvapāmi' iti mantre agnaye nirvapāmiti pade karmasamavetārthaprakāśake
GSP33vacbhamu:11203: śiṣṭānāṃ tu padānāṃ tadekavākyatayā yathākathañcidvyākhyānamevamihāpi hṛdayapadasyopāsanāyāṃ samavetārthatvāttadanusāreṇa tadekavākyatāpannāpi padāntarāṇi gauṇyā lakṣaṇayā ca vṛttyā kathañcinneyānīti nāsamavetārthatā mantrāṇām /
GSP33vacbhamu:11204: naca mantraviniyogo nopāsaneṣu dṛṣṭo yenātyantādṛṣṭaṃ kalpyata ityāha- dṛṣṭaścopāsaneṣviti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:11205: yadyapi vākyena balīyasā saṃnidhirdurbalo bādhyate tathāpi virodhe sati /
GSP33vacbhamu:11207: vākyena viniyuktasyāpi jyotiṣṭome pravargyasya saṃnidhinā vidyāyāmapi viniyogasaṃbhavāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:11208: yathā 'brahmavarcasakāmo bṛhaspatisavena yajeta' iti brahmavarcasaphalo 'pi bṛhaspatisavo vājapeyāṅgatvena codyate-vājapeyeneṣṭvā bṛhaspatisavena yajeteti /
GSP33vacbhamu:11209: atra hi ktvaḥ samānakartṛkatvamavagamyate dhātusaṃbandhe pratyayavidhānāt
GSP33vacbhamu:11210: dhātvarthāntarasaṃbandhaśca kathaṃ ca samānaḥ kartā syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:11215: naca guṇapradhānabhāvamantareṇaikaprayogatā saṃbandhaśca tatrāpi vājapeyasya prakaraṇe samāmnānādvājapeyaḥ pradhānam /
GSP33vacbhamu:11219: nahyetadvacanaṃ kasyaciddarśapūrṇamāsamya somasya vā prakaraṇe samāmnātam
GSP33vacbhamu:11220: tathāca dvayoḥ sādhikāratayā agṛhyamāṇaviśeṣatayā guṇapradhānabhāvaṃ prati vinigamanābhāvenādhiṣṭhānamātravivakṣayā lākṣaṇikaṃ samānakartṛkatvamityadoṣaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:11223: tathā sati dvayorapi pṛthagadhikāratayā pratītaṃ samapradhānatvamatyaktaṃ bhaveditarathā tu guṇapradhānabhāvena tattyāgo bhavet /
GSP33vacbhamu:11226: hṛdayaṃ pravidhyetyayaṃ mantraḥ svarasatastāvadābhicārikakarmasamavetaṃ sakalaireva padairarthamabhidadhadupalabhyate tadasyābhidhānasāmarthyalakṣaṇaṃ liṅgaṃ vākyaprakaraṇābhyāṃ kramādbalīyobhyāmapi balavatkimaṅga punaḥ kramāt, tasmālliṅgena saṃnidhimapodyābhicārikakarmaśeṣatvamevāpādyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:11229: ābhicārike tu karmaṇi sarveṣāmarthasamavāya iti kimekapadasamavetārthatā kariṣyati /
GSP33vacbhamu:11232: 'deva savitaḥ prasuva yajñam' ityāderapi yajñaprasavaliṅgasya yajñaṅgatve
GSP33vacbhamu:11234: evamanyeṣāmapi śvetāśva ityevamādīnāṃ keṣāñcilliṅgena keṣāñcicchutyā keṣāñcitpramāṇāntareṇa.prakaraṇeneti /
GSP33vacbhamu:11235: kasmātpunaḥ saṃnidhirliṅgādibhirvādhyate ityata āha- durbalo hi saṃnidhiriti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:11237: tatra tu śrutiliṅgayoḥ samavāye samānaviṣayatvalakṣaṇe virodhe kiṃ balīya iti cintā /
GSP33vacbhamu:11238: atrodāharaṇam-astyaindrī ṛk 'kadācanastarīrasi nendra' ityādikā śrutirviniyokī 'aindrayā gārhapatyamupatiṣṭhate' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:11240: śruteśca gārhapatyamiti dvitīyāto gārhapatyasya śeṣitvaṃ aindriyeti catṛtīyāśruteraindyā ṛcaḥ śeṣatvamavagamyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:11241: yadyapi gārhapatyamiti dvitīyāśruterāgneyīmṛcaṃ prati gārhapatyasya śeṣitvenopapatteḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:11242: yadyapi caindrayeti ca tṛtīyāśruteraindrayā indraṃ prati śeṣatvanopapatteravirodhaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:11243: padāntarasaṃbandhe tu vākyasyaiva liṅgena virodho na tu śruteḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:11246: dvitīyātṛtīyāśrutī hi kārakavibhaktitayā kriyāṃ prati prakṛtyarthasya karmakaraṇabhāvamavagamayata iti viniyojike /
GSP33vacbhamu:11247: kriyāṃ prati hi karmaṇaḥ śeṣitvaṃ karaṇasya ca śeṣatvamiti hi viniyogaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:11248: padāntarānapekṣe ca kriyāṃ prati śeṣaśeṣitve śrutimātrātpratiyete iti śraute /
GSP33vacbhamu:11252: tasmādvākyalabhyaṃ viśiṣamapekṣya śrautaḥ śeṣaśeṣibhāvo liṅgena virudhyata iti śrutiliṅgavirodhe kiṃ liṅgānuguṇena gārhatvamiti dvitīyāśrutiḥ saptamyarthe vyākhyāyatāṃ gārhapatyasamīpe aindrayendra upastheya iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:11254: prabhavati hi svocitāyāṃ kriyāyāṃ gārhapatya itīndra indarteraiśvaryavacanatvāditi /
GSP33vacbhamu:11256: no khalu yatrāsamarthaṃ tacchutisahasreṇāpi tatra viniyoktuṃ śakyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:11259: taccāsyā ṛcaḥ pramāṇāntarataḥ śabdataśca indre pratīyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:11262: tasmāddārudahanasyeva dahanasya saliladahane viniyogo gārhapatye viniyoga aindrayāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:11265: tasmādaindrayendra eva gārhapatyasamīpa upasthātavya iti prāpte
GSP33vacbhamu:11268: yadi hi sāmarthyamavagamya śruterviniyogamavadhārayetpramātā tataḥ śruterviniyogaṃ prati liṅgajñānāpekṣatvāddurbalatvaṃ bhavet /
GSP33vacbhamu:11271: avagate tu tato viniyoge nāsamarthasya sa iti tannirvāhāya sāmarthyaṃ kalpyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:11274: viniyoge tu siddhe tadanyathānupapattyā paścātpratīyata iti śrutiviniyogātparācīnā sāmarthyapratītistadanurodhenāvasthāpanīyā
GSP33vacbhamu:11275: liṅgaṃ tu na svato viniyojakamapi tu viniyokīṃ kalpyitvā śrutim /
GSP33vacbhamu:11276: tathāhi-na svarasato liṅgādanenendra upasthātavya iti pratīyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:11277: kintvīdṛgindra iti tasya tu prakaraṇāmnānasāmartyāt sāmānyataḥ prakaraṇāpatitaidamarthyasya tadanyathānupapattyā viniyogakalpanāyāmapi śrautādviniyogātkalpanīyasya viniyogasyārthaviprakarṣācchutireva kalpayitumucitā na tu tadartho viniyogaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:11287: tathāca yāvalliṅgādviniyojikāṃ śrutiṃ kalpayituṃ prakāntavyāpārastāvatpratyakṣayā śrutyā gārhapatye viniyogaḥ siddha iti nivṛttākāṅkṣaṃ prakaramamiti kasyānupapattyā liṅgaṃ viniyokīṃ śrutimupakalpyet mantrasamāmnānasya pratyakṣayaiva viniyogaśrutyopapāditatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:11289: pramite tu pramātṛṇāṃ pramautsukyaṃ vihanyate' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:11290: tasmātpratītaśrautaviniyogopapattyai mantrasya sāmarthye tadanuguṇatvena nīyamānaṃ prathamāṃ vṛttimajahajjaghanyayāpi neyamiti siddham /
GSP33vacbhamu:11291: liṅgavākyayoriha virodho yathā-'syonaṃ te sadanaṃ kṛṇomi ghṛtasya dhārayā suśeṣaṃ kalpyāmi
GSP33vacbhamu:11292: tasminsīdāmṛte pratitiṣṭha vrīhīṇāṃ medha sumanasyamānaḥ' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:11293: kimayaṃ kṛtsna eva mantraḥ sadanakaraṇe puroḍāśāsādane ca prayoktavya uta kalpyāmyanta upastaraṇe tasmintsīdetyevamādistu puroḍāśāsādana iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:11294: yadi vākyaṃ balīyaḥ kṛtsnau mantra ubhayatra, suśevaṃ kalpyāmītyetadapekṣo hi tasminsīdetyādiḥ pūrveṇaikavākyatāmupaiti yatkalpayāmi tasmintsīdeti /
GSP33vacbhamu:11295: atha liṅgaṃ balīyastataḥ kalpyāmyantaḥ sadanakaraṇe tatprakāśane hi tatsamartham /
GSP33vacbhamu:11298: liṅgādvākyaṃ balīya ityubhayatra kṛtsnasya viniyoga iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:11299: iha hi yattatpadasamabhivyāhāreṇa vibhajyamānasākāṅkṣatvādekavākyatāyāṃ siddhāyāṃ tadanurodhena paścāttadabhidhānasāmārthyaṃ kalpanīyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:11302: tadevaṃ pratītaikavākyatānirvāhāya tadanuguṇatayā sāmarthyaṃ kḷptaṃ sanna
GSP33vacbhamu:11303: tadvyāpādayitumarhati, api tu viniyojikāṃ śrutiṃ mantraḥ prayoktavya iti prāptam /
GSP33vacbhamu:11304: evaṃ prāpte ucyate-bhavedetadevaṃ yadyekavākyatāvagamapūrvaṃ sāmarthyāvadhāraṇamapi tu avadhṛtasāmarthyānāṃ padānāṃ praśliṣṭapāṭhitānāṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:11306: yavanti padāni pradhānamekamarthamavagamayituṃ samarthāni vibhāge sākāṅkṣāṇi tānyekaṃ vākyam
GSP33vacbhamu:11309: tayośca sadanakaraṇaṃ kalpayāmyanto mantraḥ samarthaḥ prakāśayituṃ puroḍāśāsādanaṃ ca tasminsīdetyādiḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:11310: tataśca yāvadekavākyatāvaśena sāmarthyamanumīyate tāvatpratītaṃ sāmarthyamekaikasya bhāgasyaikaikasminnarthe viniyojikāṃ śrutiṃ kalpayati
GSP33vacbhamu:11311: tathāca śrutyaivaikaikasya bhāgasyaikatra viniyoge sati prakaraṇapāṭhopapattau na vākyakalpitaṃ liṅgaṃ viniyojikāṃ śrutimaparāṃ kalpayitumarhatītyekavākyatābuddhirutpannāpyābhāsībhavati liṅgena bādhanāt
GSP33vacbhamu:11312: yatra tu virodhakaṃ liṅgaṃ nāsti tatra samavetārthaikadvitripadaikavākyatā padāntarāṇāmapi sāmarthyaṃ kalpayatīti bhavati vākyasya viniyojakatvam /
GSP33vacbhamu:11316: atra ca padānāṃ parasparāpekṣāvaśātkasmiṃścidviśiṣṭa ekasminnarthe paryavasitānāṃ vākyatvaṃ, labdhavākyabhāvanāṃ ca punaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:11318: kartavyāyāḥ khalu phalabhāvanāyā labdhadhātvarthakaraṇāyā itikartavyatākāṅkṣāyā vacanaṃ prakaraṇamācakṣate vṛddhāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:11321: tadetasmin svapadagaṇena kiyatyapyarthe paryavasite karaṇopakāralakṣaṇakāryāntarāpekṣāyāṃ 'samidho yajati'
GSP33vacbhamu:11323: samidādibhāvanā hi svavidhyupahitāḥ puruṣe hitaṃ bhāvyapekṣamāṇā viśvajitryāyena vānuṣaṅgato vārthavādato vā phalāntarāpratilambhena darśapūrṇamāsabhāvanāṃ nirvārayitumīśate /
GSP33vacbhamu:11324: tasmāttadakāṅkṣāyāmupanipatitānyetāni vākyāni svakāryāpekṣāṇi tadapekṣitakaraṇopakāralakṣaṇaṃ kāryamasādya nirvaṇvanti ca nirvārayanti ca pradhānam /
GSP33vacbhamu:11328: taśca na mitha ekavākyatāṃ gantumarhantīti liṅgena paurṇamāsīyāgādindrāgnīśabda utkraṣṭavyaḥ amāvāsyāyāṃ ca samavetārtatvātprayoktavyaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:11329: athedānīṃ saṃdihyate-kiṃ yadindrāgnipadaikavākyatayā pratīyate 'avivṛdhethāṃ maho jyāyo 'kātām' iti tannotākraṣṭavyamutendrāgniśabdābhyāṃ sahotkraṣṭavyamiti /
GSP33vacbhamu:11330: tatra yadi prakaraṇaṃ balīyastato 'panītadevatāko 'pi śeṣaḥ prayoktavyo 'tha vākyaṃ tato tatra devatāśabdastatraiva prayoktavyaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:11335: evaṃ prāpta ucyate-bhavedetadevaṃ yadi viniyojyasvarūpasāmarthyamanapekṣya prakaramaṃ viniyojayet
GSP33vacbhamu:11336: api tu viniyogāya tadapekṣaye 'nyathā pūṣādyanumantraṇamantrasya dvadaśopasattāyāśca notkarṣaḥ syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:11337: tadrūpālocanāyāṃ ca tadyadeva śīghraṃ pratīyate tattadvalavadviprakṛṣṭaṃ tu durbalam /
GSP33vacbhamu:11338: tatra yadi tadrūpaṃ śrutyā liṅgena vākyena vānyatra viniyuktaṃ tataḥ prakaramaṃ bhaṅktvotkṛṣyate, piriśiṣṭaistu prakaraṇasyetikartavyatāpekṣā puryate /
GSP33vacbhamu:11339: atha svasya śīghrapravṛttaṃ śrutyādi nāsti tataḥ prakaramaṃ viniyojakam /
GSP33vacbhamu:11344: tataśca saha prasthitayorvākyaprakaraṇayoryāvatprakaraṇenaikavākyatā kalpyate tāvadvākyenābhidhānasāmarthyaṃ, yāvaditaratra vākyena sāmarthyaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:11345: tāvaditaratra sāmarthyena śrutistāvadiha śrutyā viniyogastāvatā ca vicchinnāyāmākāṅkṣāyāṃ śrutyanumāne vihate prakaraṇenāntarā kalpitaṃ vilīyanta iti vākyabalīyastvāttaddevatāśeṣaṇāmapakarṣa eveti siddham //
GSP33vacbhamu:11349: yadi prakaramaṃ balīyastataḥ samastasya rājasūyasya, atha kramastato 'bhiṣecanīyasyaiveti, kiṃ tāvatprāptam /
GSP33vacbhamu:11351: gāmānaya prasādaṃ paśyeti gāmityasya kriyāmātrāpekṣiṇaḥ paśyetyanenāpi saṃbandhasaṃbhavādvinigamanābhāvaprasaṅgāt
GSP33vacbhamu:11355: ayameti putro rājñaḥ puruṣo 'pasāryatāmityatra rājña ityasya putrapuruṣapadasaṃnidhānāviśeṣānmā bhūdavinigamanā /
GSP33vacbhamu:11357: atra putraśabdasya saṃbandhivacanatayā samutthitākāṅkṣasyāntike yadupanipatitaṃ saṃbandhyantarākāṅkṣaṃ padaṃ tasya tenaivākāṅkṣāparipūrteḥ puruṣapadena puruṣarūpamātrābhidhāyinā svatantreṇaiva na saṃbandhaḥ kintu pareṇāpasāryatāmityanenāpasaraṇīyāpekṣeṇeti /
GSP33vacbhamu:11360: tathā cākāṅkṣitamapi na yāvatsaṃnidhāpyate tāvanna saṃbadhyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:11361: tathā saṃnihitamapi yāvannākāṅkṣyate na tāvatsaṃbadhyata iti dvayoḥ saṃbandhaṃ prati samānabalatvātkramaprakaraṇayoḥ samuccayāsaṃbhavācca vikalpena rājasūyābhiṣecanīyayorviniyogaḥ śaunaḥśepopākhyānādīnāmiti prāptam /
GSP33vacbhamu:11362: evaṃ prāpta ucyate-rājasūyake kathaṃbhāvāpekṣā hi pavitrādārabhya
GSP33vacbhamu:11365: anirjñātaphalaṃ karma tasya prakaraṇāṅgatā ' iti nyāyādrājasūyāṅgatā śaunaḥśopopākhyānādīnām
GSP33vacbhamu:11366: abhiṣecanīyasya tu svavākyopāttapadārthanirākāṅkṣasya saṃnidhipāṭhenākāṅkṣotthāpanīyā yāvattāvatsiddhākāṅkṣeṇa rājasūyenaikavākyatā kalpyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:11367: yāvaccābhiṣecanīyaikavākyatayā liṅgaṃ kalpyate tāvatkḷptaliṅgaṃ viniyokrīṃ śrutiṃ kalpyati yāvadvākyakalpitena liṅgena śrutiritaratra kalpte tāvatkḷptayā śrutyā viniyoge sati prakaraṇapāṭhopapattau saṃnidhānaparikalpitamantarā vilīyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:11370: tasmātprakaraṇavirodhe kramasya bādha eva naca vikalpo durbalatvāditi siddham //
GSP33vacbhamu:11372: sānnāṭyakrame ca śundhadhvaṃ daivyāya karmaṇa iti śundhanārtho mantraḥ samāmnātaḥ, tatra saṃdihyate kiṃ samākhyānasya balīyastvātpuroḍāśapātrāṇāṃ śundhena viniyoktavyaḥ, āho sānnāṭyapātrāṇāṃ śundhena kramo balīyāniti /
GSP33vacbhamu:11374: samākhyānāṃ balīya iti pauroḍāśikaśabdena hi puroḍāśasaṃbandhīnītyucyante tānyadhikṛtya pravṛttaṃ kāṇḍaṃ pauroḍāśikam /
GSP33vacbhamu:11375: tataśca yāvatkrameṇa prakaraṇādyanumānaparamparayā saṃbandhaḥ pratipādanīyaḥ yāvatsamākhyayā śrutyaiva sākṣādeva sa pratipādita iti arthaviprakarṣeṇa kramātsamākhyaiva balīyasīti puroḍāśapātraśundhena mantraḥ prayoktavyaḥ na sānnāṭyapātraśundhana iti prāptam /
GSP33vacbhamu:11377: tathāhi-samākhyā na tāvatsaṃbandhasya vācikā kintu pauroḍāśaviśiṣṭaṃ kāṇḍamāha /
GSP33vacbhamu:11378: tadviśiṣṭatvānyathānupapattyā tava saṃbandhaḥ kāṇḍasyānumīyate na tu sākṣānmantrabedasya /
GSP33vacbhamu:11380: na cāsau saṃbandho 'pi śrutyaiva śeṣaśeṣibhāvaḥ pratīyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:11386: prakaraṇāṅgatvamaviruddhamiti viśeṣāpekṣāyāṃ sānnāṭyakramaḥ sānnāṭyaṃ prati prakaraṇādyanumānadvāreṇa viniyogaṃ kalpayitumutsahate na tu samākhyānam /
GSP33vacbhamu:11390: yāvacca kḷptena saṃnidhānenākāṅkṣā kalpyate tāvaditaratra kḷptayākāṅkṣayaikavākyatā tāvaditaratraikavākyatayā kḷptayopakārasāmarthyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:11392: yāvadatra liṅgena viniyojikā śrutistāvaditaratra kḷptayā śrutyā viniyoga iti tāvataiva prakaraṇapāṭhopapatteḥ sarvaṃ samākhyānakalpitaṃ vicchinnamūlatvāttūyamānaśasyamiva nirbījaṃ bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:11397: tatrāpi ca 'bādhikaiva śrutirnityaṃ samākhyā bādhyate sadā /
GSP33vacbhamu:11400: tadvayaṃ vistarādbibhyato 'pi prathamatantrānabhijñānukampayā nidhrā vistare patitāḥ sma ityuparamyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:11401: tasmādyathānujñāpanānujñayoḥ prajñātakramayorupahūta upahūyasvetyevaṃ mantravāmnātau deśasāmānyāttathaivāṅgatayā prāpnutaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:11402: upahūta iti liṅgato 'nujñāmantro nānujñāpane upahūyasveti ca liṅgato
GSP33vacbhamu:11404: tadiha liṅgena kramaṃ bādhitvā viparītaṃ śeṣatvamāpādyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:11405: yāvaddhi sthānena prakaraṇamutpādyaikavākyatvaṃ kalpyate tāvalliṅgena śrutiṃ kalpayitvā sādhito viniyoga iti akalpitaliṅgaśruteḥ kramasya bādhaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:11406: tadvidihāpi viniyoge pratyekāntaritena liṅgena caturantaritasya vidyākramasya bādha iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:11407: yadyapi prathamatantra evāyamartha upapāditastathāpi virodhe tadupapādanamiha tvavirodhaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:11410: athaiva pratītivirodho naca vastuvirodhaḥ sa vidyāyāṃ viniyoge 'pi tulyaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:11416: upapādite tu śrutyādibiḥ prakaraṇapāṭhe kṣīṇatvādarthāpatteḥ kramo na svocitāṃ pramāmutpādayitumarhati pramityābhāvāditi /
GSP33vacbhamu:11417: bṛhaspatisavasya tu ktvāśrutireva dhātusaṃbandhādhikārakātsamānakartṛkatāyāṃ vihitā saṃyogapṛthaktvena viniyuktamapi viniyojayantī na śakyā śrutyantareṇa niroddhuṃ svapramāmiti vaiṣamyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:11418: tadidamuktam- vājapeye tu bṛhaspatisavasya spaṣṭaṃ viniyogāntaramiti /
GSP33vacbhamu:11420: tulyabalatayā bṛhaspatisamasya tulyatāśaṅkāpākaraṇadvāreṇa samuccayo na tu pṛthaguktitayā parasparāpekṣatvāditi /
GSP33vacbhamu:11423: yatra hānopāyane śrūyete tatrāvivādaḥ saṃnipāte yatrāpyupāyanamātraśravaṇaṃ tatrāpi nāntarīyakatayā hānamākṣiptamityasti saṃnipātaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:11424: yatra tu hānamātraṃ sukṛtaduṣkṛtayoḥ śrutaṃ na śrūyate upāyanaṃ, tatra kimupāyanamupādānaṃ saṃnipatenna veti saṃśayaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:11431: nanu yathopāyanaṃ śrutaṃ hānamupasthāpayatyevaṃ hānamapi upāyanamityata
GSP33vacbhamu:11433: grahaṇaṃ hi na svāmino 'pagamamantareṇa bhavatīti grahaṇādapagamasiddhiravaśyaṃbhāvinī /
GSP33vacbhamu:11434: apagamastvasatyapyanyena grahaṇe dṛṣṭo yathā prāyaścittenāpagatirenasa iti
GSP33vacbhamu:11437: ayamasyārthaḥ-karmāntare vihitaṃ hi na karmāntara upasaṃhriyate pramāṇābhāvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:11438: yatpunarna vidhīyate kintu stutyarthaṃ siddhatayā saṃkīrtyate tadasati bādhake devatādhikaraṇanyāyena śabdataḥ pratīyamānaṃ parityaktumaśakyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:11439: tathāca vidhūtayoḥ sukṛtaduṣkṛtayornirguṇāyāṃ vidyāyāmaśvaromādivatkiṃ bhavatvityākāṅkṣāyāṃ na tāvatprāyaścitteneva tadvilayasaṃbhavastathā satyaśvaromarāhudṛṣṭāntānupapatteḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:11451: yadyapyanyadīye api sukṛtaduṣkṛte anyasya phalaṃ prayacchataḥ, yathā putrasya śrāddhakarma pitustṛptiṃ yathā ca piturvaiśvānarīyeṣṭiḥ putrasya /
GSP33vacbhamu:11453: tathāpyanyadīye api sukṛtaduṣkṛte sākṣādanyasminna saṃbhavata ityāśayena śaṅkā /
GSP33vacbhamu:11458: prayojanaṃ copāsake sauhārdamācaritavyaṃ na svasauhārdamiti chanda evācchanda ācchādanādācchabdo bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:11465: nanu svatantrāṇyeva santu vākyānītyata āha- śrutyantarakṛtamiti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:11466: aṣṭadoṣavikalpaprasaṅgabhayena vākyāntarasya vākyāntaraśeṣatvamatrabhavato jaiminerapi saṃmatamityāha- taduktaṃ dvādaśalakṣaṇyām. /
GSP33vacbhamu:11468: ityetadeva sūtramarthadvāreṇa paṭhati- api tu vākyaśeṣatvāditaraparyudāsaḥ syātpratiṣedhe vikalpaḥ.syātsa cānyāṭya iti śeṣaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:11469: evaṃ kila śrūyate-'eṣa vai saptadaśaḥ prajāpatiryajñe yajñe 'nvāyatta' iti
GSP33vacbhamu:11476: dṛṣṭaṃ hi tādātvikīmasya sundaratāṃ gamayati nāyatau doṣavattāṃ niṣedhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:11478: niṣedhaśāstraṃ tu tādātvikaṃ saundaryamabādhamānameva pravṛttyunmukhaṃ naraṃ nivārayadāyatyāmasya duḥkhaphalatvamavagamayati /
GSP33vacbhamu:11480: tato gārataḥ pravṛttamapyāyatyāṃ duḥkhato vibhyataṃ puruṣaṃ śaknoti nivārayitumiti balīyayān śāstrīyaḥ pratiṣedho gārataḥ pravṛtteriti na tayā vikalpamarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:11485: naca vācyaṃ yāvadyajatiṣu yeyajāmahakaraṇaṃ yāvadyajatisāmānyadvāreṇānuyājaṃ yajativiśeṣamupasarpati tāvadanuyājagatena niṣedhena tanniṣiddhamiti śīghrapravṛtteḥ sāmānyaśāstradviśeṣaniṣedho balavāniti yato bhavatvevaṃvidhiṣu brāhmaṇebhyo dadhi dīyatāṃ takraṃ kauṇḍinyāyeti /
GSP33vacbhamu:11486: tatra takradhaprāptyai tadvidhimapekṣate pravartitumiha tu prāptapūrvakatvāpratiṣedhasya yeyajāmahasya cānyato 'prāptestanniṣedhena
GSP33vacbhamu:11488: naca sāpekṣatayā niṣedhādvidhireva balīyānityatulyaśiṣṭatayā na vikalpaḥ kintu niṣedhasyaiva bādhanamiti sāṃprataṃ, tathā sati niṣedhaśāstraṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:11494: na cātra tathā yeyajāmahābhāvaḥ, yajatiṣu yeyajāmahavidhānāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:11500: tenādoṣaduṣṭo 'pi vikalpa āsthīyate pakṣe 'pi prāmāṇyānmā bhūtpramatagītateti /
GSP33vacbhamu:11502: evaṃ hi tadā nañaḥ saṃbandho 'nanuyājeṣu yajatiṣvanuyājavartiteṣu yeyajāmahaḥ kartavya iti
GSP33vacbhamu:11505: yadetadyeyajāmahaṅkarotītyetannānuyājeṣu yāvaduktaṃ syādanuyājavarjitoṣviti tāvaduktaṃ bhavati nānuyājeṣviti /
GSP33vacbhamu:11511: yathā hi sukṛtaduṣkṛtayoramūrtayoḥ kalpanaṃ nāñjasaṃ sūrtyanuvidhāyitvātkampasya /
GSP33vacbhamu:11513: tasmādyatra vidhūnanamātraṃ śrutaṃ tatra kampanena varaṃ svakāryarambhāccālanamātrameva lakṣyatāṃ na tu tato 'pagatyānyatra
GSP33vacbhamu:11517: kkacidapi codvidhūnanaṃ tyāge vartate tathā satyanyatrāpi tatraiva vartitumarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:11518: evaṃ hi na varteta yadi vidhūnanamiha mukhyaṃ labhyeta /
GSP33vacbhamu:11531: śrutyarthau ca pāṭhakramādbalīyāṃsau, 'agnihotraṃ juhoti yavāgūṃ pacati'
GSP33vacbhamu:11536: taditi hi sarvanāma tasmādarthe sannihitaparāmarśakaṃ tasya hetubhāvamāha
GSP33vacbhamu:11542: nahi tatra jīvanniti vā jīvata iti vā śrutam /
GSP33vacbhamu:11544: evañca na paryaṅkavidyātastatprakṣaya iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:11545: rāddhāntastu vidyāsāmarthyavidhūtakalmaṣasya jñānavata uttareṇa pathā gacchato brahmaprāptirna cāprakṣīṇakalmaṣasyottaramārgagamanaṃ saṃbhavati
GSP33vacbhamu:11549: vidyaiva tādṛśī kalmaṣaṃ kṣapayati kṣapitakalmaṣaṃ cottaramārgaṃ prāpayatīti kathamardhapathe kalmaṣayaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:11551: nanu na pāṭhakramamātramatra, taditi sarvanāmaśrutyā saṃnihitaparāmarśādityuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:11552: tadayuktaṃ, buddhisaṃnidhānamātramatropayujyate nānyat, taccānantarasyeva vidyāprakaraṇādvidyāyā apīti samānā śrutirubhayatrāpīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:11555: aśva iva romāṇi vidhūyeti hi svatantrasya puruṣasya vyāpāraṃ brūte, naca paretasyāsti svātantryam, tasmāttadvirodhaḥ //27 //
GSP33vacbhamu:11558: nanu yathā paretasyottareṇa pathā brahmaprāptirbhavatīti vidyāphalamevaṃ tasyaivārdhapathe sukṛtaduṣkṛtahānirapi bhaviṣyatīti śaṅkāpadāni tebhya uttaramidaṃ sūtram /
GSP33vacbhamu:11562: sukṛtaduṣkṛtaprakṣayastu satyapi naraśarīre saṃbhavatīti samarthasya hetoryamaniyamādisahitāyā vidyāyāḥ karyakṣayāyogādyukto jīvata eva sukṛtaduṣkṛtakṣaya iti siddham /
GSP33vacbhamu:11568: evaṃ kāraṇānantaraṃ kāryotpāde sati nimittanaimittakayostadbhāvasyopapattistāṇḍiśāṭhyāyaniśrutyośca saṃgatiritarathā svātantryābhāvenāsaṃgatiruktā syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:11570: ye tu parasya viduṣaḥ sukṛtaduṣkṛte kathaṃ paratra saṃkrāmata iti śaṅkottaratayā sūtraṃ vyācakhyuḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:11575: yathā hānisaṃnidhāvupāyanamanyatra śrutamiti, tatrāpi kevalā hāniḥ śrūyate tatrāpi upāyanamupasthāpayatyevaṃ tatsannidhāveva devayānaḥ panthāḥ śruta iti yatrāpi sukṛtaduṣkṛtahāniḥ kevalā śrutā tatrāpi devayānaṃ panthānamupasthāpayitumarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:11578: tasmāddhānimātre devayānaḥ panthāḥ saṃbadhyata iti prāptam /
GSP33vacbhamu:11579: evaṃ prāptam ucyate-vidvān puṇyapāpe vidhūyanirañjanaḥ paramaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:11580: sāmyamupaitīti hi viduṣo vidhūtapuṇyapāpasya vidyayā kṣemaprāptimāha /
GSP33vacbhamu:11583: nahi jātu rajjau sarpabhramanivṛttaye samutpannaṃ rajjutattavajñānaṃ deśaviśeṣamapekṣate /
GSP33vacbhamu:11587: yadi paramārabdhakāryakarmakṣapaṇāya śarīrapātāvadhyapekṣeti na devayānenāstīhārtha iti śrutidṛṣṭavirodhānnāpekṣitavya iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:11588: asti tu paryaṅkavidyāyāṃ tasmārtha ityuktaṃ dvitīyena sūtreṇeti /
GSP33vacbhamu:11589: ye tu yadi puṇyamapi nivartate kimarthā tarhi gatarityāśaṅkya sūtramavatārayanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:11591: yadi punaḥ puṇyamanuvarteta brahmalokagatasyāpīha puṇyaphalopabhogāyavṛttiḥ syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:11593: tasmādduṣkṛtasyeva sukṛtasyāpi prakṣaya iti taiḥ punaranāśaṅkanīyamevāśaṅkitam /
GSP33vacbhamu:11594: vidyākṣiptāyāṃ hi gatau keyamāśaṅkā yadi kṣīṇasukṛtaḥ kimarthamayaṃ yātīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:11599: yadi tu tannādriyate tato darśapūrṇamāsajyotiṣṭomādidharmāḥ saṃkīryeran /
GSP33vacbhamu:11600: naca teṣāṃ vikṛtiṣu sauryādiṣu dvādaśāhādiṣu codakataḥ prāptiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:11604: na caivaṃ sati śrutyādoya'pi viniyojakāsteṣāmapi hi prakaraṇena
GSP33vacbhamu:11606: yatrāpi vināprakaraṇaṃ śrutyādibhyo viniyogo 'vagamyate tatrāpi tannirvāhāya prakaraṇasyāvaśyaṃ kalpanīyatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:11608: tasmādyāsvevopāsanāsu devayānaḥ pitṛyāṇo vā panthā āmnātastāsveva na tūpāsanāntareṣu tadanāmnānāt
GSP33vacbhamu:11609: naca 'ye ceme 'raṇye śraddhātapa ityupāsate' iti sāmānyavacanātsarvavidyāsu tatpathaprāptiḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:11610: śraddhātapaḥparāyaṇānāmeva tatra tatpathaprāptiḥ śrūyate, na tu vidyāparāyaṇānām /
GSP33vacbhamu:11611: apicaivaṃ satyekasyāṃ vidyāyāṃ mārgopadeśaḥ sarvāsu vidyāsvityekatraiva mārgopadeśaḥ kartavyo na vidyāntare /
GSP33vacbhamu:11614: evaṃ prāpte ucyate-'ye ceme 'raṇye śraddhātapa ityupāsate' iti na śraddhātapomātrasya pathiprāptimāhāpi tu vidyayā tadārohāntītyatra nāvidvāṃsastapasvina iti kevalasya tapasaḥ śraddhāyāśca tatprāptipratiṣedhādvidyāsahite śraddhātapasī tatprāpyupāyatayā vadan vidyāntarīlānāmapi pañcāgnividyāvidbhiḥ samānamārgatāṃ darśayati /
GSP33vacbhamu:11615: tathānyatrāpi pañcāgnividyādhikāre 'bhidhīyate-'ya evametādvidurye cāmī araṇye śraddhāṃ satyamupāsate' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:11622: etaduktaṃ bhavati-bhavetprakaraṇaṃ niyāmakaṃ yadyaniyamapratipādakaṃ vākyaṃ śrautaṃ smārtaṃ vā na syādasti tu tattasya ca prakaraṇādbalīyastvam
GSP33vacbhamu:11623: tasmādaniyamo vidyāntareṣvapi saguṇeṣu devayānaḥ panthā asakṛnmārgopadeśasya ca prayojanaṃ varṇitaṃ bāṣyakṛteti //31 //
GSP33vacbhamu:11625: saguṇānāṃ vidyāyāṃ cintāṃ kṛtvā nirguṇāyāṃ cintayati /
GSP33vacbhamu:11635: naca 'tāvadevāsya ciraṃ yāvanna vimokṣye 'tha saṃpatsye' iti śruterviduṣo dehapātāvadhipratīkṣāvadvasiṣṭhādīnāmapi prārabdhakarmaphalopabhogapratīkṣeti sāṃpratam /
GSP33vacbhamu:11636: yena hi karmaṇā vasiṣṭhādīnāmārabdhaṃ śarīraṃ tatpratīkṣā syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:11643: atra ca pākṣikaṃ mokṣahetutvamityāpātataḥ, ahetutvaṃ vetu tu
GSP33vacbhamu:11647: nirguṇāyāṃ vidyāyāmapavargalakṣaṇaṃ śrūyamāṇaṃ na stutimātratayā vyākhyāyamucitam /
GSP33vacbhamu:11650: uktaṃ hi 'na vidyau paraḥ śabdārtha' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:11651: naca viduṣamapāntaramaḥprabhṛtīnāṃ tattaddehasaṃtārātsatyāmapi brahmavidyāyāmanirmokṣānna brahmavidyā mokṣasya heturiti sāmpratam /
GSP33vacbhamu:11652: hetorapi sati pratibandhe kāryānupajano na hetubhāvamapakāroti /
GSP33vacbhamu:11653: nahi vṛntaphalasaṃyogapratibaddhaṃ gurutvaṃ na patanamajījanaditi pratibandhāpagame tatkurvanna taddhetuḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:11654: naca na setupratibandhānāmapāṃ nimnadeśānabhisarpaṇamiti setubhede na nimnamabhisarpanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:11655: tadvadihāpi vidyākarmārādhanāvarjiteśvaravihitādhikārapadapratibaddhā brahmavidyā yadyapi na muktiṃ dattavatī tathāpi tatparisamāptau pratibandhavigame dāsyati /
GSP33vacbhamu:11656: yathā hi prārabdhavipākasya karmaṇaḥ prakṣayaṃ pratīkṣamāṇaścaramadehasamutpannabrahmasākṣātkāro 'pi dhriyate 'tha
GSP33vacbhamu:11658: evaṃ prārabdhādhikāralakṣaṇaphalavidyākarmā puruṣo vasiṣṭhādirvidvānapi tatkṣayaṃ pratīkṣamāṇo yugutkrameṇa vā tattaddehaparigrahaparityāgau kurvanmukto 'pyanābhogātmikayā prakhyayā sāṃsārika ava viharati /
GSP33vacbhamu:11659: tadidamuktam- sukṛtapravṛttameva hi te karmāśayamadhikāraphaladānāyeti. prārabdhavipākāni tu karmāṇi varjayitvā vyapagatānijñānenaivātivāhitāni /
GSP33vacbhamu:11661: yo hi paravaśo dehaṃ parityājyate dehāntaraṃ ca nītaḥ pūrvajanmānubhūtasya smarati sa janmavāñjātismarca
GSP33vacbhamu:11662: gṛhādiva gṛhāntare svecchayā kāyāntaraṃ saṃcaramāṇo na jātismara ākhyāyataṃ /
GSP33vacbhamu:11667: vidyayāvidyādikleśanivṛttau nāvaśyaṃ niḥśeṣasya karmāśayasya nivṛttinaranādibhavaparasparāhitasyāniyatavipākakālasyāsaṅkhyeyatvātkarmaśayasyetyata āha- na cāvidyādikleśadāhe satīte. /
GSP33vacbhamu:11668: nahisamāne vināśahetau kasyacidvināśo nāparasyeti śakyaṃ vaditum /
GSP33vacbhamu:11670: tathāca na viduṣo vasiṣṭhāderdehadhāraṇetyata āha- pravṛttaphalasya tu karmaṇa iti. tasya tāvadeva ciramiti śrutiprāmāṇādanāgataphalameva karma kṣīyate na pravṛttaphalamityavagamyate
GSP33vacbhamu:11673: tatkinteṣāmanirmokṣa eva, netyāha- te paścādaiśvaryakṣaya iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:11676: apica svargādāvanubhavapathamanārohati śabdaikasamadhigamye vicikitsā syādapi mandadhiyāmāmuṣmikaphalatvaṃ prati /
GSP33vacbhamu:11677: yathā cārthavādaḥ-'ko hi tadveda yadamuṣmiṃlloke 'sti vā na veti' /
GSP33vacbhamu:11680: advaitatattvasākṣātkāro hi avidyāsamāropitaṃ prapañcaṃ samūlaghātaṃ nighnandhoraṃ saṃsārāṅgaparitāpamupaśamayati puruṣasyetyanuvādapi sphuṭamupapatidraḍhimnaśca śrutirdarśitā /
GSP33vacbhamu:11682: nanu tattvamasi vartasa iti vākyaṃ kathamanubhavameva dyotayatītyata āha-
GSP33vacbhamu:11686: aṅaraviṣayāṇāṃ (?) pratiṣedhadhiyāṃ sarvavedavartinīnāmavarodha upasaṃhāraḥ pratiṣedhasāmānyādakṣarasya tadbhāvapratyabhijñānāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:11687: ānandādayaḥ pradhānasyetyatrāyamartho yadyapi bhāvarūpeṣu viśeṣaṇeṣu siddhastantryāyatayā ca niṣedharūpeṣviti siddha eva /
GSP33vacbhamu:11691: yadyapi śābare dattottaramatrodāharaṇāntaraṃ tathāpi tulyanyāyatayaidapi śakyamudāhartumityudāharaṇāntaraṃ darśitam /
GSP33vacbhamu:11694: tadaṅgatvena yajurveda eva 'ya evaṃ vidvānvāravantīyaṃ gāyati ya evaṃ vidvānyajñāyajñīyaṃ gāyati ya evaṃ vidvānvāmadevyaṃ gāyati' iti vihitam /
GSP33vacbhamu:11696: tatredaṃ saṃdihyate-kimetāni yatrotpadyante tatrapyainevoccaiṣṭvena svareṇādhāne prayoktavyānyatha yanna viniyujyante tatratyenopāṃśutvena svareṇa 'uccaiḥ sāmnopāṃśu yajuṣā iti śruteḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:11698: utpattividhinaivāpekṣitopāyatvātmanā vihitatvādaṅganāṃ tasyaiva prāthamyāttannibandhana evoccaiḥsvare prāpta ucyate-guṇamukhyavyatikrame
GSP33vacbhamu:11701: tadanayorvyātikrame virodhe utpattividhyālocanenoccaiṣṭvaṃ viniyogavidhyālocanena copāṃśutvaṃ so 'yaṃ virodho vyatikramastasminvayatikrame mukhyena pradhānena niyujyamānatvarūpeṇa tasya vāravantīyādervedasaṃyogo grāhyo notpadyamānatvena guṇena /
GSP33vacbhamu:11707: ekasyaiva vidherutpattiviniyogādhikāraprayogarūpeṣu caturṣu madhye kiñcideva rūpaṃ kenacidvākyenollikhyate yadanyato 'prāptam /
GSP33vacbhamu:11708: tatra yadyapi sāmavede sāmāni vihitāni tathāpi tadvākyānāṃ tadutpattimātraparatā viniyogasya yājurvaidikaireva vākyai prāptatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:11709: tathācotpattivākyebhyaḥ samīhitārthāpratilambhādviniyogavākyebhyaśca tadavagatestadarthānyevotpattivākyāni bhavantīti tatra yena vākyena viniyujyante tasyaiva svarasya sādhanatvaṃsaṃsparśino grahaṇaṃ na tu rūpamātrasparśina iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:11712: puroḍāśe viniyuktatvātpradhānānurodhenādhvaryuṇaiva teṣāṃ prayogo nodrātreti dārṣṭāntike yojayati- evamihāpīti. //33 //
GSP33vacbhamu:11715: ekatra bhokrabhokrorvedyatā, anyatra bhokroreveti vedyabhedādvidyābheda iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:11720: saṃdehe hi vākyaśeṣānnirṇayo naca mukhyalākṣaṇikagrahaṇaviṣayo viṣayaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:11722: prakaraṇasya ca tato balīyasā vākyena bādhanāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:11723: tasmādvedyabhedādvidyābheda iti prāpta ucyate-dvāsuparṇatyatra ṛtaṃ pibantāvityatra ca dvitvasaṃkhyotpattau pratīyate tena samānatautsargikī /
GSP33vacbhamu:11724: pibantāviti dvayoḥ pibantā yā sā bādhanīyā, sā copakramopasaṃhārānurodhena na dvayorapi tu chatrinyāyena lākṣāṇikī vyākhyeyā /
GSP33vacbhamu:11725: yena hyupakramyate yena copasaṃsthite tadanurodhena madhyaṃ jñeyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:11726: yathā jāmitvadoṣasaṃkīrtanopakrame tatpratisamādhānopasaṃhāre ca saṃdarbhe madhyapātino viṣṇurūpāṃśu yaṣṭavyo 'jāmitvāyetyādayaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:11727: pṛthagvidhitvamalabhamānā vidhitvamavivakṣitvārthavādatayā nītāstatkasya hetorekavākyatā hi sādhīyasī vākyabhedāditi /
GSP33vacbhamu:11730: apica triṣvapyeteṣu vedāntaṣu prakaraṇatraye 'pi paurvāparyaparyālocanayā paramātmavidyaivāvagamyate
GSP33vacbhamu:11731: yadyevaṃ kathaṃ tarhi jīvopādānamastvityata āha- tādātmyavivakṣayeti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:11732: nāsyāṃ jīvaḥ pratipādyate kintu paramātmano 'bhedaṃ jīvasya darśayitumasāvanūdyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:11736: kauṣītakeyakaholacākrāyaṇoṣastapraśnopakramayorvidyornaitarantaṇāmnātayoḥ kimasti bhedo na veti viśaye bheda eveti bhrūmaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:11737: kutaḥ-yadyapyubhayatra praśnottarayorabhedaḥ pratīyate, tathāpi tatsyaivaikasya punaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:11739: na caikasyaiva tāṇḍināṃ navakṛtva upadeśe 'pi yathā bhedo na bhavati 'sa
GSP33vacbhamu:11740: ātmā tattvamati śvetaketo' ityatra tathehāpyabheda iti yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:11741: bhūya eva mā bhagavān vijñāpayatu, iti hi tatra śrūyate tenābhedo yujyate
GSP33vacbhamu:11748: vastusvarūpaṃ tu punaḥpunarucyamānamapi na doṣamāvahati śatakṛtvo 'pi hi pathyaṃ vadantyāptāḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:11753: ubhābhyāmapi vidyābhyāṃ bhinna ātmā pratipādyate iti yo manyate pūrvapakṣaikadeśī taṃ prati sarvāntaratvavirodho darśitaḥ //35 //
GSP33vacbhamu:11760: evaṃ hi nikṛṣṭa utkṛṣṭo bhavatīti prāptam /
GSP33vacbhamu:11767: nanvevamutkṛṣṭasya nikṛṣṭaprasaṅga ityuktaṃ tatkimidānīṃ saguṇe brahmaṇyupāsyamāne 'sya vastuto nirguṇasya nikṛṣṭatā bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:11768: kasmaicitphalāya tathā dhyānamātraṃ vidhīyatena tvasya nikṛṣṭatāmāpādayatīti cedihāpi vyatihārānucintanamātramupadiśyate phalāya na ti nikṛṣṭatā bhavatyutkṛṣṭasya /
GSP33vacbhamu:11770: satyakāmādiguṇopadeśa.iva tadguṇeśvarasiddhiriti siddhamubhayatrobhayātmatvādhyanamiti saiva hi satyādayaḥ. /
GSP33vacbhamu:11771: tadvai tadetadeva tadāsa satyameva sa yo haitanmahadyakṣaṃ prathamajaṃ veda satyaṃ brahmeti jayatīmāṃllokāñjita ityasāvasadya evametanmahadyakṣaṃ prathamajaṃ veda satyaṃ brahmeti satyaṃ hyeva brahma /
GSP33vacbhamu:11772: pūrvoktasya hṛdayākhyasya brahmaṇaḥ satyamityupāsanamena saṃdarbheṇa vidhīyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:11782: kiñca jito vaśīkṛta inuśabda itthaṃśabdasyārthe vartate /
GSP33vacbhamu:11790: kasmiṃnnālambane tadupāsanīyamityata uttaram-sa ādityo ya eṣa ityādinā tasyopaniṣadaharahamiti
GSP33vacbhamu:11791: hanti pāpmānaṃ jahāti ca ya evaṃ vedetyantena /
GSP33vacbhamu:11796: tamimaṃ viṣayamāha bhāṣyakāraḥ- yo vai haitamiti /
GSP33vacbhamu:11798: tathāca śrutiḥ-'tadetadakṣaraṃ satyamiti sa ityekamakṣaraṃ tītyekamakṣaraṃ yamityekamakṣaraṃ prathamottame akṣare satyaṃ madhyato 'nṛtaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:11799: tadetadanṛmubhayataḥ satyena parigṛhītaṃ satyabhūyameva bhavati naivaṃvidvāṃsamanṛtaṃ hinasti' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:11802: atra hi prathamottame akṣare satyaṃ mṛtyurūpābhāvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:11810: yadyapi tadyatsatyamiti prakṛtānukarṣeṇābedaḥ pratīyate tathāpi phalabhedena bhedaḥ sādhyabhedeneva nityakāmyadiṣayordarśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ svargakāmo yajeta yāvajjīvaṃ darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ yajeteti śāstrayoḥ satyapyanubandhābhede bheda iti prāpte pratyucyate-ekaiveyaṃ vidyā tatsatyamiti prakṛtaparāmarśādabhedena pratyabhijñānāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:11814: yadi punarvidyāvidhāvadhikāraśravaṇābhāvāttatkalpanāyāmārthavādikaṃ phalaṃ kalpyeta tato jāteṣṭāvivāgṛhyamāṇaviśeṣatayā saṃvalitādhikārakalpanā tataśca samastārthavādikaphalayuktamekamevopāsanamiti siddham /
GSP33vacbhamu:11817: tataśca vājasaneyoktānāṃ satyādīnāmupasaṃhāra ityatrārthe saiva hi satyādaya iti sūtraṃ vyākhyātaṃ tadetaddūṣayati- tanna sādhviti /
GSP33vacbhamu:11822: tathāhi chāndogye-'atha ya ihātmānamanuvidya vrajanti etāṃśca satyānkāmān'
GSP33vacbhamu:11824: vājasaneye tu nirguṇameva paraṃ brahmopadiśyate 'vimokṣāya brūhi' iti tathāpi tayoḥ parasparaguṇopasaṃhāraḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:11827: nahi nirguṇāyāṃ vidyāyāmādhāyātavyatvenaite coditā yenātrādhyeyatvena saṃbadhyerannapi tu satyakāmādiguṇanāntarīyakatvenaiteṣāṃ prāptirityupasaṃhāra ucyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:11831: rāddhāntastu sarvasāmyamevobhayatrāpyātmopadeśādākāśaśabdenaikatrātmokto 'nyatra ca daharākāśādhāraḥ sa evokta iti sarvasāmyādbrahmaṇyubhayatrāpi
GSP33vacbhamu:11837: tena yadyapīyamupāsanāgocarā na cintā sākṣāttathāpi tatsaṃbaddhaprathamabhojanasaṃbandhādasti saṃgatiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:11847: tathehāpi bhojanārthabhaktāgamanasaṃyogātprāṇāhuterbhojanābhāve bhaktaṃ pratyaprayojakatvamiti nāsti pūrvapakṣa ityapūrvapakṣamidamadhikaraṇamityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:11848: pūrvapakṣamākṣipya samādhatte- evaṃ prāpte, na lupyeteti tāvadāha. /
GSP33vacbhamu:11856: evaṃ sarvāṇi bhūtānyagnihotramupāsate' iti vacanādagnihotrasyātithīnbhūtāni pratyupajīvyatvena
GSP33vacbhamu:11858: tadevaṃ sati 'yathāha vai svayamahutvāgnihotraṃ parasya juhuyādityevaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:11861: nanvātithitāmeṣā śrutiḥ prāṇahutiṃ kintu svāmibhojanapakṣa eva nābhojane
GSP33vacbhamu:11862: 'pītyata āha- yā hi na prāthamyalopaṃ sahate natarāṃ sā prāthamyavato 'gnihotrasya lopaṃ saheteti manyate. /
GSP33vacbhamu:11863: īdṛśaḥ khalvayamādaraḥ prāṇāgnihotrasya dharmiṇaḥ prāthamyadharmalopamapi na sahate śrutistadāsyāḥ kaiva kathā dharmilopaṃ sahata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:11865: yathā hi kauṇḍapāyināmayanagate agnihotre prakaraṇāntarānnaiyamikāgnihotrādbhinne dravyadevatārūpadharmāntararahitatayā tadākāṅkṣe sādhyasādṛśyena naiyamikāgnihotrasamānanāmatayā taddharmātideśena rūpadharmāntaraprāptirevaṃ prāṇāgnihotre 'pi
GSP33vacbhamu:11870: yathā jāghanyā patnīḥ saṃyājayantīti patnīsaṃyājānāṃ jāghanyekadeśadravyajuṣāṃ jāghanīprayojakatvam
GSP33vacbhamu:11871: sa hi nāmāprayojako bhavati yasya prayojakagrahaṇamantareṇārtho na jñāyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:11874: tasmādyathā jāghanyantareṇāpi paśūpādānaṃ paraprayuktaśūpajīvanaṃ vā khaṇḍaśo māṃsavikrayiṇo muṇḍādivadākṛtirūpādīyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:11876: tasmānna bhojanasya lope prāṇāgnihotralopa iti manyate pūrvapakṣī /
GSP33vacbhamu:11879: taddhomīyamiti hi vacana kimapi saṃnihitadravyaṃ home viniyuṅkte tadaḥ sarvanāmnaḥ saṃnihitāvagamamantareṇābhidhānāparyavasānāttadanena svābhidhānaparyavasānāya tadyadbhaktaṃ prathamamāgacchediti
GSP33vacbhamu:11881: tacca saṃnihitaṃ bhaktaṃ bhojanārthamityuttarārdhātsviṣṭakṛte samavadyatītivanna bhaktaṃ vāpo vā dravyāntaraṃ vā prayoktumarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:11882: jāghanyāstvavayavabhedasya nāgnīṣomīyapaśvadhīnaṃ nirūpaṇaṃ svatantrasyāpi tasya sūnāsthasya darśanāttasmādastyetasya jāghanīto viśeṣaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:11887: api cāgnihotrasya codakato dharmaprāptāvabhyupagamyamānāyāṃ bahutaraṃ prāptaṃ bādhyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:11895: na tu nadyāṃ cakravākādaya eva cakravākādinā saṃpādyante /
GSP33vacbhamu:11900: nanvatithibhojanottarakālatā svāmibhojanasya vihiteti kathamasau bādhyata ityata āha- nāsti vacanasyātibhāraḥ. /
GSP33vacbhamu:11903: yathaiva 'yasya parṇamayī juhūrbhavati na sa pāpaṃ ślokaṃ śṛṇoti'
GSP33vacbhamu:11904: ityetadanārabhyādhītamavyabhicāritakratusaṃbandhaṃ juhūdvārā kratuprayogavacanagṛhītaṃ kratatvarthaṃ satphalānapekṣaṃ siddhavartamānāpadeśapratītaṃ na rātrisatravatphalatayā svīkarotīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:11910: evañca sati kratau parṇatāniyamavadupāsanāniyama iti prāpte ucyate-yuktaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:11916: nāpi svādiratāyāmiva prakṛtakratusaṃbaddho yūpa āśrayastadāśrayaḥ prakṛto
GSP33vacbhamu:11919: na cātatparaṃ vākyaṃ jñāpayitumarhatīti tatra vākyatātparyamavaśyāśrayaṇīyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:11920: tathāca tatparaṃ sanna parṇatāyāḥ phalasaṃbandhamapi gamayitumarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:11922: upāsanānāṃ tu vyāpārātmatvena svata eva phalasaṃbandhopapatteḥ udgīthādyāśrayaṇaṃ phale vidhānaṃ na virudhyate viśiṣṭavidhānāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:11931: tasmādyathā kratvāśrayāṇyapi godohanādīni phalasaṃyogādanityāni evamudgīthādyupāsanānīti draṣṭavyam
GSP33vacbhamu:11937: phalaparatve tvasya na śakyaṃ prayājādīnāṃ pārārthyenāphalatvaṃ vaktumiti
GSP33vacbhamu:11939: tattacchutyarthālocanayā vāyuprāṇayoḥ svarūpābhede siddhe tadadhīnanirūpaṇatayā tadviṣayopāsanāpyabhinnā na cādhyātmādhidaivaguṇabhedādbhedaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:11954: nanvetasyai devatāyai iti devatāmātraṃ śrūyate na tu vāyustatkathaṃ vāyuprāptimāhetyata āha- devatetyatra vāyuriti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:11958: militānāṃ śravaṇāviśeṣādindrasya devatāyā abhedātrayāṇāmapi puroḍāśānāṃ sahapradānāśaṅkāyāmutpattivākya eva rājādhirājasvarājaguṇabhedādyājyānuvākyāvyatyāsavidhānācca yathānyāsameva devatāpṛthaktvātpradānapṛthaktvaṃ bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:11965: tatra yadyapi bhūyāṃsi santi liṅgāni manaścidādīnāṃ svātantryasūcakāni tathāpi na tāni svātantryeṇa svātantryaṃ prati prāpakāṇi /
GSP33vacbhamu:11968: na cedaṃ sāmarthyalakṣaṇaṃ liṅgaṃ yenāsya svātantryeṇa prāpakaṃ bhavet /
GSP33vacbhamu:11970: tathā pūṣādyanumantraṇamantrasya pūṣānumantraṇe, yathā vā 'paśunā yajeta'
GSP33vacbhamu:11974: tasmādasati sāmarthyalakṣaṇe viroddhari prakaraṇapratyūhaṃ manaścidādīnāṃ kriyāśeṣatāmavagamayati
GSP33vacbhamu:11975: naca te haite vidyācita evetyavadhāraṇaśrutiḥ kriyānupraveśaṃ vārayati /
GSP33vacbhamu:11976: yena śrutivirodhe sati na prakaraṇaṃ bhavet,
GSP33vacbhamu:11978: naca vidyayā haivaita evaṃvidaścitā bhavantīti puruṣasaṃbandhamāpādayadvākyaṃ prakaraṇamapabādhitumarhati
GSP33vacbhamu:11981: tasmāttadapi na prakaraṇavirodhāyālamiti sāṃpādikā apyete agnayaḥ prakaraṇātkriyānupraveśina eva mānasavat /
GSP33vacbhamu:11982: dvādaśāhe tu śrūyate-'anayā tvā pātreṇa samudraṃ rasayā prājāpatyaṃ manograhaṃ gṛhṇāmi' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:11983: tatra saṃśayaḥ-kiṃ mānasaṃ dvādaśāhā daharantamuta tanmadhyapātino daśamasyāhnāṅgamiti /
GSP33vacbhamu:11984: tatra vāgvai dvādaśāho mano mānasamiti mānasasya dvādaśāhādbhedena vyapadeśādvāṅmanasabhedavadbhedaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:11985: nirdhūtāni dvādaśāhasya gatarasāni chandāṃsi tāni mānasenaivāpyāyantīti ca dvādaśāhasya mānasena stūyamānatvādbhede ca sati stutistutyabhāvasyopapatterdvādaśāhādaharantaraṃ na tadaṅgaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:11986: patnīsaṃyājāntatvāccāhnāṃ patnīḥ saṃyājya mānasāya prasarpantīti ca mānasasya patnīsaṃyājasya parastācchuteḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:11988: hi trayodaśatve 'hnāṃ siddhe dvādaśāha iti jaghanyayā vṛttyonnīyeta /
GSP33vacbhamu:11994: patnīsaṃyājāntatā tu yadyapyautsargikī tathāpi daśamasyāhno viśeṣavacanānmānasāni grahaṇāsādanahavanādīni patnīsaṃyājātparāñci bhaviṣyanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:11996: eṣa vai daśamasyāhno visargo yanmānasamiti vacanāddaśamāharaṅgatā gamyate
GSP33vacbhamu:11997: visargo 'nto 'ntavato dharmo na svatantra iti daśame 'hani mānasāya pramarpantīti daśamasyāhna ādhāratvanirdeśācca tadaṅgaṃ mānasaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:12004: nahi sāṃpādikānāmagnīnāmiṣṭakāsu citenāgninā kiñcidasti sādṛśyamanyatra kriyānupraveśāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:12007: mā bhūdanyeṣāṃ śrutavidhyuddeśānāmanyārthadarśanānāmaprāptaprāpakatvameteṣu tvaśrutavidhāyuddeśeṣu 'vacanāni tvapūrvatvāt' iti nyāyādvidhirunnetavyaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:12008: tathā caitebhyo yādṛśor'thaḥ pratīyate tadanurūpa eva sa bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:12009: pratīyate caitebhyo manaścidādīnāṃ sāntatyaṃ cāvadhāraṇaṃ ca phalabhedasamanvayaśca puruṣasaṃbandhaśca
GSP33vacbhamu:12010: na cāsya godohanādivatkratvarthāśritatvaṃ yena puruṣārthasya karmapāratantryaṃ bhavet /
GSP33vacbhamu:12019: yaduktaṃ pūrvapakṣiṇā kratvaṅgatve pūrveṇeṣṭakācitena manaścidādīnāṃ vikalpa iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:12022: tatsāmānyādvidyāpradhānatvameva lakṣyate na karmāṅgatvamityāha sūtreṇa- pareṇa ca śabdasya tādvidhyaṃ bhūyastvāttvanubandhaḥ. /
GSP33vacbhamu:12024: asti rājasūyaḥ 'rājā svārājyakāmo rājasūyena yajeta' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:12027: yadi brāhmaṇo yajeta bārhaspatyaṃ madhye nidhāyāhutiṃ hutvābhighārayedyadi vaiśyo vaiśvadevaṃ yadi rājanya aindramiti /
GSP33vacbhamu:12028: tatra saṃdihyate-kiṃ brāhmaṇādīnāṃ prāptānāṃ nimittārthena śravaṇamuta brāhmaṇādīnāmayaṃ yāgo vidhīyata iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:12029: tatra yadi prajāpālanakaṇṭakoddharaṇādi karma rājyaṃ tasya kartā rājeti rājaśabdasyārthastato rājā rājasūyena yajeteti rājyasya kartū rājasūye
GSP33vacbhamu:12031: tasmātsaṃbhavantyaviśiṣeṇa brāhmaṇakṣatriyavaiśyā rājyasya kartāra iti siddhaṃ sarva evaite rājasūye prāptā iti 'yadi brāhmaṇo yajeta'
GSP33vacbhamu:12033: atha tu rājñaḥ karma rājyamiti rājakartṛyogāttatkarma rājyaṃ tataḥ ko rājetyapekṣāyāmāryeṣu tatprasiddherabhāvātpikanematāmarasādiśabdārthāvadhāraṇāya mlecchaprasiddhirivāndhrāṇāṃ kṣatriyajātau rājaśabdaprasiddhistadavadhāraṇakāraṇamiti kṣatriya eva rājeti na brāhmaṇavaiśyayoḥ prāptiriti rājasūyaprakaraṇaṃ bhittvā brāhmaṇādikartṛkāṇi pṛthageva karmāṇi prāpyanta iti na naimittikāni /
GSP33vacbhamu:12040: tvanapekṣaṃ syāt' iti nyāyena bādhanāttadanuguṇatayā vā kathañcinnasvanakulādivadanvākhyānāmātraparatayā
GSP33vacbhamu:12043: evaṃ prāpta ucyate-'rūpato na viśeṣo 'sti hyāryamlecchaprayogayoḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:12045: tadiha rājaśabdasya karmayogādvā kartari prayogaḥ kartṛprayogādvā karmaṇīti viśaye vaidikavākyaśeṣavadabhiyuktatarasyātrabhavataḥ pāṇineḥ smṛternirṇāyate prasiddhirāndhraṇāmanādirādimatī cāryāṇāṃ prasiddhirgogāvyādiśabdavat naca saṃbhāvitādimadbhāvā prasiddhiḥ pāṇinimsṛtimapodyānādiprasiddhimādimatīṃ kartumatsahate
GSP33vacbhamu:12047: tasmātpāṇinīyasmṛtyanumatāndhraprasiddhibalīyastvena kṣatriyatvajātau rājaśabde mukhye tatkartaryatajjātau rājaśabdo gauṇa iti kṣatriyasyaivākārādrājasūye tatprakaraṇamapodyāveṣṭerutkarṣaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:12050: iyaṃ ca rājasūyādadhikārāntarametayānnādyakāmaṃ yājayediti nāstītikṛtvā cintā /
GSP33vacbhamu:12058: nasūtrakāreṇa tatroktaṃ yena punaruktaṃ bhavedapi tu bhāṣyakṛtetyatratyasyaivārthasyāpakarṣaḥ pramāṇalakṣaṇopayogitayā tatra kṛta iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:12066: yadyapi samastavyasteṣu pṛthivyaptejovāyuṣu na caitanyaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ tathāpi kāyākārapariṇateṣu bhaviṣyati /
GSP33vacbhamu:12067: nahi kiṇvādayaḥ samastavyastā na madanā dṛṣṭā iti madirākārapariṇatā na madayanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:12068: ahamiti cānubhave deha eva gaurādyakāraḥ prathate /
GSP33vacbhamu:12069: na tu tadatiriktaḥ tadadhiṣṭhānaḥ kuṇḍa eva dadhīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:12071: na jātu dadhisamānādhikaraṇāni madhurādīni kuṇḍasyaikādhikaraṇyamanubhavanti sitaṃ madhuraṃ kuṇḍamiti /
GSP33vacbhamu:12076: yadā ca upalabdhisādhyanāntarīyakabhāvasya liṅgasyeyaṃ gatistadā kaiva kathā dṛṣṭavyabhicārasya śabdasyārthāpatteścātyantaparokṣārthagocarāyā upamānasya heturbhāṣyakṛtā vyākhyātaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:12078: sa ca śarīrādhīnatayā dṛśyamānaḥ śarīradharma evaṃ prāṇaḥ śvāsapraśvāsādirūpaḥ śarīradharma eva /
GSP33vacbhamu:12079: icchāprayatnādayaśca yadyapyāntarāḥ tathāpi śarīrātiriktasya tadāśrayānupalabdheḥ sati śarīre bhāvāt antaḥ śarīrāśrayā eva, anyathā dṛṣṭahānādṛṣṭakalpanāprasaṅgāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:12080: śarīrātirikta ātmani pramāṇābhāvāccharīre ca saṃbhavāccharīre ca saṃbhavāccharīramevecchādimadātmeti prāpta ucyate- //53 //
GSP33vacbhamu:12082: nāpratyakṣaṃ pramāṇamiti bruvāṇaḥ praṣṭavyo jāyate kuto bhavānanumānādīnāmaprāmāṇyamavadhāritavāniti
GSP33vacbhamu:12092: naca liṅgaṃ pramāṇaṃ yata ete sidhyanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:12093: na puṃsāmitthaṃbhāvamavijñāya yaṃ kañcana puruṣaṃ pratipipātayiṣato
GSP33vacbhamu:12101: tadeva mā nāma bhūnnāstikasya janmāntaramasminneva janmanyupasthito 'sya
GSP33vacbhamu:12109: sūtrayojanā tu na tvavyatiriktaḥ kintu vyatirikta ātmā dehāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:12111: caitanyādiryadi śarīraguṇaḥ tato 'nena viśeṣaguṇena bhavitavyam. na tu saṃkhyāparimāṇasaṃyogādivatsāmānyaguṇena
GSP33vacbhamu:12112: tathāca ye bhūtaviśeṣaguṇaste yāvadbhūtabhāvino dṛṣṭā yathā rūpādayaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:12113: nahyasti saṃbhavaḥ bhūtaṃ ca rūpādirahitaṃ ceti /
GSP33vacbhamu:12116: prāṇaceṣṭādayo yadyapi dehadharmā eva tathāpi na dehamātraprabhavāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:12118: tasmādyasyaite adhiṣṭānāddehadharmā bhavanti sa dehātirikta ātmā /
GSP33vacbhamu:12121: svaparapratyakṣā hi dehadharmā dṛṣṭā yathā rūpādayaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:12130: naca bahūnāṃ cetanānāmanyonyābhiprāyānuvidhānasaṃbhava iti ekapāśanibaddhā iva bahavo vihaṅgamāḥ viruddhādikriyābhimukhāḥ samarthā api na hastamātramapi deśamatipatitumutsahante /
GSP33vacbhamu:12133: śakyo viniścetuṃ, mā bhūdākāśasya sarvo dharmaḥ sarveṣvanvayāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:12136: tathāca sādhakatvamanvayamātrasyetyāha- apica sati hi tāvaditi. /
GSP33vacbhamu:12137: dūṣaṇāntaraṃ vivakṣuriṇāmabhedo rūpādirna tu bhūtacatuṣṭayādarthāntaramevaṃ bhūtapariṇāmabheda eva caitanyaṃ na tu
GSP33vacbhamu:12138: bhūtebhyor'thāntaraṃ, yena 'pṛthivyāpastejo vāyuriti tattvāni' iti pratijñāvyāghātaḥ syādityarthaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:12139: etaduktaṃ bhavati-caturṇāmeva bhūtānāṃ jagatpariṇāmo na tvasti tattvāntaraṃ yasya pariṇāmo rūpādayo 'nyadvā pariṇāmāntaramiti /
GSP33vacbhamu:12141: bhūtadharmā rūpādayo jaḍatvādviṣayā eva dṛṣṭā na tu viṣayiṇaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:12148: tasyāstataḥ svayaṃprakāśapratyayena bhūtadharmebhyo jaḍebhyo vailakṣaṇyena vyatirekaniścayāt
GSP33vacbhamu:12149: astu tarhi vyatirekādupalabdhirbhūtebhyaḥ svatantrā tathāpyātmani pramāṇābhāva ityata āha- upalabdhisvarūpa eva ca na ātmeti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:12153: evaṃ ca sati viṣayarūpatadbhedāveva sudurlabhāviti dūranirastā viṣayabhedādupalabdhibhedasaṃkathā
GSP33vacbhamu:12156: tatrāvidyādaśāyāmapyupalabdherabheda ityāha- ahamidamadrākṣamiti ceti. na kevalaṃ tāttvikābhedānnityatvamatāttvikādapi nityatvameveti tasyārthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:12158: nānātve hi nānyenopalabdhe 'nyasya puruṣasya smṛtirupapadyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:12160: yo hi dehavyāpārādupalabdhirutpadyate tena dehadharma iti manyate taṃ pratīdaṃ dūṣaṇam- na cātyantaṃ dehasyeti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:12166: tadvedavihitāḥ pratyayā utānyavedavihitānāmapyudrīthādīnāṃ te pratyayā iti
GSP33vacbhamu:12169: nirviśeṣasya ca tasyānupapatterviśeṣakāṅkṣāyāṃ svaśākhāvihitasya viśeṣasya saṃnidhānāttenaivākāṅkṣāvinivṛtterna śākhāntarīyamudrīthāntaramapekṣate /
GSP33vacbhamu:12170: na caivaṃ saṃnidhānena śrutipīḍā, yadi hi śrutisamarpitamarthamapabādhena
GSP33vacbhamu:12174: kṛṣṇādi yadi muñcāmaḥ kā śrutistatra pīḍyate' //
GSP33vacbhamu:12176: evaṃ prāpta ucyate-udrīthāṅgavavaddhāstu pratyayā nānāśākhāsu prativedamanuvarteranna pratiśākhaṃ vyavatiṣṭheran /
GSP33vacbhamu:12177: udrīthamityādisāmānyaśruteraviśeṣāt etaduktaṃ bhavati-yuktaṃ śuklaṃ paṭamānayetyādau paṭaśrutimaviśeṣapravṛttāmapi
GSP33vacbhamu:12181: naca svārthamasmārayitvā viśiṣṭārthapratyāyanaṃ padānāmiti viśiṣṭārthaprayuktaṃ svārthasmāraṇaṃ na svaprayojakamapavādhitumutsahate /
GSP33vacbhamu:12182: mā ca vādhiprayojakābhāvena svārthasmāraṇamapīti yuktamaviśeṣapravṛttāyā api śruterekasminneva viśeṣe avasthāpanam /
GSP33vacbhamu:12195: tatra divameva bhagavo rājanniti hovāceti pratyakamupāsanaśruteḥ pratyekaṃ ca phalavattvāmnānātsamastopāsane ca phalavattvaśruterubhayathāpyupāsanam /
GSP33vacbhamu:12196: naca yathā vaiśvānarīyeṣṭau yadaṣṭākapālo bhavatītyādīnāmavayujyavādānāṃ pratyekaṃ phalaśravaṇe 'pyarthavādamātratvaṃ vaiśvānaraṃ dvādaśakapālaṃ nirvapedityasyaiva tu phalavattvamevamatrāpi bhavitumarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:12201: iha tu samaste vyaste ca vartamānāpadeśasyāviśeṣādagṛhyamāṇaviśeṣaśatayā ubhayatrāpi vidhikalpanāyāḥ phalakalpanāyāśca bhedāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:12210: tathā caikavākyatālābhāya vākyabhedaparihārāya ca samastopāsanaparataiva saṃdarbhasya lakṣyate
GSP33vacbhamu:12219: saṃprati tu sarvāsāmīśvaragocarāṇāṃ vidyānāṃ kimabhedo bhedo vā, evaṃ prāṇādigocarāsviti vicārayitavyam
GSP33vacbhamu:12220: nanu yathā pratyayābhidheyāyā apūrvabhāvanāyā ājānato bhedabhāve 'pi
GSP33vacbhamu:12226: iha brahmaṇaḥ siddharūpatvājguṇānāmapi satyasaṃkalpatvādīnāṃ tadāśrayāṇāṃ siddhatayā sarvatrābhedo vidyāsu /
GSP33vacbhamu:12227: nahi viśālavakṣāścakorekṣaṇaḥ kṣatriyayuvā duśryavanadharmeti ekatropadiṣṭo 'nyatra siṃhāsyo vṛṣaskandhaḥ evopadiśyamānaścakorekṣaṇatvādyapajahāti na khalu pratyupadeśaṃ vastu bhidyate tasya sarvatra tādavasthyāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:12231: evaṃ prāpta ucyate-bhavedetadevaṃ yadi vastuniṣṭānyupāsanavākyāni kintu
GSP33vacbhamu:12236: yathaikaḥ strīkāyaḥ kenacidbhakṣyatayā kenacidupagantavyatayā kenacidapatyatayā kenacinmātṛtayā kenacidupekṣaṇīyatayā viṣayīkriyamāṇaḥ puruṣecchātantraḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:12246: vidyābhede tu na paunaruktyamekasyāṃ vidyāyāmuktā vidyāntare noktā iti vidyāntarasyāpi tadguṇatvāya vaktavyā anuktānāmaprāpteriti //58 //
GSP33vacbhamu:12248: agnihotradarśapūrṇamāsādiṣu pṛthagadhikārāṇāmapi succayo dṛṣṭo niyamavāṃsteṣāṃ nityatvādupāsanāstu kāmyatayā na nityāstasmānnāsāṃ samuccayaniyamaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:12249: tena samānaphalānāṃ darśapūrṇamāsajyotiṣṭomādīnāmiva na niyamavānvikalpaḥ phabhūmārthinaḥ samuccayasyāpi saṃbhavāditi pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:12252: upāsanāntarābhyāse ca cittaikāgratāvyāghātena kasya cidupāsanāniṣpatteriha vikalpa eva niyamavāniti rāddhāntaḥ //59 //
GSP33vacbhamu:12254: yāsūpāsanāsu vinopāsyasākṣātkāraṇamadṛṣṭenaiva kāmyasādhanaṃ tāsāṃ kāmyadarśapaurṇamāsādivatpuruṣecchāvaśena vikalpasamuccayāviti sāmpratam
GSP33vacbhamu:12256: tannirdhāraṇāniyamastaddṛṣṭeḥ pṛthagdhyapratibandhaḥ phalamityatropasanāsu phalaśruteḥ parṇamayīnyāyenārthavādatayopāsanānāṃ kratvarthatvena samuccayaniyamamāśaṅkya puruṣārthatayaikaprayogavacanagrahaṇābhāve samuccayaniyamo nirastaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:12257: iha tu satyapi puruṣārthatve kasmānnaikaprayogavacanagrahaṇaṃ bhavatīti pūrvoktamarthamākṣipan pratyavatiṣṭhate /
GSP33vacbhamu:12258: yadyapi hi kāmyā etā upāsanāstathāpi na svatantrā bhavitumarhanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:12259: tathā sati hi kratvarthānāśritatayā kratuprayogādbahirapyamūṣāṃ prayogaḥ prasajyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:12262: evaṃ cāśrayatantratvādāśritānāṃ prayogavacanenāśrayāṇāṃ samuccayaniyamenāśritānāmapi samuccayaniyamo yukta itarathā tadāśritatvānupapatteḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:12263: sa ca prayogavacana upāsanāḥ samuccitanvaṃstattatphalakāmanānāmavaśyaṃbhāvamākṣipati tadabhāve tāsāṃ samuccayaniyamābhāvāditi manvānasya pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:12268: nahi kāmā vidhīyate yena samuccīyerannapi tūddiśyante /
GSP33vacbhamu:12272: nityānityasaṃyogavirodhāt satyapi tadāśrayāṇāṃ nityatve idameva cāśrayatantratvamāśritānāṃ yadāśraye satyeva vṛttirnāsatīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:12273: na tu tatra vṛttireva nāvṛttiriti tadidamuktam-āśrayatantrāṇyapi hīti //61
GSP33vacbhamu:12277: vedāntarohitapraṇavodgīthaikatvapratyayasāmarthyāddhotṛkarmaṇaḥ śaṃsanādudrātā pratisamādadhāti kiṃ tadityata āha durudrīthamapi vedāntarodite caudrātre karmaṇi utpannaṃ kṣatam /
GSP33vacbhamu:12282: iti śrīvācaspatimiśraviracite śārīrakabhagavatpādabhāṣyavibhāge bhāmatyāṃ tṛtīyādhyāyasya tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ //3 //
GSP33vacbhamu:12286: samprati tu kimaupaniṣadātmatattvajñānamapavargasādhanatayā puruṣārthamāho kratuprayogāpekṣitakartṛpratipādakatayā kratvarthamiti mīmāṃsāmahe /
