GSP33vacbhamu:12287: yadā ca kratvarthaṃ tadā yāvanmātraṃ kratuprayogavidhināpekṣitaṃ kartṛtvamāmuṣmikaphalopabhoktṛtvaṃ ca na caitadanityatve ghaṭate kṛtavipraṇāśākṛtābhyāgamaprasaṅgādato nityatvamapi, tāvanmātramupaniṣatsu vivakṣitam /
GSP33vacbhamu:12290: yadyapi jīvānuvādena tasya brahmatvapratipādanaparatvamupaniṣadāmiti mahatā prabandhena tatra tatra pratipāditaṃ tathāpyatra keṣāñcitpūrvapakṣaśahkābījānāṃ nirākaraṇe tadeva sthūṇanikhanananyāyena niścalīkriyata ityasti vicāraprayojanam /
GSP33vacbhamu:12292: yadyapi ca kartṛmātraṃ nāvyabhicāritakratusaṃbandhaṃ kartṛmātrasya laukikeṣvapi karmasu darśanādyena parṇatādivadanārabhyādhītamapyavyabhicaritakratusaṃbandhajihūdvāreṇa vākyenaiva kratvarthamāpadyate tathāpi yādṛśa ātmā kartāmuṣmikasvargādiphalabhogabhāgī dehādyatirikte vedāntaiḥ pratipādyate na tādṛśasyāsti laukikeṣu karmasūpayogaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:12294: āmuṣmikaphalānāṃ tu vaidikānāṃ karmaṇāṃ tamantareṇāsaṃbhavāttatsaṃbandha evāyamaupaniṣadaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:12297: iti aupaniṣadātmajñānasaṃskṛto hi kartā pāralaukikaphalopabhogayogyo 'smīti vidyāvācchraddhāvānkratuprayogāṅgaṃ nānyathā prokṣitā iva vrīhayaḥ kratvaṅgamiti /
GSP33vacbhamu:12298: priyādisūcitasya ca saṃsāriṇa evātmano draṣṭavyatvena pratijñāpanādapahatapāpmatvādi tu tadviśeṣaṇaṃ tasyaiva stutyartham /
GSP33vacbhamu:12304: na tvetatprakṛtodgīthavidyāviṣayaṃ yadeva vidyayeti sarvanāmavadhāraṇābhyāṃ vyāpteradhigamat
GSP33vacbhamu:12305: yathā ya eva dhūmavāndeśaḥ sa vahvimāniti /
GSP33vacbhamu:12306: samanvārambhavacanaṃ ca phalārambhe vidyākarmaṇoḥ sāhityaṃ darśayati /
GSP33vacbhamu:12307: tacca yadyapyāpneyādiyagaṣaṭkavatsamapradhānatvenāpi bhavati tathāpyuktayā yuktyā vidyāyāḥ karma pratyaṅgabhāvenaiva netavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:12313: yadi śarīrādyatiriktaḥ kartā bhoktātmetyetanmatra upaniṣadaḥ paryavasitāḥ syustataḥ syādevaṃ, na tvetadasti /
GSP33vacbhamu:12316: tathā caupaniṣadātmajñānasya kratvanuṣṭhānavirodhinaḥ kratusaṃbandha eva nāsti /
GSP33vacbhamu:12319: ata eva priyādisūcitena saṃsāriṇātmanopakramasya tasyaivātmano 'dhikopadidikṣāyāṃ paramātmanātyantābheda upadiśyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:12320: yathā samāropitasya bhujagasya rajjurūpādatyantābhedaḥ pratipādyate yo
GSP33vacbhamu:12326: yatha sarve brāhmaṇā bhojyantāmiti nimintritāpekṣayā teṣāmeva prakṛtatvāt
GSP33vacbhamu:12329: avibhāge 'pi na doṣa ityāha- na cedaṃ samanvārambhavacanamiti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:12333: etaduktaṃ bhavati-yadadhyayanamarthāvabodhaparyantaṃ karmasūpayujyate yathā karmavidhivākyānāṃ tanmātravata evādhikāraḥ karmasu
GSP33vacbhamu:12335: adhyayanamātravata eveti mātragrahaṇenārthajñānaṃ vā vyavacchinnamiti manvāno bhrāntaścodayati- nanvevaṃ satīti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:12342: apica vidyāphalaṃ pratyakṣaṃ darśayantī śrutiḥ kālāntarabhāviphalakarmāṅgatvaṃ vidyāyā nirākarotītyāha- kāmakāreṇa
GSP33vacbhamu:12355: nindati hi pratyakṣā śrutirāśramāntaraṃ 'vīrahā vā eṣa devānām' ityādikā /
GSP33vacbhamu:12356: pratyakṣaśrutivirodhe ca smṛtyācārayoraprāmāṇyamuktaṃ 'virodhe tvanapekṣaṃ syādasati hyanumānam' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:12361: na kevalamanyaparatayā parāmarśasyāśramāntaraṃ na labhyate api tvāśramāntaranindādvāreṇāpavādādapītyarthaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:12364: ye ceme 'raṇya ityādibhyastvāśramāntaraṃ setasyatītyata āha- ye ceme 'raṇya iti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:12366: na cānyaparādapi sphuṭatarāśramāntarapratyata ityāha- saṃdigdhaṃ ceti. nahi tapa eva dvitīya ityatrāśramāntarābhidhāyī kaścidasti śabda iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:12367: nanvetameva pravrājina iti vacanādāśramāntaraṃ setsyatītyata āha- tathaitameveti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:12377: tatra skandhaśabdo yadyāśramaparo na syāditi tu samūhavacanastato dharmāṇāṃ yajñādīnāṃ prātisvikotpattīnāṃ kimapekṣya tritvamaṅkhyā suvyavasthāpyeta /
GSP33vacbhamu:12379: tatra yajñādiliṅgo gṛhāśrama eko dharmaskandho brahmacārīti dvitīyastapa iti ca, tapaḥpradhānāttu vānaprasthāśramānnānyaḥ, brahmasaṃstha iti ca
GSP33vacbhamu:12381: tasmādanyaparādapi parāmarthādaśramāntarāṇi pratīyamānāni devatādhikaraṇanyāyena na śakyante 'pākartum /
GSP33vacbhamu:12382: naca pratyakṣaśrutivirodho vīrahā vetyādeḥ pratipannagārhasthyaṃ pramādādajñānādvāgnimudvāsayituṃ pravṛttaṃ pratyupapatteḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:12383: evañca avirodhe siddhavatparāmarśādaśramāntarāṇāṃ śāstrāntarasiddhiṃ vā kalpayiṣyāmo yathopavītavidhipare vākye 'upavyayate devalakṣmameva
GSP33vacbhamu:12384: tatkurute' ityatra nivītaṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ prācīnāvītaṃ pitṛṇāmiti śāstrāntarasiddhayornivītaprācīnāvītayoḥ parāmarśa iti //19 //
GSP33vacbhamu:12388: tathāpyāśramāntarāṇāṃ pūrvasiddherabhāvātparāmarśānupapatteḥ, aparāmarśe ca stuterasaṃbhavena kiṃparatayā ekavākyatāstvitī tāṃ bhaṅktvā dhāraṇavadvaramapūrvatvādvidhirevāstu /
GSP33vacbhamu:12397: nanu anāśramyeva brahmasaṃstho bhaviṣyatītyata āha- anāśrayamitveti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:12400: yadi tāvadbrahmasaṃstha iti padaṃ pratyastamityāvayavārthaṃ parivrājake
GSP33vacbhamu:12407: evañca caturṣvāśrameṣu yasyaiva brahmaṇi niṣṭhatvamāśramiṇaḥ sa brahmasaṃstho 'mṛtatvametīti yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:12408: tatra tāvadbrahmacārigṛhasthau svaśabdābhihitau tapaḥpadena ca tapaḥpradhānatayā bhikṣuvānaprasthāvupasthāpitau
GSP33vacbhamu:12411: yadi tāvatkarmayogaḥ karmitā sā bhikṣorapi kāyavāṅmanobhirasti /
GSP33vacbhamu:12412: atha ye na brahmārpaṇena karma kurvanti kintu kāmārthitayā te karmiṇaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:12413: tathā sati gṛhasthādayo 'pi brahmārpaṇena karma kurvāṇā na karmiṇaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:12414: tasmādbrahmaṇi tātparyaṃ brahmaniṣṭhatā na tu karmatyāgaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:12416: tapasā ca dvayorāśramayorekīkaraṇena traya iti tritvamupapadyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:12417: evañca trayo 'pyāśramā abrahmasaṃsthāḥ santaḥ puṇyalokabhājo bhavanti yaḥ punareteṣu brahmasaṃsthaḥ so 'mṛtatvabhāgiti /
GSP33vacbhamu:12419: yathā devadattayajñadattau mandaprajñāvabhūtāṃ saṃprati tayoryajñādattastu śāstrābhyāsātpaṭuprajño vartate iti tathehāpi ya evābrahmasaṃsthāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:12421: tathāca brahmasaṃstha iti yaugikaṃ padaṃ prakṛtaviṣayaṃ bhaviṣyati /
GSP33vacbhamu:12422: yathā āgnepyāgnīdhramupatiṣṭhata ityatra viniyuktāpi prakṛtaivāgneyī gṛhyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:12424: yadi hyatrāgnotyupadiśyeta tato yathā pratītā tathoddiśyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:12426: iha tu āgnīdhropasthāne sā vidheyatvena viniyujyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:12432: tathehāpi prakṛtā evāśramā buddhiviparivartinaḥ parāmṛśyante nānuktaḥ parivrāḍeveti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:12436: yatsaṃkhyākāśca ye prasiddhāste tatsaṃkhyākā eva kīrtyante iti cocitam /
GSP33vacbhamu:12438: aśādhāraṇenaikaikena lakṣaṇenaikeka āśramo vaktumupakrānta iti tathaiva samāpanamucitam /
GSP33vacbhamu:12440: naca tapo nāma nāsādhāraṇaṃ vānaprasthānāmityata āha- tapaścāsādhāraṇa
GSP33vacbhamu:12442: na khalu parākādibhiḥ kāyakleśapradhāno yathā vānaprasthastathā bhikṣuḥ satyapyaṣṭagrāsādiniyame
GSP33vacbhamu:12443: naca śaucasantoṣaśamādayastapaḥ pakṣe vartante tatra vṛddhānāṃ tapaḥprasiddherasiddheḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:12448: traya eta iti kiṃ bhikṣurapi parāmṛśyate kintvā bhikṣuvarjaṃ traya eva /
GSP33vacbhamu:12449: na tāvantraya iti bhikṣusaṃgrahe tadvarjanamete traya ityatra vartuṃ śakyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:12450: eva iti prakṛtānāṃ sākalyena parāmarśādbhikṣusaṃgrahe ca na tasya puṇyalokatvamabrahmasaṃsthātvābhāvādbhikṣoḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:12451: tena tasya brahmasaṃsthasya sadā puṇyalokatvamamṛtatvaṃ ceti virodhaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:12458: satyaṃ yaugikaḥ śabdaḥ sati prakṛtasaṃbhave na tadatipattyāprakṛte vartitumarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:12459: asati tu saṃbhave mā bhūtpramādapāṭha ityaprakṛte vartayitavyaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:12461: eṣa hi brahmasaṃsthatālakṣaṇo dharmo bhikṣorasādhāraṇa āśramāntarāṇi tatsaṃsthānyatatsaṃsthāni ca bhikṣustatsaṃstha ityeva /
GSP33vacbhamu:12462: tatsaṃsthatā hi svābhāvaṃ vyavacchindantī virodhādyastatsaṃstha eva tatrāñjasī nānyatra /
GSP33vacbhamu:12465: brahmasaṃsthatvamasādhāraṇaṃ parivrājakadharmaṃ śrutirādarśayatītyāha- tathāca nyāsa iti brahmeti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:12466: sarvasaṅgaparityāgo hi nyāsaḥ sa brahmā kuta ityata āha- brahmā hi paraḥ. /
GSP33vacbhamu:12468: kimapekṣya paraḥ saṃnyāsa ityata āha- tāni vā etānyavarāṇi tapāṃsi nyāsa evātyarecayaditi. etaduktaṃ bhavati-brahmaparatayā sarveṣaṇāparityāgalakṣaṇo nyāso brahmeti
GSP33vacbhamu:12469: tathā cedṛśaṃ nyāsalakṣaṇaṃ brahmasaṃsthatvaṃ bhikṣorevāsādhāraṇaṃ netareṣāmāśramiṇām /
GSP33vacbhamu:12475: vidhivyabhicāritatadvidhisaṃbandhenodgīthenopasthāpitaḥ sa eṣa rasānāṃ rasatama ityādinā padasaṃdarbheṇaikavākyabhāvamupagataḥ stūyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:12478: yadi tūdgīthamupāsīta sāmopāsītetyādividhisamabhivyāhāraḥ śrutastathāpi tasyaiva vidheḥ stutirna tūpāsanāviṣayasamarpaṇapara omityetadakṣaramudgīthamityanenaivopāsanāviṣayasamarpaṇāditi prāpte 'bhidhīyate-na tāvaddūrasthena karmavidhivākyenaikavākyatāsaṃbhavaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:12485: tenaikavākyatānupapatteḥ saṃnihitasya tūpāsanāvidheḥ kiṃ viṣayasamarpaṇenopayujyatāmuta stutyeti viśaye viṣayasamarpaṇena yathārthavattvaṃ naivaṃ stutyā bahiraṅgatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:12497: sāmānyoktau tadviśeṣāḥ pacedityādayo 'pi gamyanta iti tatra
GSP33vacbhamu:12501: evaṃ daṇḍī bhaveddaṇḍinā bhavitavyaṃ daṇḍinā bhūyetetyekadhātvarthaviṣayā vidhyupahitā bhāvanā udāhāryāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:12503: yathā kulālavyāpārādghaṭo bhavati bījādaṅkuro bhavatīti prayuñjate /
GSP33vacbhamu:12509: naca sarvā dāśatayīranubrūyāditi viniyoge 'pi dāśatayīnāṃ prātisvikaviniyogāttatra tatra karmaṇi yathā viniyogo na virudhyate tathehāpi satyapi pāriplave viniyege saṃnidhānādvidyāṅgatvamapi bhaviṣyatīti vācyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:12510: dāśatayīṣu prātisvikānāṃ viniyogānāṃ samudāyaviniyogasya ca tulyabalatvādiha tu saṃnidhānāt śruterbalīyastvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:12513: kintu pāriplavamācakṣītetyupakramya yānyāmnātāni manurvaivasvato rājetyādīni teṣāmeva tatra viniyogaḥ, tānyeva hi pāriplavena viśeṣitāni /
GSP33vacbhamu:12517: yathā sarve brāhmaṇā bhojayitavyā ityatra nimintrātāpekṣaḥ sarvaśabdaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:12518: tathā copaniṣadākhyānānāṃ vidyāsaṃnidhirapratidvandīṃ vidyaikavākyatāṃ so 'rodīdityādīnāmiva vidhyekavākyatvaṃ gamayatīti siddham /
GSP33vacbhamu:12519: pratipattisaukaryāccetyupākhyānena hi bālā apyavadhīyante yathā tantropākhyāyikayeti //23
GSP33vacbhamu:12521: vidyāyāḥ kratvarthatve sati tathā kratūpakaraṇāya svakāryāya kraturapekṣitaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:12523: yadā tu puruṣārthā tadā nānayā kraturapekṣitaḥ svakārye nirapekṣāyā eva tasyāḥ sāmarthyāt
GSP33vacbhamu:12524: agnīndhānādinā cāśramakarmāṇyupalakṣyante tadāha- agnīndhanādīvyāśramakarmāṇi vidyayā svārthasiddhau nāpekṣitavyānīti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:12528: adhikavivakṣyeti yaduktaṃ tadadhikamāha- sarvāpekṣā ca yajñādiśruteraśvavat. /
GSP33vacbhamu:12529: yathā svārthasiddhau nāpekṣyante āśramakarmāṇi evamutpattāvapi nāpekṣyeranniti śaṅkā syāt
GSP33vacbhamu:12539: caturthī sākṣātkāravatī vṛttirūpā nāntarīyakaṃ hi tasyāḥ kaivalyamiti /
GSP33vacbhamu:12540: tatrādye tāvatpratipatti viditapadatadarthasya viditavākyagatigocaranyāyasya ca puṃsa upapadyete eveti na tatra karmāpekṣā /
GSP33vacbhamu:12541: te eva ca cintāmayīṃ tṛtīyaṃ pratipattiṃ prasuvāte iti na tatrāpi karmāpekṣā /
GSP33vacbhamu:12542: sā cādaranairantaryadīrghakālasevitā sākṣātkāravatīmādhatta eva pratipattiṃ caturthīmiti na tatrāpyasti karmāpekṣā /
GSP33vacbhamu:12543: tannāntarīyakaṃ ca kaivalyamiti na tasyāpi karmāpekṣā /
GSP33vacbhamu:12544: tadevaṃ pramāṇataśca prameyata utpattau ca kārye ca na jñānasya karmāpekṣeti bījaṃ śaṅkāyām
GSP33vacbhamu:12545: evaṃ prāpta ucyate-utpattau jñānasya karmāpekṣā vidyate vividiṣotpādadvārā
GSP33vacbhamu:12548: yathā yasya parṇamayī juhūrbhavatīti parṇamayatāvidhirapūrvatvānna tvayaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:12554: sa hi tattvato 'nityāśuciduḥ-khānātmani saṃsāre sati nityaśucimukhātmalakṣaṇena vibhrameṇa
GSP33vacbhamu:12556: ataḥ pāpmanaḥ prakṣaye pratyakṣopapattidvārāpāvaraṇe sati pratyakṣopapattibhyāṃ saṃsārasya tāttvikīmanityāśuciduḥkharūpatāmapratyūhaṃ viniścineti /
GSP33vacbhamu:12559: tato hānopāyaṃ prayeṣate paryeṣamāṇaścātmatattvajñānamasyopāya iti śāstradācāryavacanāccopaśrutya tajjijñāsata iti vividiṣopahāramukhenātmajñānotpattāvasti karmāṇamupayogaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:12560: vividiṣuḥ khalu yukta ekāgratayā śravaṇamanane kartumutsahate /
GSP33vacbhamu:12563: yena bhāvanāyāṃ vā bhāvanākārye vā sākṣātkāre karmaṇāmupayogaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:12567: dṛṣṭārtheṣu tu karmasu pratiṣiddhavarjamanadhikāre 'pyasaktasya svārasikī pravṛttirupapadyata eva /
GSP33vacbhamu:12569: ataśca 'bhrāntyā cellaukikaṃ karma vaidikaṃ ca tathāstu te' iti pralāpaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:12571: upapāditaṃ caitadasmābhiḥ prathamasūtra ite neha punaḥ pratyāpyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:12572: tasmādvividiṣotpādadvārāśramakarmaṇāṃ vidyotpattāvupayogo na vidyākārya iti siddham /
GSP33vacbhamu:12576: eṣa kila vicāraviṣayaḥ-sarvāṇi khalu vāgādīnyavajitya prāṇo mukhya uvācaitāni kiṃ me 'nnaṃ bhaviṣyatīti, tāni hocuḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:12577: yadidaṃ loke 'nnamā ca śvabhya ā ca śakunibhyaḥ sarvaprāṇināṃ yadannaṃ tattavānnamiti /
GSP33vacbhamu:12578: tadanena saṃdarbheṇa prāṇasya sarvamannamityanucintanaṃ vidhāyāha śrutiḥ-'na ha vā evaṃvidi kiñcanānannaṃ bhavati' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:12580: tatra saṃśayaḥ-kimetatsarvānnābhyanujñānaṃ śamādivadetadvidyāṅgatayā vidhīyata uta stutyarthaṃ saṃkīrtyata iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:12581: tatra yadyapi bhavatīti vartamānāpadeśānna vidhiḥ pratīyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:12582: tathāpi yathā yasya parṇamayī juhūrbhavatīti vartamānāpadeśādapi palāśamayītvavidhipratipattiḥ pañcamalakārāpattyā tathehāpi pravṛttiviśeṣakaratālābhe vidhipratipattiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:12583: stutau hi arthavādamātraṃ na tathārthavadyathā vidhau /
GSP33vacbhamu:12584: bhakṣyābhakṣyaśāstraṃ ca sāmānyataḥ pravṛttamanena viśeṣaśāstreṇa bādhyate
GSP33vacbhamu:12588: na tāvatkauleyakamaryādamannaṃ manuṣyajātinā yugapatparyāyeṇa vā śakyamattum /
GSP33vacbhamu:12590: na cātra liṅ iva sphuṭatarā vidhipratipattirasti /
GSP33vacbhamu:12593: naca satyāṃ gatau sāmānyataḥ pravṛttasya śāstrasya viṣayasaṃkoco yuktaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:12596: prāṇātyasya iti cāvadhāraṇaparaṃ prāṇātyaya eva sarvānnatvam /
GSP33vacbhamu:12597: tatropākhyānācca sphuṭataravidhismṛteśca surāvarjaṃ vidvāṃsamavidvāṃsaṃ prati vidhānāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:12605: kāmo ma udakapānamiti svātantryaṃ me udakapāne nadīkūpataḍāgaprāpādiṣu yathākāmaṃ prāpnomīti nocchiṣṭodakābhāve prāṇātyaya iti tatrocchiṣṭabhakṣaṇadoṣa iti maṭacīhateṣu kuruṣu glāyannaśanāyayā munirnirapatrapa ibhyena sāmijagdhānkhādayāmāsa //28 //
GSP33vacbhamu:12613: evaṃ prāpte 'bhidhīyate-siddhe hi syādvirodho 'yaṃ na tu sādhye kathañcana
GSP33vacbhamu:12616: na tu sādhyarūpaṃ yathā ṣoḍaśina ekasya grahaṇāgrahaṇe /
GSP33vacbhamu:12620: nityehitopāttaduritaprakṣayaprayojanamavaśyakartavyaṃ, vidyāṅgatayā ca vidyāyāḥ kādācitkatayānavaśyaṃ bhāve 'pi 'kāmyo vā naimittiko vā vikṛtya
GSP33vacbhamu:12621: niviśate' iti nyāyādanityādhikāreṇa niviśamānamapi na nityamanityayati,
GSP33vacbhamu:12622: tenāpi tasmiddheriti saṃyogapṛthaktvānna nityānityasaṃyogavirodha ekasya kāryasyeti siddham
GSP33vacbhamu:12623: sahākiratvaṃ ca karmaṇāṃ na kārye vidyāyāḥ kiṃ tūtpattau /
GSP33vacbhamu:12626: yathā 'sahaiva daśābhiḥ pūtrairbhāraṃ vahati gardabhī' iti sātsveva daśaputreṣu saiva bhārasya vāhiketi /
GSP33vacbhamu:12631: catasṛṇāmapi ca pratipattīnāṃ brahmaṇi vidhānānupapatterityuktaṃ prathamasūtre /
GSP33vacbhamu:12632: draṣṭavyo nididhyāsitavya iti ca vidhisarūpaṃ ni vidhirityapyuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:12635: naca svaṃ rūpaṃ brahmaṇaḥ sādhyaṃ nityatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:12638: yathā māsamagnihotraṃ juhvatīti prakaraṇāntarātkarmabheda evamihāpi 'tametaṃ vedānuvacanena brāhmaṇā vividiṣanti yajñena'
GSP33vacbhamu:12639: itikratuprakaraṇamatikramyaśravaṇātprakaraṇāntarāttadbuddhivyavacchede sati karmāntaramiti prāpta ucyate-satyapi prakaraṇāntare tadeva karma,
GSP33vacbhamu:12640: śruteḥ smṛteśca saṃyogabhedaḥ paraṃ yathā 'agnihotraṃ juhuyātsvargakāmaḥ'
GSP33vacbhamu:12643: kintu ajñātajñāpanasvaraso vidhiḥ prakaraṇaikye sphuṭatarapratyabhijñābalena svarasaṃ jahyāt
GSP33vacbhamu:12645: iha tu siddhavadutpannarūpāṇyeva yajñādīni vividiṣāyāṃ viniyuñjāno na juhvatītyādivadapūrvameṣāṃ rūpamutpādayitumarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:12649: kāle hi karma vidhīyate na karmaṇi kāla ityutsargaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:12650: iha tu vividiṣāyāṃ vidhiśrutiḥ na yajñādau /
GSP33vacbhamu:12654: yadi vidyāsahakārīṇyāśramakarmāṇi hanta bho vidhurādīnāmanāśramiṇāmanadhikāro vidyāyām,
GSP33vacbhamu:12664: yadyapi ceha janmani tatheha janmanyāśramakarmotpāditavividiṣa eva vidyāyāmadhikṛto netara ityanāśramiṇāmanadhikāro vidhuraprabhṛtīnāmityata
GSP33vacbhamu:12672: daivātpunaḥ patnyādiviyogātaḥ satyanāśramitve bhavedadhikāro vidyāyāmiti śrutismṛtisaṃdarbheṇa vividiṣanti yajñenetyādinā jyāyastvāvagateḥ śrutiliṅgātsmṛtiliṅgāccvāgamyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:12673: tenaiti puṇyakṛditi śrutiliṅgam, anāśramī na tiṣṭhetetyādi ca smṛtiliṅgam //39 //
GSP33vacbhamu:12679: atadrūpatāmārohatulyatābhāvaṃ vyācaṣṭe- tathāca brahmacaryaṃ samāpyeti. abhāvaṃ śiṣṭācārābhāvaṃ vibhajate- na caivamācārāḥ śiṣṭā iti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:12682: prāyaścittaṃ na paśyāmīti naiṣṭhikaṃ prati prāyaścittābhāvasmaraṇānnairṛtagardabhālambhaḥ prāyaścittamupakurvāṇakaṃ prati /
GSP33vacbhamu:12683: tasmācchinnaśirasa iva puṃsaḥ pratikriyābhāva iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:12685: 'avakīrṇipaśuśca tadvadādhānasyāprāptakālatvāt' ityanena yatprāyaścittaṃ tanna naiṣṭhike bhavitumarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:12691: tasyāmapi ca sākṣātprāyaścittaṃ na kartavyamiti prāyaścittaniṣedho na
GSP33vacbhamu:12692: gamyate, na paśyāmīti tu darśanābhāvena so 'numātavyaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:12693: tathā ca smṛtirniṣedhārtheti anumāya tadarthā śrutiranumātavyā /
GSP33vacbhamu:12700: śāstrasthā yā vā prasiddhiḥ sā grāhyā śāstramūlatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:12703: yadi naiṣṭhikādīnāmasti prāyaścittaṃ tatkimetaiḥ kṛtanirṇejanaiḥ saṃvyavahartavyamuta neti
GSP33vacbhamu:12704: tatra doṣakṛtatvādasaṃvyavahārasya prāyaścittena tannibarhaṇādanibarhaṇe vā tatkaraṇavaiyarthyātsaṃvyavahāryā eveti prāpta ucyati- bahistūbhayathāpi smṛterācārācca. /
GSP33vacbhamu:12705: niṣiddhakarmānuṣṭhānajanyameno lokadvaye 'pyaśuddhimāpādayati dvaidham lokadvaye 'pyaśuddhirapanīyate prāyaścittairenonibarhaṇaṃ kurvāṇaiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:12706: kasyācittu paralokāśuddhimātramapanīyate prāyaścittairenonibarhaṇaṃ kurvāṇairihalokāśuddhistvenasāpāditā na śakyāpanetum /
GSP33vacbhamu:12709: tathā ca 'prāyaścittairapaityeno yadajñānakṛtaṃ bhavet' kāmataḥ kṛtamapi /
GSP33vacbhamu:12710: bālaghrādistu kṛtanirṇejano 'pi vacanādavyavahārya iha loke jāyata iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:12714: prathame kāṇḍe śeṣalakṣaṇe tathākāma ityatrartviksaṃbandhe karmaṇaḥ siddhe kiṃ kāmo yājamāna utārtvijya iti saṃśapyārtvijye 'pi karmaṇi yājamāna eva
GSP33vacbhamu:12715: kāmo guṇaphaleṣviti nirṇītamihi tvevañjātīyakāni cāṅgasaṃbaddhāni upāsanāni kiṃ yājamānanyevotārtvijyānīti vicāryata iti na punaruktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:12716: tatropāsakānāṃ phalaśravaṇādanadhikāriṇastadanupapatteryajamānasya ca karmajanitaphalopabhogabhājo 'dhikārādṛtvijāṃ ca tadanupapattervacanācca rājājñāsthānīyātkkacidṛtvijāṃ phalaśruterasati vacane yajamānasya phalavadupāsanaṃ tasya phalaśruteḥ taṃ ha bako dālabhyo vidāñcakāretyāderupāsanasya ca siddhaviṣayatayānyāyāpavādasāmarthyabhāvādyājamānamevopāsanākarmeti prāpta ucyate- ārtvijyamityauḍulomistasmai hi parikrīyate. /
GSP33vacbhamu:12719: na cartvikkartṛka upāsane yajamānagāmitā phalasyāsaṃbhavinī tena hi sa parikrīyastadgāmine phalāya ghaṭate /
GSP33vacbhamu:12722: labdhvā bālyena tiṣṭhāsedbālyaṃ ca pāṇḍityaṃ ca nirvidyātha muniramaunaṃ ca maunaṃ ca nirvidyātha brāhmaṇa iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:12723: yatra hi vidhivibhaktiḥ śrūyate sa vidheyaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:12724: bālyena tiṣṭhāsedityatra ca sā śrūyate na śrūyate tu maune /
GSP33vacbhamu:12731: tasmādbālyamevātra vidhīyate maunaṃ tu prāptaṃ praśaṃsārthamanūdyata iti yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:12733: api tu jñānamātraṃ pāṇḍityaṃ jñānātiśayasaṃpattistu maunaṃ tatprasiddheḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:12735: tasmādapūrvatvānmaunasya bālyapāṇḍityāpekṣayā tṛtīyamidaṃ maunaṃ jñānātiśayarūpaṃ vidhīyate
GSP33vacbhamu:12736: evaṃ ca nirvedanīyatvamapi vidhāna āñjasaṃ syādityāha- nirvedanīyatvanirdeśāditi. /

GSP33vacbhamu:12950: nahyupāsanavidhānāni jīvātmano brahmasvabhāvapratipādanaparaistatvamasyādisaṃdarbhairekavākyabhāvamāpadyante yena tadekavākyatayā brahmadṛṣṭyupadeśeṣvātmadṛṣṭiḥ kalpeta bhinnaprakaraṇatvāt. tathāca tatra yathālokapratītivyavasthito jīvaḥ kartā bhoktā ca saṃsārī na brahmeti kathaṃ tasya brahmātmatayābrahmadṛṣṭyupadeśeṣvātmadṛṣṭirupadiśyatetyarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:12952: yadyapyupāsako jīvātmā na brahmavikāraḥ, pratīkāni tu manaḥprabhṛtīnibrahmavikārastathāpyavacchinnatayā jīvātmanaḥ pratīkaiḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:12955: yadyapi sāmānādhikaraṇmubhayathāpi ghaṭate tathāpi brahmaṇaḥ sarvādhyakṣatayā phalaprasavasāmarthyena phalavatvātprādhānyena tadevādityādidṛṣṭibhiḥ saṃskartavyamityādityādidṛṣṭayo brahmaṇyeva kartavyā na tu brahmadṛṣṭirādityādiṣu /
GSP33vacbhamu:12956: na caivaṃvidhe 'vadhṛte śāstrārthe nikṛṣṭadṛṣṭinorkṛṣṭa iti laukiko nyāyo 'pavādāya prabhavatyāgamavirodhena tasyaivāpoditatvāditi pūrvapakṣasaṃkṣepaḥ /

GSP33vacbhamu:12960: atra hi sarvatra yāgādyārādhitā devataiva phalaṃ prayacchatīti sthāpitaṃ tathāpi śabdataḥ karmaṇaḥ karaṇatvāvagamane phalavatvapratūte- prādhānyam
GSP33vacbhamu:12962: taduktaṃ ----'yaistu dravyaṃ saṃcikīrṣyate guṇastatra pratīyate' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:12963: tadiha yadyapi sarvādhyakṣatayā vastuto brahmaiva phalaṃ prayacchati tathāpi śāstraṃ brahmabuddhyā'dityādau pratika upāsyamāne brahma phalāya kalpate ityabhivadati kiṃvādityādibuddhyā brahmaiva viṣayīkṛtaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:12964: palāyetyubhayathāpi brahmaṇaḥ sarvādhyakṣasya phaladānopapatteḥ śāstrārthasaṃdehe lokānusārato niścīyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:12966: na kevalaṃ laukiko nyāyo niścaye heturapi tu ādityādiśabdānāṃ prāthamyena mukhyārthatvamapītyāha ---prāthamyācceti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:12968: tathāhi ----svaravṛtyā ādityādiśabdā yathā svārthe vartante tathā brahmaśabdo 'pi svārthe vartsyati yadi svārtho 'sya vapavakṣitaḥsyāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:12969: tathācetiparatvamanarthakaṃ tasmāditinā svārthātpracyāvya brahmapadaṃ jñānaparaṃ svarūpaparaṃ vā kartavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:12970: naca brahmapadamādityādipadārtha iti ,pratūtipara evāyamitiparaḥśabdo yathā gauriti me gavayo 'bhavaditi /
GSP33vacbhamu:12971: tathāca ādityādayo brahmeti pratipattavyā ityartho bhavatītyāha--- itiparatvādapi brahmaśabdasyeti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:12975: satsvapi ādityādiṣu phalānutpādādutpattimataḥ karmaṇa eva phaladarśanātkarmaiva phalavat /
GSP33vacbhamu:12978: ādityadiṣu punarudgīthādidṛṣṭāvudgīthādibudyopāsyamānā ādityādayaḥ karmātmakaḥsantaḥ phalāya kalpiṣyanta iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:12979: ata eva ca pṛthvyagnyorṛksāmaśabdaprayoga upapanno yataḥ pṛthvyāmṛgdṛṣṭiradhyastāgnau ca sāmadṛṣṭiḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:12980: sāmni punaragnidṛṣṭau ṛci ca pṛthvīdṛṣṭau viparītaṃ bhavet /
GSP33vacbhamu:12983: evaṃ khalvadhikaraṇanirdeśo viṣayatvapratipādanapara upapadyate yadi lokeṣu sāmadṛṣṭiradhyasyeta nālyatheti /
GSP33vacbhamu:12988: nahyādityādibhiḥ kiñcitkriyate yadvidyayā viryavattaraṃ bhavatītyādityamatīnāmupapadyate udgīthādiṣu saṃskārakatvenopayogaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:12990: yatra hi karmaṇa- phalaṃ tatraivaṃ bhavatu yatra tu guṇātaphalaṃ tatra guṇasya siddhatvenākāryatvātkarotītyeva nāstītyatra vidyāyāḥ kva upayoga ityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:12992: na tāvadguṇaḥ siddhasvabhāvaḥ kāryāya phalāya paryāptaḥ, mā bhūtprakṛtakarmāniveśino yatkiñcitphalotpādaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:12993: tasmātprakṛtāpūrvasaṃniveśinaḥ phalotpāda iti tasya kriyamāṇatvena vidyayā vīryavattaratvopapattiriti
GSP33vacbhamu:12998: nanūktaṃ siddharūpairādityādibhiradhyastaiḥ sādhyabūtatvamabhibhūtaṅkarmaṇāmityata āha--- ādityādibhāvenāpi ca dṛśyamānānāmiti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:13000: api tu māṇavaka ivāgnidṛṣṭiḥ kenacittīvratvādinā guṇena gauṇyanabhibhūtamāṇavakatvāttathehāpi
GSP33vacbhamu:13008: tatra yadi sāmadhīradhyasyeta tato na sāmānyupāsyeran api tu lokāḥ pṛthivyādayaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13009: tathā ca dvitīyārthaṃ parityajya tṛtīyārthaḥ parikalpayeta sāmneti /
GSP33vacbhamu:13011: akāre gāvo vāsyantāṃ prāvāre kusumānītivat tenoktanyānurodhena saptamyāścobhayathāpyavaśyaṃ kalpanīyārthatvādvaraṃ yathāśrutadvitīyārthānurodhāya tṛtīyārthe saptamī vyākhyātavyā /
GSP33vacbhamu:13013: nanu yatrobhayatrāpi dvitīyānirdeśo yathā khalvamumevādityaṃ saptavidhaṃ hiṅkāraprastāvoṅkārodgīthapratīhāropadravanidhanaprakāraṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:13015: tatrāpi samastasya saptavidhasya sāmna upāsanamiti sāmna upāsyatvaśruteḥ sādhviti pañcavidhasya
GSP33vacbhamu:13018: hiṅkārānuvādena pṛthivīdṛṣṭividhāne hiṅkāraḥ pṛthivīti prāpte viparītanirdeśaḥ pṛthivī hiṅkāraḥ āsīnaḥ saṃbhavāt. /
GSP33vacbhamu:13019: karmāṅgasaṃmandhiṣu yatra hi tiṣṭhataḥ karma coditaḥ tatra tatsaṃbaddhopāsānāni tiṣṭhataiva kratavyā /
GSP33vacbhamu:13022: pramāṇatantrā ca vastuvyavasthā pramāṇaṃ ca .....nāpekṣata iti
GSP33vacbhamu:13024: yanmahatā prayatnena vinopāsitumaśakyaṃ yathā pratīkādi , yathā vā samyagdarśanamapi tatvamasyādi,tatraiṣā cintā /
GSP33vacbhamu:13025: tatra codakaśāstrābhāvādaniyame prāpte yathā śakāyata ityupabhandhādāsīnasyaiva siddham /
GSP33vacbhamu:13026: nanu yasyāmavasthāyāṃ dhyāyatirupacariyate prayujyate kimasau tadā tiṣṭhato na bhavati na bhavatītyāha /
GSP33vacbhamu:13030: same śucau śarkarāvahnivālukāvivarjita ityādivacanānniyame siddhe digdeśādiniyamamavācanikamapi prācīnapravaṇe vaiśvadevena yajetetivadvaidikārambhasāmānyātkvacitkaścitadāśaṅkate /
GSP33vacbhamu:13038: śāstraṃ hi niyojyasya kāryarūpaniyegasaṃbandhamavabodhayati tasyaiva karmaṇyaiśvaryalakṣaṇamadhikāraṃ taccaitadubhayamatīndriyatvādbhavati śāstralakṣaṇaṃ pramāṇāntarāprāpye śāstrasyārthavattvādbrahmatvapratītestu
GSP33vacbhamu:13039: jīvanmuktena dṛṣṭatvānnāstīha tirohitamiva kiñcaneti kimatra śāstraṃ kariṣyati /
GSP33vacbhamu:13040: nanvevamapyabhyudayaphalānyupāsanāni tatra niyoganiyojyalakṣaṇasya ca kramaṇi svāmitālakṣaṇasya ca saṃbandhasyātīndritvāttatra sakṛtkāraṇādeva śāstrārthasamāptauprāptāyāmupāsanapadavedanīyāvṛttimātrameva kṛtavata uparaṃmaḥ prāptastāvataiva kṛtaśāstrārthatvāditi prāpte
GSP33vacbhamu:13041: 'bhidhīyate--savijñāno bhavatītyādiśruteryatra svargādiphalānāmapi karmaṇāṃ prāyaṇakāle svargādivijñānāpekṣakatvaṃ tatra kaiva kathātīndriyaphalānāmupāsanānām /
GSP33vacbhamu:13042: tāni khalu āprāyaṇaṃ tattadupāsyagocarabuddhipravāhavāhitayā dṛṣṭenaiva rūpeṇa prāyaṇasamaye tadbuddiṃ bhāvayiṣyanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:13043: kimatra phalavatprāyaṇasamaye buddhyākṣepeṇa nahi dṛṣṭe saṃbhavatyadṛṣṭakalpanā yuktā /
GSP33vacbhamu:13046: tathā ca śrutiḥ sarvādīndriyaviṣaya--'sa yathākraturasmāllokāt praiti tāvatkraturhāmuṃ lokaṃ pretyabhisaṃbhavati' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:13052: tatra tāvatprathamamidaṃ vicāryate kiṃ brahmādhigame brahmajñāne sati brahmajñānaphalānmokṣādviparītaphalaṃ duritaṃ bandhanaphalaṃ kṣīyate na kṣīyata iti saṃśayaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13053: kiṃ tāvatprāptaṃ , śāstreṇa hi phalāya yadvihitaṃ pratiṣiddhaṃ cānarthaparihārāyāśvamedhādi brahmahatyādi cāpūrvāvāntaravyāpāraṃ kiṃ tadapūrvamuparate 'pi karmaṇyatra sukhadukhopabhogātprāṅgāvirantumarhati sa hi tasya vināśahetusdabhāve kathaṃ vinaśyediti /
GSP33vacbhamu:13055: adattaphalaṃ cetkarmāpūrvaṃ vinaśyati karmaṇa eva phalaprasavasāmarthyabodhakaśāstramapramāṇaṃ bhavet /
GSP33vacbhamu:13056: naca prāyaścittamiva brahmajñānamadattaphalānyapi karmapūrvāṇi kṣiṇotīti sāmpratam /
GSP33vacbhamu:13059: ata eva smaranti nābhuktaṃ kṣīyate karmeti /
GSP33vacbhamu:13060: yadi punarapekṣitopāyatātmā prāyaścittavidhirna niyojyaviśeṣapratilambhamātreṇa nirvṛṇotītyapekṣitakāṅkṣāyāṃ doṣasaṃyogena śravaṇāttannibarhaṇaphalaḥ kalpeta /
GSP33vacbhamu:13063: śāstraprāmāṇyātsaṃbhaviṣyatyasāvavasthā yasyāmupabhogena samastakarmakṣaye brahmajñānaṃ mokṣaṃ prasoṣyati /
GSP33vacbhamu:13064: yogādhdyairva vā divi bhuvyantarīkṣe bahūni śarīrendriyāṇi nirmāya phalānayupabhujyarddhena yogasāmarthyena yogī karmāṇi kṣapayitvā mokṣī saṃpatsyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:13065: sthite caitasminnarthe nyāyabalādyathā puṣkarapalāśa ityādivyapadeśo brahmavidyāstutimātraparatayā vyākhyeya iti prāpta ucyate--vyākhyāyetaivaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:13067: śāstraṃ hi phalotpādanasāmarthyamātraṃ karmaṇāmavagamayati na tu kutaścidāgantukānnimittataḥ prāyaścittādestadapratibandhamapi /
GSP33vacbhamu:13069: yadi śāstrabodhitaphalaprasavasāmarthyamapratibaddhamāgantukena kenacit karmaṇā tatastatphalaṃ prasūta evāti na śāstravyāghātaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13072: yatrāpi nirguṇāyāṃ paravidyāyāṃ doṣoddheśo nāsti tatrāpi tatsvabhāvālocanādeva tatprakṣayaprasavasāmarthyamavasīyate
GSP33vacbhamu:13073: nahi tatvamasivākyārthaparibhāvanābhuvā prasaṃkhyānena nirmṛṣṭanikhilakartṛbhokktṛtvādivibhramo jīvaḥ phalopabhogona yujyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:13074: nahi rajjavāṃ bhujaṅkasamāropanibandhanā bhayakampādayaḥ sati rajjutatvasākṣātkāre prabhavanti, kintu saṃskāraśeṣātkiñcitkālamanuvṛttā api nivartanta eva /
GSP33vacbhamu:13075: amumevārthamanuvadanto yathā puṣkarapalāśa ityādayo vyapadeśāḥ samavetārthāḥ santo na stutimātratayā kathañcidvyākhyānamarhanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:13076: nanūktaṃ saṃbhaviṣyanti sāvasthā jīvātmano yasyāṃ paryāyeṇopabhogādvā yogarddheḥ prabhāvato yugapannaikavidhakāyanirmāṇenāparyāyeṇopabhogādvā jantuḥ karmāṇi kṣapayitvā mokṣī saṃpatsyata ityata āha--- evameva ca mokṣa upapadyata iti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:13077: anādikālapravṛttā hi karmāśayā aniyatakālavipākāḥ kramavatā tāvadbhogena kṣetumaśakyāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13083: nanu satsvapi karmāśayāntareṣusukhadukhaphaleṣu mokṣaphalāt karmaṇaḥ samudācarato brahmabhāvamanubhūyātha labdhavipākānāṃ karmāntarāṇāṃ phalāni bhokṣyanta ityāha-- naca deśakālanimittāpekṣā iti. nahi kāryaḥ sanmokṣo mokṣo bhavitumarhati brahmabhāvo hi saḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13087: jñānasya cānantarabhāvinījñeyābhivyaktiḥ phalaṃ, saivāvidyocchedamādadhatī brahmasvabhāvasvarūpāvasthānalakṣaṇāya mokṣāya kalpate /
GSP33vacbhamu:13089: apūrvādhānaparamparayā jñānasya mokṣaphale kalpyamāne jñānasya parokṣaphalatvamadṛṣṭārthatvaṃ bhavet /
GSP33vacbhamu:13093: adharmasya svābhāvikatvena rāgādinibandhanatvena śāstrīyeṇa brahmajñānena pratibandho yuktaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:13098: yathā devadatto dakṣiṇenākṣṇā paśyatītyukte na vāmena paśyatīti gamyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:13099: ubhe hyevaiṣa ete taratīti ca yathāsaṃbhavaṃ, brahmajñānena duṣkṛtaṃ bhogena sukṛtamiti
GSP33vacbhamu:13100: 'kṣīyante cāsya karmaṇi' iti ca sāmānyavacanaṃ 'sarve pāpmānaḥ' iti viśeṣaśravaṇātpāpakarmāṇīti viśeṣe upasaṃharaṇīyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:13101: tasmādbrahmajñānādduṣkṛtasyaiva kṣayo na sukṛtasyeti prāpte pūrvādhikaraṇarāddhānto 'tidiśyate
GSP33vacbhamu:13102: no khalu brahmavidyā kenacidadṛṣṭena dvāreṇa duṣkṛtamapanayatyapi tu dṛṣṭenaiva bhoktṛbhoktavyabhogādipravilayadvāreṇa taccaitattulyaṃ sukṛtepīti kathametadapi nocchindyāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:13103: evaṃ ca satina śāstrīyatvasāmyamātramavirodhaheturanahi pratyakṣatvasāmānyamātrādavirodho jalānalādīnāṃ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13109: tadyathā puṇyapāpe anukramya sarve pāpmāno 'to nivartaneta ityatra /
GSP33vacbhamu:13117: māyaivādinaśca puṇyapāpayoścamāyāmātravinirmitatvena māyānivṛttau na puṇyāpuṇye na tatasaṃskāro vastusantīti kasyānuvṛttiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13118: naca rajjau sarpādivibramajanitā bhayakamapādayo nivṛtte 'pi vibhrame yathānuvartante tathehāpīti yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:13121: atra tu māyā na tajjaḥ saṃskāro na tadgocara iti tucchatvātkimanuvarteta /
GSP33vacbhamu:13123: naca tasya tāvadeva ciraṃ yāvanna vimokṣye 'tha saṃmapatya iti śruterdehāpratīkṣārabdhakāryāṇāṃ yuktā. nahyeṣā śrutiravadhibhedavidhāyinyapi tu kṣipratāparā /
GSP33vacbhamu:13124: yathā loka etāvanme ciraṃ yatsanāto bhuñjānaśceti /
GSP33vacbhamu:13125: nahi tatra snānabhojane avadhitvena vidhīyate kitu kṣapīyastā
GSP33vacbhamu:13126: pratipādyate. ubhayavidhāne hi vākyaṃ bhidyetāvadhibhedaḥ ciratāceti prāpte 'bhidhīyate--yadyapyadvaitabrahmatatvasākṣātkāro
GSP33vacbhamu:13128: tathāpyanārabdhavipākaṃ karmajātaṃ drāgityeva samucchinatti na tvārabdhavipākaṃ saṃpāditajātyāyurvitatapūrvāparībhītasukhaduḥkhopabhogapravāhaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:13130: anyathā devarṣīṇāṃ hiraṇyagarbhamanūddālakaprabhṛtīnāṃvigalitanikhilakleśajālāvaramatayā paritaḥ pradyotamānabuddhisatvānāṃ na jyogjīvitā bhavet /
GSP33vacbhamu:13131: śrūyate caiṣāṃ śrutismṛtītihāsapurāṇeṣu tatvajñatā ca mahākalpakalpamanvantarādijīvitā ca
GSP33vacbhamu:13132: na caite mahadhiyo na tadīyasamastaphalopabhogapratīkṣā satyapi tatvasākṣātkāre /
GSP33vacbhamu:13133: tāvadeva ciramiti na ciratā vidhīyate. api tu śrutyantarasiddhāṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:13134: ciratāmanūdya dehapātāvadhimātravidhānaṃ tadetadabhisaṃdhāyaucityamātratayāha bhagavān bhāṣyākāraḥ--- na tāvadanāśrityārabdhakāryaṃ karmāśayamiti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:13135: na cedaṃ na jātu dṛṣṭaṃ yadviredhisamavāye viroddhyantaramanuvartata
GSP33vacbhamu:13140: tadevaṃ madhyasthanapratipādya ye bhāṣyakāramāptaṃ manyate tān pratyāha---
GSP33vacbhamu:13147: sa cāsanna nirvacanīya iti kuto vastusataḥ karyotpādaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13153: yadi puṇyasyāpyaśleṣavināśau hanta nityamapyagnihotrādi na kartavyaṃ yogamārūrukṣuṇā /
GSP33vacbhamu:13156: naca vividiṣanti yajñena dāneneti mokṣalakṣaṇaikakāryatayā vidyākarmaṇoravirodhaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13158: nahyetamātmānaṃ viduṣo vigalitākhilakartṛtvādiprapañcavibhramasya pūrvottare nitye kriyājanye puṇye saṃbhavataḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13159: tasmādvividiṣanti yajñeneti vartamānāpadeśo brahmajñānasya yajñādīnāṃ vā stutimātraṃ na tu mokṣamāṇasya muktisādhanaṃ yajñādividhiriti prāpta ucyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:13162: naca karmaṇāṃ vidyayā virudhyamānānāṃ na vidyākāraṇatvaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:13166: evañca vividiṣanti yajñeneti yajñasādhanatvaṃ vidyāya apūrvamarthaṃ prāpayataḥ pañcamalakārasya nātyantaparokṣavṛttitayā jñānastutyarthatayā kathañcidvyākhyānaṃ bhaviṣyati /
GSP33vacbhamu:13167: tadanenābhisamadhinoktaṃ -- jñānasyeva hi prāpakaṃ satkarama praṇaḍyā mokṣakāraṇamityupacaryate. yata eva na vidyodayasamaye karmāsti nāpi parastādapi tu prāgeva vidyāyāḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:13172: kāmyakarmaviṣayamaśle,vināśavacanaṃ śākhāntarīyavacanaṃ ca tasya putrā dāyamupayantīti //17
GSP33vacbhamu:13174: asti vidyāsaṃyuktaṃ yajñādi ya evaṃ vidvānyajetetyādikam /
GSP33vacbhamu:13176: tatra yathā brāhmaṇāya hiraṇyaṃ dadyādiyukte viduṣe brāhmaṇāya dadyātra brāhmaṇabruvāya mūkhāyeti viśeṣapratilambhaḥ tatkasya hetostasyātiśayavatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:13178: tasmādvividiṣanti yajñenetyaviśeṣaśrutamapi vidyāsahite yajñādāvupasaṃhartavyamiti prāpte 'bhidhīyate--yadeva vidyayā karāti tadevāsya vīryavattaramiti tarabarthaśrutervidyārahitasya
GSP33vacbhamu:13181: tasmādastyasyāpi kayāpi mātrayā paravidyotpādopayoga iti vidyārahitamapi yajñādi paravidyārthinānuṣṭheyamiti siddham //18 //
GSP33vacbhamu:13183: anārabdhakārya ityasya nañaḥ phalaṃ bhogena nivṛttiṃ darśayatyanena sūtreṇa /
GSP33vacbhamu:13184: asya tūpapādanaṃ purastādapakṛṣya kṛtamiti neha kriyate punaruktibhayāt
GSP33vacbhamu:13185: iti śrīvācaspatimiśraviracite śārīrakabhagavatpādabhāṣyavibhāge bhāmatyāṃ caturthasyādhyāyasya prathamaḥ pādaḥ samāptaḥ //
GSP33vacbhamu:13189: ityata āha-- athāparāsu vidyāsu phalaprāptaya iti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:13190: aparavidyāphalaprāptyarthadevayānamārgārthatvādutkrāntestadgato vicāraḥ pāramparyeṇa bhavati phalavicāra iti nāsaṃgata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13191: nanvayamutkrāntikramo viduṣo nopapadyate 'na tasya prāṇā utkrāmantyatraiva
GSP33vacbhamu:13192: samavanīyante' iti śravaṇāttatkathamasya vidyādhikāra ityata āha-- samānā hi vidvadaviduṣoriti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:13198: siddhāntasūtraṃ pūrayitvā paṭhati-- vāgvṛttirmanasi saṃpadyate iti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:13201: tattvasya dharmiṇo vācaḥ pralayavivakṣāyāṃ tviha sarvatraiva paratreha cāvibhāgasāmyātkiṃ paratraiva viṃśiṣyādavibhāga iti na tvatrāpi /
GSP33vacbhamu:13207: āgamo hi dṛṣṭānusārataḥ prakṛtau vikārāṇāṃ layamāha /
GSP33vacbhamu:13208: na ca vācaḥ prakṛtirmano yenāsminniyaṃ līyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:13213: yata eva prakṛtivikārabhāvābhāvanmanasi na svarūpalayo vāco 'pi tu
GSP33vacbhamu:13214: vṛttilayaḥ, ata eva ca sarveṣāṃ cakṣurādīnāmidriyāṇāṃ satyeva savṛttike manasi vṛtteranugatirlayo na svarūpalayaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13215: vācastu pṛthak grahaṇaṃ pūrvasūtre udāharaṇāpekṣaṃ na tu tadeveha vivakṣitamityarthaḥ //2
GSP33vacbhamu:13217: yadi svaprakṛtau vikārasya layastato manaḥ prāṇe saṃpadyate ityatra manaḥsvarūpasyaiva prāṇe saṃpattyā bhavitavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:13218: tathā hi manaḥ iti nopacārato vyākhyānaṃ bhaviṣyati /
GSP33vacbhamu:13220: annamayaṃ hi somya mana ityannātmatāmāha manasaḥ śrutirāpomayaḥ prāṇa iti ca prāṇasyābātmatām
GSP33vacbhamu:13222: tathā ca prāṇo manasaḥ prakṛtiriti manaso vṛttimataḥ prāṇe laya iti prāpte 'bhidhīyate-- satyam, āpo 'nnamasṛjanta iti śruterabannayoḥ prakṛtivikārabhāvo 'vagamyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:13224: khayoniprāṇāḍikayā tu mitho vikārayoḥ prakṛtivikārabhāvābhyupagame saṃkarādatiprasaṅgaḥ syāt
GSP33vacbhamu:13225: tasmādyo yasya sākṣādvikārastasya tatra laya ityannasyāpsu layo na tvabvikāre prāṇe 'nnavikārasya manasaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13226: tathā cātrāpi manovṛttervṛttimati prāṇe layo na tu vṛttimato manasa iti siddham //3 //
GSP33vacbhamu:13228: prāṇastejasīti tejaḥśabdasya bhūtaviśeṣavacanatvādvijñānātmani cāprasiddheḥ prāṇasya jīvātmanyupagamānugamāvasthānaśrutīnāṃ ca tejoddhāreṇāpyupapatteḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13232: tasmāttejasyeva prāṇavṛttipravilaya iti prāpte 'bhidhīyate--- sa prakṛtaḥprāṇo 'dhyakṣe vijñānātmanyavatiṣṭhate tattantravṛttirbhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:13242: yadyapi prāṇastejasītyatastejasi prāṇavṛttilayaḥ pratīyate, tathāpi sarvaśākhāpratyayatvena vidyānāṃ śrutyantarālocanayā vijñānātmani layo
GSP33vacbhamu:13244: na ca tejasastatrāpi laya iti sāmpratam /
GSP33vacbhamu:13248: tejaḥsahacaritāni bhūtānyupalakṣyantāṃ tejaḥśabdenādhyakṣe tu kimāyātaṃ tasya tadasāhacaryādityarthaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:13250: yadā hyayaṃ prāṇo 'ntarāle 'dhyakṣaṃ prāpyādhyasaṃparkavaśādeva tejaḥprabhṛtīni bhūtasūkṣmāṇi prāpnoti tadopapadyate prāṇastesīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:13264: praśaṃsāśabdo 'pi karmaṇāṃ prayojakatayā prakṛṣṭamāśrayatvaṃ brūte sati nikṛṣṭa āśrayāntare tadupapatterityāha-- praśaṃsāśabdādapi tatreti //6
GSP33vacbhamu:13266: atrābhṛtatvaprāptiśruteḥ paravidyāvantaṃ pratyetaditi manvānasya pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13271: sādharmyavaidharmyābhyāṃ hi sphuṭataraḥ pratipipādayiṣite vastuni pratyayo bhavatīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:13272: na tu viduṣaḥ sakāśādviśeṣavanto 'vidvāṃso vidhīyante yena vidyāprakaraṇavyākhyāto bhavedapi tu vidyāṃ pratipādayituṃ lokasiddhānāṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:13277: ayaṃ vidyopakrama ārambhaḥ prayatna iti yāvat /
GSP33vacbhamu:13278: tasmādetaduktaṃ bhavati-- neyaṃ parā vidyā yato nāḍīdvāramāśrayate /
GSP33vacbhamu:13280: na cāsyāmātyantikaḥ kleśapradāho yato na tatrotkrāntirbhavet /
GSP33vacbhamu:13284: siddhāṃ kṛtvā bījabhāvāvaśeṣaṃ paramātmasaṃpattiṃ vidvadaviduṣorutkrāntiḥ samarthitā /
GSP33vacbhamu:13286: kimātmani tejaḥprabhṛtīnāṃ bhūtasūkṣmāṇāṃ tatvapravilaya eva saṃpattirāhosvidbījabhāvāvaśeṣeti
GSP33vacbhamu:13290: tatrāprakṛtau na vikāratatvapravilayo yathā manasi na vāgādīnām /
GSP33vacbhamu:13291: sarvasya ca janimataḥ prakṛtiḥ parā devateti tattvapralaya evātyantikaḥ syāttejaḥprabhṛtīnāmiti prāpte 'bhidhīyate-- 'yonimanye prapadyante śarīratvāya dehinaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13293: ' ityavidyāvataḥ saṃsāramupadiśati śrutiḥ seyamātyantike tattvalaye nopapadyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:13294: na ca prāyaṇasyaivaiṣa mahimā vidvāsamavidvāṃsaṃ vā pratīti
GSP33vacbhamu:13295: sāṃpratamityāha-- anyathā hi sarvaḥ prāyaṇasamaya eveti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:13298: na kevalaṃ śāstrānarthakyamayuktaśca prāyaṇamātrānmokṣa ityāha-- mithyājñāneti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:13302: kasmānna mūrtāntaraiḥ pratibadhyata iti śaṅkāmapākartumidaṃ sūtram-- sūkṣmaṃ pramāṇataśca tathopalabdheḥ. /
GSP33vacbhamu:13305: tacca sūkṣmaṃ svarūpataḥ parimāṇataśca svarūpameva hi tasya tādṛśamadṛśyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:13306: yathā cākṣuṣasya tejaso mahato 'pi adṛṣṭavaśādanudbhūtarūpasparśaṃ hi tat
GSP33vacbhamu:13307: parimāṇataḥ saukṣmyaṃ yato nopalabhyate yathā trasareṇavo jālasūryamarīcibhyo 'nyatra pramāṇatastathopalabdhiriti vyācaṣṭe-- tathāhi nāḍīniṣkramaṇa iti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:13308: ādigrahaṇena cakṣuṣṭo vā mūrdho vā anyebhyo vā śarīradeśebhya iti saṃgṛhītam /
GSP33vacbhamu:13311: yathā hi kācābhrapaṭalaṃ svacchasvabhāvasya na tejasaḥ pratidhātam /
GSP33vacbhamu:13322: siddhāntimatamāśaṅkya tannirākaraṇena pūrvapakṣī svamatamavasthāpayati-- ataḥ paravidyāviṣayātpratiṣedhāditi. /
GSP33vacbhamu:13323: yadi hi prāṇopalakṣitasya sūkṣmaśarīrasya jīvātmanaḥ sthūlaśarīrādutkrāntiṃ pratiṣedhecchrutiḥ tata etadupapadyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:13325: na tasmātprāṇa utkrāmantīti hi tadā sarvanāmnā pradhānāvamarśinābhyudayaniḥ śreyasādhikṛto dehi pradhānaṃ parāmṛśyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:13326: tathā ca tasmāddehino na prāṇaḥ sūkṣmaṃ śarīramutkrāmantyapi tu tatsahitaḥ kṣetrajña evotkrāmatīti gamyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:13327: sa punaratikramya brahmanāḍya saṃsāramaṇḍalaṃ hiraṇyagarbhaparyantaṃ saliṅgo jīvaḥ parasminbrahmaṇi līyate tasmātparāmapi devatāṃ viduṣa utkrāntirata eva mārgaśrutayaḥ, smṛtiśca mumukṣoḥ śukasyādityamaṇḍalaprasthānaṃ darśayatīti prāptam //12 //
GSP33vacbhamu:13331: tathā hi -- ārtabhāgapraśnottare hyekasminpakṣe saṃsāriṇa eva jīvātmano 'nutkrāntiṃ parigṛhya na tarhyeṣa bhṛtaḥ prāṇānāmanutkrānteriti svayamāśaṅkya prāṇānāṃ pravilayaṃ pratijñāya tatsiddhyarthamutkrāntyavadherucchvayanādhmāne bruvanyasyocchvayanādhmāne
GSP33vacbhamu:13333: śarīrasya ca te itiśarīrameva tadapādānaṃ gamyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:13334: nanvevamapyastvaviduṣaḥ saṃsāriṇo viduṣastu kimāyātamityata āha-- tatsāmānyāditi. /
GSP33vacbhamu:13335: nanu tadā sarvanāmnā pradhānatayā dehi parāmṛṣṭaḥ tatkathamatra dehāvagatirityata āha-- tatsāmānyaditi. /
GSP33vacbhamu:13336: nanu tadā sarvanāmnā pradhānatayā dehī parāmṛṣṭaḥ tatkathamatra dehāvagatirityata āha-- abhedopacāreṇa. /
GSP33vacbhamu:13337: dehadehinordehiparāmarśinā sarvanāmnā deha eva parāmṛṣṭa iti pañcamīpāṭhe vyākhyeyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:13338: ṣaṣṭhīpāṭhe tu nopacāra ityāha-- yeṣāṃ tu ṣaṣṭhīti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:13339: api ca prāptipūrvaḥ pratiṣedho bhavati nāprāpte /
GSP33vacbhamu:13340: aviduṣo hi dehādutkrāmaṇaṃ dṛṣṭamiti viduṣo 'pi tatsāmānyāddehādutkramaṇe prāpte pratiṣedha upapadyate na tu prāṇānāṃ jīvāvadhikaṃ kvacidutkramaṇaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:13344: apadasya hi brahmavido mārge padaiṣiṇo 'pi devā iti yojanā /
GSP33vacbhamu:13350: tāni punaḥ prāṇaśabdoditānīndriyāṇyekādaśa sūkṣmāṇi ca bhūtāni pañca /
GSP33vacbhamu:13357: itarā tu evamevāsya paridṛṣṭuḥ ityādikā vidvatpratipattyapekṣā tāttvikapramāṇāpekṣā /
GSP33vacbhamu:13361: avidyānimittaśca vibhāgo nāvidyāyāṃ vidyayā samūlaghātamapahatāyāṃ sāvaśeṣo bhavitumarhati
GSP33vacbhamu:13365: tatra kiṃ vidvānavidvāṃścāviśeṣeṇa mūrdhādibhya utkrāmatyāho vidvānmūrdhasthānādeva, apare tu sthānāntarebhya iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:13367: tasyopasaṃhṛtavāgādikalāpasyocciktamiṣato vijñānātmanā oka āyatanaṃ hṛdayaṃ tasyāgraṃ tasya jvalanaṃ yattatprakāśitadvāro viniṣkramadvāro vidvānmūrdhasthānādeva niṣkrāmati nānyebhyaścakṣurādisthānebhyaḥ kutaḥ-- vidyāsāmarthāt hārdavidyāsāmarthyāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:13370: atha sthānāntarebhyo 'pyutkrāmamankasmāllokamutkṛṣṭaṃ na prāpnotītyata āha-- taccheṣagatyanusmṛtiyogācca. hārdavidyāśeṣabhūtā hi mūrdhanyā nāḍī gatyai upadiṣṭā /
GSP33vacbhamu:13371: tadanuśīlanena khalvayaṃ jīvo hārdena sūpāsitena brahmaṇānugṛhītastasyānusmaraṃstadbhāvamāpanno mūrdhanyayaiva śatādhikayā nāḍya niṣkrāmati /
GSP33vacbhamu:13372: hṛdayādudgatā hi brahmanāḍī bhāsvarā tālumūlaṃ bhittvā mūrdhānametya raśmibhirekībhūtā ādityamaṇḍalamanupraviṣṭā tāmanuśīlayatastayaivāntakāle nirgamanaṃ bhavatīti //17 //
GSP33vacbhamu:13374: rātrāvahani cāviśeṣeṇa raśmyanusārī sannādityamaṇḍalaṃ prāpnotīti siddhāntapakṣapratijñā //18
GSP33vacbhamu:13378: amuṣmādādityātpratāyante raśmayanta āsu nāḍīṣu sṛptā bhavanti ya ābhyo nāḍībhyaḥ pratāyante a.vistāryante te raśmayo 'muṣminnāditye sṛptāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13381: candramasā khalvaṃmayena saṃbadhyamānānāṃ sūrīṇāṃ bhāsāṃ candrikātvam /
GSP33vacbhamu:13388: ye tu manyante vidvānapi rātriprāyaṇāparādhena nordhvamākramata iti
GSP33vacbhamu:13390: nityavatphalasaṃbandhena vihitā vidyā na pākṣikaphalā yukteti /
GSP33vacbhamu:13391: ye tu rātrau pretasya viduṣo 'harapekṣāṃ sūryamaṇḍalaprāptirācakṣate
GSP33vacbhamu:13396: ata evetyuktahetuparāmarśa ityāha-- ata eva codīkṣānupapatteriti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:13400: viduṣo 'pi ca bhīṣmasyottarāyaṇapratīkṣaṇamaviduṣa ācāraṃ grāha- yati
GSP33vacbhamu:13402: āpūryamāṇapakṣādityādyā ca śrutirna kālaviśeṣapratipattyarthā, api tvātivāhikīrdevatāḥ pratipādayatīti vakṣyati /
GSP33vacbhamu:13404: sūtrāntarāvataraṇāya codayati-- nanu ca yatra kāle tviti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:13405: kāla evātra prādhānyenocyate na tvātivāhikī devatetyarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13406: yoginaḥ prati ca smaryate smārte caite. /
GSP33vacbhamu:13407: smārtīmupāsanāṃ pratyayaṃ smārtaḥ kālabhedaviniyogaḥ pratyāsatteḥ na tu śrautīṃ pratītyarthaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:13408: atra yadi smṛtau kālabhedavidhiḥ śrautau cāgnijyotirādividhistatrāgnyādīnāmātivāhikatayā viṣayavyavasthayā virodhābhāva uktaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13409: atha pratyabhijñānaṃ tathāpi yatra kāla ityatrāpi kālābhidhānadvāreṇātivāhikya eva devatā uktā ityavirodha eveti //21 //
GSP33vacbhamu:13410: iti śrīvācaspatimiśraviracite śārīrakabhāṣyavibhāge bhāmatyāṃ caturthasyādhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ //2 //
GSP33vacbhamu:13414: gantavyamekaṃ nagaraṃ prati vakreṇādhvanā gatimapekṣya ṛjunādhvanā gatistvarāvatī kalpyate
GSP33vacbhamu:13416: atha taireva raśmibhirityavadhāraṇaṃ nopapadyate pathyantarasya nivartanīyasyābhāvāttasmātparānapekṣā evaite panthāna ekabrahmalokaprāptyupāyā vrīhiyavāviva vikalperanniti prāpte pratyucyate-
GSP33vacbhamu:13419: saparvā hi panthā nagarādikamekaṃ gantavyaṃ prāpayati nābhāgaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13424: athaitaireva raśmibhirityavadhāraṇaṃ na tāvadarthāntaranivṛttyarthaṃ tatprāpakaireva vākyāntarairvirodhāt, tasmādanyānapekṣāmasyāvadhārayatīti vaktavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:13425: na caikaṃ vākyamaprāptamadhvānaṃ prāpayati tasya cānapekṣatāṃ pratipādayatītyarthadvayāya
GSP33vacbhamu:13428: na khalvekasminneva gantavye pathibhedamapekṣya tvarāvakalpyate kintu gantavyabhedādapi tadupapattiḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:13429: yathā kaśmīrebhyo mathurāṃ kṣipraṃ yāti caitra iti tathehāpyanyataḥ kutaścidgantavyādanenopāyena brahmalokaṃ kṣipraṃ prayātīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:13434: tasmādbhūyasāṃ parvaṇāmavirodhenālpānāṃ tadanupraveśa eva yukta iti //1 //
GSP33vacbhamu:13438: ' 'sa vāyumāgacchati tasmai sa tatra vijihīte yathā rathacakrasya khaṃ tena sa ūrdhvamākramate' iti hi vāyunimittamūrdhvākramaṇaṃ śrutaṃ na tu
GSP33vacbhamu:13443: tatrāgnilokamāgacchati sa vāyulokamityādisaṃdarbhagatasya pāṭhasya kvacinniyāmakatvena kḷptasāmarthyādagnivāyuvaruṇakramaniyāmakaśrutyādyabhāvāditi prāpte pratyucyate- ūrdhvaśabdo na lokasya kasyacitpratipādakaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13445: bhavedetadevaṃ yadyūrdhvaśabdātkaścillokabhedaḥ pratīyeta sa tūparideśamātravācī lokabhedādvināparyavasyaṃllokabhedavācināditye vyavasthāpyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:13446: tathā cādityalokagamanameva vāyunimittamiti śrautakramaniyame, pāṭhaḥ padārthamātrapradarśanārtho na tu kramāya prabhavati śrutivirodhāditi siddham /
GSP33vacbhamu:13447: vājasaneyināṃ saṃvatsaraloko na paṭhyate chāndogyānāṃ devaloko na paṭhyate tatrobhayānurodhādubhayapāṭhe māsasaṃbandhātsaṃvatsaraḥ pūrvaḥ paścimo devalokaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13448: nahi māso devalokena saṃbadhyate kintu saṃvatsareṇa /
GSP33vacbhamu:13449: tasmāttayoḥ parasparasaṃbandhānmāsārabhyatvācca saṃvatsarasya māsānantarye sthite devalokaḥ saṃvatsarasya parastādbhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:13450: tatrādityānantaryāya vāyoḥ saṃvatsarādityasya sthāne devalokādvāyumiti paṭhitavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:13463: na caiṣāṃ tvāvadhikānāmiva niyamavatī saṃvahanasvarūpā svatanantrakriyā buddhipūrvā saṃbhavatyacetanānām
GSP33vacbhamu:13466: na heturnāguṇe hetau pañcamī dṛśyate kvacit //
GSP33vacbhamu:13467: jāḍyādbaddha ityādiṣu guṇavacaneṣu jāḍyādiṣu hetupañcamī dṛṣṭā /
GSP33vacbhamu:13468: na cārcirādiśabdā guṇavācino yena pañcamyā teṣāṃ vahanaṃ prati hetutvamucyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:13470: na cāmānavasya puruṣasya vidyudādiṣu voḍhṛtvadarśanādarcirādīnāmapi voḍhṛtvānnāmānavaḥ puruṣo voḍhā śrūyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:13472: tasmādbhogabhūmaya evārcirādayo nātivāhikā iti prāpte pratyucyate
GSP33vacbhamu:13474: na svātantryaṃ na cāgnyādyā netāro 'cetanāstu te //
GSP33vacbhamu:13475: īdṛśī hi niyamavatī gatiḥ svayaṃ vā prekṣāvato 'prekṣāvato vā prekṣāvatprayuktasya /
GSP33vacbhamu:13476: na tāvadvigalitasthūlakalevarāḥ sūkṣmadehavantaḥ saṃpiṇḍitakaraṇagrāmā utkrāntimanto jīvātmāno mattamūrcchicavatsvayaṃ prekṣāvanto yadevaṃ svātantryeṇa gaccheyustadyadyarcirādayo 'pi mārgacihnāni vā śamīkāraskarādivadbhogabhūmayo vā sumeruśailalāvṛttādivadubhayathāpyacetanatayā na nayanaṃ pratyeṣāmasti svātantryam /
GSP33vacbhamu:13477: na caitebhyo 'nyasya cetanasya netuḥ kalpanā sati śrutānāṃ caitanyasaṃbhave /
GSP33vacbhamu:13480: tasmādvyavasthita eva parameśvarasya sarvādhyakṣatve yathā yathātvaṃ lokapālādīnāṃ svātantryamevamihāpyarcirādīnāmātivāhikatvameva darśanānusārācchabdārtha iti yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:13484: arciṣa iti ca hetau pañcamī nāpādāne /
GSP33vacbhamu:13490: yathā brāhmaṇamānaya bhojayitavya iti tadviśeṣāpekṣāyāṃ yadā tatsaṃnidhāvupanipatati padaṃ kaṇṭhādi(?) tadā tenaitanniyamyate evamihāpīti //4 // //5 //
GSP33vacbhamu:13492: vidyullokamāgato 'mānavaḥ puruṣo vaidyutastenaiva na tu varuṇādinā svayamuhyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:13494: varuṇādayastu tatsāhāyake vartamānā voḍhāro bhavantīti ca vaiṣamyaṃ na voḍhṛtve iti sarvamavadātam pāṭhakramādarthakramo balavānitiyathārthakramaṃ paṭhyante sūtrāṇi- paraṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:13497: kiṃ paraṃ brahma gamayatyāhosvidaparaṃ kāryaṃ brahmeti /
GSP33vacbhamu:13500: brahma gamayatītyatra hi napuṃsakaṃ brahmapadaṃ parasminneva brahmaṇi nirūḍhatvādanapekṣatayā mukhyamiti sati saṃbhave na kārye brahmaṇi guṇakalpanayā vyākhyātumucitam /
GSP33vacbhamu:13503: kiñca tatra tatra parameva brahma prakṛtya prajāpatisadmapratipattyādaya ucyamānā nāparabrahmaviṣayā bhavitumarhanti prakaraṇavirodhāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:13504: na ca parasmintsarvagate gatirnopapadyate prāptatvāditi yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:13506: yathaikasminnyagrodhapādape mūlādagramagrācca mūlaṃ gacchataḥ śākhāmṛgasyaikenaiva nyagrodhapādapena nirantaraṃ saṃyogavibhāgā bhavanti
GSP33vacbhamu:13507: na caite tadavayavaviṣayī na tu nyagrodhaviṣayā iti sāmprataṃ tathā sati na śākhāmṛgo nyagrodhena yujyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:13509: evaṃ dṛśyamānānāmapi tadavayavānāṃ na yogastadavayavayogāttadantena krameṇa tadavayaveṣu paramāṇuṣu vyavatiṣṭhate /
GSP33vacbhamu:13510: te cātīndriyā iti kasminnu nāmāyamanubhavapaddhatimadhyāstāṃ saṃyogatapasvī /
GSP33vacbhamu:13514: lokaśabdaścālokane prakāśe vartayitavyo na tu sanniveśavati deśaviśeṣe /
GSP33vacbhamu:13516: yathā vidyākarmavaśādarcirādinā gatasya satyalokamatikramya paraṃ jagatkāraṇaṃ brahma lokamālokaṃ svayaṃ prakāśakamiti yāvat /
GSP33vacbhamu:13517: prāptasya tatraiva liṅgaṃ pralīyate na tu gatimevaṃbhūtāṃ vinā liṅgapravilaya iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:13518: ata eva śrutiḥ- puruṣamāṇāḥ puruṣaṃ prāpyāstaṃ gacchanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:13519: tadanenābhisandhinā paraṃ brahma gamayatyamānava iti mene jaiminirācāryaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:13525: advaitabrahmatattvasākṣātkāravatastu vigalitanikhilaprapañcāvabhāsavibhramasya na gantavyaṃ na gatirna gamayitāra iti kiṃ kena saṃgatam /
GSP33vacbhamu:13527: naca tatrāpi prāptaprāptiḥ karmajena hi vibhāgena niruddhāyāṃ pūrvaprāptāvaprāptasyaivottaraprāpterutpatteḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:13528: etadapi vastuto vicārasahatayā sarvamanirvacanīyaṃ vijṛmbhitamavidyāyāḥ samutpannādvaitatattvasākṣātkāro na vidvānabhimanyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:13535: yathā vidyābrahmaprāptyoḥ samānakālatā śrūyate- 'brahma veda brahmaiva bhavati' 'ānandaṃ brahmaṇo vidvānna bibheti' 'tadātmānameva vedāhaṃ brahmāsmīti tatsarvamabhavat' 'tatra ko mohaḥ kaḥ śoka ekatvamanupaśyataḥ'
GSP33vacbhamu:13536: iti paurvāparyāśravaṇāt paravidyāvato muktiṃ prati nopāyāntarāpekṣeti lakṣyate 'bhisaṃdhiḥ śruteḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13538: na khalu brahmaivedaṃ viśvamahaṃ brahmāsmīti paribhāvanābhuvā jīvātmano brahmabhāvasākṣātkāreṇonmūlitāyāmanavayavenāvidyāyāmasti gantavyagantṛvibhāgo viduṣastadabhāve kathamayamarcirādimārge pravarteta /
GSP33vacbhamu:13540: śraddhāvihīnasya dṛṣṭārthāni karmāṇi phalanti na phalanti ca /
GSP33vacbhamu:13541: adṛṣṭārthānāṃ tu phale kā kathetyuktaṃ prathamasūtre /
GSP33vacbhamu:13542: na cārcirādimārgabhāvanāyāḥ parabrahmaprāptyarthamaviduṣaḥ pratyupadeśastathā ca karmāntareṣviva nityādiṣu tatrāpi syāttasya pravṛttirapi sāmpratam /
GSP33vacbhamu:13545: na tāvadanapekṣā 'tameva viditvātimṛtyumeti nānyaḥ panthā vidyate 'yanāya'
GSP33vacbhamu:13547: paravidyāpekṣatve tu mārgabhāvanāyāḥ kimiyaṃ vidyākārye mārgabhāvanā sāhāyakamācaratyatha vidyotpāde /
GSP33vacbhamu:13548: na tāvadvidyākārye tayā saha tasyā dvaitādvaitagocaratayā mitho virodhena sahāsaṃbhavāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:13554: lokatvaṃ celāvṛttādivatsanniveśaviśeṣavati bhogabhūmau nirūḍhaṃ na kathañcidyogena prakāśe vyākhyātaṃ bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:13556: aprāmāṇikānāṃ bahupralāpāḥ sarvagatasya dravyasya guṇāḥ sarvagatā eva caitanyānandādayaśca guṇinaḥ paramātmano bhedābhedavanto guṇā ityādayo dūṣaṇāyānubhāṣyamāṇā apyaprāmāṇikatvamāvahantyasmākamityupekṣitāḥ granthayojanā tu pratyagātmatvācca gantṝṇāṃ.pratiprati añcati gacchatīti pratyak pratibhāvavṛtti brahma tadātmatvādgantṝṇāṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:13570: codayati- nanu gatasyāpi pāramārthikī gantavyatā deśāntaraviśiṣṭasyeti. nyagrodhavānaradṛṣṭānta upapāditaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13573: ayamabhisaṃdhiḥ-yathātathā nyagrodhāvayavī pariṇāmavānupajanāpāyadharmabhiḥ karmajaiḥ saṃyogavibhāgaiḥ saṃyujyatāmayaṃ punaḥ paramātmā nirastanikhilabhedaprapañcaḥ kūṭasthanityo
GSP33vacbhamu:13587: api ceyaṃ gatirna vicāraṃ sahata ityāha- gatikalpanāyāṃ ceti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:13590: atha kasmādātyantikamananyatvaṃ na kalpyata ityata āha- atyantatādātmya
GSP33vacbhamu:13592: mṛdātmatayā hi svabhāvena ghaṭādayo bhāvāstadvikārā vyāptāḥ, tadabhāve na bhavanti śiṃśapeva vṛkṣatvābhāva iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:13593: vikārāvayavapakṣayośca tadvataḥ.saha vikārāvayavaiḥ sthiratvā.dacalatvādbrahmaṇaḥ saṃsāralakṣaṇaṃ gamanaṃ vikārāvayavayeranupapannam /
GSP33vacbhamu:13595: anyānanyatve api caikasya virodhādasaṃbhavantī iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13597: tathāca brahmaṇyasaṃsaratyapi jīvasya saṃsāraḥ kalpyata iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:13605: apica jīvānāṃ brahmāvayavatvapariṇāmātyantabhedapakṣeṣu tāttvikī saṃsāriteti muktau svabhāvahānājjīvānāṃ vināśaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13606: brahmavivartatve tu brahmaivaiṣāṃ svabhāvaḥ pratibimbānāmiva bimbaṃ taccāvināśīti na jīvavināśa ityāha- sarveṣveteṣviti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:13609: yathā hi kaphanimitto jvara upāttasya kaphasya viśeṣaṇādibhiḥ prakṣaye kaphāntarotpattinimittadadhyādivarjane praśānto 'pi na punarbhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:13610: evaṃ karmanimitto bandha upāttānāṃ karmaṇāmupabhogātprakṣaye praśāmyati /
GSP33vacbhamu:13611: karmāntarāmaṇāṃ ca bandhahetūnāmananuṣṭhānātkāraṇābhāve kāryānupapatterbandhābhāvātsvabhāvasiddho mokṣa ārogyamiva /
GSP33vacbhamu:13617: na cātropapattiḥ prabhavati saṃsārasyānāditayā karmāśayasyāpyasaṃkhyeyasyāniyatavipākakālasya bhogenocchettumaśakyatvādityāha- na caitattarkayitumapīti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:13621: yadi hi nityanaimittikāni karmāṇi sukṛtamapi duṣkṛtamiva nirvaheyustataḥ kāmyakarmopadeśā dattajalāñjalayaḥ prasajyeran /
GSP33vacbhamu:13622: nahyasti kaściccāturvarṇye cāturāśramye vā yo na nityanaimittikāni karmāṇi karoti /
GSP33vacbhamu:13626: samyagdarśī hi viraktaḥ kāmyaniṣiddhe varjayannapi pramādādupanipatite tenaivasamyagdarśanena kṣapayati /
GSP33vacbhamu:13627: jñānaparipāke ca na karotyeva ajñastu nipuṇo 'pi pramādātkaroti /
GSP33vacbhamu:13628: kṛte ca na kṣapayituṃ kṣamata iti viśeṣaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13630: kartṛtvabhoktṛtve samākṣiptakriyābhoge te cedātmanaḥ svabhāvāvadhārite na tvāropite tato na śakyāvapanetum /
GSP33vacbhamu:13632: na ca bhogo 'pi satsvabhāvaḥ śakyo 'satkartuṃ, no khalu nīlamanīlaṃ śakyaṃ śakreṇāpi kartuṃ tadidamuktaṃ- svabhāvasyāparihāryatvāditi. /
GSP33vacbhamu:13633: samāropitasya tvanirvacanīyasya tatsvabhāvasya śakyastattvajñānenāvaropaḥ kartuṃ sarpasyeva rajjutattvajñāneneti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13637: kartṛtvabhoktṛtvayornimittasaṃbandhasya ca śaktidvāreṇa nityatvādbhaviṣyati kadācideṣāṃ samudācāro yataḥ sukhaduḥkhe bhojyete iti saṃbhāvanātaḥ kutaḥ kaivalyaniścaya ityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13643: santi hi mano brahmetyupāsītetyādyāḥ pratīkaviṣayā vidyāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13647: naca brahmakratava eva brahmalokabhājo nātatkratava ityapyekāntaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13649: na caite na brahmakratavo mano brahmetyupāsītetyādau sarvatra brahmānugamena tatkratutvasyāpi saṃbhavāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:13650: phalaviśeṣasya brahmalokaprāptāvapyupapatteḥ, tasya sāvayavatayotkarṣanikarṣasaṃbhavāditi prāpte pratyucyate-
GSP33vacbhamu:13654: kimiva hi vacanaṃ na kuryāt nāsti vacanasyātibhāra iha tu tadabhāvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:13655: 'taṃ yathāyathopāsate tadeva bhavati' iti śruterautsargikyānnāsati viśeṣavacane 'pavādo yujyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:13659: āśrayāntarapratyayasyāśrayāntare prakṣepaḥ pratīka iti hi vṛddhāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13660: brahmāśrayaśca pratyayo nāmādiṣu prakṣipta iti nāmatantraḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13665: na hyevamubhayathābhāva ubhayathārthatve kāṃścitpratīkālambanānna nayati vikāralambanānviduṣastu nayatītyabhyupagame kaściddoṣo 'sti 'aniyamaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:13667: iti śrīvācaspatimiśraviracite bhagavatpādabhāṣyavibhāge bhāmatyāṃ caturthasyādhyāyasya tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ //3 //
GSP33vacbhamu:13670: prāgabhūtasya niṣpattau kartṛtvaṃ na sato yataḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13674: svarūpāvasthānaṃ cedātmano muktirna sā niṣpadyeta, tasya gaganavadatyantasataḥ prāgasattvābhāvāt
GSP33vacbhamu:13675: na cāsya bandhābhāvo niṣpadyate, tasya tucchasvabhāvasya kāryatvenātucchatvaprasaṅgāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:13676: phalatvaprasiddheśca mokṣasyākāryasya phalatvānavakalpanādāgantunā rūpeṇa kenacidutpattau sveneti prāptamanūdyata iti prāpte
GSP33vacbhamu:13679: anadhigatāvabodhanaṃ hi pramāṇaṃ śābdamagatyā kathañcidanuvādatayā varṇyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:13681: na cāsya niṣpattyasaṃbhavaḥ, sata iva ghaṭādeḥ sāṃvyavahārikeṇa pramāṇena bandhavigamasyāpi niṣpatterlokasiddhatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:13689: nanu jyotirupasaṃpadya svena rūpeṇābhiniṣpadyata iti paurvāparyaśravaṇāt svarūpaniṣpatteranyā jyotirupasaṃpattiḥ tathāca bhautikatve 'pi na mokṣavyāghātaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13690: bhavedetadevaṃ yadi jyotirupasaṃpadya tat parityajediti śrūyeta /
GSP33vacbhamu:13691: tadadhyāhāre 'pi tatpratipādanavaiyarthyaṃ tadaparityāge ca jyotiṣaiva svena rūpeṇeti gamyate
GSP33vacbhamu:13692: tasya ca bhūtatve vikāratvānmaraṇadharmakatvaprasiddheramuktitvamiti prāpte pratyucyate-jyotiṣpadasya mukhyatvaṃ bhautike yadyapi sthitam /
GSP33vacbhamu:13694: paraṃ jyotiriti hi parapadasamabhivyāhārātparatvasya cānapekṣasya brahmaṇyeva pravṛttejyotiṣi cāpare kiñcidapekṣya paratvātparaṃ jyotiriti vākyādātmaivātra gamyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:13696: yat saṃpadya niṣpadyata iti tanmukhaṃ vyādāya svapitītivat /
GSP33vacbhamu:13699: yadyapi jīvātmā brahmaṇo na bhinna iti tatra tatropapāditaṃ tathāpi sa tatra paryetītyādhārādheyabhāvavyapadeśasya saṃpattṛsaṃpattavyabhāvavyapadeśasya ca samādhānārthamāha //4 //
GSP33vacbhamu:13701: upanyāsa uddeśo jñātasya yathā ya ātmāpahatapāpmetyādiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13703: yathā sa tatra paryeti jakṣadramamāṇa iti, tasya sarveṣu lokeṣu kāmacāro bhavatītyetadajñātajñāpanaṃ vidhiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13711: muktaḥ saṃpadyate svairityāha sma kila jaiminiḥ //
GSP33vacbhamu:13712: na ca citsvabhāvasyātmano 'bhāvātmāno 'pahatapāpmatvādayo bhāvātmanaśca sarvajñatvādayo dharmā advaitaṃ ghnanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:13713: no khalu dharmiṇo dharmā bhidyante, mā bhūdgavāśvavaddharmidharmabhāvābhāva iti jaiminirācārya uvāca //5 //
GSP33vacbhamu:13719: atha na bhidyante tata ekasmādātmano 'bhedānmitho 'pi na bhidyeran /
GSP33vacbhamu:13723: naca dharmiṇa ātmano na bhidyante mithastu bhidyanta iti sāmpratam /
GSP33vacbhamu:13726: bhedābhedau ca parasparavirodhādekatrābhāvānna saṃbhavata ityupapāditaṃ prathame sūtre /
GSP33vacbhamu:13728: tadadhīnanirūpaṇatayā teṣāmapi kālpanikatvamiti na tāttvikī taddharmatā śliṣyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:13732: tadidamuktaṃ- śabdavikalpajā evaite.apahatapāpmatvādayo na tu sāṃvyavahārikā apīti //6
GSP33vacbhamu:13737: śauṇḍīryaṃ tu na sahata ityāha- vyavahārāpekṣayeti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:13739: apahatapāpmasatyakāmatvādayastvaupādhikatayātāttvikā api vyāvahārikapramāṇopanītatayā lokasiddhā nātyantāsanto yena tacchabdā rāhoḥ śira itivadavāstavā ityarthaḥ //7 //
GSP33vacbhamu:13743: loke hi kañcidarthaṃ cikīrṣuḥ prayatate prayatamānaḥ samīhate samīhānastamarthamāpnotīti kramo dṛṣṭaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13745: tena śrutyāpi lokavṛttamanurudhyamānayā viduṣastādṛśa eva kramo
GSP33vacbhamu:13747: avadhāraṇaṃ tu saṃkalpādeveti laukikaṃ yatnagauravamapekṣya vidyāprabhāvato viduṣo yatnalāghavāt
GSP33vacbhamu:13750: yathā manorathamātropasthāpitā strī straiṇānāṃ caramadhātuvisargaheturevaṃ pitrādayo 'pyasya saṃkalpopasthāpitāḥ kalpiṣyante svakāryāyetyata āha- naca saṃkalpamātrasamutthāpanā iti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:13751: santi hi khalu kānicidvastusvarūpasādhyāni kāryāṇi yathā strīvastusādhyāni dantakṣatamaṇimālādīni
GSP33vacbhamu:13753: tatra manorathamātropanīte pitrādau bhavantu tajjñānamātrasādhyāni kāryāṇi natu tatsādhyāni bhavitumarhanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:13754: nahi straiṇasya romaharṣādivadbhavanti strīvastusādhyā maṇimālādayastadidamuktaṃ puṣkalaṃ bhoga.miti prāpte 'bhidhīyate-
GSP33vacbhamu:13757: pramāṇāntarānapekṣā hi śrutiḥ svārthaṃ gocarayantī na pramāṇāntareṇa śakyā bādhitum /
GSP33vacbhamu:13758: anumānameva tu svotpādāya pakṣadharmatvādivanmānāntarābādhitaviṣayatvaṃ svasāmagrīmadhyapātenāpekṣamāṇaṃ sāmagrīkhaṇḍanena tadviruddhayā śrutyā bādhyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:13761: tathāhurāgaminaḥ-ko hi yogaprabhāvādṛte 'gastya iva samudraṃ pibati sa iva daṇḍakāraṇyaṃ sṛjati /
GSP33vacbhamu:13766: anekadhābhāvaścarddhiprabhāvabhuvo manobhedādvā stutimātraṃ vā kathañcidbhūmavidyāyāṃ nirguṇāyāṃ tadasaṃbhavādasatāpi hi guṇena stutirbhavatyeveti //10 //
GSP33vacbhamu:13771: ata eva saubharerabhivinirmitavividhadehasyāparyāyeṇa māndhātṛkanyābhiḥ pañcāśatā vihāraḥ pairāṇikaiḥ smaryate /
GSP33vacbhamu:13774: yadyapi nirguṇāyamidaṃ bhaumavidyāyāṃ paṭhyate tathāpi tasyāḥ purastādanena saguṇāvasthāgatenaiśvaryeṇa nirguṇaiva vidyā stūyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:13777: tasmānmanaḥ śarīrendriyayoga aiśvaryaśālināṃ niyameneti mene jaiminiḥ //11
GSP33vacbhamu:13779: manaseti kevalamanoviṣayāṃ ca sa ekadhā bhavati tridhā bhavatīti śarīrendriyabhedaviṣayāṃ ca śrutimupalabhyāniyamavādī khalu bādarāyaṇo niyamavādau pūrvayorna sahate /
GSP33vacbhamu:13782: kāmeṣu hi ramaṇaṃ samanaskendriyeṇa śarīreṇa puruṣāṇāṃ siddhameveti nāsti śaṅkā manoyogasyeti tadvyavacchedo vyarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13788: dvādaśāhamṛddhikāmā upeyurityupāyicodanena ya evaṃ vidvāṃsaḥ satramupayantīti ca dvādaśāhasya satratvaṃ bahukartṛkasya gamyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:13789: evaṃ tasyaiva dvādaśāhena prajākāmaṃ yājayediti yajaticodanena niyatakartṛparimāṇatvena dvirātreṇa yajatetyādivadahīnatvamapi gamyata iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:13790: saṃprati śarīrendriyābhāvena manomātreṇa viduṣaḥ svapnavatsūkṣmo bhogo bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:13793: yadi punaḥ suṣuptavadabhogo bhavet naiṣā śrutirupapadyeta /
GSP33vacbhamu:13802: vijñānātmānādyavidyākalpitaprādeśikāntaḥkaraṇāvacchedenānādijīvabhāvamāpannaḥ prādeśikaḥ sanna dehāntarāṇi svabhāvanirmitānyapi nānāpradeśavartīni sāntaḥkaraṇo yugapadāveṣṭumarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:13808: evaṃ nirmāṇaśarīrāṇyapi sendriyāṇīti prāpte pratyabhidhīyate-śarīratvaṃ na jātu syādbhogādhiṣṭhānatāṃ vinā /
GSP33vacbhamu:13809: sa tridheti śarīratvamuktaṃ yuktaṃ ca tadvibhau //
GSP33vacbhamu:13810: sa tridhā bhavati pañcadhā saptadhā navadhetyādikā śrutirviduṣo nānābhāvamācakṣāṇā bhinnaśarīrendriyopādhisaṃbandhe
GSP33vacbhamu:13812: nahi yantrāṇi bhinnāni nirmāya vāhayanyantravāho nānātvenāpadiśyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:13813: bhogādhiṣṭhānatvaṃ ca śarīratvaṃ nābhogādhiṣṭhāneṣu yantreṣviva yujyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:13816: naca sarvagatasya vastuto vigalitaprāyāvidyasya viduṣaḥ pṛthagjanasyevautpattikāntaḥkaraṇavaśyatā yena tadautpattikamantaḥkaraṇamāgantukāntaḥkaraṇāntarasaṃbandhamasya vārayet /
GSP33vacbhamu:13817: tasmādvidvān sarvasya vaśī sarveśvaraḥ satyasaṃkalpaḥ sendriyamanāṃsi śarīrāṇi nirmāya tāni caikapade praviśya tattadindriyamantaḥkaraṇaisteṣu lokeṣu mukto viharatīti sāṃpratam /
GSP33vacbhamu:13818: pradīpavaditi tu nidarśanaṃ pradīpaikyaṃ pradīpavyaktiṣūpacaryate bhinnavartivartinīnāṃ bhinnavyaktīnāṃ bhedāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:13822: na caitasyetthaṃbhāvasaṃbhavaḥ śrutivirodhādityuktamarthajātamākṣipati- kathaṃ punarmuktasyeti salila iti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:13823: salilamiva salilaḥ salilaprātipadikātsarvaprātipadikebhya ityupamānādācāre kvipi kṛte pacādyaci ca kṛte rūpam /
GSP33vacbhamu:13827: āsu kāścicchrutayaḥ suṣuptimapekṣya kāścittu saṃpattiṃ tadadhikārāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:13828: aiśvaryaśrutayastu saguṇavidyāvipākāvasthāpekṣā muktyabhisaṃdhānaṃ tu tadavasthāsatteryathāruṇadarśane saṃdhyāyāṃ divasābhidhānam //16 //
GSP33vacbhamu:13832: 'āpnoti svārājyaṃ' 'sarve 'smai devā balimāvahanti' 'sarveṣu lokeṣu kāmacāro bhavati' ityādiśrutibhyo viduṣaḥ parabrahmaṇa
GSP33vacbhamu:13834: nanvasya brahmopāsanālabdhamaiśvaryaṃ kathaṃ brahmādhīnaṃ na tu svabhāvaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:13839: na ca viduṣāṃ parameśvarādhīnaiśvaryasiddhitvāttadgatamaiśvaryaṃ yena laukikā iva rājāno mahārājādhīnaḥ svavyāpāre vidvāṃsaḥ parameśvarādhīnā bhaveyuḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13840: na khalu yadadhīnotpādaṃ yasya rūpaṃ tattadrūpādūnaṃ bhavatīti kaścinniyamaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13841: tatsamānāṃ tadadhikānāṃ ca darśanāttathā hyantevāsī gurvadhīnavidhaḥ tatsamastadadhiko vā dṛśyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:13843: tadiha niratiśayaiśvaryatvāt parameśvarasya mā nāma bhūvanvidvāṃsastato
GSP33vacbhamu:13847: tadete svatantrāḥ santastadvyāpāre jagatsarjane 'pi pravarteranniti prāpte pratyabhidhīyate-nityatvādanapekṣatvāt śrutestatprakramādapi /
GSP33vacbhamu:13849: jagatsargalakṣaṇaṃ hi kāryaṃ kāraṇaikasvabhāvasyaiva hi bhavatu āho kāryakāraṇasvabhāvasya
GSP33vacbhamu:13850: tatrobhayasvabhāvasya svotpattau mūlakāraṇāpekṣasya pūrvasiddhaḥ parameśvara eva kāraṇamabhyupetavya iti sa evaiko 'stu jagatkāraṇam /
GSP33vacbhamu:13856: apica samapradhānānāṃ hi na niyamavadaikamatyaṃ dṛṣṭamiti yadaikaḥ sisṛkṣati tadaivetaraḥ saṃjihīrṣatītyaparyāyeṇa sṛṣṭisaṃhārau syātām /
GSP33vacbhamu:13859: tatrāgantukānāṃ kāraṇādhīnajanmaiśvaryāṇāṃ gṛhyamāṇaviśeṣatayāsamatvānnityaiśvaryaśālinaḥ sa eva teṣāmadhīśa iti tattantrā vidvāṃsa iti parameśvaravyāpārasya sargasaṃhārasya neśate pūrvapakṣiṇo 'nuśayabījamāśaṅkya nirākaroti- pratyakṣopadeśāditi
GSP33vacbhamu:13861: yataḥ parameśvarādhīnamaiśvaryaṃ tasmāttato nyūnamaṇimādimātraṃ svārājyaṃ na tu jadatsraṣṭṛtvam
GSP33vacbhamu:13866: tathā pādo 'sya viśvā bhūtānīti vikāravarti rūpaṃ tripādasyāmṛtaṃ divīti
GSP33vacbhamu:13868: darśayataścāpare śrutismṛtī nirvikārameva rūpaṃ bhagavataste ca paṭhite /
GSP33vacbhamu:13869: etaduktaṃ bhavati-yadi brūṣe saguṇe brahmaṇyupāsyamāne yathā tadguṇasya niravagrahatvamapi vastuto 'stīti niravagrahatve viduṣā prāptavyamiti
GSP33vacbhamu:13871: yathā savikāre brahmaṇyupāsyamāne vastutaḥ sthitamapi nirvikārarūpaṃ na prāpyate tatkasya hetoḥ, atatkratutvādupāsakasya /
GSP33vacbhamu:13872: tathā tadguṇopāsanayā vastutaḥ sthitamapi niravagrahatvaṃ nāpyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:13874: upāsakasya tadakratutvaṃ ca niravagrahatvasyopāsanavidhyagocaratvādvidhyadhīnatvāccopāsanāsu puruṣasvātantryābhāvātsvātantrye vā prātibhatvaprasaṅgāditi //20 //
GSP33vacbhamu:13876: na kevalaṃ svārājyasyeśvarādhīnatayājagatsarjanam, sākṣādbhogamātreṇa tena parameśvareṇa sāmyābhidhānādapi vyapadeśaliṅgāditi /
GSP33vacbhamu:13879: saha parameśvarasyātiśayena vartata iti viduṣa aiśvaryaṃ sātiśayam /
GSP33vacbhamu:13880: yacca kāryaṃ sātiśayaṃ tacca yathā laukikamaiśvaryam /
GSP33vacbhamu:13882: tathāca kāryatvādantavatprāptamiti tacca na yuktamānantyena tadviduṣāṃ tatra pravṛtteriti ata uttaraṃ paṭhati- anāvṛttiḥ śabdādanāvṛttiḥ śabdāt. /
GSP33vacbhamu:13891: na caitannirvāṇaṃ svarūpāvasthānalakṣaṇaṃ kāryaṃ yenānityaṃ syādityāha- nityasiddheti. //22 //
GSP33vacbhamu:13893: so 'yaṃ śāṅkarabhāṣyajātaviṣayo vācaspateḥ sādaraṃ saṃdarbhaḥ paribhāvyatāṃ sumatayaḥ svārtheṣu ko matsaraḥ //1 //
GSP33vacbhamu:13904: iti śrīvācaspatimiśraviracite śaṅkarabhagavatpādabhāṣyavibhāge bhāmatyāṃ caturthasyādhyāyasya caturthaḥ pādaḥ samāptaḥ. /
